
1a1(rgyud 'grel): dpal sangs rgyas thams cad dang mnyam par sbyor ba'i rgyud kyi dka' 'grel bzhugs//
1b1(rgyud 'grel): rgya gar skad du/ sh+rI sarba bud+d+ha sa ma yo ga tan+t+ra nA ma pany+tsi kA/ bod skad du/ dpal sangs rgyas thams cad
1b2(rgyud 'grel): dang mnyam par sbyor ba zhes bya ba'i rgyud kyi dka' 'grel/ bcom ldan 'das dpal rdo rje sems dpa' la phyag 'tshal lo/ /
1b3(rgyud 'grel): kun mkhyen kun mdzad thams cad pa/ /kun khyab mchod chen rdo rje dang/ /slob dpon in+d+ra b+ha ti la/ /shAkya bshes gnyen
1b4(rgyud 'grel): phyag 'tshal lo/ /sangs rgyas kun gyi nges pa'i tshig /bla mas bstan par mdzad du gsol/ /gsang ba zhes
2a1(rgyud 'grel): ni gang la bgyi/ /mchog gi zhes ni gang la bgyi/ /dgyes pa zhes ni ji ltar bshad/ /thams cad bdag
2a2(rgyud 'grel): nyid ji ltar bzhugs/ /sangs rgyas kun gyi dngos po gang/ /sems dpa' zhes ni gang la bgyi/ /rnam pa dag ni gang dag gis/ /
2a3(rgyud 'grel): rdo rje sems dpa' bde ba'i mchog /bde ba rnam pa du ru bshad/ /rdo rje sems dpa' ji lta bu/ /de ni ji ltar rang byung yin/ /
2a4(rgyud 'grel): gcig pu nyid ni ji lta bu/ /bcom ldan 'das sgra ji lta bu/ /che ba'i lha ni ji lta bu/ /sangs rgyas thams cad don gang lags/ /
2b1(rgyud 'grel): mnyam par sbyor zhes gang la bgyi/ /mkha' 'gro zhes bya gang gi ming/ /sgyu ma ji ltar 'gyur ba lags/ /bde ba'i mchog ces gang la bgyi/ /de bzhin
2b2(rgyud 'grel): ngan par spyod pa gang/ khyed kyi chags pa med pa gang/ /chags pa yang ni gang zhig lags/ /chags bral min pa'ang khyed kyis shod/ /bud med
2b3(rgyud 'grel): kun gyi sgyu ma ci/ /rgya 'di gnyis med theg pa yi/ /mchog ces gang la rab tu bsgrags/ /gnas ni gang du yang dag bshad/ /zhu ba por ni 'dir gyur
2b4(rgyud 'grel): pa/ /'dir ni rgyud 'di'i ston pa su/ /der ni 'khor yang ji lta bu/ /rigs ni dbye ba du ru bshad/ /sngags btu ba yi rim pa gang/ /ston pa'i glu
2b5(rgyud 'grel): zhes gang la bshad/ /brjod dang 'grel dang dgos pa dang/ /sngon byung ba yi rnam drug dang/ /de bzhin sna tshogs pad+ma ras/ /A li kA li mnyam
3a1(rgyud 'grel): pa'i rgya/ /mnyam med mi g.yo bstod pa dang/ /de nyid min pa'i rnal 'byor dang/ /shin tu de nyid ji ltar 'gyur/ /rol tu phyag rgya 'ang bshad du
3a2(rgyud 'grel): gsol/ /mnyam par ma bzhag rnal 'byor dang/ /rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas nyi zla dang/ /shar ba dag ni ji lta bu/ /dkyil 'khor zlum po sangs rgyas kyi//
3a3(rgyud 'grel): rdo rje can gyi zla khams bzhin/ /padmo'i dbang gi padmo'i dbyibs/ /rin chen mchog gi rin chen dbyibs/ /bri 'am yang na mi 'dri ba'i/ /dkyil 'khor
3a4(rgyud 'grel): rnams ni ji ltar bzhag /dkyil 'khor dang ni rgyud dang ni/ /de bzhin du ni sngags rnams kyis/ /sbas dang gtso bo'i sgra ni gang/ /cho ga rnams kyang
3a5(rgyud 'grel): bshad du gsol/ /sbyor ba'i rnam pa ji lta bus/ /rdo rje sems dpa' stobs chen yin/ /dbang phyug dang ni tshangs pa dang/ /dbang por bcas dang khyab
3b1(rgyud 'grel): 'jug dang/ /'dod lha chung mar bcas gsol zhing/ /lha mo b+hi ma drug min bcas/ /mngon thon sbyar bas spyad mdzad la/ /sngon ni de la skyabs su song/ /rtag tu 'di ltar g.yul 'gyed pa/ /der ni
3b2(rgyud 'grel): gsang ba ji lta bur/ /rdo rje can de brdzun pa'i tshig /phyi nas gsungs par mdzad gyur te/ /sangs rgyas rdo rje sems dpa' pa/ /tshangs pa khyab 'jug zla ba dang/ /thams cad bdag nyid rtag bzhugs zhes//
3b3(rgyud 'grel): gzhan yang sngon ni gsungs pa nyid/ /rdo rje sems dpa' byed pa po/ /lha gzhan gang zhig yod dam ci/ /rdo rje nyi ma mnan pa dang/ /rnam par snang mdzad dpal nyid dang/ /dpal ldan rdo rje 'chang mnan
3b4(rgyud 'grel): cing/ /de bzhin du yang rta mchog dang/ /'jig rten dbang phyug sprul mo dang/ /byang chub de bzhin pha rol phyin/ /rkang pa brkyang dang gnon pa dang/ /bskum nas 'degs pa'i stabs dag gis/ /
3b5(rgyud 'grel): g.yas dang g.yon pa'i sbyor ba yis/ /gzugs rnams thams cad gnon par byed/ /bcom ldan lha la rnal 'byor ni/ /mngon sum rjes su dpag pa gang/ /DA ni nam mkha' 'go sgra dang//
3b6(rgyud 'grel): thams cad ma lus pa nyid dang/ /kun tu kun nas thams cad ni/ /bdag nyid kun tu rnam pa kun/ /sangs rgyas brtan g.yo la sogs kun/ /kun gyi dngos por ji ltar 'gyur/ /ji ltar sems
4a1(rgyud 'grel): de 'di ltar yang/ /dngos po kun la gnas par gyur/ /rdo rje can gyi gzhi nyid dang/ /khro bo'i gzugs su ji ltar gyur/ /chos kyi sku ni ji ltar bshad/ /longs spyod rdzogs pas
4a2(rgyud 'grel): gang zhig bya/ /sprul pa'i tshogs ni ji lta bu/ /rdo rje sems dpa' i tshig ni gang/ /lha yi tshig ni gang zhig ces/ /shAkya'i bshes gnyen the tshom gyur/ /sngags ston rnams kyis btus pa yis//
4a3(rgyud 'grel): bcos pa'i tshig ni gang zhig lha/ /in+d+ra b+hu ti de nyid mkhyen/ /'di dag thams cad bshad du gsol/ /de nas legs so legs so zhes/ /slob dpon in+d+ra b+hu tis byin/ /shAkya shes rab rab ldan khyod//
4a4(rgyud 'grel): sangs rgyas kun gyi nges par nyon/ /ji ltar bla mas bdag la bshad/ /mdor bsdus nas ni bshad par bya/ /gnas ni nam mkha' lngas brgyan pa'i/ /shes rab b+ha ga yin par bshad/ /chos kyi 'khor lo lte
4a5(rgyud 'grel): ba ched/ /rdo rje can ni stong par gzhugs/ /nyid kyi thugs ni bdag nyid can/ /bde mchog de yi zhu ba po/ /rdo rje can gyis bdag 'dod spyod/ /longs spyod rdzogs pa'i skur mdzad cing/ /sprul pa'i sku ni stong pa dang//
4a6(rgyud 'grel): chos kyi sku ni thig ler bcas/ /ji ltar yang dag rdzogs gyur cing/ /stong pa gdan la legs bzhugs te/ /longs spyod rdzogs pa'i skur mdzad nas/ /sangs rgyas kun sbyor bshad
4b1(rgyud 'grel): du gsol/ /bde mchog ma mo'i tshogs bcas par/ /'dir ni zhu ba por gyur to/ /rdo rje can gyi ma mo la/ /rigs kyi dbye bas phye ste bshad/ /'brel pa 'jig rten pha rol te/ /dgos pa sgrub pa po rnams kyis/ /sbas pa'i sgra ni gsang ba ste/ /rdo rje can
4b2(rgyud 'grel): gyi sba bar bshad/ /gtso bo'i sgra 'di ni bshad/ /mngon sum gyi ni tshig nyid do/ /gang tshe sems ni mi mthong bas/ /sbas te rjes su dpag pa ste/ /gsang ba mchog gi dgyes pa na/ /thams cad bdag nyid rtag tu bzhugs/ /gzugs sogs sngo dang ser po
4b3(rgyud 'grel): dang/ /de kar dang la brgan mdog tu ni/ /gang tshe sems ni mi mthong zhing/ /rna bdag gis mi thos pas/ /kyang tshe sems ni ji 'dra zhes/ /rjes su dpag par de tshe 'gyur/ /gzhan yang dri bcas sna dang ni/ /lce yis tshor bar mi 'gyur zhing/ /de bzhin longs
4b4(rgyud 'grel): spyod bde ba dag /gzhan gyis sems mthong mi 'gyur la/ /khya dang ro yis ma yin zhing/ /reg bya rnams kyang de bzhin te/ /gsang ba mchog gi dgyes pa na/ /gang zhig thams cad bdag nyid bzhugs/ /rjes su dpag pas sgom byed pa/ /gsang pa'i gzhub
4b5(rgyud 'grel): na 'di lta bu'o/ /'di ni zhes bya'i sgra yod pas/ /lag mngon sum par 'dod de/ /rang byung kun tu snang gyur cing/ /de bzhin longs spyod rdzogs sku dang/ /mi ru snang zhing spyod pa dang/ /snom zhing myang dang bzhad pa dang/ /rnam pa sna tshogs g.yul 'gyed dang/ /
4b6(rgyud 'grel): dbang po gnyis kyis 'dod pa de dang/ /phyag ni brgya phrag bye ba dang/ /dbu ni 'brum phrag khrir gyur cing/ /tshad med zhabs gnyis zhabs bzhi dang/ /rdo rje sems dpa' brtan pa dang/ /g.yo ba rnams ni khyab pa zhes/ /gang phyir sngar ni bshad pas na/ /rtag tu mngon
4b7(rgyud 'grel): sum snang ba yis/ /gsang ba mchog gi dgyes pa yis/ /mngon sum gzhung ni 'di lta bu'o/ /de nas shAkya'i bshes gnyen gyis/ /a'in+d+ra b+hu Til zhus pa/ /gsang ba zhes ni bshad pa de/ /gang gis mi la rab tu bshad/ /slob dpon gyis 'di skad ces
5a1(rgyud 'grel): gsungs so/ /de nyid gsang ba zhes bshad pa/ /sa bon lnga ni gsang ba ste/ /sbas pa'i bden pa bshad pa yin/ /gsang ba'i pad+ma gsang ba'o/ /kar+Ni ka'i dga' gsang ba/ /thams cad 'dus pa gsang ba ste/ /bde ba'i 'og ni gsang ba zhes/ /brda
5a2(rgyud 'grel): yis bshad par mdzad pa yin/ /byang chub sems las byung ba yi/ /ting nge 'dzin ni mchog ces bshad/ /sems kyi rang bzhin bsam mi khyab/ /yid bzhin nor bu 'dra ba bzhin/ /bde mchog ces ni bya bar bsgrags/ /rdo rje sems dpa' i btsun mo gang/ /
5a3(rgyud 'grel): de ni gcig las du mar phye/ /shes rab pha rol phyin pa'ang de/ /kun mkhyen kun rtsol phra ba ste/ /snying ga'i phug gi nang na gnas/ /de ni sgyu ma'i gzugs su shes/ /sangs rgyas thams cad ston pa ste/ /sngon byung ba ni rnam lnga nyid/ /bde mchog la ni
5a4(rgyud 'grel): yang dag bshad/ /drug pa nyid kyang 'dum sde yi/ /tshad kun rgyud kyi nang yod de/ /rdo rje sems dpa' de la bshad/ /mi yi 'jig rten dag na med/ /bcom ldan 'das rdo rje sems dpas gsungs so/ /sngon byung go rims ji lta ba/ /'di ni bden pa mchog gi
5a5(rgyud 'grel): tshig /skad cig tsam gyis dus gcig na/ /sngon byung ba dang gsungs pa ste/ /sngon byung ba dang bde mchog gis/ /dus mang dag tu ma bshad de/ /bla ma rdo rje can bshad pa/ /ma mo rnams kyi nang du bshad/ /thams cad stong pa nyid rmongs pas/ /shin
5a6(rgyud 'grel): tu yongs su mya ngan 'das/ /de tshe rtag tu rdo rje can/ /sangs rgyas skur ni 'dzin nas/ /'dod chags zhe sdang gti mug gis/ /khebs las sems can kun grol mdzad/ /sangs rgyas srid la legs bzhag nas/ /dbugs 'byin pa ni stsol bar mdzad/ /rnam
5a7(rgyud 'grel): par snang mdzad dbugs 'byin bshad/ /he ru ka'i yang de nyon cig /de tshe sems can thams cad ni/ /shin tu khro gtum gdug par gyur/ /lha la sogs pa 'jigs byed cing/ /bstan pa dag kyang 'jig par byed/ /de nas bcom ldan rdo rje can/ /khro bo'i
5b1(rgyud 'grel): gzugs su rnam par phyung/ /'jigs pa chen po'i dus ltar gtum/ /mkha' 'gro rnams kyis yongs su bskor/ /thams cad za zhing bral ba dang/ /thal bar gyur pa'ang 'tsho bar byed/ /he ru ka yi dbugs dbyung ba'ang/ /pad+ma gar gyi dbang phyug gi 'am/ /rdo rje nyi ma rta
5b2(rgyud 'grel): mgrin te/ /thams cad rdo rje can las phyung/ /rdo rje can gyi zhabs dag la/ /dad pas skyabs su 'ongs gyur pa/ /ci yi phyir na de yis gsol/ /bim la sogs mngon thon spyad/ /bdag gis sngar ni gsol mod kyi/ /'di la the tshom gyur pa mchis/ /slob dpon gyis de skad ces
5b3(rgyud 'grel): smras so/ /khyab 'jug sgra ni rnam shes yin/ /tshangs pa sa bon yin par bshad/ /dbang po lus su gyur pa yin/ /bde ba thams cad 'dod pa'i lha/ /lha chen po ni sems de nyid/ /gzugs med khams la gnas pa'o/ /rim la sogs ming gis ni/ /shes rab kyis
5b4(rgyud 'grel): ni b+ha gar bshad/ /nang gi gzhung ni 'di yin la/ /phyi yi gzhan du bshad pa ste/ /rdo rje sems dpas tshangs la sogs/ /mu stegs rnams ni sngon mnan pa/ /rdo rje sems dpa' i dkyil 'khor la/ /rab tu 'dud par mi byed pas/ /dgos pa de yi don du ni/ /zhabs
5b5(rgyud 'grel): g.yon gyis ni drag po mnan/ /rdo rje can gyi brdzun tshig ni/ /gang gis khyod kyis sngon dris pa/ /gang tshe lha chen mnan gyur na/ /thams cad khyab par ji ltar gyur/ /rdo rje sems dpas 'gro ba kun/ /sna tshogs gzugs su rnam sprul te/ /gti mug zhe sdang chags
5b6(rgyud 'grel): pa ni/ /tshangs dang khyab 'jug lha chen gyur/ /rdo rje can gyi 'ga' ma gsol/ /lha chen mo yang stong pa yin/ /bstan pa thams cad gnon par mdzad/ /ma ni mi dang lha ma yin/ /ha ni bzhir gyur pa nyid de/ /de ni lus kyi dbugs gnas pa/ /?ni ? gi
5b7(rgyud 'grel): gzugs can no/ /de nyid tshangs pa'i sgra can te/ /khyab 'jug dang ni dbang po'ang yin/ /rdo rje sems dpa' i snying gnas pa'i/ /bud med rtag par 'dod chags sbyad/ /de bas brtan dang g.yo bcas la/ /spyod pas 'dod pa'i lhar gyur to/ /thams cad
6a1(rgyud 'grel): bdag nyid bzhugs nyid la/ /in+d+ra b+hu ti gzhung 'di yin/ /sdud par byed pas 'di skad ces gsol to/ /pad+ma gsang ba zhes bshad cing/ /gsang ba 'dod par bshad pa dang/ /gsang ba sa bon zhes bshad cing/ /gsang ba mtshal chen zhes
6a2(rgyud 'grel): bshad do/ /gsang ba rnal 'byor pa yis rdzas/ /dri chu sha ste lnga po yi/ /mchog ni bdud rtsi rdzas rnams te/ /g.yo ba yi ni khams rnams kun/ /dgyes pa gzi brjid ces bshad la/ /dgyes pa bdag la'ang gnas pa'o/ /slob dpon gyis de skad ces gsungs so/ /gsang
6a3(rgyud 'grel): ba byang chub sems yin zhing/ /mchog ni rta mchog yin par bshad/ /dgyes pa rnam par snang mdzad yin/ /thams cad sgra ni he ru ka /yi ge ra ni gnyis pa yis/ /mtshal chen pad+ma'i rigs byung ba'o/ /ba ni rdo rje nyi ma'o/ /sngon byung rim pa de bzhin no/ /sdud? par?
6a4(rgyud 'grel): byed pa 'di skad ces gsol to/ /thams cad khyab pa'i ye shes gang/ /thams cad bdag nyid ji ltar bzhugs/ /'gro ba dang ni 'od pa nyid/ /thugs kyi pad+ma ji ltar gnas/ /snod ni ji ltar 'bigs par 'gyur/ /mthong ba'i gtam ni ji lta bu/ /gzhan gyi blong du ji
6a5(rgyud 'grel): ltar 'gro /bdag ni the tshom chen po 'di/ /rang gi lus la rtsa rgyus su/ /bdag nyid kyis ni nang na gnas/ /'byung po kun la gnas pa yi/ /ye shes de ni gang du gnas/ /rnam pa gang dang gang dag gis/ /rtag tu rol cing rtse bar 'gyur/ /tshe ? rtag par mi nus la/ /
6a6(rgyud 'grel): phra zhing shin tu dri ma med/ /hUM cha bcas pa gang lags lha/ /cha med cha ni rnam yangs gang/ /slob dpon gyis de skad ces gsungs so/ /snying gar gnas pa'i yi ge hUM/ /sa bon cha dang bcas pa yin/ /yi ge ha ni cha spangs pa/ /de bzhin cha med 'gyur yin ?
6a7(rgyud 'grel): 'dul ba don yod rgyud las ni/ /phyag na rdo rjes gsungs pa yin/ /mtshan ni ldan par rab gyur zhes/ /de nyid bsdus las bshad pa yin/ /mi shigs 'du shes bral ba zhes/ /dpal mchog las kyang gsungs pa yin/ /bcom ldan de nyid 'di lta bur/ /
6b1(rgyud 'grel): thams cad bdag nyid rtag tu bzhugs/ /rtag tu med cing snang ba med/ /nam mkha' lngas ni rnam par brgyan/ /rkang pa'i thil nas spyi bo'i bar/ /bdag nyid rtag tu brjod pa yin/ /der ni sgom par byed pa na/ /phreng ba mi dgos dgag mi dgos/ /gzung dang sbyin sreg las
6b2(rgyud 'grel): rnams dag /mchog las mchog tu ldog par 'gyur/ /nam mkha' mchog ni mya ngan 'das/ /mya ngan 'das pa yin zhes brjod/ /yid las 'das pa rdo rje che/ /rnam rtog med cing gnas med pa/ /'gyur ba med cing snang ba med/ /chags pa med cing skye ba med/
6b3(rgyud 'grel): dmigs su med cing mtshan ma med/ /lus med dbang po rnams kyang med/ /cha med dag cing dri ma med/ /gzhan yang zhi zhing nges par rgyal/ /'chi med dga' ba med rdo rje/ /nad med bstan du med pa dang/ /rma med bde sogs stong pa nyid/ /zag med de bzhin 'jig pa
6b4(rgyud 'grel): med/ /chags med kun 'gro gsang ba ste/ /de nyid gnas pa rnam spangs pa/ /cha med cha bcas las 'das pa/ /sgra dang reg pa med pa ste/ /ngo bo nyid dang 'ba' zhig gcig /de bzhin gnas su nges pa ste/ /zur cig ma yin zur gsum min/ /la la zlum po'i dbyings su
6b5(rgyud 'grel): min/ /ring por ma yin zung dung min/ /de bzhin yo dang drang ba min/ /tshad min rnam par shes bya min/ /mdun du ma yin rgyab du min/ /mngon sum ma yin lkog tu min/ /gzung med gzung ba rnam spangs pa/ /cha tsam ma yin spun tsam min/ /shin tu phre ba'i
6b6(rgyud 'grel): char yang min/ /'gro ba dang ni 'ong ba min/ /lam de bde bzhin lam ngan min/ /chad med bsam gyis mi khyab par/ /rdo rje sems dpa' rnam par bzhugs/ /sdud par byed pa 'di skad ces gsol to/ /rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas nyi zla rnams/ /shar ba dag ni
6b7(rgyud 'grel): mthong ba yis/ /sdig pa kun las grol 'gyur zhing/ /bsod nams thams cad grub par 'gyur/ /slob dpon gyis 'di skad ces gsungs so/ /bsam gtan dus su rnal 'byor bas/ /gsang ba'i dkyil 'khor rtag mthong ba/ /nyi zla dag ni shar ba ste/ /
7a1(rgyud 'grel): sdig pa kun las grol 'gyur zhing/ /bsod nams thams cad 'grub par 'gyur/ /gzhan dag 'dod pa'i gzhung yang ni/ /zla ba sa bon zhes bshad pa/ /nyi ma mtshan chen yin par 'dod/ /de dag 'dres pa rdzogs sangs rgyas/ /'brel
7a2(rgyud 'grel): pa sa bon mtshal chen po/ /de dag mthong ba tsam gyis ni/ /sdig pa kun las grol 'gyur zhing/ /sngags kyi gzugs kyis zos pas ni/ /bsod nams shar ba'i sgra gang yin/ /sa bon rgyun ni min par bshad/ /bzhad pa'i rdo rje'i gzhung yin te/ /in+d+ra
7a3(rgyud 'grel): b+hu ti'i gzhung yang yin/ /rtsa yi rgyu bar bshad pa ni/ /da ni sna sgor gnyis dag ste/ /de dag 'dus pa'i dus kyang ni/ /lha rnams dmigs pa dran pa'o/ /'di ni 'gro dang 'ong ba yi/ /don ni yang dag bstan pa yin/ /de ni lus la steng sgor yang/ /rdo rje can ni rtag
7a4(rgyud 'grel): tu gnas/ /steng gi sgo ni 'dab ma gsungs/ /sgo dgu yis ni yongs bskor ba/ /rnyog med rtag par mi nus pas/ /bla ma'i kha las rnyed par 'gyur/ /rang gi bdag dbus nas rnyed pas/ /des na rang byung zhes brjod de/ /'di ni rang byung bcom ldan 'das/ /gcig du
7a5(rgyud 'grel): rab tu che ba'i lha/ /gsang ba mchog gi dgyes pa na/ /thams cad bdag nyid rtag par bzhugs/ /sdud par byed pas 'di skad ces gsol to/ kaDA ni nam mkhar 'gro ma zhes/ /khams las mngon du brtags pa ste/ /nam mkha' kun tu sbyod 'grub pas/ /mkha' 'gro ma
7a6(rgyud 'grel): zhes rab tu grags/ /De ni mkha' 'gro ma zhes pa'i/ /don ni ji ltar nye bar sbyar/ /de nas sgra 'di brtag bya ste/ /de la rab bzhad rdo rje dang/ /slob dpon gzhan gyi gzhung dag gi /'di ni sbyor ba bshad par bya/ /khams kyi sgra ni sa bon te/ /gcig tu brtag pa nyid kyis ni
7a7(rgyud 'grel): bza' brtag pa de bzhin te/ /DA ni mkha' 'gro'i sgra yis so/ /in+d+ra b+hu ti'i gzhung nyon cig /De ni lus zhes bshad pa yin/ /be ni rtag tu rdo rje 'dzin/ /ha ni gzhi ru gyur pa ste/ /rkang pa'i gzhi nas spyi bor rten/ /ma shigs gang dang gang phrad pa/ /rtag tu rang nyid
7b1(rgyud 'grel): brjod pa yin/ /ya ni mi mngon pa nyid de/ /mi mngon gnas las byung ba'o/ /'gro dang 'ong ba nyid dag gis/ /khams ni rang dgar 'gro ba'o/ /re zhig khams zhes bya ba'i sgra/ /gsang ba'i yi ge bcu drug ste/ /ra ni mtshal chen po yi khams/ /ha ni de bzhin reg pa'o/ /skye ni bad
7b2(rgyud 'grel): kan yin par bshad/ /yi ge pa ni 'khrig pa gnyid/ /ra ni chu yi ngo bo'o/ /me ni de bzhin tshil yin te/ /ra ni me nyid yin par bshad/ /me ni de bzhin sha nyid do/ /sa ni shad bar bshad pa yin/ /rba? ni de bzhin zhag yin la/ /ma ni pags pa nyid du bshad/ /ni ni ru ba nyid
7b3(rgyud 'grel): yin no/ /sa ni gci bar gyur pa yin/ /da ni glo ba yin par bshad/ /s+thi ni gang gang zhes bshad pa'i/ /mkhal ma'i rdzas ni rab mdzes pa'o/ /ta ni khu bar gyur pa ste/ /byang chub sems las legs byung ba'o/ /khams kyi sgra ni 'di dag tu/ /in+d+ra b+hu ti'i gzhung yin no/ /
7b4(rgyud 'grel): bdag nyid rang gi lhar sbyor bas/ /bdag nyid rab tu bsgrub bya bar/ /rgyud 'dir yang dag bstan pa yin/ /tshogs kyi dkyil 'khor bsgrub pa ni/ /khrag dgyes pa yi rkyen du rkang/ /rab tu 'bad de bsgrub par bya/ /dbus su rnam snang mgon po gtso/ /de dbus bde ba chen
7b5(rgyud 'grel): bo ste/ /dngos grub dkyil 'khor bzhi po ni/ /rim pa bzhin du bzhag par bya/ /sdud par byed pas 'di skad ces gsol to/ /gtso bo khyod kyis gsungs pa yi/ /gzhung 'di slob dpon gang gi lags/ /slob dpon gyis ni 'di skad ces gsungs so/ /de ni gzhad pa'i rdo
7b6(rgyud 'grel): rje ste/ /in+d+ra b+hu ti'i gzhung yang yin/ /slob ma rnams la phan 'dod pas/ /dkyil 'khor bri bar bzhag pa ni/ /in+d+ra b+hu ti'i bshad pa'i gzhung/ /dkyil 'khor dbus su he ru ka /zla kham zhes ni bshad pa gang/ /thod pa mgo yi khu bas khyab/ /zur bzhi rdo rje can
7b7(rgyud 'grel): dkyil 'khor/ /sangs rgyas dkyil 'khor zlum po yin/ /pad+ma'i dbyibs zhes bshad pa ni/ /pad+ma gar dbang las byung ba'o/ /dkyil 'khor gru gsum bri ba ni/ /rta mgrin gyi ni dkyil 'khor du/ /rin chen dbyings su bya ba ni/ /rdo rje nyi ma'i dkyil 'khor du'o/ /
8a1(rgyud 'grel): shar la sogs pa'i phyogs su ni/ /sgo srungs bzhi ni bzhag par bya/ sdud par byed pas yang 'di skad ces gsol to/ /rdo rje sems dpa' lha mo dang/ /gang gzhan he ru ka sogs kyi/ /sngags kyi 'byung ba gsang ba dang/ /khro bo rnams kyi khyad par
8a2(rgyud 'grel): du'o/ /slob dpon gyis 'di skad ces gsungs so/ /dang por oM ni yang dag sbyar/ /de ni lha mo rnams la'ang bshad/ /de nas a dang sbyar bya zhing/ /de yi 'og tu yi ge hUM/ /ha ni stong pa zhes bshad de/ /mgo dang thig ler bcas byas pa'o/ /yi ge swAhAr de brjod
8a3(rgyud 'grel): pa/ /sngags rnams kyis ni dpal byed pa'o/ /de nas phaT dang sbyar ba ni/ /gang gzhan khro bo'i dkyil 'khor du'o/ /sngags kyi 'byung ba gsang ba ni/ /bdag gi de nyid la gnas so/ /sdud par byed pas yang 'di skad ces gsol to/ /rnam pa dag ni ji lta bu/ /lha
8a4(rgyud 'grel): rnams kyi ni khang par bshad/ /khang pa rnam pa du ru bshad/ /lha ni gang zhig khang pa gang/ /slob dpon gyis 'di skad ces gsungs so/ /lha ni lha ru sbyor ba ste/ /lha rnams kyis lha nyid do/ /khang pa dkyil 'khor zhes bshad pa/ /bzhad pa rdo rje'i gzhung yin no/ /
8a5(rgyud 'grel): in+d+ra b+hu ti'i gzhung ci bzhin/ /lha yi khang pa de bshad bya/ /de ni lus zhes bshad pa yin/ /badzra ni rdo rje yin par bshad/ /ga ni pad+ma zhes bshad la/ /ra ni rin chen 'byung ldan no/ /rin chen sa bon zhes bshad cing/ /rin chen pad+ma zhes bshad de/ /rin chen bcu len
8a6(rgyud 'grel): mtshal chen dang/ /dri chu sha ste lnga pa'o/ /dmar chen dang ni ga pur bcas/ /tsan dan dmar po sbyar ba dag /tshogs kyi dbus su bzhag pa ni/ /ra la ya na kun slong ba'o/ /dus su yang dag byung ba yi/ /me tog mtshal chen yin par bshad/ /ga pur sa bon zhes bshad
8a7(rgyud 'grel): de/ /tsan dan dmar po sbyar ba dag /rab tu 'bad de zos gyur na/ /bdud rtsi sman ni chen po'o/ /chags min chags dang bral ba min/ /dbu mar yang ni mi dmigs pa/ /chags pa min pa rdo rje can/ /chags dang bral mi bde ba'i mchog /de dag phyag rgya rab sbyar ba/ /
8b1(rgyud 'grel): dbu mar yang ni mi dmigs pa'o/ /gzhung gcig legs par bshad nas ni/ /gzhung gnyis pa ni bshad par bya/ /chags pas grol bar mi 'gyur zhing/ /de bzhin sdang bas ma yin la/ /gti mug u ma zhes brjod de/ /de bas 'di ni spang par bya/ /slob dpon
8b2(rgyud 'grel): gnyis pa'i gzhung 'di yin/ /gsum pa'i gzhung ni bshad bya ste/ /chags pa min pas sa bon te/ /chags dang bral min rdo rje chu/ /dbu mar gyur pa 'tshal chen po/ /bzhi pa'i gzhung ni btu bar bya/ /tshogs kyi dkyil 'khor dbus su ni/ /rtag tu chags par mi
8b3(rgyud 'grel): bya zhing/ /bud med kyis ni chags bral min/ /sgom pa dbu mar gyur pa'o/ /sku gsung thugs ni bsgrub pa yi/ /in+d+ra d+hu ti'i gzhung gis bshad/ /rtsa ba'i sgrubs ni gtso bo gsum/ /lus kyi nang na rnam par gnas/ /de rnams kyi ni khang pa dgu/ /bcu pa bla ma'i kha
8b4(rgyud 'grel): las so/ /A li kA li yongs spangs shing/ /phyag rgya'i yi ge mchog yin la/ /mi shigs rdo rje can gyis ni/ /lha mo rtag tu dran par bya/ /chags pa min pas mig gi sgo /chags dang bral min kha nyid yin/ /dbu ma snang zhes bshad pa ste/ /gnas gsum
8b5(rgyud 'grel): dag ni spang bar bya/ /stong pa shin tu rnal 'byor yod med mthus/ /nam mkha' nyid du dam tshig nye bar gnas/ /bder gshegs bde bar gshegs pa bzhengs su gsol/ /rdo rje sems dpa' skal bzangs dpal khyod bdag /stong pa nam mkha' zhes brjod cing/ /stong
8b6(rgyud 'grel): pa bdag la rnam par gnas/ /stong pa cha las 'das pa dang/ /mi shigs pa yi yi ger bshad/ /stong pa dngos po med pa yis/ /rdo rje sems dpa' rnams bzhugs te/ /'byung ba bzhi sogs gong po ni/ /chos kyi dbyings su rab tu brtag /a ni me long lta bur
8b7(rgyud 'grel): bshad/ /sa ni mnyam pa nyid du gyur/ /pra ni sgra brnyan lta bu ste/ /so sor rtog pa 'dra bar bshad/ /gri ni bya ba byed pas na/ /de ni bya ba bsgrub par 'gyur/ /rkang thil nas ni spyi mdza' ru/ /stong pa de ni dbus na gnas/ /sems can kun la rnam gnas nas/ /
9a1(rgyud 'grel): rtag tu rang nyid brjod par 'gyur/ /sdud par byed pas yang 'di skad ces gsol to/ /dkyil 'khor ngag ni ma lus pa'i/ /lha ni du zhig rnam par bzhugs/ /slob dpon gyis 'di skad ces gsungs so/ /de la dang po nyid du dpal rdo rje sems dpa' i
9a2(rgyud 'grel): dkyil 'khor la ni/ /bde mchog kI li kI li'i phyag rgya dang/ dpal rdo rje sems dpa' i dam tshig bde mchog kI li kI la zhes bya ba'i phyag rgya dang/ dpal rdo rje mtshon/ /bde mchog kI li kI la zhes bya ba'i phyag rgya dang/ dpal rdo rje tshe bde mchog kI la kI la zhes
9a3(rgyud 'grel): bya ba'i phyag rgya dang/ dpal tshangs pa'i mgo rdo rje'i mda' zhes bya ba'i phyag rgya dang/ dpal rdo rje srid med kyi bu zhes bya ba'i phyag rgya dang/ dpal rdo rje gar gyi dbang phyug ces bya ba'i phyag rgya dang/ dpal rdo rje 'dod pa'i lha mo zhes bya ba'i phyag rgya dang/ dpal
9a4(rgyud 'grel): rdo rje pad+ma rta gdong zhes bya ba'i phyag rgya dang/ dpal rdo rje phag mo zhes bya ba'i phyag rgya dang/ dpal rdo rje nyi ma'i me zhes bya ba'i phyag rgya dang/ dpal rdo rje chos kyi dbyings yang dag par 'tsho ba zhes bya ba'i phyag rgya dang/ dpal rdo rje gling bu byed pa zhes bya ba'i phyag
9a5(rgyud 'grel): rgya dang/ dpal rdo rje pi bang bde bas rab tu rmongs pa zhes bya ba'i phyag rgya dang/ dpal rdo rje ku mu ta zhes bya ba'i phyag rgya dang/ dpal rdo rje rdza rnga zhes bya ba'i phyag rgya dang/ dpal rdo rje me tog zhes bya ba'i phyag rgya dang/ dpal rdo rje bdug pa zhes bya ba'i phyag rgya dang/ dpal
9a6(rgyud 'grel): rdo rje mar me zhes bya ba'i phyag rgya dang/ dpal rdo rje dri zhes bya ba'i phyag rgya dang/ dpal rdo rje lcags kyu zhes bya ba'i phyag rgya dang/ dpal rdo rje zhags pa zhes bya ba'i phyag rgya dang/ dpal rdo rje lcags sgrog ces bya ba'i phyag rgya dang/ dpal rdo rje dril bu zhes bya ba'i phyag rgya ste/ rdo rje sems
9a7(rgyud 'grel): dpa' i dkyil 'khor du/ /nyi shu rtsa lngas yongs su bskor/ /sangs rgyas me tog phreng brgyan pa'i/ /dkyil 'khor gnyis pa bshad par bya/ /dang po sangs rgyas kun brjod ma/ /gnyis pa shin tu rgyal mo ste/ /gsum pa kun du bzang mo yin/ /bzhi pa mi zad za ma tog /rdo
9b1(rgyud 'grel): rje sangs rgyas kun yan lag/ de bzhin zhal bzang gzungs ma dang/ /sprin chen mo ni bdun pa ste/ /brgyad pa nam mkha' i spyan yin no/ /sangs rgyas dkyil 'khor bshad nas ni/ /he ru kar grags bstan par bya/ /dkar mo kun byed rab rmings dang/ /ro langs de bzhin sngos byed ma/ /gtu mo spe
9b2(rgyud 'grel): sha nyid yin te/ /lha mo bdun po brda yis ni/ /nges par thams cad slong byed de/ /pad+mar gnas pa brgyad pa'o/ /pad+ma gar gyi dbang phyug ni/ /lha mo brgyad kyis yongs bskor te/ /rnam par lta ba rnam dag dpal/ /sgrol ma blo gros mchog gyur dang/ 'khor lo sgyur nyid bud+d+hi ni/ khro gnyer
9b3(rgyud 'grel): can te phyag rgya'i lam/ /lha mo dpal chen lnga pa ste/ /drug pa pad+ma la gnas pa/ 'dod pa'i dbang mo bdun pa yin/ /'gro ba gsum mo brgyad pa'o/ /rdo rje nyi ma mchod pa ni/ /brgyad kyis bskor rim bdag gis bshad/ /mda' gzhu dang ni ral gri dang/ /gzi brjid 'bar ba gsum pa'o//
9b4(rgyud 'grel): dbang bskur ba ni bzhi pa ste/ /lag na gtor 'chang lnga pa yin/ /lag na rgyal mtshan drug pa ste/ /mchod pa chen mo bdun pa yin/ /brgyad pa lag na nyi ma ste/ /sna tshogs gzugs can phyag bzhi pa/ /rta mgrin mchod pa gang yin pa/ /drag po'i sbyor bas bsgrubs pa ste/ /lha mo d+hi?
9b5(rgyud 'grel): ma drug mi dang/ /de bzhin rab tu zhim dang/ dga' dang sdug dang nag mo dang/ /'dod mi spyod pa'i chung mar bcas/ /dbang po'i chung ma'ang gang yin pa/ /drag po'i spyod pas bsgrubs pa'o/ /pi bang rol mo'i mchog gang dang/ /lcags kyu la sogs sgo srungs rnams/ /'khor lo kun la
9b6(rgyud 'grel): thun mong ste/ dkyil 'khor cho ga'i rim pa yin/ sdud par byed pas yang 'di skad ces gsol to/ /dpal rdo rje sems dpa' i phyag rgya'i ye shes dang/ dpal rnam par snang mdzad kyi phyag rgya'i ye shes dang/ dpal he ru ka'i phyag rgya'i ye shes dang/ dpal pad+ma gang gyi dbang phyug gi
9b7(rgyud 'grel): phyag rgya'i ye shes dang dpal rdo rje nyi ma'i phyag rgya'i ye shes dang/ dpal rta mchog gi phyag rgya'i ye shes te/ 'di dag rnam pa ji lta bus/ /tshig 'di gsungs par gyur ba yin/ /phyi yi don bstan gang zhig lags/ /yang na ye shes mchog gyur gang/ /ye shes 'di don ji lta bar/
10a1(rgyud 'grel): 'di dag thams cad bshad du gsol/ /'di la bdag ni som nyi skyes/ khyed ni gcod par 'os pa yin/ /slob dpon gyis 'di skad ces gsungs so/ /phyag rgya lha mo yin par bshad/ /ye shes rdo rjer bstan pa ste/ /rang nyid kyi ni lha mo'i gzugs/ /rab tu dam khyung
10a2(rgyud 'grel): 'o byed cing/ /rdo rje sems dpa' i sgra 'dzin pas/ /rig pa yid dang 'dra bar 'jog /byang chub sems kyi rnam 'phrul ba/ /lus kyi nang du 'ongs par bsam/ /pad+ma ku mud las byung ba'i/ /rjes su sbyor bas byed par 'gyur/ /'di dag thams cad bshad pa ni/ /rnam par shes par gang
10a3(rgyud 'grel): gis nus/ /rdo rje sems dpa' i rgya ye shes/ /tshig gis khyod la bstan pa yin/ /sdud par byed pas yang 'di skad ces gsol to/ /sems dpa' sangs rgyas kun ngo bo/ /rdo rje sems dpa' bde ba'i mchog /de nyid ji ltar shes par bgyi/ /in+d+ra b+hu ti'i gzhung ni gang
10a4(rgyud 'grel): rab bzhad rdo rje ji lta bu/ /gzhan gyi gzhung gis ji ltar bshad/ /rdo rje sems dpa' bde ba'i mchog /de dag thams cad bshad du gsol/ /slob dpon gyis 'di skad ces gsungs so/ /sangs rgyas kun gyi ngo bo'i sgra/ /sa ni dpal rnam par snang mdzad dang/ /dpal he ru dang/ dpal
10a5(rgyud 'grel): pad+ma gar gyi dbang phyug dang/ dpal rdo rje nyi ma dang/ dpal rta mchog ste/ 'di dag nang du zhugs pa ni/ /rdo rje sems dpa' bde ba'i mchog /slob dpon gzhan gyi gzhung 'di yin/ /gnyis pa'i gzhung ni bshad par bya/ /sangs rgyas kun gyi sgra yis ni/ /bcu drug khams rnams thams cad
10a6(rgyud 'grel): yin/ /phung po lnga yang de bzhin te/ /'byung ba lnga la sogs pa'i lus/ /thams cad sa bon dag las byung/ /mchog ni 'debs 'byung ba zhes/ /rab bzhad rdo rje'i gzhung yin no/ /slob dpon gnyis pa'i gzhung 'di yin/ gsum pa gzhan gyi gzhung gi brda/ /lha ru sbyor ba'i dus ni/ /ba spu'i
10a7(rgyud 'grel): bu ga'i mtshams rnams su/ /gzugs kyi rang bzhin dkyil 'khor du/ /rtag par rgyun du bsgom par bya/ /sangs rgyas stong phrag bye ba ni/ /phyogs bcu rnams su spro bar bya/ /rdo rje sems dpa' i ting 'dzin gnas/ /bde ba mchog la gnas pa'o/ /slob dpon gsum pa'i gzhung 'di yin/ /in+d+ra
10b1(rgyud 'grel): b+hu ti'i gzhung nyon cig /sngags pas thig gis thig btab pa'i/ /lte ba'i dkyil 'khor bcu drug par/ /a sogs k+Sha yi mthar thug par/ /rim gyis rgod pa bslang bar bya/ /sangs rgyas kun gyi ngo bo ni/ /yi ge thams cad yin par bshad/ /gang tshe tha ma'i gong ma ni/ /tshe dang thig le
10b2(rgyud 'grel): rnam spangs la/ /dbus su yang dag gnas pa ste/ /mi mngon phra zhing zad pa med/ /byang chub sems mchog ye shes te/ /rdo rje sems dpa' mi 'jigs pa'i/ /des ni rang nyid che ba'i lha/ /mchog tu bde la rnam par bzhugs/ /'di ni mi shigs par bshad de/ /rang byung gcig pu che ba'i lha//
10b3(rgyud 'grel): sangs rgyas thams cad yi ge'i tshogs/ /go rims ji bzhin yang dag sbyar/ /yi ge kun ni bde mchog gi /u dang thig le rnam spangs pa/ /k+Sha yi mdza' ni spang bya ste/ /'dis ni sa bon gzugs can no/ /ka dang Shar ldan zad mdza' can/ /ji ltar thang pa yin par bshad/ /'di ni rang byung
10b4(rgyud 'grel): bcom ldan 'das/ /gcig bu rab tu che ba'i lha/ /sangs rgyas kun dngos stong pa yis/ /yi ge nyid ni mkha' 'gro ma/ /sangs rgyas kun gyi ji bzhin don/ /in+d+ra d+hu ti'i gzhung bzhin bshad/ /gcig pu min par rtag tu spyod/ /sems can kun gyi snying la gnas/ /thig le gug kyang rnam spangs pa/
10b5(rgyud 'grel): gcig pu rab tu che ba'i lha/ /rdo rje can 'di'i dbus na bzhugs/ /yi ge rnams kyis kun nas bskor/ /sdud par byed pas yang 'di skad ces gsol to/ /rol mo rgyas btab ye shes ni/ /ji bzhin don du ji ltar sbyang/ /des pa'i lam ston ji lta bu/ /rol mo'i dam tshig gang zhig lags/ /he ru ka
10b6(rgyud 'grel): ni dpal rol mo/ /de bzhin pad+ma'i lam dang ni/ /rgyun gyi rnga dang de bzhin gzhan/ /rgyal po'i rol mo shin tu myur/ /slob dpon gyis 'di skad ces gsungs so/ /snying po phyag rgya sngags rig dang/ /bya ba rnam pa sna tshogs dang/ rnam par sel la sogs bya bas/ /rol mo'i phyag rgya rab tu gnas?
10b7(rgyud 'grel): gzhung gzhan rnam pa sna tshogs dang/ /sngags bcu ba'i tshig rnams dang/ /rigs kyi dbye ba rnam drug dang/ /bdun pa tshogs kyi dkyil 'khor rnams/ /bdag la sgrub pa bzhin du bshad/ /de nyid mchog ni nges stong pa/ /rol mo kun gyi gzhir gyur pa/ /rgyud kyi rol mo bla med pa'o/ /'di la
11a1(rgyud 'grel): slob dpon mang po'i gzhung/ /gzhung gzhan sngags ni yin par smra/ /in+d+ra b+hu ti'i gzhung yang gzhan/ /rab gzhan rdo rje'i gzhung nyon cig /rgyun bzhin 'bab pa'i rgyun gyis ni/ /sa bon rgyun ni gang 'bab pa/ /khams rnams kyis ni bzhir gyur pas/ /des na 'di ni
11a2(rgyud 'grel): rgyud ces bya/ /in+d+ra d+hu tis bshad pa'i gzhung/ /gang 'dir kun gyi snying la gnas/ /brtan pa dang ni g.yo ba yi/ /d+ha ni sems can kun rgyun yin/ /ra ni 'od zer yin par bshad/ /ba ni rdo rje can yin te/ /tye lus zhes bshad pa yin/ /thams cad bdag nyid de bzhin gnas/ /
11a3(rgyud 'grel): brtag par mi nus shes mi nus/ /lus med dbang po rnams dang bral/ /rgyun gyi rol mo yin par bshad/ /brtan pa'i lam ni ji lta bu/ /brtan pa'i lam gyi rol mo dang/ /slob dpon la las bshad pa ni/ /brtan pa yod dang med pa ste/ /brtan pa bden pa nges mthong dang/ /brtan pa
11a4(rgyud 'grel): smig rgyu chu lta bu/ /brtan pa thams cad sgyu ma bzhin/ /brtan pa sa bon yin bshad pa/ /rab bshad rdo rje'i gzhung yin no/ /in+d+ra b+hu ti'i gzhung ci bzhin/ /de ni bshad kyis bu khyod nyon/ /'di ltar cha shas drug dang ni/ /brtan pa rdo rje can nyid yin/ /brtan pa stong pa yin par bshad/ /brtan pa
11a5(rgyud 'grel): mar me rtse lta bu/ /brtan pa dbang ba'i lam nyid ces/ /bla ma'i kha las ston pa yin/ /brtan pa sems zhes bshad pa ste/ /cha dang bral zhing spas pa yin/ /gsum pa gtso bo'i rol mo yi/ /dam tshig gsum gyi rol mo ni/ /grags pa kun ni bya ba ste/ /gar gyi dus kyi rol mo yin/ /dkyil 'khor
11a6(rgyud 'grel): bri ba'i dus mdzad/ /sku gzugs rnams la mchod pa na/ /rnal 'byor de nyid ma yin sems/ /byang chub sems ni rnam spong la/ /gzhung 'di nyid ni bshad pa yin/ /gzhan yang rab bzhad rdo rje'i gzhung/ /tri ni gru gsum yin par bshad/ /sa ni bud med thams cad yin/ /ma ni rdo rje
11a7(rgyud 'grel): sems dpa' yi/ /thugs la gnas pa yin par bshad/ /ya ni gang zhes bshad pa yi/ /nam mkha' i gnas kyi sa bon yin/ /sa bon nyid kyang pa yis ni/ /gang zhig bshad pa'i rdo rje can/ /tye ni lus zhes gang bshad pa/ /bud med b+ha ga'i dbus gnas pa/ /rab bzhad rdo
11b1(rgyud 'grel): rje slob ma la/ /dam tshig gsum gyi rol mo bshad/ /in+d+ra b+hu ti'i gzhung gzhan ni/ /shAkya'i bshes gnyen gyis zhus pa/ /tri ni rtsa spubs gsum yin la/ /sa yis thams cad yin par bshad/ /ma ni bdag gi yin zhes ston/ /ya ni mi shigs gang yin pa'o/ /ba ni rtsa spubs mang
11b2(rgyud 'grel): po ste/ /bya ni lus kyi dbus gnas pa/ /sku dang gsung thugs gsum gyis ni/ /rdo rje can ni bsgrub par bya/ /dam tshig gsum gyi rol bshad nas/ /pad+ma'i thal mo rtogs par bya/ /pad+ma'i thal mo rol mo che/ /pad+ma'i gar dbang 'byung ba'o/ /rol mo mang po brtag par ni/ /la la sngags
11b3(rgyud 'grel): ni yin par smra/ /pad+ma thal mo'i sgra yang yin/ /rab bzhad rdo rje'i gzhung nyon cig rkan sogs mgo nas rkang pa'i bar/ /rgyan rnams kun gyis rnam brgyan pa'i/ /rdo rje can ni thal mo ste/ /pad+ma'i sgras ni bde mchog go /de dag phyag rgya rab sbyor ba/ /pad+ma thal mo de
11b4(rgyud 'grel): bshad pa/ /rang bzhad rdo rje'i gzhung yin te/ /de bzhin in+d+ra b+hu ti'i gzhung/ /pad+ma thal mo'i bdag nyid che/ /shAkya bshes gnyen 'di nyon cig /pad+ma'i sgra yis pad+ma ni/ /dkyil 'khor lngar ldan yin par bshad/ /de ni gnyid log shes min zhing/ /lus med dbang po rnam?
11b5(rgyud 'grel): dang bral/ /bri ba nyid kyis de bskul zhing/ /thal mo de gsum gsum yin no/ /de nas rdo rje can bskul nas/ /mngal 'dzin pa ni legs par byed/ /he ru ka dpal 'drar bshad cing/ /don mang pha rol gnon sbas pa'o/ /sh+rI ni dang por yang dag ldan/ /hUM b+hyo'i sngags ni btu? bar bya/
11b6(rgyud 'grel): khro bas 'khrug pa'i dkyil 'khor du/ /slob dpon bau ShaT smra bar byed/ /yi ge gsum gyis dngos bzlas pa'i/ /cang te'u mtshan mo rdung byed na/ /ji snyed thos pa'i mkha' 'gro rnams/ /phyogs bcu rnams su sgra yang sgrogs/ /sgra ni gtong bar mi byed cing/ /me mi
11b7(rgyud 'grel): rnams kyi dkyil 'khor gnon/ /gal te rdo rje mkha' 'gro yi/ /dkyil 'khor sgrub pa lta 'dod na/ /kha TwAM ga ni g.yon pas blang/ /mtshal can gyis bkang thod pa thogs/ /mi yi rgyu mas lus dkris te/ /rig pa dag ni sgrub pa yi/ /sha chen rtag tu phyag rgya dang/ /thal ba
12a1(rgyud 'grel): lus la bsgos pa dang/ /sha yis bkang ba'i thod pa ni/ /phyag rgya'i lag pas sbyin par bya/ /smin ma la sogs bsgoms nas ni/ /b+ha ga'i pad+ma mchod par bya/ /b+ha ga'i dkyil 'khor du bsgrub pa'o/ /der ni yi ge phye bsgrags bya/ /shing gcig drung ngaM
12a2(rgyud 'grel): dur khrod dam/ /chu ngogs dag gam gzhi mdo ru/ /zla ba mar ngo'i bcu bzhi la/ /rgyal dang lhan cig brtul zhugs can/ /brtson 'grus brtan pas bgrod pa yis/ /sangs rgyas byang chub rab tu bsgrub/ /rdo rje mkha' 'gro'i dkyil 'khor ni/ /de la rtag tu phyag 'tshal zhing/ /
12a3(rgyud 'grel): ming la gang ngag 'dod pa yi/ /nam mkhar spyod pa'i dngos grub ster/ /dngos grub kyi ni sbyor ba 'dis/ /slob dpon ku ku ras bsgrubs pa/ /shAkya'i bshes gnyen khyod la bshad/ /gzhan gyis slob ma gzhan la min/ /he ru ka yi rol mo gsang/ /sbyar ba dag gis bshad
12a4(rgyud 'grel): pa yin/ /gzhung 'di ji ltar smra ba ni/ /slob dpon in+d+ra b+hu ti yin/ /slob dpon rab bzhad rdo rje'i gzhung/ /yi ge sh+rI ni rig par bshad/ /he ni sa bon yin par bshad/ /ru ni mtshal chen nyid yin zhing/ /ka ni sku yi rdo rje'o/ /khrag 'thung rol mo bshad pa yin/ /shAkya'i bshes
12a5(rgyud 'grel): gnyen gyis zhus pa/ /rgyal po'i rol mo rol mo gzhan/ /shin tu myur ba bshad du gsol/ /slob dpon gyis 'di skad ces gsungs so/ /rgyal po'i rol mo'i dkyil 'khor du/ /la lar bde la rnam par gzigs/ /la lar bud med 'dod chags de/ /la lar gsod dang 'joms
12a6(rgyud 'grel): pa ste/ /la lar rol mo brdung bar mdzad/ /la lar me tog 'bras bur gnas/ /la lar rol zhing spyod par 'gyur/ /la lar srog tu rnam par gnas/ /la lar sa dang chu dang me/ /la lar 'byung ba chen po lnga/ /la lar rigs kyi bye brag gis/ /bram ze dang ni gdol ba dag /la lar mang?
12a7(rgyud 'grel): bring mor ru/ la lar chung ma bu mo ru/ /la lar tshangs dang dbang ldan dang/ khyab 'jug dang ni nyi ma nyid/ /la lar zla ba dkar dmar bcas/ /la lar nyin dang mtshan mor gyur/ /la lar khams gsum pa rnams kun/ /byed pa po dang mi zad rgyal/ /la lar shi ba'i dbang gis
12b1(rgyud 'grel): zhum/ /mi gsal stong pa'i rdo rje can/ /la lar byang chub chen por gshegs/ /la lar pha rol bdud las rgyal/ /la lar byis pa'i rang bzhin nyid/ /la lar rgas shing 'khogs pa'o/ /la lar nad chen gyis zin pa/ /la lar sngo dang le brgan dang/ /la lar dkar dang ser pa'o//
12b2(rgyud 'grel): la lar sangs rgyas rnam snang mdzad/ /la lar sgrol ma gos dkar mo/ /la lar spyan dang mA ma kI/ /la lar dka' zlog zhi ba mo/ /la lar 'dab chags mkha' lding dang/ /nam mkha' dang ni mkha' 'gro nyid/ /la lar klu dang sbrul chen po/ /la lar smad 'tshong spre'u dang ni//
12b3(rgyud 'grel): la lar gnyid ni log pas gnas/ /la lar rlung dang mkhris pa dang/ /la lar khrag dang pags par 'gyur/ /la lar mya ngan du ba dang/ /la lar bsreg pa'i mi dag yin/ /la lar mtho ris skye ba ste/ /rnam par 'phrul pa 'di lta bu/ /thams cad bdag nyid bzhugs
12b4(rgyud 'grel): 'di la/ /in+d+ra b+hu tIs bshad pa yin/ /lha gang cha ni rnam spangs pa'i/ /de yi sgyu ma sna tshogs 'di/ /rtag pa min pa rdo rje can/ /gzugs med par ni b+hu ga'i nang/ /lte ba'i nang na pad+ma che/ /bcu drug thig gis thig btab par/ /yi ge dang yang mnyam sbyor bas/ /bskor
12b5(rgyud 'grel): ba'i bya ba byas pa yin/ /de dbus rtag tu gsang ba ni/ /'byin dang sdud pa byed pa'o/ /de ni rang nyid rdo rje can/ /gcig pu rang 'byung che ba'i lha/ /de ni sangs rgyas kun dngos zhes/ /mtshan ni rab tu bshad pa yin/ /gsang ba mchog gi dgyes pa la/ /thams cad bdag nyid
12b6(rgyud 'grel): rtag tu bzhugs/ /thams cad mkhyen pas 'di bshad pa 'am/ /yang na mi shigs kun mkhyen pa/ /sangs rgyas kun gyi dngos por ni/ /la lar lha mo'i tshogs la 'dod/ /bcom ldan lha yi rnal 'byor ni/ /sngags dang phyag rgya bsdus pa yin/ /bsam gtan dag ni ji
12b7(rgyud 'grel): ltar bgyi/ /lha ni ji ltar bskyed par bgyi/ /dkyil 'khor gnas ni gang dag tu/ /lha rnams rnal 'byor bsgom pa rnams/ /gtso bo 'di dag the tshom gyur/ /de dag thams cad bshad du gsol/ /slob dpon gyis 'di skad ces gsol to/ /lung dang bstan bcos shes pa dang
13a1(rgyud 'grel): snyan dngags byed pa nyid dang yang/ /slob dpon mang po'i gzhung thos nas/ /bdag gis gzhung 'di zab gyur pa/ /sangs rgyas bstan pa 'dzin pa po/ /shAkya blo gros chen po nyon/ /dang po chags las rnam rgyal zhing/ /de bzhin zhe sdang gti mug dang/ /nga rgyal
13a2(rgyud 'grel): de bzhin khro ba dang/ /sred dang sdug bsngal bkres skom dang/ /'dre ba med cing chags bral la/ /mdza' bshas dang ni dgar mnyam pas/ /gal te dngos grub 'dod 'gyur na/ /lha yi rnal 'byor bsgom par bya/ /lus gnas b+ha ga'i dkyil 'khor du/ /dang po stong pa bsgom par
13a3(rgyud 'grel): bya/ shin tu phra ba'i rlung gi dngos/ /phra rab drug tu phye ba yis/ /sgo dgu po ni thams cad dag /rtag tu de yis dbye bar bya/ /steng gi sgor ni nges 'byung bar/ /sngags pas rtag tu bsam par bya/ /zla ba'i dkyil 'khor rdzogs par ni/ /rtag par rgyun tu brdung bar ni/ /la la
13a4(rgyud 'grel): rol mo nyid du 'dod/ /la la sngags ni yin par smra/ /'di 'dra'i don gyi gzhung mang la/ /rab bzhad rdo rje'i gzhan yin te/ /ra ni mtshal chen yin par bshad/ /dza ni rkang pa'i nang gnas pa/ /ba ni mtshan dag yin par bshad/ /tya ni lus su gyur pa yin/ /rab bzhad rdo
13a5(rgyud 'grel): rje'i gzhung yin te/ /in+d+ra b+hu ti'i gzhung nyon cig /rA ni gzi brjid yin par smra/ /steng gi sgo na rnam par gnas/ /dza ni gang du skye ba ste/ /chos kyi lte ba b+ha ga'i nang/ /ba ni khams kyi gzugs can te/ /spu yi rtse mo brgyar gyur pa'i cha/ /tya ni snying gi pad+ma ru/ /byang chub
13a6(rgyud 'grel): sems de rdo rje can/ /dbang po kun las rnam 'das shing/ /dbang po thams cad yongs spangs pa'i/ /dbang po thams cad 'dzin rgyal po/ /rgyal po'i rol mor de 'gyur ro/ /sa dang chu dang me la sogs/ /'byung ba kun gyi rgyal po yin/ /in+d+ra b+hu ti'i gzhung 'di ni/ /shAkya'i
13a7(rgyud 'grel): bshes gnyen la bshad pa'o/ /shin tu myur ba'i ji bzhin smra/ /gzhan yang bdag gis bshad par bya/ /a ni sngags su gyur pa yin/ /ti ni 'di yis gnas pa'o/ /d+hU ni mtshal chen yin par bshad/ /ta ni sa bon nyid yin pa/ /rab bzhad rdo rje'i gzhung yin no//
13b1(rgyud 'grel): in+d+ra b+hu ti'i gzhung nyon cig /a zhes bya ba'i rim pa 'dis/ /bde mchog sgrol ma la sogs pa/ /ti ni dngos po gsum spangs te/ /sku gsung thugs la reg pa la/ /d+ha ni nges pa thams cad ste/ /ta ni mi zang de nyid yin/ /gzugs med gyur pa'i bde ba ni/ /reg pa'i bde
13b2(rgyud 'grel): ba tshor ba'o/ /yod dang med pa ma yin dang/ /khams gsum thams cad bdag yin zhing/ /myur bar zhu bar gyur pa yis/ /byang chub sems su rnam par 'phrul/ /shin tu myur ba'i sgrar grags pa/ /bdag gis phye ste bshad pa yin/ /in+d+ra b+hu ti'i gzhung 'di ste/ /shin
13b3(rgyud 'grel): tu myur ba mi rtag pa'o/ /sdud par byed pas yang 'di skad ces gsol to/ /slob dpon in+d+ra b+hu ti lha/ /bdag ni slar yang zhu bar 'tshal/ /slob dpon rab bzhed rdo rje dang/ /slob dpon gzhan gyi gzhung rnams kyi/ /rol mo'i don rnams mang po dang/ /A li kA li sngags
13b4(rgyud 'grel): bcas dang/ /gsang ba'i gzhung gi don mang dang/ /dkyil 'khor gyi ni cho ga'i rim/ /rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas nyi zla dang/ /DA ni nam mkhar 'gro ba'i sgra/ /sangs rgyas thams cad mnyam sbyor ba/ /mkha' 'gro sgyu ma bde ba'i mchog /lha yis ji bzhin bka' stsal cing/ /sngags
13b5(rgyud 'grel): rnams kyang ni gsang bar mdzad/ /de nas shAkya'i bshes gnyen la/ /slob dpon gyis ni legs shes gnang/ /'di 'dra'i gzhung ni thos pa dang/ /stan ni yongs su spangs nas kyang/ /pus mo sa la bzhag nas ni/ /bdag nyid yongs su phul bar gyur/ /rdo rje sems dpa' 
13b6(rgyud 'grel): bang ba tsha/ /gnas ni gang du bzhugs gyur pa/ /brtan g.yo kun pha rol mdzad pa/ /bcom ldan lha yis? bshad du gsol/ /slob dpon gyis 'di skad ces gsungs so/ /rdo rje sems dpa' i rnam 'phrul ba/ /shAkya tshul bzhin mnyan par gyis/ /thams cad bdag
13b7(rgyud 'grel): nyid rtag bzhugs par/ /gang zhig sngar ni bshad pa nyid/ /dkyil 'khor lus ni yin par bshad/ /de ni sgo dgu dag tu 'gyur/ /de la lte ba'i 'khor lo ni/ /thams cad mkhyen pa zhes byar bshad/ /rdo rje can ni rang bzhugs pa/ /cha med cha ni rnam spangs pa/ /lus
14a1(rgyud 'grel): can rnams kyi nang na rol/ /lus las 'das shing gos pa med/ /la lar gzugs can dag tu bzhugs/ /la lar sna dang kha dag dang/ /la lar rna ba sgra dag dang/ /la lar dri chen rdo rje chu/ /la lar tshor dang bcas pa'i sems/ /la lar skom dang la lar
14a2(rgyud 'grel): bkres/ /la lar khro dang la lar zhi/ /b+ha ga'i dbus nas bsgom par bya/ /der ni stong nyid dbus gnas par/ /bsgoms nas glu ni brjod par bya/ /stong pa yod med shin tu rnal 'byor mthus/ /nam mkha' nyid du dam tshig nye bar gnas/ /bder gshegs bde bar
14a3(rgyud 'grel): gshegs pa gzhengs su gsol/ /rdo rje sems dpa' skal bzang dpal khyod bdag /oM las dkyil 'khor bya ba ste/ /zur gsum du ni dkyil 'khor bsgom/ /yi ge a las pad+ma ste/ /'dab brgyad lte bar bcas pa bsgom/ /rtag tu stong pa nam mkha' lnga/ /u dang thig ler
14a4(rgyud 'grel): rnam brgyan zhing/ /zla ba'i byed dang ldan pa ni/ /yi ge mchog ni bsgom par bya/ /sangs rgyas bye ba stong phrag ni/ /phyogs bcu rnams su spro bar bya/ /rang gi ngo bo'i rigs dbye bas/ /lha ni de ru bskyed par bya/ /zhal gcig phyag ni gnyis pa dang/ /brgya 'am yang na stong
14a5(rgyud 'grel): snyed? du/ /sgrub pa po ni ci 'dod par/ /bsam gtan du ni brtag par bya/ /sngags pas yang ni rtag stong pa/ /a yis mnan cing brgyan pa la/ /ra ni stan du dgram bya ba/ /bde mchog sgrol ma la sogs pa/ /lha rnams bskyed pa 'di yis ni/ /lha yi rnal 'byor bsgom par
14a6(rgyud 'grel): bya/ /rang gi lha yi rim pa yis/ /der ni snying po brjod par bya/ /phyag rgya rnams kyis yongs bskor nas/ /sngags pas yongs su rdzogs par bsgom/ /dri chu mtshal ni chen po dang/ /der ni mchod par rab tu bya/ /sha? chen sa bon dag dang yang/ /rtag tu mchod pa rim bzhin brtsam/ /ji srid skyo
14a7(rgyud 'grel): bar ma gyur par/ /lha yi rnal 'byor bsgom par bya/ /slar yang bdag gi gsang sngags kyi/ /lha yi bzlas brjod dag kyang bya/ /spos dang me tog byug pa dang/ /glu gar nye bar mchod pa dang/ /mchod yon yang dang yang phul nas/ /de 'og lha rnams gshegs su gsol/ /sngags pas lha rnams spyan
14b1(rgyud 'grel): drangs nas/ /bdag gi snying ni dgang bar bya/ /sngags pa ting 'dzin la gnas nas/ /bdag nyid rnam par sel bas ni/ /stong pa nyid du bsgoms nas su/ /steng gi sgo nas zhugs par bya/ /chos kyi 'khor lo lte ba che/ /sangs rgyas kun gyis yongs bskor ba/ /rang gi rigs kyi lha dag ni/ /stong pa'i
14b2(rgyud 'grel): dbus gnas bsgom par bya/ /dmar chen dang ni ga bur bcas/ /tsan dan dmar po bza' bya zhing/ /tshogs kyi dbus su bzhag pa ni/ /ra sa ya na kun slong ba'o/ /gang zhig de yi rigs gyur pa'i/ /bud med thams cad sbyang bya ste/ /gsang sngags yi ge gsum gyi lus/ /lha yi rnal 'byor bsgom
14b3(rgyud 'grel): bar bya/ hUM ni b+ha ga'i dbus gnas shing/ /hUM las rdo rjer gyur pa ni/ /bsams nas sngags pas las rigs bya/ /cho ga yis ni rdzas rnams bza' / /bgegs rnams 'dul ba'i khro bo ni/ /bdud rtsi thab sbyor las byung ba/ /de dang dmar chen tsan dan bcas/ /bdud rtsi dag ni bza' 
14b4(rgyud 'grel): ba ni/ /las rnams thams cad byed par bshad/ /de bzhin dbang dang dgug pa la/ /dang po bdud rtsi thab sbyor zhes/ /grags pa sngags pas brjod par bya/ /de nas skal bzang rnal 'byor pa'i/ /sgrub pa pos ni bltas tsam gyis/ /sa steng bud med ji snyed pas/ /'chi bdag kyang
14b5(rgyud 'grel): rjes su 'gro/ bram ze rgyil rigs rje'u rigs mo/ /rigs ngan sme sha khrus mkhan ma/ /'dug pa 'am ni ldang ba 'ang rung/ /gang du 'dod par sbyad par bya/ /bsam gtan sbyor ba 'di yis ni/ /phyag rgyar bcas bdag sngags rig pas/ /sangs rgyas byang chub bsgrub bya zhing/ /bu gar bdud
14b6(rgyud 'grel): ni bza' bar bya/ /b+ha ga'i pad+ma reg bya zhing/ /ro 'dzin pa yang bskyod par bya/ /rnyog pa med pa'i byang chub sems/ /de yis sangs rgyas nyid 'grub 'gyur/ /de yi dus su rang gi lha'i/ /sbyor ba dag ni mi bya min/ /skye bo med cing dben pa dang/ /gsang zhing bzang ba'i gnas
14b7(rgyud 'grel): gcig tu/ /rang gi lha yi dkyil 'khor gyi/ /lha yi rnal 'byor bsgom par bya/ /byang chub sems ni rang 'bad pas/ /su la 'ang sbyin par mi bya'o/ /tshogs kyi dkyil 'khor brtul zhugs can/ /gsang sngags de yang brjod mi bya/ /lha yi rnal 'byor bsgom pa dag /'di ni
15a1(rgyud 'grel): byang chub yin par bstan/ /ji lta gzugs ni rnam gnon pa/ /gzhan yang yang dag bshad par bya/ /slob dpon la las bshad pa ni/ /rnam snang dpal gyi dkyil 'khor du/ /cho ga bzhin du dbang bskur
15a2(rgyud 'grel): nas/ /bsam bzlas cho ga'i rim gyis ni/ /gang tshe de la mi 'khrug na/ /rkang pas mnan nas bzlas byas te/ /lugs ma 'am 'bur du brkos pa'ang rung/ /gang gzhan khro pa'i lha rnams ni/ /slob dpon khro la zhes pa yis/ /gzugs
15a3(rgyud 'grel): rnams thams cad mnan par bya/ /rkang pa brkyang dang gnon pa dang/ /drag po'i sbyor bas de bzhin du/ /rdo rje nyi ma sbyang bya zhing/ /de bzhin rdo rje 'dzin pa dang/ /pad+ma gar gyi dbang phyug dang/ /de bzhin du ni rta mchog go /shes rab pha rol
15a4(rgyud 'grel): phyin pa dang/ /da bzhin mkha' 'gro thams cad sbyad/ /'di la slob dpon gzhung mang ste/ /gzhan dang gzhan du ston par byed/ /sngags kyi gzugs dag gam mnan pa la/ /'di lta bu yi don ston te/ /gzugs ni sgrub pa po yi lus/ /rigs
15a5(rgyud 'grel): kyi dbye bas mnan par bya/ /mnan pa bsgom pa zhes bshad pas/ /bdag gis thams cad bsgom par bya/ /sngags pa grub par gyur pa ni/ /phongs pa kun las grol bar 'gyur/ /gzhan yang rab bzhad rdo rje yes/ /gnas 'dir gnang?
15a6(rgyud 'grel): du gyur pa ni/ /rnam par snang mdzad dpal gyi sgra/ /sa bon nyid ni yin par bshad/ /stong pa'i rdo rje las byung bas/ /de tshe rdo rje nyi ma 'gyur/ /de nyid rdo rje 'dzin pa ste/ /pad+ma gar dbang ngo bo'ang de/ /skyes pa bud med gzugs rnams kyis?/ /de yi
15a7(rgyud 'grel): thams cad mnan pa yin/ /shes rab pha rol phyin pa dang/ /de bzhin mkha' 'gro ma kun spyad/ /byang chub sems kyi rnam 'phrul ba/ /de nyid byed pa rang nyid gtso/ /gsang ba'i mchog ga? dgyes pa ni/ /thams cad bdag nyid rtag tu bzhugs?/ /
15b1(rgyud 'grel): rkang pa brgyang dang gnon pa dang/ /bskum nas 'degs pa'i stobs dag gis/ /kun byed sa bon byed pa ni/ /sna tshogs gzugs can 'gro bskyed pa/ /rab bzhad rdo rje'i gzhung yin te/ /slob dpon ku ku ra yi gzhan/ /dkar mo rku byed dmar ldan pa'i
15b2(rgyud 'grel): he ru ka yis kun mnan te/ /dpal ldan rnam snang tshangs la sogs/ /za zhing mtshal chen 'thung bar byed/ /rdo rje can gyis slar bslangs nas/ /thal bar gyur pa'ang 'tsho bar byed/ /bsgom bya'i gzhung ni 'di lta bu/ /grub pa slob dpon ku ku
15b3(rgyud 'grel): ra'i/ /slob dpon gzhan gyis bshad pa ni/ /shAkya'i bshes gnyen mnyam par gyis/ /gzugs nyid rnam par snang mdzad dpal/ /sgra ni rdo rje nyi ma yin/ /dri ni rta mgrin yin par bshad/ /pags pa rus ba he ru ka /tshigs ni pad+ma
15b4(rgyud 'grel): gar dbang yin/ /sems ni bde ba chen po'o/ /lus ni gzugs su rnam par bshad/ /gnon pa rim bzhin spyad pa'o/ /'byor pa rgyal po ral mo che/ /bud med kun gyis gsang ba'o/ /slob dpon gzhan dag 'di ltar 'dod/ /'dod chags rnam
15b5(rgyud 'grel): par snang mdzad yin/ /zhe sdang rdo rje rigs su bshad/ /gti mug de bzhin pad+ma'i rigs/ /nga rgyal rdo rje nyi ma yin/ /khro bo nyid ni he ru ka /sred pa rta mgrin yin par bshad/ /gang gzhan bud med longs spyod cing/ /drag po'i sbyor bas
15b6(rgyud 'grel): longs spyod la/ /sna tshogs phyag rgyas yongs su bskor/ /gzugs kyi sgra ni mtshan yin te/ /lus nyid kyang ni gzugs yin no/ /rim pa 'di yis sbyor ba yis/ /'di ni 'di 'dra ston byed pa/ /slob dpon mang ba'i gzung 'di yin/ /
15b7(rgyud 'grel): in+d+ra b+hu ti'i gzhung nyon cig /sangs rgyas kyis ni dkyil 'khor gcig /gnyis pa rdo rje nyi ma yi/ /gsum pa gar gyi dbang byug gi /bzhi pa rta mchog nyid kyi yin/ /rdo rje 'dzin par bshad pa yi/ /he ru ka ni lnga pa yin/ dga' ba
16a1(rgyud 'grel): chen po rol pa yis/ /rdo rje sems dpa' kun nas mnan/ /gang zhig bde chen grub pa yi/ /sgrub pa po yi yon tan 'di/ /brtag pa dag ni bzhi pa ru/ /sngar ni bshad pa mdzad pa yi/ /rkang pa brkyang dang g.yon pa dang/
16a2(rgyud 'grel): bskums nas 'degs pa'i stobs dag gis/ /g.yas dang g.yon pa'i sbyor ba yis/ /khro bos thams cad mnan par bya/ /'byor pa thams cad spyad nas ni/ /rtag tu don ni 'grub par 'gyur/ /shes rab pha rol phyin pa dang/ /de
16a3(rgyud 'grel): bzhin mkha' 'gro thams cad spyad/ /'di la mi sbyin ci yang med/ /sangs rgyas kun gyi don bya ba/ /'gro ba dang ni byed pa dang/ /dpung rnams thams cad rab 'joms par/ /rdo rje can gyis gang gsungs pa/ /gang zhig bde chen grub gyur
16a4(rgyud 'grel): pa'i/ /sngags pa yis ni thams cad bya/ /de la ngan 'gro yod min te/ /rtag tu sgrub pa por 'gyur ro/ /gdug pa rnams ni gdul ba'i phyir/ /khro bo'i rgyal por de sprul cing/ /rdo rje pad+ma'i sbyor chen gyis/ /tshogs kyi dkyil 'khor
16a5(rgyud 'grel): bsgrub par bya/ /sangs rgyas thams cad mthong ba la/ /sngags pa gang zhig mngon slob pa/ /sems kun las ni legs byung ba/ /sangs rgyas chags pa rdo rje can/ /gang tshe sngar ni des bshad pa/ /brtan pa dang ni g.yo ba dang/ /
16a6(rgyud 'grel): rnal 'byor yang dag ma yin sems/ /gzugs brnyan la ni sgom pa ste/ /lugs ma 'am 'bur du brkos pa 'am/ /bris par gang dag gyur pa la'o/ /yang dag mchog sems rnal 'byor pa/ /byang chub sems ni rnam par
16a7(rgyud 'grel): bsgom/ /rang nyid kyi ni nang dag na/ /gang zhig stong par rnam gnas pa/ /byang chub sems ni stong pa ste/ /rdo rje rnam snang rang nyid do/ /de nyid chags dang chags bral dang/ /srid dang grol bar gyur pa yin/ /brtan dang g.yo ba sna
16b1(rgyud 'grel): tshogs pa/ /thams cad du ni 'di 'gyur ro/ /gtan tshigs des na bdag nyid ni/ /sangs rgyas thams cad nyid du bshad/ /rang gi che ba'i lha yis sgras/ /rang gi stong pa'i rdo rje can/ /bde ba'i mchog la tshig 'di nyid/ /bcom ldan 'das kyis
16b2(rgyud 'grel): 'di skad gsungs/ /bde mchog sngon ni byung ba rnams/ /mi yi 'jig rten dag tu sgrogs/ /ma lus 'jig rten gsum rgyal srid/ /'jig rten dbang phyug kun dang bcas/ /ngo mthon stobs kyis phrogs nas ni/ /de ni dad la sbyin par
16b3(rgyud 'grel): byed/ /sangs rgyas byang chub sems dpa' yang/ /phrogs nas kyang ni sbyin byed na/ /las mchog dang ni rab 'byams dang/ /dngos grub dang ni ji zhig smos/ /'di ni in+d+ra b+hu ti'i gzhung/ /yon tan sgrub par byed pa nyid/ /dbang po gang dag
16b4(rgyud 'grel): gang lam gyur/ /de dang de yi ngo bor te/ /mnyam par ma bzhag sbyor ba yis/ /sangs rgyas kun dang mnyam par sbyor/ /mig gi lam gyur gzugs rnams te/ /de la rnam par snang mdzad gnas/ /rna ba rdo rje nyi ma ste/ /sgra yang der ni rab tu bsdugs
16b5(rgyud 'grel): sna yi lam du rta ma grin? te dri yi lam duAng bshad pa yin/ /lce lam pad+ma zhes bya ba/ /pad+ma gar dbang ro yang yin/ /sems kyi lam ni gzugs med par/ /rdo rje sems dpa' rnam par gnas/ /pags pa rus ba rkang dag dang/ /khrag
16b6(rgyud 'grel): dang rgyu ma he ru ka 'o/ /de lta dbang po lam rnams ni/ /ngo bo nyid kyis tha dad pa'o/ /mnyam par ma bzhag sbyor ba ni/ /gzhung ni mang du bshad pa yod/ /la la'i gzhung ni mi rtog pa/ /ldang ba 'am gang yang rung ba dang/ /'dug dang 'chag? pa
16b7(rgyud 'grel): dag la'ang rung/ /mnyam par ma bzhag pa yi gzhung/ /rab bzhad rdo rje'i mnyam par gyis/ /dbang po gang dang gang sgo nas/ /'ongs pa'i rdzas ni yang dag blang/ /de dang de ni sa bon 'gyur/ /sngags nyid mnyam par ma bzhag pa'o/ /sangs
17a1(rgyud 'grel): rgyas kun gyi dngos bsams la/ /thams cad rdo rje can du sbyor/ /pad+ma'i snod du bzhag nas ni/ /lag pa g.yon dang sgrub pa pos/ /g.yas pa yi ni lag pa yi/ /ba dan gsum pas bza' bar bya/ /rab tu
17a2(rgyud 'grel): bzhad pa'i rdo rje yis/ /mnyam par ma gzhag sngags su bshad/ /oM a sa ma hI taM/ oM a sa ma hI tiM a(rgyud 'grel): a/ rab bzhad rdo rje'i gzhung yin te/ /gzhan dag gi ni gzhung gnyis pa/ /mnyam par ma bzhag ming gis ni/ /
17a3(rgyud 'grel): stong pa mi shigs pa yi gzhung/ /chos kyi 'khor lo lte ba cher/ /des ni thams cad sang par byed/ /des na 'di ni sangs rgyas kun/ /mi mnyam nam mkha' la gnas pa'o/ /de yi yon tan brtag pa ni/ /mnyam med ces bya'i bstod
17a4(rgyud 'grel): pa yi/ /'di la gzhung ni gzhan ci yang rung/ /bdag gi bshad pa yod ma yin/ /rigs kyi dbye bar la lar 'dod/ /sku gsum du ni la la 'chad/ /a ni chos kyi sku yin la/ /ma ni mkha' 'gro la brten pa/ /longs spyod rdzogs pa'i
17a5(rgyud 'grel): bshad pa'o/ /sa ni mnyam med mi g.yo pa'o/ /rab bzhad rdo rje'i bshad pa ni/ /a ni sa bon nyid yin la/ /sa ni skye 'gro thams cad de/ /ma ni sha dang pags pa yi/ /gal te sa bon mi sprod na/ /myur du rtag par gsod par byed/ /g.yo dang g.yo
17a6(rgyud 'grel): bas legs par ni/ /b+ha ga nyid khams rdo rje can/ /'dis ni sa bon brtan pa ste/ /de la 'dir ni bstod bshad pa'o/ /sngon ni shAkyas bskul ba yi/ /rang byung gcig pu che ba'i lha/ /sbyor ba la las bshad pa yin/ /lha nyid kyis ni rnal 'byor
17a7(rgyud 'grel): yin/ /la la sna tshogs pad+ma'i ras/ /gzhung du mkhas pa la la 'dod/ /tshogs kyi dkyil 'khor dbus su ni/ /phyag rgyas bstong pa 'don par byed/ /sna tshogs mchod pa du ma ste/ /ras la pad+ma bri bar bya/ /bla re bsgreng nas bri? bya zhing/ /
17b1(rgyud 'grel): bsgrub pa'i stan ni 'jam par bya/ /lha mo rnams kyi rang gi mtshan/ /gos dang rgyan gyis rnam brgyan pa/ /bzhag nas rig pa mchod bya'i phyir/ /yang dang yang du spyad par bya/ /phyi nas mnyam med mi g.yo ba'i/ /bstod pa dbyangs su gnod par bya/ /sdud par byed
17b2(rgyud 'grel): ba yang 'di skad ces gsol to/ /sna tshogs ras kyis bkab pa yi/ /thams cad dag pa'i stan de ni/ /rang gi gzhung ni gang yin pa/ /rab tu brtse bas bshad du gsol/ /slob dpon gyis 'di skad ces gsungs so/ /sna tshogs rdo rje zhes bshad
17b3(rgyud 'grel): pa/ /pad+ma'i sgra ni bde mchog yin/ /ras kyi sgra ni bags par bshad/ /thams cad dag pa sa bon yin/ /stan ni b+ha ga zhes bshad de/ /gang du rnal 'byor pas rol pa/ /rab bzhad rdo rje'i gzung yin te/ /in+d+ra? pra? ti'i gzhung nyon cig /sna tshogs du ma
17b4(rgyud 'grel): zhes bshad de/ /stong pa mkha' dang mtshungs pa'o/ /pad+ma gnas su gyur pa yin/ /ras ni de yi pags pa yin/ /bkab pa bsgrub pa yin par bshad/ /b+ha ga thams cad dag pa'i stan/ /rdo rje sems dpa' dpal? ? ? gyi? lha/ /de nyid du ni rnam par ?
17b5(rgyud 'grel): sangs rgyas kun gyi mnyam sbyor ba/ /gcig pu bsdus pa'i bya ba mdzad/ /nang gi gzhung ni 'di yin te/ /phyi yi tshogs kyi dkyil 'khor te/ /in+d+ra b+hU ti'i bshad gzhung gis/ /tshogs kyi dkyil 'khor bya ba yin/ /tshes brgyad dang ni bcu bzhi
17b6(rgyud 'grel): pa/ /rnal 'byor ma dang bla ma mchod/ /dmar chen tsan dan bcas pa yi/ /rdzas ni 'di yis bza' bar bya/ /sku gsung thugs kyi rdo rje can/ /gal te cung zad sgrub 'dod na/ /gang zhig bya ba dang bral bas/ /sgrub pa 'ga' zhig brtsam? par bya/ /
17b7(rgyud 'grel): sbyin sreg las ni mi bya zhing/ /bzlas brjod ma yin gzung ma yin/ /bsnyung ba brtul zhugs mchod med par/ /de yi dngos grub mchog tu 'gyur/ /sdung par byed pas yang 'di skad ces gsol to/ /bcom ldan phyag mtshan bshad du
18a1(rgyud 'grel): gsol/ /de bzhin 'dod chags che las byung/ /de bzhin lha mo'i sngags rnams dang/ /chos gos dang ni lhung bzed nyid/ /rnal 'byor rgyud las bshad pa yi/ /de bzhin glegs bam mkhar gsil gsungs/ /slob
18a2(rgyud 'grel): dpon gyis 'di skad ces gsungs so/ /'dod chags chen po las byung ba/ /gzhon nu bdag po dang 'dus khrag /tsan dan dang ni sha chen te/ /gci ba rdo rje chu zhes bya/ /rdo rje bcas pa'i dri bshad pa'o/ /pad+ma'i snod ni ka pA la/ /bsgrub pas tshogs
18a3(rgyud 'grel): kyi dkyil 'khor du/ /rdzas de der ni brtag par bya/ /bde mchog sa bon hom zhes bya/ /brda yi tshig gis chos gos yin/ /kye ma bde ba zhes bya ba'i/ /dza yis sa bon lhung bzed yin/ /sgrol ma'i yi ge pa yang yin/ /brda yi tshig
18a4(rgyud 'grel): gis mkhar sil yin/ /sha shi'i yi ge ha yang yin/ /sa bon lnga dang ldan gyur pa/ /sangs rgyas ming gis spas pa ste/ /de nyid ming ni glegs bam mo/ /pad+ma gar dbang phyag rgya ni/ /pad+mar ldan pa'i yi ge hUM/ /hUM b+hyo hUM zhes btus
18a5(rgyud 'grel): pa'i sngags/ /sngags ni he ru ka 'byung ba'o/ /phyag rgya rnams ni dril bu nyid/ /rdo rje can gyi dkyil 'khor bshad/ /mo dri bi bi dzaM dzaM baM baM/ /rdo rje nyi ma'i lha mo rnams/ /aM aM nyid de stong pa ste/ /paM baM daM daM de bzhin to/ /sangs rgyas
18a6(rgyud 'grel): dkyil 'khor brtul zhugs can/ /de nas gsang sngags brjod par bya/ /gzhan gyi 'gros ni rol pa ste/ /yi ge u ni rings rab 'gyur/ /gang gzhan drag po'i sbyor ba ni/ /rta mchog gi ste mdza' yas pa'o/ /sna tshogs pad+mar de
18a7(rgyud 'grel): bshad pa/ /bde mchog kye ma bde ba dang/ /sna tshogs pad+ma'ang sha shi ste/ /sgrol ma de ni bzhi pa'o/ /lha mo rnams kyi sngags bshad pa/ /sa bon lnga dang yang dag ldan/ /stong pa drug par yang dag sbyar/ /dkyil 'khor rnams
18b1(rgyud 'grel): kyi rim pa nyon/ /sngar ni bshad pa byas pa'i tshig /gnas ni shes rab b+ha ga ste/ /der ni pad+ma 'dab ma brgyad/ /lte ba la ni bde chen po/ /dkyil 'khor rnams kyi kun tu yang/ /de yi rnam par bri bar bya/ /dbus su pad+ma 'dab ma brgyad//
18b2(rgyud 'grel): lte ba la ni ltar bcas pa/ /sna tshogs gzugs can phyag bzhi pa'i/ /phyag rgya 'dab ma rnam la bri/ /dgu pa la ni sgra 'dzin pas/ /rdo rje bsdams pa'i phyag rgya bri/ /ngos la me tog bdug pa spos/ /lcags kyu la sogs sgo srungs bri/ /rab
18b3(rgyud 'grel): bzhad rdo rje'i gzhung yin te/ /in+d+ra b+hA ti'i gzhung yang yin/ /gnas 'dir gzhung yang 'di lta bus/ /bri ba'i dkyil 'khor bya ba yin/ /rdo rje sems dpa' he ru kar/ /gang zhig dbang ni bskur gyur pa/ /de dang rnam par snang mdzad zhal/ /de yi
18b4(rgyud 'grel): dbus su rang gi lha/ /chog 'dis ni mchod bya zhing/ /tshogs kyi dkyil 'khor mnyes par bya/ /sdud par byed pas yang 'di skad ces gsol to/ /bcom ldan sgra ni gang du bsdu/ /de bzhin der ni bcom ldan gang/ /de bzhin rgyud kyi sgra ngag
18b5(rgyud 'grel): dang/ /rtog pa'i sgra yang bshad du gsol/ /slob dpon gyis 'di skad ces gsungs so/ /de la b+ha ni b+ha ga ste/ /ga ni nam mkha' yin par bshad/ /ba ni stong pa nyid rdo rje/ /der ni sgra de lus de ste/ /der ni rtsa yis thig btab bo/ /ta? ni
18b6(rgyud 'grel): byang chub sems yin la/ /tri ni rnam pa gsum pa ste/ /sku dang gsung dang thugs rnams ni/ /gsang bar byas pas rtag tu brtag /rtog pa zhes bshad khang pa ste/ /dkyil 'khor bya bar gsungs pas na/ /rtog pa'i sgra ni de bshad do/ /
18b7(rgyud 'grel): ngan par spyod pa'ang mnyam par gyis/ /ngan par spyod pa smad 'tshong ma/ /gal te dngos grub sgrub 'dod na/ /dga' ston dang ni bde rnyed par/ /rang gi rdo rje can dang ldan/ /'ang gi sgra ni nges pa ste/ /smad 'tshong ma 'dis 'grub par 'gyur
19a1(rgyud 'grel): b+ha ga'i nang gi rtsa sbubs gnyis/ /ngan par spyod pa yin bshad de/ /gzhon nu'i mtshal chen sa bon dag /legs par rnyed pa nyid dga' bstan/ /las kyi rigs ni bsgoms nas su/ /bud med thams cad bsgrub par bya//
19a2(rgyud 'grel): slob dpon gnyis pa'i gzhung 'di yin/ /slob dpon rab bzhad rdo rje'i gzhung/ /in+d+ra b+hA ti'i gzhung gis ni/ /ji ltar ngan spyod 'grub par bshad/ /ngan par spyod pa rdo rje can/ /gzhir gyur sa bon ngo bo nyid/ /bde mchog rtag tu spyod pa
19a3(rgyud 'grel): ste/ /d+ha gnang gi ling gar ro/ /'ang gi sgra ni nges par ni/ /bde ba chen po de 'thob pa'o/ /rab bzhad rdo rje'i gzhung bshad nas/ /in+d+ra b+hU ti'i gzhung nyon cig /gug kyeng gnyis dang rnam bral ba/ /ngan par spyod par rnam par bshad/
19a4(rgyud 'grel): de ni thams cad sgyu ma nyid/ /bud med gzugs suAng de gnas pa/ /ngan par spyod pa zhes bshad de/ /stong pa rdo rje mkhas la gnas/ /rnyed pa kun dang bde spyod pas/ /ngan par spyod pa 'grub 'gyur na/ /sku gsung thugs kyi rdo rje can/ /zhing
19a5(rgyud 'grel): las ni smos ci de gos/ /slob dpon gzhan dag 'chad pa ni/ /yi ge gnyis ni sgom byed de/ /ha ni rdo rje can du bshad/ /a ni bud med 'di yin te/ /yi ge gnyis kyi ming dag na/ /ngan par spyod par rnam par bshad/ /rnyed dang
19a6(rgyud 'grel): bde ba thams cad kyis/ /bud med 'di ni 'grub par 'gyur/ /shAkya 'di ni mngon sum du/ /rdo rje sems dpas rab tu gsungs/ /phyag rgya 'di nyid dag gis ni/ /bud med kun gyi sgyu ma bshad/ /sku ni yongs su ma bsgyur bas/ /bde
19a7(rgyud 'grel): mchog rdo rje can gyis gsungs/ /bsdoms dang bsam gtan 'dzin pa yis/ /de la 'dod chags yod ma yin/ /de bzhin chags dang bral ba dang/ /dbu ma 'ang dmigs par mi 'gyur ro/ /phra ba'i gzugs can mkha' la gnas
19b1(rgyud 'grel): lha mo de ni dmigs mi 'gyur/ /bde mchog byed par byas nas ni/ /brtan dang g.yo ba rnams la gnas/ /rang gi gzugs ni yongs gyur pas/ /bud med kun gyi sgyu mar bshad/ /khams rnams dang ni lus nyid ni/ /lha mo bde mchog yin par
19b2(rgyud 'grel): bshad/ /sna tshogs du mar bshad pa ste/ /sangs rgyas rol mo rdo rje can/ /chos rnams rnam par mi rtog cing/ /stong nyid nam mkha' 'dra ba las/ /sems can kun la phan pa'i phyir/ /yongs su rtog pa gsungs pa yin/ /stong pa ma yin mi stong yin
19b3(rgyud 'grel): dbu ma dmigs par mi 'gyur ba'i/ /stong nyid gsum bshad bde mchog gis/ /sgra brnyan lta bu'i tshig tu thos/ /dngos med mtshan ma med pa ru/ /phyi dang nang du bcas na gnas/ /snying ga'i mkha' dang phyi rol gnas/ /de bzhin 'char dang nub pa ru/ /
19b4(rgyud 'grel): rtag tu rdo rje can rol kyang/ /rang gi sku? ni snang mi 'gyur/ /stong nyid gcig buAng ma yin te/ /de bzhin sprul pa'i skur mdzad do/ /stong nyid min pa'ang ma yin snga/ /chos kyi sku ni yin par bshad/ /dbu ma mang med ces grags te/ /lte ba'i 'dus? ?
19b5(rgyud 'grel): par gnas/ /shes rab pha rol phyin pa'i ming/ /bde mchog rdo rje can du bshad/ /rnal 'byor sgra ni mnyam sbyor pa/ /u ni stong pa nyid yin pas/ /rnal 'byor stong nyid rdo rje can/ /u nyid kyang ni bde mchog go /cha dang thig ler rnam brgyan bshad? pa
19b6(rgyud 'grel): ni thams cad byed par 'gyur/ /sangs rgyas kyis 'dul thams cad la/ /sems can kun don bla med pa/ /cha med rtag tu rdo rje can/ /cha de yong pa ma yin pa/ /rlung gi gzugs su gnyid log pa/ /de las sprul bar 'gyur ba yin/ /sa bon kha nas? rnams
19b7(rgyud 'grel): 'dzin byed cing/ /khams rnams thams cad nyid kyang ngo/ /de bas chos kyi skur 'gyur ba/ /gang tshe stong nyid thig ler bcas/ /gang tshe de yi gug skyeng dang/ /cha dang zla phyed byung gyur pa/ /de tshe 'dir ni sku yi sgrar/ /longs spyod rdzogs pa chen por bshad/
20a1(rgyud 'grel): lte ba'i dbus na pad+ma tshe/ /bcu drug thig gis thig btab pa/ /de dbus rtag tu stong pa yin/ /gsang ba mchog la bzhugs pa yin/ /dbang po gnyis kyis mnyam sbyor bas/ /thams cad bskyed par mdzad pa yin/ /chos
20a2(rgyud 'grel): kyi sku ni byung gyur nas/ /de 'og mi rnams byung ba yin/ /rtag tu gzugs med rdo rje can/ /rtag tu sbruM ma'i bu bzhin no/ /sdud par byed pas yang 'di skad ces gsol to/ /thod pa'i phreng ba'i dbu rgyan dang/ /de bzhin spyi bor nor bu 'ching/ /rtag tu'i sgra
20a3(rgyud 'grel): ni ji lta bu/ /bcom ldan bla mas bshad du gsol/ /slob dpon gyis 'di skad ces gsungs so/ /thod pa'i phreng ba'i u rgyan ni/ /he ru ka yi dbang bskur ba'o/ /slob dpon mang pos rab tu bshad/ /rab bzhad rdo rje'i gzhung yin te/ /thod pa lus
20a4(rgyud 'grel): zhes bya ba yin/ /phreng ba rked pa'i ming yin la/ /cod pan b+ha ga yin par bshad/ /sangs rgyas sa bon yin par bshad/ /nor bu bde ba zhes bshad de/ /rdo rje sems dpa' i sa bon dag /rab bzhad rdo rje'i gzhung yin te/ /in+d+ra b+hU ti'i gzhung nyon cig
20a5(rgyud 'grel): thod pa g.yogs pa yin par bshad/ /phreng ba sngags ni stong pa'o/ /dbu rgyan lte ba'i kha yin te/ /bcu drug thig gis thig btab pa'o/ /sangs rgyas sgra ru bshad pa der/ /a la sogs pa'i yi ge rnams/ /de rnams dbus gyur stong pa nyid/ /de
20a6(rgyud 'grel): nyid gtsug gi nor bur bshad/ /gang tshe rdo rje sems dpa' yis/ /rtag par sngon ni gsungs pa yi/ /thod pa'i phreng ba'i dbu rgyan dang/ /de bzhin sangs rgyas gtsug gi nor/ /pad+ma dpal gyi nags gnas 'di/ /sangs rgyas phyag rgya'i brda?
20a7(rgyud 'grel): yin te/ /dpal ni lha mo'i stong nyid de/ /lte ba'i kha yi pad+ma yin/ /nags kyi gnas zhes bstan pa ni/ /a la sogs pa'i yi ge rnams/ /'di zhes bya bar rjes dpag par/ /brda yi sgras ni bstan pa yin/ /sangs rgyas skye? ni stong nyid
20b1(rgyud 'grel): nges phyag rgya bde mchog b+ha ga yin/ /rdo rje sems dpa' rtag sangs rgyas/ /he ru ka dang rta mchog dang/ /rdo rje nyi ma 'jig rten dbang/ /sangs rgyas thams cad 'jig rten du/ /de dag gzugs rnams thams cad mdzad/ /stong pa'i thig le rnam spangs pa/ /ji ltar khang
20b2(rgyud 'grel): pa'o zur bzhi ni/ /dus kyi mthar ni 'jig par 'gyur/ /de yi dbus ma mi 'jig te/ /'di ni stong pa'i mtshan nyid do/ /cha yi rnyog dang rnam bral zhing/ /stong pa'i thig le yongs spangs pa/ /sems med par ni yang dag bstan/ /rnal 'byor pa yi gnas mchog go/
20b3(rgyud 'grel): skye gnas sa bon rim byas pa/ /gzhi dang khang pa nyid dang ni/ /las dang sbyor ba rang nus pa/ /rang gi ngo bor yi ger sbyar/ /tshig gi don ni bcu gnyis po/ /sngags kyi snying por gyur pa'o/ /de dag thams cad rig pa ni/ /sngags kyi de nyid mtshon pa ste/ /yin
20b4(rgyud 'grel): pa gang dag 'dod pa yi/ /dngos grub thams cad bsgrub par bya/ /de la rdo rje zhes bya ba ni rtse lnga pa'o/ /rdo rje kha TwAM ge zhes bya ba ni/ /rdo rje kha TwAM ga nyid do/ /rdo rje dril bu zhes bya ba ni dril bu nyid do/ /kA la pa zhes bya ba ni Da ma ru'o/ /gos chen po zhes bya ba ni
20b5(rgyud 'grel): mi'i pags pa'o/ /dbang bskur ba chen po zhes bya ba ni byang chub kyi sems kyis dbang bskur ba'o/ /sha chen po zhes bya ba ni sha chen po nyid do/ /chang? chen po zhes bya ba ni dmar chen po'o/ /mchod phyir thogs zhes bya ba ni mi'i mgo yi phreng ba'o/ /slong ba zhes bya ba
20b6(rgyud 'grel): ni rdo rje'o/ /sems dpa' zhes bya ba ni sa bon no/ /sa bon zhes bya ba ni rdo rje 'dzin pa'o/ /rab tu bzhad pa'i rdo rje'i gzhung ni/ /bcom ldan 'das zhes bya ba ni rdo rje 'chang chen po'o/ /de la oM zhes bya ba ni sa'o/ /a zhes bya ba ni chu'o/ /hUM zhes bya ba ni me'o/ /
20b7(rgyud 'grel): swA zhes bya ba ni rlung ngo/ /hA zhes bya ba ni nam mkha' o/ /haM zhes bya ba ni chos kyi dbyings kyi ngo bo'o/ /de yang dang po'i oM ni sa'i ngo bo ste/ /mig gis nam mkhar gnas nas gzugs rnams mthong/ /rdo rje hUM ni snying gar rnam bsams pa/ /rgyal ba rnams kyis rnam shes
21a1(rgyud 'grel): ming gis gsungs/ /A ni gsung ste 'jig rten dbang phyug dang/ /rna bar gnas swA rdo rje nyi ma yin/ /sna yi hA ni he ru ka ru bshad/ /rta mchog ming ni stong pa'i rdo rje can/ /zhes bshad pas so/ /sdud par byed pas yang 'di
21a2(rgyud 'grel): skad ces gsol to/ /e ma'o 'gro ba mthon byed bde ba che/ /e ma'o sangs rgyas rnam 'phrul bsam mi khyab/ /e ma'o nges sbas sangs rgyas thams cad mchog /e ma'o rnyed dka' in+d+ra b+hU ti'i bla/ /slob dpon gyis 'di skad ces
21a3(rgyud 'grel): gsungs so/ /shAkyas gang dris in+d+ra b+hU ti'i gzhung gi dka' 'grel bshad/ /slob dpon chen po mang pos bshad gzhung ming gis legs bshad pas/ /bdag gis bsod nams nges par gang bsags des ni 'gro ba kun/ /myur du
21a4(rgyud 'grel): sangs rgyas kun skyes dngos grub che mchog snang thob shog /dpal sangs rgyas thams cad dang mnyam par sbyor ba zhes bya ba rnal 'byor rgyud kyi dka' 'grel/ /slob dpon in+d+ra b+hU tis mdzad pa rdzogs so// //
21a5(rgyud 'grel): rgya gar gyi mkhan po A tsArya sh+rad+d+hA ka ra pad+ma dang/ /zhu chen gyi lo tsa ba dge slong rin chen bzang pos bcos shing bsgyur te gtan la phab pa// //sangs rgyas mnyam sbyor gyi 'grel bas zhugs/ */ /rgya gar skad du/
21a6(rgyud 'grel): sarba kalpa sa muts+tsha ya nA ma sarba bud+d+ha sa ma yo ga DA ki ni dzA la saM ba rot+ta rot+ta ra tan+t+ra TI kA/ bod skad du/ rtog pa thams cad 'dus pa zhes bya ba sangs rgyas thams cad dang mnyam par sbyor ba mkha' 'gro ma sgyu ma bde ba'i mchog gi rgyud phyi ma'i phyi ma
21a7(rgyud 'grel): rnam par bshad pa/ dpal rdo rje sems dpa' la phyag 'tshal lo/ /de ltar rnam par bshad pa chen pos rtog pa bcu'i bdag nyid/ sangs rgyas thams cad dang mnyam par sbyor ba/ /mkha' 'gro ma sgyu ma bde ba'i mchog gi de kho na'i rtog pa thams cad
21b1(rgyud 'grel): bsdus pa zhes bya ba'i rgyud phyi ma'i yang phyi ma yis/ /rtsa ba'i rgyud la sogs pa la brjod pa'i rtog pa'i don dang/ rgyud phyi ma'i dang po'i sa chog dang/ gdod ma dang tha ma med pa'i rdo rje sems dpa' dang/ yid 'bru dang/ sngags dbyung ba dang/ shin tu
21b2(rgyud 'grel): dga' ba dang/ shin tu bzang ba nyid dang/ rdo rje snying po'i gtso bo nyid dang/ sems dang sems dpa' dang/ ting nge 'dzin dang/ rdo rje dang/ rdo rje 'dzin pa dang/ rdo rje 'dzin pa chen po nyid dang/ byang chub spyod pa dang/ bdud dang bdud las rgyal ba dang/ byang
21b3(rgyud 'grel): chub dang/ sangs rgyas nyid dang/ rdo rje gtum po thar byed dang/ phyag na rdo rje dang/ dang po'i rigs bskyed pa dang/ 'dod pa'i thar pa dang rnam pa gsum thams cad nyid dang/ dang po'i snying po 'byung ba dang/ nye ba'i snying po de nyid dang/ bde ba chen po dang/ rdo rje
21b4(rgyud 'grel): dang/ don yod pa'i dam tshig dang/ dkyil 'khor gyi don shes pa dang/ dkyil 'khor du bcug pa'i rnam par smin pa dang/ dkyil 'khor gyi thig gdab pa dang/ rtog pa'i dngos grub dang gsang ba chen po lnga dang/ de bzhin nyid chen po dang/ dkyil
21b5(rgyud 'grel): 'khor gyi gtso bo dang/ rigs dang/ dbang thams cad bskur ba dang/ sku phyag rgya chen po'i tshogs kyi de nyid dang/ thams cad dgug pa dang/ mchod pa chen po dang/ byin gyis brlab pa la sogs pa dang 'grub pa'o/ /de rnams kyi tshig dang don gyi 'khrul ?bsal
21b6(rgyud 'grel): bar bya ba'i phyir bsam gtan dang/ bsam gtan gyi bdag nyid kyi don du rig pa'i las thams cad bsal bar bya ba'i dngos grub thams cad 'grub par byed pa rnams gsungs pa/ sangs rgyas thams cad la phyag 'tshal te/ zhes pa la sogs pa
21b7(rgyud 'grel): ste/ da la dpal rdo rje sems dpa' la sogs pa'i shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa'i rang bzhin sems dang sems las byung ba dang/ de dang rgyu mthun pa rnams sbrul pa dang 'dra ba/ dpal rdo rje sems dpa' la sogs pa ni/ sangs rgyas thams cad
22a1(rgyud 'grel): ces pa'o/ /de dag la phyag 'tshal te/ zhes pa ni te zhes pa'i sgra ni nges pa'i don te/ sangs rgyas de dag kho na la phyag 'tshal ba yin gyi/ gzhan ni ma yin zhes pa'i tha tshig go /ma lus lus pa med pa ces pa la sogs pa ni/ de
22a2(rgyud 'grel): la ma lus zhes pa ni chos kyi dbyings dang/ 'jig rten gyi khams thams cad la'o/ /lus pa med ces pa ni thams cad ma lus pa'o/ /grub pa zhes pa ni/ thabs dang shes rab kyi dngos po dpal rdo rje sems dpa' la sogs pa sgrub par byed pa'i sgom pa'i
22a3(rgyud 'grel): stobs kyis mngon du gyur pa'o/ /rnam rtog med pa'i sems la ni zhes pa ni/ gzung ba dang 'dzin pa'i rnam par rtog pa med pa mi rtog pa'i sems rtse gcig pa'o/ /yang de kho na gsungs pa de kho na nyid nges par zhes pa ste/ rtog pa'i don zhes pa la sogs pa'i ngo
22a4(rgyud 'grel): bo ni de kho na nyid ces bya'o/ /de'i nges pa la bzung ba'i ngo bos gnas pa ni nges par gnas zhes pa'o/ /don ni 'di ltar gsungs par 'gyur te/ rang bzhin dag pa'i chos thams cad dpyad pa la gnas pa'i sems 'di ni sangs rgyas thams cad la phyag 'tshal te/
22a5(rgyud 'grel): zhes pa'o/ /dpal rdo rje sems dpa' la sogs pa'i thabs dang shes rab kyi rang bzhin bskyed pa'i chos kyi yi ges ni/ yang nas yang du gtan la phab ste bskyed nas sgrub pa pos mngon du byed pa ni rtog pa'i don shes pa rnams kyi gzhir gyur pa'o/ /de bas
22a6(rgyud 'grel): de 'dra ba la ni de kho na nyid nges par gnas zhes so/ /des ni chos kyi phyag rgya gtso bor gyur pa shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la gsal bar byed pa'i rgyu 'di yin no/ /dpal rdo rje sems dpa' rigs su gsungs pa'i chos kyi phyag rgya yis ni rtog pa thams
22a7(rgyud 'grel): cad 'dus pa 'jug pa la bshad par byed do/ /da ni chos kyi phyag rgyas gang grub par byed pa de ston pa ni sems dpa' sangs rgyas kyi dngos/ /zhes pa la sogs pa ste/ de dag kyang bshad zin to/ /de ltar gzung ba'i tshig gis chos kyi phyag rgya la de
22b1(rgyud 'grel): kho na nyid gnas par gsungs nas/ de gnas pa'i man ngag gi tshig gis re zhig gsungs pa/ 'dod chags chen po bde che la/ zhes pa nas brtsams nas/ thams cad mi gsung 'os ma lags/ zhes ji snyed pa'i bar du'o/ /da ni man ngag gi tshig rnams ston pas
22b2(rgyud 'grel): gsungs pa/ de nas ston pa rdo rje 'dzin zhes pa la sogs pa ste/ de la de nas zhes pa ni zhus pa'i de ma thag pa'i tshig kho na'o/ /skal pa ji lta ba bzhin du sems can gyi khams la rang gi bka' 'byor bar byed pas ston pa zhes pa'o/ /rdo rje 'dzin zhes pa ni dpal
22b3(rgyud 'grel): rdo rje sems dpa' ste/ bka' stsal pa zhes pa dang 'brel to/ /dpal rdo rje sems dpa' la sogs pa'i dkyil 'khor gyi rang bzhin rtog pa la ni rtog pa kun gyi ces pa'o/ /de dag gi gtso bo chen po zhes pa ni nam mkha' i khams thams cad la rtag tu gnas pa'i sku dang
22b4(rgyud 'grel): gsung dang thugs rdo rje bcom ldan 'das bskyed pa'i rkyen to/ /the tshom dag gis zhes pa la sogs pa ni go sla'o/ /rnam par mi rtog chos dag la/ zhes pa ni ji ltar gsungs pa'i dpal rdo rje sems dpa' la sogs pa'i rang bzhin gzung 'dzin rnam par rtog pa med
22b5(rgyud 'grel): ba la zhes pa'i tha tshig go /sems can don du yongs su rtog ces pa ni 'dul ba'i sems can de dag gi don du dpal rdo rje sems dpa' la sogs pa mngon par 'dod pa'i don grub pa ni sems can don du yongs su rtog ces pa'o/ /de'i don du rdo rje sems dpa' la sogs pa'i
22b6(rgyud 'grel): dkyil 'khor la sogs pa'i de kho na nyid 'di sgra'i don du shes pa rjes su 'gro ba'i shes rab kyis phyogs bcur rnam par bzhag pa yongs su rtog ces pa'o/ /de phyir rtog par yang dag bshad ces pa ni 'dul ba'i sems can gyi don gyi rgyud yin pa'i phyir dpal rdo rje sems
22b7(rgyud 'grel): dpa' kho nas rtog par bshad do/ /rtog pa yongs su dag phyir ro/ /zhes pa ni 'dul ba'i sems can gyi khams kyi gzung 'dzin gyi rnam par rtog pa spang ba'i don du zhes pa'i tha tshig go /de ltar rtog pa'i don shes pas dngos grub gsungs nas/ rgyud phyi ma'i don shes
23a1(rgyud 'grel): pa med na dngos grub mi 'gyur te/ de gsal ba'i don du rgyud phyi ma'i don shes par gsungs pa/ 'di la ji ltar rgyud phyi ma yin zhe na zhes pa la sogs pa ste/ rgyud ni rab tu 'brel par bshad ces pa ni rigs 'di lha thams cad kyi thun mong gi dkyil
23a2(rgyud 'grel): 'khor de kho na nyid la sogs pa 'brel pa ste/ gsal bar byed pa'i sgra 'dus pa nye bar spyod pa ni de bzhin gshegs pa'i rgyud ces gsungs so/ /phyi ma gong du phyung ba yin/ zhes pa ni de bzhin gshegs pa rnams byung yang rung ma byung yang rung bskal pa bzang po la
23a3(rgyud 'grel): sogs pa'i sngon du/ da lta'i dus kyi rang bzhin nyid kyis dpal rdo rje sems dpa' la sogs pa'i rang bzhin rtag par gnas gcig cing chog tu 'jig rten las 'das pa dam tshig chen po 'byung ba gang yin pa de ni rgyud phyi ma'i gong du byung ba'o/ /de kho na yang gsungs pa/ de nyid
23a4(rgyud 'grel): gsang ba gsang chen dag /de yang rgyud ni phyi mar 'dod ces pa ste/ de nyid gsang ba gsang chen ni gong du bstan pa shes par bya'o/ /de yang zhes pa ni don de kho na nyid gsungs pa'o/ /des ni 'di gsungs par 'gyur te de nyid dang/ gsang ba dang/ gsang chen du gang dang gang ston pa de dang
23a5(rgyud 'grel): de ni rgyud phyi ma des 'dir 'dod pa'o/ /de ltar yang gsungs pa/ gang dag 'jig rten gyi spyod pa dang/ 'jig rten las 'das pa'i chos de kho na nyid la sogs pa rnams de dag ni rtsa rgyud ces pa dang/ gang dag 'jig rten las 'das pa dam tshig chen po'i de nyid rnams de dag ni rgyud phyi ma zhes 'dod
23a6(rgyud 'grel): dang/? de ltar rgyud phyi ma zhes pa bsten nas/ dang po'i sa'i de nyid ces pa gsungs te/ 'di la ji ltar dang po'i sa zhes pa la sogs pa ste/ phyogs bcu nas rdzas thams cad dngos po'i rang bzhin dngos po thams cad go 'byed pa sbyin pa'i ngo bo ni nam mkha' kun tu zhes pa'o/ /de rab tu gnas pa
23a7(rgyud 'grel): gzhan gang de de ltar ro/ /dbang po rdo rje dang/ rin chen dang/ pad+ma dang/ sna tshogs rdo rje dag gis byams pa de ni rdo rje kun gyi dngos po mchog ces pa'o/ /de nyid bde ba chen po bskyed pa'i phyir/ bde ba chen po zhes pa'o/ /sems can thams cad kyi re ba kun yongs su bskang ba'i phyir de nyid dgyes pa che
23b1(rgyud 'grel): zhes pa'o/ /da lta'i dus kyi rang bzhin nyid kyis rtag par gnas pas na/ dam pa'i yi ge gzhal yas khang zhes pa ste brtan pa'o/ /de ltar dang po'i sa'i de bzhin nyid kyi zhes pa bstan nas/ da ni rang byin gyis brlab pa la sogs pa'i cho ga brtsams pa nas/ dkyil 'khor bsgom pa la de kho na nyid
23b2(rgyud 'grel): bsam pa 'am/ sbyor ba la sogs pa sgom par byed 'dod pas/ mi skye bar ston pa'i sgra yig dang po la yig 'bru ka kha la sogs pa rnams dang/ sgra yig a la sogs pa bco lnga ni/ de bzhin nyid kyi sbyor bas btsud nas/ rang gi rigs gtso bo dang po'i rdo rje la sogs pa'i gzugs bsams
23b3(rgyud 'grel): te zla ba'i dkyil 'khor gnyis kyis bskor ba'i spyi bos nas ma rag par zla gam gyis brgyan par bsams te/ de'i dbus su zla ba'i yi ge rnams yid kyis sangs rgyas thams cad kyi ri mo bris nas de kho na brjod pas/ bzlas pa'i don du dkyil 'khor la sogs pa sgom par bya'o//
23b4(rgyud 'grel): zhes pa ston pa'i don 'di la ji ltar gdong ma dang tha ma med pa'i rdo rje sems dpa' yin zhe na/ lan btab pa/ shes rab mdun du byas pa'i yi ge ka la sogs pas gdong ma tha ma med pa'i rdo rje sems dpa' de nyid ces pas gsungs pa'o/ /de la yi ge ka la sogs zhes pa ni zla ba'i
23b5(rgyud 'grel): dkyil 'khor la bri bar bya'o zhes pa dang 'brel lo/ /de ji ltar bri ba yin zhe na gsungs pa/ d+ha yig mdza' dang nga nya spangs nas 'jug par bya zhes pa ste/ ka'i sde la yi ge nga dang/ tsa'i sde la yi ge nya spangs nas/ rang gi snying ga'i zla ba la/ g.yas kyi glo nas yi ge ka la sogs pa da'i bar gyi
23b6(rgyud 'grel): yi ge 'bru bcu drug gi phreng ba yid kyis bri ba dang/ yang g.yon gyi glo nas yi ge da la sogs pa'i k+Sha'i bar yig 'bru bcu drug gi phreng ba dang/ de ltar phreng ba gnyis kyi bskor ba bri bar bya'o/ /da nas phreng ba gnyis kyi dbus su se ral kha'i skud pa bzhin du/ sgra yig a la sogs pa bcu drug
23b7(rgyud 'grel): gi phreng ba gi bar bya'o/ /de'i phyir gsungs pa/ dbus gnas par ni a yig phreng/ zla ba'i dkyil 'khor la bkod de zhes pa'o/ /thig le zla tshes ldan par zhes pa ni sgra yig bco lnga pa la gang thig le'i gzugs su gnas pa zla tshes kyi tshul du yongs su brtags pa'o/ /par zhes pa'i sgra ni ?
