131b2(rgyud 'grel): brgyad drung du rnal 'byor 'khor bcas gnas/ /sprin dang mchod rten rang 'byung mkha' 'gro'i tshogs/ /ro langs sha za 'byung po mang gnas shing/ /ro dang bya khyi ce spyang rnam par 'dres/ /de dus drag byed mkha' 'gro lha tshogs la/ /'dzam bu'i gling bzhin dur khrod
131b3(rgyud 'grel): rnam par snang/ /phyi rol dpag bsam bum pa bya dang shing/ /'dod pa'i longs spyod kun gyis rnam par mdzes/ /dbus kyi pad+ma'i gdan dag la/ /dpal mchog dang po bzhugs mdzad de/ /chos kun stong nyid mtshan mar bral/ /smon med rang bzhin 'od gsal
131b4(rgyud 'grel): ba'i/ /ting 'dzin la bzhugs byams par gnas/ /'gog pa'i rang bzhin la gnas pa/ /phyogs bcu'i rgyal bas bskul mdzad de/ /mngon byang lnga yis rdzogs skur gyur/ /rang sems zla ba'i dkyil 'khor la/ /a yig bcu drug gnas pa las/ /thugs rje
131b5(rgyud 'grel): chen po shar byed pa'i/ /nyi dkyil ka yig sum cu bzhi/ /lce rtsa can bzhi mi gsal gnyis/ /skar ma'i gzugs 'dra bsgom par bya/ /de dag 'phro zhing 'dus pa yis/ /tshogs gnyis mtshan dang dpe byad rdzogs/ /ye shes dang po gnyis ston cing/ /
131b6(rgyud 'grel): byang chub sems gnyis mtshan nyid do/ /gsum pa rdo rje rtse lnga pa/ /dkar gsal dmar ba'i mdangs dang ldan/ /bum par hUM mtshan rnam gsal pa/ /tshogs gnyis 'bras bu yongs rdzogs rtags/ /kha dog lnga ni snang ba las/ /rigs drug dkyil 'khor bsam
131b7(rgyud 'grel): byas pas/ /rang gi gnas rnams sbyong mdzad cing/ /dkyil 'khor so so'i 'khor bcas la/ /slar 'dus sku gsung thugs zhugs pas/ /rdo rje'i 'od bcas chen por gyur/ /ye shes par pa gnyis ston cing/ /byang chub sems nyid mtshan nyid do/ /lnga pa cho ga rdzogs pa
132a1(rgyud 'grel): las/ /rdo rje sems dpa' i skur bzhengs te/ /ye shes byang sems lnga pa las/ /phyag rgya chen por gsal ba yin/ /oM badzra a haM/ oM ma hA su kha badzra satwa a/ dza(rgyud 'grel): hUM baM ho:/ su ra ta stwaM/ gang ri rdul bral me shel 'od/ /rin chen lnga
132a2(rgyud 'grel): yis gzer phreng mdzes/ /sgeg dgyes 'dzub mo ka bcas pa'i bzhin/ /dkar mthing ser mchog 'bar ba'i mdangs/ /zhal mang phyag bzhi sgeg bshad 'chang/ /g.yas na rdo rje rtse lnga 'bar/ /snyoms bcus gsor zhing thugs kar brten/ /g.yon pa kha TwAM
132a3(rgyud 'grel): rgya gram can/ /dril bu ba dan bcas pa la brol/ /'og ma gnyis kyi mnga' dang gzhu/ /mtshan dpe phyag rgya lnga yis mdzes/ /stod g.yogs dar dkar gser ris can/ /sku smad tshig gu'i na bza' gsol/ /rin chen 'phreng ba'i rkeng 'chings can/ /
132a4(rgyud 'grel): mgul gdub do shal dpung brgyan dang/ /phyag zhabs gdu bu se mo do/ /rdo rje rtse lnga'i phyag rgya ni/ /gnas lnga dag tu gtug bya ste/ /sngags kyi bde gshegs thams cad kyi/ /sku gsung thugs sogs rnam par bsam/ /oM na mo sarba ta thA ga ta kA
132a5(rgyud 'grel): ya bIk+tsat+ta/ gu? Na badzra b+hA ra At+ma ko haM/ lus kyi ba spu'i gnas rnams su/ /dkyil 'khor drug gi rdul phran gnas/ /mkha' dbyings dbang phyug phyag rgya yis/ /gnas kun byin gyis brlab par bya/ /mthe bong sems dpa' i skyil mo krung/ /mdzub mo gnyis kyi rtse mo
132a6(rgyud 'grel): dgug /gung mo gnyis ni mnyam par sbyar/ /lhag ma rdo rje thal mor bya/ /sor mo thams cad nang du bsnol/ /rtse mo nang du sprang byas nas/ /sna dang mig phug lta bu ste/ /'di gnyis mgo bo'i gnas lngar gtug /dar dpyangs bcing zhing mdza' nas dgrol/ /oM
132a7(rgyud 'grel): a b+hi Shiny+tsa mAM/ hUM a b+hi Shiny+tsa maM/ ratna mA le a b+hi Shiny+tsa traM/ pa Ta laM a b+hi Shiny+tsa hUM/ badzra duSh+ya ho/ /yon tan cha la rna ba yi/ /zab mo bde mchog sku lta bur/ /phyung nas byin gyis brlabs mdzad/ /thabs dang shes rab ldan par gyur/ /lus dang ngag
132b1(rgyud 'grel): sems rdo rje yis/ /mtshan ma'i phyag rgyar ldan byas te/ /oM A(rgyud 'grel): hUM/ /thugs gsal nyi ma la gnas pa'i/ /ye shes sems dpa' hUM dang bcas/ /dkyil 'khor spyan drangs lha mo yi/ /khrus byas dri ma gsum dag nas/ /dbang bskur 'bras bu bsam par bya//
132b2(rgyud 'grel): sangs rgyas gtsug gi nor bu'o/ /khams gsum dag na rin chen gzhan/ /sangs rgyas rin chen lta bu med/ /sangs rgyas kun gyi rin po che/ /dbu rgyan du ni bde bas mchog /gzhan gyi nor min mi 'phrogs pa/ /lha yi chu yi dag pa ste/ /thod pa'i phreng ba'i dbu
132b3(rgyud 'grel): rgyan dang/ /dar dpyangs sogs kyis brgyan pa'o/ /mkha' gsang hUM las byung ba yi/ /rdo rje pang? bcas nor bus mtshan/ /pad+ma 'dab brgyad a dang bcas/ /mdog ser lte ba ze 'bru dmar/ /sha ta pa la sogs brda yis/ /dza(rgyud 'grel): hUM baM ho(rgyud 'grel): 'i sbyor ldan bya/ /lha mo'i
132b4(rgyud 'grel): rol spyod gsang byas pas/ /dkyil 'khor mnyes pa'i las bya'o/ /oM pra be sha phaT/ a la la la la ho/ ling ga 'greng ba rang 'byung ste/ /brla yi dbus su gzhug byas nas/ /ling ga rdo rje byin brlabs nas/ /rdo rje sems dpa' de kun dag /ma lus nye bar khyab
132b5(rgyud 'grel): byas nas/ /'dod dgur bya ba rab tu mnyes/ /'od 'dus thog ma'i gzugs la gzung/ /bde ba chen po'i 'od zer las/ /lha mo bcu gnyis tshul 'dra bar/ /phyogs dus sangs rgyas yab yum rnams/ /dga' ba chen pos mnyes par mdzad/ /rdul phran yi ge'i
132b6(rgyud 'grel): dbyibs su gyur/ gang zhig zhal du zhugs pa las/ /bde ba chen po'i gnas su 'dus/ /'khor lo bzhin nas rim bzhin spro/ /barta ka ta'i gnas 'byung ste/ /bde chen chags dang gnyis med 'dres/ /khams gsum 'gro ba'i rgyud bsregs nas/ /rigs drug
132b7(rgyud 'grel): so so'i dkyil 'khor bsgrub/ /rnal 'byor dag pa'i rgyud bskul zhing/ /rnam gsum dkyil 'khor bsal bar snang/ /slar 'dus gnas su gzhal yas khang/ /rgyan dang gdan bcas sngon bzhin 'byung/ /thig les gnas su mtshon byas nas/ /spros pas ye
133a1(rgyud 'grel): shes dkyil 'khor gsal/ /hUM las rdo rje sems dpa' ste/ /gsang gnas dbus kyi pad+ma la'o/ /dza(rgyud 'grel): las lha mo bde mchog ma/ /hUM las e ma bde ba'o/ /paM las lha mo snang mdzad ma/ /ho las slob ma mo yi rgya/ /de dag sems dpa' i
133a2(rgyud 'grel): phyogs bzhi nas/ /'khril pa'i tshul du bzhugs pa'o/ /oM las sangs rgyas byang chub ma/ /b+h+ruM las chos kyi 'khor lo yin/ /ha las khams gsum rnam rgyal te/ /khaM las 'dod pa kun mdzad ma'o/ /de dag shar la sogs pa yi/ /phyogs bzhi yi ni re cha
133a3(rgyud 'grel): la'o/ /oM las gling bu traM pi paM/ /paM las rdo rje dzdza rdza rnga/ /me mtshams la sogs re mig tu/ /lha mo bzhi ni rim bzhin bzhugs/ /a A me tog spos me ma/ /aM a(rgyud 'grel): mar me dri chab ma'o/ /bar khyams mtshams kyi gnas bzhi ru/ /lha mo bzhi ni
133a4(rgyud 'grel): gnas pa yin/ /dza las rta mgrin 'phang mtho ma/ /hUM las phag gdong mche ba can/ /paM las nyi zla me 'bar ma/ /ho las thal byed sgo bzhir gnas/ /b+ha ga'i gnas nas spro bya zhing/ /slar 'dus phyi rol gnas la 'khod/ /rdo rje sems dpa' i gzugs
133a5(rgyud 'grel): 'dra ba/ /sku gnyis 'phro 'dus rang la gzhug /dza badzra traM sa ma ya phaT/ /lha mo bde mchog 'gying bag can/ /dkar mo sna tshogs rgyan dang gos/ /phyag gnyis mda' gzhu 'gengs pa ste/ /'phro 'du las mdzad shar du bzhugs/ /oM badzra kI li kI la
133a6(rgyud 'grel): hUM/ e ma bde ba gser gyi mdog /g.yas pas bdag po la 'khyad cing/ /g.yon pas rdo rje rin chen 'dzin/ /'gying bcas lho yi phyogs su gnas/ /baM badzra Ni sma ra raT/ /snang mdzad dmar mo g.yas pa na/ /sna tshogs rdo rje g.yon dag gis/ /?
133a7(rgyud 'grel): bcas thod pa'i snod thogs shing/ /kha TwAM la brten nub phyogs gnas so/ /ho badzra kA me shA ri traM/ /slod ma mo 'gying ljang gu'i mdog /g.yas pas bdag po'i sku la 'khyud/ /g.yon gyi bdud rtsi'i bum pa nas/ /sangs rgyas sku 'byung byang gi phyogs/ /oM aM
133b1(rgyud 'grel): ma du badzri g+huM g+huM/ sangs rgyas byang chub dkar dmar gsal/ /tshangs pa'i mgo bzhis mtshan pa yis/ /mda' bzhi dus gcig 'phen pa'i tshul/ /'gying bcas shar gyi re'u char gnas/ /g.yas pas bdag po'i sku la 'khyud/ /g.yon gyis bdud rtsi'i bum pa nas/ /
133b2(rgyud 'grel): sangs rgyas sku ?? byang gi phyogs/ /oM badzra me ge ku lu hUM/ /chos kyi 'khor lo dkar ser mdangs/ /g.yas kyi gung mo'i rtse mo la/ /'khor lo rtse brgyad 'degs tshul 'dzin/ /'gying bcas lho yi re char gnas/ /oM ha sha rat badzri iM iM/ /khams gsum rnam
133b3(rgyud 'grel): rgyal dmar skye'i? mdog /g.yas? na twi shul rtse gsum dang/ /g.yon pas rdo rje rtse lnga 'dzin/ /gar mdzad nub kyi re'u char gnas/ /aM khaM badzra shi raM hUM hUM/ 'dod pa'i dbang mo ljang gu'i mdog /phyag gnyis dpag bsam ljon shing la/ /me tog dang bcas rlung
133b4(rgyud 'grel): bskyod 'dzin/ /gang mdzad byang gi rogs su gnas/ /oM he ra ti badzri bi la si tra tha/ /gling bu sngon mo rdo rjes mtshan/ /sna tshogs sgra sgrogs me yi phyogs/ /he badzra g+hi te te te te/ pi paM ser mo rdo rjes mtshan/ /glu dbyangs drug ldan bden bral phyogs/ /he ra ti badzra ha si
133b5(rgyud 'grel): ta sa paM/ /rnga chen dmar po'i rdo rje rnga/ /brdung mdzad rlung mtshams la gnas pa'o/ /he ra te badzra ne tre pe pha pe sa dzaM/ /rdza rda ljang gu rje rnga la/ /rdo rjes mtshan brdung dbang ldan phyogs/ /oM badzra puShpe/ me tog dmar ser rdo rjes mtshan/ /klu gzhu thogs pa me'i phyogs
133b6(rgyud 'grel): gnas/ /badzra d+hu pe/ spos me dkar sngo rdo rjes mtshan/ /spog thogs bden bral mtshams su gnas/ /a badzrA lo ke /mar me dmar mo rdo rjes mtshan/ /gsal 'dzin rlung gi mtshams su gnas/ /a badzra gand+he/ dri chab ljang gu rdo rjes mtshan/ /gang 'thor dbang ldan
133b7(rgyud 'grel): mtshams su gnas/ /oM badzra aM ku sha dza:/ rta gdong dkar mo lcags kyu dang/ /thod pa rta mgo ljang gu shar/ /oM badzra pA she hUM/ phag gdong sngon mo g.yas mche ba/ /g.yon zhags lho yi sgo la gnas/ /oM badzra shwi kha le baM/ snang ba mo dmar phyag gnyis kyis/ /
134a1(rgyud 'grel): nyi zla lcags sgrog nub kyi phyogs/ /oM badzra g+haN+Te/ thal byed ljang gu g.yas dril bu/ /g.yon pas band+ha ku bcas byang/ /yang na lha mo thams cad kyang/ /zla ba'i kha dog 'dzum pa'i zhal/ /brla yi dbus ni dmar la dkar/ /phyag mchog lo ma sngon
134a2(rgyud 'grel): mo 'dra/ /dkar zhing ser ba'i brla dang ldan/ /lha rdzas kha zas sna tshogs mchog /'bar ba sna tshogs 'khrigs pa'i 'od/ /pad+ma sna tshogs la gnas pa/ /sangs rgyas pad+ma la sogs mchog /rin chen sna tshogs rgyan dang gos/ /mu tig me tog la sogs
134a3(rgyud 'grel): mchog /mdzes pa'i rgyan cha sna tshogs 'chang/ /mgon po ro mnyam gnas bzhugs nas/ /chos dbyings ye shes snyoms 'jug las/ /lha mo bdag po bskul mdzad de/ /sems can don kun rnam 'phrul mdzad/ /rjes su chags pa'i rnam mang
134a4(rgyud 'grel): dga' ba'i padmo rnams/ /dag pa'i mchod pas gsal bar rjes su mchod byas pa/ /mchog tu rtag pa'i rnal 'byor bde bas bde ba grub par mdzod/ /e ma'o mchog tu bde ba'i dam tshig ngo bo nyid/ /mchog tu bde ba'i shin tu rnal 'byor skal
134a5(rgyud 'grel): bzang mchog dgyes pa/ /rang gi dam tshig skyon med rtag la rol cig rol cig ho/ /blo bur 'khrul pas 'khor ba yi/ /'gro ba kun la dgongs nas bzhengs/ /dkyil 'khor tshogs rnams gsal bya'i phyir/ /dbang bskur byin gyis brlab par
134a6(rgyud 'grel): mdzad/ /gzugs phung chos dbyings ye shes che/ /mig la sangs rgyas rnam snang mdzad/ /rnam gsum gzugs dang rol mdzad de/ /brtan g.yo'i dngos po rnam par 'phrul/ /chor ba kun tog ye shes che/ /rna ba rdo rje nyi ma yin/ /rnam gsum
134a7(rgyud 'grel): sgra dang rol mdzad de/ /brtan g.yo'i dngos po rnam par 'phrul/ /'du shes mnyam nyid ye shes che/ /lce la pad+ma dbang phyug rgyal/ /rnam gsum ro dang rol mdzad de/ /brtan g.yo'i dngos po rnam par 'phrul/ /'du byed bya ba grub pa'i gnas/ /sna la
134b1(rgyud 'grel): rta mchog rol ba ste/ /rnam gsum dri dang rol mdzad cing/ /brtan g.yo'i dngos po rnam par 'phrul/ /rnam shas me long ye shes che/ /yid la rdo rje he ru ka/ rnam gsum chos dang rol mdzad de/ /brtan g.yo'i dngos po rnam par 'phrul/ /kun khyab stong pa'i ye shes
134b2(rgyud 'grel): che/ /lus la rdo rje sems dpa' gnas/ /rnam gsum reg dang rol mdzad de/ /brtan g.yo'i dngos po rnam par 'phrul/ /rnam gsum phyag rgya'i tshogs ldan zhing/ /thugs kar ye shes sems dpa' gnas/ /rang rig dkyil 'khor spyan drangs nas/ /dbang
134b3(rgyud 'grel): bskur rigs kyi mtshan ma bsam/ /de ltar gtso dang sprul bcas pa/ /dbang bskur byin brlabs rdzogs byas nas/ /phyag rgya bzhi la gnas spro zhing/ /phyag rgya'i sku rnams gsal bar mdzad/ /sbyor ba bzhi yi bye brag gis/ /dkyil 'khor rdzogs par byas nas
134b4(rgyud 'grel): ni/ rjes su 'gro ba'i las dag gis/ /dkyil 'khor bsgrub par bya ba yin/ /ye shes tsam la snyoms 'jug pa/ /sbyor ba zhes ni bya bar bshad/ /yum ldan byin brlabs rol bas mchod/ /gzhug pa rjes su sbyor ba'o/ /dag mdzad dkyil 'khor rdzogs mdzad nas//
134b5(rgyud 'grel): 'phro 'du shin tu sbyor ba yin/ /byin brlabs dbang bskur las rdzogs pa/ /sbyor ba chen po zhes bya'o/ /thugs ka'i 'od zer 'phro 'du yis/ /ye shes dkyil 'khor sprul mdzad cing/ /dza hUM baM ho(rgyud 'grel): 'i sbyor tshogs dang/ /rdo rje bsdu ba'i phyag rgya bcing/ /stong pa shin
134b6(rgyud 'grel): tu rnal 'byor yod med mthus/ /nam mkha' nyid du dam tshig nye bar gnas/ /bde gshegs bde bar gshegs pa bzhengs su gsol/ /rdo rje sems dpa' skal bzang dpal khyod bdag /dza(rgyud 'grel): hUM baM ho:/ e hye hi b+ha ga bAn ma hA ka ru Ni kA h+ri sh+ya ho/ /sa ma yastwaM/ bde
134b7(rgyud 'grel): gshegs pho brang dkyil 'khor 'dir/ /'gro ba ma lus bsgral ba'i phyir/ /don gyi dbang du dgongs nas kyang/ /'khor bcas gshegs shing bzhugs su gsol/ /kA ya bAk+tsit+ta hUM/ sgyu 'phrul dga' ba'i rdo rje rol mo'i tshogs/ /gzhan la snang ba'i dkyil
135a1(rgyud 'grel): 'khor rnam par mdzes/ /a la la ho/ /tshangs pa'i mchog rnams zil gyis gnon mdzad cing/ /rtog pa du ma'i sgro 'dogs gcod par mdzad/ /a la la ho/ /gnyis med ye shes gnyis can rnam mdza' yas/ /snang stong bde chen
135a2(rgyud 'grel): mnyam nyid dbyings la rol/ /a la la ho/ kun 'byung yon tan rtsol med lhun grub snang/ /rgyan gyi dkyil 'khor rnams dgod rang las byung/ a la la ho/ mdzad pa rgya chen 'gog med kun bsgrubs pas/ /tshogs bcas rol pas bya ba kun
135a3(rgyud 'grel): rdzogs nas/ /a la la ho/ /sku gsung thugs mchog yon tan phrin las rgyan/ /dkyil 'khor mdzes pa'i lha la phyag 'tshal lo/ /a la la ho/ dpal ldan g.yon pa 'gying ba'i thabs/ /g.yas pa ba dan gsum par bya/ /sri zhur byas shing
135a4(rgyud 'grel): bteg pa'i mchog /bdag nyid rdo rje sems dpa' i dpal/ /'dzum dang bcas pa'i mig gis blta/ /bsam g.yon thal mo sbyar bar bya/ /oM A(rgyud 'grel): hUM/ a ti b+hu ho/ band+ha nAM kA ro ya mi/ gu ru pa ti/ a la la ho/ oM 'byung ba chen po thams cad 'byung//
135a5(rgyud 'grel): stong gsum rdul snyed ma lus pa'i/ /gzugs sgra dri ro reg bya chos/ /lha mo'i tshogs rnams ma lus spro/ /me tog bdug pa mar me ma/ /dri tshogs kun gyi mchod par bya/ /oM pa na pe na/ pe nu su ra ta/ ti pu pa ra mu/ sarba ta thA ga ta/ sa ma yo gi
135a6(rgyud 'grel): sirb+ha hUM/ oM badzra puShpe/ oM badzra d+hU pe/ oM badzra A lo ke /badzra gand+he/ pra tIts+tsha ho/ sh+rI b+ha ga ban kha kha khA hi/ skad kyi gsang ni mthon dman dang/ gre 'gyur bcas shing bzlas pa yis/ /dus gsum rang bzhin mchog rnams kyis/ /hUM
135a7(rgyud 'grel): ba sogs pa'i glu blang zhing/ /tshig rnams kun gyis ci 'dod par/ ji ltar spros pa'i glu kun gyis/ /hUM gi glu yis phyag rgya dpal/ /rdo rje sems dpa' rab bsgrub pa'o/ /gling bu dang ni rgyud gcig dang/ /de bzhin du ni rgyud med sogs/ /gyen
135b1(rgyud 'grel): du 'thor dang thur du blugs/ /g.yas pa mi 'degs so so'i rgya/ /sbyor ba rnam pa gsum ldan pas/ /rang gi gnas la sbyar bar bya/ /dza(rgyud 'grel): hUM baM ho:/ bde ba kun la zhen pa dang/ /dngos grub thams cad rnam dag phyir/ /rdo rje sems dpa' bde ba'i mchog/
135b2(rgyud 'grel): zla ba nya ltar rtsa dmar sku/ /g.yas g.yon rdo rje dril 'dzin pas/ /bde ba'i cha lugs gar byed cing/ /sems dpa' i skyil krung snyems bcas nas/ /dpung 'joms dngos grub thams cad 'grub/ /oM ma hA su kha badzra satwa A(rgyud 'grel): dza(rgyud 'grel): hUM baM ho(rgyud 'grel): su ra tastwaM zla
135b3(rgyud 'grel): ba'i kha dog 'dzum pa'i zhal/ /pad gnas bcas pa'i gar bcas 'khyud/ /mnga' 'dzin sangs rgyas padmo sogs/ /rin chen sna tshogs rgyan gos can/ /rnam pa sna tshogs dam tshig chags/ /bde ba 'bar ba'i gar byed pas/ /bdag la 'khyud pa'i
135b4(rgyud 'grel): phyag rgya mchog /dbus kyi lha mchog chen po'o/ /se ral kha yi tshul bzhin du/ /rdo rje kha TwAM ga bzung ste/ /bdag la 'khyud pa'i phyag rgya ni/ /gtsug lag ji lta'i rjes mthun par/ /dpal rdzogs rgya chen gar dag gis/ /mda' bzhi yongs su 'phang ba ni/ /
135b5(rgyud 'grel): bdud bzhi rag las rgyal bar 'gyur/ /rkang pa bteg cing 'bad ba dang/ /gzhibs te 'phang ba'i stabs dag gis/ /'khor lo'i phyag rgya bstod pa ni/ /khams gsum dag las mchongs par 'gyur/ /bya ba dang ni bzlog pa dang/ /dbrog pa dag gis khyad par
135b6(rgyud 'grel): du/ /sna tshogs phyag rgyas gar byed cing/ /khams gsum dag ni bsdu bar bya/ /lcug ma gang yang rung gzung nas/ /bdag la 'khyud pa'i phyag rgya yis/ /bud med thams cad rtsen nas ni/ /dpag bsam shing dag yongs su 'grub/ /gling bu len pa'i tshul ston
135b7(rgyud 'grel): no/ /pi baM len pa'i tshul ston dang/ /cang te'u tshul ston rnal 'byor dang/ /rdza rnga tshul ston rnal 'byor pa'i/ /myang ba btung ltar byed pa dang/ /sna yi myang ba rdub pa dang/ /mig btsum zhen par lta ba dang/ /thams cad bdag gis myang ba'o/ /rang 'byung
136a1(rgyud 'grel): lha mo dang bcas pa'i/ /phyag rgya sngags kyis gnyis med 'gyur/ /rdo rje sems dpa' bde chen skal bzang dpal khyod bdag cag sgrub la rtogs par mdzad du gsol/ /kye de bzhin gshegs pa kun gyi bdag nyid bde ba mkha' 
136a2(rgyud 'grel): 'gro sgyu ma'i tshogs rnams bde ba'i mchog /'gro ba'i rgyud rnams rnam pa sna tshogs 'dul mchog grub pa bdag la grub par mdzad du gsol/ /a la la ho/ /de bzhin gshegs pa'i sbyor ba rnam pa sna tshogs gar rnams bstan du gsol/ /
136a3(rgyud 'grel): dza(rgyud 'grel): hUM baM ho(rgyud 'grel): kye ma bde mchog bde bas zung la rnam par sprul/ /hUM snang bar mdzad du gsol/ /a la la la la ho/ /de bzhin gshegs pa kun gyi mkha' 'gro sgyu mas slob ma gzung du gsol/ /mdzub mos mtheb mo mnan nas ni/ /rang gi
136a4(rgyud 'grel): mtheb mos mdzub mo mnan/ /dpal grub spyan gyi phyag rgya ste/ /mdzub mo mig gi 'bras bur bya/ /rdo rje thal mo mnyam sbyar nas/ /khong stong du ni sbyar nas su/ /sngags bcas gnas su bzhag bya ste/ /rim bzhin mdza' nas dgrol bar bya/ /rab tu dga' ba'i
136a5(rgyud 'grel): bdag la phyag 'tshal lo/ /de bzhin gshegs pa'i bdag la phyag 'tshal lo/ /de bzhin gshegs pa'i dam pa grub par mdzod/ /oM A(rgyud 'grel): hUM/ dam tshig dam pa grub par mdzad du gsol/ /mchod pa chen po thams cad dag par mdzod/ /mnyam pa
136a6(rgyud 'grel): chen po'i gnas la rol du gsol/ /rab tu dga' ba rjes su chags pa'i mda' gzhu rab tu phra ba'i rgyas btab pa'i/ /rab tu dga' ba'i sbyor ba'i bde bas myos pa'i bde bas thams cad bdag la grub par mdzod/ /rab tu bde mchog rnam pa sna tshogs rnam
136a7(rgyud 'grel): par rgyal ba'i rgyal mtshan bsgreng ba'i longs spyod dang/ /rab tu dga' ba'i dbang phyug che mchog grub pa de bzhin gshegs pa rab tu sna tshogs bde ba'i mchog rol cig ho/ /bde bas bde ba slong rnam par rol hUM snang bar mdzod/ /a la la la la ho//
136b1(rgyud 'grel): de bzhin gshegs pa kun gyi mkha' 'gro sgyu ma sna tshogs kun gyis slob ma gzung du gsol/ /kye bde ba'i mchog grub par mdzod/ /e ma'o bde ba gsol/ /dam pa rab tu zhugs par mdzod/ /bdag la rab tu bde bar 'gyur/ /a la la la la ho/ /e ma'o
136b2(rgyud 'grel): shi shi zhugs shig /mkha' 'gro bde mchog kun tu bskor cing kun tu zhugs/ /la lar rab tu drag cing skye bo drag la drag pa'i bud med sku ltar snang/ /'gro ba mdza' dag 'dul phyir la lar rab tu rno ba'i 'khor lo phyag na bsnams pa'i sku/ /la lar rab
136b3(rgyud 'grel): tu res shing zhi bar mi 'gyur sbyin pa tshangs pa'i skur yang ston par mdzad/ /la lar rab tu 'bar ba'i chags pa padmo'i dam tshig bdag la grub par mdzod/ /thams cad dbang bskur dbang phyug dam pa mi zad gter mchog bdag la grub par mdzad du
136b4(rgyud 'grel): gsol/ /kun mchog rgyal mtshan bsgreng ba'i rdo rje rin chen shin tu che ba bdag la stsol/ /lha mo kun gyi bde ba'i mchog /mdzes pa'i zhal ni rnam par 'gyur/ /bde ba myong bar rab sbyor ba/ /mdzes par lta zhing gar byed pa'o/ /lha mo kun gyi bde ba mchog /
136b5(rgyud 'grel): mdzes pa'i ma mchu sos mnan pa'i/ /'dzum pa'i phyag rgya mchog 'di ni/ /sangs rgyas thams cad dgyes par byed/ /sna tshogs band+ha brtag pa las/ /sna tshogs bdud rtsis rnam par dag /lnga lnga lnga yi 'phro 'du yis/ /mtshan ma rnam pa lnga dang ldan/ /'od dang
136b6(rgyud 'grel): du ba dri dang sgra/ /lha mo'i gzugs ston bdud rtsir 'grub/ /rang byung gdod nas rnam par dag /mnyam pa'i don ldan rol bar mdzad/ /byin brlabs mtshan dang rgyan ldan pa'i/ /mi mo rnams kyi reg bya'i mchog /byin gyis rlobs shig rnal 'byor pa/ /gsang
136b7(rgyud 'grel): ba chen por rnam par rol/ /grub pa'i rdzas 'di thams cad la/ /hUM dang phaT kyis ldan par mdzod/ /mnyam nyid mi g.yo mnyam nyid mchog gi chos nyid can/ /thugs rje'i bdag nyid 'gro ba'i sdug bsngal sel bar mdzad/ /yon tan mdza' yas dngos grub
137a1(rgyud 'grel): thams cad sbyin mdzad pa/ /dri med mi g.yo mnyam med dam pa'i mchog chos can/ /yon tan shin tu phra ba'i cha la'ang tshad med de/ /dpe ni nam mkha' dang yang bskrun du yod ma yin/ /dngos grub mdza' yas mnyam med dpe
137a2(rgyud 'grel): dang bral ba rnams/ /sems can khams la dngos grub mchog rnams nges par stsol/ /rtag tu dri ma med pa'i thugs rje'i shugs las byung/ /smon lam grub pa 'gag pa med pa'i chos nyid can/ /'gro ba'i don sgrub rab tu brtson pa mdza' yas
137a3(rgyud 'grel): pa/ /thugs rje chen po'i bdag nyid rtag tu rnam par snang/ /tshad med tshad dang bral ba shin tu rdzogs pa yi/ /bde bar gshegs pa'i go 'phang dam pa rnyed gyur kyang/ /khams gsum rnams la dngos grub mchog stsol mdzad pa yi/ /thugs rje'i
137a4(rgyud 'grel): spyod pa mi g.yo 'gag par yod mi 'gyur/ /e ma'o shin tu bzang po'i chos nyid mchog dang ldan/ /mchog sbyin rnams kyi nang nas go 'phang mchog brnyes pa/ /khams gsum rnams la dngos grub mchog stsol mdzad pa yi/ /mgon po dus
137a5(rgyud 'grel): gsum sgrib pa med par rab mkhyen pas/ /dam tshig mchog gsum dngos grub dam pa bdag la stsol/ /dza(rgyud 'grel): hUM baM ho:/ ruT maT/ smar raT/ hu lu hu lu/ pra sid+d+ha/ Tak+ki hUM dzra/ ka ni ku ni/ hUM hUM/ Tik+ka ni hUM dza(rgyud 'grel): hu lu hu lu/ a la la la la ho/
137a6(rgyud 'grel): shud+d+ha sid+d+ha/ darsha ya/ sarba ta g+he g+he/ ta g+he g+he/ Ta Ta/ g+he g+he g+he/ ta g+he ta g+he/ g+he g+he ta ta/ ta g+he ta g+he/ heM doN+Tak+ki hUM dza/ g+he ta g+he doN+Tak+ki hUM dza/ tra a la la la la ho/ /ruT maT/ thal mo brdab pa brtag pa'o/ /ta g+he g+he/ ta g+he na ta g+he na g+he na g+he ta/
137a7(rgyud 'grel): g+he na g+he na/ rgyun gyi rnga'o/ /bdag cag dam tshig 'di la mngon du zhugs pa rnams/ /bcad gtubs lus la 'byung bar mi 'gyur zhing/ /grib mas thog pa'i sdug bsngal mi bzad pa'i/ /sku yi phyogs tsam mthong bas smon lam 'tsho ba dang/ /gzi
137b1(rgyud 'grel): mdangs lus la 'jug pa bye ba stong phrag gi /'od kyis phog pas 'jig rten khams kun snang ba dang/ /lus ngag sems dang tshe ni rdo rje rab brtan ta/ /re smon thams cad dus 'dir 'grub par mdzad du gsol/ /dkyil 'khor rgyas pa la dmigs nas/ /thun mong
137b2(rgyud 'grel): 'das dang dang po brtsam/ /sems dpa' rnam pa gsum ldan par/ /rang rang sku gsung thugs kyi rtags/ /nyi dkyil thabs dang shes rab kyi/ /phreng ba gnyis dang ldan pa las/ /sku gsung thugs kyi mtshan mas brgyan/ /gtso bos ji ltar bzlas pa bzhin/ /'khor
137b3(rgyud 'grel): gyi dkyil 'khor rnam par gnas/ /gnas dang 'khor dang 'phro ba yis/ /mthun pa'i lha tshogs mnyes mdzad cing/ /rigs bsdus 'gro ba'i las la sbyar/ /gtso bo'i zhal nas sbyor sngags ni/ /rang gi gsang sngags bcu bzhi pa'o/ /de bzhin lha mo so
137b4(rgyud 'grel): so yi/ /sngags dang 'phro 'du las ldan pa'o/ /rdzogs nas mchod bstod bskul ba dang/ /gsol gdab 'gro ba'i las la sbyar/ /gnyis pa so so'i las bya ba/ /gtso sogs rim pa bzhin du ni/ /phyag rgya bzhi dang ldan byas te/ /'od kyi rig ma dang bcas shig/
137b5(rgyud 'grel): gsal ba rnam pa gnyis ldan par/ /rang gi gsang sngags brjod par bya/ /oM ma hA su kha badzra satwa A(rgyud 'grel): /dza(rgyud 'grel): hUM baM ho:/ rdo rje sems dpa' i snying po'i gsang sngags yi ge bco brgyad pa'o/ /'khor gyi lha mo ma lus pa'i/ /bzlas rdzogs mchod bstod bskul
137b6(rgyud 'grel): bya zhing/ /rang gi las la sbyar nas kyang/ /so so'i gnas su bsdu bar bya/ /mnyam nyid dkyil 'khor kun gyi mchog /don dam bde ba chen po'i sku/ /de bzhin nyid dbyings ye shes kyi/ /lha nyid brtson pas bsgom par bya/ /sna rtse thig le phra mo la/ /phyi yi dkyil
137b7(rgyud 'grel): 'khor bsdu bya ste/ /yi ge mtshan ma phra mo'i bar/ /mtshan ma lnga gsal bar du gnas/ /yi ge ka sogs da yig mdza' / /nga nya spangs nas 'jug par bya'o/ /yi ge d+ha sogs k+Sha yig mdza' / /phreng ba gnyis pa yang dag bri/ /dbus gnas par ni
138a1(rgyud 'grel): a yig phreng/ /zla ba'i dkyil 'khor la bkod de/ /thig le zla tshes dang ldan par/ /tsheg drag zla ba gnyis yin te/ /a yig mi 'gyur bsgom par bya/ /dbus su rdo rje ngo bor gnas/ /de dbus rtag tu bsgom pa ni/ /'dod chags
138a2(rgyud 'grel): chen po bde ba che/ /'di de sangs rgyas thams cad kyi/ /sangs rgyas ri mor grags pa yin/ /ling ga 'greng ba rang 'byung ste/ /bral yi dbus su gzhug byas nas/ /ying ga rdo rjer byin brlabs te/ /rdo rje sems dpa' bdag sngon bskyed/ /b+ha gar yid
138a3(rgyud 'grel): ka bcu gnas ni/ /der ni hUM yig bsgom par bya/ /shin tu dga' 'dra'i gzugs dag ni/ /sku gnyis ldan par spro bya'o/ /kun kyang khyab cing dri med pas/ /byang chub sems dag brtan pa'o/ /mtshan ma rnam pa lnga yi bar/ /gsal ba'i dkyil
138a4(rgyud 'grel): 'khor rnam par bsgom/ /rten dang brten pa'i tshogs rnams kyis/ /rnam dag de nyid gsal bar brtag /dge bcu dag la brten bcas shing/ /bden bzhi bcos po gcig tu gnas/ /rten 'brel yan lag bcu gnyis tshogs/ /rgyu 'bras sna tshogs
138a5(rgyud 'grel): dag pa'i dbyings/ /yon tan tshogs rnams kun rgyas shing/ /tshangs pa'i gnas bzhi khyab mdzad nas/ /chos tshogs sum cu rtsa bdun las/ /ting 'dzin bzhi por 'jug par mdzad/ /rang bzhin ye shes drug dag las/ /rigs kyi mtshan
138a6(rgyud 'grel): ma sna tshogs snang/ /rnam thar brgyad po brten bcas shing/ /rdo rje theg pa'i tshul nyid mdzes/ /mdzad pa rgya chen 'phrin las rnams/ /yul drug dag gi phyag rgya che/ /mnyam nyid dkyil 'khor chen mor spyod/ /thugs rje chen po'i char khab dang/
138a7(rgyud 'grel): bdud bzhi las rgyal theg chen mchog /mnyam par sbyor bas tshul 'jug cing/ /rtog pa'i sgrib pa sel bar mdzad/ /smon lam las grub mdzad 'phro las/ /theg chen yon tan ci yang 'byung/ /mtshan dang dpe byad rdzogs pa'i sku/ /brten pa'i
138b1(rgyud 'grel): theg pa sna tshogs sgrogs/ /dbang phyug la sogs yon tan brgya/ /phrin las bzhi yis rnam phye zhing/ /rten gnas rgyu dang sbyod mdzad pa'i/ /gnas kyi mtshan ma 'grub pa yin/ /chags med mdzad pas spyod kun dang/ /nyon mongs mtshan mas gos pa
138b2(rgyud 'grel): med/ /bde chen dbyings las ma 'phros shing/ /sku gsung thugs kyi theg pa can/ /yon tan 'byung gnas 'chi med lngas/ /gang ba phyogs bzhir gnas dgod pa/ /shes lnga'i 'dod pa'i longs spyod tshogs/ /nyi shu bdun gyi rgyan gyis spras/ /phrin
138b3(rgyud 'grel): las mchod pa'i gnas gyur pa'i/ /'khor lo rang rtags mtshan mas mdzes/ /phyi yi mtshan ma tshogs dag gis/ /thams cad yon tan snang bas spras/ /sku gsum rdo rje'i rang bzhin gyis/ /sna tshogs phrin las dpag med tshogs/ /ye shes
138b4(rgyud 'grel): 'bar ba'i byin rlabs kyis/ /log rtogs mtshan ma bsreg par mdzad/ /mtshan nyid theg sogs gzhan dag las/ /khyad par 'phags pa theg pa'i mchog /khams gsum gzhan rtog sbyor mdzad cing/ /lus sogs rnam par dag pa'i phyir/ /yon tan
138b5(rgyud 'grel): rgyan gyi rten dag las/ /sangs rgyas brgyad po sku snang mdzad/ /dregs byed 'dul phyir rigs mtshan mnan/ /snod bcud sgrol mdzad shes rab mtshon/ /srid gnas las byung rtog pa'i tshogs/ /gnyis med rang gi ngo bor mos/ /dbyings dang ye shes
138b6(rgyud 'grel): mnyam pa'i lha/ /snang srid gnyis med bsgom pa'i lha/ /thugs rje che la sprul pa'i char/ /tha ba las byung smin par mdzad/ /rang byung ye shes chen po las/ /tshogs brgyad snang ba sna tshogs nyid/ /thugs rje'i sprul pa dpag med kyis/ /stong gsum khams
138b7(rgyud 'grel): las 'gro bar byed/ /'byung ba'i snang ba tha dang rnams/ /thams cad rnam dag dkyil 'khor che/ /'khor ba'i rtog pas mgos shing/ /byang chub thugs rje chags pa'i rtags/ /rdo rje sems dpa' bde chen sku/ /zla 'dra dmar ba'i mdang dang ldan/ /
139a1(rgyud 'grel): chos dbyings stong pa'i ye shes las/ /rigs kyi mtshan ma bzhir snang zhing/ /'phrin las tshad med rnam spyod pas/ /'brel pa'i don bzhin sbyong par mdzad/ /khams gsum rgyal ba'i rgyan bcas pas/ /cha lugs sbyong zhing 'gying bar
139a2(rgyud 'grel): mdzad/ /ye shes lnga ldan zab mo dang/ /rgya chen rigs lnga'i sku snang mdzad/ /rang gi thugs bskul dran tshogs kyis/ /las la rnam par rol mdzad do/ /sna tshogs kun grub sku gsung thugs/ /khams gsum las rgyal gsung sgrogs shing/ /
139a3(rgyud 'grel): chags phyir zhi gnas lhag mthong gi /mtshan nyid 'brel pa ston par mdzad/ /mtshan bzang sum cu rtsa gnyis dang/ /dpe byad brgyad cus rnam spras pas/ /thun mong las grub zil gnon pa'i/ /dbyings dang ye shes 'brel ba'i rgyan/ /byang chub
139a4(rgyud 'grel): sems sogs bla gab la/ /thugs rje'i rim pas legs spras shing/ /mdzad pa'i las mang sna tshogs pas/ /'gro ba'i rnam rtog spyod par ston/ /g.yas su bsdu ba bzhi dag dang/ /g.yon du tshad med bzhi snang mdzad/ /spyi bor pha rol phyin drug
139a5(rgyud 'grel): dang/ /gzungs dang ting 'dzin rtag sna tshogs/ /phyogs bcu'i sangs rgyas kun 'dus pas/ /yon tan rgyan gyi rin chen la/ /rnam pa lnga yi tshul zhugs shing/ /yon tan rgyan gyis spras pa yi/ /rigs kyi mtshan ma mi nub phyir/ /gzugs mthun
139a6(rgyud 'grel): ba yi do ker can/ /yon tan sna tshogs brgyan bcas pas/ /de nyid kun gyis gzugs su ston/ /dge bcu yan lag rnam spras shing/ /zhabs la rnam thar brgyad kyis brgyan/ /bden bzhi'i gdu bus mdzes byas pas/ /rnam thar bzhi yi rang
139a7(rgyud 'grel): bzhin can/ /dge dang pha rol phyin bcu yi/ /rkeng chings phreng ba nyi rim mdzes/ /chos bzang sum cu rtsa bdun gyis/ /tshangs skud bzhin du brgyan bcas shing/ /ma 'dres chos bzang bco brgyad pos/ /rim gnyis phreng bar ldan pa yin/ /
139b1(rgyud 'grel): phyag rgya rnam pa bzhi ldan zhing/ /'gro la de don ston par mdzad/ /phung po lnga rnams rnam dag pas/ /rigs lnga'i rgyan gyis mdzes par byas/ /'byung ba che rnams rnam dag phyir/ /lha mo bzhi dang kun tu 'khril/ /skye mched bcu gnyis rnam dag pas/ /nang
139b2(rgyud 'grel): gi lha mo'i tshogs su byung/ /khams sogs sbyod pa rnam dag cing/ /thug rje'i phrin las rgya chen pos/ /lha mo'i tshogs rnams dgod byas nas/ /nyon mongs nyi shu dag par mdzad/ /ye shes snang ba bsam yas pas/ /sna tshogs dkyil 'khor cir yang snang/ /
139b3(rgyud 'grel): bar chad bgegs bzhi bsrung? pa dang/ /dngos grub ltag par gnas pa'i phyir/ /brtson pas thun mtshams rnam pa bzhir/ /gtor ma'i las dag brtsam par bya/ /sgrib pa thams cad sbyod byed cing/ /tshogs kyi las rnams rdzogs byed pa/ /de nyid spyod dang mthun
139b4(rgyud 'grel): pa'i las/ /des ni mdzad pa rgya chen 'gyur/ /phyi rol dkyil 'khor zla gam la/ /dmar po'i mtshon gyis kha bsgyur te/ /mkha' 'gro'i dkyil 'khor rnam lnga yi/ /thig le dbus dang phyogs bzhi ru/ /dbus su rta yi rgyal po la/ /lha chen lha yi mtshon mas
139b5(rgyud 'grel): bskor /shar du phyogs skyong la/ /lho ru sngon spyod ma mo'i tshogs/ /nub tu dbang lha klu chen brgyad/ /byang du rgyas pa'i 'gro ba rnams/ /rang gi gsang sngags kyis bskyed cing/ /skur gyur ye shes 'od tshogs sbyang/ /sgeg mo dang ni na chung dang/ /myos
139b6(rgyud 'grel): dang de bzhin bdud rtsi dang/ /gcig pu dbang dang 'dod chags sra/ /g.yon can bran mo de bzhin te/ /lan tsha la sogs ro kun dang/ /kar la sogs bdud rtsi bzhin/ /bdag nyid kun gyi ro grub pa/ /sha dang chang dang ldan pa yi/ /bza' ba sna tshogs grub
139b7(rgyud 'grel): pa ni/ /dga' ba'i longs spyod skal mchod ste/ /tshe yi dam pa rab tu grub/ /a mra smin dang rgun 'brum dang/ /pa na se dang na le ker/ /a ru ra la sogs pa yi/ /'bras bu'i phyag rgya mchog rnams dang/ /kha ra sbrang rtsi byug pa yis/ /a mra la sogs tshig
140a1(rgyud 'grel): gus byug /ta sa ka ra'i mar la sogs/ /mnyam pa'i dri zhis bskur bar bya/ /yung dang rgya skyegs la sogs pa'i/ /mtshon gyis mthun par kha bsgyur nas/ /shun pa dro ba la sogs byas/ /mchod pa'i tshe na dbul bar bya/ /thod pa'i
140a2(rgyud 'grel): nang du sbyar byas pa'i/ /gza' btung bca' ba la sogs rnams/ /ha ho h+rI(rgyud 'grel): yis sreg sbyang brlab/ /mkha' 'gro'i 'khor la bsngo bar bya/ /gtor ma rdzas chen ma lus pa/ /dang po dri yi chu sbyungs shing/ /sna tshogs sgra snyan ba dang sogs/ /bkod pa'i mchod
140a3(rgyud 'grel): gtor brlabs la spel/ /sangs rgyas rdo rje sems dpa' nyid/ /rta mchog gzugs su sprul byas nas/ /mdzes pa'i phyag rgya sngags ldan pas/ /mkha' 'gro'i tshogs rnams bsdu bar bya/ /oM badzra TA ki nI b+hyo/ /e a ra li dza dza/ 'khor bcas bsdu bar
140a4(rgyud 'grel): 'ongs pa dang/ /dam tshig phyag rgya rnam gsum bstan/ /oM badzra gu hya drir sh+ya ho/ sa ma ya stwaM/ oM badzra gu hya dri sh+ya ho/ sa ma yastwAM/ oM badzra gu hya dri sh+ya ho/ sa ma ya phaT/ oM a dam du puShpa d+hu pa gand+he/ pU dza sa pha ra Na arg+haM ba liM kha kha khA hi/ yaM las
140a5(rgyud 'grel): skyes pa'i gzhu 'dra'i dbyibs/ /ba dan g.yo bas mtshan pa ste/ /raM byung me yi dkyil 'khor 'bar/ /dmar po gru gsum ra yis mtshan/ /kaM byung thod pa mtshan ldan nang/ /'od gsal chags med la gnas pa'o/ /mi sha la sogs phyogs dang mtshams

140b1(rgyud 'grel): byang chub sems ldan snying rje can/ /dbang phyug chen po chung? mar bcas/ /de bzhin khyab 'jug tshangs pa dang/ /brgya byin 'dod dga' chung mar bcas/ /lha chen 'khor bcas tshogs rnams dang/ /phyogs skyong brgyad po 'khor dang bcas/ /klu chen brgyad po 'khor dang bcas/
140b2(rgyud 'grel): mkha' 'gro drag mo gsum 'dzin ma/ /dur khrod ma tshogs 'khor bcas dang/ /gzhan yang lha srin sde brgyad dang/ /'gro ba drug po 'khor bcas rnams/ /sku gsung thugs sogs sbyang byas nas/ /rang gi lha yi gzugs 'dzin rnams/ /gnas 'dir 'dus pa'i
140b3(rgyud 'grel): dam tshig can/ /mchod gtor rgyun dang bcas pa bzhes/ /dam tshig srungs shig dam tshig can/ /las la brtson pa'i mkha' 'gro rnams/ /mkha' 'gro drag mo 'khor bcas rnams/ /rnal 'byor bsgrub pa'i grogs mdzad cig /las mkhan rdo rje bran bcas pas/ /

141a1(rgyud 'grel): sems can don kun mdzad/ /rjes su mthun pa'i dngos grub gsol/ /sangs rgyas yul du gshegs nas kyang/ /slar yang 'gro ba'i don la dgongs/ /oM badzra gats+tsha mu(rgyud 'grel): de nas phyag rgya rnams dgod pa/ /rim bzhin bdag la

141a3(rgyud 'grel): cod pan ldan/ /kaM haM oM tuM ratna mA le a b+hi Shiny+tsa/ pa Ta laM ba a b+hi laM ba hUM/ spyod lam kun tu ma nyams par/ /lha nyid du ni bsgom par bya/ /dbang po'i snang ba yul dus rnams/ /dkyil 'khor rol po'i tshul du brtag /bza' btung byin brlabs

144a6(rgyud 'grel): zhugs/ /e yaM raM baM laM suM raM/ oM na ma(rgyud 'grel): sarba ta thA ga ta a nu rA ga ya mi maN+DA la hUM baM/ chos 'byung nam mkha' i rang bzhin las/ /'byung ba'i dkyil 'khor rim bzhin brtsegs/ /ri rab me 'od rgyan gsal zhing/ /kha dog dbyibs rgyan mtshan mar bcas//
144a7(rgyud 'grel): bde gshegs yon tan snang ba'i gnas/ /sna tshogs pad+ma rin po che/ /'khor lo sna tshogs rdo rje dbus/ /khang pa gru bzhi sgo khyud dang/ /rta babs bzhi yis mdzes byas pa/ /sa bzhi nam mkha' logs kyi phyogs/ /rim gyi rin chen 'cher ba la/ /rang 'byung nyi
144b1(rgyud 'grel): shu rtsa lnga'i 'od/ /sna lnga'i rtsig pa dra ba dang/ /dra phyed rin chen pha gus mtshan/ /'khor los mtshan pa'i ka ba brgyad/ /rin chen mu tig me tog phreng/ /rgyal mtshan bla re rnga yab gdugs/ /yon tan lnga yi lha mo mchog /zla phyed rdo rje rin chen dang/ /ba dan dril
144b2(rgyud 'grel): bu'i sgra snyan sgrogs/ /pho brang 'khor lo rtse brgyad la/ /pad mtshan mu khyud 'khor lo'i phreng/ /mtshams su bum pa gang ba bzhi/ /rigs kyi mtshan mas rnam par mdzes/ /bar skabs re'u cha brgyad la/ /mtshams phyed 'khor lo'i phreng bas mdzes/ /khams
144b3(rgyud 'grel): kyi cha yi mtshams bzhi dang/ /sgo gnas la sogs pad+ma'i gdan/ /phyi rol ra ba rim gsum brgyan/ /phyogs mtshams dur khrod chen po brgyad/ /de mdza' 'dod pa'i longs spyod dang/ /rdo rje ra bas bskor ba'o/ /yod pa ma yin med pa min/ /dbu mar yang
144b4(rgyud 'grel): ni dmigs su med/ /shes rab pha rol phyin sbyor ba/ /sangs rgyas byang chub rab sgrub pa'o/ /rnam thar sgo bzhir snyoms 'jug gi /'gog gnas gdul bya'i don bral la/ /phyogs bcu'i rgyal bas bskul mdzad de/ /mngon byang lnga yis rdzogs skur 'gyur/ /sems
144b5(rgyud 'grel): dang sems dpa' i ting 'dzin dang/ /byang chub spyod pa sna tshogs nyid/ /de bzhin bdud dang bdud las rgyal/ /de yi byang chub sangs rgyas yin/ /oM mahA su ka badzra satwa a(rgyud 'grel): dza(rgyud 'grel): hUM baM ho/ /su ra ta ta stwaM/ /rdo rje sems dpa' bde chen sku/ /dkar zhing dmar ba'i

144b7(rgyud 'grel): na bza' la/ /rin chen phreng ba'i rked 'ching 'dril/ /mgul du do bshal dpung rgyan dang/ /phyag bzhi gdu bu se mo do/ /rdo rje rtse lnga'i phyag rgya ni/ /gnas lnga dag tu gtug bya ste/ /sngags kyi bde gshegs thams cad kyi/ /sku gsung thugs sogs rnam par bsam
145a1(rgyud 'grel): oM sarba ta thA ga ta/ kA ya bAk+tsit+ta gu Na karmma/ /badzra swa b+hA ba At+ma konyahaM/ /lus kyi ba spu'i gnas rnams su/ /dkyil 'khor drug gi rdul phran gnas/ /mkha' dbyings dbang phyug phyag rgya yis/ gnas kun byin gyis brlab par bya/ /oM d+harmA
145a2(rgyud 'grel): d+hA tu swa b+hA ba At+ma konyahaM/ /rdo rje thal mo mnyam sbyar te/ /lag gnyis nor bu rin chen dung/ /ji ltar rig pa mnyam sbyar nas/ /mdzub mo mthe bong rtse mo bzhi/ /yongs su bsgyur te bteg nas su/ /dpral bar legs par bzhag par bya/ /khaM a b+hi Shiny+tsa mi?
145a3(rgyud 'grel): ratna mA li a b+hi Shiny+tsa traM/ pa Ta laM ba a b+hi Shiny+tsa oM/ badzra tu Sh+ye ho/ /byin brlabs rigs kyi dbu rgyan gyis/ rgyu yis mgon po rdo rje 'chang/ /sangs rgyas rnam par snang mdzad sku/ /cha lugs mtshan ma rgyan gsal gyur/ /zhal bzhi ser dkar ljang

145b2(rgyud 'grel): dag pa dang/ /rnal 'byor mtshan ma rnam par spyang/ /gsal ba'i gnas su gzhal yas khang/ /rgyan sogs gdan rnams sngon bzhin dbyung/ /thig le gnas su mtshan byas na/ /spros pa yi ge'i dkyil 'khor gsal/ /khaM las rnam par snang mdzad de/ /gsang gnas

147a1(rgyud 'grel): ta thA ga ta sa ma yo ga sid+d+ha A(rgyud 'grel): hUM/ oM badzra puShpe badzra d+huShpe/ badzra A lo ke /badzra gand+he/ pra tIts+tsha ho/ /sh+rI b+ha ga bAn kha kha khA hi/ /lag pa g.yas g.yon gnyis dag gis/ /mdzub mo mthe'u chung mdzes par bsgyur/ /rdo rje thal

148b5(rgyud 'grel): chen gyi lo tsa ba bande/ lha rin po ches bsgyur zhing/ gtan la phab pa'o// //dpal he ru ka'i gsang don bzhugs// */ /rgya gar skad du/ sh+rI badzra he ru ka gu hyArtha d+ha ro byu ha nA ma/ /bod skad du/ dpal he ru ka'i gsang ba'i don rnam par bkod pa
148b6(rgyud 'grel): zhes bya ba/ dpal rdo rje sems pa la phyag 'tshal lo/ /thams cad 'byung gnas gsal byed cing/ /gnyis med ma 'dres mdzad mthar phyin/ /stong nyid ye shes drug gi bdag /thugs mchog khro bdag phyag 'tshal te/ /dregs byed zhe sdang la sogs
148b7(rgyud 'grel): skyes/ /nyon mongs lam zhen ru tra sogs/ /'joms mdzad dpal ldan he ru ka'i/ /gsang don rnam bkod bshad par bya/ /rang bzhin dang tshul bzang las byung/ /gnyis med yon tan skye bas thob/ /skyabs 'gro byang sems sdom pa can/ /
149a1(rgyud 'grel): dbang thob dam tshig 'jigs med pa/ /theg chen gsang sngags blo gros mchog /he ru ka dpal la dga' bas/ /phyi nang g.yeng ba rab gsal te/ /rang gi 'dod don 'bras bu gnyer/ /dur khrod dang ni lha rten dang/ /ma mo'i gnas la sogs
149a2(rgyud 'grel): 'dug nas/ /rdo rje 'dzin pa'i dgongs pa dag /rnam pa du ma 'grub par 'gyur/ /'gro la snying rje chen po yis/ /bdag gzhan sgrol bar dam bcas nas/ /sbyor ldan nus mthu gsum bskyed pas/ /bdag dang 'gro ba sbyang ba dang/ /dbang po'i dkyil 'khor
149a3(rgyud 'grel): mdun dmigs te/ /dang po bya ba'i rim rdzogs sbyang/ /sgrib sogs las grol dag byed pa'i/ /sems can tshad med blo yis gzung/ /bar chad bgegs bsal srung byed pa'i/ /'khor lo me 'od ra ba gur/ /phyogs bcu khro bo'i tshogs bskyed pa'i/ /
149a4(rgyud 'grel): cho ga rang gi las bzhin bsgom/ /thams cad spros bral de bzhin nyid/ /gnyis med byang chub sems dbyings las/ /'gro la phan pa'i thugs rje'i rgyun/ /stong gsal nam mkha' i shugs ltar byung/ /rdo rje sems dpa' skal bzang dpal/ /rnam
149a5(rgyud 'grel): 'phrul ting 'dzin gnas la bzhugs/ /e yaM baM laM suM raM/ /oM na ma(rgyud 'grel): sarba ta thA ga ta/ /a nu rA ga ya ni maN+Da la hUM b+h+ruM/ /chos 'byung nam mkha' i rang bzhin las/ /byung ba'i dkyil 'khor rim bzhin brtsegs/ /ri rab me 'ong rgyan gsal zhing/ /
149a6(rgyud 'grel): kha dog dbyibs rgyal mtshan mar bcas/ /bde gshegs yon tan snang ba'i gnas/ /sna tshogs pad+ma rin po che/ /'khor lo sna tshogs rdo rje dbus/ /khang pa rdo rje sgo khyud dang/ /rta babs bzhi yis mdzes byas pa/ /sa gzhi nam mkha' logs
149a7(rgyud 'grel): kyi phyogs/ /rigs kyi rin chen 'tsher ba la/ /rang 'byung nyi shu rtsa lnga'i 'od/ /sna lnga'i rtsig pa dra ba dang/ /dra byed rin chen pha gus mchan/ /rdo rjes mtshan pa'i ka ba brgyad/ /rin chen mu tig me tog phreng/ /rgyan mtshan bla re rnga yab gdugs/ /
149b1(rgyud 'grel): 'dod yon lnga yi lha mo 'khyug /zla ched rdo rje rin chen dang/ /ba dan dril bu sgra snyan sgrogs/ /pho brang zla khams sgo can la/ /re'u mig dgu pa thod pas mtshan/ /sna tshogs pad+ma'i gdan mdzes shing/ /rdo rje phreng bas rnam par mtshan/ /rdo rje ra bas bskor ba yis/ /
149b2(rgyud 'grel): thams cad nam mkha' i mtshan nyid de/ /nam mkha' la yang mtshan nyid med/ /khams gsum dag ni ma lus pa/ /thams cad sgyu ma lta bu ste/ /ji ltar sgyu ma thams cad du/ /mthong ba dag ni reg par 'gyur/ /dmigs su yod pa ma yin te/ /de bzhin 'gro ba
149b3(rgyud 'grel): kun gyis tshul/ /rnam thar sgo bzhi snyoms 'jug go /'gog gnas 'dul bya'i don bral ba/ /phyogs bcu'i rgyal bas bskul mdzad de/ /mngon byang lnga yis rdzogs skur 'gyur/ /sems dang sems dpa' i ting 'dzin dang/ /byang chub spyod pa sna
149b4(rgyud 'grel): tshogs nyid/ /de bzhin bdud dang bdud las rgyal/ /de ni byang chub sangs rgyas yin/ /oM ma hA su kha badzra satwa A(rgyud 'grel): dza(rgyud 'grel): hUM baM ho(rgyud 'grel): su ra ta stwaM/ rdo rje sems dpa' bde chen sku/ /dkar zhing dmar ba'i mdangs gsal 'od/ /zhal bzhi rnams
149b5(rgyud 'grel): gzigs phyag bzhi pa/ /dang po rdo rje rtse lnga 'bar/ /rdo rje kha TwAM dril bcas 'khrol/ /'og ma gnyis kyis mda' dang gzhu/ /mtshan dpe phyag rgya lnga yis brgyan/ /stong g.yogs dar ser ngang ris tsan/ /sku smad tshig gu'i na bza' la/ /rin chen phreng
149b6(rgyud 'grel): ba'i rked 'chang 'dril/ /mgul du do shal dpung rgyan dang/ /phyag zhabs gdu bu se mo do/ /rdo rje rtse lnga'i phyag rgya ni/ /gnas lnga dag tu gtug bya ste/ /sngags kyi bde gshegs thams cad kyi/ /sku gsung thugs sogs rnam par bsam/ /oM na
149b7(rgyud 'grel): ma(rgyud 'grel): sarba ta thA ga ta/ kA ya bAk+tsit+ta gu Na karmma/ badzra swa b+hA ba At+ma konyahaM/ lus kyi ba spu'i gnas rnams su/ /dkyil 'khor drug gi rdul phran gnas/ /mkha' dbyings dbang phyug phyag rgya yis/ /gnas kun byin gyis brlabs par bya/ /oM d+harmA d+ha tu
150a1(rgyud 'grel): At+ma ko haM/ lag pa shin tu brkyang ba yi/ /mdzub mo gnyis ni mdud bar bcing/ /gung mo mthe bo'i rtse mo can/ /rdo rje phyag rgya yongs bsgyur bteg /bskor zhing kun tu bskor nas kyang/ /khro gnyer du ni legs bzhag
150a2(rgyud 'grel): bya/ /hi a b+hi Shiny+tsa maM/ ratna ma le a b+hi Shiny+tsa traM/ pa Ta laM b+hi Shiny+tsa oM/ /badzra tu Sh+yA ho/ /byin brlabs rigs kyi dbu rgyan gyis/ /rgyu yi mgon po rdo rje 'chang/ /dpal ldan he ru ka yi sku/ /khrag 'thu mthing nag 'jigs pa'i rgyal/
150a3(rgyud 'grel): 'bar ba chen po'i 'od zer can/ /zhal g.yas zhi ba'i rang bzhin dkar/ /dbus ma mthing nag drag po'i zhal/ /g.yon pa rmongs byed ser po ste/ /rgyab ma chags mdzad dmar ba'o/ /smin mtshams khro gnyer glog bzhin 'gyu/ /spyan
150a4(rgyud 'grel): dmar mche gtsigs 'jigs pa'i zhal/ /dbu skra sma ra ser gnag las/ /spu rnams rdo rje gyen du 'khyil/ /sgeg pa dpa' bo 'jigs su rung/ /rgod dang gshe dang 'jigs par byed/ /snying rje rngam dang zhi ba yis/ /sku gsung thugs kyi gar
150a5(rgyud 'grel): thabs can/ /g.yas g.yon dang po rdo rje dang/ /rdo rje kha TwAM dril bur bcas/ /de 'og gnyis kyis 'jigs byed kyi/ /pags pa rlung gi tshul du bskor/ /gsum pa gnyis na mda' dang gzhu/ /g.yas kyis bzhi pas dud khrag 'dzin/ /
150a6(rgyud 'grel): g.yon gyi bzhi pas thod pa ru/ /snying chen po yis bkang pa'o/ /la lar zhal gcig phyag bzhi pa/ /g.yas gnyis rdo rje dung khrag 'dzin/ /g.yon gnyis thod pa zhags par bcas/ /rdo rje kha TwAM se ral kha/ /la lar rdo rje band+ha
150a7(rgyud 'grel): dmar/ /kha TwAM ga la rgyab rten mdzad/ /glang chen stag gi pags pa yis/ /stod smad sku yin bzar mnabs/ /klu rgyal thod pa'i phreng ba yis/ /sku yi gnas brgyad rnams spras shing/ /lha chen dpa' bo'i g.yang gzhi dag /mtshan
150b1(rgyud 'grel): ma chen po na bzar gsol/ /sku la thal bas byugs pa la/ /khrag dang zhag gi ri mos mtshan/ /phyag rgya lnga yi mtshan pa la/ /snyan gong nyin zla rin chen phreng/ /thun mong rgyan sogs tshang pa la/ /khyad par rtags kyis rnam spras pa'o/ /rang byung ngo bo las byung ba'i/ /
150b2(rgyud 'grel): kro d+hi shwa ri'i 'jo sgeg stabs/ /sku mdog sngo skya nam mkha' i lus/ /se ral kha yi tshul dag tu/ /kha TwAM ga la rgyab rten bcas/ /lag pa g.yon pas thod pa thogs/ /g.yas pa ba dan gsum pa'i phyag /rin chen 'bar ba'i rgyan gyis mtshan/ /phyung nas byin gyis
150b3(rgyud 'grel): brlabs mdzad de/ /thabs dang shes rab ldan par 'gyur/ /gnas bzhi yi ge mtshan ma sngags/ /dkyil 'khor gdan la legs gnas rnams/ /spro dang bsdu ba'i rim pa yis/ /phyag rgya bzhi yi rnam par gsal/ /lha mo'i bum pas khrus byas
150b4(rgyud 'grel): te/ /dbang bskur rigs kyi bdag por bsam/ /h+ri(rgyud 'grel): las skyes pa'i ling ga ni/ /rdo rje gsang lam phaT kyis mtshan/ /a yig dag byas b+ha ga'i dbyibs/ /pad+ma 'dab brgyad e gnas pa/ /sna tshogs brda yis bskul byas nas/ /thabs shes
150b5(rgyud 'grel): gnyis med rol par mdzad/ /oM pra be sha phaT/ a la la la la ho/ /byang chub sems kyi 'od zer gyis/ /phyogs bcu'i dkyil 'khor mnyes par mdzad/ /lha rnams rang la gzhug bya ste/ /gnyis ka'i dga' ba rab tu spel/ /khams gsum 'gro
150b6(rgyud 'grel): gnas dag pa dang/ /rnal 'byor mtshan ma rnam par sbyang/ /gsang ba'i gnas su gzhal yas khang/ /rgyan sogs gdan rnams sngon bzhin 'byung/ /thig les gnas su mtshan byas nas/ /spros pas yi ge'i dkyil 'khor gsang/ /h+rI las rdo rje
150b7(rgyud 'grel): he ru ka /gsang gnas dbus kyi pad+ma la'o/ /h+rI(rgyud 'grel): las shar du gau rI ma/ h+ni las tsau rI lho yi phyogs/ /nub tu dzhi las pra mo ste/ /dzi las bet+tA byang du'o/ /mtshams bzhir hUM phaT sa bon las/ /puk+ka la sogs lha mo bzhi/ /ya wa ra la bzhi po
151a1(rgyud 'grel): las/ /mnga' rnon 'dzin ma la sogs rnams/ /me mtshams sogs kyi gru chad la/ /rim pa bzhin du gnas pa yin/ /a A me tog spos me ma/ /aM a(rgyud 'grel): mar me dri chab ste/ /bar khyams mtshams kyi gnas bzhi ru/ /lha
151a2(rgyud 'grel): mo bzhi ru gnas pa yin/ /dza(rgyud 'grel): las rta mgrin 'phang mtho ma/ /hUM las phag gdong mche ba can/ /baM las nyi zla me 'bar ma/ /ho(rgyud 'grel): las thal byed sgo bzhir gnas/ /oM sh+rI he ru ka badzra sa ma ya hi/ sarba duSh+Ta na sa ma ya mu dra/ pra
151a3(rgyud 'grel): b+hany+tsa kra hUM phaT/ /phyogs bcu'i 'gro ba sbyang mdzad nas/ /yab yum sku la gzhug par bya/ /hUM badzra g+ha he sid+d+he pa ra ma hA yo gi shwa ri di/ /ke'u re dmar ser zhi ba mo/ /zhal bzhi g.yon rkyang gar gyis bzhugs/ /phyag brgyad g.yas
151a4(rgyud 'grel): kyi mnga' bzhi la/ /tshangs pa chen po'i mgo bzhi sbyangs/ /hUM hUM badzra tsaN+Da shi kha TwAM ga ma hA badzra ka pA la mA la ma g+hu ge ru ru/ /tsau ri dmar ser drag pa mo/ /g.yon na lcags kyu g.yas pa yi/ /gung mos 'khor lo rtse brgyad bstong//
151a5(rgyud 'grel): khaTAM la brten zhabs g.yas bteg /oM badzra ma ra yo gi dza(rgyud 'grel): phra mo dmar gnag phyag bzhi ma/ /dang por rdo rje kham phor 'chang/ /'og gnyis khu tshur 'khor lo 'degs/ /g.yas brkyang rmongs tshul gong ma 'phag /oM badzra pre ta ke
151a6(rgyud 'grel): dzi/ pre ta dkar mo slong mdzad tshul/ /dga' ba'i gar thabs g.yas pa na/ /thod pa mtshan ldan bdud rtsis bkang/ /g.yon pa ba dan gsum pa'i phyag /oM badzra pra ha ri ni twaM/ puk+ka phrag mo sna tshogs mdog /g.yas pas rdo rje rtse lnga
151a7(rgyud 'grel): gsor/ /g.yon pas dpag bsam lcug ma 'dzin/ /gar gyis gzigs thabs 'gyur ba bzhin/ /hUM badzra shU la a /ka bi dang phaT/ tsaN+Da sngo gnag dbugs 'byin tshul/ /g.yas na bskyes rdo rjes mtshan/ /rlung 'thor g.yon pas tri
151b1(rgyud 'grel): shul gar/ /gzhan gyi srog 'phrog las la brtson/ /hUM badzra kro d+ha ts+tshinda ka maT/ g+hasma seb gnag ro ldegs tshul/ /g.yas pas ral gri g.yon me thab/ /g.yon brkyang gar gyis gyur bag can/ /myur ba'i phrin las grub pa mdzod/ /oM badzra sa ma ya
151b2(rgyud 'grel): pA she phaT/ /sme sha mthing nag phyag bzhi pa/ /phyag gnyis rdo rje dung khrag 'dzin/ /g.yon gnyis thod pa zhags par bcas/ /rdo rje kha TwAM se ral kha/ /kun kyang thod phreng sprul gdug dang/ /zhing lpags rlon pa'i rin chen phreng/ /gdan ni sna tshogs
151b3(rgyud 'grel): pad+ma la/ /zhing dang nyi mas mtshan pa'o/ /he badzra ra ti phaT/ /mnga' 'dzin dkar mo mda' dang gzhu/ /me mtshams phyogs kyi pad+ma pa la/ /paM ma hA ra ti badzra ho/ /kha TwAM ser mo kha TwAM ga /rdo rje dril 'phan bden bral mtshams/ /oM badzra lo tsa me yaM ya/ /
151b4(rgyud 'grel): 'khor lo 'dzin pa dmar ser mo/ /rtsibs brgyad 'dzin ma rlung gi phyogs/ /ra ma hA sh+rI badzra ra tra h+ri/ /sna tshogs ba dan ljang gu la/ /sna tshogs ba dan dril dbang mtshams/ /a badzra puShpe/ me tog ljang ser rdo rjes mtshan/ /gzhong thogs me yi
151b5(rgyud 'grel): mtshems su gnas/ /A badzra d+hu pe/ spos me bkar ser rdo rjes mtshan/ /phog phor bden bral phyogs su gnas/ /oM badzra A lo ke /mar me dmar mo rdo rjes mtshan/ /gsal 'dzin rlung gi mtshams su gnas/ /a(rgyud 'grel): badzra gand+he/ dri chab ljang gu
151b6(rgyud 'grel): rdo rjes mtshan/ /dag 'thor dbang ldan mtshams su gnas/ /oM badzra aM ku sha dza(rgyud 'grel): stag gdong dkar mo lcags kyu dang/ /thod pa rta mgo ljang gu shar/ /oM badzra pra pe sha hUM/ /pag gdong sngon mo g.yas mche ba/ /g.yon zhags sngo yi sgra la gnas/ /oM
151b7(rgyud 'grel): badzra shi pa le 'aM/ /snang pa dmar mo phyag gnyis kyis/ /nyi zla lcags sgrog nub gyi phyogs/ /oM badzra gaN+De ho(rgyud 'grel): thal byed ljang gu g.yas bril du/ /g.yon pa band+ha sku bcas byang/ /lha mo 'di dag thams cad kyang/ /rin chen rgyan dang na bza' klubs/ /sku
152a1(rgyud 'grel): mdzes khros pa'i mtshan ma 'dzin/ /sgo pa cung zad 'gying ba'i tshul/ /mgon po ro mnyam la bzhugs gnas/ /chos dbyings ye shes snyoms 'jug las/ /lha mos bdag po bskul mdzad de/ /sems can kun don rnam 'phrul
152a2(rgyud 'grel): mdzad/ /brten pa'i dkyil 'khor lha rnams kyis/ /skye mched drug la sangs rgyas drug /phyag rgya bzhi yi mtshan ma dang/ /rigs kyi bdag pos brgyan par bya/ /thugs kyi 'od zer 'phro 'du yis/ /ye shes dkyil 'khor bskul mdzad cing/ /dza:
152a3(rgyud 'grel): hUM baM ho(rgyud 'grel): 'i sbyar tshogs dang/ /rdo rje bsdu ba'i phyag rgya cing/ /stong pa shin tu yod med rnal 'byor mthu/ /nam mkha' nyid du dam tshig nye bar gnas/ /bde gshegs bde bar gshegs pa gzhengs su gsol/ /rdo rje he ru skal bzang dpal khyod bdag /dza(rgyud 'grel): hUM baM ho:/
152a4(rgyud 'grel): e hye hi b+ha ga bAn ma hA kA ru Ni ka sh+rI dri sh+ya ho/ /sa ma ya ho/ /sa ma yastwaM/ bde gshegs pho brang dkyil 'khor 'dir/ /'gro ba ma lus bsgral ba'i phyir/ /don gyi dbang gis dgongs nas kyang/ /'khor bcas gshegs shing bzhugs su gsol/ /kA ya
152a5(rgyud 'grel): bAk+tsi hUM hUM/ /sgyu 'phrul dga' ba'i rdo rje rol ba'i tshogs/ /gzhan la snang ba'i dkyil 'khor rnam par mdzes/ a la la ho/ /tshangs pa'i tshogs rnams zil gyi gnon mdzad cing/ /rtog ba du ma'i sgro 'dogs gcod bar mdzad/ /a la la ho/ /
152a6(rgyud 'grel): gnyis med ye shes gnyis can rnam mdza' yas/ /snang stong bde chen mnyam nyid dbyings la rol/ /a la la ho/ /kun 'byung yon tan rtsol med lhun grub gang/ /rgyan gyi dkyil 'khor rnam bkod rang las byung/ /a la la ho/ /mdzad pa rgya chen
152a7(rgyud 'grel): 'gog med kun grub pas/ /tshogs bcas rol pas bya ba kun rdzogs pa/ /a la la ho/ /sku gsung thugs mchog yon tan phrin las brgyan/ /dkyil 'khor mdzes pa'i lha la phyag 'tshal lo/ /a la la ho/ /smin ma g.yo ba 'degs tshul gyis//
152b1(rgyud 'grel): ru lu ru lung bcas dgong 'dud/ /hUM a ti b+hu ho/ /banda naM kA ro ya mi/ /gu ru pa ti/ a la la ho/ /oM 'byung ba che las thams cad 'byung/ /stong gsum rdul snyed ma lus pa'i/ /gzugs sgra dri ro reg bya chos/ /me tog bdug pa mar me dang/ /dri tshogs kun gyis
152b2(rgyud 'grel): mchod pa'i phyir/ /lha mo'i tshogs rnams ma lus spro/ /oM pa na pe na pe nu su ra ta ti pu pa ra mu/ sarba ta thA ga ta sa ma yo ga tsit+ta a(rgyud 'grel): hUM/ oM badzra puShpe/ oM badzra d+hu pe/ badzra A lo ke/ badzra gand+he/ pra tIts+tsha ho/ sh+rI b+ha ga pAn kha kha khA hi khA hi/ rdo rje drag po gang
152b3(rgyud 'grel): mo che/ /mkhur pa dpugs kyi rlung 'byin cing/ /'brug gi sgra ltar zag pa yi/ /ru lu ru lu'i sgra brjod do/ /dza(rgyud 'grel): hUM baM ho(rgyud 'grel): /rnal 'byor de nyid bcom ldan 'das/ /rdo rje sems dpa' de bzhin gshegs/ /dam tshig las sdang rnam sbyang phyir/ /dur khrod gar gyi
152b4(rgyud 'grel): phyag rgya gsal/ /shin tu gdug cing gtum pa la/ /zhi bas phan par mi 'gyur te/ /shes rab thabs kyi rnal 'byor gyis/ /rnal 'byor bde mchog dam bar 'gyur/ /sangs rgyas khro 'byung khro bo ni/ /thal bar 'jig pa'i mchog yin te/ /sems
152b5(rgyud 'grel): dpa' sngon po 'bar ba'i ngang/ /'od kyi dkyil 'khor dmar po snang/ /rdo rje kha TwAM rdo rjer bcas/ /dril bu 'khrol ba'i sgrar bcas pa/ /gos chen po dang byug pa che/ /sha chen po dang sbrang rtsi tshe/ /dur khrod kun gyi 'byung ba yi/ /phyag rgya dpal ldan dbang phyug
152b6(rgyud 'grel): mchog /shin tu khro gtum gdug pa yi/ /sems can khams ni rnam sbyang phyir/ /'di ni dpal ldan he ru ka'i/ /rdo rje rgya chen dbang phyug mchog /thod ba'i phreng ba'i dbu rgyan dang/ /sangs rgyas gtsug gi nor bu dag /dpal ldan he ru ka bcas pa'i/ /phyag rgya sna
152b7(rgyud 'grel): tshogs rnam 'phrul pa'o/ /se ral kha yi tshul dag tu/ /kha TwAM ga la rgyab rten bcas/ /lag pa g.yon par thod pa thogs/ /g.yas pa ba dan gsum par bya/ /nam mkha' i phyag rgya rnal 'byor pa/ /nam mkha' kun tu 'gro bar 'gyur/ /bud med la sogs rin
153a1(rgyud 'grel): chen mchog /dngos po thams cad mkha' la 'byin/ /g.yas dang g.yon gyi sbyor ba yis/ /bde bar 'bab pa'i gar byed pas/ /skyil mo krung ni phyed bcas la/ /rkang pas rang gi brla mnan nas/ /legs par bsdams pa'i sbyor ba yis/ /yang
153a2(rgyud 'grel): nas yang du bskyod pa yis/ /oM badzra sh+rI he ru ka /sa ma yastwaM/ zhi dang drag po rmongs pa'i mchog /dga' bar gar byed 'gyur bas bcas/ /shi ba ldang ba'i sbyor ba yis/ /bde ba'i phyag rgya rab tu gnas /zhing dang drag po rmongs byed dang/ /gyen tu 'bugs
153a3(rgyud 'grel): byed gar byed lus/ /lta ba'i phyag rgya grub pa'i mchog /gsang ba'i sbyor ba bde mchog gis/ /me tog bdug pa'i sbyor ba mchog /chang dang chu dang lcug ma dang/ /ras dang me tog grub pa yis/ /khyad par du ni rgyas 'debs so/ /rtse gcig mnyam par sbyor ba yis
153a4(rgyud 'grel): sbyor ba'i gnyer ba bde ba bzhin/ /mngon par gtor zhing se gol brdab/ /dal bus gyen du dbugs 'byin pas/ /g.yon du blta zhing lag pas drung/ /'o byed 'khyud pa de bzhin te/ /gar byed rab tu rmongs pa dang/ /zas dang gsang ba'i lus rnams dang/ /
153a5(rgyud 'grel): tshangs pa chen po'i mgo dang ni/ /de bzhin 'jig rten gsum las rgyal/ /de bzhin sa las 'dren pa dang/ /rang gi phyag rgya'i tshul bstan dang/ /dur khrod dag gis gar byed dang/ /de bzhin rlung gi dkyil 'khor dang/ /rab tu 'jigs pa bsreg pa'i me/ /
153a6(rgyud 'grel): las kyi phyag rgya rab tu gnas/ /dang po rgyas 'debs ma yin rgya/ /snying 'dren ma yi gnyis pa'o/ /gsum pa shin tu rmongs byed ma'i/ /de bzhin bzhi pa 'debs byed ma'i/ /lnga pa gar byed ma yi rgya/ /drug pa gsong ma yin par bshad/ /bdun pa za ba mo yi
153a7(rgyud 'grel): rgya/ /brgyad pa las kyi phyag rgya yin/ /mda' rnon 'dzin pa la sogs pa'i/ /lha mo bzhi po snga ma bzhin/ /me tog la sogs brgyad rnams ni/ /dkyil 'khor phyag rgya lnga ma'i tshul/ /rang 'byung mo dang bcas pa yi/ /phyag rgya sngags kyis gnyis med 'gyur/ /
153b1(rgyud 'grel): gzigs pa rnam pa sna tshogs 'gyur ba'i rgyas thob la/ /rnam pa sna tshogs 'o byed 'khyud pas rmengs mdzad de/ /rnam pa sna tshogs bde ba'i mchod ston kun gsol la/ /rnam pa sna tshogs bde mchog ngo mtshar bstan du gsol/ /rgyas btab rmongs byas
153b2(rgyud 'grel): man bsu gsol/ /bde mchog ngo mtshar bde la bzhugs/ /hUM a la la ho/ /snang bar mdzod/ /rnal 'byor bde mchog sgyu mas sprul/ /dam tshig dag la 'jug tu gsol/ /nyon mongs kun las rgyal bar mdzod/ /so so'i sngags kyi pad+ma la/ /chos kyi
153b3(rgyud 'grel): snying po mtshan ma'i dkyil/ /su b+ha gasta ma ha na de bo hi ri mi ri/ mi ti ri ri sh+rI ye/ rdo rje thal mo gyen du dbye/ /mdzub mo gnyis kyi rtse mo dgug /mthe bo gnyis kyi mche ba gtsigs/ /'jigs pa rdo rje gnod sbyin ma/ /sngags bcas gnas su bzhag
153b4(rgyud 'grel): byas te/ /rim bzhin mdza' nas dgrol bya'o/ /oM A(rgyud 'grel): hUM/ rab tu dga' ba'i bdag la phyag 'tshal lo/ /de bzhin gshegs pa'i dam pa grub par mdzod/ /dam tshig dam pa grub par mdzad du gsol/ /mchod pa chen po thams cad dag par mdzod/ /
153b5(rgyud 'grel): mchod pa chen po thams cad grub par mdzod/ /mnyam pa'i gnas la rol tu gsol/ /hUM rdo rje las kyi mda' gzhu la phyag 'tshal lo/ /dpal rdo rje chags pa'i dam tshig la phyag 'tshal lo/ /rdo rje kha TwAM ga rab tu 'jigs pa phyag 'tshal lo/ /dpal rdo rje dril bu rab
153b6(rgyud 'grel): tu 'khrol ma la phyag 'tshal lo/ /sna tshogs band+ha brtags pa las/ /sna tshogs bdud rtsis rnam par bkang/ /lnga lnga lnga yi 'phor 'du yis/ /mtshan ma rnams pa lnga dang ldan/ /'od dang du ba dri dang sgra/ /lha mo'i gzugs ston bdud rtsi bsgrub/ /rab byung gdong nas
153b7(rgyud 'grel): rnam par dag /mnyam pa'i don la rol par mdzod/ /byin brlabs rgyan dang mtshan ldan pa'i/ /mi mo rnams kyis reg bya'i mchog /byin gyis rlobs shig rnal 'byor pa/ /gsang ba chen po rnam par rol/ /grub pa'i rdzas 'di thams cad la/ /hUM dang phaT kyis
154a1(rgyud 'grel): ldan par mdzod/ /mnyam nyid mi g.yo la sogs pa'i/ /bstod pa'i glu rnams blangs byas nas/ /sil snyan kun gyi sgra rnams dang/ /gar gyis lha rnams mnyes par bya/ /d+he koM koM /kaM kaM /d+he badzra badzra/ ? ?/ kAM kAM kAM kAM/ hUM b+hyo hUM b+hyo hUM b+hyo hUM
154a2(rgyud 'grel): b+hyo/ d+he kauM kauM kauM kauM kauM kauM/ d+he kauM kauM kauM/ bdag cag dam tshig 'di la mngon du zhugs pa rnams/ /bcad btubs lus la 'byung bar mi 'gyur zhing/ /grib mas phog pa'i sdug bsngal mi bzod pa/ /sku yi phyogs tsam mthong bas mod la 'tsho ba dang/ /gzi mdangs
154a3(rgyud 'grel): lus la 'jug pa bye ba stong phrag gis/ /'od kyi phog pas 'jig rten khams su snang ba dang/ /lus ngag sems dang tshe na rdo rje rab gnas shing/ /re smon thams cad dus 'dir grub par mdzad du gsol/ /de nas bzlas brjod rnam gnyis sam/ /thig
154a4(rgyud 'grel): le gnyis sam phra mo gnyis/ /rnam dag mtshan ma gsal ba dang/ /mtshan ma med pa'i don bsam bya/ /mnyam nyid dkyil 'khor kun gyi mchog /don dam bde ba chen po'i sku/ /de bzhin dbyings nyid ye shes kyi/ /lha nyid brtson pas bsgom par
154a5(rgyud 'grel): bya/ /thun bzhi'i skabs su gtor ma btang/ /rdzogs nas dkyil 'khor mchod cing bstod/ /rang las byung ste mdun bzhag nas/ /gsol btab las la bskul bar bya/ /oM khyed kyi sems can don kun mdzad/ /rjes su mthun pa'i dngos grub gsol/
154a6(rgyud 'grel): sangs rgyas yul du gshegs nas kyang/ /slar yang 'gro ba'i don la dgongs/ /oM badzra gats+tsha mu:/ /de nas phyag rgya rnam bkod pa/ /rim bzhin bdag la bsdu byas nas/ /rnam gsum sems dpa' hUM la thim/ /rim bzhin thig le mnyam pa'i dbyibs/
154a7(rgyud 'grel): rjes 'byung mtshan ma'i skur gnas te/ /mtshan dpe rgyan dang cha lugs la/ /go cha go bcings bsrung bya zhing/ /dbang bskur dbu rgyan cod pan ldan/ /kaM haM oM TyaM/ oM ratna ma le a b+hi Shiny+tsa traM/ oM pa Ta laM ba a b+hi laM ba hUM/ spyod lam kun tu ma nyams
154b1(rgyud 'grel): par/ /lha nyid du ni bsgom bya ste/ /dbang po snang ba yul dus rnams/ /dkyil 'khor rol pa'i tshul du brtag /bza' btung byin rlabs ma nyams bzlas/ /sgyu ma gnyis med ye shes rol/ /byed spyod tshogs gnyis rgyu ru brtag /thams cad 'gro
154b2(rgyud 'grel): ba'i don phyir spyod/ /nyon mongs dpa' rlabs 'jigs las sgrol/ /skyabs mdzad dpal ldan he ru ka'i/ /don bkod 'gro ba ma lus kun/ /rigs kyi dkyil 'khor la gnas shog /dpal he ru ka'i gsang ba'i don rnam par dgod pa zhes bya ba/
154b3(rgyud 'grel): slob dpon ku ku rA dzas mdzad pa rdzogs so// //rgya gar gyi mkhan po bidyA ka ra siM ha dang/ zhu chen gyi lo tsa ba ban de lha rin po ches bsgyur cing zhus te gtan la phab pa'o// //dpal pad+ma gar dbang gi gsang don rnam par dgod
154b4(rgyud 'grel): pa slob dpon ku ku rA dzas mdzad pa bzhugs so// // */ /rgya gar skad du/ sh+rI pad+ma narte shwa ri guhtA rtha d+ha ro byU he nA ma/ bod skad du/ dpal pad+ma gar gyi dbang phyug gi gsang ba'i don rnam par dgod pa zhes bya ba/ dpal rdo rje sems dpa' la
154b5(rgyud 'grel): phyag 'tshal lo/ /rnam dag zhing zab mo'i chos rgya cher drag shul 'od gsal zhing/ /rab rtog bya ba grub pa'i tshogs/ /gsung bdag gtso bcas la phyag 'tshal/ /gti mug la sogs rab 'joms pa'i/ /sangs rgyas kun gyi padmo'i sku/ /gar gyi dbang
154b6(rgyud 'grel): phyug sgrub pa'i thabs/ /de don 'dod pa'i don phyir bshad/ /rang bzhin ngang tshul bzang las byung/ /gnyis med yon tan skye bas thog /skyabs 'gro byang sems sdom pa can/ /dbang thob dam tshig 'jigs med pa/ /theg chen gsang sngags blo gros

155a2(rgyud 'grel): las grol byed pa yis/ /sems can tshad med blo yis gzung/ /bar chad bgegs bsal drung byed pa'i/ /'khor lo me 'od ra ba gur/ /phyogs bcur khro bo'i tshogs bskyed pa'i/ /cho gas rang gis las bzhi bsgom/ /thams cad spros bral de

155b2(rgyud 'grel): nyes pas yong mi gos/ /rnam thar sgo bzhi snyoms 'jug gi /'gog gnas gdul bya'i don bral la/ /phyogs bcu'i rgyal bas sprul mdzad de/ /mngon byang lnga yis rdzogs gyur cig /sems dang sems pa'i ting nge 'dzin dang/ /byang chub spyod pa
155b3(rgyud 'grel): sna tshogs nyid/ /de bzhin bdud dang bdud las rgyal/ /de ni byang chub sangs rgyas yin/ /oM ma hA su kha /badzra satwa a:/ /dza(rgyud 'grel): hUM baM ho:/ /su ra twa stwaM/ /rdo rje sems dpa' bde chen sku/ /dkar zhing dmar ba'i mdangs gsal 'od/ /zhal bzhi rnam
155b4(rgyud 'grel): gzigs phyag bzhi pa/ /dang po rdo rje rtse lnga 'bar/ /rdo rje kha TwAM dril bcas 'khrol/ /'og ma gnyis kyi mda' dang gzhu/ /mtshan dpe phyag rgya lnga yis mdzes/ /stod g.yogs dang dkar gser ris can/ /sku smad tshig gu'i na bza' la/ /rin chen phreng ba'i

155b6(rgyud 'grel): na ma(rgyud 'grel): sarba ta thA ga ta/ kA ya gA kIt+ta gun/ karma badzra swa b+hA ba At+ma konyahaM/ lus kyi ba spu'i gnas rnams su/ /dkyil 'khor drug gi rdul phran gnas/ /mkha' dbyings dbang phyug phyag rgya yis/ /gnas kun byin gyis brlabs par bya/ /oM d+harmA
155b7(rgyud 'grel): drA bu badzra swa b+hA ? At+ma? konyahaM/ /mthe bong sems dpa' i skyil mo krung/ /mdzub mo gnyis kyi rtse mo dgug /gung mo gnyis ni mnyam par sbyar/ /lhag ma rdo rje thal mo'i 'od/ /rdo rje rin chen phyag rgya 'di/ /rang byung rnams kyis dbang bskur ba'o/ /h+rI:
156a1(rgyud 'grel): a b+hi Shiny+tsa mAM/ ratna mA le a b+hi Shiny+tsa traM/ paTTa laM a b+hi Shiny+tsa oM/ badzra tu Sh+ya ho/ /byin rlabs rigs kyi dbu rgyan gyis/ /rgyu yi mgon po rdo rje 'chang/ /dpal ldan pad+ma gar dbang sku/ /cha lugs mtshan ma rgyan gsal 'gyur/ /sku mdog

156a3(rgyud 'grel): mdzes/ /nyi shu rtsa lnga'i 'od zer 'phro/ /rin chen la sogs rgyan phreng tshogs/ /dar gyi gos rgyan cod pan dbyangs/ /bkra shis skyil krung legs bzhugs shing/ /bsnyems bcas chags pa'i tshul du gzigs/ /rang 'od ngo bo las byung ba'i/ /na bza'

156a7(rgyud 'grel): badzra be sha phaT/ a la la ho/ /byang chub sems kyi 'od zer gyis/ /phyogs bcu'i dkyil 'khor rab mnyes par/ /lha rnams rang la gzhug bya ste/ /gnyis ka'i dga' ba rab tu spel/ /khams gsum 'gro gnas dag pa dang/ /rnal 'byor mtshan ma

157a7(rgyud 'grel): 'khor lha rnams kyi/ /skye mched drug la sangs rgyas drug /phyag rgya bzhi yis mtshan ma dang/ /rigs kyi bdag pas nye bar mtshan/ /thugs ka'i 'od zer lcags kyu yis/ /ye shes dkyil 'khor bskul mdzad de/ /dza(rgyud 'grel): hUM baM ho:I sbyor tshogs dang/ /

157b6(rgyud 'grel): ngas kyi snying gar bcing bya ste/ /mthe bong mthe'u chung pad+ma bzhin/ /rgyas par 'dud pa'i phyag kyang bya/ /h+ri a ti b+hu ho/ /bande naM kA ro ya mi/ gu ru pa ti/ a la la ho/ /oM 'byung ba che las thams cad 'byung/ /stong gsum rdul snyed ma lus pa'i/ /
157b7(rgyud 'grel): gzugs sgra dre ro reg bya chos/ /lha mo'i tshogs rnams ma lus spro/ /me tog bdug pa mar me dang/ /dri tshogs kun gyis mchod par bya/ /oM pa na pe na pa nu su ratwa/ /sarba ta thA ga tA/ sa ma yo gA sid+d+hi A(rgyud 'grel): hUM/ oM badzra puShpe/ badzra d+hu pe/ badzra A lo
158a1(rgyud 'grel): ke/ badzra gand+he/ pra tIts+tshi ho/ /sh+rI b+hA ga ban kha kha khA hi khA hi/ lag pa g.yas g.yon gnyis dag gis/ /mdzub mo mthe'u chung mdzes bsgyur te/ /g.yas g.yon thal mo brdabs pa yis/ /mchod pa thams cad dbul bar bya/ /te zhes bya ba
158a2(rgyud 'grel): glu yi rgya/ /thams cad dag pas rab bsgrub pa'o/ /dza hUM baM ho/ /rnal 'byor de nyid bcom ldan 'das/ /rdo rje sems dpa' de bzhin gshegs/ /'dod chags thams cad rnam dag phyir/ /pad+ma'i phyag rgya dpal du gnas/ /mi 'gyur dam pa dag bya'i
158a3(rgyud 'grel): phyir/ /shel gong bzhin du dag pa'o/ /'dod chags thams cad bsal ba'i phyir/ /'bar ba sna tshogs 'khrigs pa'i 'ong/ /sangs rgyas tshe yi rin chen spras/ /gos dang sna tshogs rgyan gyis brgyan/ /sangs rgyas thams cad 'dus pa
158a4(rgyud 'grel): yis/ /bde ba can bzhin dam par 'gyur/ /gar thabs rnam pa sna tshogs kyis/ /yongs su bsgyur cing gar byas pa/ /pad+ma'i mtshan mchog padmor bcas/ /phyag na rgya rnams 'khor lo bskor/ /g.yas dang g.yon gyi sbyor ba yis/ /skyil mo
158a5(rgyud 'grel): krung ni phyed mar gnas/ /rgyal ba'i skyil mo krung bcas nas/ /sdug bsngal thams cad sel bar byed/ /oM swa b+hA ba shud+d+ha pad+ma na rte shwa ri ? dza bsnyems pa'i lag pa g.yon pa yis/ /pad+ma dmar po ci bder gzung/ /snying gar 'dren tshul kha
158a6(rgyud 'grel): 'byed pa/ /rnam par gzigs pa'i rnam dag dpal/ /bsnyems pa'i lag pa g.yon pa yis/ /pad+ma sngon po ci bder bzung/ /snying gar 'dren tshul bud med rgya/ /sgrol ba'i byang chub mchog yin no/ /bsnyems pa'i lag pa g.yon pa yis
158a7(rgyud 'grel): pad+ma dkar po ci bder bzung/ /'khor lo'i rgya bcings rab tu bskor/ /rgyal chen mo yi 'khor lo'o/ /bsnyems pa'i lag pa g.yon pa yis/ /pad+ma mthing kha ci bder gzung/ /g.yas pa gar byed ba dan gsum/ /khro gnyer ma yi phyag rgya
158b1(rgyud 'grel): yin/ /bsnyems pa'i lag pa g.yon pa yis/ /pad+ma dmar po ci bder bzung/ /g.yas pa tri shul tshul du bsgreng/ /pad gtum dbang phyug bde gnon rgya/ /bsnyems pa'i lag pa g.yon pa yis/ /pad+ma ljang gu ci bder gzung/ /g.yas pas
158b2(rgyud 'grel): 'khor lo rtse brgyad stong/ /pad+ma dbang phyug thugs kyi rgya/ /bsnyems pa'i lag pa g.yon pa yis/ /pad+ma ser po ci bder bzung/ /g.yas pas gar byed chu srin bsgreng/ /padmo gnas pa'i dpal chen yin/ /bsnyems pa'i lag pa g.yon pa yis/ /
158b3(rgyud 'grel): pad+ma le brgan ci bder gzung/ /snying gar 'dren tshul rdo rje'i rgya/ /'dod pa'i dbang mo'i go ba gsum/ /gling bu la sogs lha mo yi/ /phyag rgya'i dkyil 'khor snga ma bzhin/ /rang byung lha mo dang bcas pa'i/ /phyag rgya sngags gnyis gnyis med

158b6(rgyud 'grel): bar byed pa/ /padmo dam tshig dbang phyug sangs rgyas gar rnams mdzad du gsol/ /'dod chags rnam par spyod pa thams cad da rung rnam par spongs/ /padmo 'dzin pas mngon sum spyan sngar gang mkhan gang mdzod cig /so so'i ljags kyi pad+ma la/ /
158b7(rgyud 'grel): mtshan ma chos kyi snying por bcas/ /oM tA re tut+tA re tu re swAhA/ /rdo rje thal mo mnyam sbyar nas/ /gung mo mnyam par rab tu sgrub/ /mthe bong mthe chung 'dab ma bzhi/ /pad+ma dri med rab tu rgyas/ /sngags bcas gnas su bzhag bya ste/ /rim bzhin mdza' nas
159a1(rgyud 'grel): dgrol bar bya'o/ /oM A(rgyud 'grel): hUM/ rab tu dga' ba'i bdag la phyag 'tshal lo/ /de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad grub par mdzod/ /dam tshig dam pa grub par mdzad du gsol/ /mchod pa chen po thams cad dag par mdzod/ /mchod

162b2(rgyud 'grel): At+ma konyahaM/ lus kyi ba spu'i gnas rnams su/ /dkyil 'khor drug gi rdul phran gnas/ /mkha' dbyings dbang phyug phyag rgya yis/ /gnas kun byin gyis brlab par bya'o/ /oM d+harmA d+hA tu badzra swa b+hA ba At+ma konyahaM/ /rdo rje thal mo mnyam sbyor ba/ /
162b3(rgyud 'grel): mdzub mo mnyam sde'i? rol dgug /mthe bong gnyis ni rab tu brgyan/ /rdo rje nor bu zhes kyang bya/ /dpral bar mi gu bzhag pa ni/ /bsam pa thams cad rdzogs byed pa'o/ /traM a b+ha Shiny+tsa maM/ ratna ma? le a b+hi Shiny+tsa oM/ paTTa laM a b+hi Shiny+tsa oM/
162b4(rgyud 'grel): ? shU? ? ho/ /byin rlabs rigs kyis dbu rgyan gyis/ /rgyu yi mgon po rdo rje 'chang/ /dpal ldan rdo rje nyi ma ru/ /ma lus mtshan ma rgyan gsal gyur/ /gser gyi ril nyi shar bzhin/ /zhal bzhi phyag bzhis rnam mdzes pa/ /g.yas na mnga' 
162b5(rgyud 'grel): dang ral gri 'dzin/ /g.yon gzhu nyi dkyil rdo rjes mtshan/ /'od kyis dkyil 'khor rnam lngas bskor/ /'dzum bcas? g.yon mig gyen du bteg /la lar nyung zhig khrom pa la/ /byu ru dmar po'i mdangs ldan sku/ /zhabs gnyis skyil krung legs
162b6(rgyud 'grel): bzhugs shing/ /snga ma'i rgyan gyis byas pa'o/ /rang 'od ngo bor las byung ba'i/ /mthing shun? mdog 'dam ma kI/ /zhal gcig phyag gnyis sgyu? rtsal can/ /phyag gnyis rin chen thod pa 'dzin/ /rin chen sna tshogs phreng ba dang/ /na bza' dril bu rked
162b7(rgyud 'grel): bcings can/ /phyung nas byin gyis rlabs mdzad de/ /thabs dang shes rab ldan par gyur/ /gnas bzhi yig mtshan ma sngags/ /dkyil 'khor gdan la legs gnas rnams/ /spro dang bsdu ba'i rim pa yis/ /phyag rgya bzhi yi rnam par gsal/ /??
163a1(rgyud 'grel): mo'i bum pas khrus byas te/ /dbang bskur rigs kyi bdag por bsam/ /traM las bskyed pa'i ling ga ni/ /rin chen gsal lam phaT kyis mtshan/ /a yis dag byas b+ha ga'i dbyibs/ /pad 'dab brgyad la e gnas pa/ /sna tshogs
163a2(rgyud 'grel): brda' yis bskul byas nas/ /thabs shes gnyis med rol par mdzad/ /traM pra be sha phaT/ a la la la ho/ byang chub sems kyi 'od zer gyis/ /phyogs bcu'i dkyil 'khor mnyes par mdzad/ /lha rnams rang la gzhug bya ste/ /gnyis ka'i
163a3(rgyud 'grel): dga' ba rab tu spel/ /khams gsum 'gro gnas dag pa dang/ /rnal 'byor mtshan ma rnam par sbyang/ /gsang ba'i gnas su gzhal yas khang/ /rgyan sogs na bza' sngon bzhin 'byung/ /thig le gnas su mtshan byas nas/ /spros pa yi ge'i
163a4(rgyud 'grel): dkyil 'khor gsal/ /traM las rdo rje nyi ma ste/ /gnas nas dbus kyi pad+ma la/ /oM las lha mo'i dbang bskur ma'o/ /h+ri(rgyud 'grel): las de bzhin gter ldan ma/ /ho(rgyud 'grel): las rgyal mtshan mchog ldan yin/ /haM(rgyud 'grel): las lha mo mchod chen ma'o/ /dza(rgyud 'grel): las
163a5(rgyud 'grel): lha mo mda''dzin te/ /hUM las de bzhin ral gri 'dzin/ /paM las lha mo nyi ma'o/ /de dag nang gi re'u cha dang/ /rin chen rtse mo'i phyogs bzhir gnas/ /oM las gling bu traM pi baM/ /paM las rnga chen dza rdza rnga/ /me mtshams la sogs re'u mig tu/ /lha mo
163a6(rgyud 'grel): bzhi ni gnas pa yin/ /a a me tog spos me ma/ /a a(rgyud 'grel): mar me dri chab ma/ /bar khyams mtshams kyi gnas bzhi ru/ /lha mo bzhi ni gnas pa yin/ /dza(rgyud 'grel): las rta 'grin 'phang mtho ma/ /hUM las phag gdong mche ba can/ /paM las nyi zla
163a7(rgyud 'grel): me 'bar ma/ /ho(rgyud 'grel): las thal byed sgo bzhir gnas/ /oM styi tya bu styi tya ma hA badzra ratna b+ha ta ta traM dza(rgyud 'grel): rang gi gnas nas spro bya ste/ /slar 'dus lus la yab yum gzhug /badzra satwa dza(rgyud 'grel): lha mo dbang skur mdang gsal dmar/ /dbu rgyan rdo rje cod
163b1(rgyud 'grel): ban can/ /badzra ratna hUM/ gter ldan dmar ser phyag gnyis ma/ /rin chen gnyis kyi bum pa bsnams/ /badzra d+harmA paM/ rgyal mtshan mchog ldan dkar mdog ma/ /rin po che yi rgyal mtshan mchog /oM badzra karma ho:/ mchog chen ljang sngon rin chen mdog
163b2(rgyud 'grel): tshul dang gzi brjid chen po ston/ /gzhu dang mda' dang ral gri dang/ /de bzhin du ni 'bar ba'i me/ /mdangs gsal 'dzum dang bcas pa'i rgyan/ /g.yon pa 'byed cing gyen du 'degs/ /rdo rje pus mo gnyis bcings te/ /skyil krung gdan la legs par
163b3(rgyud 'grel): bzhugs/ /badzra ratna bA b+ha ta ta traM dza/ /dbang bskur ma yi dbu rgyan te/ /gter ldan ma yi rin chen bum/ /rgyal mtshan mchog ldan rin chen tog /mchod chen rin chen gzhong pa 'gengs/ /mnga' gzhu ma dang kha TwAM ga /nyi ma mo dang me mo zhi/ /rang gi mtshan
163b4(rgyud 'grel): gyi phyag rgya bzhin/ /'gyings bcas gtso bo'i phyogs su 'dud/ /gling bu ma sogs lha mo yi/ /phyag rgya'i dkyil 'khor snga ma bzhin/ /rang byung lha mo dang bcas pa'i/ /phyag rgya sngags kyis gnyis med gyur/ /khams gsum kun gyi rgyal srid sna tshogs
163b5(rgyud 'grel): mchog gi nor ldan pas/ /'jal du ma g.yul 'gyed rnam par khyad par gyis 'dul ba/ /rnam pa sna tshogs 'jal du ma rnam par rgyas pa'i rgyal mtshan can/ /rdo rje nyi ma rgyal po bde mchog sgyu ma bstan du gsol/ /sems can sprin la byang chub
163b6(rgyud 'grel): mchog sprin sna tshogs char? 'bebs pa/ /bdag gi re ba kun sgrub myur du ston/ /a la la la la ho/ /mi zad gter gyi dbang bskur khyad par bdag la stsal du gsol/ /khyad par 'di dag thams cad bud med rnams kyi phyir/ /rin chen tshogs kun
163b7(rgyud 'grel): nang na bud med rin chen gcig pu mchog /bud med drin chen dag pa dam pa'i rin du thams cad 'gro /a la la ho/ /so so'i lcags? kyi pad+ma la/ /chos kyi snying po mtshan ma'i dkyil/ /trAM pa pa ta Ta Ta Ta tra Ta/ rdo rje thal mo mnyam sbyar la/ /mdzub mo mnyam
164a1(rgyud 'grel): par phyir bkug ste/ /mthe bong rdo rjes g.yog pa ni/ /rdo rje dpal gyi nor bu yin/ /sngags bcas gnas nas dgrol bar bya'o/ /oM A(rgyud 'grel): hUM/ /rab tu dga' ba'i bdag la phyag 'tshal lo/ /de bzhin gshegs pa'i dam pa grub par mdzod/ /dam
164a2(rgyud 'grel): tshig dam pa grub par mdzad du gsol/ /mchod pa chen po thams cad dag par mdzod/ /mchod pa chen po thams cad grub par mdzod/ /mnyam pa chen po'i gnas la rol tu gsol/ /thams cad dbang bskur dbang phyug dam pa mi zad gter
164a3(rgyud 'grel): mchog bdag la grub par mdzad du gsol/ /kun mchog rgyal mtshan rnam rgyal bsgreng ba rdo rje rin chen shin tu che ba bdag la mdzod/ /mche ba cung zad gtsigs pa'i zhal/ /khro zhing 'dzum dang bcas pa'i bzhin/ /khro las gyur kyang
164a4(rgyud 'grel): bcas shing 'dzum/ /gsal bar blta zhing legs par gnas/ /sna tshogs band+ha brtags pa la/ /sna tshogs bdud rtsis rnam par bkad/ /lnga lnga lnga yi 'phro 'du yis/ /mtshan ma rnam pa lnga dang ldan/ /'od dang du ba dri dang sgra/ /lha mo'i gzugs

164a6(rgyud 'grel): rol/ /grub pa'i rdzas 'di thams cad la/ /hUM dang phaT kyis ldan par mdzod/ /mnyam nyid mi g.yo la sogs pa'i/ /bstod pa'i glu rnams blang byas nas/ /sil snyan kun gyi sgra rnams dang/ /gar gyis lha rnams mnyes par bya/ /traM traM traM/

164b6(rgyud 'grel): ratna mA le a b+hi Shiny+tsa traM/ paTTa laM ba a b+hi laM ba hUM/ spyod lam kun tu ma nyams par/ /lha nyid du ni bsgom bya ste/ /dbang po snang ba yul dus rnams/ /dkyil 'khor rol pa'i tshul du rtag /bza' btung byin rlabs ma nyams bzlas/ /sgyu ma
164b7(rgyud 'grel): gnyis med ye shes rol/ /byed spyod tshogs gnyis rgyu ru brtag /thams cad 'gro ba'i don phyir spyad/ /legs dgos sgrub thabs bsdus pa yis/ /rab spyod nor bu rin chen nges/ /khams gsum rgud pa sel mdzad nas/ /rigs kyi

165a3(rgyud 'grel): skad du/ dpal rta mchog rol pa'i gsang ba'i don du rnam par dgod pa zhes bya ba/ dpal rdo rje sems dpa' la phyag 'tshal lo/ /thugs rjes cha mnyam la rgyud gzigs/ /so so'i don bzhin rnam drug tshogs/ /dbugs sbyin phrin las

165a5(rgyud 'grel): byung/ /gnyis med yon tan skye bas thob/ /skyabs 'gro byang sems sdom pa can/ /dbang thob dam tshig 'jig med pa/ /theg chen gsang sngags blo gros mchog /rta mchog dkyil 'khor la dga' bas/ /phyi nang g.yeng ba rab bsal te/ /

165b1(rgyud 'grel): pas bsrung byed pa'i/ /'khor lo me 'od ra ba kun/ /phyogs bcu'i khro bo'i tshogs bskyed pa'i/ /cho ga rang gi las bzhin sgom/ /thams cad spros bral de bzhin nyid/ /gnyis med byang chub sems dbyings las/ /'gro ba khyab pa'i thugs rje rgyun/ /stong
165b2(rgyud 'grel): gsal nam mkha' i shugs ltar 'byung/ /rdo rje sems dpa' skal bzang dpal/ /rnam 'phrul ting 'dzin gnas la bzhugs/ /e yaM paM laM maM suM raM/ oM na ma sarba ta thA ga tA a nu ra ga ya mi maN+Da la hUM/ chos 'byung nam mkha' i rang bzhin las//

165b7(rgyud 'grel): chen po brgyad/ /de mdza' 'dod pa'i longs spyod dang/ /rdo rje ra bas bskor ba'o/ /thams cad dag par mos pa yi/ /sdig med stobs kyis ngo mngon du/ /drag shul sbyor bas mnyam sbyor bas/ /'jig rten thams cad gzhom par bya/ /rnam thar bzhi yi
166a1(rgyud 'grel): snyoms 'jug gi /'gog gnas gdul bya'i don bral ba/ /phyogs bcu'i rgyal bas bskul mdzad de/ /mngon byang lnga yi rdzogs skur gyur/ /sems dang sems dpa' i ting 'dzin dang/ /byang chub spyod pa sna tshogs nyid/ /de bzhin
166a2(rgyud 'grel): bdud dang bdud las rgyal/ /de ni byang chub sangs rgyas yin/ /oM mahA su kha badzra satwa A(rgyud 'grel): dza hUM baM ho(rgyud 'grel): rdo rje sems dpa' bde chen sku/ /dkar zhing dmar ba'i mdangs gsal 'od/ /zhal bzhi rnam bzhi phyag bzhi pa/ /dang po rdo rje rtse lnga 'bar/ /rdo rje kha
166a3(rgyud 'grel): TwAM dril bcas 'khor/ /'og ma gnyis kyi mda' dang gzhu/ /mtshan dpe phyag rgya lnga yis mdzes/ /stod g.yogs dar dkar ngang ris can/ /sku smad tshig gu'i na bza' gsol/ /rin chen 'phreng ba'i rked chings can/ /mgul du do shal dpung

166b1(rgyud 'grel): rdo rje ral gri mda'/ /g.yon pa khu tshur sna tshogs su pad/ /mdung dang dbyug pa gzhu 'dzin pa'o/ /g.yas pa gru gsum dpal mo mnan/ /gnyis pas grol ma dga' ba'o/ /g.yon pas mig gsum khyab 'jug dang/ /gnyis pas tshangs pa dga' rab
166b2(rgyud 'grel): gnon/ /zhal rnams dmar dang nag po dang/ /dkar zhing rta mgo ljang gu ston/ /sku yi kha dog ljang gu la/ /phyag rnams dmar zhing zhabs gnag pa'o/ /khro rtags drug cu rtsa gcig dang/ /'bar ba chen po'i brgyan gyis mdzes/ /rang 'od ngo bo las
166b3(rgyud 'grel): byung ba'i/ /dam tshig sgrol ma mdog ljang skya/ /sna tshogs rdo rje thod pa thogs/ /rin chen rgyan mdzes 'jo sgeg stabs/ /phyung nas byin gyis brlabs mdzad de/ /thabs dang shes rab ldan par 'gyur/ /gnas bzhi yi ge mtshan ma sngags/ /
