166b5(rgyud 'grel): gsang lam pad kyis mchan/ /a yis dag byas b+ha ga'i dbyibs/ /pad+ma'i 'dab brgyad e gnas pa/ /sna tshogs brda yis bskul byas nas/ /thabs shes gnyis med rol par mdzad/ /oM pra be sha phaT/ a la la la la ho/ /byang chub
166b6(rgyud 'grel): sems kyi 'od zer gyis/ /phyogs bcu'i dkyil 'khor mnyes par mdzad/ /lha rnams rang la gzhug bya ste/ /gnyis ka'i dga' ba rab tu spel/ /khams gsum 'gro gnas dag pa dang/ /rnal 'byor mtshan ma rnam par sbyar/ /gsang ba'i
166b7(rgyud 'grel): gnas su gzhal yas khang/ /rgyan sogs gdan rnams sngon bzhin 'byung/ /thig les gnas su mtshan byas nas/ /spros pas yi ge'i dkyil 'khor gsal/ /haM las bskyed pa'i rta mchog ni/ /gsang gnas dbus kyi pad+ma la'o/ /dziM las sna tshogs
167a1(rgyud 'grel): pad+ma'i rgya /ta las sna tshogs rdo rje ma'o/ /dkyil 'khor gang yang rung ba yi/ /lha mo nyi shu'i tshogs rnams la/ /khyad par lha mo gnyis kyis lhags/ /chos kyi snying po'i phyogs su bskyed/ /oM suM b+ha ni suM b+ha hUM/ phyogs bcu'i
167a2(rgyud 'grel): 'gro ba sbyar byas nas/ /yab yum sku la gzhug par bya/ /oM bi shwA badzra d+harmA ho:/ /sna tshogs pad+ma dmar skya mo/ /phyag gnyis pad+ma gar stabs sgyur/ /oM bi shwa badzra satwa a:/ sna tshogs rdo rje thod pa 'dzin/ /lha mo 'di dag thams cad kyang/ /
167a3(rgyud 'grel): rin chen rgyan dang na bza' klubs/ /'dzum bteg rgod pa'i so zur ston/ /rang gi cha lugs kun gyi gnas/ /mgon po ro mnyam la bzhugs nas/ /chos dbyings ye shes snyoms 'jug pas/ /lha mo bdag po bskul mdzad de/ /sems can
167a4(rgyud 'grel): kun don rnam 'phrul mdzad/ /rten gyi dkyil 'khor lha rnams kyi/ /skye mched drug las sangs rgyas drug /phyag rgya bzhi yi mtshan ma dang/ /rigs kyi bdag pos nye bar mtshan/ /thugs ka'i 'od zer lcags kyu yis/ /ye shes dkyil 'khor
167a5(rgyud 'grel): bskul mdzad de/ /dza(rgyud 'grel): hUM baM ho(rgyud 'grel): 'i sbyor tshogs dang/ /rdo rje bsdu ba'i phyag rgya bcing/ /stong pa shin tu 'od med rnal 'byor mthu/ /nam mkha' nyid du dam tshig nye bar gnas/ /bde gshegs bde bar gshegs pa bzhengs su gsol/ /rta mchog rol
167a6(rgyud 'grel): pa skal bzang dpal khyod bdag /dza(rgyud 'grel): hUM baM ho:/ e hye hi b+ha ga bAn/ mahA ka ru Ni ka dri sh+ya ho/ /sa ma ya stwaM/ bder gshegs pho brang dkyil 'khor 'dir/ /'gro ba ma lus bsgral ba'i phyir/ /don gyi dbang gis dgongs nas kyang/ /'khor bcas
167a7(rgyud 'grel): gshegs shing bzhugs su gsol/ /ka ya bAk+tsit+ta hUM/ /sgyu 'phrul dga' ba'i rdo rje rol pa'i tshogs/ /gzhan la snang ba'i dkyil 'khor rnam par mdzes/ /a la la ho/ /tshangs pa'i tshogs rnams zil gyis gnon mdzad cing/ /rtog pa du ma'i
167b1(rgyud 'grel): sgro 'dogs gcod par mdzad/ /a la la ho/ /gnyis med ye shes gnyis can rnam mdza' yas/ /snang stong bde chen mnyam nyid dbyings la rol/ /a la la ho/ /kun 'byung yon tan rtsol med lhun grub snang/ /rgyan gyi dkyil 'khor rnam bkod rang las
167b2(rgyud 'grel): byung/ /a la la ho/ /mdzad pa rgya chen 'gog med kun grub pas/ /tshogs bcas rol pas bya ba kun rdzogs pa/ /a la la ho/ /sku gsung thugs mchog yon tan phrin las rgyan/ /dkyil 'khor mdzes pa'i lha la phyag 'tshal lo/ /a la
167b3(rgyud 'grel): la ho/ /dpal rdo rje 'gying ba'i thabs/ 'dzum pa'i mig gis phyag bya'o/ /haM a ti b+hu'o/ /band+ha naM kA ro ya mi/ gu ru pa ti a la la ho/ /oM 'byung ba chen las thams cad 'byung/ /stong gsum rdul snyed ma lus pa'i/ /gzugs sgra dri ro reg 
167b4(rgyud 'grel): bya chos/ /lha yi tshogs rnams ma lus spro/ /me tog bdug pa mar me dang/ dri tshogs kun gyi mchod par bya'o/ /oM pa na pe na pe nu su ra ti pu pa ra mu sarba ta thA ga tA/ /sa ma yo ga sid+d+hi a pa hUM/ oM badzra puShpe/ badzra d+hu pe/ badzra A
167b5(rgyud 'grel): lo ke/ badzra gand+he pra tIts+tsha ho/ /sh+ri b+ha ga bAn kha kha khA hi/ gyen du 'thor zhing thur du 'bebs/ /bskor zhing de bzhin nyug pa dag /me tog bdug pa mar me mchog /dri yis mchod pa byung ba'o/ /gang dam 'on te stong ngam rung/ /yang na ci 'byor pa
167b6(rgyud 'grel): yis kyang/ /dam tshig mnyam par bsgrub pa yis/ /mchod pa thams cad 'grub par 'gyur/ /ka ka la ya dang tso 'urya'i dbyangs/ /de bzhin rab tu gdangs snyan dang/ /ka nya la yi glu yi rgya/ /'joms pa thams cad 'grub pa'o/ /dza(rgyud 'grel): hUM baM ho:
167b7(rgyud 'grel): rnal 'byor de nyid bcom ldan 'das/ /rdo rje sems dpa' de bzhin gshegs/ /drag shul sbyor bas rnam sbyong dpal/ /rta yi phyag rgyar rab tu gnas/ /thams cad padmo mos pa yis/ /sdig med stobs kyi ngo 'thon tu/ /rab tu non pa'i rtsal
168a1(rgyud 'grel): dag gis/ /'jig rten thams cad rab tu 'joms/ /'dod chags can la g.yem par ston/ /gdug pa rnams la gdug par 'gyur/ /drag shul can la drag shul sbyor/ /zhal bzhi pa la phyag bzhi pa/ /zhabs bzhi pa
168a2(rgyud 'grel): la rmig pa bzhi/ /rta mgrin rgyal po rdo rje ste/ /dbang phyug dam pa sgrub par bya/ /g.yon pa'i khu tshur mdzub mo yis/ /dpal ldan pad+ma sna tshogs 'dzin/ /rdo rjer bcas shing slob ma 'grub/ /g.yas pa ba dan gsum pa bya/ /g.yas dang g.yon
168a3(rgyud 'grel): pa'i sbyor ba yis/ /brkyang dang bskum pa'i tshul byas nas/ /khro bo'i skyil mo krung byas te/ /'jig rten thams cad rab tu 'jig /oM suM b+ha ni sum b+ha hUM/ lha mo nyi shu'i tshogs rnams kyis/ /phyag rgya'i so so'i dkyil 'khor bzhin/ /rang byung lha mo
168a4(rgyud 'grel): dang bcas pa'i/ /phyag rgya sngags kyis gnyis med 'gyur/ /myos byed stong bas lhag par bde ba'i 'dod pa'i gzugs ston pa/ /'dul ba'i dbang gis gshin rje stong pas lhag par rab tu 'jigs/ /zhi ba'i skur yang tshangs pa stong pas lhag
168a5(rgyud 'grel): par rab tu ston/ /dkyil 'khor kun gyi mchog tu de bzhin gshegs kun grub par mdzod/ /thams cad dag pas mos pas ngo 'thon stobs kyis non par mdzod/ /hi he he he he/ dbang phyug thams cad rab shig rab tu shig /rab kyi rtsal
168a6(rgyud 'grel): gyis non pa'i stobs kyis ngo 'thon dbang phyug non/ /sbyor chen hu lu hu lu mig gsum po la gsum grub drongs/ /rab kyi rtsal gyis non pa'i stobs kyis ngo 'thon mthu chen non/ /mnyam sbyor ru tra ma tra'i snying las dpal mo drongs shig rab
168a7(rgyud 'grel): drongs shig /rab kyi rtsal gyis gnon pa'i stobs kyis ngo 'thon tshangs pa non/ /sbyor chen tshangs las sgrol ma drongs shig sma ra ti/ /rab kyi rtsal gyis non pa'i stobs kyis ngo 'thon dga' dbang non/ /mnyam sbyor kun gyis bdag la dga' 
168b1(rgyud 'grel): dbang drongs/ /a la la ho/ /gdug cing khro la rab tu gtum pa'i sems can bsgral ba'i phyir/ /sgrub zhugs a la la la la ho/ /oM suM b+ha ni suM b+ha hUM phaT/ /madzA bo mi la bya 'am mi bya yongs su rtog pa de dag med kyang bla/ /de 'dra'i mdza' bo sgyu ma
168b2(rgyud 'grel): yin pas de la mdza' zhes su zhig zer/ /rgol ba gang la bya ba 'am mi bya yongs su rtog pa de dag med kyang bla/ /de 'dra'i rgol ba sgyu ma yin pas de la dpa' zhes su zhig zer/ /so so'i ljags kyi pad+ma la/ /mtshan ma chos kyi snying por bcas/ /sh+ri
168b3(rgyud 'grel): pad+ma Ta ba mu kha yo gI shwa ri/ hi hi hi hi hi/ /rdo rje thal mo mnyam sbyar nas/ /mthe'u chung srin lag mnyam par brkyang/ /mdzub mo rtse mnyam bkug pa ni/ /dpal mchog te zhes grags pa yin/ /sngags bcas gnas su bzhag bya ste/ /rim
168b4(rgyud 'grel): bzhin mdza' nas dgrol bar bya'o/ /oM A(rgyud 'grel): hUM/ rab tu dga' ba'i bdag la phyag 'tshal lo/ /de bzhin gshegs pa'i dam pa grub par mdzod/ /dam tshig dam pa grub par mdzad du gsol/ /mchod pa chen po thams cad dag par mdzad/ /mnyam
168b5(rgyud 'grel): pa chen po'i gnas la rol du gsol/ /la lar mkhas pa'i gzugs kyang 'dzin/ /la lar dus mdza' i dus ltar drag /la lar rgyal ba'i dbang po bzhin du zhi/ /la lar rta mchog sbyor bas 'dod pa 'grub/ /sna tshogs band+ha brtags pa las/ /sna tshogs
168b6(rgyud 'grel): bdud rtsis rnam par dgang/ /lnga lnga lnga yi 'phro 'du yis/ /mtshan ma rnam pa lnga dang ldan/ /'od dang du ba dri dang sgra/ /lha mo'i tshogs ston bdud rtsi 'grub/ /rang 'byung gdong nas rnam par dag /mnyam pa'i don ldan rol par mdzod/ /byin brlabs
168b7(rgyud 'grel): rgyan dang mtshan ldan pa'i/ /mi mo rnams kyi reg bya'i mchog /byin gyis rlabs shig rnal 'byor pa/ /gsang ba chen po rnam par rol/ /grub pa'i rdzas 'di thams cad la/ /hUM dang phaT kyis ldan par mdzod/ /mnyam nyid mi g.yo la sogs pa'i/ /bstod
169a1(rgyud 'grel): pa'i glu rnams blang byas nas/ /sil snyan kun gyi sgra rnams dang/ /gar gyi lha rnams mnyes par bya/ /Tik+ki hUM dza(rgyud 'grel): Tak+ki hUM dza(rgyud 'grel): tra tra tra tra tra tra tra/ Ta ta baT ta ba hUM/ Ta ta be Ta ta be/ hi don/ ta Ta ba/ ta Ta ba/ ta Ta ba/ ta Ta ba/ ta Ta ba tra

169a3(rgyud 'grel): gis/ /'od kyis phog pas 'jig rten khams su rab sbyang ba/ /lus ngag sems dang tshe ni rdo rjer rab gnas te/ /re smon thams cad dus 'dir thob par mdzad du gsol/ /de nas bzlas brjod rnam gnyis sam/ /thig le gnyis sam phra mo gnyis/ /rnam
169a4(rgyud 'grel): dag mtshan ma gsal ba dang/ /mtshan ma med pa'i don bsam bya/ /mnyam nyid dkyil 'khor kun gyi mchog /don dam bde ba chen po'i sku/ /de bzhin nyid dbyings ye shes kyi/ /lha nyid brtson pas bsgom par bya/ /thun bzhi'i skabs su gtor

169b1(rgyud 'grel): lha nyid du ni bsgom bya ste/ /dbang po'i snang ba yul dus rnams/ /dkyil 'khor rol pa'i tshul du brtag /bza' btung byin rlabs ma nyams bzlas/ /sgyu ma gnyis med ye shes rol/ /byed spyod tshogs gnyis rgyu du brtag /thams cad 'gro ba'i don phyir spyad/ /

169b3(rgyud 'grel): mdzad pa rdzogs so// //rgya gar gyi mkhan po bidyA ka ra sid+ha dang/ zhu chen gyi lo tsa ba lha rin po ches bsgyur cing zhus te gtan la phab pa'o// //dkyil 'khor thams cad kyi rjes su 'jug pa'i cho ga bzhugs so/ */ /rgya gar skad du/
169b4(rgyud 'grel): sarba maN+Da lA nutpi ta ra sha sra pany+tsa bi d+hi nA ma/ bod skad du/ dkyil 'khor thams cad kyi rjes su 'jug pa'i cho ga lnga pa zhes bya ba/ dpal rdo rje sems dpa' la phyag 'tshal lo/ /gang zhig thog mdza' kun gzigs shing/ /thams cad don 'byung gsang
169b5(rgyud 'grel): ba'i tshul/ /phyag rgya'i bdag nyid ma 'dres stobs/ /rigs kun 'khor lo'i gnas rdzogs shog /rang bzhin dpa' bo kun tu snang/ /'joms byed chos kun ma 'dres pa/ /yon tan tshogs bdag rol pa'i sku/ /rigs kyi lha mo tshogs rgyal shog /

169b7(rgyud 'grel): byed pa'i/ /dkyil 'khor thabs rnams 'jug par bshad/ /dkyil 'khor thams cad rjes bstan pa'i/ /'jug thabs cho ga lnga pa'i don/ /ston pa'i lung las gsal bshad pa/ /gzhung 'di bsdu bar 'os pa yin/ /don kun 'dod pa'i rnal 'byor
170a1(rgyud 'grel): bdag /thabs kyi cho ga mang po yis/ /der 'jug lam kun rdzogs byed pas/ /dri med dag pa'i rgyud gzung mdzod/ /ji ltar gsang sngags legs sbyar bas/ /dngos grub tshul mang thob 'gyur ba/ /don dam bya ba mthar phyin pas
170a2(rgyud 'grel): gzhan dag don tshogs rnam par dag /myur bar phyag rgya sngags tshogs 'jug /bla med dngos grub don kun rtogs/ /bstan pa'i tshul gyis gdams pa'i rgyun/ /ji ltar bya ba'i sgo ston byed/ /shin tu sbyar dka' i las rnams dag /rang sngags rten

170a7(rgyud 'grel): byed cing/ /bag med 'khrugs pa'i nang kun zhi/ /rgyal ba'i 'khor du gyur pa'i phyir/ /rang gi sdom pa dam tshig gzung/ /de yang rgya che blo dmigs te/ /ma lus khams rnams kun tu spyad/ /ji srid rtog pa'i rgyun gnas pa/ /de srid rtog

170b3(rgyud 'grel): can dang/ /gzhan gyi nor la 'phrog pa dang/ /'dod pa log par g.yem pa dag /sems can dmyal bar myur du 'gro/ /dbyen byed pa dang tshig rtsub dang/ /brdzun du smra zhing mi sdom dang/ /byis pa khyal ba smra ba rnams/ /so so skye bo slu bas bcings/

172a3(rgyud 'grel): bskyed byas nas/ /log sel ri bo thams cad 'joms/ /dran dang shes bzhin bskyed byas pas/ /rtag tu 'gro don brtson par byed/ /grogs 'dis bdag gzhan grol bar byed/ /byang sems 'phel bar byed pa ni/ /rnam pa bzhir ni shes bya ste/ /
172a4(rgyud 'grel): srog gi phyir yang bsam bzhin du/ /brdzun tshig smra bar mi byed dang/ /lhug pa'i bsam pa rnam dag pas/ /dus kun tu ni gnas bya zhing/ /sems can rnam pa thams cad la/ /g.yo rgyu bslu bar mi bya dang/ /sems bskyed byang chub sems dpa' la/ /ston
172a5(rgyud 'grel): pa'i 'du shes bskyed bya zhing/ /yang dag par ni yon tan dag /phyogs bcu'i zhing khams brjod par byed/ /sems can gang zhig dge ba dang/ /bkod bya de dang nyan thos sogs/ /theg pa dman par mi sbyor zhing/ /yang dag byang chub sems dpa' tshe/ /byang
172a6(rgyud 'grel): sems 'grib par byed pa yang/ /rnam pa bzhir ni shes bya ste/ /dam pa'i dkon mchog bla ma sogs/ /mchod par 'os pa bslus pa dang/ /'gyod pa'i gnas pa yin pa la/ /gzhan dag nye bar sbyor ba dang/ /sems bskyed byang chub sems
172a7(rgyud 'grel): dpa' che/ /zhe sdang tshig gis tshar gcod cing/ /sems can rnam pa thams cad la/ /g.yo dang sgyu yis sbyor byed pa'o/ /byang chub sems kyi bsod nams gang/ /de la gal te gzugs mchis na/ /nam mkha' i khams ni kun bkang nas/ /de ni de
172b1(rgyud 'grel): las lhag par 'gyur/ /gang+gA'i bye ma grangs snyed kyis/ /sangs rgyas zhing khams mi gang gis/ /rin chen rdzas kyis kun bkang ste/ /ston pa mchog la phul byas pas/ /gang gis thal mo nyer sbyar nas/ /byang chub mchog tu sems bskyed nas/ /mchod pa
172b2(rgyud 'grel): mchog 'di khyad par 'phags/ /de la mthar thugs ma mchis so/ /'khor lo dpag tshad bcu gnyis pa/ /lcags las byas pa mgo la 'khor/ /byang chub sems ni bskyed pa yis/ /gsal bar gyur zhes rab tu grags/ /byang chub sems mchog ma bskyed par/ /
172b3(rgyud 'grel): dge gzhan gang gis grol mi 'gyur/ /'o mas dug ni sel lo zhes/ /'jig rten pa la rab tu grags/ /de nyid sprul gyis 'thungs pa ni/ /shin tu dug ni 'phel bar byed/ /mar dang bur ma sman kyi mchog /byis pas bza' nyes dug tu 'gyur/ /'bru mar
172b4(rgyud 'grel): sdong bu'i phung pos kyang/ /me med par du gsal bar 'gyur/ /shel gong dag par gyur pa yang/ /tshon gzhan dag gis bsgyur ba yin/ /long ba dmigs bu med pa dang/ /brgya stong grong gzhan rgyu mi zhu/ /rlung dang bral ba'i me nyid kyis/ /nags tshal
172b5(rgyud 'grel): bsreg par ga la nus/ /gsher bral rdul gyi phung po'i tshogs/ /'du bar mi 'gyur rlung gis mthor/ /chu rnams bsags pa'i lteng ka dag /gnyen bas mod la 'joms par byed/ /sems nyid rab tu dang ba yis/ /dge ba'i bshes la brten bya ste/ /bsnyen
172b6(rgyud 'grel): bkur cho ga bzang po'i tshogs/ /bya ba'i khyad par gnas kun 'phags/ /mngon 'dod the tshom med pa'i yul/ /don kun gsang ba ston byed pa/ /rab tu smin pa 'di nas 'jug /bla ma'i byin rlabs mthu yis grol/ /lan grangs mang por gsol gdab cing/ /
172b7(rgyud 'grel): phun sum tshogs pas mthu bskyed nas/ /mos pa'i dkyil 'khor gsang ba'i skor/ /rang rgyud dag pas sdom gnas 'dod/ /dbang bskur cho ga rdzogs pa yis/ /las kun rim bzhin mngon gnyer zhing/ /phyag rgya'i bsam gtan mthu bcas pas/ / 
173a1(rgyud 'grel): las kun gsang ba'i sngags rgyun 'jug /thun mong khyad par dam tshig gis/ /nyes bskyed rten gnas dag par bya/ /thams cad sdom pas rjes gzung zhing/ /bdag gzhan bya ba mthar phyin brtsam/ /byang chub chen po'i gnas sbyong
173a2(rgyud 'grel): pa/ /der 'jug de nyid lam chen sgom/ /don kun ngo bo gsal byed pas/ /sgo gsum bya rgyu rtag tu brtag /'gro gnas sems can rgya chen tshogs/ /theg chen gsang bas gzung bya ste/ /mthar thug cig tsam don gyi phyir/ /rgyal ba'i bka' don gus
173a3(rgyud 'grel): pas bzung/ /rdo rje bla ma sangs rgyas mchog /dus gsum thugs rje gtser ldan pas/ /phyogs bcu'i sangs rgyas thams cad kyi/ /phyag 'tshal mchod pa'i gnas nyid yin/ /mi mkhas phrag dog nyams pa'i gzhi/ /de rgyud gtan du nyams par
173a4(rgyud 'grel): 'gyur/ /thog mar don kun sgo 'jug pas/ /bcas pa'i dam tshig sdom la gzung/ /thabs rnams kun gyis bstan pa'i sgo/ /mtshan med mtshan ma sna tshogs kun/ /ma nor de bzhin ston byed pa/ /rdo rje theg pa'i sngags lam rgyud/ /phyag rgya kun las mi
173a5(rgyud 'grel): 'da' zhing/ /mchod bstod tshogs kyi bya ba shes/ /sems can don spyod 'tshe ba spang/ /der 'jug thugs rjes rnam par gzung/ /rtag tu rang gi lha nyid dang/ /rang gi sngags dang phyag rgya'i tshogs/ /stobs ldan rnams kyis spyong byed pa/ /de dag kun gyi
173a6(rgyud 'grel): sgor 'jug brtsam/ /rtag tu dkon mchog mchod bya zhing/ /rtag tu rang gi dam tshig bsrung/ /mchod rten gtsug lag khang bzang po/ /yid dag gus pa'i sems kyis gnas/ /lha gzhan dag la phyag byed dang/ /ngan pa'i spyod yul kun ston pa'i/ /
173a7(rgyud 'grel): theg dman rgyun gzhan stan pa'i phyir/ /don kun tsha ba'i gnas nyams 'gyur/ /dran tshogs shes bzhin blo gros mthus/ /dad brtson ting 'dzin bskyed byas te/ /sdom bcas sdom min gnas dag las/ /mchod brtson mthu yis rnam par grol/ /
173b1(rgyud 'grel): dkyil 'khor kun tu ma zhugs shing/ /dam tshig rnams ni spangs pa dang/ /gsang ba yang dag mi shes pas/ /sgrub pa ci yang grub mi 'gyur/ /bdag nyid chos nyid dang ldan pas/ /dam tshig la sdang skal ba ngan/ /srog chags bsad par mi bya zhing/ /
173b2(rgyud 'grel): dkon mchog gsum ni yong mi spang/ /byang chub sems kyang mi btang ste/ /skal bzang slob dpon spang mi bya/ /srid pa shin tu sgrub byed pa'i/ /mgon gyur rnams la bdag skyabs mchi/ /thog mar bslab par bya ba'i tshul gyis smin par bya ba'i cho ga ste dang
173b3(rgyud 'grel): po'o// //rten gyi dkyil 'khor sgrub pa pos/ /mngon par bsgrub bya'i gnas gang dag /rgyud las mngon par bsngags pa'i gzhi/ /phun sum tshogs pas don kun spyad/ /gnas mal phyag dar legs pa'i sar/ /rgyan tshogs bkod pa
173b4(rgyud 'grel): legs dgram zhing/ /'phags pa'i gnas mchog mthu ldan pa'i/ /rten gyi bya bas don kun rdzogs/ /sa chu lci ba sbyin pa'i rdzas/ /legs snyoms byugs pa tshul khrims mchog /grog sbur skyon bsal bzod pa nyid/ /kun tu spro ba'i brtson 'grus dang/ /
173b5(rgyud 'grel): mi g.yeng brtan ba'i bsam gtan dang/ /legs par ri mo shes rab rdzogs/ /pha rol phyin drug dkyil 'khor 'di/ /rtse gcig sangs rgyas rnams la dbul/ /gser mdog nang rnams kun zhi zhing/ /zla ba'i bzhin rgyas lha yis mchod/ /khyad
173b6(rgyud 'grel): par bla ma lhag pa'i lha/ /thun mong dkon mchog la dmigs pas/ /dus bzhin maN+Dal bzhi dag la/ /me tog sngags su bcas pas dgram/ /oM badzra re khe hUM/ oM badzra tsakrA maN+Da la hUM b+huM/ dkyil 'khor bzang po gnas de nyid/ /don gyi byin rlabs mthu
173b7(rgyud 'grel): ldan pas/ /stan bzang legs par bshams pa la/ /khrus kyi dag byas bde bar gnas/ /rgyud dang po yi dbye ba nyid/ /brtan pas nyin rer gsum zhi ba/ /bya ba thun mong bye brag gis/ /las kun yongs su dag par brtsam/ /tho rangs mal nas legs langs
174a1(rgyud 'grel): te/ /bgegs kyi sbyor ba sel byed pa'i/ /sngags kyi rgyal pos bsrungs byas nas/ /pha rol phyin tshogs mdza' yas spyad/ /'gro ba rgya che la dmigs te/ /tshad med bzhi nas kun tu khyab/ /bag med mtshan mo'i nyes dmigs kun/ /
174a2(rgyud 'grel): dran pa bskyed cing bshags par bya/ /de bzhin 'bad pas dgongs mo'i dus/ /rang rgyud dmigs pas rnam par sbyad/ /rgyan rnams kun gyis legs mdzes brgyan/ /kun tu bzengs stod dga' ba'i yid/ /lhag pa'i lha yid rgyal ldan/ /phyag
174a3(rgyud 'grel): rgya sngags kyis bsrung byas pa'o/ /me tog la sogs gcal bkram zhing/ /mchod tshogs gtor ma rgyas byas nas/ ras ris la sogs glegs bam la/ /yang dag mos pa dad pa skyes/ /snying ga'i sngags kyi 'od zer gyis/ /phyogs bcur khyab pa'i
174a4(rgyud 'grel): zla ba bsam/ /sbyor ba'i rgyal po'i phyag rgya sngags/ /gnas kun dkyil 'khor legs par bskyed/ /rnam pa kun mkhyen sangs rgyas gtso/ /rigs kyi dkyil 'khor tshogs rnams kun/ /sku rgyan cha lugs byin rlabs rdzogs/ /rigs kyi 'od zer sprul par
174a5(rgyud 'grel): bcas/ /thams cad rgyud kun rnam dag pas/ /pho brang dkyil 'khor sgo bzhir ldan/ /oM badzra tsakra maN+Da la hUM b+huM/ dri chab sngags kyi byin brlabs pas/ /phyogs rnams kun tu bsang gtor bya/ /me tog mar me mdza' rgyas pas/ /bkra shis
174a6(rgyud 'grel): gzi mdangs rgya cher bskyed/ /gnod byed khro bo'i sngags kyi tshogs/ /phyogs bcu khro bo'i phyag rgyas gnas/ /bgegs kyi dngos po bsreg byas te/ /bsrung ba'i 'khor lo rgya chen tshogs/ /dga' chen dpal gyi rdo rje las/ /rdo rje se gol rnam pa gnyis
174a7(rgyud 'grel): rang gi sngags bcas mthu ldan pas/ /lhag pa'i lhar bcas dkyil 'khor bskul/ /oM badzra sa mA ya dzA hUM/ oM dam tshig chen po'i dkyil 'khor nyid/ /sna tshogs lhag pa'i bsam pa can/ /ma lus sems can don mdzad pa/ /ye shes che gnas
174b1(rgyud 'grel): byin gyis brlabs/ /dza(rgyud 'grel): hUM baM ho:/ oM e hye hi b+ha ga bAn ma hA ka ru Ni ka dri sh+ya ho/ /sa ma ya ho/ sa ma ya stwaM/ oM phyogs bcu'i kun legs bzhugs pa yi/ /bcom ldan rgyal ba sras dang bcas/ /thugs rje che dgongs 'gro rgyud gzigs/ /thabs mkhas smon lam dbang gis
174b2(rgyud 'grel): sbyon/ /oM badzra maN+Da la sa pa ri bA ra hUM/ /'gro ba rnams kyi don slad du/ /phyag dang zhabs ni bsil mdzad cing/ /dam tshig dkyil 'khor gnas 'dir bzhugs/ /oM badzra sa ma ya/ pad+ma maN+Da la hUM/ pra na rA ga swA hA/ /gang dag bzhugs pa'i sangs rgyas spyan//
174b3(rgyud 'grel): sku mchog gsum mnga' dus gsum nyid/ /rab mchog theg chen bla na med/ /byang chub dge tshogs thugs ldan pa/ /rig pa gsang sngags tshogs su bcas/ /phyag rgya'i dkyil 'khor mthar phyin pa/ /bsam 'das brjod par dka' ba'i tshogs/ /gnyis
174b4(rgyud 'grel): med sbyor bas bstod pa'i gnas/ /thams cad don kun ston mdzad pa'i/ /dkyil 'khor kun la bdag cag 'tshal/ /oM na ma(rgyud 'grel): sarba ta thA ga ta kA ya bAk+tsit+ta banda nA ka ri mi/ /sdig las ldog pa'i sems nyid kyis/ /thal sbyar pus mo g.yas btsugs te/ /
174b5(rgyud 'grel): nyon mongs rgyu dang yan lag gis/ /rmongs pa'i tshogs 'phel 'khrul pa bskyed/ /sgo gsum mi dge sdig pa las/ /dus kun rgyun gyis bshags pa bya/ /thun mong khyad par dkon mchog gi /bstan la mngon par ma dang cing/ /dge bshes dam pa ston pa'i
174b6(rgyud 'grel): mchog /khyad par zhing du gyur kun la/ /mi dge las kun gang bgyis la/ /thog med 'khor ba'i kha brgyud nas/ /rang bzhin bcas pa'i sdig pa kun/ /bdag gzhan rgyud las gang byung ba/ /dus 'dir bshags shing bsdam par bya/ /gang dag phyogs bcu'i
174b7(rgyud 'grel): sangs rgyas dang/ /'phags pa rnams kyis byang bar mdzod/ /oM sarba pA ri spho Ta da ha na badzra bA paM swA hA/ /gnyis med ye shes 'dag pa'i phyir/ /mi 'gyur kun tu dag pa'i bdag /bkod pa che snang sna tshogs bzhi/ /don kun phyag rgya 'byung ba'i tshul/
175a1(rgyud 'grel): sprul pa phyogs bcur ma 'gags pa'i/ /dbyer med pas ni las mdzad pa/ /thams cad don kun bskyed pa'i mchog /dus 'dir skyabs su gsol ba 'debs/ /oM bud+d+ha bo d+hi satwa/ sha ra NaM gats+tsha mi/ badzra d+harmA h+ri(rgyud 'grel): skyon med rnam
175a2(rgyud 'grel): par dag pa'i sgo/ /rdul phran grangs med bsam 'das pa/ /bzhi 'byung ma lus lhag pa'i tshogs/ /bde gshegs kun la dbul bar bgyi/ /oM sarba ta thA ga ta pu dza pra brta na ya At+ma nAM ni rya tA yA mi/ sarba ta thA ga tA sha a d+hi tri shtha naM/ sarba
175a3(rgyud 'grel): ta thA ga tA dz+nyA na maM a b+hi Shiny+tsan tu swAhA/ /skye rga na 'chi rba glong gi /chu bo kun las sgrol byed shog /mi shes log rtog nges bcom dag /thugs rjes mgon la skyabs su mchi/ /'gro rnams kun la skyab slad du/ /sems mchog rin chen bdag gis
175a4(rgyud 'grel): sbyar/ /dus kun srog chags rnams kyi bdag /skyabs rnams dpung gnyen skyob gyur cig /oM bo d+hi tsit+ta utpla da ya ni/ sarba pA paM bi ka ta ka na tya traT tA sa ma ya bo d+he tsit+ta hUM swA hA/ /phyogs bcu'i rgyal ba sras bcas kyi/ /bsod nams sna
175a5(rgyud 'grel): tshogs mkhas pa'i mchog /'phags dang lha mi dge spyod pa'i/ /brtul zhugs bzang po bla med pa/ /bya ba rgya chen gnas kun tshogs/ /der gzhol de nyid slob byed pa'i/ /bsod nams tshogs 'gyur gang yin pa/ /de dag kun la rjes yid rang//
175a6(rgyud 'grel): oM sarba ta thA ga tA bu dza dz+nyA na a nu mo da na pU dza me g+ha sa mu dra sphar Na sa ma ye hUM/ /theg chen gsang ba bla na med/ /rdo rje lta bu yon tan brjod/ /rnal 'byor theg pa'i lam gyur pa'i/ /rin chen sgrol mas gsal bar mdzod/ /dngos rtogs rigs kun
175a7(rgyud 'grel): sel byed pa'i/ /ye shes nyi ma'i thugs rje bdag /dus kun rnam par grol ba yi/ /chos kyi 'khor lo bskor bar mdzod/ /oM sarba ta thA ga ta a d+hiSh+Tha na pU dza me g+ha sa mu dra spha ra Na sa ma ye hUM/ /dus kun rdzogs par grol byed pa'i/ /skyob pa
175b1(rgyud 'grel): rnams kyi gsang ba'i sngags/ /nyi ma'i snying po dri med pas/ /rgya chen phyogs rnams khyab byed pa'i/ /nyes pa'i skyon tshogs rab tu zhi/ /de dag de las der mtshungs ston/ /ston pa 'jig rten sgron ma'i tshogs/ /dus kun mi 'gyur brtan par mdzod//
175b2(rgyud 'grel): oM sarba ta thA ga ta ga naM a tye shA ya me/ sarba ta thA ga tA e ta ra tA ya/ d+harmA tra thA/ sti thir b+ha ba ye swA hA/ /'gro rnams kun la phan pa'i phyir/ /dge ba rgya chen gang bsags pa/ /'khor ba'i chu bo 'joms byed pa'i/ /mya ngan 'das las grol bar
175b3(rgyud 'grel): shog /ma lus 'di dag gcig pa'i blos/ /rnam par sbyor ba gang dang gang/ /mthar thug dngos po'i zhi byed pa/ /don kun gsal ba gnyis med mchog /oM na ma(rgyud 'grel): sarba ta thA ga ta pu na nir yA ta na pU dza me g+ha spha ra Na sa ma ye hUM swAhA/ /chu rgyun spangs
175b4(rgyud 'grel): pa ku sha'i tshogs/ /gnas kun dri sbyangs dag par byed/ /so so'i sngags dang phyag rgya yis/ /de dag byin gyis brlab cing dbul/ /dkon mchog gsum nyid gtsor gyur pa/ /lhag pa'i yon tan mdza' yas tshogs/ /sangs rgyas la sogs
175b5(rgyud 'grel): rjes su gzungs/ /rnam grol mdza' yas brjod cing bstod/ /rtse gcig 'dur pa'i rgyun kun tu/ /'khor los gnas kun 'khor lor sbyor/ /dga' dang gus pa'i tshogs kun gyis/ /bsod nams rgya chen mdza' yas ba'o/ /oM na mo b+ha ga ba ti
175b6(rgyud 'grel): ratna ke tu rA dzA ya/ sarba ta thA ga ta a ra ha te samyaka saM bud+d+ha ya/ tadya rtA/? oM ratno ratno ta b+ha ba/ ratna de re ye swA hA/ /lus sam yang na sems kyang rung/ /ci tsam nus par bskor ba bya/ /rgya cher 'gro ba la gnas te/ /smon lam mdza' yas gdab
175b7(rgyud 'grel): par bya?/ /rten? pa? rten gnas tshogs rnams kun/ /thams cad bdag la rnam btud cing/ /'gro ba thams cad 'gron du gnyer/ /de dag byang chub la bzhugs phyir/ /rnam grangs mdza' yas 'jug pa'i sgo/ /khyad par brten gnas skyabs 'os gzung/
176a1(rgyud 'grel): bla ma dam chos sangs rgyas dang/ /byang chub sems dpa' rnams la yang/ /dus kun btung de skabs gsol zhing/ /mchod 'os rnams la 'dud par bgyi/ /'di dag sdig las zlog bgyid cing/ /bsod nams tshogs kun
176a2(rgyud 'grel): yongs su gzung/ /lus can rnams la bsod nams dag /de dag kun la rjes yi rang/ /lus btud thal mo sbyar byas te/ /gsang ba'i theg chen bshad pa dang/ /'gro rnams rab tu gzhug slad du/ /rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas rnams la gsol/ /
176a3(rgyud 'grel): 'di dag gis bgyis bsod nams dang/ /bdag gis bgyis dang ma bgyis dang/ /de gang sems can thams cad kyi/ /bla med byang chub sems bskyed shog /chos kun rnam dag dri med dbang/ /yongs rdzogs mi khom kun spangs nas/ /spyod pa rang
176a4(rgyud 'grel): dbang yod pa dang/ /'tsho ba bzang po rgyu ldan shog /lus can dag ni thams cad kyang/ /lag na rin chen nyid ldan zhing/ /yo byad tshogs rnams mdza' yas la/ /'khor 'das srid dus gnas par shog /bud med thams cad dus kun tu/ /skyes
176a5(rgyud 'grel): mchog byang chub sems ldan zhing/ /lus can thams cad rig pa dang/ /rkang par ldan pa nyid du shog /'gro rnams kha dog ldan pa rnams/ /gzugs bzang gzi brjid che ba dang/ /blta na sdug cing nad med par/ /stobs chen tshe ring brtan par
176a6(rgyud 'grel): shog /thams cad thabs las mkhas gyur te/ /sdug bsngal tshogs rnams las grol zhing/ /dkon mchog gsum la gzhol byed par/ /sangs rgyas theg pa'i rgyan ldan shog /byams sogs snying rje dga' ba dang/ /btang snyoms kun gyi gzhir
176a7(rgyud 'grel): gyur cig /sbyin rnams tshul khrims bzod brtson 'grus/ /bsam gtan shes rab kyis brgyan cing/ /tshogs rnams thams cad yongs rdzogs shing/ /mtshan dang dpe byad gsal bar bya/ /bsam gyis mi khyab sa bcu dang/ /rgyun mi 'chad
176b1(rgyud 'grel): bar 'gro byed shog /bdag gis yon tan de dag dang/ /gzhan tshogs rnam par brgyan pa'i stobs/ /nyes pa kun las grol byed cing/ /sems can kun mchog byams pa'i gtso/ /sems can kun yid re ba bzhin/ /dge ba thams cad rdzogs bgyid cing/
176b2(rgyud 'grel): rtag tu lus can thams cad kyi/ /sdug bsngal rtog pa'i rgyun sel shog /khams gsum kun gyi skye ba gang/ /gang dag sdug bsngal nyen pa'i tshogs/ /bdag gis ming tsam thos pa'i dus/ /shin tu 'jigs pa med gyur cig /bdag nyid mthong zhing dran
176b3(rgyud 'grel): pa dang/ /ming tsam grag pos gzhan dag kun/ /rab tu 'khrug med rnal ma'i yid/ /rdzogs pa'i byang chub des gzhol zhing/ /tshe rabs kun tu rjes 'breng ba'i/ /mngon shes lnga po thob par shog /sems can kun la rnam kun tu/ /rtag tu phan par bgyid
176b4(rgyud 'grel): gyur cig /'jig rten kun la skye bo gang/ /sdig pa'i rgyun zhugs 'dod gyur dag /de dag thams cad gnod med par/ /rtag tu cig car zlog gyur cig /sa chu me rlung 'gyur tshogs dang/ /sman dang dgon pa shing bzhin du/ /rtag tu sems can thams
176b5(rgyud 'grel): cad kyi/ /rang dgar 'gag med spyod par shog /sems can rnams ni srog bzhin phangs/ /de dag la bdag cher phangs shing/ /bdag la de dag sdig smin cing/ /bdag dge ma lus der smin cig /ji srid sems can dga' zhig kyang/ /gang
176b6(rgyud 'grel): du ma grol de srid du/ /de phyir bla na med pa yi/ /byang chub thob kyang gnas gyur cig /gang du sa gzhi legs pa'i gnas/ /der nam rten gyi las byas te/ /bar chad rkyen kun gsal nas ni/ /rigs kyi ting 'dzin bsgom par bya/ /sa gzhi 'jam
176b7(rgyud 'grel): zhing sbyin bdag /gtsang ma'i gnas nas blang bya ste/ /dri zhim sngags kyi chus brlan nas/ /skyon med pha rol phyin drug sbyar/ /oM na ma(rgyud 'grel): sarba na ta bud+d+ha naM/ oM badzra A yu She swA hA/ oM badzra badzrod b+ha ba ye swA hA/ oM a ra dze bir dze swA hA/ oM d+harma d+hA tu
177a1(rgyud 'grel): garb+he swA hA/ legs par snum bsku phyag rgya gzhug /gdab pas sku gsum gsal gyur pa'o/ /maN+Dal mchod pa rgyan dang bcas/ /rol cha kun gyis mngon par bstod/ /dam tshig dkyil 'khor rim bzhin gsal/ /ye shes
177a2(rgyud 'grel): dkyil 'khor spyan drangs gzhug /mchod pa'i tshogs mang legs bsngos nas/ /lha gnas dbang bskur byin brlab cing/ /gtor mas mgron tshogs tshim par bya/ /oM badzra aM ku sha dza(rgyud 'grel): d+harma d+ha re swA hA/ oM pad+ma sa ma ya a pra ti ha ta ye tha
177a3(rgyud 'grel): b+ha badzra ya swA hA/ oM na mo b+ha ga ba te badzra sarba pra b+ha rA dzA ya/ ta thA ga ta ya a ra ha te/ saM myaka saM bud+d+ha ya/ ta dya ya/ suk+Sha me suk+Sha me/ sa ma ye sa ma ye/ shAn+te shAn+te/ sa ma ro bA/ a na ya/ a baM pe/ a paM be ya/ sho pa ti/ mahA te dza
177a4(rgyud 'grel): ni ra ku le ra pA ni ra bA bu traM/ a d+hiShpA na a d+hiShpI te swA hA/ oM sarba ta thA ga ta ni sha ti ta ba de dza la dza la d+harmA d+ha tu ganhe swA hA/ mdza' mar bzod pa'i gsol bya ste/ /byin rlabs brtan par mnga' gsol zhing/ /bkra shis rgya cher brjod byas pas//
177a5(rgyud 'grel): de dag bsdu zhing gshegs su gsol/ oM A ka sha garb+he swA hA/ ye d+harmA he du pra b+ha bA he tun+te ShAM ta thA ga te hya ba da ta/ te ShAM tsa yo ni ro d+ha e baM bA dI mahA sh+ra ma Na:/ oM swa b+hA ba bi shud+d+he/ ha ra ha ra/ a ka dzwa la/ a ka dzwa la/ d+harmA d+hA tu
177a6(rgyud 'grel): garb+he swA hA/ /bya ba'i las kun brtan 'gyur bas/ /phrin las bzhi bcas dngos grub tshogs/ /'byung ba lnga yi khams rnams la/ /rang gi sngags dang phyag rgyas gdab/ /bar skabs khrus kyi dus rtag tu/ /dri bcas chu rgyun byin brlabs pas/ /
177a7(rgyud 'grel): bdag dang 'gro la sogs pa yi/ /phyi nang gsum gyis gnas gsum sbyang/ /oM na ma(rgyud 'grel): sarba ta thA ga tA mahA sa ma ya sh+rI hUM/ byang chub sems dpa' snod gnas la/ /chu rgyun bzang po yi ni gnod/ /sngags bcas brgya rtsa brgyad du 'bul/ /
177b1(rgyud 'grel): khrus gsol zug rngu sel bar byed/ /oM dzaM b+ha la dza len+twa ye swAhA/ /slar yang zas kyi dus dag tu/ /thog mar byin brlabs dkon mchog mchod/ /srung ma rgya chen mnyes byas nas/ /lhag mas 'byung po tshim par bya/ /oM a kA ro mu khaM sarba d+harmA hUM//
177b2(rgyud 'grel): Adya nu tA nA datya/ oM A(rgyud 'grel): hUM phaT swA hA/ /thams cad thugs rje'i mes bsregs nas/ /bdud rtsi'i rgyun gyis dag par byed/ /oM las 'dod lnga'i yon tan sogs/ /rgya chen nam mkha' i khams su sprul/ /dbyer med lha yi nga rgyal gyis/ /gnas
177b3(rgyud 'grel): rnams kun tu longs spyod bya/ /rtag tu bsam gtan la gnas pas/ /zab mo rgya mtsho'i mdo gdon cing/ /sems can kun gyi don gyur pa'i/ /phyogs rnams mthun par 'gro bar sgro/ /lus ngag sems kyi bya ba kun/ /rnam grol theg pa
177b4(rgyud 'grel): bsod nams tshogs/ /phyogs thams cad nas bslab par bya ba'i cho ga ste gnyis pa'o// //dga' chen dpal gyi rdo rje las/ /rdo rje sems dpa' i sbyor gnyis bcing/ /ting 'dzin sngags kyis bskul ba'i mthus/ /phyogs
177b5(rgyud 'grel): bcu'i sangs rgyas kun gshegs 'gyur/ /phyi nang phyogs kun snang ba yi/ /gdug pa thams cad zhi byed pa/ /rang bzhin sku gsung thugs kyi bdag /byin brlabs gsal bas bstan par 'gyur/ /sangs rgyas thams cad tshogs pa yi/ /gang na
177b6(rgyud 'grel): 'dzom bka' bgros dgra mdzad cing/ /bar chad bgegs kun bzhom pa'i tshogs/ /rang gi gnas nas rnam par spro/ /rdo rje 'khor lo ral gri dang/ /be con rtse gsum la sogs kyi/ /phyag rgya sngags la rnam 'phrul bas/ /thams cad 'jig cing 'thor bar byed//
177b7(rgyud 'grel): rang gi gnas gzung brtan pa'i phyir/ /rang nyid rdo rje he ru ka'i/ /gnas kun mtshan ma bzang pos brgyan/ /shin tu 'phro ba'i sems kun gyis/ /phyogs bcu sprul pa'i 'khor lo brjod/ /'dod pa'i rgyal po khro bo chas/ phyogs kun bgegs rnams
178a1(rgyud 'grel): gzir byas te/ phyag rgya bzhis btab gnas su dgod/ /nyi ma la gnas khro tshogs bsgom/ /grangs med sprul pa'i tshogs ldan pas/ /phyogs bcu'i mdza' rnams gtams byas te/ /mi ri 'bar ba'i mtshon char bcas/ /phyogs
178a2(rgyud 'grel): rnams byams pa'i lta ba yis/ /snying rje chen po'i gnas kun gsal/ /'di las lhag pa'i bsrung ba'i mchog /gnyis med stong pa'i rang bzhin las/ /ye shes lnga yi 'od 'bar ba/ /zab mo'i sngags kyis mtshams byas pa'o/ /phyogs gzhan
178a3(rgyud 'grel): khro tshogs bsrung ba'i phyir/ /rdo rje la sogs mtshon cha dang/ /nyungs kar thal ba dri yi chu/ /legs sbyangs byin brlabs rigs kyi lha/ /khro bo'i dkyil 'khor rab 'bar bas/ /de dag mthar phyin sel bar byed/ /dbyings dang ye shes gnyis
178a4(rgyud 'grel): med pa'i/ /don kun mchog tu gsang ba'i gnas/ /rang nyid ngo bo ma bcos dbyings/ /chos kyi rgyun kyi ting 'dzin gsal/ /phyogs rnams sprul pa'i dkyil 'khor la/ /dngos byung rdo rje sems dpa' che/ /ma chags g.yo ba'i dkyil 'khor gyi/ /
178a5(rgyud 'grel): gnas kyi mtshan ma kun las 'phags/ /dkar dmar zhal phyag bzhi bzhis mdzes/ /g.yas sngo g.yon dmar rgyab ser po'o/ /dang po ba dang gsum pa yi/ /phyag rgya rdo rje rtse lnga 'dzin/ /gnyis pa rin chen mda' gsor zhing/ /g.yon
178a6(rgyud 'grel): gyi dang po kha TwAM nyid/ /rgya gram ba dang dril bu'i sgra/ /gnyis pa rin chen sna lnga'i gzhu/ /mtshan dpe phyag rgya lnga yis mdzes/ /las bzhir gzigs pa'i spyan ldan pa/ /'od gsal rin chen sna lnga'i mdangs/ /rin chen phreng bas rgya rnams spras/ /sku
178a7(rgyud 'grel): stong dang dkar gser ris la/ /sku smad tshig gu'i na bza' nyid/ /spyi bor zla dkyil skur ldan par/ /sku yi dkyil 'khor de nyid sngags/ /mgrin pa'i pad+ma gsung ldan par/ /gsung gi dkyil 'khor de nyid sngags/ /thugs ka'i nyi ma'i thugs
178b1(rgyud 'grel): ldan par/ /ye shes dkyil 'khor rten gsal ba'i/ /sngags kyi dkyil 'khor phreng ba'i tshul/ /'od kyi dkyil 'khor sangs rgyas rnams/ /rang gi gnas kun gzhug par bya/ /byin brlabs shes pas ye shes lha/ /rang rig tshul bzhin spyan drangs
178b2(rgyud 'grel): te/ /mdun gyi dkyil 'khor la bzhag nas/ /phyag 'tshal mchod pas mnyes par bya/ /de rjes phyag rgya rnam par bzhis/ /rang gi gnas kun brtan byas la/ /byin brlabs 'dod don gsol gdab cing/ /mchod bstod mnyes pa'i rol mos mchod
178b3(rgyud 'grel): dam tshig gsum gyi phyag rgya yis/ /mdun nas sems dpa' i dkyil 'khor la/ /sngags kyi phreng ba 'khor lo'i tshul/ /'phro 'du gsal ba'i ngo bor brtag /spyod lam kun tu ma nyams blos/ /dkyil 'khor gnyis med tshul bsgom zhing/ /
178b4(rgyud 'grel): byas pa'i tshogs gnyis rgyur shes pas/ /rang gi byin rlabs brtan par bya/ /ji srid kha zas dus kun dang/ /bya ba'i tshul gzhan de bzhin nyid/ /'dri klog kha don la sogs pa'i/ /don kun sngo ba rgya chen tshogs/ /rang gi dbang po gnas las
178b5(rgyud 'grel): byung/ /de dag rol pa'i tshul rgyun bcas/ /ma nyams dus kun snang byed pas/ /de mdza' i chags pa grol bar 'gyur/ /de ltar dkyil 'khor rgya chen po'i/ /tshul rnams gang dag bshad pa yang/ /las su bya bas 'jug pa te/ /mi gnas gsal
178b6(rgyud 'grel): bar goms pa nyid/ /gdul bya'i rgyud rnams sbyang ba'i phyir/ /sngon 'byung sprul pa'i dkyil 'khor bzhin/ /rigs kyi 'khor lo gang nas 'jug /de dag bsdus dang rgya chen tshogs/ /byin brlabs gsal bas brtan byas pa'i/ /sbyor ba'i don kun
178b7(rgyud 'grel): rdzogs par gnas/ /bsnyen sgrub yan lag rjes mthun pa'i/ /phyag rgya'i rigs kyi dkyil 'khor dag /de dag mtshan ma med pa'i gnas/ /rol pa'i byin rlabs che las 'byung/ /ji srid de nyid snang ba yi/ /tshul bya mi de rgyud gsal bar byed/
179a1(rgyud 'grel): don 'byung gsang ba'i kun ston pas/ /dkyil 'khor kun gyi ngo bo nyid/ /'di dag nang gi mtshan nyid de/ /thams cad spyi yis chos nyid don/ /nam zhig stong par 'dod pa'i dus/ /de dag dngos kun las grol ba/ /dkyil 'khor
179a2(rgyud 'grel): gnyis med sbyor byed cing/ /byin brlabs mchog kun rnam par rol/ /nang gi ting 'dzin gsal ba las/ /thig le phra mo la sogs sbyor/ /dam tshig kun gyi gnas rgyas pas/ /brtan pa'i tshogs kun mthar phyin 'gyur/ /rgya chen dkyil 'khor
179a3(rgyud 'grel): rnam dag dang/ /lha yi rnam dag gsal pa'i mthus/ /byang chub sems su sgyu ma'i dngos/ /chos rnams kun gyi mdza' bral ba'o/ /spyod pa yongs su dag pa rnal 'byor pas bar chad bsal ba'i cho ga ste gsum pa'o// //de nas
179a4(rgyud 'grel): bdag gzhan bsrung 'dod pas/ /dben pa'i gnas su tshogs bsags cing/ /rdo rje sems dpa' i ting 'dzin sbyor/ /bsnyen pa'i cho gas brtan par bya/ /dur khrod lha yi gnas rnams dang/ /ma mo gnas kyi thal ba mchog /thod pa mtshan ldan
179a5(rgyud 'grel): sbyar mar bzhag /rigs kyi sngags dang phyag rgyas bsrung/ /snying po nye ba'i snying po dang/ /rtsa sngags lha rnams kun gyis sbyin/ /ting 'dzin 'phro 'du gsal rdzogs pa'i/ /brgya stong khri yi bzlas brjod bya/ /gang dag bsrung bar 'dod pa la/
179a6(rgyud 'grel): thog pe 'am sor ris gsum du shis/ /phyogs mtshams nam mkha' i sa bcings na/ /bsrung ba kun gyi bla med yin/ /de bzhin snga ma'i sbyor ldan pas/ /rgya mtshor 'bab pa'i chu blangs te/ /rin chen snod bzang byin brlabs nas/ /dkyil
179a7(rgyud 'grel): 'khor rkyan pa la bzhag cing/ /ku zha'i chu rgyun sngags thim par/ /lha rdzas zhi ba'i chu mchog gis/ /gtor ba dang ni blugs pa dag /khrus byas phog pas sngon bzhin 'grub/ /mi yi thod pa'i nang du ni/ /nyungs kar rgyal po sngags kyis
179b1(rgyud 'grel): bskyed/ /tshul bzhin chung nas sa gzhi la/ /yun rings goms pa'i brtul bzhugs ldan/ /phyag rgyal rigs tshogs sna tshogs pa/ /rab tu grol bas gzhan dgug cing/ /bzang po khrus kyi cho ga nyid/ /dus gsum bzlas brjod mtshams sbyar
179b2(rgyud 'grel): te/ /rigs tshogs brten gnas gdan bcas pa'i/ /rab tu sprul pa'i khro bo bskyed/ /zhi dang rgyas sogs las rnams la/ /dus bzhi rten 'brel mthun par spyad/ /de las byung ba'i rdzas rnams kyis/ /de nyid las kun byed par 'gyur/ /dpa' bo
179b3(rgyud 'grel): gcig pa'i phyag rgya nyid/ /byin brlabs tshogs kyis rnam par brgyan/ /rang rig snang ba'i dkyil 'khor kun/ /phyogs bcur spro zhing gsal bar bya/ /sku gsung thugs kyi rdo rje yis /gnas gsum mtshan ma'i tshogs 'joms shing/ /phyogs
179b4(rgyud 'grel): mtshams bla 'og thams cad kun/ /gang 'dod de nyid ngo bor 'gyur/ /gzhug dka' bdag nyid ngan pa'i rnams/ /sangs rgyas kun gyis byin gyis brlabs/ /dkyil 'khor rgyas pa la dmigs te/ /sbyor ba bzhi yis rdzogs byas pa'i/ /
179b5(rgyud 'grel): rigs kyi dkyil 'khor mnyam par sbyor/ /gnas kun phyag brgya gsol bar mdzad/ /thams cad sprul pa'i byang chub sems/ /rigs rnams phyogs bcur rnam bkod pas/ /bsgrub bya gang dag de nyid la/ /gsang ba'i gnas su sbyor bar byed
179b6(rgyud 'grel): don mthun phyag brgya 'di yis ni/ /'gro gnas thams cad bsrung bar 'gyur/ /chos dbyings ye shes phyag rgya las/ /'od 'bar 'khor lo'i gzhal yas khang/ /rdo rje sems dpa' las byung ba'i/ /rnam par snang mdzad sbyor ldan pas/ /
179b7(rgyud 'grel): phyogs bcu legs par 'khor lo'i tshul/ /bla 'og dag tu byin brlab cing/ /dkyil 'khor bsdus dang rgyas pa yis/ /thams cad bsrung ba bla na med/ /rdo rje sems dpa' i sbyor ba las/ /zhe sdang la sogs 'joms byed pa'i/ /drag po chen
180a1(rgyud 'grel): po'i sku sbyor zhing/ /bsdus dang rgyas pa'i dkyil 'khor chen/ /phyag brgya rdo rje'i tshogs spro zhing/ /rang gi sngags dang rnal 'byor pas/ /brtan g.yo thams cad bsrung bar byed/ /de bzhin tshar gcod rengs pa 'grub/ /
180a2(rgyud 'grel): sangs rgyas gar gyi rnam 'phrul pa/ /sbyor ldan rdo rje sems dpa' bzhin/ /bsdus dang rgyas pa'i dkyil 'khor gyis/ /gsang sngags phyag rgya bsam gtan las/ /sna tshogs pad+ma la brten bya/ /phyag rgya'i tshogs kun kha 'byed pas/ /sgrib pa'i
180a3(rgyud 'grel): las kun rnam grol zhing/ /thams cad dag pa'i las la sbyor/ /sems dpa' chen po'i cha lugs kyis/ /sems dang ngo bo la gnas bya/ /de bzhin nyid la snang ba yi/ /rdo rje sems dpa' i rnal 'byor ldan/ /rin chen tshogs 'bar brjod pa'i gnas/ /'bar ba'i
180a4(rgyud 'grel): lta ba'i tshul bzhugs pa/ /rdo rje rab tu drag po'i me/ /rab 'jigs 'bar ba mi bzad 'grub/ /gang dag rgyas pa'i tshul sbyor zhing/ /las rnams dngos grub skyed byed pas/ /dkyil 'khor bsdus dang rgyas pa'i tshul/ /gnas rnams kun tu 'gros pa'o/ /thams
180a5(rgyud 'grel): cad dag pa'i las la sbyar/ /mi gnyis ting 'dzin brtan pa'i mthus/ /rdo rje sems dpa' las byung ba/ /las kyi phrin las kun gyi bdag /so so'i phyag rgya sngags kyis sbyor/ /ji ltar phrin las grub pa yis/ /oM TuM rdo rje khu tshur gnyis/ /go cha bgos
180a6(rgyud 'grel): pa'i tshul du bya/ /gnas lngar rang gi sngags dang rgyas/ /nyis 'gyur dag tu bcings nas kyang/ /sangs rgyas gtsug gi nor bu dag /dar dbyangs 'gyid dang bcas pas dgrol/ /thal mo brdabs pas brtan byed pa/ /bsrung ba kun gyi bla med pa'o/ /phyi nang
180a7(rgyud 'grel): gdul dka' drag po'i tshogs/ /'di dag mthu yis 'jigs par 'gyur/ /thams cad kun gyis srung byed pa'i/ /bla na med pa'i go cha mchog /bsod nams ye shes las brgyud stobs/ /mthu yis thams cad 'jigs 'gyur ba/ /don kun gsang
180b1(rgyud 'grel): ba'i phyag rgya dang/ /gsang sngags ting 'dzin gnas las skyes/ /rdo rje sems dpa' i ting 'dzin gyis/ /chos sems rtse gcig gnas pa yi/ /rdo rje khu tshur gnyis bcings te/ /zhi ba'i lta bas bltas nas ni/ /phyogs kyi rigs kun g.yo 'gyur zhing//
180b2(rgyud 'grel): rigs dug gdon rnams sel byed 'gyur/ /'di dag bsam gtan gyis 'grub pa/ /bsam gtan goms pa'i stobs kyis ni/ /dang po las kyi sbyor byed na/ /phyag rgya sngags kyi mthu ldan pa'o/ /rdo rje khu tshur gnyis bcings nas/ /mthe chung lcags kyu rtse mos
180b3(rgyud 'grel): mnan/ /bsam gtan sngags kyi gnas rdzogs 'gyur/ /rtse gcig lha yi ting 'dzin gyi/ /phyag rgya bsgyur te dpral bar bzhag /mi mthun gnas kun lta ba'i tshul/ /rdo rje bsdam pa bstan byas pa'i/ /mdzub mo phan tshun skam pa'i tshul/ /nang
180b4(rgyud 'grel): dang zug rngu ma lus kun/ /'dren byad phyag rgya'i gtso bo mchog /rtag tu rang gi ting 'dzin gnas/ /byams dang snying rje lta bar ldan/ /grub pa dpal gyi spyan bcings nas/ /mig gsal phyag rgya'i sbyor ba yis/ /shes rab ye shes mig bskyed cing//
180b5(rgyud 'grel): long ba dag kyang mthong bar 'gyur/ /rigs kyi sbyor ba mngon ldan par/ /phyag rgya'i yan lag brtan byas pas/ /glad pa'i nang rnams kun bsdus te/ /kha phyogs dang zhing btung bar bya/ /rtse gcig brtan pas yang dang yang/ /rdo rje khu tshur dpal sbyor
180b6(rgyud 'grel): bas/ /nad kyi zug rngu na sogs kun/ /gang la dmigs pa sel bar 'gyur/ /de dag kun gyi gsang sngags 'di/ /don bzhin brtson pas rna la grags/ /oM sarba ta thA gata karma sta ma sid+d+ha ho(rgyud 'grel): de bzhin gshegs pa'i phyag rgya che/ /don kun rnam
180b7(rgyud 'grel): par 'phrul byed pas/ /lag g.yas sems dpa' i gtsug tor bcing/ /byis pa nad med bde ba'i mchog /'od 'bar pad+ma'i dkyil 'khor du/ /bdud rtsi byang chub sems dpa' ste/ /lag g.yas klu yi gdengs ka bya/ /'bar ba'i tshul ston 'bebs
181a1(rgyud 'grel): par bcas/ /mi mthun gnas rnams dug rgyas btab/ /thams cad sel ba'i las byed pa'o/ /bde gshegs sku ni rigs chen pos/ /'khor lo'i phyag rgya mngon sbyar te/ /bsrung ba sngags kyi rgyud ldan dag /dga' ba'i rgyud kyis grol bar
181a2(rgyud 'grel): 'gyur/ /drag po che mchog sbyor ba yis/ /mdzes pa'i phyag rgya smin mtshams bzhag /ru lu'i sngags kyi don sbyar bas/ /mkha' 'gro'i las kun 'grub par 'gyur/ /'gro gzhan dud 'gro phra mo sogs/ /thams cad rigs kyis sbyangs byas te/ /
181a3(rgyud 'grel): rten dang sbyor ba rnam tshogs dang/ /sngags bcas bsam gtan rtse gcig mthus/ /de dag nad med bde ba dang/ /gzi byin mthu rtsal phun sum tshogs/ /me tog 'bras bu skye shing rnams/ /rten 'brel cho ga ji lta bar/ /phyag rgya sngags kyis sbyor
181a4(rgyud 'grel): byas shing/ /rigs pa'i ting nge 'dzin bskyed pa yis/ /de dag thams cad bcud rdzogs te/ /rtag tu gzi mdangs rgyas par 'gyur/ /pha rol gnon pa'i rtsal dag gis/ /'khrul 'khor mtshon cha'i phyag rgya rnams/ /mnyams rang gi mtshan nyid
181a5(rgyud 'grel): rdzogs/ /sngags dang phyag rgyas sbyangs bya ste/ /khro bo brjid pa'i stobs ldan pas/ /mi mthun gnas kun gzhom pa'i phyir/ /ji srid brtan par ma gyur pa/ /de srid bsgom bzlas rtse gcig tu/ /khro bo'i tshogs kun legs gzhug cing/ /
181a6(rgyud 'grel): 'phro 'du yang yang don spyod pa/ /rigs kyi dkyil 'khor mngon sbyor mthus/ /sde dpung 'joms pa'i stobs rdzogs 'gyur/ /de dag dkyil 'khor ji lta bur/ /yang dag brtan pas sngags rnams dang/ /phyag rgya'i stobs bskyed sbyor byas nas
181a7(rgyud 'grel): mtshon cha so so'i tshul bzhin du/ /'debs shing 'phangs pa drag po'i tshogs/ /tshar bcad bsgral zhing brlag par 'gyur/ /mi gnyis ye shes che sbyor ba'i/ /zab cing rgya che dkyil 'khor nyid/ /thog mdza' i yul las 'das pa'i dngos/ /
181b1(rgyud 'grel): dpal mchog dang po'i mtshan nyid can/ /nyon mongs drag po'i gnas tshogs bskyed/ /don kun 'joms byed thams cad sku/ /cha lugs ji bzhin gsal ldan pa/ /thabs dang shes rab snyoms 'jug nas/ /rnam par spros pa'i las rnams
181b2(rgyud 'grel): kun/ /de ltar sder bcas mnan pa'i tshul/ /rkang pa brkyang dang gnon pa dang/ /bskum nas 'degs pa'i stabs dag ni/ /phrin las bzhi yi sbyor bas te/ /phyag rgya bsam gtan sngags bcas pas/ /g.yas g.yon sbyor ba'i rgya gzung zhing/
181b3(rgyud 'grel): gzugs rnams gzhom zhing mnan par bya/ /rigs kun sbyor ba'i ting 'dzin gyis/ /las kun dkyil 'khor rnam par 'phrul/ /gzugs sogs phung po lnga rnams dang/ /de rgyu nyon mongs drug lnga'i tshogs/ /yul bcas rnam par dag pa'i
181b4(rgyud 'grel): mthus/ /thams cad gnyis med sangs rgyas su/ /yon tan phrin las rol pa'i stabs/ /rigs kyi dkyil 'khor chen po rnams/ /yongs bkug dbang du bsdu bya ste/ /bsam gtan sngags dang phyag rgya mnan/ /rang bzhin gcig pa'i btsun mo
181b5(rgyud 'grel): rnams/ /dga' zhing longs spyod dgyes pas spyad/ /'di dag zag med mthu ldan pas/ /gnyis med 'bras bu chen por sbyor/ /ji snyed rgyu dang las kyi chos/ /so so'i theg pa gzhung bzhin du/ /byang chub pha rol phyin pa dang/ /grub dang gzung dang
181b6(rgyud 'grel): mdangs rnams dang/ /rigs dang phyag rgya'i khyad par kun/ /so so'i las kun spyod cing gnon/ /rgyu 'bras gnyis su med pa'i tshul/ /so so'i mthu yis sbyor byed cing/ /rnam pa'i don kun las rnams sbrel/ /bsod nams ye shes rdzogs pa'o/ /nye
181b7(rgyud 'grel): bar spyod pa lha mo'i tshogs/ /don grub gsang ba kun nas 'jug /rigs mthun gtso bzungs sbyor ba yis/ /phyag rgya 'phrul pas de non 'gyur/ /nyon mongs gnas kun rgyu rdzogs pa/ /dregs byed lha rnams dbang mdzad de/ /rigs kun dkyil
182a1(rgyud 'grel): 'khor cha lugs kyis/ /byin brlabs gsang ba lha mo dag /rang gi sngags dang phyag rgya'i mthus/ /'jig rten gsum tshogs rnam bkug cing/ /mthu rtsal rdzu 'phrul 'brog bya ste/ /'da' ba med par las bzhin dgug /rigs kun
182a2(rgyud 'grel): phrin las rnam pa'i stobs/ /dregs byed sder bcas mnan byas te/ /chung ma rgyan tshogs yo byad rnams/ /mthu yis dbrog cing longs spyod do/ /de bzhin 'jig rten gsum dag gi /mthu chen sde brgyad dbang ldan sogs/ /phyogs skyong bcu po
182a3(rgyud 'grel): la sogs rnams/ /yud tsam zhig gis 'dir bkug ste/ /gang gi rten la sbyor bstims nas/ /sngags dang phyag rgyas dbang du byed/ /ma lus 'jig rten kun grags pa'i/ /zhi dang rgyas sogs las rnams kun/ /de dag rnams 'byor mthu
182a4(rgyud 'grel): sbyor bas/ /'bad pa med par 'grub par 'gyur/ /las kun dngos grub tshogs shes pas/ /bdag gzhan don kun spyad pa'i rnams/ /mi 'jigs gnas gsum theg pa dang/ /rten 'brel gsang bas kun bstan pa'o/ /de ltar dgug dang dbye ba
182a5(rgyud 'grel): dang/ /bsod dang skrod dang rings pa dang/ /rmugs pa la sogs las rnams kun/ /'di nyid mthu yis grub par 'gyur/ /so so'i ting 'dzin sngags bcas pas/ /rten cing 'brel pas spyang byas te/ /don kun gsang bas sna tshogs pa'i/ /
182a6(rgyud 'grel): tshul rnams sna tshogs brjod pa bzhin/ /bsod nams ye shes tshogs kun gyi/ /thun mong cho ga bzhin gyur pa'i/ /yi ge phreng ba'i 'khor lo dag /byin rlabs tshogs bskyed brtsam par bya/ /rang gi lha yi rnal 'byor gyis/ /bsnyen rdzogs
182a7(rgyud 'grel): sgrub pa tshul bzhin du/ /rten cing dkyil 'khor la sbyor bas/ /de dag gsang sngags brjod pa gdon/ /thog mar 'khor lo tshul bzhin du/ /rtsibs brgyad bcu drug mu khyud gnyis/ /A li kA li mnyan byas te/ /shar gyi gnas su sbyor bar bya/ /
182b1(rgyud 'grel): 'khor lo mu khyud bzhi rnams la/ /yi ge gsang sngags rdzogs par dgod/ /drag dal ring thung tshul bzhin du/ /g.yas g.yon phreng ba thabs shes rgya/ /oM A(rgyud 'grel): hUM sh+rI de ba te badzra satwa stwaM tra na mo swa tu sti/ sarba bud+d+ha sa ma yo gI nI na hUM hUM swAhA/ /rig
182b2(rgyud 'grel): sngags phreng bas bsgyur byas pa'i/ /'khor los gnas kun dag par 'gyur/ /'di nas dam tshig dkyil 'khor rnams/ /gsal bar bskyed cing brtan byas nas/ /ye shes lha dang gnyis med par/ /phyag rgya bzhi yis rgyas btab cing/ /mchod bstod
182b3(rgyud 'grel): lhag gnas cho ga rdzogs/ /dus kun tshogs bsags dngos grub bzhi/ /'jug pa po rnams phrin las sna tshogs 'grub pa'i cho ga ste bzhi pa'o// //de nas dngos grub bzang po ni/ /bdag gzhan kun la phan phyir du//
182b4(rgyud 'grel): mnyams kun la 'jug pa'i sgo/ /don kun gsang dang spyad par bya/ /rdo rje sems dpa' dpal sbyor zhing/ /gzugs dbyibs thams cad ldan pa'i rgya/ /byin brlabs dbang bskur gnas rdzogs pas/ /sngon du bsnyen cing sgrub pa dang/ /rten gyi
182b5(rgyud 'grel): mtshan ma goms byas te/ /las kun bya ba'i sgo rnams dang/ /phyi rol pra se cho ga dang/ /rten 'brel mthu las brtag par bya/ /'byung ba lnga yi khams kun las/ /rang rig sbyor ba'i phyag rgya sngags/ /sbyang zhing byin brlabs bsrung byas pas//
182b6(rgyud 'grel): don kun lha yi ngo bo nyid/ /yang dang yang du sngags brjod cing/ /yi ge gcig las kun ston 'gyur/ /de ltar phyi nang sna tshogs bdag /rigs kyi dkyil 'khor cher rnams kyi/ /phyag rgyas brtan pa'i las byas pas/ /bden brjod mtshan ma
182b7(rgyud 'grel): sna tshogs ston/ /nang gi ye shes zag pa med/ /rigs kyi dkyil 'khor che gnas sbyor/ /de nyid thugs kyi gsang ba mchog /so so'i rten la bsgrub bya ste/ /sngags bcas bden pa brjod cing brtag /don kun gsang ba ston par 'gyur/ /de dag
183a1(rgyud 'grel): ting 'dzin goms pa las/ /bden brjod sngags kyi mthu bskyed cing/ /dus gsum chos rnams ma lus pa'i/ /rang rig tshul gyis gsal bar byed/ /rdo rje sems dpa' i ting 'dzin gnas/ /dkyil 'khor phyag rgya'i cho ga rdzogs/
183a2(rgyud 'grel): so so'i rten 'brel rdzas rnams la/ /phyag rgya sngags bcas don rnams bsgrub/ /'di dag rgyu rkyen tshogs pa'i mthus/ /rang gi ngo bo brtan par 'gyur/ /ri lu mig sman bcud kyis len/ /ral gri gser 'gyur la sogs rdzas/ /de dag dmigs
183a3(rgyud 'grel): pa'i yan lag gis/ /las kun rdzogs pa'i dngos grub 'gyur/ /dkyil 'khor chen po nyams dga' i gnas/ /cho ga tshogs rnams rdzogs pa'i gzhi/ /der ni rang gi rdzas dag las/ /don kun dngos grub skye bar 'gyur/ /so so'i rig pa
183a4(rgyud 'grel): phyag rgyar bcas/ /yun rings mdza' i las rdzogs pa/ /ji bzhin 'jug pa'i byin rlabs kyis/ /bden pa'i chos kun gsal bar ston/ /phun sum tshogs pa bzhir ldan pas/ /sngon du 'gro ba'i yan lag rdzogs/ /phyi dang nang gi khrus byas
183a5(rgyud 'grel): nas/ /sgrub pa chen po la 'jug bya/ /rigs kyi dkyil 'khor gang rung bar/ /sngon du bsnyen pa rdzogs byas te/ /bdud rtsi rnam pa lnga po dag /sha lnga'i grogs dang bcas par bsags/ /band+ha mtshan dang ldan pa rnams/ /phyogs mtshams
183a6(rgyud 'grel): dbus kyi gnas su dgod/ /rigs kyi dkyil 'khor ji bzhin pa'i/ /pho brang gdan khang pa rdzogs nas/ /yig 'bru phyag mtshan sku phra mo/ /spro dang bsdu bas yongs su rdzogs/ /sangs rgyas kun gyi dam tshig nyid/ /gnyis med bsgoms pas gsal
183a7(rgyud 'grel): par 'gyur/ /'di dag rang rang mthu bskyed pa'i/ /byin rlabs rten 'brel stobs rdzogs nas/ /ye shes dkyil 'khor spyan drangs bstims/ /dgug gzhug gnyis su med par gnas/ /rang gi lha yi sbyor ldan pas/ /srin lag dang ni mthe bong rtsas/ /zhi
183b1(rgyud 'grel): ba'i btung ba bzhin myangs na/ /rtag pa yi ni dngos grub thob/ /tshul bzhin rigs kyi dkyil 'khor che/ /'khor lo chen po gnas rgyas par/ /bdud rtsi gsang ba bsgrub bya ste/ /rang rig rgyur rkyen tshogs pas so/ /bsnyen bsgrub yan lag
183b2(rgyud 'grel): rnam bzhi yis/ /byin brlabs dkyil 'khor rdzogs byas te/ /rigs dang rigs kyi dkyil 'khor tshul/ /gnyis med thabs dang shes rab gsal/ /'od dang du ba dri sgra rgyun/ /lha mo'i gzugs dang mang du 'phel/ /yi ge dgu dang bcu gcig dang/ /
183b3(rgyud 'grel): bcu bdun nyi shu rtsa gcig sogs/ /bar skabs sngags kyis gsal byas pas/ /phyag rgya'i gnas kun rdzogs par 'gyur/ /nyi zla'i dkyil 'khor la gnas pa'i/ /dmar po h+rI(rgyud 'grel): yid kun sdud de/ /rta mchog yon tan rol pa'i mthus/ /rigs kyi
183b4(rgyud 'grel): dkyil 'khor kun mnyes mdzad/ /tshogs chen yongs su rdzogs pa yi/ /dkyil 'khor gnas kun spro bsdu ba/ /ye shes 'khor lo gzhug byas te/ /bdud rtsi gsang ba chen po'i rgyun/ /rdo rje sems gtso lha mor bcas/ /bsdus dang rgyas pa'i
183b5(rgyud 'grel): 'khor lo rnams/ /de dag rim gyis khyab byed pa'o/ /bdud rtsi shel gong dag pa'i gzugs/ /bsnyen sgrub yan lag rnam pa bzhi/ /cho ga'i don kun rab tu rdzogs/ /'di dag skyed dang spro ba dang/ /rgya chen spros pas kun gsal zhing/ /sangs
183b6(rgyud 'grel): rgyas rigs sogs 'gro ba'i tshogs/ /kun gyis dngos por 'di gyur cig /thams cad bsgrub pa'i bdag nyid kyi/ /ra sa ya na'i bde ba'o/ /'dis ni bsrung ba byas na dpal/ /rdo rje sems dpa' nyid du 'gyur/ /de nas tshe gnas bskyed pa'i phyir
183b7(rgyud 'grel): mkhas pa de nyid dkyil 'khor bzhin/ /cho ga rdzogs pas brtsams byas te/ /phun sum tshogs pas kun spyad rdzogs/ /mgon po tshe dpag med pa'i sku/ /cho ga shes pas bsgom par bya/ /byin brlabs rang gi ngang tshul bstan/ /lha
184a1(rgyud 'grel): mo'i tshogs rnams rdzogs par gnas/ /rtag tu bsnyen sgrub yan lag bzhi/ /sbyor ba bzhi rgyun cho ga tshogs/ /phyogs dus dkyil 'khor rten sdud cing/ /bzlas brjod gsal bas brtson pas 'grub/ thod pa mchan dang
184a2(rgyud 'grel): ldan sngags pa/ /rang gi dkyil 'khor gnas su bzhag /thabs dang shes rab 'phro 'du yis/ /phyogs kun sangs rgyas gsal bar 'gyur/ /nyi ma'i 'od zer sna tshogs pas/ /tshe gnas byin brlabs bskyed par bya/ /ye shes 'khor lo
184a3(rgyud 'grel): kun bsdus te/ /rang rig gnas kun rgyas par mdzad/ /'od 'bar g.yo ba la sogs kyi/ /dngos grub bzang po rtags rnams kun/ /yi ge bdun dang bcu gcig pa/ /bco lngas 'phro 'du rdzogs par 'gyur/ /rtag tu rang gi dam tshig ni/ /gnas
184a4(rgyud 'grel): kun rgyas par byed pa'i mchog /rigs kun dkyil 'khor gnas gsal bas/ /phrin las bzhi yi dngos grub 'grub/ /de dag dkyil 'khor rgya chen dang/ /sdus tshogs gang la mos pa bzhin/ /dmigs par bya ba'i bsgrub bya rnams/ /phyag
184a5(rgyud 'grel): rgya'i dkyil 'khor so so'i gnas/ /phrin las gsang ba 'di rgyud kyis/ /so so'i phrin las mnyam par sbyor/ /rang gi gsang sngags ji lta ba/ /rang gi ting 'dzin rtse gcig nyid/ /don kun gsang ba la dmigs te/ /phyag rgya'i gnas kun
184a6(rgyud 'grel): rdzogs par spyad/ /des ni zhi rgyas dbang drag gi /dngos grub thun mong las 'phags pa'i/ /rnam pa mang po mtshan ldan zhing/ /de dag las kun rdzogs par byed/ /don 'di gsang ba la brten nas/ /rgya chen sngags don tshul mang po/ /de nyid
184a7(rgyud 'grel): rnam kun gsal 'gyur te/ /thogs pa med par 'grub pa'o/ /rtag tu rang gi dam tshig gnas/ /des ni dngos grub kun sbyor zhing/ /'gro ba rgya chen la dmigs pas/ /mchog gi ye shes bsgrub par bya/ /bsnyen sgrub kun gyi sngon 'gro ba'i/ /cho ga rgya
184b1(rgyud 'grel): chen rdzogs gyur nas/ /rigs kyi dkyil 'khor tshul bzhin du/ /rang rigs dngos grub rnam par sbyor/ /rten gyi dbye ba rnam bzhi ste/ /dbang po yul dus bsnyen sgrub sogs/ /rang gi 'jug pa tshul bzhin du/ /cho ga rdzogs pa'i yan lag rnams/ /
184b2(rgyud 'grel): phyag rgya'i gnas kun la brten nas/ /don dam gsang ba spyad par bya/ /gcig bzhin du ni gcig spyod pa/ /lhan cig spyod pa rjes spyad sdug /go rim so so'i khyad par dag /ma 'dres gsal bas don kun rdzogs/ /nga yi dam tshig de 'byung ba/ /
184b3(rgyud 'grel): sdug pa'i dam tshig bdag rjes 'brang/ /shin tu sbyor dang sbyor chen po/ /thams cad bdag nyid dam tshig mchog /de dag tshul gyis las kun la/ /rnam par sbyor bas rdzogs par 'gyur/ /dngos grub mchog gi mchog sbyor ba/ /phyag rgya la gnas
184b4(rgyud 'grel): gsang bas 'grub/ /rnal 'byor thams cad bde ba yi/ /rjes su sbyor bas mchod byed cing/ /kun la myang bar byed pas na/ /shin tu sbyor bas rab 'grub 'gyur/ /sangs rgyas thams cad bdag nyid kyi/ /ra sa ya na'i bde ba nges/ /rdo rje sems dpa' 
184b5(rgyud 'grel): tshe 'grub pa'i/ /lang tsho dang med bde mchog 'grub/ /sangs rgyas kun gyi sku chen dang/ /sangs rgyas kun gyi gsung snyan pa/ /sangs rgyas kun gyi thugs chen po/ /sangs rgyas kun gyi mchod pa che/ /sangs rgyas kun gyi rgyal chen po/ /rdo rje
184b6(rgyud 'grel): 'dzin pa kun gyi bdag /'jig rten dbang po kun gyi gtso/ /rin chen dbang phyug kun gyi bdag /de dag dang ni dga' spyad na/ /'dod pa bzhin du 'gro 'ong lding/ /lha mo kun gyi grub chen po/ /'khor lo grub pa rab tu grub/ /theg chen gsang ba
184b7(rgyud 'grel): gnyis med pa'i/ /don mchog 'bras bu'i lam ston pa/ /rgyal ba kun gyi dgongs mdzad de/ /rjes su 'jug pas spyad pa'i lam/ /'di dag don tshogs rgya chen las/ /nye bar bstan pa'i cho ga rnams/ /bdag don sgrub pa'i thabs tsam zhig /
185a1(rgyud 'grel): legs bshad gsal bar byas pa yin/ /sangs rgyas rnams kyis gang bstan pa/ /de dag byang chub sems dpa' i yul/ /mchog tu gyur pa'i rnal 'byor pas/ /de gsal sgo rnams gzung bar 'os/ /thun mong dang mchog gi
185a2(rgyud 'grel): dngos grub bstan pa'i cho ga ste lnga pa'o// //dam pa'i bka' don rgya chen po/ /rnam kun sdud par su yi nus/ /de dag don ni 'dor byed pa/ /tshul ldan gsang ba'i man ngag mchog /legs bshad dri med dge ba
185a3(rgyud 'grel): bzang/ /cho ga'i gnas kun rnams gsal bas/ /'jig rten 'di dag kun sgrol zhing/ /thams cad mkhyen nyid rdzogs gyur cig /dkyil 'khor thams cad kyi rjes su bstan pa la 'jug pa'i cho ga lnga pa zhes bya ba/ /slob dpon chen po ku
185a4(rgyud 'grel): ku rA dzas mdzad pa rdzogs so// //rgya gar gyi mkhan po sh+rI badzra ha sa dang/ sgra bsgyur gyi lo tsa ba ? rin mchog gis bsgyur cing gtan la phab pa'o// // */ /sangs rgyas thams cad mnyam par sbyor ba'i dkyil
185a5(rgyud 'grel): 'khor gyi cho ga bzhugs so// */ /rgya gar skad du/ sh+rI sarba bud+d+ha sa ma yo ga ni maN+Da la bi d+hi nA ma/ bod skad du/ dpal sangs rgyas thams cad dang mnyam par sbyor ba'i dkyil 'khor gyi cho ga zhes bya ba/ dpal rdo rje sems dpa' 
185a6(rgyud 'grel): thams cad la phyag 'tshal lo/ /dpal ldan mi mthun tshogs 'joms rgyal ba'i sku/ ye shes dbang phyug phun sum tshogs pa'i bdag /shes rab rnam 'phrul brgya dang nyi shu brgyad/ /rang 'od thabs sbyor de rnams phyag 'tshal lo/ /rang rgyud
185a7(rgyud 'grel): pas bsgrubs drag po'i tshogs sogs 'joms/ /dbugs 'byung sna tshogs rang gi rigs las sprul/ /rten dang brten pa'i 'jig rten rnam 'phrul mdzad/ /khams gsum snang mdzad gtsor byas phyag 'tshal te/ /dgongs mdzad
185b1(rgyud 'grel): bzhi lam 'bras bu gsang ba'i don/ /dpal ldan sangs rgyas thams cad mnyam sbyor ba'i/ /mkha' 'gro sgyu ma bde mchog rgyu dag las/ /dkyil 'khor drug gi gsang don rnam bkod nas/ /tshogs bsags bsrung zhing byin rlabs gnas pa dang/ /
185b2(rgyud 'grel): sgrub don slob ma las su rung ba'i phyir/ /rgyud bzhi'i yan lag phyogs mthun las bsdus pa'i/ /rigs drug gzugs brnyan cho ga bshad par bya/ /bde chen sangs rgyas kun gyi dngos/ /rdo rje sems dpa' dpal gyi lha/ /rnam pa sna tshogs kun
185b3(rgyud 'grel): gyi mchog /'khor lo thams cad rnam 'phrul lo/ /gsang ba mchog gi dgyes par ni/ /thams cad bdag nyid rjes su bsgrub/ /rten gnas phun sum tshogs ldan pas/ /sngon 'gro'i bsnyen pa rdzogs byas te/ /sa gzhi sta gon gnas pa dang/ /
185b4(rgyud 'grel): gzugs brnyan dkyil 'khor rtsom sgrub cing/ /'jug pa'i sbyin sreg gtor ma'i las/ /rab gnas dbang bskur la sogs rnams/ /bdag gzhan smin cing grol ba'i phyir/ /dam pa'i lung bzhin bsgrub par bya/ /gzhan don rtsom pa'i
185b5(rgyud 'grel): blo ldan pa/ /rang bzhin mngon par 'dus byas pa'i/ /thun mong khyad par dbang thob nas/ /yon tan rtsal ldan gang yang rung/ /dkyil 'khor ting 'dzin phyag rgya sngags/ /dgug mchod las sbyor srung ba che/ /myur du gshegs su gsol ba yi/ /
185b6(rgyud 'grel): de nyid bcu sogs las la mkhas/ /khyad par las kyi rim pa yis/ /gsal mdzad rgya chen 'gro la dmigs/ /rgya mtsho ri rab nor bu rdzing/ /nam mkha' sa gzhi gser bzhin gnas/ /des shing 'jam la snyan po de smra/ /dad brtson shes
185b7(rgyud 'grel): rab dang ldan pas/ /thos bsam bsgom pa'i las la sogs/ /sems can kun la byams sems can/ /snying rje dga' ba btang snyoms gnas/ /pha rol phyin pa drug ldan zhing/ /dkyil 'khor rgyud dang bla ma dang/ /zab mo'i chos la rtse gcig
186a1(rgyud 'grel): dga' / /bstan bcos kun la 'jigs med cing/ /bstan po byang chub don gnyer bas/ /dang ba'i bla ma dri med la/ /lan gsum yon bcas gsol ba gdab/ /rigs kyi bu khyod 'byor ldan ma/ /dgos pa'i rdzas rnams
186a2(rgyud 'grel): gang yod smros/ /ma tshogs pa rnams rnyed 'gyur na/ /phun sum tshogs dus gzung bar bya/ /dkyil 'khor kun tu ma zhugs shing/ /dam tshig rnams ni spangs pa dang/ /gsang ba yang dag ni shes pas/ /sgrub pa ci yang mi 'grub po//
186a3(rgyud 'grel): kun tu sna tshogs skal bzang por/ /bdag rang bsgrubs pas skal ba bzang/ /bdag med chos nyid dang ldan pas/ /dam tshig la sdang skal pa ngan/ /srid pa shin tu bsgrubs pas na/ /bskal bzang sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das/ /skal
186a4(rgyud 'grel): ngan nyan thos 'jig rten na/ /shin tu yongs su mya ngan 'das/ /rtog pa thams cad bsgrub pa'i phyir/ /skal bzang phyag na rdo rje dpal/ /stong pa nyid la rab sbyor bas/ /rang rgyal rnams ni skal pa ngan/ /'dod chags thams cad rnam dag
186a5(rgyud 'grel): pas/ /skal bzang spyan ras gzigs kyi dbang/ /log par lta dang ldan pas na/ /skal ngan mu stegs 'jig rten rnams/ /dam pa'i nor mchog sdud pa'i phyir/ /skal bzang rdo rje nyi ma dpal/ /bdag gi bu la'ang ma chags pas/ /skal
186a6(rgyud 'grel): ngan dka' thub spyod pa kun/ /rgyal srid mchog rnams bsdus pas na/ /rta mchog dpal ni skal ba bzang/ /bdag med yongs su 'dzin med pas/ /thub pa thams cad skal pa ngan/ /bde ba thams cad rab bsgrub phyir/ /kun gyi slob dpon skal
186a7(rgyud 'grel): ba bzang/ /lta ngan dam tshig la sdang ba'i/ /slob ma thams cad skal pa ngan/ /gsang ba'i don ni yang dag nyid/ /'di ni gsal bar shes pa yin/ /sangs rgyas kun gyi bka' bzhin du/ /sangs rgyas kun gyi grub par 'gyur/ /dpen pa
186b1(rgyud 'grel): yi ni gnas dag gam/ /rang gi skyed mos tshal sogs par/ /kun tu sna tshogs bskal bzang po/ /kun tu sna tshogs bde mchog gis/ /kun tu sna tshogs dgos pa rnams/ /ci bde bar ni bsgrub par bya/ /rten dang dgos pa gtsug lag khang/ /ri yi rtse rnams
186b2(rgyud 'grel): thams cad tu/ /rnam pa du ma sna tshogs pa'i/ /sangs rgyas dgongs pa bsgrub par bya/ /dur khrod dang ni lha rten dang/ /ma mo'i gnas la sogs 'dug na/ /rdo rje 'dzin pa'i dgos pa dag /rnam pa du ma sgrub par 'gyur/ /padmo skyed mos tshal dga' 
186b3(rgyud 'grel): sdang/ /chu bo dag gi mdo dag tu/ /padmo 'dzin pa'i dgos pa rnams/ /rnam pa du mas 'grub par 'gyur/ /rgyal po'i pho brang dga' ba dang/ /padmo skyed mos tshal nyid du/ /rnam pa sna tshogs du ma yi/ /rgyal po'i dgos pa bsgrub par bya/ /mkhar ni rnam pa
186b4(rgyud 'grel): sna tshogs dang/ /de bzhin chu bo'i 'gram dag gam/ /rgyal khams gzhan las grub pa ru/ /rdo rje rta ni bsgrub par bya/ /cha lugs rnam pa sna tshogs dang/ /sgrub pa rnam pa sna tshogs kyis/ /rdo rje sems dpa' i go bgos la/ /dkyil 'khor la
186b5(rgyud 'grel): sogs rab? tu bsgrub/ /sangs rgyas rnams kyi padmo dmar/ /phyag na rdo rje sna tshogs pa/ /'jig rten dbang gi kha dog dkar/ /rdo rje nyi ma dpal gyi ser/ /kha dog kun dang ci 'byor pa/ /bla re rgyal mtshan rgyan gyi rnams/ /thams cad rab tu sgrub pa dpal/
186b6(rgyud 'grel): rta mchog rdo rje can gyi'o/ /gnas dang 'khor rnams ci 'dra dang/ /bkod dang 'gro ba ci 'dra dang/ /'khor rnams bkod pa ci 'dra ba/ /de yi 'khor lo mchog gis mdzad/ /rdo rje sems dpa' i lha rnams kyi/ /'khor lo mngon sum mthong ba las/ /bsod nams
186b7(rgyud 'grel): rtag pa ci 'dra? ba/ /phyis byas pa yang de bzhin no/ /snying rje byang chub sems ldan pas/ /khams gsum gnas sogs blta byas te/ /rgyu rkyen 'bras bu rnam dag pa'i/ /chos bdag med pa'i rnam par bsam/ /rigs kyi rnam 'phrul las byung ba'i/ /
187a1(rgyud 'grel): rnam gsum nus pa mthu bskyed de/ /phyag rgya mthu ldan dag pa'i phyir/ /g.yas pa'i nyi ma drug dkyil du/ /hUM oM h+rI(rgyud 'grel): h+rI(rgyud 'grel): trAM haM las/ /rigs drug sangs rgyas bskyed par bya/ /g.yon pa'i zla dkyil drug dbus su/ /mi 'gyur a dkar
187a2(rgyud 'grel): gsal 'bar bas/ /rigs mthun lha mo drug bsam bya/ /'phro 'du mdzad ces gnyis med 'gyur/ /sgra gnas chos kyi phyag rgya ste/ /thugs kar ye shes sems dpa' gnas/ /sku gsung thugs kyi mtshan ma yis/ /gnas gsum gsum
187a3(rgyud 'grel): brlabs brgyan byas te/ /bdag dang 'gro ba sbyang ba yi/ /sbyor ba'i ting 'dzin la gnas bya/ /dbang po mdun du dgug byas nas/ /'phags dang sems can la dmigs te/ /bcu bzhi'i bya ba rgya chen tshogs/ /yongs su dag pa'i gsum gnas

187a5(rgyud 'grel): yin te/ /'khor gyi lha mo'i tshogs rnams la/ /re re la yang khri 'am stong/ /gzhan yang bsnyen pa rnam lnga ste/ /grangs dus mtshan ma mthong ba dang/ /gnang ba thob dang 'gog pa yi/ /'khor lo goms pa las byung bas/ /rang sems dag pas
187a6(rgyud 'grel): gtor ma brtsam/ /thun bzhi'i sbyor bas 'jug byas te/ /cho ga yan lag sngon 'gro rnams/ /rdzogs pas dkyil 'khor las dag brtsam/ /so so'i rigs kyi sbyor ldan pas/ /bdag dang gzhan gyi don ched du/ /tshogs rdzogs bar chad bsal ba
187a7(rgyud 'grel): dang/ /lha mnyes las kun grub bya'i phyir/ /dkyil 'khor sa gzhi brtag par bya/ /des ni bkra shis phun sum tshogs/ /so so'i rang gnas nyams dga' ba/ /nags tshal me tog lcug ma'i ri/ /rin chen 'byung gnas rgya mtsho'i ngogs/ /me tog
187b1(rgyud 'grel): 'bras bzang nyams dga' ba'i/ /de bzhin dgon pa'i gnas mchog ni/ /sa gzhi chags med dbus mtho zhing/ /phyag rgya chen po'i rigs 'dzin rtags/ /shar dang byang gzhol dngos grub gnas/ /lho nub gzhol bas 'jig rten pa/ /nub byang mtho bas las
187b2(rgyud 'grel): phra mo/ /shar mtho dbus dma''grub mi 'gyur/ /nam mkha' 'khor lo rtse brgyad pa/ /sgrub gnas las mthun so so'i dbyings/ /pus nub tsam du brko byas te/ /slar las nges dgang pa 'am/ /chu rgyun gang ba dri ldan la/ /mnyam gzhag

191a6(rgyud 'grel): ba bye ba grangs med dug gang gis sdig pa spyod byas pa'ang/ /dkyil 'khor 'di 'dra mthong bas ni/ /de dag thams cad zad par 'gyur/ /gsang sngags spyod tshul cho ga ni/ /mnyam par gyur pa gzhan gang yod/ /tshe 'di nyid la sngags bzlas
191a7(rgyud 'grel): pas/ /bla med gnas su 'gro gsung te/ /sdug bsngal kun 'byung nyams thag pa'i/ /ngan 'gro'i gnas ngan spong bar 'gyur/ /des na spyod mchog las 'di la/ /blo gros shin tu brtan pas na/ /de ring khyod ni rnyed pa mchog /bdag nyid chen po thob

191b2(rgyud 'grel): dpal dang ldan/ /theg chen gsang ba cher 'byung bas/ /khyod ni 'gro bar 'gyur bas na/ /de bzhin gshegs pa 'byung bar 'gyur/ /sta gon gnas mchog de nyid du/ /mchod dbul gtor ma btang byas te/ /ku sha'i sngas stan legs pa la/ /mi smra
191b3(rgyud 'grel): dge ba'i sems bcas kyis/ /seng ge'i nyal stabs legs pa yis/ /rmi lam mtshan ma brtag par bya/ /slob dpon nang du bzhugs mnyam bzhag /dkyil 'khor mchod cing bstod par bya/ /mthar mtshan ma bzang mthong na/ /yi rang dngos
191b4(rgyud 'grel): grub rab 'bring bstan/ /ngan pa'i ltas dag sbyin sreg dang/ /gtor ma sngags dang phyag rgyas bzlog /ba yi rnam lnga dri bsres chu/ /sngags kyis spyangs pas dag par bya/ /mkha' dbyings dbang phyug phyag rgya yis/ /gnas kun byin gyis
191b5(rgyud 'grel): brlab par bya/ /oM d+harmA d+hA tu swa b+hA ba At+ma ko haM/ /gser dngul zangs lcags la sogs pa'i/ /rin chen rgyan las byung ba 'am/ /'byor med sa las byas pa ru/ /bum pa mgrin ring lto ba zlum/ /nag po dri bral kha gyed can/ /dri zhim tshon dkar
191b6(rgyud 'grel): gyis byugs shing/ /pad+ma'i lta bas mtshan pas brgyan/ /grang bzhin tshogs pas legs gnas la/ /rigs kyi cho gas byin brlab cing/ /cha rig nyi shu rtsa bdun bsag /bum pa lha yi gnas yin te/ /kha brgyan mgul chings rta babs brgyan/ /gzungs
191b7(rgyud 'grel): thag thugs rje chen po'i rtags/ /sman lnga thugs rje byang chub sems/ /'bru rnams lha yi rang bzhin yin/ /rin chen rnam lnga sku yi 'ong/ /snying po ye shes thugs kyi dbyings/ /spos sogs tshul khrims yon tan rgyal/ /rang gi gnas su dgram byas nas/ /
192a1(rgyud 'grel): rigs kyi dkyil 'khor dgug gzhug rnams/ /dam tshig lha dang gnyis med par/ /mchod bstod bzlas pas mnyes byas te/ /brgya stong brgya lhag grangs tshad nas/ /sngags kyi chu dang gnyis med gyur/ /ras gtsang me
192a2(rgyud 'grel): tog bcal bkram zhing/ /shing bzangs lo ma 'bras bur bcas/ /rdo rje gzungs skud phreng bas mtshan/ /bgegs bskrad bdug mchog bsrung bar bya/ /dkyil 'khor bsgrubs pa'i rjes thogs la/ /rten rnams lha yi rim pas dgram/ /
192a3(rgyud 'grel): bskrad bsrung sbyang zhing tshe bzung la/ /byang nas g.yon skor sgo bzhir bzhag /mchod dang khrus kyi las dag kun/ /phyi mtshams khyams kyi gnas dag tu/ /las kun pa ni kun ldan pa/ /rnam rgyal rang gi gnas mchog mdzes/ /slob dpon mtshan
192a4(rgyud 'grel): nyid kun lhan zhing/ /rang gi lha yi sbyor ldan pas/ /shes rab mtshan ldan bcu gnyis brgyan/ /thig skud sar ba tshang ldan pas/ /sngags bcas lha mos bskal byas pa'i/ /ring thung dkyil 'khor nyis 'gyur la/ /spom phra sgo yi nyi shu ma/ /rin
192a5(rgyud 'grel): chen thod ba'i snod bzhag la/ /rigs kyi yi ge'i sngags kyis bskyed/ /swa tra mA tri kra ma hUM/ oM A hUM/ mig gi blta bas bkug byas pa'i/ /sangs rgyas rigs rnam gzhug par bya/ /nyi zla 'bar ba'i lcags kyu yis/ /gnyis med gcig tu gnas
192a6(rgyud 'grel): pa dag /mchod dgul bstod pas mnyes byas nas/ /gtso bo'i sngags brjod bsgril bar bya/ /oM di b+ha draMSh+Ti oM ku sha dza(rgyud 'grel): oM badzra sa ma yA sU tra mA ti kra ma hUM/ oM a(rgyud 'grel): hUM/ sgrub pa'i grogs mchog nus gnas pas/ /de nyid gsum gyis
192a7(rgyud 'grel): gsang sngags bzla/ /dza(rgyud 'grel): gdags gtso bo'i thugs ka nas/ /rang gi smin mtshams drang por 'dren/ /stobs mchog dpa' bo dgongs su gsol/ /rdo rje thig gi sgra ldan pas/ /nam mkha' i dkyil 'khor legs grub cing/ /'gro ba'i don la bskul
192b1(rgyud 'grel): bar mdzad/ /oM a n+yo n+ya a nu ga ta sarba d+harmA/ par spor a nu ga ta sarba d+harmA/ a tyan+ta a nu pra biSh+Tha sarba d+harmA hUM/ /grogs mchog rdo rje phyag rgya yis/ /dza gsum lte ba'i gnas su 'dren/ /rdo rje khu tshur sar bzhag cing/ /dang po'i thig skud gdab par bya/ /
192b2(rgyud 'grel): shar nub lho byang thig bzhi yis/ /logs dang mtshan su gdab par bya/ /dang po cha chen bcu drug las/ /khyams kyi snam bu ma gtogs pa/ /cha bran bzhi bzhi dgong byas pa/ /phyi nas bcu drug rta bab bsgo/ /rtsig pa brgyan pa cas g.yon pa nas/
192b3(rgyud 'grel): rab dur khrod ci rigs brtag /dbu ma rang gi rigs 'khor lo/ /dkyil 'khor so so'i cha bzhin pa'o/ /thig gdab cho ga rdzogs byas nas/ /ye shes skud pa mchod bstod cing/ /phyag rgya'i ting 'dzin gsang sngags kyis/ /rang gi gnas su
192b4(rgyud 'grel): gshegs su gsol/ /rigs kyi nga rgyal sbyor ldan pas/ /mig gnyis nyi zla'i blta ba yis/ /hi bcas sgo dang cha rnams dbye/ /oM badzra pe ka a kra ma hUM/ oM thams cad rnam 'phrul rang bzhin mchog /dngos med zhi ba'i 'od ldan gsal
192b5(rgyud 'grel): rdo rje 'dzin pa'i gter chen 'byin/ /dkyil 'khor dag par byin gyis rlabs/ /mnyam pa'i sngags blo rnams gsal bas/ /nyes pa'i zug rdu dag par 'gyur/ /dkyil 'khor thig gdab shes rab can/ /phyogs kun mnyam pa nyid 'grub cing//
192b6(rgyud 'grel): shar nub byang gi phyogs rnams su/ /thig bzhi btab pas dkyil 'khor brgyad/ /dkyil 'khor yang dag ji lta bar/ /rab tu brtag pas su zhig nus/ /rang gi lha'i rang bzhin gyis/ /dkyil 'khor brtag par 'grub par 'gyur/ /bdag nyid rang gi lhar
192b7(rgyud 'grel): sprar pas/ /dngos grub thams cad bsgrub par bya/ /chog lhag gam mchad na'ang/ /nyes pa med de 'grub par 'gyur/ /gru bzhi pa la sgo bzhi pa/ /tshad ldan rnam par phyed pa la/ /rnam 'khor phreng ba'i rabs mdzes/ /rta babs brgyad kyis rnams spras 
193a1(rgyud 'grel): shing/ /bar khyams cha chen gcig gi tshang/ /ka ba mchog brgyad gdung rnams la/ /so so'i mtshan ma'i phreng bas brgyan/ rin chen rdor sogs tog ger bcas/ /kun tu sna tshogs skal bzang ngo/ /kun tu sna tshogs
193a2(rgyud 'grel): 'khor lo can/ /kun tu sna tshogs grub pa'i phyir/ /dkyil 'khor kun tu sna tshogs pa'o/ /dkyil 'khor zlum po sangs rgyas kyi/ /rdo rje can gyi zla kham bzhin/ /pad+ma dbang gi padmo'i dbyibs/ /rin chen mchog gi rin chen dbyibs/ /ji ltar
193a3(rgyud 'grel): 'dod pa ci 'byor pa/ /ji lta'i dus dang ci bde bar/ /dkyil 'khor kun tu gnas pa dpal/ /rta mchog phyag rgya rdo rje'o/ /rin chen lnga sogs phye ma rnams/ /snod mdzes legs par blugs byas te/ /cho ga gsum gyis rigs kyi lha/ /spyan
193a4(rgyud 'grel): mig 'bar bas dgug byas te/ /rigs kyi dkyil 'khor gnyis med gzhug /mchod bstod rang gi gnas nas dbye/ /oM badzra tsi tra sa ma ya hUM/ /dkar po mthing kha dmar ser ljang/ /rigs drug so so'i dbye ba yis/ /pany+tsa rang gi
193a5(rgyud 'grel): go rims bzhin/ /byang shar mtshams nas brtsams nas ni/ /hUM brjod rdor 'dzin g.yon gyis bris/ re khA ma ya ma 'dres par/ /mchod dbul thod pas bkab nas ni/ /bden pa brjod cing blta bar bya/ /'di ni chos dbyings rnam
193a6(rgyud 'grel): par dag/ sems can khams ni rab sgrol byed/ /dpal ldan rgyal po che ge mo/ /de bzhin gshegs pa kun gyi gnas/ /yang dag bden pa'i byin rlabs kyis/ /dkyil 'khor las rnams shis par mdzod/ /thig ni phyi nas btab pa la/
193a7(rgyud 'grel): tshon rtsi nang nas dgyes par bya/ /dang po slob dpon gyis bri zhing/ /phyi nas ci bde shes pas bri/ /nyes pa kun las rnam grol bas/ /tshon gyi las ni yang dag brtsam/ /rtse gcig las su rung byas te/ /mtho zhing drang ba'i rgyan bcas
193b1(rgyud 'grel): pa'o/ /re khA dma' bas mi 'grub cing/ /yon pos gdung bskyed par byed/ /chad bas slob dpon slob ma dag /'chi 'am na bar 'gyur ba yin/ /lhag chad las ni nad 'byung zhing/ /phyogs 'khrul rmongs pa'i las su 'gyur/ /padmo so so'i gdan dag la/ /
193b2(rgyud 'grel): rigs kyi mtshan mas brgyan pa dang/ /kun tu sna tshogs bskal bzang po/ /rang 'byung rnams kyi mchan ma'i rgya/ /nam mkha' dbyings kyi mdza' klas pa'i/ /lha mo rnams kyi bde ba'i mchog /gzhu dang mda' dang de bzhin te/ /skal bzang de bzhin skal
193b3(rgyud 'grel): pa bzang/ /thod pa dang ni kha TwAM ga /rdo rje rgya gram de bzhin no/ /pad+ma rgya gram dpag med tshe'i/ /sangs rgyas kun gyi che sgrub pa/ /lha mo'i tshogs rnams thams cad kyi/ /mtshan ma'i phyag rgya'i tshogs bsgrubs nas/ /mda' dang de bzhin tshangs pa'i mgo /de
193b4(rgyud 'grel): bzhin 'khor ba'i phyag rgya dang/ /rdo rje dril bu phyag rgya'i mchog /dpag bsam shing gi lcug ma dang/ /padmo rta mgrin 'phang mtho ba/ /rta mgrin ljang gu de bzhin no/ /phag gi mche ba grub pa dang/ /zla ba nyi ma de bzhin te/ /rin chen sna tshogs snod
193b5(rgyud 'grel): chen du/ /sangs rgyas kun gyi ra sa yin/ /thams cad bdag nyid myong skal bzang/ /mtshan ma'i phyag rgya'i tshogs gzhan no/ /gling bu dang ni pi waM dang/ /ku mu ta dang muny+tsa ra/ /me tog bdug pa mar me dang/ /sna tshogs dri rnams de bzhin no/ /
193b6(rgyud 'grel): rim bzhin snying po sngags bcas pas/ /rang rang mtshan ma sngags bcas dgong/ /mtshams bzhir bum pa gang ba bzhi/ /bdud rtsi lnga yi thod par bcas/ /rgyan bcas mchod pa ma lus pa/ /phyogs mtshams steng 'og gnas su dgod/ /chos
193b7(rgyud 'grel): gos dang ni lhung bzed dang/ /de bzhin du ni mkhar gsil dang/ /dam pa'i chos kyi glegs bam dag /mtshan ma'i phyag rgya'i tshogs gzhan no/ /de bzhin lce'i phyag rgya dang/ /cha lang dang ni rnga yab dang/ /rdo rje dang ni rin chen sgron/ /mtshan ma'i phyag
194a1(rgyud 'grel): rgya'i tshogs gzhan no/ /de bzhin sangs rgyas gzugs brnyan dang/ /me long dang ni rlung yab dang/ /rdo rje ser po sprin dang bcas/ /de bzhin mig gi phyag rgya'o/ /lha mo rdo rje glang sogs kyang/ /'khor lo'i mtshan mas bsgyur te
194a2(rgyud 'grel): dgod/ /rdo rje 'bar ba kha TwAM ga/ thod pa kham phor de bzhin no/ /dmar chen po dang snying chen po/ /sha chen po yang de bzhin no/ /rnon po mda' dang de bzhin 'dren/ /chang dang chu yang de bzhin te/ /lcug ma rlung gis bskyod pa dang/ /ras dang de
194a3(rgyud 'grel): bzhin me dag dang/ /rdo rje 'bar ba kha TwAM ga /gzhu dang kha TwAM dril bur bcas/ /'khor lo rtse brgyad rnon pa dang/ /sna tshogs ba dang dril bur bcas/ /me tog sa sogs lha mo brgyad/ /rdo rje sems dpa' i dkyil 'khor bzhin/ /pad+ma sna tshogs
194a4(rgyud 'grel): dmar po dang/ /mthing kha ser po le brgan dag /pad+ma'i mtshan mchog rnam pa bdun/ /pad+ma'i snying po bud med brgya/ /de bzhin chos kyi 'khor lo dang/ /bsad cing bsal bskyed rdo rje dag /pad+ma'i mtshan ma'i tshogs gzhan no/ /padmo dmar
194a5(rgyud 'grel): po tri shu la/ /pad+ma sna tshogs 'khor lo che/ /pad+ma ser po chu srin rgyal/ /pad+ma le brgan rdor rtse lnga/ /gling bu la sogs pad+mas mtshan/ /bcu gnyis la sogs dgod par bya/ /gzhu dang mda' dang ral gri dang/ /de bzhin du ni 'bar ba'i me/ /dbang

194a7(rgyud 'grel): brgyad/ /de bzhin sna tshogs pad+ma dang/ /rdo rje rgya gram de bzhin te/ /mtshan ma'i phyag rgya grub pa gnyis/ /dkyil 'khor gang gi gnas zhugs pa/ /lha mo'i mtshan ma rab bstan te/ /khyad par las kyi mtshan ma dang/ /yi ge'i rigs kyis brgyan

194b2(rgyud 'grel): in+d+ra nI la'o/ /rta babs rgyan bcas mtshan ma'i tshogs/ /nyi shu rtsa lnga'i mtshan dang ldan/ /pad+ma rdo rje me 'od kyi/ /kha dog rang bzhin rnam par gnas/ /dur khrod phyogs mdog khyad par dang/ /thun mong dbye bas rnam bstan pa'o/ /'dod 'byung
194b3(rgyud 'grel): bdud rtsi'i mdog can la/ /phyi yi ra ba bai DUrya/ /de ni sna tshogs bum pa dang/ /mchod pa'i tshogs mang rab dgod cing/ /rgyan sogs phreng bas mdzes byas pa/ /sna tshogs me tog sngags bcas dgram/ /me tog dkar dang dmar ba dang/ /mthing
194b4(rgyud 'grel): kha ser bo kun bsdus pa/ /me tog phyag rgya mchog 'di ni/ /'dod pa'i yon tan lnga la spro/ /rgya skyegs mthing kha ljang gu'i tshogs/ /tshon sna lnga yis btsos pa dang/ /dkar po lnga yi phyag rgya dang/ /snga ma bzhin du mnyam par 'grub/ /khams las
194b5(rgyud 'grel): byung ba thams cad dang/ /srog dang rtsa ba de bzhin te/ /rnam par mdzes shing dri zhim pa/ /snga ma bzhin du mnyam par 'grub/ /tsan dan gnyis dang kla rtsi dang/ /ga bur nag la la ti/ /'dug pa bu ram dang sbyar ba/ /las rnams thams cad las 'grub pa'o//
194b6(rgyud 'grel): gar dang tri dang gu gul dang/ /sardza ga bur gla rtsi dang/ /rdzas 'di dag las btsos pa'i mar/ /mar me byas na snang ba skyed/ /tsan dan gur gum pri ka dang/ /ga bur dang ni gla rtsi dag /btsos pa'i bdug pa bsgrub pa ste/ /spos kyi phyag rgya spos mchog
194b7(rgyud 'grel): 'gyur/ /ka ko la dang sug smel dang/ /'di rnams zhib tu btags pa ni/ /seng ldeng bu ram dag dang sbyor/ /shing tsa pa Ta lo ma dang/ /na le sham dang ga bur sbyar/ /he sa ka ri'i shing mar gyis/ /sbrus pa kha yi spos yin no/ /me tog dkar bo sangs rgyas la/ /
195a1(rgyud 'grel): rdo rje can la sna tshogs pa/ /'jig rten dbang la kha dog dkar/ /ser po mkha' las byung ba la/ /tsan dan bdug pa sangs rgyas la/ /rdo rje can la du ru ka/ /spyan ras gzigs la ka pi ta/ /lce phog rdo rje nyi ma la/ /mar me'i phreng ba

195a3(rgyud 'grel): me tog phreng dang bdug pa kun/ /de bzhin mar me thams cad dang/ /spos rnams thams cad ji snyed pa/ /rdo rje can la dbul du rung/ /bsrung ba'i 'khor lo'i cho ga yis/ /dkyil 'khor rdzas bcas bsrung byas nas/ /sta gon nam mkha' bteg
