195a7(rgyud 'grel): gru bzhi bar khyams sgo dang bcas/ /rin chen phreng ba'i rgyan tshogs mdzes/ /gtso bo'i mdun du lha chen po/ /ka las byung ba drag po yi/ mig gsum tri shul dgra sta dang/ /ral gri thod pa sha khrag bcas/ /sngo skya thod ba zhags pas dkris
195b1(rgyud 'grel): nyi zla rin chen phreng bas mdzes/ /dbu ma ljang skya thod pa thogs/ /na ra'i rgyan bcas rnams khril gnas/ /g.yas su tshangs pa oM las byung/ gser mdog gdong bzhi phreng bas mdzes/ /khams gsum skyob tshul rnam 'grub ma/ /mdzes ma kun
195b2(rgyud 'grel): gzugs rin chen 'dzin/ /dbang po mig stong a las byung/ /rdo rje rtse gsum zla 'dra'i mdangs/ /'dod pa'i longs spyod kun la rol/ /sha tsi dkar mo rin chen dang/ /g.yon du ha las khyab 'jug ste/ /nag po drag chen khros pa'i gzugs/ /'khor lo rtse 
195b3(rgyud 'grel): gsum mda' dang gzhu/ /gzugs chen chen mo pad+ma'i mdog /'dod dbang dam pa las byung ba'i/ /ser skya sna tshogs rgyan gos can/ /snang ba'i mda''dzin mos pa'i dpung/ /drag mo gnas rgyal rin chen skyes/ /kun kyang rang rigs g.yog 'khor
195b4(rgyud 'grel): dang/ /stan dang longs spyod tshogs bcas pa'o/ /dbang po dkar skya rtse gsum 'dzin/ /gshin rje sngo gnag thong dbyug gdengs/ /chu lha dmar ser zhags pa thogs/ /gnod sbyin ljang gu in+d+ra nIr/ /dbang ldan ser skya rin chen mdzod/ /me lha dmar
195b5(rgyud 'grel): ser bgrang phreng bum/ /rlung lha dung kha ba dang phreng/ /bden bral ljang sngon rin chen dbyig /rgyan bcas bzhon pa chung ma'i tshogs/ /las mdzad g.yog 'khor bran dang bcas/ /sgo bzhi nyi ma zla ba'i lha/ /sa bdag sa yi lha mo gnas/ /rang mdog mtshan
195b6(rgyud 'grel): ma rgyan dang ldan/ /g.yog 'khor bzhon pa'i gnas la 'khod/ /lho phyogs dkyil 'khor zur gsum gnag /gru gsum zla gam khyams dang snod/ /mdun du las dag mkha' 'gro ma/ /g.yas su rdo rje rin chen ma/ g.yon du pad+ma sna tshogs ma'i/ /mkha' 
195b7(rgyud 'grel): 'gro lnga rnams 'jigs pa'i tshul/ /phyogs bzhi mchams kyi khyams dag la/ /dur khrod mkha' 'gro chen mo brgyad/ /sgo bzhi'i gnas bsrungs drag mo'i tshogs/ /ru lu ru lu'i sgra 'don ma/ /kun kyang b+hyo las rnam 'phrul zhing/ /mdog
196a1(rgyud 'grel): nag gri gug thod pa thogs/ /mi yi thod phreng legs pas mtshan/ /dam tshig mtshan ma g.yog 'khor bcas/ /nub kyi pad+ma dmar po la/ /klu brgyad yi ge phu las byung/ /sna tshogs sprul mgo gdengs ka can/ /phyogs
196a2(rgyud 'grel): mdog rin chen snyem dang/ /bcas pa'i thal mos phyogs su gus/ /nor bu'i rgyan phreng chung ma dang/ /longs spyod g.yog 'khor bcas pa yis/ /rang gi las bzhin rnam par spyod/ /byang du maN+Dal 'byung chen dbyibs/ /ser po bar khyams
196a3(rgyud 'grel): drug pa la/ /a nri su tri pri du las/ /'gro ba drug po ma lus pa/ /sgo bzhir 'byung po ma lus rnams/ /gzugs bzhag ring ba mi sdug dgod/ /rang rig sngags dang phyag rgya yis/ /sbyang zhing byin brlabs sku rdzogs par/ /byas nas rang rig
196a4(rgyud 'grel): bdag pos brgyan/ /rang gi rigs las rnam par dag /sgeg po dang ni na chung dang/ /mos dang de bzhin bdud rtsi dang/ /gcig pu dpa' dang 'dod chags sra/ /g.yon can bram mo de bzhin te/ /lan tsha la sogs ro kun dang/ /ka ra la sogs bdud
196a5(rgyud 'grel): rtsi sbyin/ /ma lus lus pa med par 'grub/ /sha dang chang du ldan pa yi/ /a mra la sogs tshig gur bcug /ha sa ka ri mar la sogs/ /mnyam pa'i dri yis bsku bar bya/ /spung dang rgya skyegs la sogs pa'i/ /tshon gyis mthun par kha bsgyur
196a6(rgyud 'grel): nas/ /shun pa grog la sogs byas/ /mchod pa'i che na dbul bar bya/ /sangs rgyas rnams la spos dbul pa/ /sha dang chang dang rnam par spang/ /klu dang sil snyan grub pa dang/ /gdugs dang rgyal mtshan ba dan dang/ /sha dang chang du bcas
196a7(rgyud 'grel): par mi / /gtor ma'i mchod rten sna tshogs pa'o/ /bdag gi dbang phyug skal bzang po/ /rdo rje las ni dpal grub pa'o/ /bshos dang gtor ma dkar po dang/ /pad+ma'i me tog ldan pa ni/ /spyan ras gzigs dbang gtso bo la/ /phul nas dgos pa thams
196b1(rgyud 'grel): cad 'grub/ /rgyal po kha zas sna tshogs pa/ /sha dang chang du ldan pa dag /glu dang sil snyan skal bzang kun/ /rdo rje nyi ma'i 'khor la dbul/ /kha zas kun gyi ro rnams dang/ /sha dang sha yi mchog rnams dang/ /sha yi sbyor ba sha skam tshogs/ /bshos
196b2(rgyud 'grel): dag rdo rje rta la dbul/ /thod pa snod du sbyar ba yi/ /bza' btung bca' ba sna tshogs rnams/ /ha ho(rgyud 'grel): h+rI yis bsregs sbyang brlab/ /mgron tshogs rnams la bsngo bar bya/ /mchod pa rdzas chen ma lus pa/ /dang po dri yis chus sbyangs pa/ /sna tshogs
196b3(rgyud 'grel): sgra rnyan ba dang tshogs/ /bkod pa'i mchod gtor byin brlabs spel/ /sangs rgyas rdo rje sems dpa' sogs/ /rta mchog gzugs su sprul byas nas/ /mchod pa'i tshe na dbul bar bya/ /mgron gyi tshogs rnams bsdu bar bya/ /oM badzra sa ma ye/ i a
196b4(rgyud 'grel): ra laM b+hyo a a dza dza/ 'khor bcas bsdus pas 'ongs pa dang/ /dam tshig phyag rgya rnam gsum bstan/ /oM badzra gu hya dri sh+ya sa ma ya stwaM/ oM badzra gu dri tya ho sa ma ya ho oM badzra gu hya dri sh+ya ho sa ma ya phaT/ e daM puShpe d+hU pe dI paM gand+he/ pU dza spha ra Na arg+haM pa liM khA hi/ yaM

196b7(rgyud 'grel): rtsi bkug byas te/ /rdo rje bzhugs nas snod bzang bltam/ /zla 'dra 'od zer lnga bcas pas/ /dkyil 'khor tshogs bcas mnyes par bya/ /oM 'jig rten kun gyi gtso mdzad pa'i/ /'jigs chen dregs byed stobs ldan pa/ /bde gshegs sras
197a1(rgyud 'grel): mchog bran mdzad pa'i/ /byang chub sems ldan snying rje can/ /dbang phyug chen po chung mar bcas/ /de bzhin khyab 'jug tshangs pa dang/ /brgya byin 'dod khams chung mar bcas/ /lha chen 'khor dang bcas tshogs dang/ /phyogs skyong
197a2(rgyud 'grel): brgyad po 'khor bcas dang/ /klu chen brgyad po 'khor bcas dang/ /mkha' 'gro drug po gsum 'dzin ma/ /dur khrod ma mo'i tshogs bcas dang/ /gzhan yang lha srin sde brgyad dang/ /mkha' 'gro drug po 'khor bcas rnams/ /sku gsung thugs

197a4(rgyud 'grel): 'gro chen mo'i 'khor bcas rnams/ /rnal 'byor sgrub pa'i grogs mdzod cing/ /las mdzad rdo rje bran mdzad pas/ /zhi rgyas dbang drag las grub cing/ /theg chen gsang sngags bsrung ba dang/ /nang dang gdon sogs zhi ba dang/ /tshe dang bkra shis spel

200b7(rgyud 'grel): gzugs lugs ma la sogs rnams/ /gzhi rten sbyor ba'i ting 'dzin gyis/ /rang rig lha yi rnam par bsam/ /phyag rgya bzhi yis bstan par bya/ /pu ti rigs kyi lha nyid las/ /gsung sogs yi ge'i rnam par gyur/ /mchod rten la sogs
201a1(rgyud 'grel): bzhir bcas pa/ /mos pa'i lha rnams gang yang rung/ /dza(rgyud 'grel): hUM baM ho(rgyud 'grel): 'i sbyor ba yis/ /lha rnams brtan par bzhugs su gsol/ /mchod cing bstod pas mnyes pa dang/ /sngags mang brjod cing na bza' g.yog /de nas snga dro'i dus
201a2(rgyud 'grel): su ni/ /snga ma'i sbyor bcas tshig gis bskul/ /bzhengs gsol gos sogs bsal byas nas/ /sngar bzhin sgom bzlas mchod sogs bya/ /ji ltar bltam ma thag tu ni/ /de bzhin gshegs kun khrus gsol ba/ /lha yi chu ni dag pa
201a3(rgyud 'grel): yis/ /de bzhin bdag gis sku khrus gsol/ /oM sarba ta thA ga ta sa ma ya sh+rI ye hUM/ /dri med ras kyis rlan phyis shing/ /dri zhim rdzas kyis byug par bya/ /dngul snod mang dkar sbrang rtsis bkang/ /gser thur rtser blangs spyan la byung/ /
201a4(rgyud 'grel): oM tsak+Shu sa man+ta tsak+Shu bi sho d+ha ni swAhA/ me yi bsreg khang bzang po ru/ /rgyas pa'i sbyin sreg dbul bar bya/ /oM ru ru sphu ru dzwa la tiSh+Tha sid+d+ha lo tsa na sarbArtha sA d+hA ne swA hA/ oM me lha'i me tog shin tu dmar/ /lha yi dri yis nye bar
201a5(rgyud 'grel): byugs so/ /me tog bzang po 'di bzhes la/ /gnas 'di nyid du bzhugs su gsol/ /oM mar me 'od bzang 'bar ba ni/ /ngan 'gro'i mun pa 'joms byed la/ /lha yi mig 'byed dam pa 'di/ /bdag la dgongs te bzhes su gsol/ /oM tsan
201a6(rgyud 'grel): dan gur gum sbyar ba yi/ /dri mchog bdug pa 'di bzhes la/ /dbang po'i sgo rnams tshim pa'i mchog /byin gyis rlobs pa bzhes su gsol/ /oM sna tshogs lha yi dri ldan pa/ /sna tshogs ga pur gyis ni brgyan/ /sna tshogs hUM las
201a7(rgyud 'grel): yang dag byung/ /dri mchog 'di dag bzhes su gsol/ /oM kha dog dri dang ror ldan pa'i/ /bza' ba'i bye brag sna tshogs rnams/ /zhal zas thams cad phun sum tshogs/ /'gro ba'i don du bzhes su gsol/ /oM badzra puShpe A(rgyud 'grel): hUM/ oM badzra
201b1(rgyud 'grel): d+hU paM A hUM/ oM badzra gand+he A(rgyud 'grel): hUM/ oM badzra nai be tya A hUM/ oM dpag bsam shing sogs rgyu las byung/ /lha yin bza' nir na 'phags/ /btso ma gser gyi mdog dang mtshungs/ /sna tshogs rin chen rgyan sogs dbul/ /oM badzra sa ma ye
201b2(rgyud 'grel): swAhA/ /de nas mchod pa'i rol mo'i tshogs/ /sna tshogs rnam par dbul bya zhing/ /dga' ba'i glu dang dbyangs kyis dbul/ /bkra shis 'don zhing bskor ba bya/ /dbang bskur lnga yi cho ga yis/ /byin brlabs bskyed de brtan par bya/ /sbyin

206a2(rgyud 'grel): sangs rgyas rdo rje rin chen phyed/ /rdo rje'i rigs la rdo rje yin/ /spyan ras gzigs kyi sangs rgyas sku/ /nor bu 'dzin gyi nor bu yin/ /sangs rgyas rin chen padmo dang/ /rdo rje nor bu de bzhin du/ /thams cad mchog ni rta mchog la/ /rang gi dbang bskur
206a3(rgyud 'grel): bsdus pa'o/ /blugs pa dang ni byas pa dang/ /brdung ba 'am yang na bris pa'ang rung/ /sna tshogs rab tu legs pa yis/ /mtshan ma'i phyag rgya rab tu brtag /sangs rgyas rin chen dbang bskur bas/ ji lta bar ni dbang bskur ro/ /oM sangs rgyas
206a4(rgyud 'grel): kun gyis bsngags pa yi/ /rin chen las byung dbu rgyan che/ /thor gtsug dbu rgyan gyis brgyan pa'i/ /dar dbyangs dbang bskur sbyin par bya/ /oM badzra barta ka badzra a ra li ho/ /a b+hi Shiny+tsa traM/ mnyam nyid ye shes rang bzhin gyi/ /nyi
206a5(rgyud 'grel): ma'i ngo bo dbu rgyan no/ /rdo rje rtse lnga byin brlabs pa/ /g.yas pa slob ma'i snying gar btug /'di ni sangs rgyas thams cad kyi/ /rdo rje gsang ba chen po'i don/ /de ring khyod la dbang bskur te/ /rab tu grub phyir gzung bar bgyis/ /oM badzra satwa
206a6(rgyud 'grel): twaM a b+hi Shiny+tsa mi/ /slar nyid slob ma'i lag g.yas gtad/ /lan gsum gtod de thugs kar bzung/ /thog mdza' med pa'i sems dpa' ni/ /rdo rje sems dpa' dga' ba che/ /kun tu bzang po kun bdag nyid/ /rdo rje snyems bdag bdag po'i
206a7(rgyud 'grel): bdag /kun rtog ye shes rang bzhin gyi/ /gar dbang ngo bo rdo rje'i dbang/ /dril bu mdun bzhag byin brlabs te/ /dkrol zhing slob ma'i lag g.yon gtad/ /'di ni rnal 'byor ma tshogs kyi/ shes rab dbyangs kyi rjes 'gror bshad/ /khyod kyis
206b1(rgyud 'grel): rtag tu bcang bar bya/ /byang chub mchog tu rgyal ba bzheng/ /oM a d+hi pa ti stwaM/ a b+hi Shiny+tsa mi/ srid pa ngo bo nyid kyis dag /ngo bo nyid kyis srid bral byas/ /rang bzhin dag pa'i sems dpa' rnams/ /srid pa'i dam pa byed par 'gyur/ /bya ba'i
206b2(rgyud 'grel): ye shes rang bzhin gyi/ /rta mchog ngo bo dril bu'i dbang/ /rdo rje dril bu bsnol ba'i phyag /sbyir bcas slob ma'i mgo bor bzhag /gang phyir chos rnams rnam dag pas/ /sangs rgyas ye shes rab bzhin nyid/ /dbang po'i sbyod lam gang dang
206b3(rgyud 'grel): gang/ /bde mchog sgyu ma'i dkyil 'khor nyid/ /oM sh+rI che ge mo a b+hi Shiny+tsa mAM/ badzra nA ma a b+hi She ka ta ya ho/ chos dbyings ye shes rang bzhin gyi/ /rnam snang ngo bo ming gi dbang/ /sangs rgyas thams cad mnyam sbyor ba'i/ /mkha' 'gro ma
206b4(rgyud 'grel): yi tshig gis kyang/ /rgyas mi thebs shing mi smos te/ /de la gnod par mi 'gyur ro/ /de nas mna' ni bsngags byas nas/ /sangs rgyas thams cad mthun pa yi/ /mchog tu rtag pa'i bka' stsal te/ /dam tshig sdom pa sbyin par bya/ /sangs rgyas
206b5(rgyud 'grel): thams cad mnyam sbyor ba'i/ /sdom pa nyams par khyod byed pa/ /ji snyed sangs rgyas thams cad dang/ /byang chub sems dpa' rdo rje 'dzin/ /lha rnams dang ni mi dag dang/ /de bzhin rnal 'byor sgrub pa po/ /de dag la ni snying rings nas/ /snying las 
206b6(rgyud 'grel): khrag chen brdung bar 'gyur/ /sems can khams ni ma lus don/ /srid pa shin tu dag bya'i phyir/ /mi 'gog chos nyid sbyor ba yis/ /rtag pa nyid ni sgrub par bya/ /rang gi ngo bo yongs spangs shing/ /dka' thub kyis ni gzir mi bya/ /ci bde bar ni
206b7(rgyud 'grel): bde bar sbyar/ /'di ni phyi dus sangs rgyas yin/ /rnal 'byor longs spyod thams cad pa/ /cis kyang mi 'jigs dga' bar gyis/ /sdig pa med kyis khyed ma 'jigs/ dam tshig 'da' bar dka' ba'o/ /mgon khyod thugs rje'i rang bzhin gyis/ /dkyil
207a1(rgyud 'grel): 'khor slob dpon dbang bskur sogs/ /bdag gzhan don gyi bya ba rnams/ /grub byed dbang bskur bdag la stsal/ /rdo rje dril bu phyag rgya che/ /zung zhig yang dag gzung bar gyis/ /de ring rdo rje slob dpon che/ /slob ma'i tshogs rnams
207a2(rgyud 'grel): bzung bar gyis/ /'di ni sangs rgyas thams cad kyi/ /rdo rje sems dpa' i phyag rgya gnas/ /rtag tu khyod kyis kyang bzung ste/ /phyag na rdo rje'i brtul zhugs brtan/ /oM sarba ta thA ga ta badzra sa ya tiSh+Tha e Sha twaM b+ha ra ya mi/ hi hi hi hi hUM/ 'di de sangs
207a3(rgyud 'grel): rgyas thams cad kyi/ /shes rab dbyangs kyi rjes 'gror bshad/ /khyod kyis kyang ni rtag tu bcang/ /byang chub mchog tu rgyal bas bskyed/ /oM mahA badzra hUM/ oM badzra gaN+DE a/ yid kyi lus ni brtan pa'i phyir/ /dam tshig phyag rgya zhes byar brjod/ /
207a4(rgyud 'grel): lus kun brtan byed gang zhig ni/ /phyag rgya rab tu grags pa yin/ /oM mahA kA ya bA k+tsit+ta mahA sa ma ya hUM/ mchod tshogs gar bskor bstod dang bcas/ /dgyes pa'i brtul zhugs dbang chog go /sems dpa' i nga rgyal rnal 'byor las/ /sems
207a5(rgyud 'grel): bcas? me tog phreng 'phang bya/ /der nas brtsams te rdzogs sangs rgyas/ /sras bcas kun nas rnam par rol/ /rdo rje sems sogs rab sbyor bas/ /bdag bstod pa de chen mched pa mdzod/ /oM badzra lA sya hUM/ sgeg dang bcas pas phreng ba 'phang/
207a6(rgyud 'grel): sangs rgyas thams cad mchod par bya/ /bcom ldan kun du mi 'bral te/ /phreng ba de yi rgyan yin no/ /mA lye hUM/ lus can kun la dam chos kyi/ /glu dbyangs snyan pa'i tshig brjod pas/ /bde bar gshegs pa'i dngos grub mchog /myur
207a7(rgyud 'grel): du bde ba myong bar 'gyur/ /gi badzra gAM ti hUM/ /gar bcas thal mo sbyor ba yis/ /sangs rgyas thams cad bsdu bar byos/ /sangs rgyas thams cad 'dus pa'i 'phrin las kyi/ /gar dbang tshul bzhin bsgyur bar gyis/ /oM badzra nI tyai hUM/ /rdzogs
207b1(rgyud 'grel): sangs rgyas la spos 'bul ma/ /brtul zhugs bzang pos legs par tshim/ /lus can bde gshegs cha 'dra bar/ /ye shes can gyis tshim par gyis/ /oM badzra d+hu pe hUM/ me tog sangs rgyas rnams su 'thor/ /byang chub yan lag tshogs
207b2(rgyud 'grel): pa'i sgo/ /mtshan bzang dpe byad kun ldan pa'i/ /bde bar gshegs pa'i sku thob 'gyur/ /b+h+ruM badzra puShpe hUM/ /chos kyi mig 'byed sgrol gsal bas/ /rdo rje chos dang 'dra ba ru/ /sems can ma rig mun thoms pa'i/ /ye shes snang ba gsal
207b3(rgyud 'grel): bar gyis/ /pra badzra A lo ke hUM/ rgyal ba rnams la dri sbyor zhing/ /tshul khrims phung po shes rab dang/ /rnam grol ye shes mthong ba yis/ /byang chub lus can rnams la byug /a badzra gand+he hUM/ bdag gzhan don grub las kyi tshogs//
207b4(rgyud 'grel): thun mong 'bring po tshogs gyur pa'i/ /zhi rgyas dbang dang dgug pa dang/ sdang gnod nges pa'i las kun dang/ /'byed rmongs bskrad pa'i cho ga rnams/ /thogs pa med par bsgrub par gyis/ /ral gri mig sman sa 'og dang/ /thogs med mi dbyibs
207b5(rgyud 'grel): skas 'dzeg cing/ /gser 'gyur ri lu nyi zla gzung/ /char dbab la sogs las kyi tshogs/ /rnam shes bsgrub dang ye shes bsgrub/ /phyag rgya shes pa'i dngos grub dang/ /thams cad bsgrub cing grol ba yi/ /don nyid yang dag grol bar
207b6(rgyud 'grel): gyis/ /rgyal ba kun gyi gnas 'jug cing/ /sku gsung thugs mchog yon tan rgyas/ /phrin las gzhan dag sbyor ba yi/ /mkha' 'gro sgyu ma'i dngos grub gnang/ /ji ltar mig mkhan rgyal po yis/ /'jig rten ling tog bsal ba ltar//
207b7(rgyud 'grel): bu khyod kyi ni mi shes pa yi/ /rab rib rgyal ba rnams skyis bsal/ /oM badzra mre tra a pa ha ra phaT laM b+ha h+rI/ /chos rnams gzugs brnyan lta bu ste/ /dag cing gsal la dri ma med/ /gzung du med cing brjod du med/ /rgyu dang las las
208a1(rgyud 'grel): kun du 'byung/ /rang bzhin med cing bdag med pa/ /chos rnams de bzhin shes bgyis la/ /sems can don la yang dag byos/ /'on kyang sangs rgyas rigs su skyes/ /thams cad nam mkha' i mtshan nyid de/ /nam mkha' la
208a2(rgyud 'grel): yang mtshan nyid med/ /nam mkha' dang mnyam sbyor ba yis/ /kun mchog mnyam pa nyid du gsal/ /rdo rje sems dpa' me long bzhin/ /dag cing bsal la rtog pa med/ /bu khyod kyi ni snying la zhugs/ /rdo rje sems dpa' rang nyid gtso/ /
208a3(rgyud 'grel): rigs kyi yi ge mtshan ldan pa'i/ /mnga' 'phang pa dang 'khor lo gnon/ /g.yas par dung gi sgra 'byin zhing/ /g.yon par rang gi glegs bam mo/ /oM pha rol phyin drug las rnams kyis/ /sems can kun don rab sbyor zhing/ /'khor ba'i
208a4(rgyud 'grel): rgyun gcod mya ngan 'das/ /chos kyi 'khor lo chen po bskor/ /the tshom rtog tshogs gcod mdzad pa'i/ /chos kyi dung ni sgra sgrogs shing/ /gsang sngags snying po'i gsang chen 'di/ /snod ldan kun la rab tu shod/ /des ni rgyal ba thams
208a5(rgyud 'grel): cad la/ /phan thogs drin du gzo zhes bya/ /mkha' 'gro sgyu ma'i dkyil 'khor gyis/ /khyod la rtag tu srung bar mdzod/ /mdor na 'jig rten khams rnams su/ /sems can kun gyi don gyi phyir/ /ji ltar 'dul ba sna tshogs su/ /rdo rje'i
208a6(rgyud 'grel): 'khor lo bskor du gsol/ /rdo rje gnas su bde gshegs rin/ /padmo las kyi rjes su gnas/ /'di ltar nga yis khyod lung bstan/ /rdo rje dpal ldan gsang ba'i bdag /dngos po mchog tu sgrub pa'i phyir/ /srid pa'i ngan 'gro rnams las grol/ /
208a7(rgyud 'grel): kye che ge mo zhes bya ba ni/ /de bzhin gshegs pa b+hur b+hu ba swa:/ /dus gsum rgyal ba thams cad kyis/ /dus gcig tu ni lung bstan pas/ /phyag rgya chen po'i sngags bcas mthus/ /skad cig dus kyi lung bstan mdzad/ /'dod
208b1(rgyud 'grel): chags bral ba lta bu'i sdig /khams gsum na ni gzhan med de/ /de bas 'dod la chags bral bar/ /khyod kyis nam yang bya ma yin/ /ma hA sa ma ya hUM/ di ring dkyil 'khor slob dpon gyur/ /sngags sogs rgyud rnams 'dzin par gyur/ /sangs
208b2(rgyud 'grel): rgyas byang chub sems dpa' dang/ /lha rnams kun gyis mthun par bsrungs/ /sems can kun la snying brtse bas/ /dkyil 'khor cho ga bzhin du bris/ /rtse gcig nan tan bskyed nas ni/ /sgrub pa po rnams rgyud la sbyor/ /mchog tu gsar
208b3(rgyud 'grel): pa'i dkyil 'khor 'dir/ /zhugs shing mthong la sogs pa yis/ /sdig pa kun las grol 'gyur zhing/ /khyed rnams rab tu dgyes par gnas/ /bde chen theg pa 'di la ni/ /phyin kyang 'chi ba yod med cing/ /mtshungs med thub par mi 'gyur te/
208b4(rgyud 'grel): cis kyang mi 'jigs dga' bar gyis/ /srid pa kun tu dag pas na/ /srid pa'i sdug bsngal las 'das so/ /byang chub sems ni yongs mi spang/ /rdo rje zhes bya'i phyag rgya ste/ /gang zhig bskyed pa tsam gyis ni/ /sangs rgyas nyid 'gyur the tshom
208b5(rgyud 'grel): med/ /dam pa'i chos dag mi smad cing/ /ma gus spang zhing dor mi bya/ /mi shes snod min rmongs pa la/ /nam yang bstan par mi bya'o/ /rdo rje dril bu mi spang ste/ /slob dpon dag la gus par gyis/ /khams gsum gyi ni rgyal srid che/ /
208b6(rgyud 'grel): bdag por rgyal chen dbang bskur zhing/ /bdud rnams thams cad las rgyal bas/ /grong khyer mchog tu zhugs pa yin/ /'de yis khyed rnams dus 'di ru/ /sangs rgyas thob par the tshom med/ /dbang bskur rjes thob dbugs phyung bas/ /
208b7(rgyud 'grel): slob ma yon 'byung rgyal por 'gyur/ /slob dpon blo gros dam tshig ldan/ /brtan g.yo'i mdza' las rnam par grol/ /lam mchog 'jug sogs dbugs dbyung ste/ /dal ba'i gnas ngan kun tu spangs/ /rigs kyi 'khor gang yin pa
209a1(rgyud 'grel): yi/ /brten pa'i dkyil 'khor de bzhin nyid/ /rten gnas khang brgyan bcas pa'i/ /rnam dag rang bzhin rgyan bstan cing/ /bskyed pa'i las lam bye brag sogs/ /slob dpon phyogs gcig nas 'jug pa'i/ /rig pa'i yan
209a2(rgyud 'grel): lag rgyud don bzhin/ /slob dpon dbang bskur don du bstan/ /de nas sna tshogs rgyan rnams dang/ /mchod pa kun dang gtor ma kun/ /snga ma bzhin du phul byas te/ /dkyil 'khor lha rnams bstod par bya/ /kun tu sna tshogs bla ma la
209a3(rgyud 'grel): yon mchog bdag gis dbul bar bya/ /gang la yongs su gtang dka' ba/ /de ni mchog tu bshad pa yin/ /gang dang gang ni sdug pa'i mchog /yang na shin tu khyad par can/ /de dang de ni bla ma la/ /de ni zad par 'dod pas dbul/ /yang na
209a4(rgyud 'grel): de ni 'dod gyur pa 'am/ /'on te sems la bgos pa dag /de bzhin yang na dgos par bya/ /de ni chung yang mchog yin no/ /gal te de la mchog bdog la/ /de yang ngan pa'i yon dbul na/ /kun gyi slob dpon brnyas pas na/ /de ni rtag tu
209a5(rgyud 'grel): sdug bsngal thob/ /bu mo shin tu brgyan pa 'am /de bzhin chung ma sdug pa dag /phul nas rin gyis rlu ba ni/ /sangs rgyas byang chub mchog gi yon/ /mi chen dag ni phul nas su/ /slar yang rin gyis slu ba ni/ /rdo rje 'dzin la dpal sbyor
209a6(rgyud 'grel): ba/ /yon de mchog gi yon yin no/ /mu tig zangs dang nor bu dang/ /shin tu dkar dang ras zung dang/ /de bzhin rta ni dkar po dang/ /pad+ma can gyi yon mchog yin/ /rgyal srid longs spyod gter rnams dang/ /gos dang rgyan gyi tshogs rnams
209a7(rgyud 'grel): dang/ /de bzhin mchod pa thams cad dang/ /rdo rje nyi ma'i yon yin no/ /rta mchog shin tu brgyan pa dang/ /shing rta rin chen bkang ba dag /rta yi rgyal po'i yon yin no/ /de nas dben pa'i gnas dag tu/ /dris byugs maN+Dal legs bshams
209b1(rgyud 'grel): nas/ /sna tshogs rgyan sogs me tog bkram/ /bla ma bde ba'i stan la bzhag /shes rab phun sum mtshan ldan pa/ /snod ldan dbang thob dam tshig gnas/ /yon bcas bla ma la phul nas/ /ston mo'i g.yos sogs dga' longs
209b2(rgyud 'grel): spyod/ /rdo rje yol bas bar bcad la/ /gus pas rgyab nas gsol ba gdab/ /dpal ldan mgon po bde ba che/ /bde chen bde ba'i gnas la bzhugs/ /sangs rgyas thams cad mnyam sbyor ba'i/ /mkha' 'gro sgyu ma'i bde stsol mdzod//
209b3(rgyud 'grel): byang chub sems dpa' che rnams kyis/ /yang dag don mchog rnam dag pa/ /ji ltar de nyid bdud rtsi yi/ /mchog gi dbang bskur ba bzhin du/ /de bzhin bdag sogs 'gro kun gyi/ /sdug bsngal thams cad sel bar mdzod/ /rnal
209b4(rgyud 'grel): 'byor bdud rtsi dri med mchog /ma rig rtog pa'i rab rib sel/ /gang gis byang chub bla med pa/ /de ring bdag gis thob par mdzod/ /blo gros thugs rje chen po yis/ /brtse ba'i gsung gis slar brjod pa/ /bu khyod ji ltar 'dod pa bzhin
209b5(rgyud 'grel): rgyal ba kun gyi bde chen sbyin/ /ting 'dzin sbyor sngags gsal ba yis/ /rang gi gnas su legs par sdod/ /de nas phyi nang khrus sogs kyis/ /dam tshig lha mo sbyang byas nas/ /nyungs kar sngags kyis bgegs bskrad cing/ /sbyor ba
209b6(rgyud 'grel): rjes sbyor gyis bskyed de/ /dbang bskur byin rlabs rdzogs byas nas/ /rol pa'i brdas bskul spro ba bskyed/ /gnyis med sbyor ba'i byang chub sems/ /slob ma'i kha ru dbab par bya/ /ji ltar rgyal ba bde gshegs kyis/ /rang gi sras
209b7(rgyud 'grel): mchog dbang bskur zhing/ /byang chub sems de dag pa'i chu/ /rtog tshogs dri ma dag par byas/ /oM ma hA bo d+hi tsit+ta sa ma ya a bi Shiny+tsa hUM/ a ho su kha zhes brjod cing/ /longs spyod gnas la gzhug byas te/ /rigs kyi cha lugs
210a1(rgyud 'grel): gsal ba dag /chu zla sgyu ma'i rnam pa bzhin/ /rdzogs rim bcud rdzogs bla ma mchog /'gro ba skyob pa'i blo ldan pa/ /rdo rje 'dzin pa'i gsang gnas don/ /slob mas rgyang la rab bskul mdzad/ /mtshan ldan yum bcas bla ma
210a2(rgyud 'grel): las mchod cing gsol ba gdab par bya/ /kye kye mgon po bde ba che/ /rdo rje sbyor las yang dag byung/ /phyag rgya mi phyed rab sgrub pa/ /mngon sum nyams myong bskyed pa'i phyir/ /bde gnyid chen pos ji lta bar/ /gtso bos bdag la mdzad
210a3(rgyud 'grel): du gsol/ /rtog pa'i dri mas bsgrub pa rnams/ /byang chub chu yis dag par mdzod/ /rigs mthun mchon ldan byin brlabs pa'i/ /lha mo bu yi lag tu gtad/ /dga' ba'i gnas chen lha mo 'di/ /sna tshogs sgyu rtsal yid du 'ong/ /legs
210a4(rgyud 'grel): par zung zhing blo gros mchog /dga' ba de'i mchod pa rab tu gyis/ /thabs gzhan gyis ni 'tshang mi rgya/ /'gro ba'i de dag thams cad 'gyur/ /de bas khyod kyis 'di nyid du/ /nam yang 'bral bar mi bya ste/ /'di ni sangs rgyas thams cad kyi//
210a5(rgyud 'grel): rig pa'i brtul zhugs bla na med/ /blun po gang zhig 'di spong ba/ /de la mchog gi dngos grub med/ /lha mos grogs la dga' ba'i bzhin/ /rgyas mdzad pad+ma kha phye bstan/ /khyod kyis nus sam rdo rje can/ /dri chen dri chu'i bza' btung dang/ /rak+ta ga
210a6(rgyud 'grel): bur maM pa dang/ /bud med rnams la dad gus dang/ /b+ha gar 'o byed mi rtog ba/ /smros shig grogs po bde ba can/ /lha mo ci phyir bdag mi spro/ /khu khrag la sogs bza' ba dang/ /bud med rnams la rtag gus shing/ /dga' ba'i pad+ma ra'o
210a7(rgyud 'grel): bgyid cing/ /rmad byung gsal ba'i pad+ma 'di/ /thams cad bde bar yang dag ldan/ /rtag tu rim bzhin 'di spyod na/ /de nyid bde chen 'bral mi 'gyur/ /chos dbyings 'di ni rnam par dag /sems can thams cad rnam par dkrol/ /bde chen rgyal
210b1(rgyud 'grel): ba 'di nyid ni/ /dngos po kun gyi rang bzhin bcas/ /nang gi rtsa yi 'khor lo'i tshogs/ /pad+ma la bzhugs rab tu rgyas/ /b+ha ga'i mkha' dbyings nam mkha' i dbyings/ /'byung po lnga po rgyan bzhin dgod/ /lte ba ze'u 'bru ge sar zlum/ /'dab ma brgyad
210b2(rgyud 'grel): sogs rnam par mdzes/ /de yi dbus su gnas pa ni/ /de nyid bdud rtsi bde chen gzugs/ /b+hany+tsa mo k+Sha ho/ /dben pa'i gnas mchog dri bcas brgyan/ /yol ba'i rab stan bde la/ /thabs shes sbyod ba'i ting 'dzin dang/ /rjes su sbyor dang sbyor
210b3(rgyud 'grel): chen bsgom/ /ka ma la yi gtsug lag gzhung/ /rim gyis bde ba'i ye shes bskyed/ /dngos grub shes dang mi shis las/ /yi ge lnga bcu'i mtshan ma rtag /ye shes 'di ni shin tu phra/ /snying rje chen po mkha' 'dra zhing/ /rdul bral thar
210b4(rgyud 'grel): ba zhi ba chos/ /rang gi rang bzhin de nyid do/ /byang sems rdo rje lce yis blang/ /mchod yon dbul bskor gtang rag gtang/ /bla ma dam pa'i man ngag gis/ /dbang bzhi'i rim pa bstan pa'i phyir/ /thabs dang shes rab gnyis med pa'i//
210b5(rgyud 'grel): rnam gsum phyag rgya gang rung las/ /gnyis med bde ba'i ye shes don/ /mngon sum nyams myong rgyad la bskyed/ /de don rtog pa bdun pa las/ /rgyas par bstan pa'i gzhung bzhin bslab/ /phyi nang gsang ba gsang chen gyi/ /dbang bskur
210b6(rgyud 'grel): dam pa bzhi dag las/ /rgyud gzhan la las bum pa dang/ /gsang ba shes rab ye shes dang/ /bde chen bzhi pa zhes brjod de/ /de don rang bzhin mtshungs pa'o/ /khyod kyis srog chags bsad par bya/ /ma byin par yang blang bar bya/ /
210b7(rgyud 'grel): 'dod pas log par g.yo ma par bya/ /brdzun gyi tshig kyang smra bar bya/ /rdo rje bla ma byang chub sems/ /srog gi phyir yang byang chub sems/ /dran pa gsal bas gzung byas nas/ /lhag pa'i lha bzhin rin chen tog /phyi dang nang gi sbyin
211a1(rgyud 'grel): sreg dang/ /gtor ma'i las rnams rdzogs byas nas/ /rab tu gces pa'i rin chen sogs/ /bla ma'i zhabs la btud de dbul/ /de nas brtsams te dus kun tu/ /bla ma bzang la rab gus dang/ /thugs rje brtse ba nyer bzhag
211a2(rgyud 'grel): nas/ /bdag la dgongs shing gzigs par mdzod/ /'gro ba kun gyi don gyi phyir/ /smon lam rgya chen gdab par bya/ /dkyil 'khor rnams gsum rim pa bzhin/ /bsdu ba'i cho ga rgya cher bya/ /sbyin pa rnam bzhi'i bye brag gis/ /mgron tshogs
211a3(rgyud 'grel): ma lus dgug par bya/ /bkra shis glu gar rol mo'i tshogs/ /de nyid longs spyod nye bar gnas/ /mgon pos ji ltar rnam bkod pa/ /de don gsang ba rgya mtsho'i rgyud/ /rab bsdus dkyil 'khor cho ga bzhin/ /dri med yan lag rgyas pa'i tshul/ /rnal
211a4(rgyud 'grel): 'byor 'jug pa'i yan lag tu/ /bstan pa'i dge pas 'gro ba rnams/ /rang gi ye shes zag pa med/ /bdud rtsi'i bcud kyis rgyal bar shog /dpal sangs rgyas thams cad mnyam par sbyor ba'i rgyud kyi dkyil 'khor gyi cho ga zhes bya ba slob
211a5(rgyud 'grel): dpon chen po ku ku rA dzas mdzad pa rdzogs so// //rgya gar gyi mkhan po gu len+d+ra gupta dang/ /zhu chen gyi lo tsA pa dran ban nam mkhas bsgyur ba/ phyis kyi lo tsA ba lha rin po ches bcos shing gtan la phab pa'o// //
211a6(rgyud 'grel): sangs rgyas thams cad dang mnyam sbyor ba'i tshogs kyi chog bzhugs so// */ /rgya gar skad du/ sarba bud+d+ha sa ma yo gI ga Da bi d+hi nA ma/ bod skad du/ sangs rgyas thams cad dang mnyam par sbyor pa'i tshogs kyi cho ga ces bya ba/ /dpal mkha' 
211a7(rgyud 'grel): 'gro'i tshogs la phyag 'tshal lo/ /dpal ldan bde chen sems dpa' i mchog /sangs rgyas sras mchog 'khor lo'i gnas/ /rnam 'phrul cho ga ston mdzad pa'i/ /sku gsung dbyings la phyag 'tshal lo/ /rnam pa sna tshogs mchog gyur pa'i/ /
211b1(rgyud 'grel): sangs rgyas thams cad mnyam sbyor ba/ /mkha' 'gro sgyu ma bde mchog las/ /tshogs kyi cho ga bshad par bya/ /dpal ldan sangs rgyas kun gyi dngos/ /rdo rje sems dpa' bde 'byung ba/ /gsang ba mchog gi dgyes pa na/ /thams cad rang
211b2(rgyud 'grel): nyid rtag tu bzhugs/ /bsod nams ye shes tshogs rdzogs pas/ /kun ldan tshogs kyi 'khor lo yin/ /rigs kyi bkod pa so so'i gnas/ /phun sum tshogs par bstan pa 'am/ /yang na bde ba'i gnas dag tu/ /skyed mos tshal la
211b3(rgyud 'grel): sogs par bsgrub/ /mar ngo'i brgyad dang bcu bzhi dang/ /yar ngo'i brgyad dang bcu mtshams gnyis/ /der ni dang po gdan bshams te/ /'jam zhing reg na bde 'gyur pa'i/ /sna tshogs pad+ma ras kyis g.yogs/ /de ni thams cad dag
211b4(rgyud 'grel): pa'i gdan/ /sangs rgyas kun gyi dam tshig dpal/ /rdo rje sems dpa' i snang ba bde/ /de bzhin gshegs pa'i pho brang mchog /rin chen rgyan la sogs pas spras/ /dril bu rgyal mtshan mchog ldan pa'i/ /bla re dam pa bres pa na/ /
211b5(rgyud 'grel): rdo rje tshig dang mchog la sogs/ /glu dang sil snyan rnam par 'phrul/ /me tog bdug pa'i sbyor ba dang/ /mar me dril sogs ldan par/ /sangs rgyas thams cad mnyam sbyor ba'i/ /mkha' 'gro sgyu ma bde mchog bsgrub/ /slob dpon mgon
211b6(rgyud 'grel): la legs zhus nas/ /phun sum tshogs pa'i rjes 'jug cing/ /sangs rgyas brda dang ldan pa yis/ /me tog thogs te 'gro la bskul/ /rnal 'byor pho mo thams cad kun/ /dga' zhing dang pa'i sems can gyis/ /do nub bdag gi gnas
211b7(rgyud 'grel): dag tu/ /tshogs kyi cho ga mdzad par gsol/ /e ma bu ni snying rje che/ /gal te lag pa'i phreng ston na/ /'du bar bya zhes smra ba yin/ /phreng ba mngon par btang byas nas/ /dam tshig la gnas brtul zhugs bzang/ /dpa' bo gzhan don spyod pa'o/ /
212a1(rgyud 'grel): de nas nub mo 'dus ba dang/ /phyi nas bdag chal dri chab chu/ /khrus byas me tog gis brgyan cing/ /rnal 'byor dag chos sngags kyis sbyang/ /de nas nang gi khrus byas te/ /sngags kyis bsrung zhing byin brlabs nas/ /dam tshig
212a2(rgyud 'grel): tshogs rnams bskang gso zhing/ /rim bzhin nang du 'gro bar bya/ /dam tshig brda sogs brtag pa'i phyir/ /khro bo'i rgyal sngon las mkhan gnyis/ /rig pa'i sngags brjod mthong bas 'dzin/ /bsrung ba'i don phyir sgo 'gram gnyis/ /khro rgyal
212a3(rgyud 'grel): rgyan sngon dag gis mdzes/ /dam tshig rnam par spyod pa'o/ /dngos grub rin chen dbyug to 'dzin/ /dpal ldan dpa' bo 'dul bar mdzod/ /mkha' mdzes rnal 'byor ma dkyil du/ /dam pa'i mtshan ldan bdag thong zhig/ oM ma hA sa ma ya hUM/ sur?
212a4(rgyud 'grel): ta? stwaM?/ rdo rje slob ma chen po dang/ /rang gi grogs mchog lha rnams la/ /bskor zhing phyag 'tshal rang nyid kyi/ /stan la gus pa'i sems kyis 'dug /yon bdag las mkhan gang rung gis/ /sa gzhi legs bsham dri bcas nas/ /khru? gang la
212a5(rgyud 'grel): sogs tshad mnyam pa'i/ /maN+Dal rgyan dang bcas par bsham/ /rdo rje 'dzin gnon sngags kyis ni/ /bsang sbyang bsrung zhing byin gyis brlob/ /rig pa chad dag rnam phye la/ /dkyil 'khor sngags kyis me tog dgra ma/ /oM badzra re kha
212a6(rgyud 'grel): hUM/ 'jig rten pa yi maN+Dal ni/ /de yi 'og tu brtsam par bya/ /phyogs bzhir dkyil 'khor rnam bzhi'am/ /yang na gcig tu dgong par bya/ /dbus su rta mchog lha mo ste/ /zla gam lha mchog chen po'i gnas/ /bar khyam dang por phyogs
212a7(rgyud 'grel): skyed? lha/? /gnyis par mkha' 'gro'i tshogs rnams te/ /gsum par klu rgyal 'khor bcas tshogs/ /bzhi par 'gro drug bgegs tshogs so/ /so so'i las dang mthun pa yi/ /tshogs pa'i rgyan rnams dgram par bya/ /mchod yon mchod
212b1(rgyud 'grel): sogs rim gro dang/ /nya sha la sogs bza' ba dang/ /chang rtsi myos byed phreng ba dang/ /g.yon du nye bar dgod par bya/ /g.yas pa dag tu chu yi snod/ /ku sha'i chun por nyungs kar bcas/ /mdun du mchod yon bzang zhal dang/ /rdo rje dril
212b2(rgyud 'grel): bu phyag rgya'i tshogs/ /mchod pa'i phyag rgya'i shes tshogs rnams/ /mdun gyi dkyil 'khor dang po la/ /mchod pa kun gyi gtor ma'i tshogs/ /phyag rgya shes pa'i rjes rnams ni/ /'jig rten pa yi dkyil 'khor la/ /bkeng? de bsrung sbyang?
212b3(rgyud 'grel): shes par bya/ /bsod nams tshogs kyis dog byas nas/ /bsrung ba'i 'khor lo bsgom par bya/ /gzhi rten sbyor ba'i ting 'dzin gyis/ /dam tshig dkyil 'khor sbyor ldan pas/ /bsgom pa'i yan lag ma nyams par/ /rigs kyi rnam par
212b4(rgyud 'grel): bsgom par bya/ /ye shes dkyil 'khor la dmigs shing/ /bdun gyi dkyil 'khor gnyis med pa'i/ /dkyil 'khor dag gi las bya'o/ /chang la sogs pa'i yo byad rnams/ /mdun nas phyag tu ci rigs dbul/ /ltos shib/ rnal
212b5(rgyud 'grel): 'byor rgyan mdzes rnams/ /'di la rnam rtog yod ma yin/ /bram ze khyi dang gdol pa rnams/ /rang bzhin gcig pas lhan cig bza' / /oM ma hA sa ma ya/ ku ru ku ru d+ha ro ku ru hUM phaT/ bde gshegs de ni sdig mad cing/ /'dod chags
212b6(rgyud 'grel): sogs pa'i skyon dang bral/ /gzung 'dzin dri ma rnam par spangs/ /de bzhin nyid la bdag phyag 'tshal/ /g.yas dang g.yon gyi lag gnyis kyis/ /pad+ma'i bskor ba byas nas ni/ /rol pa'i bcas pas bza' ba bzung/ /rang gi lha yi sbyor ba
212b7(rgyud 'grel): yis/ /ji bzhin du ni 'jug par bya'o/ /rdo rje slob dpon blo ldan pas/ /chang sogs rdzas rnams byin gyis rlob/ /g.yo zhing 'bar ba'i gzugs can dang/ /khyad par du ni bskol ba nyid/ /shel gyi gzugs kyis byin brlab cing/ /thams 
213a1(rgyud 'grel): cad bdud rtsi'i ngo bor brtag /de nyid yang dag spyod pa 'dis/ /rnal 'byor pa ni kun nas bdag/ ji ltar bde bar brjod par bya/ /sgyu ma lta bu mdzes pa yi/ /'o byed sogs sbyor kun 'khyud pa/ /sems can don du yang dag spyad//
213a2(rgyud 'grel): de nas mna' ni bsgags byas nas/ /sangs rgyas thams cad mthun pa yi/ /mchog tu rtag pa'i bka' stsal pa/ /dam tshig sdom pa sbyin par bya/ /sangs rgyas thams cad mnyam sbyor ba'i/ /sdom pa nyams par khyed byed pa/ /ji
213a3(rgyud 'grel): snyed sangs rgyas thams cad dang/ /byang chub sems dpa' rdo rje 'dzin/ /lha dag dang ni mi dag dang/ /de bzhin rnal 'byor sgrub pa po/ /de dag la ni snying rings nas/ /snying nas khrag chen 'thungs pa yin/ /bdag gi ngo bo yongs spangs shing
213a4(rgyud 'grel): dka' thub kyis ni gzir mi bya/ /ci bde bar ni bde bar spyang/ /'di ni phyi dus sangs rgyas yin/ /rnal 'byor longs spyod thams cad la/ /cis kyang mi 'jigs dga' bar gyis/ /sdig med stobs kyis khyod ma 'jigs/ /dam tshig 'da' 
213a5(rgyud 'grel): bar dka' pa'o/ /tshogs kyi dpa' bo'i ston mo las/ /slob dpon las kyi rim pa'o/ /de nas khrus byas dri yi lus/ /ji ltar 'byor ba'i gos dang rgyan/ /sna tshogs rnam par bgos na ni/ /me tog phreng ldan kha dri zhim/ /sems can khams
213a6(rgyud 'grel): ni ma lus gdon/ /srid pa shin tu dag bya'i phyir/ /mi 'gog chos nyid sbyor ba yis/ /mnyam pa nyid du bsgrub par bya/ /gru bzhi pa la sgo bzhi pa/ /rta babs bzhi yis mdzes par bya/ /rdo rje rin chen padmo sogs/ /sgo bsrungs dang ni ldan
213a7(rgyud 'grel): par bya/ /rang gi lha dang 'dra ba yi/ /bud med dag ni legs bsgrubs pas/ /skal bzang rang gi phyag rgyas mtshan/ /tshogs kyi dkyil 'khor brtag bar bya/ /sangs rgyas thams cad mnyam sbyor ba/ /sbyor ba'i dbang phyug rnam 'phrul bas/ /
213b1(rgyud 'grel): rdo rje sems dpa' dpal gyi lha/ /de ni rnam par 'phrul par mdzad/ /brtan zhing grub pa'i slong byed pa/ /kun nas slong ba'i bde ba ni/ /stong pa rnal 'byor yod med mthus/ /nam mkha' nyid du dam tshig nye bar gnas/ /bde gshegs bde bar gshegs
213b2(rgyud 'grel): su gsol/ /rdo rje sems dpa' bskal bzang dpal khyod bdag /oM e hye ti b+ha ga wan ma hA ka ru Ni ka tri sh+ya ho sa ma ya sa ma ya stwaM dza(rgyud 'grel): hUM baM(rgyud 'grel): ho stwaM/ /de nas yang dag par gsal bas/ /bud med dag ni bzhi rnams la/ /gar gyis
213b3(rgyud 'grel): phyag rgya'i mchod pa yis/ /mchod pa thams cad dbul bar bya'o/ /oM A(rgyud 'grel): hUM/ rab tu dga' ba'i bdag la phyag 'tshal lo/ /de bzhin gshegs pa'i dam pa grub par mdzod/ /dam tshig dam pa grub par mdzad du gsol/ /mchod pa
213b4(rgyud 'grel): chen po thams cad dag par mdzod/ /mchod pa chen po thams cad grub par mdzod/ /klu yi phyag rgya 'di ni dpal/ /rdo rje sems dpa' la gnas te/ /mchod pa ma lus byed pa yi/ /rab 'byam las la sbyor du rung/ /gang dag grub
213b5(rgyud 'grel): bar ma gyur dang/ /mchod pa dag ni mi 'byor pa/ /phyag rgya 'di yis mchod byas na/ /mchod pa thams cad myur du 'grub/ /de nas ro mchog bza' btung nas/ /glu tshig sil snyan la sogs la/ /de dag mgon po rnams la dbul/ /dkyil
213b6(rgyud 'grel): 'khor tshogs bcas dbyer med blos/ /rdo rje bla ma chen po dang/ /bdag gzhan tshogs pa 'dod dgus mchod/ /rnam pa mang po'i 'dod chags rgyud kyi sems can ma lus med par dbul mkhas pa/ /de bzhin gshegs pa kun gyi
213b7(rgyud 'grel): mkha' 'gro sgyu mas thams cad rab sprul rnam par sprul/ /te na te te hUM/ rnam pa mang po rab tu dga' ba'i rgyud kyi sems can ma lus lus pa med par 'dul mkhas pa/ /de bzhin gshegs pa kun gyi sgyu ma bde mchog sgyu mas thams cad
214a1(rgyud 'grel): rab sprul rnam par sprul/ hUM hUM hUM/ rnam pa mang po khro bo'i rgyud kyi sems can ma lus lus pa med par 'dul mkhas pa/ de bzhin gshegs pa kun gyi sgyu ma bde mchog sgyu ma thams cad rab sprul rnam par sprul/ ru lu ru
214a2(rgyud 'grel): lu hUM b+hyo hUM/ rnam pa mang po srog gi rgyud kyi sems can ma lus lus pa med par 'dul mkhas pa/ /de bzhin gshegs pa kun gyi sgyu mas thams cad rab sprul rnam par sprul/ /hUM shi shwa bi shwa hUM/ oM badzra satwa sa ma ya/ ma nu pA
214a3(rgyud 'grel): la ya/ badzra satwa te na pa tiSh+Tha/ dri Dho me b+ha ba/ su to Sh+yo me b+ha ba/ a nu rak+to me b+ha ba/ su po Sh+yo me b+ha ba/ sarba sid+d+hi me pra yats+tsha/ sarba karma ku ru su tsa me tsit+ta/ sh+re ya(rgyud 'grel): ku ru hUM/ ha ha ha ha ho/ b+ha ga ban/ sarba ta thA ga ta/ badzra ma me muny+tsa /
214a4(rgyud 'grel): badzra b+ha ba/ ma hA sa ma ya/ satwa A/ de nas zos shing 'thungs pa yi/ /lhag pa'i tshogs rnams kun bsdus te/ /gong du bkod pa'i bkod ma dang/ /so sor byin brlabs bsngo bar bya/ /ha ho h+ri(rgyud 'grel): yi sbyor ba yis/ /bdud rtsi'i rang bzhin 'dod lnga'i tshogs//
214a5(rgyud 'grel): mdzes pa'i phyag rgya smin mtshams gnas/ /sngags bcas mgron tshogs bsdu bar bya/ /oM ha hi ru lu ru lu hUM baM ho/ /badzra DA ki ni b+hyo/ e a ra l+li ho dza dza/ /oM suM b+ha ni suM b+ha dza(rgyud 'grel): hUM baM ho/ A kaDd+ha ya/ A kaDDd+ha ya/ pra be sha ya pra be sha ya/ to
214a6(rgyud 'grel): Sha ya to Sha ya/ mo ha ya mo ha ya/ e a ra l+li ho/ h+riM h+riM h+riM/ hUM las rngam chen 'bar ba'i sku ston cing/ /'jig rten lha chen yab yum zhabs kyis gnon/ /drag po'i dkyil 'khor sna tshogs ston mdzad cing/ /dbu ma rta skad 'tsher zhing gar mdzad pa
214a7(rgyud 'grel): nyi ma 'bum gyi 'od mnga' sku la rdzogs/ /khro rgyal 'khor bcas ma lus gshegs su gsol/ /'jig rten dbang phyug chen po dang/ /de bzhin tshangs pa brgya byin sogs/ /khyab 'jug 'dod dga' i dbang phyug dang/ /'jig rten skyong ba'i lha dang
214b1(rgyud 'grel): klu/ /gang dag rdzu 'phrul mthu mnga' rnams/ /bran mngags g.yog dang chung mar bcas/ /dpa' bo'i spyan sngar dam bcas bzhin/ /rang gi dam tshig dran byos pa/ /tshogs kyi dkyil 'khor bsrung ba'i phyir/ /'khor bcas gnas 'dir gshegs su
214b2(rgyud 'grel): gsol/ /'od zer sngags kyis sbyang byas nas/ /rigs kyi dkyil 'khor mngon par gsal/ /oM kak+ka Dha na/ babband+ha na na/ khakh+khA da na/ sarba duSh+Ta na/ ha na ha na/ g+ha g+ha g+hA ta ya/ a mu ka syA/ shAn+ti ku ru/ hUM hUM phaT phaT dza swA hA/ /bdud rtsi bsam
214b3(rgyud 'grel): gtan dmigs nas ni/ /bdud rtsis kha ni dag par bya/ /oM gu ru tro ta khA hi/ sa ma ya braM sha khA hi/ bak+Sha su gan/ b+hu tak+She tre pra ti ste b+ha ya ha hi/ lhag ma kha chu'i tshogs kyis bran/ /dgyes pa'i longs spyod rnam par rol/ /oM 'jig
214b4(rgyud 'grel): rten kun gtso mnga' mdzad pa'i/ /lha chen dregs byed stobs ldan pa/ /bde gshegs sras sogs bran mdzad pa'i/ /byang chub sems ldan snying rje can/ /dbang phyug chen po chung mar bcas/ /de bzhin khyab 'jug tshangs pa dang/ /brgya byin 'dod
214b5(rgyud 'grel): dga' chung mar bcas/ /lha chen 'khor bcas tshogs rnams dang/ /phyogs skyong brgyad po 'khor bcas dang/ /klu chen brgyad po 'khor bcas dang/ /mkha' 'gro chen mo gsus 'dzin ma/ /dur khrod ma mo tshogs bcas dang/ /gzhan yang
214b6(rgyud 'grel): lha srin sde brgyad dang/ /'gro ba sdug po 'khor bcas rnams/ /sku gsung thugs sogs sbyang byas nas/ /rang gi lha yi gzugs 'dzin rnams/ /gnas 'dir 'dus pa'i dam tshig can/ /mchod gtor rgyun dang bcas pa bzhes/ /dam tshig
214b7(rgyud 'grel): bsrung zhing dam tshig can/ /las la sogs pa mkha' 'gro'i tshogs/ /mkha' 'gro chen mo 'khor bcas rnams/ /rnal 'byor bsgrub pa'i grogs mdzod cig /las mdzad rdo rje bran bcas pas/ /zhi rgyas dbang drag las grub cing/ /
215a1(rgyud 'grel): theg chen gsang sngags bsrung ba dang/ /nad dang gnod sogs zhi ba dang/ /tshe dbang bkra shis spel ba dang/ /bde legs 'bras bu grub par mdzod/ /oM sarba duSh+Ta na/ g+hi na g+hi na/ gats+tsha hUM phaT/ de nas sna tshogs gar
215a2(rgyud 'grel): gyi rgya/ /dag mdzes stobs kyis bsgyur bya zhing/ /sna tshogs glu rnams snyan pa'i dbyangs/ /dpa' bo'i tshogs kyis legs par blangs/ /rdo rje thal mo legs sbyar ba/ /rang gi snying gar bzhag nas su/ /sems can thams cad la dmigs
215a3(rgyud 'grel): te/ /smon lam rgya chen gdab par bya/ /sems can thams cad sdig med cing/ /dus kun du ni bde gyur cig /sangs rgyas nyid dang 'phrad 'gyur ba'i/ /lam de nyid la zhugs nas kyang/ /ma sgral ba rnams bsgral ba dang/ /ma grol
215a4(rgyud 'grel): ba rnams dgrol bar shog /kun gyis rigs 'dzin bgrod byas nas/ /sku gsung 'bras bu skye 'gyur zhing/ /rnal 'byor gtsug lag dam tshig la/ /da lta nyid du gnas par shog /dkyil 'khor rim bzhin bsdu bya ste/ /ye shes lha tshogs
215a5(rgyud 'grel): gshegs su gsol/ /dam tshig gsal mnyes bsrung bar bya/ /gzugs brnyan dben pa'i gnas su bzhag /oM khyed kyis sems can don kun mdzad/ /rjes su mthun pa'i dngos grub stsol/ /sangs rgyas yul du gshegs nas kyang/ /slar
215a6(rgyud 'grel): yang sems can don la dgongs/ /oM(rgyud 'grel): A hUM mu(rgyud 'grel): badzra gats+tsha mu:/ /gsang mchog snying po dri ma med/ /tshogs gnyis gcig tu rab sbyor ba/ /ye shes bla ma'i rtsal rdzogs don/ /dpa' bo longs spyod spyad pa'i thabs/ /sgrub thabs snga ma'i
215a7(rgyud 'grel): yan lag tu/ /cho ga'i dbye ba bkod byas pas/ /'gro rnams tshogs gnyis rnam 'phrul nas/ /rdo rje sems dpa' i gnas thob shog /sangs rgyas thams cad dang mnyam par sbyor ba'i tshogs kyi cho ga zhes bya ba/ slob dpon chen po rgyal
215b1(rgyud 'grel): po in+d+ra b+hU tis mdzad pa rdzogs so// //rgya gar gyi mkhan po A nanda garb+ha dang/ zhu chen gyi lo tsa ba dran ban nam mkhas bsgyur ba las/ phyis lo tsa ba lha rin po ches bcos shing gtan la phab pa'o// //
215b2(rgyud 'grel): dpal he ru ka'i sgrub thabs bzhugs so// //rgya gar skad du/ sh+rI he ru ka nA ma no pi ka /bod skad du/ dpal he ru ka zhes bya ba'i sgrub thabs/ dkon mchog gsum la phyag 'tshal lo/ /dngos dang dngos med rtog bral zhing/ /thugs rje mdzad
215b3(rgyud 'grel): pa sna tshogs snang/ /thabs mkhas khro ston rgyal ba'i sku/ /ma lus 'jigs la phyag 'tshal te/ /mkha' 'gro sgyu ma'i rjes 'gro ba/ /de nyid sgrub thabs cho gar bcas/ /rnal 'byor 'dod pa'i bde skyed do/ /cung zad 'jug pa'i don phyir bshad/ /theg
215b4(rgyud 'grel): chen bla ma bzang las byung/ /yon tan stobs sogs kun nas mdzes/ /rab tu sbyangs pa'i rnal 'byor mchog /'dod pa'i lha la dad mos 'dud/ /tshul khrims brtul zhugs la sogs kyi/ /thabs mkhas yan lag rnam spyad pas/ /de gnas
215b5(rgyud 'grel): goms byed las rdzogs te/ /kun tu 'khor lo mthar phyin 'gyur/ /byams sogs tshad med bzhi rnams kyis/ /'gro rnams thams cad nye bar gzung/ /shin tu dag pa'i gnas nyid du/ /bde ba'i stan la legs par gnas/ /yang dag
215b6(rgyud 'grel): dkyil 'khor bzang po dang/ /yang dag khrus kyi cho ga dang/ /yang dag mchod rgyan gtor mar bcas/ /yang dag phyag rgya sngags sogs ldan/ /thams cad yul kun rnam dag pa'i/ /byang chub sems nyid brtan pa las/ /thugs rje nyi ma'i
215b7(rgyud 'grel): mdza' yas zer/ /thams cad yul kun khyab par gsal/ /yi ge hUM gi 'phro 'du las/ /bsrung ba'i 'khor lo rgya chen po/ /'khor lo me 'od mtshon cha'i phreng/ /khro tshogs sprul bcas tsham rngam tshogs/ /phyogs bcur bstan par bya ba'i
216a1(rgyud 'grel): phyir/ /hUM bzhi'i phyag rgya sngags kyis bsrung/ /rigs kyi yi ge mtshan mar bcas/ /phra mo'i skur gsal 'phro 'du yis/ /sangs rgyas thams cad bsdu byas te/ /gtum rngam khros pa'i cha lugs can/ /thams cad gcig tu
216a2(rgyud 'grel): sbyor ba'i mthus/ /dam tshig rgyal po he ru ka /zhal gcig phyag gnyis mthing ka'i mdangs/ /'od 'bar dur khrod rgyan gyis brjid/ /khro rtags mtshan ma kun rdzogs shing/ /nyams dgu'i rngam brjid tshul dang bcas/ /spyan dmar mche gtsigs
216a3(rgyud 'grel): khro gnyer can/ /g.yas pa rdo rje rtse lnga gdengs/ /g.yon par snod bcud kha TwAM bcas/ /klu rgyal brgyad kyis nyes mdzes shing/ /spu rnams rdo rje 'od 'bar ba/ /khro bo'i dkyil 'khor phyogs bcur spro/ /rdo rje phreng ba phyag rgya lnga/ /rigs kyi
216a4(rgyud 'grel): dbu rgyan sems dpar bcas/ /gnas gsum 'od gsal dag byed pa'i/ /dkyil 'khor la gnas sku gsung thugs/ /phyogs bcur sngo zhing bsdus pa'i mthus/ /byin brlabs gnas gsum brtan par 'gyur/ /snying ga'i 'od zer rgya chen pos
216a5(rgyud 'grel): rigs kyi khro bo kun bsdus te/ /rang gi gnas su brtan byas nas/ /'dod pa'i dngos grub gsol ba gdab/ /phyi nang mchod pa sna tshogs kun/ /rgya cher spro zhing dag par dbul/ /tshad med bzhi yi phyag rgya yis/ /sku gsung thugs su sbyor bar bya//
216a6(rgyud 'grel): ting 'dzin sems dpa' i mtshan ma la/ /sngags kyi 'khor lo spro zhing bsdu/ /oM sh+rI he ru ka h+ri swA hA/ /mar me phreng ba 'khor ba'i tshul/ /yan lag rdzogs pa'i ting 'dzin gyis/ /dngos grub mtshan ma kun ston cing/ /yang dag byang chub bstan par 'gyur
216a7(rgyud 'grel): thams cad nam mkha' i mtshan nyid de/ /nam mkha' la yang mtshan nyid med/ /khams gsum dag ni ma lus pa/ /thams cad sgyu ma lta bu ste/ /ji ltar sgyu ma thams cad du/ /mthong ba dang ni reg par 'gyur/ /dmigs su yod pa ma yin te/ /de bzhin
216b1(rgyud 'grel): 'gro ba kun gyi tshul/ /bud med la sogs rin chen mchog /mkha' las dngos grub thams cad spyod/ /dngos po med par bdag sbyor bas/ /nam mkha' kun dang mnyam par spyod/ /mkha' 'gro sgyu ma bde ba'i mchog/ shin tu bstan pas 'grub
216b2(rgyud 'grel): par 'gyur/ /spyod lam kun tu ma nyams par/ /rnal 'byor yang dag ting 'dzin gnas/ /rnam pa mang po yul bcas kun/ /thabs dang shes rab rol mo'i tshogs/ /bza' btung dag pa'i ting 'dzin gyis/ /dkyil 'khor thams cad tshim
216b3(rgyud 'grel): 'gyur cing/ /bsod nams ye shes tshogs chen la/ /'gro rnams dag par nye bar sbyor/ /kun tu cha lugs chu zla bzhin/ /ma gos chags pa med pa'i rgyal/ /thams cad chos rnams blang dor med/ /bya ba'i lam rdzogs mthar phyin 'gyur/ /
216b4(rgyud 'grel): tshe 'dir yon tan chos kun dang/ /rigs 'dzin go 'phang mngon par brnyes/ /thams cad sbyor ba'i rgyud chen po/ /de nyid nges par bstan pa'i don/ /phyag rgya gcig pa'i sgrub thabs mchog /yang dag rdzogs pa'i tshul gyis 'jug /legs
216b5(rgyud 'grel): par bsdus pa'i bsod nams kyis/ /khams gsum thams cad bcom ldan 'das/ /stobs mchog dpal ldan he ru kar/ /yang dag nyid du grol gyur cig /dpal he ru ka zhes bya ba'i sgrub thabs slob dpon chen po thu bor dza hastis
216b6(rgyud 'grel): mdzad pa rdzogs so// // */ /he ru ka'i sgrub thabs bzhugs so/ /rgya gar skad du/ sh+rI badzra he ru ka sA d+ha nA ma/ bod skad du/ dpal he ru ka'i sgrub pa'i thabs zhes bya ba/ dpal rdo rje sems dpa' la phyag 'tshal lo/ /mgon po bde chen
216b7(rgyud 'grel): las byung ba'i/ /rigs sku ye shes kun gyi bdag /dreg byed rgyu 'bras 'joms mdzad pa'i/ /stobs chen khro rgyal dpal la 'dud/ /yang dag grub pa'i las gzhung gis/ /bsnyen sgrub bzhi yi rim pa las/ /khro bo'i dkyil 'khor sgrub pa'i thabs
217a1(rgyud 'grel): dgos don 'brel pa'i sgo nas bshad/ /rtsod du sems can 'dul dka' zhing/ /log pa'i lam la gnas dag la/ /mdzad spyod zhi bas mi 'dul phyir/ /khro bo'i phrin las bstan pa yin/ /de nyid sgrub pa'i gzhung dag la//
217a2(rgyud 'grel): log rtog 'khrul pas bslang pa dag /nges pa'i gzhung don rtogs bya'i phyir/ /legs bsdus bstan pa bsal bar bya/ /'jug pa'i rnal 'byor rtsal ldan dag /shes rab kyis ni blo phye nas/ /nges par brtags pa'i sa gzhi las/ /bla
217a3(rgyud 'grel): mas nges pa'i lung 'di bstan/ /snums pa yi ni dam tshig dang/ /gtsang dang 'jigs pa'i brtul zhugs can/ /de dag goms nas nyams su blang/ /grub pa'i dbang phyug phun sum tshogs/ /blo zhan shes rab chung bas ni/ /bsgrubs kyang
217a4(rgyud 'grel): grub par mi 'gyur ro/ /phung byed gnyi ga bsregs pas na/ /de bas gzhan du bstan pa min/ /dur khrod dang ni lha rten dang/ /ma mo'i gnas la sogs 'dug nas/ /rdo rje 'dzin pa'i dgos pa dag /rnam pa du mar 'grub par 'gyur/ /phyi dang nang gi
217a5(rgyud 'grel): rdzas bsags nas/ /rang rgyud dag pa'i rnal 'byor pas/ /bgegs tshogs nye bar zhi bya dang/ /tshogs bsags bsrung ba'i don ched du/ /'byung po'i gtor ma gtang nas ni/ /gsang ba'i don gyi las rnams bya/ /bdag nyid
217a6(rgyud 'grel): rang gi lhar sbyor bas/ /lus ngag yid gsum mthu bskyed cing/ /bdag dang 'gro ba sbyang byas nas/ /rang bzhin dag pa'i rnam par bsam/ /snying ga'i sngags kyi 'phro 'du yis/ /dkyil 'khor mdun du bsam byas nas/ /rtse gcig sems
217a7(rgyud 'grel): kyis mchod sogs dang/ /'gro don sbyod pa rgya cher bya/ /rdo rje sems dpa' la sogs pa/ /thugs rje che dang ldan pa yi/ /dkyil 'khor lnga la sogs pa yi/ /zhi ba'i mchod pas mnyes byas te/ /bsnyen pa'i dus su goms byas nas /
217b1(rgyud 'grel): 'khor bcas mchod pa rdzogs par bya/ /de yang spyi dang so so yi/ /sgrub pa'i bye brag rnam gnyis te/ /bsdus dang rgyas la dga' ba yi/ /dbye ba gnyis su shes par bya/ /dang por chos kyi dbyings nyid la/ /dmigs pa med pa'i don gyis
217b2(rgyud 'grel): bsgom/ /dngos po med par bdag sbyod pas/ /nam mkha' kun dang mnyam sbyor ba'o/ /oM ma hA shu n+ya tA dz+nyA na badzra swa b+ha ba At+ma ko haM/ chos kyi dbyings kyi ye shes kyis/ /thams cad du ni khyab pa las/ /chos kun stong gsal rang
217b3(rgyud 'grel): bzhin med/ /mi dmigs snying rje chen po'i dang/ /oM d+harma d+hA swa b+hA at+ma ko haM/ skad cig ma yis skur gnas te/ /hUM gi 'od zer 'phros pa'i mthus/ /rdo rje rgya gram sa gzhi la/ /ra ba gur dang bla re dang/ /phyogs bcur me 'od
217b4(rgyud 'grel): 'bar ba yi/ /mtshon cha'i phreg bas 'khor bar bsgom/ /rdo rje sems dpa' i ting 'dzin gyis/ /mkha' dbyings sna tshogs la gnas nas/ /cir yang gyur pa'i yig 'bru las/ /'od zer tshul du spros nas kyang/ /ma lus nyes par khyab
217b5(rgyud 'grel): byas te/ /de zhing rngam pa'i tshul du dgongs/ /e las mkha' dbyings gru gsum dkar/ /bzang po'i mkha' dbyings gyen bsgreng nas/ /yaM las rlung dkyil gzhu yi dbyibs/ /dud kha sra mkhrags sgrol ma'i mkha' / /baM las chu dkyil dkar
217b6(rgyud 'grel): zhing zlum/ /bum pas mtshan pa mA ma ki /laM las gser gyi sa gzhi ste/ /gru bzhi spyan la rdo rjes mtshan/ /khaM las rak+ta'i dba'? glong 'khyil/ /'dod chags chen po'i rang bzhin rtags/ /kaM byung keng rus ri rab ste/ /rin chen rgyan spras rdo rjes
217b7(rgyud 'grel): mtshan/ /raM las me 'od dmar ser la/ /gru gsum gos dkar mkha' yi dbyings/ /de dbus bruM las gzhal yas khang/ /gru bzhi sgo dang sgo khyud can/ /rin chen thod pa sna tshogs dang/ /nyi zla rdo rje'i rgyan gyis mdzes/ /dkyil 'khor
218a1(rgyud 'grel): zla gam gnas pa la/ /re'u mig dgu pa rdo rjes mdzes/ /sna tshogs lha mo'i phreng ba dang/ /phan gdugs rnga yab rta babs ldan/ /zhing 'phrul tshangs pa'i g.yang gzhi sogs/ /dur khrod rgyan gyis 'jigs par brgyan/ /rin
218a2(rgyud 'grel): chen ka gdung tog dang bcas/ /'dod yon sna tshogs rgyan gyis mdzes/ /dkyil 'khor phyi yis gnas brgyud du/ /dur khrod shing dang zhing skyong dang/ /phyogs skyong rnal 'byor mtsho dang sprin/ /klu rgyal la sogs gnas brgyad du/ /sha za 'byung
218a3(rgyud 'grel): po gshin rje dang/ /mkha' 'gro bya byi ro la sogs/ /ce spyang khro sogs sgra 'byin cing/ /ro yi tshogs la longs spyod mdzad/ /rang byung mchod rten dang bcas la/ /phreng ba rim gsum phyi rol gnas/ /de dbus 'khor lo'i lte ba la/ /pad+ma drag byed nyi
218a4(rgyud 'grel): zla'i steng/ /dpal mchog dang po gnas gyur nas/ /sprul pa'i ting 'dzin la gnas mdzad/ /chos rnams thams cad rnam brtags na/ /dngos med mtshan ma kun dang bral/ /byang sems ye shes dang po'i gzugs/ /A li zla dkyil gsal
218a5(rgyud 'grel): bar bsgom/ /byang sems ye shes gnyis pa'i brtags/ /de steng kA li nyi mar bcas/ /mtshan dang dpe byad gsal ba'i don/ /mdzad pa'i 'phro 'dur bcas pa'o/ /de dag 'od du gyur pa las/ /hUM las rdo rje rtse lnga pa/ /dkar po bum pa
218a6(rgyud 'grel): hUM gis mtshan/ /badzra a haM/ gdod ma tha ma med pa'i dbyings/ /dang po rdo rje chen po yin/ /'od zer lnga yi 'phro 'du yis/ /dkyil 'khor drug gi las mdzad nas/ /sku gsung thugs dbyings bzhugs pa las/ /'od zer phreng mdzes brjid
218a7(rgyud 'grel): pa'i mchog /de la sku mchog phyag rgya yi/ /sngags kyi yi ge brjod par bya/ /oM ma hA su kha badzra satwa a/ dza(rgyud 'grel): hUM baM ho(rgyud 'grel): su ra ta stwaM/ de dag ye shes byang chub sems/ /mngon byang lnga yi bdag nyid do/ /dpal ldan rdo rje sems dpa' 
218b1(rgyud 'grel): che/ /dkar dmar zhal lnga phyag bzhi pa/ /rdo rje kha TwAM rdo rjer bcas/ /'og ma gnyis kyis mda' dang gzhu/ /rin chen rgyan dang na bza' can/ /dbu la rin chen phreng bas mdzes/ /lus kyi ba bu'i gnas rnams su/ /dkyil 'khor drug gi rdul phran gnas?//
218b2(rgyud 'grel): rdo rje rtse lnga'i phyag rgya ni/ /gnas lnga dag tu gtug bya ste/ /sngags kyi bder gshegs thams cad kyi/ /sku gsung thugs sogs rnam par gnas/ /oM na ma(rgyud 'grel): sarba ta thA ga ta k+Sha ya bAk+tsit+ta gu Na karma badzra swa b+hA ba At+ma ko haM/ rang 'od yum
218b3(rgyud 'grel): dang 'khril pa yi/ /gnas gnas hUM dang as brgyan te/ /ye shes rdo rje phaT dang bcas/ /rtse mo nor bu 'bar bas mtshan/ /rnam thar pad+ma e dkyil can/ /mdog ser lte ba ze'u 'bru dmar/ /sa ma ya sogs brdas bskul
218b4(rgyud 'grel): nas/ /dza(rgyud 'grel): hUM baM hos rol pa bya/ /oM pra be sha ya phaT/ /a la la la la ho/ bde ba chen po'i 'od zer gyis/ /phyogs bcu'i rgyal ba mnyes mdzad nas/ /'gro ba'i lus ngag yid gsum sbyang/ /sku gsung thugs kyi rgyan gyis brjid//
218b5(rgyud 'grel): thams cad 'od kyis slar bsdus nas/ /stong gsum til gang 'bru 'dra rnams/ /sangs rgyas drug gi gsung du gyur/ /ba spu'i bu ga kun tu thim/ /thugs ka'i gnas su zhugs pa dag /bde ba chen po'i gnas nas babs/ /'dod chags chen
218b6(rgyud 'grel): po dga' ba'i sems/ /sku dang bcas pa 'od du gyur/ /sngon gyi gams shugs lha mo bzhis/ /phyogs bzhi nas ni bskul mdzad de/ /stong pa shin tu rnal 'byor yod med mthu/ /nam mkha' nyid du dam tshig nye bar gnas/ /bde gshegs
218b7(rgyud 'grel): bde bar gshegs pa bzhengs su gsol/ /rdo rje sems dpa' bskal bzang dpal khyod bdag /ye shes gsang ba'i rgyud bskul nas/ /thugs rjes 'gro la gzigs mdzad de/ /'bras bu'i sems dpa' snga ma bzhin/ /cho ga gsum
219a1(rgyud 'grel): gyi gsal bar byas/ /de nas bcom ldan rdo rje can/ /rdo rje sems dpa' i sbyor ba yis/ /rdo rje se gol phyag rgyas ni/ /sangs rgyas thams cad bsdu bar mdzad/ /'jig rten khams ni ma lus la/ /sangs rgyas rdo rje 'dzin bcas
219a2(rgyud 'grel): rgyas/ /shin tu gdug cing gtum pa la/ /zhi bas phan par mi 'gyur te/ /shes rab thabs kyi ngo bo las/ /khro bor de bzhin gshegs kun mdzad/ /khro bo'i tshul can khros pas kyang/ /'jig rten gsum dag sred byed na/ /sangs rgyas
219a3(rgyud 'grel): thams cad khros pa yis/ /khams gsum ma lus smos ci dgos/ /de nas sna yi rtse mo la/ /yid ni yang dag brtan pa bzung/ /sna yis dbugs ring dro ba la/ /rgyal ba'i sbyor ba'i phyag rgya 'byung/ /bcom ldan de nyid rnal 'byor pas/ /rdo
219a4(rgyud 'grel): rje khro bor bsgyur nas phyung/ /oM sh+rI he ru ka sa ma ya he(rgyud 'grel): sarba duSh+Ta/ sa ma ya mu da d+ha pa b+haM dza ka hUM phaT/ snga ma las ni gnas byung ste/ /bskal pa'i me dpung 'khrigs pa bzhin/ /khrag 'thung mthing gnag 'jigs pa'i rgyan/ /'bar
219a5(rgyud 'grel): ba chen po'i 'od zer can/ /zhal g.yas zhi ba'i rang bzhin dkar/ /dbus ma mthing gnag nag po'i zhal/ /g.yon pa rmongs byed ser po ste/ /rgyab ma chags mdzad dmar po'o/ /smin mtshams khro gnyer glog bzhin 'gyur/ /sdan? gsum
219a6(rgyud 'grel): khro gnyer mche gtsigs 'jigs pa'i zhal/ /dbu skra smad ser gnag mdzes/ /spu rnams rdo rje gyen du 'khyil/ /sgeg pa dpa' bo 'jigs su rung/ /rgod dang gshe dang 'jigs par byed/ /snying rje rngam dang zhi ba yi/ /sku gsung thugs
219a7(rgyud 'grel): kyi gar thabs can/ /g.yas g.yon dang pos rdo rje dang/ /rdo rje kha TwAM dril bur bcas/ /de 'og gnyis kyis 'jigs byed kyi/ /pags pa klubs kyi tshul du bskon/ /gsum pa gnyis na mnga' dang gzhu/ /g.yas kyi bzhi pas dur
219b1(rgyud 'grel): lhag? 'dzin/ /g.yon gyi bzhi pas thod pa ru/ /snying chen po yis bkad pa'o/ /la lar zhal gcig phyag gnyis pa/ /mthing gnag 'jigs pa'i me 'od can/ /g.yas pa ba dan gsum pa phyag /rdo rje rtse lnga 'bar phreng can/
219b2(rgyud 'grel): rdo rje kha TwAM dril bur bcas/ /thod pas gang ba g.yon pa na/ /'bar ba chen po skra 'bar ba/ /thod pa mang po'i dbu rgyan can/ /'jigs pa chen po'i dus ltar drag /dur khrod bzhin du rab tu 'jigs/ /zhal rnams sna tshogs
219b3(rgyud 'grel): 'gyur ba dang/ /'bar ba'i lta ba gar byed pa/ /rdo rje rdo rje kha TwAM ga /dril bu'i sgra ni gsil ba yis/ /thams cad phab nas slar yang ni/ /thal bar gyur pa 'am 'tsho bar byed/ /gti mug dbang mdzad theg chen brgyan/ /glang
219b4(rgyud 'grel): chen ko rlon stod g.yogs mnabs/ /'dod chags gzhan gyi rgol ba'i tshogs/ /tshar bcad stag gi pags pa yin/ /nga rgyal thugs rjes 'gro sgrol rtags/ /'jigs byed chen po'i tsha ra ma/ /zhe sdang gzung 'dzin rnam
219b5(rgyud 'grel): dag pas/ /gnas brgyad sprul gyi phreng ba can/ /chags pa gnyis dang ldan pa yis/ /sku la rak+ta'i thig les brgyan/ /phrin las sna tshogs mdzad pa yis/ /thal ba'i tshom bus mtshan pa yin/ /byang sems gnyis ldan dri bral
219b6(rgyud 'grel): don/ /zhag gi ri mos spras pa'o/ /phrag dog sku gsung rgyan ldan pas/ /thod phreng thod dang se ral thogs/ /dregs byed zil gyis mnan pa'i phyir/ /nyi zla snyan gyi gong rgyan byas/ /lus dang ngag sems rdo rje yi/ /mtshan ma'i phyag rgyar
219b7(rgyud 'grel): ldan byas te/ /thams cad 'byung ba'i sbyor ba yis/ /bdag gi lhar ni bdag nyid bya/ /oM A(rgyud 'grel): hUM/ thugs gsal nyi ma la gnas pa'i/ /ye shes sems dpa' h+ri(rgyud 'grel): dang bcas/ /'od zer 'phro 'du'i sbyor ba yis/ /ye shes
220a1(rgyud 'grel): dkyil 'khor spyan drangs te/ /lha mos bdud rtsi'i bum pas bkrus/ /thod phreng la gnas rigs lngas brgyan/ /lag pa shin tu brkyang ba yis/ /mdzub mo gnyis ni mdud rab bcing /gung mo mthe bo'i rtse mo can/
220a2(rgyud 'grel): rdo rje'i phyag rgya yongs su bsgyur/ /gteg nas khro gnyer lag bzhag ste/ /hi bcas dbang bskur sngags brjod bya/ /yab yum mkha' gsang hi dang bcas/ /rdo rje pad+mar bskyed byas nas/ /ling ga 'greng ba rang byung ba/ /brla yi dbus su
220a3(rgyud 'grel): bsgom byas nas/ /ling ga pad+mar byin brlabs te/ /khrag mthung 'dra ba'i gzugs skye'o/ /byang chub sems de kun tu dgod/ /ma lus nye bar khyab byas nas/ /'dod par bya bar rab tu mnyes/ /'od 'dud thog ma'i gzugs la
220a4(rgyud 'grel): gzung/ /gsang gnas so so'i gdan dag la/ /chos kyi snying po'i lha gnas bskyed/ /h+rI las dpal chen he ru ka /gsang ba'i dkyil 'khor dbus su dgod/ /h+rI(rgyud 'grel): las lha mo gau rI ma/ /h+rI(rgyud 'grel): las de bzhin tsau rI ma/ /dzhi(rgyud 'grel): las lha mo pra
220a5(rgyud 'grel): mo yin/ /dzhi las ret+ta phyogs bzhir dgod/ /mtshams su hUM phaT las byung ba yi/ /lha mo puk+ka la sogs bzhi/ /maM khaM yaM raM las byung ba yi/ /phyi rol mnga' 'dzin la sogs bskyed/ /a A aM a(rgyud 'grel): bzhi po las/ /lha mo me
220a6(rgyud 'grel): tog la sogs rnams/ /dza(rgyud 'grel): hUM baM ho(rgyud 'grel): yi ge las/ /sgo bzhir rta mgrin 'phang mtho sogs/ /b+ha ga la ni ling ga bzhag /ling ga rdo rjer byin brlabs nas/ /khrag mthung 'dra ba'i sku gnyis ni/ /spro zhing rang la thim par bya/ /hUM badzra
220a7(rgyud 'grel): guhya sid+hI pa ra ma yo ge shwa ri hUM/ gau rI dkar ser zhi ba'i mdangs/ /zhal bzhi phyag brgyad brjid pa'i stabs/ /g.yon brkyang gar gyis bzhugs mdzad cing/ /mnga' bzhi dus gcig bkang ba la/ /tshangs pa'i mgo bzhi sbyangs
220b1(rgyud 'grel): pa ste/ /'phros du dang bcas mdun du bzhugs/ /hUM hUM badzra tsaN+De shwa ri kha TwAM gi mahA badzra ka pA la mA la ku ru ku ru l+lu h+rI(rgyud 'grel): tsau rI dmar po drag po'i zhal/ /g.yon pas lcags kyu kha TwAM 'khyud/ /g.yas pa'i gung mos rtsibs brgyad bstod/ /
220b2(rgyud 'grel): g.yas btegs g.yon stobs lho yi phyogs/ /hUM badzra nA rA ya ni dzI/ /pra mo dbu gnyis gong ma phab/ /'og ma dmar po phyag bzhi pa/ /g.yas kyi dang pos rdor rtse lnga/ /g.yon gyi dang pos kham phor 'chang/ /'og gnyis khu tshur
220b3(rgyud 'grel): so sor 'chad/ /'khor lo 'dzin cing bteg pa'i tshul/ /g.yas brkyang stobs bcas nub phyogs su/ /rmongs tshul mdog dmar pad+ma la/ /hUM badzra pa tA ke dza/ pre ta mdog dkar slong tshur gzigs/ /g.yas nas kham phor bdud rtsis
220b4(rgyud 'grel): bkad/ /g.yon pa ba dan gsum pa mdzad/ /dga' bzhin byang gi phyogs su gnas/ /hUM badzra ha ri ni ma Ta/ /puk+ka drag po gar byed tshul/ /bol bzhi brla dpung dkar ba la/ /lus bsgrubs nya bzhi dma' ba ste/ /phyag mchog lo ma sngon
220b5(rgyud 'grel): po 'dra/ /g.yas na rdo rje rtse lnga 'bar/ /g.yon pas dpag bsam lcug ma 'dzin/ /gar gyi gzugs thabs 'gyur dang bcas/ /me mtshams 'khor lo'i stan la gnas/ /hUM badzra shU le gra b+hi ta ma ta/ /tsan dan gyen du dbugs
220b6(rgyud 'grel): 'byin tshul/ /gzhan gyi srog 'phrog kha dog gnag /g.yas pas ra skyes rdo rjes mtshan/ /rlung 'thor rdo rje khu tshur 'dzin/ /g.yon pas tri shUl gar dang bcas/ /bden bral 'khor lo'i stan la gnas/ /hUM badzra ke shi ts+tshindi ma
220b7(rgyud 'grel): ta/ g+hasma ro ldan tshul du gzigs/ /ser nag g.yas pas ral gri 'dzin/ /g.yon pa me thabs g.yon brkyang tshul/ /rlung mtshams 'khor lo'i stan la gnas/ /hUM badzra be mA la pA she ma ta/ /sme sha kun gyi las mdzad ma/ / 
221a1(rgyud 'grel): khrag 'thung dpal dang 'dra ba ste /g.yas pas rdo rje dung khrag gsol/ /g.yon gyis thod pa zhags par bcas/ /rdo rje kha TwAM se ral kha/ /dbang ldan 'khor lo'i rtsibs la gnas/ /kun kyang thod phreng sbrul dang bcas /zhing
221a2(rgyud 'grel): lpags rlon pa gos su gsol/ /gdan ni pad+ma sna tshogs la/ /zhing dang nyi mas mtshan pa'o/ /he badzra ra ti paM/ mnga' 'dzin dkar mo mnga' dang gzhu/ /me mtshams phyogs kyi gru chab la/ /oM ma hA ra ta badzra ho/ /kha TwAM ser mo kha TwAM ga
221a3(rgyud 'grel): rdo rje dril can bden bral mtshams/ /oM badzra lo tsa na yaM ya/ /'khor lo 'dzin ma dmar ser mo/ /rtsibs brgyad 'dzin pa rlung gi phyogs/ /raM mahA sh+rI badzri hwi/ sna tshogs ba dan ljang gu la/ /sna tshogs 'phan dril dbang ldan mtshams/
221a4(rgyud 'grel): a badzra puShpe /me tog ser mo me tog snod/ /rdo rjes mtshan pa par khyams me/ /A badzra d+hu pe/ spos me sngon mo rdo rje phog /khyams kyi bden bral par gnas pa'i/ /oM badzra A lo ke /mar me dmar mo rdo rje sgron/ /bar 'khyams rlung phyogs
221a5(rgyud 'grel): brlar gnas/ /a(rgyud 'grel): badzra gand+he/ dri chab ljang gu dag byed 'thob/ /bar khyams dbang ldan pad+mar gnas/ /oM badzra aM ku sha dza:/ shar sgo rta mgrin 'phang mtho dkar/ /g.yas na rta gdong g.yon lcags kyu/ /oM badzra pA she hUM/ lho
221a6(rgyud 'grel): sgor phag gdong sngon mo ste/ /g.yas pas mche ba g.yon zhags 'dzin/ /oM badzra sh+ri kha le baM/ nub sgor snang byed dmar mo ni/ /phyag gnyis nyi zla lcags sgrog 'dzin/ /oM badzra g+haN+De ho(rgyud 'grel): byang sgor thal byed mdog ljang gu /sangs
221a7(rgyud 'grel): rgyas gzugs dang dril bu'o/ /lha mo 'di dag thams cad kyang/ /rin chen rgyan dang na bzas klubs/ /sku mdzes khros ba'i rgyan cha 'dzin/ /sgo ba cung zhig bgyid ba'i tshul/ /kun mkhyen ye shes las grub phyir/ /'khor lo'i
221b1(rgyud 'grel): lha rnams thams cad kyi/ /mig la sangs rgyas rnam snang mdzad/ /rna bar rdo rje nyi ma yin/ /kha la pad+ma gar dbang phyug /sna la rta mchog rol ba ste/ /lus ni rdo rje he ru ka /yid la rdo rje sems dpa' gnas/ /gnas gsum phyag rgya'i tshogs
221b2(rgyud 'grel): ldan zhing/ /thugs kar ye shes sems dpa' gnas/ /rang rig dkyil 'khor spyan drangs nas/ /dbang bskur rigs kyi mtshan ma bsam/ /gnyis med 'od zer lcags kyu yis/ /slong ba dal gyis bskul mdzad cing/ /mdzes pa'i phyag rgya gyen du
221b3(rgyud 'grel): bsgreng/ /smin mtshams dbus su gtad par bya/ /dza(rgyud 'grel): hUM baM ho:/ sh+ri he ru ka ma hA badzra/ A ka Da Dha ya A ka Da Dha ya/ bra be sha ya pra be sha ya/ band+ha ya band+ha ya/ to Sha ya to Sha ya/ badzra TA ki naM/ h+ri da ya hUM hUM phaT/ oM sh+rI he ru ka ma hA badzra
221b4(rgyud 'grel): sarba duSh+TaM sa ma ya mu dra pra b+han+tsa kra hUM phaT/ ye shes can gyi spyod yul nas/ /dpal chen khrag 'thung 'khor dang bcas/ /sems can don slad dam tshig dgongs/ /gnas 'dir ?brtsi phyir gshegs su gsol/ /pad+ma'i phyag rgyas g.yas
221b5(rgyud 'grel): nas bskor/ /gar bcas thal mo lan gsum brdab/ /oM e hye hi b+ha ga bAn/ /dza(rgyud 'grel): hUM baM ho:/ ru ru ru lu /dza(rgyud 'grel): hUM baM ho/ e hye hi tri sh+ya ho/ /sa ma ya ho/ sa ma ya stwaM/ dza(rgyud 'grel): hUM baM ho:/ sh+rI he ru ka /e hye hi/ tri sh+ya ho/ sa ma ya stwaM/ oM e
221b6(rgyud 'grel): a ral+li ho/ h+riM h+riM h+riM/ dad pa dar ni dam tshig gis/ /tshur gshegs tshur gshegs he ru ka/ /chos sku zhi ba'i ngang las kyang/ /gzugs sku 'jigs tshul bstan du gsol/ /thugs rje che la thabs mkhas pas/ gdug pa gdul phyir
221b7(rgyud 'grel): gshegs su gsol/ /tshogs rje tshogs bdag dpal dang ldan/ /tshogs kyi slob dpon gshegs su gsol/ /ye shes rtogs pa'i khyad par las/ /sprul pa mang po'i tshogs dang gshegs/ /thod phreng phyag rgya bcings la las/ /g.yas
222a1(rgyud 'grel): nas rim bzhin bskor bar bya/ /oM sh+rI he ru ka ma hA badzra/ sarba duSh+Tan/ sa ma ya mu dra/ pra be sha ya/ sh+rI he ru ka hUM phaT/ dza(rgyud 'grel): hUM baM ho(rgyud 'grel): sh+rI he ru ka/ mahA badzra sarba duSh+Tan/ sa ma ya mu tra/ pra b+ha na tsakra sh+rI he ru ka hUM phaT/ bde
222a2(rgyud 'grel): gshegs pho brang dkyil 'khor 'dir/ /'gro ba ma lus bsgral ba'i phyir/ /don gyi dbang du dgongs nas kyang/ /'khor bcas ma lus gshegs su gsol/ /rdo rje thal mo bskyed nas kyang/ /sor mo bsnol te bskyed par bya/ /oM sh+rI he
222a3(rgyud 'grel): ru ka/ ma hA badzra sa ma ya hi/ sarba duSh+Tan/ sa ma ya mu dra/ pra b+ha na tsakra hUM/ kA ya bAk+tsi t+ta/ tiSh+Tha badzra/ sems can don phyir nan tan mchog bskyed cing/ /ye shes thugs rjes bdag la dgongs nas kyang/ /mi gnyis don phyir
222a4(rgyud 'grel): dngos grub mchog gi gnas/ /bdag la gsal zhing brtan par bzhugs su gsol/ /rdo rje khu tshur bcings pa las/ /mthe bong mthe chung so sor bsgreng/ /oM sh+rI he ru ka /ma hA badzra/ sarba duSh+Tan/ sa ma ya daMSh+Ta/ a pa Sh+TaM pa ya hUM phaT
222a5(rgyud 'grel): che mchog mnyam sbyor 'bar ba'i klong dkyil nas/ /thugs rje khros pas gdug pa 'dul mdzad pa/ /gsang sngags rmad byung drag po'i phrin las rnams/ /lhun gyis grub par byin gyis brlab tu gsol/ /dam tshig phyag rgya rnam gsum
222a6(rgyud 'grel): ni/ /rim bzhin bcings te bskul bar bya/ /oM badzra gu hya tri sh+ya sa ma ya stwaM/ oM badzra gu hya dri sh+ya sa ma ya ho/ oM badzra gu hya dri sh+ya sa ma ya phaT/ /dam tshig sa la bzhes pa ni/ /dpal chen khrag 'thung 'khor dang bcas/ /dam tshig
222a7(rgyud 'grel): tshul bzhin ma bsrungs sam/ /grub pa'i mchog dag ma stsal la/ /sku gsung thugs dang 'gal ba'o/ /zhi bar gyur par gdon mi za/ /zil gnon bsrung zhing bsdig pa'i phyir/ /las kyi phyag rgya rnam gsum bcing/ /dza(rgyud 'grel): hUM baM hUM
222b1(rgyud 'grel): sh+rI he ru ka /ma hA badzra/ sarba duSh+Tan/ sa ma ya mu dra/ /pra b+han tsakra/ bak+Sha ya bak+Sha ya/ bi d+hwaM sa ya/ bi d+hwaM sa ya/ he b+ha ga bAn/ bu tak+ShaM pA ya hUM phaT/ sku gsung thugs su bdag sbyor bas/ /pho brang dkyil 'khor rang las sprul/ /nga ni bdud kyi bdud
222b2(rgyud 'grel): bdag ste/ /mkha' 'gro'i tshogs bcas ngas bsdus so/ /oM sh+rI ka ra mu ka sha ra yA ya na ma:/ /oM sh+rI rA ga sa ma yA ya na ma:/ /oM sh+rI badzra kha TwAM ga pra dzA la yA ya na ma:/ oM sh+rI badzra gand+he pra dzA la yA ya na ma:/ /a ti b+hu ho/ pra ti b+hu
222b3(rgyud 'grel): ho/ sarba ta thA ga ta/ banda naM kA ro ya mi/ ma hA yo gA ni/ a la la ho/ /oM bdag med phyogs bral don dam thugs chung cing/ /byams dang snying rjes dgra zin mi mnga' yang/ /gdug pa 'dul phyir dus las mi 'da' ba' i/ /'jigs byed
222b4(rgyud 'grel): he ru ka la phyag 'tshal lo/ /nam mkha' i lus can gang yang thogs med cing/ /'dod dgur bsgyur ba'i gzugs can 'phrul mo che/ /ma srin byams ma'i tshul gyis grogs mdzad ma'i/ /phyi nang mkha' 'gro'i tshogs la phyag 'tshal lo/ /rnal
222b5(rgyud 'grel): 'byor de nyid bcom ldan 'das/ /rdo rje sems dpa' de bzhin gshegs/ /dam tshig la sdang rnam sbyang phyir/ /dur khrod gar gyi phyag rgya gsal/ /sangs rgyas khro byung khro bo ni/ /thal bar 'jigs pa'i mchog yin te/ /sems
222b6(rgyud 'grel): dpa' sngon po 'bar ba can/ /'bar ba'i dkyil 'khor dmar po snang/ /rdo rje kha TwAM rdo rjer bcas/ /dril bu khrol ba'i sgrar bcas pa/ /gos chen po dang klubs pa che/ /sha chen po dang/ sbrang rtsi che/ /dur khrod kun gyi 'byung po che/ /phyag rgya dpal
222b7(rgyud 'grel): ldan dbang phyug mchog /shin tu khro gtum gdug pa yi/ /sems can khams ni rnam sbyang zhing/ /'di ni dpal ldan he ru ka'i/ /rdo rje rgya chen dbang phyug mchog /se ral kha yi tshul dag tu/ /kha TwAM ga la rgyab brten bcas/ /lag pa g.yon
223a1(rgyud 'grel): par thod pa thogs/ /g.yas pa ba dan gsum pa byas/ /nam mkha' i phyag rgya rnal 'byor pa/ /nam mkha' kun tu 'gro bar 'gyur/ /bud med la sogs rin chen mchog /dngos po thams cad mkhas las 'byin/ /g.yas
223a2(rgyud 'grel): dang g.yon gyi sbyor ba yis/ /bde ba dbab pa'i gar byed pa/ /skyil mo krung ni phyed bcas la/ /rkang pa rang gi brlas mnan pa'o/ /zhi dang drag po rmongs pa'i mchog /dga' ba'i gar byed sgyur bar bcas/ /shi ba'i ro ldang bsgyur
223a3(rgyud 'grel): ba yis/ /bde ba'i phyag rgya rab tu gnas/ /zhi dang drag po rmongs byed dang/ /gyen du dbyug 'byin gar byed lus/ /lta ba'i phyag rgya grub pa'i mchog /gsang ba'i sbyor ba bde mchog go /tshangs pa chen po'i mgo dang ni/ /de bzhin 'jig
223a4(rgyud 'grel): rten gsum las rgyal/ /de bzhin sa las 'dren pa dang/ /rang gi phyag rgya'i tshul bstan dang/ /dur khrod dag ni gar byed dang/ /de bzhin rlung gi dkyil 'khor dang/ /rab tu 'jigs pa bsreg pa'i me/ /las kyi phyag rgyar rab tu gnas/
223a5(rgyud 'grel): gzigs pa rnam pa sna tshogs 'gyur ba'i rgyas thob la/ /rnam pa sna tshogs 'o byed 'khyud pas rmongs mdzad de/ /rnam pa sna tshogs bde ba'i mchod ston kun gsol la/ /rnam pa sna tshogs bde mchog ngo mtshar bstan du gsol/
223a6(rgyud 'grel): rgyab btab rmongs byed mnabs su gsol/ /bde mchog ngo mtshar bde bar bzhugs/ /hUM a la la la la ho snang bar mdzod/ /rnal 'byor bde mchog sgyu mas sprul/ /dam tshig dag la 'jug tu gsol/ /nyon mongs kun las rgyal
223a7(rgyud 'grel): bar mdzod/ /ma lus bdag la mnabs su gsol/ /nyon mongs thams cad bsal bar mdzod/ /rdo rje thal mo gyen du dbye/ /mdzub mo gnyis kyi rtse mo dgug /mthe bong gnyis kyi mche ba gtsigs/ /'jigs pa'i rdo rje gnod sbyin
223b1(rgyud 'grel): ma'o/ /yi ge brgya pa dang ldan pa'i/ /dam tshig mchog gi phyag rgya ni/ /lha rnams kun gyi gnas dag tu/ /sngags dang sbyar te bskul bar bya/ /oM pa na poM/ pe nu su ra ta/ ti pu pa ra mu /sarba ta thA ga ta sa ma ya/ yo gi sid+d+hi A hUM/ oM A:
223b2(rgyud 'grel): hUM/ rab tu dga' ba'i bdag la phyag 'tshal lo/ /de bzhin gshegs pa'i dam pa grub par mdzod/ /dam tshig dam pa grub par mdzad du gsol/ /mchod pa chen po thams cad dag par mdzod/ /mchod pa thams cad grub par mdzod//
223b3(rgyud 'grel): a la la ste mchod pa 'bul/ /a la la ste dam tshig bskongs/ /a la la ste dgyes par mdzod/ /a la la ste dngos grub stsol/ /dgyes mnyam longs spyod mchog la rol/ /oM sh+rI badzra rA ga puShpe bu d+hU pe d+hu/ a lo ke hUM(rgyud 'grel): gand+he gaM/ badzra
223b4(rgyud 'grel): lA sye hUM/ badzra gI ti h+rI:/ badzra nri tye a:/ a la la la la ho/ bde bar gshegs pa khro rgyal gtso/ /rgyal ba rgya mtsho ye shes kyi/ /srid brgya mtsho mdza' yas kun/ /kun bzang?  mchod sprin mchog tu rol/ /na ma(rgyud 'grel): sarba ta thA ga te b+hyo/
223b5(rgyud 'grel): bi shwa mu khe b+hya(rgyud 'grel): sarba ta da khaM ung+ga te/ spha ra NA hi maM ga ga na khaM swA hA/ oM 'byung ba lnga las thams cad 'gyur/ /rang las ma byung gar yang med/ /gtsang med dri rtog kun bral ba'i/ /bdud rtsi byang chub sems chen pos/ /bdag sogs
223b6(rgyud 'grel): gnyis med mchod pa'i phyir/ /mnyam pa chen po'i rgyan la rol/ /oM na ma(rgyud 'grel): sarba ta thA ga ta pany+tsa a mri ta A(rgyud 'grel): hUM/ kA ya sid+d+hi oM/ bAka sid+d+hi A:/ tsit+ta sid+d+hi hUM/ oM sh+rI he ru ka i da na d+hU pe/ puShpe pe/ pI pa/ gand+he/ bi laM ha/ ba ti?
223b7(rgyud 'grel): sh+rI b+ha ga bAn/ kha kha kha/ khA hi khA hi khA hi/ dza(rgyud 'grel): hUM baM ho:/ sh+rI he ru ka ma hA badzra/ a be sha ya/ a be sha ya/ pra be sha ya/ pra be sha ya/ pra tIts+tsha ho/ sh+rI bAn kha kha kha/ khA hi khA hi khA hi/ sgeg pa dpa' bo mi sdug 'jigs su rung/ /rgod dang
224a1(rgyud 'grel): gshe dang 'jigs par byed pa dang/ /snying rje rngam dang zhi ba la sogs pa'i/ /sku yi dngos po shin tu bsgyur ba yin/ /gar byas grub po rnal 'byor pa/ /gar gyi dbang phyug gtso bo che/ /zla ba la sogs snying po can/ /maM
224a2(rgyud 'grel): sa la sogs dro mchog stsol/ /me tog la sogs tsan dan phreng/ /bzang dgur dbul lo bzhes su gsol/ /mi mo rnams kyi reg bya'i mchog /byin gyis rlobs shig rnal 'byor pa/ /sgrub pa'i rdzas 'di thams cad la/ /hUM dang phaT
224a3(rgyud 'grel): kyis ldan par brjod/ /oM shin tu brgyan pa'i rigs dang mtshan ldan mchog /bkra shis dbyangs dang gar gyis bskyod pa yis/ /lha mo rdul snyed phyogs bcur spro byas nas/ /byang sems bde ba'i mchod pa'i rnam par rol/ /hUM
224a4(rgyud 'grel): hUM hUM/ ma hA su kha bo d+hi tsit+ta a la la la la ho/ /he ru ka'i gnas bcu dang/ /dur khrod chen po'i gnas brgyad nas/ /dpal chen khrag 'thung spyan drangs te/ /dur khrod mchog gi gnas 'di ru/ /zhing chen gsar rnying sti rar bcas/ /
224a5(rgyud 'grel): dmar gyi arg+haM rgya mtsho bskyil/ /mkha' 'gro 'bar ma'i tshogs bcas rnams/ /ma lus bzhes nas mnabs su gsol/ /dza(rgyud 'grel): hUM baM ho(rgyud 'grel): sh+rI he ru ka/ mahA badzra sarba duSh+Tan ma ma ya mu dra mA ra kha kha/ khA hi khA hi/ h+ri da ya pi pa hUM
224a6(rgyud 'grel): bzung ni za byed chen po ste/ khams gsum ma lus bsgral ba dang/ /gdul dka' ba dag gdul bya'i phyir/ /sha rus la sogs bza' bar bya/ /dza hUM(rgyud 'grel): baM ho:/ sh+rI he ru ka ma hA badzra sa ma ya/ ma hA sa ma ya/ ma hA rak+ta/ mahA tsit+ta?/
224a7(rgyud 'grel): ma hA ba su ta/ ma hA pany+tsa a mi ta/ ma hA arg+haM pra tIts+tsha ho/ kha kha kha/ le le le hUM b+hyo hUM b+hyo hUM b+hyo/ ko ta sha ko ta sha/ ko ta ko ta/ pa sa pa/ ki ra rA ga/ ka la sha/ ko la ba/ ko la ko la ba/ ka la bo/ shaT tha/ rnam dag sgrib sbyang srid gsum skyon
224b1(rgyud 'grel): bral zhing/ /ston ka'i zla gsal dri med zhal mnga' ba/ /bcom ldan bde gshegs bri med rdo rje'i dkyil 'khor dbyings/ /dus gsum rgyal ba thams cad bskyed pa'i yab/ /shes rab lha mo rigs kyi yum rnams dang/ /phyag rgya gtum
224b2(rgyud 'grel): chen rnam pa'i tshogs la sogs/ /bsod nams ye shes tshogs kyi zhing rnams rdzogs/ /dgyes pa rol pa'i dus kyi mchod par sbyar ba 'di/ /bzhes te a la la ste dgyes par mdzod/ /oM badzra e sa hUM/ pe sa hUM/ sa ma ya bak+Sha
224b3(rgyud 'grel): hUM/ ru lu ru lu ru lu hUM b+hyo hUM(rgyud 'grel): dza(rgyud 'grel): hUM baM ho:/ pra ti dze hUM(rgyud 'grel): baM ho:/ ye nas mnyam nyid chos sku dag pa las/ /log rtog dbang gis sgo dang skur btab ste/ /bde dang sdug bsngal sna tshogs ngo bor smin/ /de bzlog don du rgyal ba'i dam
224b4(rgyud 'grel): mnos ba/ /rgyal bzhi khro'i thugs dam ci 'gal ba/ /thugs rje'i ngang can rnams la bzod par gsol/ /bcom ldan dpal chen rdo rje he ru ka/ khyod kyi thugs rje nam mkha' i mdza' dang mnyam/ /mkha' 'gro'i dkyil 'khor tshogs dang
224b5(rgyud 'grel): bcas pa yis/ /'gro la brtser dgongs tshangs par stsal du gsol/ /bdag cag dam tshig 'di la mngon du zhugs pa rnams/ /bcad gtubs lus la 'byung bar mi 'gyur zhing/ /grib mas phog pa'i sdug bsngal mi bzod pa/ /sku
224b6(rgyud 'grel): yi phyogs tsam mthong bas mod la 'tsho ba dang/ /gzi mdangs lus la 'jug pa bye ba stong phrag gis/ /'od kyis phog pas 'jig rten khams su snang ba dang/ /lus ngag sems dang tshen rdo rje rab gnas te/ /re smon thams cad dus 'dir grub par mthong
224b7(rgyud 'grel): du gsol/ /ye shes sems dpa' i sngags 'khor lo/ /lha rnams kun gyi gnas zhugs pa/ /yan lag rnam gsum ldan byas te/ /gsal ba gnyis kyi sgo nas brtsam/ /dang po rten dang brten pa'i sngags/ /'khor lo'i tshul ldan shes rab thab/
225a1(rgyud 'grel): yi ge mtshan ma sku yi gnas/ /bgrang dang bgrang ba las 'das pa'o/ /rtse gcig gnas su 'khor ba dang/ /langs dang rgyu dang 'phro ba las/ /mchod bskul las mdzad bsdu byed cing/ /dkyil 'khor gsal bar gyur pa'o/ /las
225a2(rgyud 'grel): kyi spyod pa kun sbyor zhing/ /dbyangs drug blangs pas don drug gsal/ /oM ru lu ru lu hUM b+hyo hUM/ thun mong gi snying po phrin las kun la 'jug pa'i yi ge 'bru brgyad pa'o/ /so so'i las la snyoms 'jug nas/ /rang gi mtshan ma sngags
225a3(rgyud 'grel): dang bcas/ /'phro 'dus rang gi las mdzad cing/ /sku gsung thugs ldan bzlas par bya/ /oM sh+rI he ru ka badzra sa ma ya hi/ sarba duSh+Tan sa ma ya mu dra pre ba dza ka hUM phaT/ khyad par gyi snying po rtsa ba'i sngags yi ge nyi shu rtsa
225a4(rgyud 'grel): drug pa'o/ /sngags gzhan rim bzhin gsal ldan pas/ /go rims 'khrul med bzlas brjod bya/ /las rdzogs mchod bstod bskul bya zhing/ /rang gi gnas su bsdu bar bya/ /mnyam nyid dkyil 'khor kun gyi mchog /don dam bde ba
225a5(rgyud 'grel): chen po'i sku/ /de bzhin nyid kyi ye shes sku/ /lha nyid brtson pas bsgom par bya/ /gzhan yang thig le 'am phra mo dag /lha dang dkyil 'khor rnam dag gi /mtshan mas dmigs pa sbyang byas te/ /chos sku'i phyag rgya chen por gnas/ /rigs kyi
225a6(rgyud 'grel): dkyil 'khor gsal byas nas/ /tshogs gnyis rdzogs pas grub byed pa'i/ /tshogs kyi dga' ba de'i longs spyod kyis/ /rnal 'byor tshogs kun mnyes bya'o/ /rta mchog mkha' 'gro'i tshogs bcas pa/ /lhag ma'i mchod pas mnyes byas
225a7(rgyud 'grel): nas/ /rang gi las la sbyar byas te/ /dngos grub don phyir mtshams su bzhag /gang zhig thun bzhi la sogs par/ /dkyil 'khor de nyid bsgoms pas ni/ /ye shes dkyil 'khor gshegs su gsol/ /dam tshig dkyil 'khor rim bzhin
225b1(rgyud 'grel): bsdu/ /slar nyid sbyor ldan bsrung byas te/ /spyod lam rnal 'byor gnas par bya/ /tshogs 'gyur spyod lam bya ba yis/ /dus kun tu ni 'gro don brtsam/ /sa steng 'gro la grags pa yis/ /'gro ba thugs rje rnam dag ston/ /rnam bkod rgya mtsho
225b2(rgyud 'grel): 'khrugs 'dra las/ /bde ba'i grog lam don gsal mdzad/ /srin bus grong khyer gsal min yang/ /dman rnams don phyir cung zad zhig /sgrub don dam pa'i gzhung gsal byas/ /grags sogs ngan rtog blos ma yin/ /thugs rje'i
225b3(rgyud 'grel): dgongs mdzad ji lta bzhin/ /ngal ba las byung nyi zer gyis/ /khams gsum mun sogs ser mdzad nas/ /yang dag grub pa'i 'bras thob shog /dpal he ru ka'i sgrub thabs zhes bya ba slob dpon chen po hUM mdzad rdo rjes mdzad pa rdzogs so// //
225b4(rgyud 'grel): rgya gar gyi mkhan po bidyA ka ra si? ha dang/ zhu chen gyi lo tsa ba bando lha rin po ches bsgyur cing bstan la phab pa'o// //rgya gar skad du/ sh+rI he ru ka sAd+ha na/ bod skad du/ dpal he ru ka zhes bya ba'i sgrub pa'i thabs/ /dpal rdo
225b5(rgyud 'grel): rje 'chang chen po la phyag 'tshal lo/ /bde chen las byung 'gro ba'i mgon/ /ye shes sku rigs kun gyi dngos/ /rgyu 'bras dregs tshogs 'joms mdzad pa'i/ /khro rgyal stobs chen dpal la 'dud/ /yang dag grub pa'i las gzhung gis/ /bsnyen
225b6(rgyud 'grel): grub bzhi yi tshul 'jug la/ /khro bo'i dkyil 'khor rnam 'phrul bcas/ /dgos don 'brel ba'i sgo nas bshad/ /rtsod dus log pa'i stobs rgyas pa'i/ /'dul dka' rgyun srang shing me ltar/ /mdzad sbyong zhi bas mi thul bar/ /thugs sprul shugs
225b7(rgyud 'grel): kyis las bstan mdzad/ /de nyid sgrub gzhung phyag rgya'i tshogs/ /bdud rtsi bcud bral 'khrul rtog slang/ /nges gzhung don rtogs spyod sgo gsal/ /tshul gyis legs bsdus bstan pa dbye/ /'jug pa'i rnal 'byor rtsal 'chang ba/ /shes rab don
226a1(rgyud 'grel): ni blo phye nas/ /nges par bstas pa'i sa gzhi la/ /bla ma nges pas lung 'di bstan/ /snum pa yi ni dam tshig par/ /gtsang dang 'jigs pa'i brtul zhugs can/ /de dag goms nas nyams su blang/ /sgrub pa'i dbang phyug phun
226a2(rgyud 'grel): sum tshogs/ /blo zhan shes rab chung bas ni/ /bsgrubs kyang 'grub par mi 'gyur te/ /'phur byed gnyi ga bsregs pas na/ /de bas gzhan du bstan pa min/ /dur khrod dang ni lha rten dang/ /ma mo'i gnas la sogs 'dug na/ /rdo rje 'dzin
226a3(rgyud 'grel): pa'i bgos pa dag /rnam pa du ma 'grub par 'gyur/ /phyi dang nang gi rdzas bsags nas/ /rang rgyud spyangs pa'i rnal 'byor pas/ /bgegs tshogs nye bar zhi bya dang/ /tshogs bsags bsrung ba'i don ched du/ /'byung po'i gtor ma btang
226a4(rgyud 'grel): nas ni/ /gsang ba don gyi las rnams bya/ /bdag nyid rang gi lhar sbyar la/ /lus ngag yid gsum mthu bskyed cing/ /gnas gsum 'gro ba sbyang byas nas/ /rang bzhin rnam dag lha yi sku/ /rnam gsum sems dpa' i 'phro 'du yis/ /
