226a5(rgyud 'grel): dkyil 'khor mdun gyi zla dkyil bzhag /rtse gcig sems kyis mchod sogs dang/ /'gro don spyod pa rgya chen bya/ /rdo rje sems dpa' i sbyor gsal zhing/ /rdo rje se gol gtogs pa'i m?/ /thams cad 'dus pa khro bo'i sku/ /thugs
226a6(rgyud 'grel): sngags mtshon cha'i tshogs spro mdzad/ /rdo rje sa gzhi ra ba gur/ /bla re mtshon cha me 'od 'phro/ /'khor lo sgyur ba gdan bcas la/ /rigs kyi khro bo rab 'jigs pa'o/ /dang po chos kyi dbyings nyid la/ /dmigs pa med pa'i don gyis bsgom
226a7(rgyud 'grel): dngos po med par bdag sbyor bas/ /nam mkha' kun dang mnyam sbyor ba'o/ /oM ma hA shU n+ya tA dz+nyA na badzra swa b+hA ba At+ma ko haM/ chos kyi dbyings kyi ye shes kyis/ /thams cad kun la'ang khyab par bsam/ /chos kun stong gsal rang bzhin
226b1(rgyud 'grel): med/ /mi dmigs snying rje chen po'i ngang/ /oM d+harma d+hA tu swa b+hA ba At+ma ko haM/ rdo rje sems dpa' i ting 'dzin gyis/ /mkha' dbyings sna tshogs la gnas pa/ /cir yang gyur pa'i yig 'bru las/ /'od zer tshul du spros nas kyang/ /ma lus nye ba khyab byas
226b2(rgyud 'grel): te/ /re zhing rngam pa'i tshul du dgongs/ /e las mkha' dbyings gru gsum dkar/ /bzang po'i mkha' dbyings gyen bsgreng nas/ /yaM las rlung dkyil gzhu yi dbyibs/ /dud kha sra mkhregs sgrol ma'i mkha' / /paM las chu dkyil dkar zhing
226b3(rgyud 'grel): zlum/ /bum pas mtshan pa mA ma kI /laM las gser gyi sa gzhi ste/ /gru bzhi spyan ma rdo rjes mtshan/ /khaM las rak+ta'i dpa' klong 'khyil/ /'dod chags chen po'i rang bzhin rtags/ /kaM byung keng rus ri rab ste/ /rin chen rgyan spras rdo rjes
226b4(rgyud 'grel): mtshan/ /raM las me tog dmar ser 'bar/ /gru gsum ras mtshan gos dkar dbyibs/ /dbus su b+h+ruM las gzhal yas khang/ /gru bzhi sgo khang sgo khyud can/ /rin chen thong pa sna tshogs mkhregs/ /nyi zla rdo rje'i rgyan gyis mdzes/ /pad gdu
226b5(rgyud 'grel): rnga yab rta babs ldan/ /'dod yon sna tshogs rgyan gyis mdzes/ /dkyil 'khor zla kham sgo can la/ /re'u cha dgu pa rdo rje'i phreng/ /rin chen sa gdung rdo rje tog /sna bdun mchod pa'i rgyan phreng tshogs/ /zhing sprul tshangs pa'i g.yang gzhi sogs/ /
226b6(rgyud 'grel): dur khrod rgyan gyis 'jigs par brgyan/ /dkyil 'khor phyi rim gnas brgyad du/ /dur khrod zhing dang zhing skyong dang/ /phyogs skyong rnal 'byor mtsho dang sprin/ /klu rgyal de dag gnas brgyad du/ /sha za 'byung po gshin rje dang/ /mkha' 'gro
226b7(rgyud 'grel): bya khyi ro langs sogs/ /ce spyang khro sogs sgra 'byin cing/ /ro yi tshogs la longs spyod mdzad/ /rang 'byung mchod rten dang bcas pa/ /phreng ba rim gsum phyi rol gnas/ /dkyil 'khor dbus kyi lte ba la/ /pad gdan drags byed nyi zla'i
227a1(rgyud 'grel): steng/ /dpal mchog dang po gnas gyur nas/ /'khrul pa'i ting 'dzin la gnas mdzad/ /chos rnams thams cad rnam brtags na/ /dngos med mtshan ma kun rtog bral/ /zla dkyil A li gsal ba dang/ /nyi dkyil kA li
227a2(rgyud 'grel): gnas pa dag /spro dang bsdu ba'i sbyor ba yis/ /mtshan bzang dpe byad gsal ba'i don/ /thams cad gcig tu bsdus pa las/ /'od dpung kha dog sna lnga nyid/ /hUM las rdo rje rtse lnga pa/ /dkar po bum par hUM gis mtshan/ /gdod ma tha
227a3(rgyud 'grel): ma med pa'i dbyings/ /dang po'i rdo rje chen po yin/ /badzra a haM/ 'od zer drug gi 'phro 'du ba'i/ /dkyil 'khor drug gi las mdzad nas/ /sku gsung thugs dbyings zhugs pa las/ /'od zer phreng mdzes brjid pa'i mchog /de las sku
227a4(rgyud 'grel): mchog phyag rgya che/ /sngags kyi 'khor los gsal bar byas/ /ma hA su kha badzra satwa/ dza(rgyud 'grel): hUM baM ho(rgyud 'grel): su ra ta stwaM/ de dag ye shes byang chub sems/ /mngon byang lnga yi bdag nyid do/ /bde gshegs rigs kun rdo rje'i dngos/ /nyon mongs
227a5(rgyud 'grel): dri bral chags pa'i bzhin/ /g.yas sngo g.yon dmar rgyab zhal ser/ /phyag bzhi rdo rje rtse lnga bsgyings/ /rdo rje kha TwAM ba dan dril/ /'og ma gnyis kyis mnga' dang gzhu/ /rin chen rgyan sogs na gza' glubs/ /thor tshugs mtshan dpe phyag
227a6(rgyud 'grel): rgyas spras/ /rdo rje rtse lnga'i cho ga ni/ /gnas lnga dag tu btugs byas te/ /sngags kyis bde gshegs thams cad kyi/ /sku gsung thugs sogs rnam par bsam/ /oM na ma(rgyud 'grel): sarba ta thA ga ta/ kA ya bAk+tsit+ta ku ma/ karma badzra swa b+hA ba at+ma ko
227a7(rgyud 'grel): haM/ lus kyi ba spu'i gnas rnams su/ /dkyil 'khor drug gi rdul phran gnas/ /mkha' dbyings dbang phyug phyag rgya yis/ /gnas kun byin gyis brlabs par bya/ /oM d+harmA d+ha tu swa b+hA ba at+ma ko haM/ rang rig 'od gsal phyag rgya yul/ /'khril
227b1(rgyud 'grel): ba'i phyag rgya hUM las brgyan/ /ye shes rdo rje rtse lngas phaT/ /rin chen zur brgyad 'bar bas mtshan/ /rnam thar pad+ma e dkyil can/ /mdog ser lte ba ze 'bru dmar/ /sa ma ya sogs brdas bskul nas/ /dza(rgyud 'grel): hUM baM ho(rgyud 'grel): sa rol ba bya/ /oM pra be sha ya
227b2(rgyud 'grel): phaT/ a la la la la ho/ /byang sems bde chen 'od zer gyis/ /phyogs bcu'i rgyal ba mnyes mdzad nas/ /'gro ba'i lus ngag yid rtog sbyang/ /sku gsung thugs kyi 'od brgyad brjid/ /thams cad 'od kyis slar bsdus nas/ /stong gsum til
227b3(rgyud 'grel): gang 'bru 'bras rnams/ /sangs rgyas gsung gi yi ge'i tshogs/ /ba spu'i bu ga kun tu thim/ /thugs ka'i gnas su zhu ba dag /bde chen gnas bdus rim bzhin bcas/ /'dod chags chen po dga' ba'i mes/ /sku bcas 'od dpung kha dog lnga//
227b4(rgyud 'grel): sngon gyi goms shugs lha mo bzhis/ /phyogs bzhi nas ni bskul mdzad de/ /stong pa shin tu rnal 'byor yod med mthu/ /nam mkha' bzhin du dam tshig nye bar gnas /bde gshegs bde bar gshegs pa bzhes su gsol/ /rdo rje sems
227b5(rgyud 'grel): dpa' skal bzang dpal 'byor bdag /ye shes gsal ba'i rgyud bskul nas/ /thugs rjes 'gro ba'i rgyud gzigs te/ /'bras bu'i phyag rgya snga ma bzhin/ /cho ga rdzogs pas gsal bar 'gyur/ /de nas bcom ldan rdo rje 'chang/ /rdo rje sems
227b6(rgyud 'grel): dpa' i sbyor ba yis/ /rdo rje se gol gtogs byas te/ /sangs rgyas thams cad bsdu bar mdzad/ /'jig rten khams ni ma lus pa/ /sangs rgyas rdo rje 'dzin bcas rgyas/ /shin tu gdug cing gtum pa la/ /zhi bas phan par mi 'gyur te/ /shes
227b7(rgyud 'grel): rab thabs kyi ngo bo las/ /khro bor de bzhin gshegs kun mdzad/ /khro bo'i tshul can khros pas kyang/ /'jig rten gsum dag sreg byed na/ /sangs rgyas thams cad khros pa yis/ /khams gsum ma lus smos ci dgos/ /de nas sna yi rtse mo
228a1(rgyud 'grel): la/ /yid ni brtan par yang dag gzung/ /sna yi dbugs rings bro ba las/ /rgyal ba'i sbyor ba phyag rgya 'byung/ /bcom ldan de nyid rnal 'byor pas/ /rdo rje khro bor bsgyur nas byung/ /oM sh+rI he ru ka mahA badzra sa ma ya hi/
228a2(rgyud 'grel): sarba duSh+Ta(rgyud 'grel): sa ma ya mu pra/ pra baM dza ka hUM phaT/ /snga ma las ni gnas 'gyur te/ /bskal pa'i me dpung 'khrigs pa'i tshul/ /dbu skra sma ra ser gnag brdzes/ /spu rnams rdo rje gyen du 'khyil/ /sgeg pa dpa' bo 'jigs su rung/ /rgod
228a3(rgyud 'grel): dang gshe dang 'jigs par byed/ /snying rje rngam dang zhi ba yi/ /sku gsung thugs kyi gar thabs can/ /g.yas g.yon dang pos rdo rje dang/ /rdo rje kha TwAM dril bur bcas/ /gnyis pa dag na 'jigs byed kyi/ /pags pa rlung gi tshul du bskor/ /
228a4(rgyud 'grel): gsum pas dbang bskur dbu rgyan chu/ /tha ma gnyis na dung chen khrag /thod par sha chen snying gis bkang/ /dur khrod gar gyi phyag rgyar bsgyur/ /la lar zhal gcig zhal gsum sku/ /mthing gnag 'jigs pa'i me 'od 'bar/ /g.yas
228a5(rgyud 'grel): pa ba dan gsum pa phyag /rdo rje rtse lnga 'bar phreng can/ /rdo rje kha TwAM dril bu bcas/ /thod khrag gang ba g.yon pa na/ /'bar ba chen po sgra 'bar ba/ /thod pa mang po'i dbu rgyan can/ /'jigs pa chen po'i dus ltar drag /dur khrod bzhin du rab tu
228a6(rgyud 'grel): 'jigs/ /zhal rnams sna tshogs 'gyur ba dang/ /'bar ba'i lta bas gar byas pa/ /rdo rje rdo rje kha TwAM ga /dril bu'i sgra ni gsil ba yis/ /thams cad phab nas slar yang ni/ /thal bar gyur pa 'ang 'tsho bar byed/ /gti mug dbang mdzad
228a7(rgyud 'grel): theg chen rgyan/ /glang chen ko rlon stod g.yogs mnabs/ /'dod chags gzhan gyis rgol ba'i tshogs/ /tshar gcod stag gi sham thabs yin/ /nga rgyal thugs rjes 'gro sgrol phyir/ /'jigs byed chen po'i g.yang gzhi gyon/ /zhe sdang gzung
228b1(rgyud 'grel): 'dzin rnam dag pas/ /gnas brgyad sprul gyi phreng ba can/ /chags pa gnyis spangs gnyis ldan pas/ /khrag gi thig les tshom bur brgyan/ /phrin las sna tshogs mdzad pa yis/ /thal ba'i tshom bu'i mtshan ma can/ /byang sems gnyis dang mi
228b2(rgyud 'grel): 'bral don/ /zhag gi ri mos spras pa'o/ /phrag dog sku gsung rgyan ldan phyir/ /thod phreng thod dang se ral thogs/ /dregs byed tshogs rnams zil mnan pa'i/ /nyi zlas snyan gyi gong rgyan byas/ /lus dang ngag sems rdo rje yi/ /mtshan ma'i phyag
228b3(rgyud 'grel): rgyar ldan byas te/ /thams cad 'byung ba'i spyod pa yis/ /bdag gi lhar ni bdag nyid bya/ /oM A(rgyud 'grel): hUM/ thugs kar nyi ma la gnas pa'i/ /ye shes sems dpa' hUM dang bcas/ /'od zer 'phro 'du'i sbyor ba yi/ /ye shes dkyil 'khor spyan
228b4(rgyud 'grel): drangs te/ /lha mo bdud rtsi'i bum pas khrus/ /rin chen dbu rgyan rtse mo cig /rdo rje phreng ba'i rigs dag dang/ /thod phreng la gnas rigs lngas brgyan/ /lag pa shin tu brkyang ba yis/ /mdzub mo gnyis ni mdud par bcing/ /gung mos
228b5(rgyud 'grel): mthe bo'i rtse mo mnan/ /rdo rje'i phyag rgya yongs su bsgyur/ /bteg nas khro gnyer la bzhag ste/ /hi bcas dbang bskur sngags bcod bya/ /yab yum mkha' srang hi dang as/ /rdo rje padmo bskyed byas la/ /ling ga 'greng pa rang byung ba/ /brla yi dbus su
228b6(rgyud 'grel): gzhug byas te/ /dbyings dang ye shes sbyor ba las/ /he ru ka yi dkyil 'khor bskyed/ /byang chub sems de kun tu dag /ma lus nye bar sbyang byas nas/ /'dod par bya ba rab tu mnyes/ /'od 'dus thog ma'i gzugs la gzung/ /gsang nas
228b7(rgyud 'grel): so so'i gdan dag la/ /chos kyi snying pos lha rnams bskyed/ /hi las dpal chen he ru ka/ /gsang ba'i dkyil 'khor 'khor dbus su dgod/ /h+rI(rgyud 'grel): las lha mo dkar mo ste/ /de bzhin h+ni las rkun mo yin/ /dzhi(rgyud 'grel): las lha mo rmongs byed ma/ /dzhi las thal/ 
229a1(rgyud 'grel): byed phyogs bzhir ro/ /mtshams su hUM phaT las byung ba'i/ /spos byed la sogs lha mo bzhi/ /maM khaM raM las byung ba lha mo bzhi/ /mda''dzin la sogs phyi rol mtshams/ /a A oM a(rgyud 'grel): yi ge las/ /lha mo me tog la sogs
229a2(rgyud 'grel): bzhi/ /dza(rgyud 'grel): hUM baM ho(rgyud 'grel): bzhi rnams las/ /sgo bzhir rta mgrin 'phang mtho sogs/ /b+ha ga la ni ling ga bzhag /ling ga rdo rjer byin brlabs nas/ /he ru ka yi sku gnyis dag /spro zhing rang la bstim par bya/ /oM he ru ka badzra sa ma ya hi sarba
229a3(rgyud 'grel): duSh+Tan sa ma ya mu dra pa poM dza ka hUM phaT/ dzdza dkar mo dkar ser zhi ba'i mdangs/ /zhal bzhi phyag brgyad 'jigs pa'i stobs/ /g.yon brkyang gar gyis bzhugs par mdzad/ /mda' bzhi dus gcig bkang ba la/ /tshangs pa'i mgo
229a4(rgyud 'grel): bzhi dbyangs pa ste/ /spro zhing bsdus pas bshad du bzhugs/ /oM badzra gu hya sid+d+hi pa ra ma yo gi shwa ri dzdza/ rkun mo dmar ser drag mo'i zhal/ /g.yon pas lcags kyu kha TwAM 'khyud/ /g.yas pa'i gung mos rtse brgyad bstong/ /g.yas bteg
229a5(rgyud 'grel): stabs gnon lho yi phyogs/ /hUM hUM badzra tsaN+De shwa re kha TwAM ga ma hA badzra ka pA la mA la ku lu ru l+lu h+rI? dzdza/ /rmongs byed mdog gnyis gong ma phag /'og ma dmar mo phyag bzhi pa/ /g.yas kyi dang pos rdo rje gsum/ /g.yon gyi dang pos kham
229a6(rgyud 'grel): bor 'chang/ /log gnyis khu tshur ro la gtong/ /g.yas bteg stongs gnon lho yi phyogs/ /rmongs tshul nub kyi phyogs su'o/ /hUM badzra na ra ya ni dzhi dzdza/ thal byed mdog dkar slong tshul gzigs/ /g.yas na thod pa bdud rtsis bkang/ /
229a7(rgyud 'grel): g.yon pa ba dan gsum pa'i gar/ /dga' ba'i bzhin bcas byang gri phyogs/ /hUM badzra ba ta ke dzdza/ spos mo drag mo gar byed tshul/ /bol bzhi brla dpung dkar ba la/ /lus spubs dmar gsal yan lag sngo/ /rdo rje rtsa lnga dpag bsam
229b1(rgyud 'grel): shing/ /g.yas g.yon gar gyi 'gyur ba bcas/ /me mtshams 'khor lo'i stan la gnas/ /hUM badzra shu le gra b+handa maT dzdza/ ri khrod ro rtags tshul 'chang zhing/ /ser gnag g.yas pa ral gri 'dzin/ /g.yon pa me ? rdo rjes mtshan/ /g.yon brkyang rlung
229b2(rgyud 'grel): mtshams 'khor lo ston/ /hUM badzra? ki shits+tsha ta maT dzdza/ kun spyod kun gyi las mdzad cing/ /g.yas pas rdo rje dur khrag gsol/ /g.yon gyis thod pa zhags par bcas/ /zhal bzhi mthing gnag gtso bo'i bzhin/ /rdo rje kha TwAM se ral kha/ /dbang ldan
229b3(rgyud 'grel): 'khor lo'i rtsibs la gnas/ /hUM badzra be mA la pA she maT dzdza/ kun kyang thod phreng sbrul mdung dang/ /g.yang gzhi brgyad te gos su gon/ /gdan ni sna tshogs pad+ma la/ /yi dags nyi mas mtshan ma'o/ /mda''dzin dkar mo mnga' dang gzhu/ /me yi mtshams
229b4(rgyud 'grel): kyi gru chad la/ /he badzra ra ti baM dzdza/ kha TwAM ser mo kha TwAM ga /rdo rje dril can bden bral mtshams/ /baM mahA ra ta badzre ho dzdza/ 'khor lo 'dzin pa dmar ser mo/ /rtsibs brgyad 'dzin ba rlung gi phyogs /oM badzra lo tsa na yi ya dza/ sna tshogs ba dan ljang gu la/
229b5(rgyud 'grel): sna tshogs 'phan dril dbang ldan phyogs/ /roM ma hA sh+rI badzra hi(rgyud 'grel): dzdza(rgyud 'grel): dza:/ me tog ser mo me tog snod/ /rdo rjes mtshan pa bar khyams me/ /a badzra puShpe hUM dzdza spos me sngon mo rdo rje pog khar khyams bden bral pad gnas pa'o/ /a badzra d+hu ba dzdza:/
229b6(rgyud 'grel): dmar mo dmar mo rdo rje sgron/ /bar khyams rlung phyogs pad+mar bcas/ /a badzra a lo ka dzdza/ dri chab ljang gu dag byed snod/ /'thor byed dbang ldan pad+mar gnas/ /a badzra gand+he dzdza/ shar sgor rta mgrin 'phang mtho dkar/ /g.yas na rta gdong g.yon
229b7(rgyud 'grel): lcags kyu/ /oM badzra aM ku shi dzdza:/ lho sgor phag gdong sngon mo ste/ /g.yas pas mche ba g.yon zhabs 'dzin/ /oM badzra pA sha hUM dzdza/ nub sgor snang byed dmar mo ni/ /phyag gnyis nyi zla lcags sgrog 'dzin/ /oM badzra sh+ring kha le paM dzdza/ /
230a1(rgyud 'grel): byang du thal byed mdog ljang gu/ sangs rgyas gzugs bcas dril bu 'khrol/ /oM badzra gaN+De ho(rgyud 'grel): dzdza/ phyi yi lha mo bcu gnyis tshogs/ /rin chen rgyan phreng na bzas klu bas/ /khro brjid 'dzum bag mtshan ma 'dzin//
230a2(rgyud 'grel): sgo ba cung zhig 'gying ba'i tshul/ /kun mkhyen ye shes las grub phyir/ /dkyil 'khor lha rnams thams cad kyi/ /mig la sangs rgyas rnam snang mdzad/ /rna ba rdo rje nyi ma yin/ /kha la pad+ma gar dbang phyug /sna la rta mchog rol pa'o/ /yid
230a3(rgyud 'grel): la rdo rje he ru ka/ lus la rdo rje sems dpa' gnas/ /gnas gsum phyag rgya'i tshogs gsal bas/ /thugs kar sems dpa' gsum sngags bcas/ /rang rig dkyil 'khor spyan drangs nas/ /dbang bskur rigs kyi mtshan ma bsam//
230a4(rgyud 'grel): dga' chen dpal gyi rdo rje las/ /rdo rje se gol gar dang bcas/ /dpung mgor lan gsum bsdu ba'i rgya/ /gnyis med 'od zer lcags kyus dgug /ye shes can gyi spyod yul can/ /dpal chen khrag 'thung 'khor dang bcas/ /sems can
230a5(rgyud 'grel): don slad dam tshig dgongs/ /gnas 'dir brtse phyir gshegs su gsol/ /mdzas pa'i phyag rgya gyen du bsgreng/ /smin mtshams dbus su gtad par bya/ /dza(rgyud 'grel): hUM baM ho:/ sh+rI he ru ka/ ma hA badzra/ A kaTd+ha ya/ a kaDDha ya/ pra be sha ya/
230a6(rgyud 'grel): pra be sha ya/ band+ha ya/ band+ha ya/ to Sha ya to Sha ya/ badzra DA ki nI naM/ h+raM da ya hUM hUM phaT/ oM he ru ka badzra sa ma ya mu dra pra ba/ dza ka hUM phaT/ pad+ma'i phyag rgyas g.yas nas bskor/ /gar thabs thal mos lan gsum gdag/ dad pa dang ni dam tshig
230a7(rgyud 'grel): gis/ /tshur gshegs tshur gshegs he ru ka/ chos sku zhi ba'i ngang las kyang/ /gzugs sku 'jigs tshul bstan du gsol/ /thugs rje chen po thabs mkhas pas/ /gdug pa 'dul phyir gshegs su gsol/ /tshogs rje tshogs bdag
230b1(rgyud 'grel): dpal dang ldan/ /tshogs kyi slob dpon gshegs su gsol/ /ye shes rtogs pa'i khyad par las/ /sprul pa mang po'i tshogs dang gshegs/ /oM e hye hi b+ha ga ban dza(rgyud 'grel): hUM baM ho/ /ru lu ru lu dza(rgyud 'grel): hUM baM ho:/ e hye hi dri sh+ya ho/ /sa ma ya ho/ sa ma ya stwaM/ e
230b2(rgyud 'grel): hye haM a ra l+li ho/ h+ri h+ri h+ri/ thod phreng phyag rgya bcings pa las/ /g.yas nas rim bzhin bskor bar bya/ /bde gshegs pho brang dkyil 'khor 'dir/ /'gro ba ma lus bsgral ba'i phyir/ /don gyi dbang gis dgongs nas kyang/ /'khor bcas
230b3(rgyud 'grel): gshegs rnams bzhugs su gsol/ /oM sh+rI he ru ka ma hA badzra sarba duSh+Tan/ sa ma ya mu dra a be sha ya/ a be sha ya/ pra be sha sh+rI he ru ka hUM phaT/ rdo rje thal mo bskyed byas nas/ /sor mo bsnol bsdoms bskyob bar bya/ /sems
230b4(rgyud 'grel): can don phyir nan tan mchog bskyed cing/ /ye shes thugs rjes bdag la dgongs nas kyang/ /mi gnyis don gyi dngos grub mchog gi gnas/ /bdag la stsal cing brtan par bzhugs su gsol/ /oM he ru ka badzra sa ma ya hi/ sarba duSh+Tan
230b5(rgyud 'grel): sa ma ya mu dra pra b+han tsakra hUM phaT/ kA ya bAk+tsit+ta/ tiSh+Thar badzra hUM/ rdo rje khu tshur bcings pa las/ /mthe bo mthe bo chung bsgreng bar bya/ /hUM me mchog mnyam sbyor 'bar ba'i klong dkyil nas/ /thugs rje khros pas gdug pa 'dul mdzad pa/ /
230b6(rgyud 'grel): gsang sngags rmad byung drag po'i phrin las rnams/ /lhun gyis grub par byin gyis brlab tu gsol/ /oM sh+rI he ru ka/ mahA badzra sarba duSh+TaM/ sa ma ya stwaM a ba stwaM b+ha ya hUM phaT/ dam tshig phyag rgya rnam gsum ni/ /rim bzhin bcings te
230b7(rgyud 'grel): bskul bar bya/ /oM badzra gu hya tri sh+ya ho sa ma ya stwaM/ i badzra gu hya sa ma yo ho/ /oM badzra gu hya tri sa ma ya phaT/ dam tshig sa la bzhengs pa yi/ /dpal chen khrag 'thung 'khor dang bcas/ /dam tshig tshul bzhin ma gshegs sam/ /grub
231a1(rgyud 'grel): pa'i mchog dag ma stsal na/ /sku gsung thugs las 'gal bar ro/ /zhig par gyur par gdon mi za/ /zil gnon bsrung zhing bsdigs pa'i phyir/ /las kyi phyag rgya rnam gsum bcing/ /dza(rgyud 'grel): hUM baM ho/ sh+rI he ru ka ma hA badzra
231a2(rgyud 'grel): sarba duSh+Tan sa ma ya mu pra ma ra pra b+han tsakra/ bak+Sha ya bak+Sha ya/ bi d+haM sa ma ya bi d+hwaM sa ma ya/ b+hu ta k+She ti pra ti pra ti sti b+ha ya hUM phaT/ sku gsung thugs su bdag sbyar bas/ /pho brang dkyil 'khor rang las sprul/ /di na bdud kyi bdud bdag ste/ /
231a3(rgyud 'grel): mkha' 'gro'i tshogs bcas bsdus pa'o/ /oM sh+rI badzra ka ra mu ka shar yA ya/ na ma(rgyud 'grel): oM sh+rI badzra kha TwAM ga pra dzA lA yA na ma(rgyud 'grel): oM sh+ri badzra gand+he pra dzA lA ya na ma(rgyud 'grel): a ti b+hu ho/ /sarba ta thA ga ta/ banda nAM ka nAM kA ro ya mi/ ma hA yo gi
231a4(rgyud 'grel): ni/ a la la ho/ /pra ti b+hu ho/ /smin ma g.yon pa 'degs tshul gyis/ /ru lu ru lu bcas brgad 'dud/ /oM bdag med phyogs bral don dang thugs chud cing/ /byams dang snying rjes dgra zin mi mnga' yang/ /gdug pa 'dul phyir
231a5(rgyud 'grel): dus las mi 'da' ba' i/ /'jigs byed he ru ka la phyag 'tshal lo/ /nam mkha' i lus can gar yang thogs med cing/ /'dod dgur sgyur ba'i gzugs can 'phrul mo che/ /ma srid byams ma'i tshul gyis grogs mdzad cing/ /phyi nang mkha' 
231a6(rgyud 'grel): 'gro'i tshogs la phyag 'tshal lo/ /haM a ti b+hu ho/ /tshad med bzhi yi phyag rgya yis/ /gnyis su med par bstan byas nas/ /dman pa'i phyag rgya rnam pa bzhis/ /rang gi de nyid las sbyor ba'i/ /rnal 'byor de nyid bcom ldan 'das/ /rdo rje sems
231a7(rgyud 'grel): dpa' de bzhin gshegs/ /dam tshig la sdang rnam sbyang phyir/ /dur khrod gar gyi phyag rgyar gsal/ /sangs rgyas khro 'byung khro ba ni/ /thal bar 'jigs pa'i mchog yin te/ /sems dpa' spon mo 'bar ba can/ /'bar ba'i dkyil 'khor
231b1(rgyud 'grel): dmar po snang/ /rdo rje kha TwAM rdo rjer bcas/ /dril bu khrol ba'i sgrar bcas pa/ /gos chen po dang blugs pa che/ /sha chen po dang sbrang rtsi che/ /dur khrod kun gyi 'byung po yis/ /phyag rgya dpal ldan dbang phyug mchog /shin tu khro gtum gdug pa
231b2(rgyud 'grel): yi/ /sems can khams ni rnam sbyang phyir/ /'di ni dpal ldan he ru ka'i/ /rdo rje rgya chen dbang phyug mchog/ se ral kha yi tshul dag tu/ /kha TwAM ga la rgyab rten bcas/ /lag pa g.yon par thod pa thogs/ /g.yas pa ba dan gsum par
231b3(rgyud 'grel): byas/ /nam mkha' i phyag rgya rnal 'byor pa/ /nam mkha' kun tu 'gro bar 'gyur/ /bud med la sogs rin chen mchog /dngos po thams cad mkha' las 'byin/ /g.yas dang g.yon gyi sbyor ba yis/ /bde bar 'ba' ba'i gar byed pas/ /skyil mo
231b4(rgyud 'grel): krung ni phyed bcas la/ /rkang pa rang gi brlas mnan pa'o/ /oM ma hA sh+rI he ru ka sa ma ya hi/ sarba duSh+Ta/ sa ma ya mu dra/ pra baM dza ka hUM phaT/ mahA mu dra hi/ dkar mo thugs mchog zhi ba'i mdangs/ /gzigs tshul phyogs kun gar bsgyur
231b5(rgyud 'grel): zhing/ /mda' bzhi dus gcig 'phangs pa yis/ /bdud bzhi dag las rgyal bar byed/ /hUM badzra gu hya sid+d+hi pa ra ma yo ge shwa ri h+rI(rgyud 'grel): ma hA mu dra h+rI:/ rkun mo rgyas mdzad drag po'i bzhin/ /thugs rje skye bas 'gro gnas 'drin/ /khams gsum
231b6(rgyud 'grel): las rgyas gnon pa'i stabs/ /kun tu myur ba'i tshogs pa bstod/ /hUM hUM badzra tsaN+Da shwa ri kha TwAM ga ma hA badzra ka pA la mA la ku ru lu ru l+lu h+ni/ ma hA mu twa h+ni/ rmongs byed dbang gis chags tshul 'chang/ /zhal gnyis mthun pa'i stabs
231b7(rgyud 'grel): bcas pas/ /gnas gsum rnam dag sku gsum sbyor/ /bdud rtsi bcud ldan 'khor lo'i rgya/ /hUM badzra a na ra ya ni dzhi/ thal byed drag mo slong ba'i tshul/ /snod bcud bde ba chen por rol/ /ba dan gsum pa'i gar thabs kyis/ /
232a1(rgyud 'grel): sku gsung thugs kyi dga' mdangs gsal/ /hUM badzra pa ta ke dza/ ma hA mu dra hi/ sbos mo phrin las rnam 'phrul zhing/ /kun snang gsal bas drag pa'i tshul/ /ye shes rigs 'byung lnga yi mtshan/ /kun 'byung gar
232a2(rgyud 'grel): thabs 'gyur bar bcas/ /hUM badzra ha ra ni phaT/ ma hA ru tri hUM/ gtum mo 'dod pa'i las la brtson/ /gzhan gyi srog 'phrog 'gyur ba med/ /'thor byed rigs kyi mtshan ma can/ /gar bcas rtse gsum dbugs 'byin tshul/ /
232a3(rgyud 'grel): hUM badzra shu le gra b+hinda maT/ ma hA ru tri ha/ ri khrod chos nyid ro myong bas/ /shes rab mtshon chas kun gcod cing/ /sreg byed rigs kyi phyag rgya 'chang/ /rigs kyi tshul gyis gar byed pa'o/ /hUM badzra ki shits+tshinda phaT/ ma hA ru tra hi/
232a4(rgyud 'grel): kun spyod tshul rnams kun gyis rol/ /dbyings dang ye shes chags pa'i las/ /stong gsum mi gtong 'ching byed pa'i/ /'jigs byed rngam pa'i cha lugs can/ /hUM badzra pe mA la pA she phaT/ ma hA ru tra hi/ byams pa'i mda''dzin
232a5(rgyud 'grel): sgeg pa'i tshul/ /ma bcos zung du 'jug pa'i gzhu/ /mnyam nyid 'phro bas kun brtson pa'i/ /rtse gcig phrin las 'gyur ba med/ /he badzra ra ti pa/ ma hA ru tra hi/ thugs rje sna tshogs khyab pa yi/ /sgrar bcas sku gsung thugs
232a6(rgyud 'grel): rgyal byed/ /gnas gsum las rgyud dag byed pa'i/ /yon tan kun gnas 'phrul pa'i mchog /baM ma hA ra ti badzra ho/ /mahA ru tra hi/ /dga' byed myur ba'i brtul zhugs 'chang/ /las rgyud gcod byed theg pa'i mchog /zab cing rgya che kun
232a7(rgyud 'grel): tshul gyis/ /yon tan brgyad 'dzin byed pa'o/ /oM badzra lo tsa ne yaM yaM/ mahA ru tra hi/ btang snyoms sna tshogs phrin las sku/ /gzugs mdzes bskyod pa'i dgra dang bcas/ /dag byed phrin las bsnyengs pa med/ /thams cad ye shes
232b1(rgyud 'grel): rnam spros pa'o/ /ri ma hA badzri ha(rgyud 'grel): ma hA ru tra hi/ sbyin pa'i mchog rnams rnam par grol/ /gzugs mchog lha rdzas me tog rgya/ /sa gzhi mdun rol g.yas g.yon bstod/ /sna tshogs spung par thor byed pa'o/ /a badzra puShpe/ mahA ru tra hi/ tshul khrims
232b2(rgyud 'grel): dri mchog tshim byed pa'i/ /bdug spos legs par sbyar ba'i mchog /g.yas bskor bteg ste phyogs bcur bsgyur/ /mdun du phyogs par sngo byed pa'o/ /a badzra d+hu pa/ ma hA ru tra hi/ bzod gsal shes rab ting nge 'dzin/ /phun tshogs sel byed
232b3(rgyud 'grel): me mar rgya/ /kun tu bskor ba'i gar bsgyur zhing/ /thugs ka'i mtshan ma gsal ston pa'i/ /aM badzra A lo ke hUM/ mahA ru tra hi/ brtson 'grus rtse gcig 'gyur ba med/ /chos kun dag byed byug pa'i dri/ /srin mtheb brang nas rtse gsum
232b4(rgyud 'grel): 'thor/ /phyogs kun dngos bcas rnam dag 'gyur/ /a(rgyud 'grel): badzra gand+he/ ma hA ru hi/ pad+ma band+ha'i bdud rtsi bstod/ /myang ba rdub pa ltar byed cing/ /lcags kyu'i phyag rgya rdo rjer bcas/ /dgug pa'i tshul mchog las grub po/ /oM badzra a ku sha
232b5(rgyud 'grel): dza(rgyud 'grel): ma hA ru tra hI/ rdo rje mche ba gtsigs ba'i rgya/ /sna yi myang ba rdub pa yi/ /rin chen zhags pa gsol dka' i tshul/ /rang gi las la sbyor byed pa'o/ /oM badzra pA she hUM/ mahA ru tra hi/ rdo rje lcags sgrog nyi zlar bcas/ /mig mtshungs
232b6(rgyud 'grel): zhen par lta ba yis/ /khams gsum kun la gzigs pa'i rgya/ /phyag rgya'i las kyi bstan byed pa'o/ /badzra sh+rI kha la baM/ ma hA ru tra hi/ mtshams ldan sku mdog bdud rtsis bkang/ /thams cad bdag nyid myang ba yis/ /ston pa'i
232b7(rgyud 'grel): gsungs dbyangs kun tu sgrogs/ /thal 'jigs rgyud rnams slar 'tsho mdzad/ /oM badzra gaN+Da ho:/ ma hA ru tra hi/ gzigs pa rnam pa sna tshogs pa yi rgyas thob la/ /rnam pa sna tshogs 'o byed 'khyud pas rmongs mdzad do/ /rnam pa
233a1(rgyud 'grel): sna tshogs bde ba'i mchod ston kun gsol la/ /rnam pa sna tshogs bde mchog ngo mtshar bstan du gsol/ /rgyas btab rmongs byed mnabs su gsol/ /bde mchog ngo mtshar bde bar bzhugs/ /hUM la la la la ho snang
233a2(rgyud 'grel): bar mdzod/ /rnal 'byor bde mchog sgyu mas sprul/ /dam tshig bdag la 'jug tu gsol/ /nyon mongs kun las rgyal bar mdzod/ /ma lus pa ni bnabs su gsol/ /nyon mongs ma lus bsal bar mdzad/ /gsungs nas pad+ma rdo rje la/ /sa bon gsang
233a3(rgyud 'grel): sngags 'phro 'dur bcas/ /rgyal ba'i gsung tshogs gnyis med pa'i/ /rdo rje gsang gsum tshig 'don pa'i/ /oM suM b+ha gasta mah+na de bi hi ri mi ri shI ye hi swAhA/ /badzra dzi swAhA/ /oM bAk badzra A(rgyud 'grel): hUM/ rdo rje thal mo gyen du dbye/ /mdzub mo gnyis
233a4(rgyud 'grel): ni rtse mo dgug /mthe bo gnyis kyi mche ba gtsigs/ /'jigs pa'i rdo rje gnod sbyin ma/ /yi ge brgya sngags ldan pa yi/ /dam tshig mchog gi phyag rgyas ni/ /lha rnams kun gyi gnas dag tu/ /rnam gsum mthu yis bskul bar bya/ /rdo rje khu tshur
233a5(rgyud 'grel): bcas pa las/ /mthe'u chung gnyis ni rab brkyang nas/ /so so'i gsang sngags sbyor ba yi/ /las kyi sngags bcas don sbyor ba'o// //lag pa g.yas g.yon gnyis dag gis/ /mdzub mo'i mthe'u chung mdzes sgyur te/ /rdo
233a6(rgyud 'grel): rje thal mo gyen du dgrol/ /mchod pa'i gtor ma kun gyi tshul/ /oM pa na pe na/ pe nu su ru ta/ pu pa ra mu/ sarba ta thA ga ta/ sa ma ya/ yo ga sid+d+hi A hUM/ oM A(rgyud 'grel): hUM/ rab tu dga' ba'i bdag la phyag 'tshal lo/ /de bzhin gshegs pa dam
233a7(rgyud 'grel): pa grub par mdzod/ /dam tshig dam pa grub par mdzad du gsol/ /mchod pa chen po thams cad dag par mdzod/ /mchod pa chen po thams cad grub par mdzad du gsol/ /a la la ste mchod par dbul/ /a la la ste dam tshig bskongs/ /a la la
233b1(rgyud 'grel): ste dgyes par mdzod/ /a la la ste dngos grub stsol/ /dgyes mnyam longs spyod mchog la rol/ /oM sh+rI ra ga badzra a puShpe pu/ a d+hu pa d+hu/ A lo ke h+rI(rgyud 'grel): a gand+ha badzra ra ti paM/ ba ma hA ra ta badzra ho/ oM badzra lo tsa ne yaM ya/ raM mahA sh+rI hi/ a la la ho/
233b2(rgyud 'grel): bde bar gshegs so khro rgyal gtso/ /rgyal ba rgya mtsho ye shes kyi/ /srid pa brgya mtsho thams cad kun/ /kun bzang mchod sprin mchog tu rol/ /oM na ma(rgyud 'grel): sarba ta thA ga te b+hyo/ bi shwa mu khe b+hya(rgyud 'grel): sarba tad khaM ud+ga te/ spha ra Na hi meM ga ga na khaM swAhA/

233b4(rgyud 'grel): ta A(rgyud 'grel): hUM/ oM kA ya sid+d+hi oM/ oM bAka sid+d+hi A(rgyud 'grel): oM tsit+ta sid+d+hi hUM/ oM sh+rI he ru ka i daM d+hu ba puShpa dI pa/ gand+ha/ ba li ta/ pra tIts+tsha ho/ sh+rI b+ha ga bAn kha kha kha le le le/ khA hi khA hi khA hi/ dza(rgyud 'grel): hUM baM ho:/ sh+rI he ru ka/ mahA badzra/ a be sha ya a be
233b5(rgyud 'grel): sha ya/ pra pe sha ya/ pra be sha ya/ pra tIts+tsha ho/ /sh+rI b+ha ga bAn/ kha kha kha/ khA hi khA hi/ sgeg po dpa' bo 'jigs su rung ba dang/ /rgod dang gshe dang 'jigs par byed pa dang/ /snying rje rngam dang zhi ba la sogs pa'i/ /sku yi dngos po shin tu bsgyur ba yin/ /
233b6(rgyud 'grel): gar byas grub pa'i rnal 'byor pa/ /gar gyi dbang phyug gtso bo che/ /bza' ba la sogs snying po can/ /maM sa la sogs bro mchog stsol/ /me tog la sogs tsan dan phreng/ /bza' dgur dbul gyis bzhes su gsol/ /mi mo rnams kyi reg bya'i
233b7(rgyud 'grel): mchog /byin gyis rlobs shig rnal 'byor pa/ /sgrub pa'i rdzas 'di thams cad la/ /hUM dang phaT kyis ldan par mdzod/ /hUM shin tu brgyan pa'i rigs dang mtshan ldan mchog /bkra shis dbyangs dang gar gyis mchod byas pa'i/ /lha mo rdul snying
234a1(rgyud 'grel): phyogs bcur spros byas pa'i/ /byang sems bde ba'i mchod pas rnam par rol/ /hUM hUM mahA su kha be d+hi tsit+ta a la la ho/ /he ru ka yi gnas bcu dang/ /dur khrod chen po'i gnas brgyad nas/ /dpal chen khrag 'thung 'khor dang
234a2(rgyud 'grel): bcas/ /dur khrod mchog gi gnas 'di ru/ /zhing chen gsang snying sti rar bcas/ /dmar gyi arg+ha rgya mtshor bskyil/ /mkha' 'gro 'bar ma'i tshogs bcas rnams/ /ma lus bzhes nas bsnams su gsol/ /dza(rgyud 'grel): hUM baM ho(rgyud 'grel): sh+rI he ru ma hA
234a3(rgyud 'grel): badzra sarba duSh+TaM sa ma ya mu tra ma ra kha kha kha/ khA hi kha hi kha hi/ h+rid ya pi ba hUM phaT/ nga ni za byed chen po ste/ /khams ma lus bsgral ba dang/ /gdul dka' ma lus gdul ba'i phyir/ /sha rus la sogs bza' bar bya/ /dza(rgyud 'grel): hUM baM ho:
234a4(rgyud 'grel): sh+rI he ru ka /mahA badzra/ sa ma ya ma hA maM sa/ mahA rak+ta/ mahA tsit+ta/ mahA ba su ta/ mahA pany+tsa a mri ta/ mahA arg+haM pra tIts+tsha ho/ /kha kha kha/ le le le ho/ b+hyo hAM hUM b+hyo/ /ko tak+Sha/ ko ta ko ta ba sa pa sa/ ka ti ra ba/ ko lA k+Sha/ ko la ko la/ ka la
234a5(rgyud 'grel): pa/ shTa tha/ rnam dag sgrib sbyangs sring gsum skyon phral zhing/ /ston ka'i zla gsal dri med zhal mda' ba/ /bcom ldan bde gshegs rdo rje'i dkyil 'khor dbyings/ /dus gsum rgyal ba thams cad bskyed pa'i yab/ /shes rab lha mo
234a6(rgyud 'grel): rigs kyi yum rnams dang/ /phyag rgya gtum chen rngam pa'i 'khor la sogs/ /bsod nams ye shes tshogs kyi zhing rab rdzogs/ /dgyes shing rol pa'i dus mchod sbyar ba yi/ /bzhes te a la la ste dgyes par mdzod/ /oM badzra e
234a7(rgyud 'grel): ma hA/ pe sa hA/ sa ma ya bak+Sha hUM/ ru lu ru lu hUM b+hyo hUM/ dza(rgyud 'grel): hUM baM ho:/ pra tIts+tsha ho/ /ye nas mnyam nyid chos sku dag pa la/ /log rtog dbang gis sgra dang skur btab ste/ /bde dang sdug bsngal sna tshogs ngo bor smin/ /de bzlog don
234b1(rgyud 'grel): phyir rgyal ba'i dam mnos pa/ /rgyal pa zhi khro'i thugs dang ci 'gal ba/ /thugs rje'i dang can rnams la bzod par gsol/ /bcom ldan dpal ldan rdo rje he ru ka /khyod kyi thugs rje nam mkha' i mdza' dang mnyam/ /mkha' 'gro'i dkyil 'khor tshogs
234b2(rgyud 'grel): dang bcas pa yis/ /'gro la rtser dgongs tshangs par stsal du gsol/ /bdag cag dam tshig 'di la mngon du zhugs pa rnams/ /bcad gtub lus la 'byung bar mi 'gyur zhing/ /grib mas phog pa'i sdug bsngal mi bzod pa/ /sku yi phyogs
234b3(rgyud 'grel): tsam dran pas mod la 'tsho ba dang/ /gzi mdangs lus la 'jug pa bye ba stong phrag gis/ /'od kyis phog pas 'jig rten khams 'dir snang ba dang/ /lus ngag sems dang tshe ni rdo rjer rab brtan te/ /re smon thams cad dus 'dir grub par
234b4(rgyud 'grel): mdzad du gsol/ /rnam gsum sems dpa' sngags kyi phreng/ /dkyil 'khor kun gyi gnas zhugs pa/ /yan lag rnam gsum spro bsdu yi/ /gsal ba gnyis kyi sgo nas brtsam/ /rim gyis rten nyid rten sngags dag /'khor lo'i tshul ldan
234b5(rgyud 'grel): shes rab thabs/ /yi ge mtshan ma sku yi gnas/ /bgrang zhing grangs 'das tshogs spyod pa'o/ /rtse gcig gnas su 'khor ba las/ /langs shing 'khrul 'khor 'phro ba dag /mnyes skul las mdzad bsdu byed cing/ /dkyil 'khor gsal bar
234b6(rgyud 'grel): gyur pa'o/ /las kyi sbyor ba kun sbyor zhing/ /dbyangs drug blangs pas don drug gsal/ /oM ru lu ru lu hUM b+hyo hUM/ thun mong bsnyen pa las kun la/ /'jug pa'i yig 'bru brgyad pa'o/ /so so'i las la snyoms 'jug las/ /rang gi mtshan ma sngags
234b7(rgyud 'grel): phreng gnyis/ /'phro 'dus rigs mthun las mdzad nas/ /sku gsung thugs kyi bzlas brjod brtsam/ /oM sh+rI he ru ka badzra sa ma ya h+ri sarba duSh+Ta sa ma ya dra pra paM tsakra hUM phaT/ khyad par gtso bo'i snying po'i sngags/ /yi ge nyi shu rtsa lnga pa'o/ /gzhan
235a1(rgyud 'grel): yang rim bzhin sngags gsal bas/ /go rims 'khrul med brjod par bya/ /bzlas rdzogs mchod stong bskul byas nas/ /rang gi gnas su bsdu bar bya/ /gzhan yang thig le phra mo'i tshogs/ /dkyil 'khor lha ni rnam dag
235a2(rgyud 'grel): kun/ /mtshan bcas dmigs pa'i las sbyangs pas/ /chos sku'i phyag gsal gyur bsgom/ /rigs kyi dkyil 'khor gsal byas nas/ /tshogs gnyis rdzogs nas 'grub byed pa'i/ /dga' bde'i longs spyod tshogs 'gyur bas/ /rnal
235a3(rgyud 'grel): 'byor longs spyod mnyes par bya/ /rta mchog mkha' 'gro'i tshogs bcas pa/ /lhag ma'i mchod pas mnyes pa dag /rang gi las la sbyar bar bya/ /dngos grub don phyir mtshams su bzhag /mnyam nyid dkyil 'khor kun gyi mchog /don
235a4(rgyud 'grel): dam bde ba chen po'i sku/ /de bzhin nyid dbyings ye shes kyi/ /lha nyid brtson pas bsgom par bya'o/ /thams cad nam mkha' i mtshan nyid de/ /nam mkha' la yang mtshan nyid med/ /khams gsum dag ni ma lus pa/ /thams cad sgyu ma lta
235a5(rgyud 'grel): bu ste/ /ji ltar sgyu ma thams cad du/ /mthong ba dang ni reg par 'gyur/ /dmigs su yod pa ma yin te/ /de bzhin 'gro ba kun gyi tshul/ /gang zhig thun bzhi la sogs par/ /dkyil 'khor 'di nyid bsgoms pas ni/ /ye shes dkyil
235a6(rgyud 'grel): 'khor gshegs gsol zhing/ /dam tshig dkyil 'khor rim bzhin du/ /slar nyid sbyor ldan bsrungs byas te/ /spyod lam rnal 'byor gnas par bya/ /tshogs 'gyur spyod mthun bya ba yis/ /dus kun du ni 'gro don brtsam/ /mgon
235a7(rgyud 'grel): mchog sa steng kun grags pas/ /thugs rjes 'gro don rnam dag ston/ /rgya mtsho 'khrugs 'dra rnam log pas/ /nges don rnam par bkod pa'i sgo/ /don gsal srin bus grong khyer min/ /dman sogs ma 'ongs gzung bya'i phyir/ /
235b1(rgyud 'grel): sgrub don dam pa'i gzhung gsal byas/ /kheng drag ngan rtogs blos ma yin/ /thugs rje mchog gi dgongs mdzad bzhin/ /ngal ba'i dge sogs nyi zer gyis/ /khams gsum mun tshogs bsal 'gyur zhing/ /yang dag grub pa'i 'bras thob
235b2(rgyud 'grel): shog /dpal he ru ka'i sgrub pa'i thabs slob dpon chen po'i hUM gyi zhal snga nas mdzad pa rdzogs so// //rgya gar gyi mkhan po badzra sa ha dang/ sgra bsgyur lots+tsha ba rma rin mchog gis bsgyur cing gtan la phab ba'o/ /
235b3(rgyud 'grel): spang gyi lo tsa ba phyi ma dag gis sum thug tu zhu chen bcos pa'o// // */ /yan lag bzhi'i don snang bar byed pa bzhugs// rgya gar skad du/ tsa turtaM garthA lo ka nA ma/ bod skad du/ yan lag bzhi'i don snang bar byed pa zhes bya ba /
235b4(rgyud 'grel): bcom ldan 'das dpal rdo rje 'dzin pa la phyag 'tshal lo/ /mkha' mnyam gsal ba gnyis med pa'i/ /yon tan rin chen sna tshogs bzhi/ /thams cad rang bzhin bde chen sku/ /bkod pa kun snang rol ston 'dud/ /bstan pa'i snying po dri med
235b5(rgyud 'grel): bka' / /gsang don gsang ba kun gyi mchog /bsdu zhing de don gsal mdzad pa'i/ /mchog rnams kun la phyag 'tshal lo/ /dpal ldan bde mchog rgyud dag las/ /rim 'jug sgrub chen don bkod pa'i/ /tshig don rtogs dka' i rim pa dag/ rnam
235b6(rgyud 'grel): gsum dgu yi gzhung gsal phyir/ /bsnyen sgrub cho ga'i rim rgyas par/ /dngos gzhi dgongs mdzad sprel bsdus pa/ /dam pa'i rjes 'brengs mdza' gnyis bsal/ /gzhung bral 'khrul sogs dgag phyir bshad/ /bskal pa bye ba grangs med par
235b7(rgyud 'grel): sangs rgyas thams cad ma thob pa/ /phyag rgya'i cho ga gang dag gis/ /tshe 'di nyid la thob par 'gyur/ /de ni bdag gis brtag par bya/ /sangs rgyas kun dag bde ba'i mchog /bdag nyid gzhin du bsgrubs pa las/ /sangs rgyas kun dag
236a1(rgyud 'grel): bde mchog go /rnal 'byor yang dag ma yin te/ /lha la dmigs par byed pa dag /rnal 'byor gzugs brnyan rang bzhin te/ /lugs ma la sogs rnal 'byor skye/ /yang dag mchog sems rnal 'byor pa/ /lha la dmigs
236a2(rgyud 'grel): par byed pa dag /rang gi dam tshig bdag sbyor bas/ /mi 'gyur dam pa grub par 'gyur/ /gzugs brnyan lugs ma la sogs la/ /rnal 'byor 'gyur par mi 'gyur gyi/ /byang chub sems la rab brtson na/ /de las rnal 'byor ltar 'gyur ro/ /
236a3(rgyud 'grel): chos rnams thams cad snang grol dbyings/ /kun gsal stong nyid zung 'jug dngos/ /rang bzhin ma bcos lhun gyis grub/ /bde ba chen po mchog gi rgya/ /byang sems mkha' dbyings dag pa las/ /yon tan ma stsal kun 'byung snang//
236a4(rgyud 'grel): sna tshogs snang ba ris ma 'grub/ /rtog spyod zhen chags yul las 'das/ /dbu mar yang ni mi dmigs te/ /shes rab pha rol phyin sbyor ba/ /thabs kyis snying rje'i bdag nyid rnams/ /de bas de ni snying rje'i thabs/ /shes rab pha rol
236a5(rgyud 'grel): phyin par gsal/ /'di ni rnal 'byor bcom ldan 'das/ /rdo rje sems dpa' de bzhin gshegs/ /sangs rgyas thams cad mnyam sbyor ba/ /mkha' 'gro sgyu ma bde ba'i mchog /yang dag grub pa gcig pu nyid/ /ji ltar 'dod pa bzhin du
236a6(rgyud 'grel): sbyar/ /rtog pa'i cho ga thams cad la/ /grub pa dam pa mchog gi mchog /sna tshogs las kyis sbyor ba yis/ /cho ga sna tshogs 'dod pa yis/ /sems can rnams ni 'dul ba dang/ /bde ba thams cad bsgrub pa'i phyir/ /bcom ldan
236a7(rgyud 'grel): 'das 'byor de nyid ni/ /thams cad sangs rgyas rnam 'phrul pas/ /sems can kun don rnam 'phrul nas/ /myur du shin tu 'grub par 'gyur/ /'das dus bskal pa rim bzhin du/ /log pa'i lam zhugs rnam drug pas/ /bdag gzhan
236b1(rgyud 'grel): gnyis ka phung byed cing/ /dregs byed chen por gyur pa la/ /? gzhan dag gis mi 'dul phyir/ /sangs rgyas thugs rje chen po yis/ /dgongs mdzad gsang ba bla ma'i mchog/ rnam 'phrul chen po bstan pa yin/ /sems dpa' sangs rgyas kun
236b2(rgyud 'grel): gyi dngos/ /rdo rje sems dpa' bde ba'i mchog /gsang ba mchog gi dgyes pa la/ /thams cad bdag nyid rtag tu bzhugs/ /'di ni rang byung bcom ldan 'das/ /gcig pu rab tu che ba'i lha/ /rgyal ba kun gyi dgongs mdzad mchog /'khor lo gsang
236b3(rgyud 'grel): ba'i rgyud chen dag /rim bzhin brda' don gsal mdzad cing/ /des skyes phyag rgyas gtan la dbab/ /shes bya'i dkyil 'khor gsal gyur nas/ /rten mchog gi ni don sbyar nas/ /yan lag bzhi snang bcu drug tshogs/ /rgyu rkyen tshogs 'bras mdzad
236b4(rgyud 'grel): bcas rdzogs/ /gang zhig yun rings sbyangs pa'i mthus/ /snying rje chen po'i goms shugs can/ /dad brtson lta bas blo gsal zhing/ /nges brtags dkyil 'khor dbang thob pas/ /smin lam rdzogs byed 'gyur med gnas/ /bla mas bsgo ba'i
236b5(rgyud 'grel): don bzhin spyod/ /bdag gzhan don sgrub lam la gnas/ /blo gros mchog gyur gsang ba'i snod/ /dkyil 'khor theg par ma bzhugs shing/ /dam tshig spangs shing gsang don rmongs/ /shes rab che dang snying rje bral/ /log sman gus pa
236b6(rgyud 'grel): med spangs bya/ /gang du 'bras bu phun tshogs shing/ /bden pa'i dgon pa nyams dga' ba/ /gzhan dbang dgra yi tsher ma med/ /chu mchog shing gis mdzes byas par/ /kun tu sna tshogs bskal bzang por/ /kun tu sna tshogs bde mchog gis/ /  
236b7(rgyud 'grel): kun tu sna tshogs dgos pa rnams/ /ci bder bar ni bsgrub par bya/ /rten dang dgon pa gtsug lag khang/ /ri yi rtse mo rnams thams cad du/ /rnam pa du ma sna tshogs pa'i/ /sangs rgyas dgongs pa bsgrub par bya/ /pad+ma'i skyed mos tshal dga' dang
237a1(rgyud 'grel): chu bo dag gi mdo dag tu/ /pad+ma 'dzin pa'i dgos pa rnams/ /rnam pa du mar 'grub par 'gyur/ /rgyal po'i pho brang dga' ba dang/ /padmo skyed mos 'tshal nyid du/ /rnam pa sna tshogs du ma yis/ /rgyal ba'i dgongs pa bsgrub
237a2(rgyud 'grel): par bya/ /mkhar ni rnam pa sna tshogs dang/ /de bzhin chu bo'i 'gram dag gam/ /rgyal khams gzhan las grub pa ru/ /rdo rje rta ni bsgrub par bya/ /yul 'khor yo byad brgyan bcas dang/ /cha lugs rnam pa sna tshogs kyis/ /gnas kyi
237a3(rgyud 'grel): sa gzhi mdzes byas te/ /sgrub pa'i skyes bu dbye ba las/ /sgrub pa rnam pa sna tshogs kyis/ /bdag gzhan bya ba sna tshogs 'grub/ /gzhan don dmigs pa'i las la ni/ /slob dpon de nyid bcu sogs shes/ /tshad ldan rang rgyud dag pa yis
237a4(rgyud 'grel): dkyil 'khor dbang bskur sgrub pa dang/ /phrin las tshogs bsags bsrung don du/ /bsnyen 'gro bsnyen pa rdzogs byas pas/ /sa gzhi sa bon la 'jug cing/ /yang dag dkyil 'khor rgyas pa yi/ /gzhung bzhin 'jug par bya ba ste/ /rtog
237a5(rgyud 'grel): pa sna tshogs las 'phros pa'o/ /bdag don bya ba de las gzhan/ /sa gzhi sta gon sngon brtsams phyin/ /bdag nyid rang gi lhar sbyor bas/ /lus ngag yid gsum mthu bskyed cing/ /bdag dang 'gro sbyangs byas nas/ /rang bzhin dag pa'i rnam
237a6(rgyud 'grel): par bsam/ /bya ba'i rgyud sogs gsungs pa yi/ /gtor sbyin chen po'i cho ga yis/ /mgron tshogs bzhi po tshim byas nas/ /bsgo ba'i phrin las drag tu bya/ /phyogs bzhir bsrung ma'i stegs bu la/ /bsrung ba'i yi ge brtsams te
237a7(rgyud 'grel): bzhag /yang dag gsang ba'i dkyil 'khor 'dir/ /gsang ba'i dam can so so nas/ /'du ba las ni ma gtogs shing/ /nyan pa las ni mi dbang ba'i/ /bgegs dang 'byung po thams cad kun/ /da lta nyid du so sor dengs/ /ji ste bka' las
237b1(rgyud 'grel): 'das gyur na/ /rdo rje 'dzin rgyal khros nas kyang/ /rdo rje mtshon chen 'bar ba yis/ /gtan du brlag cing phung bar 'gyur/ /hUM badzra dza la raM yaM khaM tsakra bi shwa hUM phaT phaT/ thabs dang shes rab bsgrub pa pos/ /phyi dang nang gis bkang bshags kyis/ /rin
237b2(rgyud 'grel): chen snong mdzes dri yis bsgribs/ /rnam dag ris gsal ji bzhin pa'o/ /thugs ka'i 'od zer spro bsdu yis/ /dkyil 'khor mdun du dbug bya ste/ /dga' chen dpal las byung ba yi/ /se gol dpung mgor lan gsum gtog /rdo rje bcing skyo'i se
237b3(rgyud 'grel): gol gyis/ /sangs rgyas thams cad bsdu bar bya/ /oM badzra sa ma dza hUM/ oM thams cad spros bral de nyid che/ /mkha' mnyam ye shes rtog med mchog /gnyis snang so sor smin dgongs mdzad/ /thugs rjes smon lam thabs mkhas pas/ /
237b4(rgyud 'grel): dbang po'i gzhu bzhin ci 'dul ston/ /phyogs bcu'i rgyal ba sras dang bcas/ /lha mo dag mchog dam pa'i lha/ /dkyil 'khor tshogs rnams dgongs su gsol/ /dza hUM baM ho(rgyud 'grel): oM e hye hi ma hA ka ru Ni ka sa ma ya stwaM/ sna tshogs gar las byung
237b5(rgyud 'grel): ba yi/ /rdo rje thal mo spyi bor sbyar/ /oM rdo rje rgyal po yon tan mchog /byang chub mchog ston 'dren mdzad cing/ /nyon mongs mtsho skems sgron mas brgyan/ /thugs rje can la skyabs su mchi/ /phyogs bcu kun na bzhugs pa yi/ /rdzogs sangs
237b6(rgyud 'grel): thub pa sras tshogs bcas/ /thugs rje chen po mnga' rnams la/ /gus par phyag 'tshal skyabs su mchi/ /oM a d+hi d+hU hUM/ oM h+ri(rgyud 'grel): h+ri(rgyud 'grel): traM hUM/ mtshon cha drug gi tshul 'dra yis/ /thal mo kha yi gnas su gtug /oM na ma(rgyud 'grel): sarba tro tra hUM/ oM h+ri:
237b7(rgyud 'grel): h+ri(rgyud 'grel): tra ho/ /mchod pa so so'i rjes mthun par/ /lha mo gar bcas phyag rgya bcing/ /oM stong gsum mi mjed gnas 'di dang/ /gzhan yang phyogs bcu'i 'jig rten gyi/ /las kyi longs spyod mngon rgyud dang/ /sangs rgyas yon tan sbyar? ba yi//
238a1(rgyud 'grel): mchod rdzas bzang po khyad par can/ /dngos su sbyar tshogs sems kyis sprul/ /me tog gzugs mdzes kha dog dang/ /dbyibs rnams sna tshogs mdza' yas mchog /bdug spos dri mchog khyad par can/ so so'i rgyu las
238a2(rgyud 'grel): byung ba'i dri/ /mar me rin chen shing gi 'od/ /mun pa'i tshogs 'joms gsal byed rgyun/ /dri mchog bzang pos sbyar ba chu/ /rnam rtog dri ma dag byed rgyun/ /bza' btung sna tshogs rgyu las byung/ /tshim byed ro mchog brgya ldan rdzas/ /
238a3(rgyud 'grel): yan lag brgyad ldan khrus pa'i chu/ /mchod yon tshul du dga' bde'i mchog /dkyil 'khor kun la legs 'dul na/ /mgon po thugs rje kun gyis bzhes/ /oM badzra puShpe oM/ oM badzra d+hU be hUM/ oM badzra A lo ki h+rI(rgyud 'grel): oM badzra band+he
238a4(rgyud 'grel): he hi/ oM badzra nai be tye traM/ oM badzra A ha ra hi/ sman dang 'bru yi rnam pa dang/ /bla re na bza' rgyal mtshan gdugs/ /ba dan phreng ba sna tshogs dang/ /do shal dpung rgyan sor bdub spras/ /dam pa rnams kyi longs spyod rkyen/ /bsod
238a5(rgyud 'grel): nams mthu las byung ba yi/ /yon tan thams cad 'byung ba'i gnas/ /nor bu rin chen 'khor lo'i mchog /blon po dmag dpon btsun mo bza' / /rta mchog glang po rin chen mchog /rnam spras nye ba'i rin chen bdun/ /bkra shis rdzas
238a6(rgyud 'grel): mchog bcu drug mchog /bum pa bzang po rgyan la sogs/ /pa Ta'i phreng ba mdzes sogs rnams/ /dkyil 'khor kun la legs 'dul na/ /mgon po thugs rje can gyis bzhes/ /oM na ma(rgyud 'grel): sarba ta thA ga te b+hyo/ a laM ka ra pa na pe nu hUM
238a7(rgyud 'grel): swAhA/ /ro d+hi d+haM sha ra ta me g+ha pa ra na hUM/ /oM sna tshogs gzugs mdzes sgra snyan zhing/ /dri zhim ro mchog brgya ldan pa/ /reg bya'i bde ba sprin phung bzhin/ /nam mkha' gang bar byung ba dang/ /gang gzhan 'gro ba drug po dag /lha tshogs
238b1(rgyud 'grel): lha mor bcas 'gyur bas/ /rgyan rnams kun gyis legs mdzes par/ /glu dbyangs tshigs su bcad pa dang/ /bro tshogs gar gyis bskyod byas pa'i/ /stong gsum rdul snyed sbrul byas rnams/ /dkyil 'khor kun la legs 'bul na/ /mgon po thugs rje
238b2(rgyud 'grel): can gyis bzhes/ /oM na ma(rgyud 'grel): sarba ta thA ga te b+hyo/ bi shwa mu khe b+hya(rgyud 'grel): sarba tad khaM ud+ga te spha ra Na hi maM ga ga na khaM swAhA/ /oM rigs lnga'i dam tshig rdzas chen po/ /ye shes lnga rdzogs grub pa'i dbyibs/ /rgyud lnga'i sems can kun grol zhing/ /
238b3(rgyud 'grel): rgyud lnga'i sems can bdud rtsi 'di/ /snying po tshim byed bcud kyi mchog /byang chub sems sogs bde ba'i rgyun/ /ma lus kun gyi reg bya las/ /rol pa sna tshogs snang ba dang/ /srid gsum brtan g.yo'i dngos po dang/ /nyon mongs sgo gsum
238b4(rgyud 'grel): spyod tshogs dang/ /phung po khams dang skye mched kyi/ /gzugs bzang mchod sprin thams cad kun/ /sku lnga rigs lnga ye shes lnga/ /lha mo sras bcas ngo bo nyid/ /'khor 'das snang ba'i dkyil 'khor kun/ /sna tshogs dngos med byang chub sems//
238b5(rgyud 'grel): gnyis su med par 'bul lags na/ /mnyam nyid blang dor med pas bzhes/ /oM na ma(rgyud 'grel): sarba pany+tsa rA sa ya na a mri te hUM phaT/ oM baM d+hi tsit+ta mahA su kha hUM/ brda med rtse gcig sems nges par/ /rdo rje thal mo snying gar sbyar/ /hUM bdag
238b6(rgyud 'grel): dang mdza' yas sems can gyi/ /mgon po'i spyan sngar bshags pa ni/ /thog ma med nas dus 'di'i bar/ /mi dge las kyi dbang song ste/ /nyon mongs sgo gsum skyes pa yi/ /mi dge bcu dang mtshams med lnga/ /lha log sgro skur zhen
238b7(rgyud 'grel): log gis/ /rnam grol lam las gol gyur dang/ /nyon mongs nye ba'i nyon mongs tshogs/ /shes dang mi spong gzhan gzung dang/ /bgyid dang bgyid du stsal ba dang/ /gang gzhan rjes su yi rang bshags/ /mgon po rnams kyi spyan
239a1(rgyud 'grel): lam du/ /rang bzhin kha na ma tho sdig /mi 'char rim bzhin nges bshags shing/ /phyis kyang mi byed sdom pa bzung/ /bcas sdom so sor thar pa las/ /rtsa ba yan lag nyams pa dang/ /skyabs 'gro mkhan sogs slob dpon spangs
239a2(rgyud 'grel): dad pa'i dge 'dun dbyen sogs dang/ /log 'tsho nyes byas phra la sogs/ /tshul khrims zhig 'gyur las rnams bshags/ /hUM byang chub sems sogs ma skyes shing/ /sdom pa rnam par spangs pa dang/ /pha rol phyin gzhung nyams pa
239a3(rgyud 'grel): yin log pa'i lam la zhugs pa dang/ /tshangs pa'i gnas nas bsdu ba bzhi/ /lam sogs sum cu rtsa bdun dang/ /ma 'dres 'bras bu mdzad par bcas/ /smod spangs sdig rnams dus 'dir bshags/ /hUM gsang ldan rdo
239a4(rgyud 'grel): rje che ge mos/ /rdo rje slob dpon smod 'ga' zhig /lha spangs mtshed la 'khus pa dang/ /sngags dang phyag rgya spangs pa dang/ /snod min gsang ba bsgrags la sogs/ /gnyis gsum nyi shu rtsa brgyad sogs/ /yan lag cha
239a5(rgyud 'grel): shas nyams las 'das/ /'gyod sems nges par bshags par bgyi/ /oM na ma(rgyud 'grel): kA ya bAk+tsit+ta sarba pA pa shud+d+ha shud+d+ha hUM swAhA/ /'das dang da ltar ma byon tshogs/ /rgyal ba sras dang bcas rnams kyi/ /dad brtson shes rab che
239a6(rgyud 'grel): bskyed cing/ /rgyu 'bras tshogs gnyis bsags byas nas/ /mdzad pa bcu gnyis la sogs dang/ /khyad par gsang sngags mdzad pa yis/ /'gro rnams lam gnyis mdzad thob la/ /bdag gi rjes su yi rang ngo/ /lam gzhan
239a7(rgyud 'grel): 'phags pa rang rgyal dang/ /nyan thos so so skye bo yi/ /dge bsam sgom sogs gang spyad la/ /phrag dog med par rjes yi rang/ /phyogs rnams kun na bzhugs pa yi/ /mgon po thugs rje'i dbang gis ni/ /'gro ba'i mos
239b1(rgyud 'grel): pa bzhin ston cing/ /sngon gyi smon lam ji lta bar/ /dam chos btsun par mdzad pa'i ched/ /bskul ba'i sa la bzhugs pa dang/ /ji ltar tshangs pa'i rgyal tshogs kyi/ /chos 'khor 'gro ba'i don bskor phyir/ /gser gyi 'khor lo stong ldan
239b2(rgyud 'grel): phul/ /'jig rten mgon la bdag gsol 'debs/ /rgyal ba bde gshegs bcom ldan 'das/ /thog ma 'di nas tha ma'i bar/ /mdzad pa rnam gsum mthar phyin nas/ /sku lnga ye shes chen por ni/ /myur du sprul pa bsdu bzhed rnams/
239b3(rgyud 'grel): 'gro rnams kun gyi don slad du/ /bskal pa ji srid gnas kyi bar/ /gzugs mang sprul sku'i tshul bzhugs shing/ /mtshan dpe chu 'phrul mi 'jigs stobs/ /bkra shis tshogs kyis rgyas mdzad cing/ /rtag tu nyi zla sgrib gsal ltar/ /
239b4(rgyud 'grel): snyoms mdzad 'gro ba'i mun sel mdzod/ /ji lta ji ltar 'dul 'gyur pa/ /de lta de ltar 'gro ba rnams/ /sdug bsngal rgyu dang de nyid las/ /bsgral zhing thar pa byas nas ni/ /bde tshogs ldan par bya ba dang/ /bla med 'bras bu bskyed bya'i phyir//
239b5(rgyud 'grel): dang po thabs kyi bdag bsgral nas/ /smon lam rdzu 'phrul dpag med dang/ /zhi gnas lhag mthong mngon shes sogs/ /thogs pa med par 'byung ba yis/ /myur du mthu stobs rtag gyur nas/ /g.yel med 'gro don brtson byed cing/ /thams
239b6(rgyud 'grel): cad dbugs dbyung byas nas ni/ /rdo rje 'dzin pa'i gnas bkod pa'o/ /phyogs bcu dag na bzhugs pa yi/ /sangs rgyas byang chub sems dpa' dang/ /bla ma rdo rje lcam dral dang/ /dkyil 'khor tshogs rnams dgongs su gsol/ /bdag
239b7(rgyud 'grel): ming 'di zhes bgyi ba yis/ /skye ba 'di dang gzhan dag tu/ /dge rtsa spyi dang khyad par don/ /sngon gyi bgyis bgyid la rjes yi rang/ /ji ltar sngon gyi de bzhin gshegs/ /rgyal ba sras bcas tshogs gyur pas/ /bla na med pa'i byang
240a1(rgyud 'grel): chub tu/ /thugs mchog rin chen bskyed pa ltar/ /bla med yang dag rdzogs pa yi/ /byang chub chen por sems bskyed de/ /rgyal ba rnams kyi rjes su slob/ /mdor na 'gro ba ma lus pa/ /sku gsum 'bras bu thob bya'i phyir/ /
240a2(rgyud 'grel): dkyil 'khor drug gi sprul pa yis/ /rnam par rol pa'i don gnas bya/ /de las byung ba'i 'bras bzang mchog /kun nas mkhyen gnas mchog snyoms mdzad pa/ /dngos rnams gang la'ang chags med de/ /byang chub sems dpa' i
240a3(rgyud 'grel): las chen pos/ /'gro ba thams cad bcom ldan 'das/ /rdo rje 'dzin pa'i gnas thob shog /sna tshogs snang grags rnam grol ba/ /dbyings na cho 'phrul dpag med de/ /de yi cho 'phrul de nyid pas/ /nam mkha' i mdza' ltar sngo dang bral//
240a4(rgyud 'grel): 'khor gsum yongs su dag par ni/ /mnyam nyid bde ba chen po'i dang/ /thams cad 'du 'bral med pa yi/ /don nyid ngo bo lhun grub shog /rdo rje khu tshur gnyis gzhibs te/ /mtheb chen bsgrengs nas g.yob par bya/ /oM badzra gats+tsha mu:
240a5(rgyud 'grel): rdo rjes thal mos lan gsum du/ /mi drag smad gnyis brdab par bya/ /oM badzra tu sh+ya ho/ /ma lus 'gro ba thams cad la/ /mnyam snyoms nyid du dmigs nas kyang/ /byams pa'i sems ni nyer gnas pas/ /sdug
240a6(rgyud 'grel): bsngal gsum dang brgyad dag gis/ /gdungs pa'i nyams thag gang yin pa/ /de dag sdug bsngal med 'dod phyir/ /sems can grangs med skur sprul nas/ /'od zer mthu dang rdzu 'phrul tshogs/ /dpag med sprul pas don mthun
240a7(rgyud 'grel): tshul/ byams pa chen pos khyab par bya/ /rnam gsum snying rje chen po yis/ /de dag bde ba thob byas te/ /'dod pa'i yon tan lnga sogs kyis/ /bde ba dag la sgrub bya ste/ /yid bzhin nor bu rin chen ltar/ /sems can
240b1(rgyud 'grel): grangs med skur sprul nas/ /'od zer mthu dang rdzu 'phrul tshogs/ /'phangs med sems can kun la gtang/ /don ldan dga' ba chen po'i blos/ /reg pas 'gro ba'i bag chags kun/ /rim gyis byang sems lam rnam bdun/ /myur bar byang
240b2(rgyud 'grel): chub rdzogs mthar phyin/ /sku dang ye shes phun sum tshogs/ /bkod pa'i yon tan dpag med snang/ /gzhir gyur btang snyoms chen po'i blos/ /dan pa'i mtshan rtags rnam bral nas/ /gsal sems snyoms gnas bral ba med/ /rang
240b3(rgyud 'grel): bzhin byang sems mnyam pa'i dbyings/ /mi rtog ting 'dzin chen po yis/ /mdza' las grol ba'i sems nyid bskyed/ /'di ni tshangs pa'i gnas bzhi las/ /mchog tu gyur pa'i tshad med bzhi/ /snying po sngags kyis spro byas la/ /rigs
240b4(rgyud 'grel): bcas 'od zer khyab par gnas/ /phyogs gzhan rtog pa sna tshogs kyi/ /rkang dang sre mnan cho ga dang/ /gsar bu shis par byas pa'i las/ /las kyi cho ga gzhan bstan pa'o/ /rdo rje sems dpa' i sbyor ba yis/ /dga' ba'i rdo rje las byung
240b5(rgyud 'grel): ba'i/ /dpung mgor se gol brdabs byas nas/ /rdo rje bcings kyo'i se gol sgras/ /'jig rten khams ni ma lus pa/ /sangs rgyas rdo rje 'dzin bcas kun/ /dam tshig mchog gi gsang sngags kyis/ /til gyi gang bu bzhin du rgyas/ /shin tu
240b6(rgyud 'grel): gdug cing gtum pa la/ /zhi bas phan par mi 'gyur te/ /shes rab thabs kyi rnal 'byor pas/ /khro bor de bzhin gshegs kun mdzad/ /khro bo'i tshul can khros pas kyang/ /'jig rten gsum dag sreg byed na/ /sangs rgyas thams
240b7(rgyud 'grel): cad khros pa yis/ /khams gsum ma lus smos ci dgos/ /de nas sna rtse'i rtse mo la/ /yid ni brtan par yang dag zung/ /sna yi dbugs rings dro ba las/ /rgyal bas phyag rgya'i sbyor ba 'byung/ /bcom ldan de nyid rnal 'byor
241a1(rgyud 'grel): pas/ /rdo rje khro bor bsgyur nas phyung/ /dpal chen rdo rje he ru ka /'bar bas thal ba rab tu 'jig /sems dpa' sngon po 'bar ba'i dang/ /'od kyi dkyil 'khor dmar po 'bar/ /dur khrod kyi ni me dang 'dra/ /'bar ba chen po skra
241a2(rgyud 'grel): 'bar ba/ /thod pa mang po'i dbu rgyan can/ /'jigs pa chen po'i dus ltar drag /dur khrod bzhin du rab tu 'jigs/ /khro la sogs pa'i tshul ldan pa/ /zhal rnams sna tshogs 'gyur ba dang/ /smin ma khro gnyer bcas par bsgyur/ /'bar
241a3(rgyud 'grel): ba'i lta bas gar byas pas/ /gu lang dbang chen de dbang bcas/ /nyi zla gshin rje'i tshangs par bcas/ /gnas gsum dag ni 'bar bcas nas/ /thal ba bzhin du rab tu bshig /rdo rje rdo rje kha TwAM ga /dril bu'i sgra ni gsil ba yis//
241a4(rgyud 'grel): thams cad phab nas slar yang ni/ /thal bar 'gyur ba'ang 'tsho bar byed/ /g.yas gnyis lcags kyu ral gri ste/ /g.yon gnyis zhags pa thod pa thogs/ /'og ma gnyis kyis mda' dang gzhu/ /brkyang bskum nyi ma'i gdan la
241a5(rgyud 'grel): gnas/ /de yi 'bar ba'i nyi ma las/ /byung ba'i grib ma mi zad pa/ /bskyed nas ma lus bdud la sogs/ /gdug pa rnams kyi khrag za nus/ /rang sngags 'od zer g.yo ba'i mthus/ /shin tu bgegs med sa mthong nas/ /rdo rje sa gzhir
241a6(rgyud 'grel): sogs bsgom/ /'khor lo me 'od mtshon char bcas/ /'dod pa'i rgyal po dregs chen pos/ /sum+b+ha ni sngags brjod cing/ /brjid gnon khro bo chen po'i tshul/ /phyogs bcu'i dgegs rnams bkug mdzad nas/ /pho mor bsngol te nyi
241a7(rgyud 'grel): mar bkod/ /so so'i tshogs bcas myos par mdzad/ /oM sum+b+ha ni sub+ha hUM/ grih+Na grih+Na hUM/ grih+NA pa ya grah+NA pa ya/ A na ya ho b+ha ga bAn bi dya rA dza hUM phaT/ in+t+ra ye dza(rgyud 'grel): ya ma ye dza(rgyud 'grel): ba ru na ye dza(rgyud 'grel): gu be ra ye dza(rgyud 'grel): agne ye dza(rgyud 'grel): ni
241b1(rgyud 'grel): ri ti ye dza(rgyud 'grel): be ramA/ ye dza(rgyud 'grel): i sha na ye dza(rgyud 'grel): tsan+d+ra ye dza(rgyud 'grel): sUryan ye dza(rgyud 'grel): su ri ta na ye dza(rgyud 'grel): a ti pa ta ye dza:/ /ye shes che las sprul pa'i sku/ /zhal gsum phyag drug 'jigs pa'i gzugs/ /g.yas dkar g.yon dmar mthing nag sku/ /rdo rje
241b2(rgyud 'grel): thod khrag ral gri zhags/ /the ba lcags kyu g.yas dang g.yon/ /dur khrod 'jigs pa'i cha lugs brgyan/ /oM badzra kro d+ha bi dza ya hUM/ /ha na ha na hUM phaT/ /oM badzra kro d+ha ya mAn+ta ka hUM:/ ti shTha ti shTha hUM phaT/ oM badzra kro d+ha ha ya gri ya hUM/
241b3(rgyud 'grel): hu lu hu lu hUM phaT/ /oM badzra kro d+ha a mri ta kuN+Da li hUM/ ts+tshinda ts+tshinda hUM phaT/ oM badzra kro d+ha nI la daN+Da hUM/ da ha da ha hUM phaT/ oM badzra kro d+ha Arya a tsa la hUM/ band+ha band+ha hUM phaT/ oM badzra kro d+ha a ba ra dzi ti hUM/ ti shTha te shTha hUM phaT/ oM badzra
241b4(rgyud 'grel): kri d+ha tri laM kya bi dza ya hUM/ b+hin da b+hin da hUM phaT/ oM ba Dha kro d+ha hUM ka ra hUM/ gardza gardza hUM phaT/ oM badzra kro d+ha ma hA ba la hUM/ spo Ta spo Ta hUM phaT/ rdo rje bdud rtsi rnam 'phrul bas/ /rdo rje tho ba phyag bsnams shing/ /phyogs mtshams steng 'og btab
241b5(rgyud 'grel): nas ni/ /rang gi gnas su nges par 'dabs/ /oM badzra g+ha g+ha g+ha ta ya sarba duSh+Ta na phaT/ badzra d+ha ro ad dz+nyA pa ye ti/ kA ya bAk+tsit+ta/ badzra kI la ya hUM phaT/ oM phyogs bcu khro bo'i dkyil 'khor rnams/ /'jigs pa'i mtshon chu me 'od 'phro/ /
241b6(rgyud 'grel): rigs mthun khro ba'i 'khor tshogs dang/ /dbang bskur rigs kyi skus brgyan pa'o/ /sangs rgyas kun gyi dam tshig dpal/ /rdo rje sems dpa' snang ba bde/ /de bzhin gshegs pa'i lha rdzas mchog /rin chen rgyan la sogs pas brgyan
241b7(rgyud 'grel): dril bu rgyal mtshan mchog ldan pa'i/ /bla re dam pa byes pas na/ /rdo rje tshig dang mchod la sogs/ /glu dang sil snyan rnam par 'phrul/ /me tog bdug pa'i sbyor ba dang/ /mar me dri la sogs par ldan/ /sangs rgyas thams cad mnyam
242a1(rgyud 'grel): sbyor ba/ /mkha' 'gro sgyu ma bde mchog sgrub/ /me tog dkar dang dmar ba dang/ /mthing ka ser po kun bsdus pa/ /me tog phyag rgya mchog 'di ni/ /'dod pa'i yon tan lnga las 'phro/ /rgya skyegs mthong la ljang gu'i mchog
242a2(rgyud 'grel): tshon sna bzhi yis btsos pa dang/ /dkar po lnga yi phyag rgya dag /snga ma bzhin du mnyam par 'gyur/ /khams las byung ba thams cad dang/ /srog dang rtsa ba de bzhin te/ /rnam par mdzes shing dri zhim pa/ /snga ma bzhin du mnyam
242a3(rgyud 'grel): pa 'grub/ /tsan dan gnyis dang gla rtsi dang/ /ga pur na ka la la gyi/ /bdug pa bu ram dang sbyar ba/ /las rnams thams cad rab sgrub pa'o/ /gan dar dri dang gu gul dag /sardza ga pur gla rtsi dang/ /rdzas 'di dag la bcos pa'i mar/
242a4(rgyud 'grel): me nar byas na snang ba skyed/ /tsan dan gur gum prika dang/ /ga pur dag ni gla rtsi dang/ /btsos po'i bdug pa sgrub pa ste/ /spos kyi phyag rgyas spos mchog 'gyur/ /ka ko la dang sug smel dang/ /gla sgang ga pur gla rtsi dang/ /'di dag zhib
242a5(rgyud 'grel): tu brtags pa ni/ /seng ldeng bur ma dag dang sbyar/ /shing rtsa pa tra lo 'dra dang/ /na le sham dang ga pur sbyar/ /ha sa ki ri shing mar gyis/ /sbrus pa kha yi spos yin no/ /me tog dmar po sangs rgyas la/ /rdo rje can la sna tshogs pa/ /
242a6(rgyud 'grel): 'jig rten dbang la kha dog dkar/ /ser po mkha' las byung ba la/ /tsan dan bdug pa sangs rgyas la/ /rdo rje can la du ru ka/ spyan ras gzigs la ka pi ta/ /lce spog rdo rje nyi ma la/ /mar me'i phreng ba sangs rgyas la/ /rdo rje can
242a7(rgyud 'grel): la mar me bdun/ /spyan ras gzigs la mar me brgya/ /stong ni rdo rje nyi ma la/ /sangs rgyas rnams la tsan dan spos/ /rdo rje can la gur gum yin/ /spyan ras gzigs la tsan dan dmar/ /ga pur rdo rje nyi ma la/ /me tog kun dang
242b1(rgyud 'grel): bdug ba kun/ /de bzhin mar me thams cad dang/ /spos rnams thams cad ji snyed pa/ /rdo rje rta la dbul du rung/ /sgeg mo dang ni na chung dang/ /mos dang de bzhin bdud rtsi dang/ /gcig pu dpa' dang 'dod chags sra/ /g.yon can bran mo de bzhin
242b2(rgyud 'grel): te/ /lan tsha la sogs ro kun dang/ /ka ra la sogs bdud rtsi sbyin/ /bdag nyid kun gyi ro 'grub pa/ /sha dang chang du ldan pa yi/ /bza' ba sna tshogs 'grub pa ni/ /dga' pa'i longs spyod skal mchog ste/ /tshe yi dam tshig rab tu bsgrub/ /a
242b3(rgyud 'grel): mwa smin dang rgun 'brum dang/ /pa na se dang na le kar/ /a ka ru la sogs pa yi/ /'bras bu'i phyag rgya thams cad 'grub/ /ka ra sbrang rtsis byugs pa yi/ /a mra la sogs tshig gu byug/ /ha sa ra ka ri mar sogs/ /mnyam pa'i dri yis
242b4(rgyud 'grel): b+hu bar bya/ /yung dang rgya skyegs la sogs pa'i/ /tshon gyis mthun par kha sgyur nas/ /shun pa gri ga la sogs byas/ /mchod pa'i tshon dbul bar bya/ /sangs rgyas rnams la gshos dbul ba/ /sha dang chang ni rnam par spangs/
242b5(rgyud 'grel): glu dang sil snyan grub pa dang/ /gdugs dang rgyal mtshan ba dan dang/ /sha dang chang du bcas pa ni/ /gtor ma'i mchog ste tshogs pa'o/ /bdag gi phyugs te skal bzang po/ /rdo rje las ni dpal grub pa'o/ /bshos dang gtor
242b6(rgyud 'grel): ma dkar po dang/ /pad+ma me tog ldan pa ni/ /spyan ras gzigs dbang gtso bo la/ /phul nas dgos pa thams cad 'grub/ /rgyal po kha zas la sogs pa/ /sha dang chang du ldan pa dang/ /glu dang sil snyan skal bzang dag /rdo rje nyi ma'i
242b7(rgyud 'grel): 'khor la dbul/ /kha zas kun gyi ro kun dang/ /sha dang sha yi mchog rnams dang/ /sha yi sbyor ba sha skam dang/ /bshes dag rdo rje lha la dbul/ /gzhan yang bza' btung longs spyod tshogs/ /g.yos kyi ston mo mang du bsham//
243a1(rgyud 'grel): dkyil 'khor chen po'i phyogs kun nas/ /spos chen sil snyan phreng thogs shing/ /gar dbyangs bro thabs drug 'gyur rtse/ /gzeng bstod dga' pa'i bzhin rgyas spyod/ /hUM 'phags mchog thugs rje'i dus la
243a2(rgyud 'grel): bab/ /khyad par bstan pa'i dus la bab/ /dam tshig bskang ba'i dus la bab/ /dngos grub stsal ba'i dus la bab/ /dngos grub stsal ba'i dus la bab/ /mthu chen mthu stobs bcom ldan 'das/ /dpal chen dbang bskur bcom ldan 'das/ /dngos grub mchog stsol bcom
243a3(rgyud 'grel): ldan 'das/ /bdag gi las rnams gang bsgrub pa/ /'bras bu dus 'dir mchis par mdzod/ /a la la ho b+ha ga bAn/ sa ma ya ho/ sa ma ya stwaM/ oM ye nas rnam pa kun ldan pa'i/ /gsang ba chen po'i dkyil 'khor 'dir/ /gsal
243a4(rgyud 'grel): la brtan pa'i rnal 'byor pas/ /gnyis med brda' yis mtshan mar bya'o/ /oM stong gsum stong gi 'jig rten na/ /phyogs bzhi'i dkyil 'khor dbus rnams kyi/ /skye 'gro rdul snyed gnas pa kun/ /bde gshegs lnga yi
243a5(rgyud 'grel): dkyil 'khor dbyings/ /phyogs dus kun nas tshogs pa'i lha/ /gnyis su med pas phyag 'tshal lo/ /hUM oM h+ri traM haM/ a ti b+hu ho/ /pra ti b+hu ba/ ta thA ga to gu ru pa ti a la la ho/ /lus ngag spyi dang khyad par gyi/ /gsang sngags brda yi
243a6(rgyud 'grel): phyag rgya 'dzin/ /byin brlabs mtshan ma gsal grub phyir/ /phyag rgya'i mtshan nyid sbyar par bya/ /he ru ka yi gnas bcu dang/ /dar khrod chen po'i gnas brgyad du/ /dam tshig rtags kyi mtshan ma yi/ /dpal gyi chas brgyad rgyan
243a7(rgyud 'grel): dang bcas/ /'khor ba'i rgyu rkyen 'bras bu rnams/ /thugs rjes rtsad nas gcod pa'i phyir/ /spyi dang khyad par rtags dag dang/ /don gyi sgo nas gzhom par mdzad/ /sems nyid bde ba chen po'i gnas/ /phung po dur khrod gzhal yas
243b1(rgyud 'grel): khab?/ /dga' ba chen po'i glu dang gar/ /dngos kyang mchod pa'i rdzas su sngo/ /dbang sgyur chen po'i ting 'dzin sogs/ /thams cad tshul bzhin byin brlabs te/ /cir yang gyur pa'i yig 'bru las/ /'bar ba'i khang pa rnam par brjid/ /rang 'od
243b2(rgyud 'grel): sa bon so so las/ /bkod pa'i rgyan gyi dkyil 'khor che/ /sku gsung thugs kyi gsang chen pos/ /bsgrub rdzas de dag byin gyis brlabs/ /kro d+he shwa ri dag byed kyis/ /mtshan ma'i gnas kun spyad par bya/ /mtshan ldan pad+ma'i pho brang du/ /
243b3(rgyud 'grel): 'chi med lcags kyu tshogs pa dag /dpa' po 'bru dgu'i 'phro 'du yis/ /thams cad bdud rtsi byang chub sems/ /mchod dang gtor tshogs zhal zas rnams/ /kun bzang dkyil 'khor rnam par dag /oM mahA badzra tsakra maN+Da la hUM /hUM
243b4(rgyud 'grel): oM hi traM haM/ oM A(rgyud 'grel): hUM/ ba oM mahA kro d+he shwa ri sarba tra ba phyi sho d+ha ya A(rgyud 'grel): hUM/ oM A(rgyud 'grel): hUM sarba pany+tsa a mri te hUM h+ri tha/ oM te dzo ba liM te b+ha la b+hi ti gu hya sa ma ya swAhA/ /so so'i ting 'dzin phyag rgya dang/ /sngags kyis gsal
243b5(rgyud 'grel): bar byas nas ni/ /sgrub pa'i dkyil 'khor gnas rnams su/ /de dag so sor dgod par bya/ /dkyil 'khor sngon 'gro rdzogs byas nas/ /bsnyen bsgrub yan lag rnam bzhi yis/ /las kun 'bras bu'i gnas sbyor ba'i/ /phyag rgya'i dkyil
243b6(rgyud 'grel): 'khor bsgrub par bya/ /dang po chos kyi dbyings nyid la/ /dmigs pa med pa'i don gyis bsgom/ /dngos po med par bdag sbyor bas/ /nam mkha' kun mnyam sbyor ba'o/ /oM mahA shAn+ya ta dz+nyA na badzra swA b+ha ba A t+ma ko haM/ /chos kyi dbyings
243b7(rgyud 'grel): kyi ye shes kyis/ /thams cad du yang khyab byas la/ /chos kun stong gsal rang bzhin med/ /mi dmigs snying rje chen po'i ngang/ /oM d+harma d+hA tu swa b+hA ba A t+ma ko haM/ rdo rje sems dpa' ting 'dzin gyis/ /mkha' dbyings sna tshogs
244a1(rgyud 'grel): la gnas nas/ /cir yang gyur pa'i yig 'bru bsam/ /'od zer tshul du 'phros nas kyang/ /ma lus nye bar khyab byas te/ /re zhing dam pa'i tshul du dgongs/ /e 'byung mkha' dbyings gru gsum dkar/ /gyen bsgreng bzang
244a2(rgyud 'grel): bo'i mkha' dbyings nas/ /yaM 'byung rlung gi dkyil 'khor dbyibs/ /dung kha sra mkhregs sgrol ma'i mkha' / /baM las chu dkyil dkar zhing zlum/ /bum pas mtshan pa mA ma ki/ li las gser gyis gzhi ste/ /gru bzhi spyan ma rdo rjes
244a3(rgyud 'grel): mtshan/ /khaM las sna tshogs can gyi mtsho/ /lcags ri mu khyud nor bus mtshan/ /suM las ri rab baM rim lcog /rin chen sna tshogs rgyu las grub/ /raM las me dkyil dkar ser 'bar/ /zur mangs gos dkar nam mkha' i dbyings/ /sra
244a4(rgyud 'grel): mkhregs rdo rje'i gzhi'i steng la/ /kun 'byung 'khor lo sna tshogs 'bum/ /de dbus brum las gzhal yas khang/ /ye shes rin chen sna tshogs rgyan/ /nang gi dkyil 'khor gnas rnams su/ /re'u mig 'khor lo mtshungs pa brgyad
244a5(rgyud 'grel): rdo rje phreng ba'i tshogs kyis brgyan/ /sna tshogs pad+ma gdan mis mtshan/ /dkyil 'khor phyi rim gnas brgyad du/ /dur khrod shing dang zhing skyong dang/ /phyogs skyong rnal 'byor mtsho dang sprin/ /klu rgyal de dag gnas brgyad du/ /sha
244a6(rgyud 'grel): za 'byung po gshin rje dang/ /mkha' 'gro bya khyi rol langs dang/ /ce spyang khros pa'i sgra 'byin cing/ /ro yi tshogs la longs spyod mdzad/ /rang 'byung mchod rten dang bcas pa/ /phreng ba rim gsum phyi rol gyi/ /ra ba'i mtshams su gnas pa
244a7(rgyud 'grel): las/ /kun 'byung rgyan gyi mtshan spras pa'o/ /de dbus 'khor lo'i lte ba la/ /pad zla nyi ma'i gdan stengs su/ /dpal mchog dang po gnas mdzad nas/ /'phrul dga' i ting 'dzin mngon par ston/ /chos rnams thams cad rnam brtar na/
244b1(rgyud 'grel): dngos med mtshan ma kun dang bral/ /zla dkyil A li bcu drug bzhi/ /nyi dkyil kA lis brgyan pa'i 'od/ /'phro 'du mdzad par bcas pa yis/ /nyis 'gyur mtshan dang dpe byad? gsal/ /de dag 'od du gyur pa la/ /'od dpung kha dog sna lnga nyid/ /hUM
244b2(rgyud 'grel): las rdo rje rtse lnga pa/ /dkar po bum par hUM gis mtshan/ /thog ma tha ma med pa'i dbyings/ /dang po rdo rje chen po yin/ /badzra a haM/ 'od zer lnga yi 'phro 'du yis/ /dkyil 'khor drug gi las mdzad nas/ /sku gsung thugs dbyings zhugs pa
244b3(rgyud 'grel): las/ /'od zer phreng mdzes brjid pa'i mchog /de las sku mchog phyag rgya yis/ /sngags kyi yi ge brjod par bya/ /oM mahA su kha badzra satwa a/ dza(rgyud 'grel): hUM baM ho(rgyud 'grel): su ra ta stwaM/ de dag ye shes byang chub sems/ /mngon byang lnga yi bdag nyid do/
244b4(rgyud 'grel): shel mdog girta 'od 'bar ba'i/ /ri po nyi ma'i mdangs chags pa/ /bzhin 'dzum snum zhing nyams tshogs rgyas/ /chags tshul dar la bab pa bzhin/ /zhal phyag mtshungs bzhin sngo dmar ser/ /g.yas na rdo rje rtse lnga 'bar/ /g.yon pa
244b5(rgyud 'grel): kha Twa'i dril bur bcas/ /'og ma gnyis kyi mda' dang gzhu/ /rin chen rgyan dang na bza' dang/ /mgul du do shal dpung rgyan dang/ /phyag zhabs gdu bu se mo ngo/ /mtshan dpe phyag rgya lnga yi mdzes/ /rdo rje rtse lnga'i phyag rgya ni/ /gnas lnga dag
244b6(rgyud 'grel): tu gtug bya ste/ /sngags kyis bde gshegs thams cad kyi/ /sku gsung thugs sogs rnam par bsam/ /oM na ma(rgyud 'grel): sarba ta thA ga ta kA ya bAk+tsi t+ta gu Na karma badzra swa b+hA ba At+ma ko haM/ /lus kyi ba spu'i gnas rnams su/ /dkyil 'khor drug gi
244b7(rgyud 'grel): rdul phran gnas/ /mkha' dbyings dbang phyug phyag rgya yis/ /gnas kun byin gyis brlab par bya/ /oM d+ha rmA d+hA tu swa b+hA ba At+ma ko haM/ rang 'od yum dang 'khral ba las/ /gsang gnas hUM dang A(rgyud 'grel): sa brgyan te/ /ye shes rdo 
245a1(rgyud 'grel): rje phaT dang bcas/ /rtse mo nor pu 'bar bas mtshan/ /rnam thar pad+ma e dkyil can/ /mdog ser lte bze 'bru dmar/ /sa ma ya sogs brdas bskul nas/ /dza(rgyud 'grel): hUM baM ho(rgyud 'grel): sa rol pa bya/ /oM pra be sha ya phaT/ oM la la la
245a2(rgyud 'grel): la ho/ /bde ba chen po'i 'od zer gyis/ /phyogs bcu'i rgyal ba mnyes mdzad de/ /'gro ba'i lus ngag yid rtog sbyangs/ /sku gsung thugs kyi rgyan gyis brjid/ /stong gsung til gang 'bru 'dra rnams/ /thams cad 'od kyis slar bsdus nas/ /
245a3(rgyud 'grel): sangs rgyas drug gi yi ger gyur/ /ba spu'i bu ga kun tu thim/ /thugs ka'i gnas su zhu ba dang/ /'dod chags chen po dga' ba'i mes/ /sku dang bcas pa 'od du gyur/ /sngon gyi gom shugs lha mo bzhes/ /phyogs bzhi nas ni bskul byas te/ /
245a4(rgyud 'grel): stong pa shin tu rnal 'byor yod med mthu/ /nam mkha' nyid du dam tshig nye bar gnas/ /bde gshegs bde bar gshegs pa bzhengs su gsol/ /rdo rje sems dpa' skal bzang dpal khyod bdag /ye shes gsal ba'i rgyud bskul nas/ /thugs
245a5(rgyud 'grel): rjes 'gro la dmigs mdzad de/ /rgyu yi rjes mthun mgon po'i sku/ /rdo rje sems dpa' bzhengs par 'gyur/ /mtshan ma rgyan sogs cha lugs dang/ /sku mdog phyag mtshan snga ma bzhin/ /lus dang ngag sems rdo rje yi/ /mtshan ma'i
245a6(rgyud 'grel): phyag rgyar ldan byas te/ /thams cad 'byung ba'i sgyur ba yis/ /bdag gi lhar ni bdag nyid bya/ /oM A(rgyud 'grel): hUM(rgyud 'grel): thugs gsal nyi ma la gnas pa'i/ /ye shes sems dpa' hUM sngags bcas/ /gsang ba'i phyag rgya rnam pa bzhis/ /
245a7(rgyud 'grel): las kun grub byed dngos grub gsal/ /'od zer 'phro 'du'i sbyor ba yis/ /ye shes dkyil 'khor spyan drangs te/ /thugs ka nas byung lha mo bzhis/ /bdud rtsi bum pas khrus byas nas/ /gnas gsum dbang bskur bri bral byas//
245b1(rgyud 'grel): slar dus tshangs bug gnas su thim/ /mthe bo sems dpa' i skyil mo krung/ /mdzub mo gnyis kyi rtse mo dgug /gung mo gnyis ni mnyam par sbyar/ /lhag ma rdo rje thal mo bya/ /spyi bo dang ni 'phul ba dang/ /ldan pa gnyis dang lhag par sbyar/ /oM a
245b2(rgyud 'grel): b+hi Shiny+tsa maM/ /sor mo thams cad nang du bsnol/ /rtse mo ngos rnams kun sprad nas/ /mthe bong rdo rjes mnan pa ni/ /sna dang mig phugs lta bu ste/ /gong bzhin mgo bo'i gnas lngar gtug /rin chen thod phreng skur bcas 'gyur/ /oM a b+hi Shiny+tsa
245b3(rgyud 'grel): maM/ /sangs rgyas kun gyi rin chen mchog /dpung rgyan kun tu brgyan par bya/ /oM ratna mA le a b+hi Shiny+tsa traM/ /dbu rgyan bcings pas bcings nas ni/ /'gying zhing mdza' nas grol bar bya/ /oM pa Ta laM ba a b+hiShiny+tsa hUM/ dar gyis mdza' ma
245b4(rgyud 'grel): dpyangs pa ltar/ /byas nas thal mo brdab par bya/ /oM badzra tru Sh+ya ho/ /khams gsum dag na rin chen gzhan/ /sangs rgyas rin chen lta bu med/ /sangs rgyas kun gyi rin po che/ /dbu rgyan can ni de bas mchog /gzhan gyi nor min mi
245b5(rgyud 'grel): 'phrog pa/ /lha yi chu ni dag pa ste/ /thod pa'i phreng ba'i dbu rgyan dang/ /sangs rgyas gtsug gi nor bu yis/ /rjes su chags pa'i rnam mang dga' ba'i padmo rnams/ /dga' ba mchod pas gsal bar rjes su mchod byas pas/ /mchog tu
245b6(rgyud 'grel): rtag pa'i rnal 'byor bde bas bde grub mdzod/ /e ma'o/ /mchog tu bde ba'i dam tshig ngo bo nyid/ /mchog tu bde ba'i rnal 'byor skal bzang mchog dgyes pa/ /rang gi dam tshig rtag la rol cig rol cig ho/ /yab yum gsang
245b7(rgyud 'grel): gnas hUM dang dza:/ /rdo rje pad+ma bskyed byas nas/ /ling ga 'greng bar rang byung ba/ /brla yi dbus su gzhug byas te/ /ling ga rdo rjer byin brlabs nas/ /rdo rje sems sogs sku bstod do/ /byang chub sems de kun tu dag /ma lus nye bar
246a1(rgyud 'grel): khyab byas nas/ /'dod par bya ba rab tu mnyes/ /'ong 'dus thog ma'i gzugs la gzung/ /gnas nas so so'i gdan dag la/ /chos kyi snying pos lha rnams bskyed/ /hUM las rdo rje sems dpa' ste/ /dkyil 'khor dbus
246a2(rgyud 'grel): kyi gdan la'o/ /dza(rgyud 'grel): las dpal ldan bde mchog ma/ /hUM las e ma bde mchog ma/ /baM las lha mo snang mdzad ma/ /ho(rgyud 'grel): las de bzhin slob ma mo/ /'di dag gtso bo'i phyogs bzhi yi/ /re'u cha'i gdan la rim bzhin gnas/ /oM
246a3(rgyud 'grel): las sangs rgyas byang chub ma/ /bruM las chos kyi 'khor lo ste/ /haM las khams gsum rnam rgyal yin/ /khaM las 'dod pa kun mdzad ma'o/ /'di dag shar la sogs pa yi/ /ri mig 'khor lo'i rtse la gnas/ /oM las gling bu tri pi baM/
246a4(rgyud 'grel): paM las rnga chen rdza rnga ma/ /lha mo 'di bzhi me mtshams kyi/ /'khor lo'i rtse la rim bzhin gnas/ /a las me tog A spos me/ /aM las mar me a dri chab/ /'di dag mtshams kyi gnas bzhi ru/ /rim pa bzhin du bskyed pa'o/ /
246a5(rgyud 'grel): dza(rgyud 'grel): hUM baM ho(rgyud 'grel): sgo bzhi ru/ /rta mgrin 'phang mtho la sogs bskyed/ /b+ha gar ling ga bcug byas nas/ /der ni mtshan ma bsgom par bya/ /rdo rje sems dpa' phyag rgya che/ /sku gnyis ldan pa spro bar bya/ /oM mahA su kha badzra satwa A:
246a6(rgyud 'grel): dza hUM baM ho:/ su ra tastwa dza/ shes rab pha rol phyin ba dang/ /thabs la mkhas pa'i phrin las kyis/ /'dul phyir rdo rje sems dpa' ni/ /skye ba dag gi rigs yin no/ /bde mchog 'gying bcas gar mdangs can/ /g.yon pas
246a7(rgyud 'grel): gzhu 'dzin g.yas mda''dren/ /rin chen phreng mdzes gos rgyan klubs/ /phyogs bcur 'gro ba'i don 'byung spro/ /dza(rgyud 'grel): badzra tiSh+Tha sa ma ke ma dzdza/ /mthar phyin rigs mthun las mdzad ma/ /slar 'dus shar gyi gdan la gnas/
246b1(rgyud 'grel): e ma bde ba gser gyi mdog /g.yas pa'i ling ga rdo rjes mtshan/ /g.yon pa'i b+ha ga rin chen snod/ /bde spros 'gying bcas lho phyogs su/ /hUM badzra kI li kI li hUM dza/ snang mdzad dmar po g.yas pa na/ /sna tshogs rdo rje g.yon dag gis/ /'gying
246b2(rgyud 'grel): bcas thod pa'i snod bdud rtsi/ /kha TwAM ga brten nub phyogs gnas/ /baM badzri Ni sma ra ta dzdza/ /slob ma mo ni mdog ljang ser/ /g.yas kyis mda' bcas bdag po 'khyud/ /g.yon pas dkyil tshul bdud rtsi'i snod/ /sangs rgyas sku 'dzin byang
246b3(rgyud 'grel): gi phyogs/ /ho badzra kA ma shwa ri traM dza/ /kun kyang rgyan bcas zhi ba'i mdangs/ /'od kyi dkyil 'khor 'bar ba mdzes/ /chags pa bzhin 'dzum bteg pa'i mchog /bdag po chags tshul bskul bar byed/ /sangs rgyas byang chub dkar

246b5(rgyud 'grel): mo'i rtse mo la/ /'khor lo rtsa brgyad gnyis brtsegs bstod/ /'khor lo'i lho phyogs rtse la gnas/ /oM badzra me b+he gu lu gu lu bruM dzdza/ khams gsum rnam rgyal dmar sgo'i mdog /g.yas gnyis tri shul rtse gsum bstod/ /g.yon
246b6(rgyud 'grel): pas rdo rje rtse lnga 'dzin/ /gang mdzad 'khor lo'i bum phyogs nas/ /oM mahA sha ra ta badzri oM dzdza/ /'dod pa'i dbang mo ? dgu'i mdog /phyag gnyis dpag bsam me tog shing/ /lcug ma rlung gis bskyod pa 'dzin/ /gar mdzad 'khor
246b7(rgyud 'grel): lo'i byang du gnas/ /oM khaM badzra she shi hUM hUM dzdza/ /gling bu sngon mo rdo rje mtshan/ /sna tshogs sgra sgrogs me yi phyogs/ /e he ra ti badzra pi la si ni tra Ta dzdza/ /pi baM ser mo rdo rjes mtshan/ /glu dbyangs drug ldan bden bral phyogs/ /
247a1(rgyud 'grel): he ra ti badzra te te te dzdzaM/ /rdza rnga dmar mo rdo rje'i rnga/ /brdung mdzad rlung mtshams la gnas pa'o/ /he ra ti badzra hA se ha paM dza/ /rdza rnga ljang gu rdza rnga la/ /rdo rjes mtshan brdung dbang ldan phyogs/ /he ra ti badzra tri tya pe pa pe pa dzaM
247a2(rgyud 'grel): dzdza/ /me tog dmar ser rdo rjes mtshan/ /gzhong thogs me yi mtshams su gnas/ /oM puShpe dzdza/ spos me dkar sngon rdo rjes mtshan/ /spog thogs bden bral mtshams su gnas/ /oM badzra d+hu pe dza/ /mar me dmar po rdo rjes mtshan/
247a3(rgyud 'grel): gsal 'dzin rlung gi mtshams su gnas/ /oM badzra A lo ke dzdza/ dri chab ljang gu rdo rjes mtshan/ /dag 'thor dbang ldan mtshams su gnas/ /oM badzra gan d+h+re dzdza/ rta mgrin 'phang mtho dkar mdangs can/ /lcags kyu rta mgo ljang gur shar/
247a4(rgyud 'grel): oM badzra aM ku sha dza(rgyud 'grel): phag gdong nag mo zhags pa g.yon/ /g.yas pas che ba lho yi sgor/ /badzra pA sha hUM dzdza/ snang ba dmar mo phyag gnyis kyis/ /nyi zla lcags sgrog nub kyi phyogs/ /oM badzra sh+ri kha le paM dzdza:/ /thal byed ljang
247a5(rgyud 'grel): gu g.yas dril bu/ /g.yon pas ban d+ha sku bcas b+hyaM/ /oM badzra g+haN+De ho(rgyud 'grel): dzdza(rgyud 'grel): lha mo 'di dag mdzes pa'i mdangs/ /rin chen rgyan dang phreng bas brgyan/ /kun mkhyen ye shes las grub phyir/ /dkyil 'khor lha rnams thams cad kyi
247a6(rgyud 'grel): mig la sangs rgyas rnam snang mdzad/ /rna ba rdo rje nyi ma brgya/ /kha la pad+ma gar dbang phyug /sna la rta mchog rol pa mchog /yid la rdo rje he ru ka /lus la rdo rje sems dpa' o/ /gnas gsum phyag rgya'i tshogs ldan zhing/ /
