249a1(rgyud 'grel): rgyas pad+ma la sogs mchog /rin chen sna tshogs rgyan dang gos/ /sangs rgyas thams cad 'dus pas so/ /mi mjed la sogs brgyan pas bzhin/ /bya ba dang ni bzlog pa dang/ /dbrog pa dag kyang khyab par mdzad/ /bdag
249a2(rgyud 'grel): la 'khyud pa'i phyag rgya yis/ /yan lag thams cad 'phrog pa 'grub/ /dza(rgyud 'grel): badzra driSh+Ti sa ma ke ma Ta/ ma hA mu Ta hUM/ /rnam pa sna tshogs dam tshig chags/ /bde ba 'bab pa'i gar byed na/ /bdag la 'khyud pa'i phyag rgya mchog /dbus kyi lha
249a3(rgyud 'grel): mchog chen mo'o/ /hUM badzra kI li kI li hUM/ mahA mu twa hUM/ /se ral kha yi tshul dag tu/ /rdo rje kha TwAM ga bzung ste/ /bdag la 'khyud pa'i phyag rgya ni/ /pang bcas rdo rje rgya raM mchog /baM badzra Ni smra ra ra ta Ta/ mahA mu tra hUM/ rdzogs sangs rgyas
249a4(rgyud 'grel): kyi kham por grub/ /bdag la 'khyud pa'i phyag rgya yis/ /rdo rje sems dpa' dpal sbyor ba/ /dbus kyi lha mo mchog chen mo/ /ho(rgyud 'grel): badzra kA ma shwa ri traM/ mahA mu tra hUM/ /gtsug lag ji lta'i rjes mthun par/ /dpal rdzogs rgya che gar dag
249a5(rgyud 'grel): gis/ /mda' bzhi yongs su 'phangs nas ni/ /bdud bzhi las ni rgyal bar 'gyur/ /oM aM ma du badzri g+huM g+huM/ ma hA mu tra hUM/ rkang pa bteg cing phab pa dang/ /bshig ste 'phangs pa'i stabs dag gis/ /'khor lo'i phyag rgya stong nas
249a6(rgyud 'grel): ni/ /khams gsum dag las 'chongs par 'gyur/ /oM badzra me b+he gu lu gu lu bruM/ mahA mu tra hUM/ bya ba dang ni bzlog pa dang/ /dprog pa dag gis khyad par du/ /sna tshogs phyag rgya gar byed cing/ /khams gsum dag ni
249a7(rgyud 'grel): bsdu bar bya/ /oM mahA shar da badzri oM oM/ mahA mu tra hUM/ lcags kyus gang yang rung bzung nas/ /bdag la 'khyud pa'i phyag rgya yis/ /bud med thams cad rtsen nas ni/ /dpag bsam shing dang yongs su 'grub/ /oM khaM
249b1(rgyud 'grel): badzra shi shir hUM hUM/ mahA mu tra hUM/ gling bu len pa'i tshul ston cing/ /ji ltar 'bab pa'i gar byed pas/ /stabs su glu bcas bgyings pa'i tshul/ /yid 'phrog sngags kyis las mdzad pa'o/ /oM he ra ti ba la badzra bi na si na tra Ta/ ma hA mu tra hUM/
249b2(rgyud 'grel): pi wang len pa'i tshul ston cing/ /ji ltar 'bab pa'i gar byed pas/ /sna tshogs bsgyur cing de don 'phrul/ /dga' dbyangs bsgyur bas gnas gsum bskyod/ /he badzra g+he te te teM/ mahA mu tra hUM/ cang te'i tshul ston rnal 'byor pa'i/ /ji ltar
249b3(rgyud 'grel): dbab pa'i gar byed pas/ /sku gsung theg chen rgyud ston pa'i/ /phyag rgya gar gyis kun las rgyal/ /oM he ra ti badzra hA se ha ha baM/ ma hA mu tra hUM/ rdza rnga'i tshul ston rnal 'byor pa/ /ji ltar 'bab pa'i gar byed cing/ /g.yas g.yon mdun
249b4(rgyud 'grel): rgyab blta ba'i bzhin/ /bzhi sbyor glu bcas kun bstan pa'o/ /oM he ra ti badzra nri te pe pe paM dza(rgyud 'grel): mahA mu tra hUM/ sbyin pa'i mchog gnas rnam par grol/ /gzugs mchog lha rdzas me tog rgya/ /sa gzhi mdun rol g.yas g.yon stod/ /sna
249b5(rgyud 'grel): tshogs spungs pa 'thor byed pa'o/ /he ra ti badzra puShpe/ ma hA mu dra hUM/ tshul khrims dri mchog tshim byed pa'i/ /bdug mchog spos legs sbyar ba'i mchog /g.yas bskor bteg ste phyogs bcur bsgyur/ /mdun du phyogs par sngo byed pa'i/
249b6(rgyud 'grel): oM badzra pU pa ma hA mu tra hUM/ bzod gsol shes rab ting nge 'dzin/ /mun tshogs gsal byed mar me brgya/ /kun tu bskor ba'i gar bsgyur zhing/ /thugs ka'i mtshan ma gsal ston pa'o/ /oM badzra A lo ke /mahA mu dra hUM/ /brtson 'grus
249b7(rgyud 'grel): rtse gcig gyur pa med/ /chos kun dag byed byug pa'i dri/ /srin mtheb rang gnas rtse gsum 'thor/ /phyogs kun dngos ni bcos dag 'gyur/ /oM badzra gand+ha/ mahA mu tra hUM/ pad+ma can de'i bdud rtsi bstod/ /myang ba rdub pa ltar byed pa'i/ /
250a1(rgyud 'grel): lcags kyu'i phyag rgya rdo rjer bcas/ /'gugs pa'i tshul las grub pa'o/ /oM badzra aM ku sha dza(rgyud 'grel): mahA mu dra hUM/ rdo rje mche ba 'jigs pa'i rgya/ /sna yi myang ba'i rdub pa yis/ /rin chen zhags bcas gsol ka'i tshul/
250a2(rgyud 'grel): rang gi las la sbyor byed pa'o/ /oM badzra pA she hUM/ mahA mu dra hUM/ rdo rje lcags sgrog nyi zlar bcas/ /mig btsums zhin par blta ba yis/ /khams gsum kun la gzigs pa'i rgya/ /phyag rgya'i las kyis bstan byed pa'o/ /oM
250a3(rgyud 'grel): badzra sh+raM kha la phaM/ mahA mu dra hUM/ mtshan ldan sku mchog bdud rtsis bkang/ /thams cad bdag nyid myang ba yis/ /stong pa gsung dbyangs rgyun mi 'chad/ /thal 'jig rgyud rnams slar 'tsho mdzad/ /oM badzra g+haN+De ha(rgyud 'grel): mahA mu dra
250a4(rgyud 'grel): hUM/ rdo rje sems dpa' skal bzang dpal khyod bdag /bdag cag bsgrubs la rtogs par mdzad du gsol/ /kye de bzhin gshegs pa kun gyi bdag nyid bde/ /mkha' 'gro sgyu ma sna tshogs bde ba'i mchog /'gro ba'i rgyud rnams
250a5(rgyud 'grel): rnam pa sna tshogs 'dul/ /mchog grub bdag la grub par mdzad du gsol/ /a la la ho/ /de bzhin gshegs pa'i sbyor ba rnams/ /rnam pa sna tshogs gar rnams bstan du gsol/ /dza(rgyud 'grel): hUM baM ho(rgyud 'grel): kye bde ba chen po'i mchog
250a6(rgyud 'grel): kun gyi/ /bde bas zung la rnam par 'phrul bar mdzod/ /hUM snang bar mdzad du gsol/ /a la la ho/ /bde gshegs mkha' 'gro slob ma gzung du gsol/ /mtshan ma'i yi ge pad+ma'i dkyil/ /kun gyi rtse la bsgom byas nas/ /'od zer
250a7(rgyud 'grel): 'phro 'du'i sbyor ba yis/ /rang sngags chos kyi phyag rgyar bcas/ /oM na mo badzra sarba stu ta sarba bud d+he b+hya(rgyud 'grel): hUM swAhA/ rdo rje sems dpa' i dkyil 'khor gyi/ /sbyor ba'i sngags kyi mthu dag gis/ /las tshogs mchod pa ma lus pa/ /
250b1(rgyud 'grel): lus pa med par kun la sbyar/ /mdzub mos mthe bo mnan nas ni/ /rang gi mthe bos mdzub mo mnan/ /dpal grub spyan gyi phyag rgya ste/ /mdzub mo mig gi 'bras bur bya/ /rdo rje thal mo mnyam sbyor nas/ /khong stong du ni byas nas su/ /gsang
250b2(rgyud 'grel): sngags dam tshig sbyor bzhag ste/ /rim bzhin mdza' nas grol bar bya/ /oM badzra satwa sa ma ya/ ma nu pA la ya/ badzra satwa te no pa tiSh+Tha/ dri Dho me b+ha ba/ su to sh+yo me b+ha ba/ a nu rak+to me b+ha ba/ su po sh+yo me b+ha ba/ sarba sid+himme pra yats+tsha/ sarba karmA
250b3(rgyud 'grel): su tsa me/ tsit+taM sh+re ye(rgyud 'grel): ku ru hUM/ ha ha ha ha ho/ /b+ha ga ban/ sarba ta thA ga ta/ badzra mA me muny+tsa badzri b+ha ba? ma hA sa ma ya satwa A:/ /srin lag mthe chung yan lag dbus/ /mthe bo legs par bzhag par bya/ /de nas khu tshur bcangs nas ni/ /mdzub
250b4(rgyud 'grel): mo legs par dgug par bya/ /gsang sngags la sogs sbyor byas pas/ /so so'i las la gzhug bya ste/ /las kyi phyag rgya'i 'ching grol gyis/ /rang gi phrin las kun spyod pa'o/ /dman pa'i phyag rgya rnam pa bzhis/ /dngos grub sna tshogs
250b5(rgyud 'grel): las sbyor ba'o/ /bde bar gshegs so bcom ldan 'das/ /rgyal ba rgya mtsho ye shes kyis/ /srid pa'i rgya mtsho mdza' yas kun/ /kun bzang mchod sprin mchog tu rol/ /oM na ma(rgyud 'grel): sarba ta thA ga te b+hyo/ bi shwa mu ge b+hya(rgyud 'grel): sarba ta da khaM ung+ga te
250b6(rgyud 'grel): spha ra Na hi maM ga ga na khaM swAhA/ /oM 'byung ba lnga las thams cad 'byung/ /rang las ma byung gang yang med/ /gtsang dme'i dri rtog kun bral ba'i/ /bdud rtsi byang chub sems chen pos/ /bdag sogs gnyis med mchod pa'i phyir/ /mnyam
250b7(rgyud 'grel): pa chen po'i gnas la rol/ /hUM mahA su kha bo d+hi tsit+ta a la la ho a la la ho/ /oM mnyam med mi g.yo mnyam nyid mchog gi chos nyid can/ /thugs rje'i bdag nyid 'gro ba'i sdug bsngal sel bar mdzad/ /yon tan mdza' yas
251a1(rgyud 'grel): dngos grub thams cad sbyin mdzad pa/ /dri med mi g.yo mnyam pa med pa'i chos mchog can/ /oM yon tan shin tu phra ba'i cha la 'ang tshad med de/ /dpe ni nam mkha' dang yang bskrun du yod ma yin/ /dngos grub
251a2(rgyud 'grel): mdza' yas mnyam med dpe dang bral ba rnams/ /sems can khams la dngos grub mchog rnams nges par gsol/ /oM rtag tu dri ma med pa'i thugs rje shugs las byung/ /smon lam grub pa 'gag pa med pa'i chos nyid can//
251a3(rgyud 'grel): 'gro ba'i don sgrub rab tu brtson pa mdza' yas pa/ /thugs rje'i chen po'i bdag nyid rtag tu rnam par snang/ /oM tshad med tshad dang bral ba shin tu rdzogs pa yis/ /bde bar gshegs pa'i go 'phang dam pa brnyes gyur kyang/ /khams
251a4(rgyud 'grel): gsum rnams la dngos grub mchog tu gsol mdzad cing/ /thugs rje'i spyod pa mi g.yo 'gag par yongs mi 'gyur/ /oM e ma 'o/ /shin tu bzang po'i dngos grub mchog dang ldan/ /mchog sbyin rnams kyi nang na go 'phang
251a5(rgyud 'grel): mchog brnyes pa/ /khams gsum rnams la rtag tu dngos grub mchog stsol mdzad/ /mgon po dus gsum sgrib pa med par rab mkhyen pa/ /dam tshig mchog gsum dngos grub dam pa bdag la stsol/ /oM phyogs bcu nam mkha' i
251a6(rgyud 'grel): mdza' klas par/ /sems can kun gyi don sgrub la/ /ji ltar thugs kyi dbang phyug bzhin/ de nyid spyod par bdag gyur cig /ji srid thog ma med dus nas/ /'khor ba yi ni mthar thug par/ /de srid sems can phan pa nyid/ /mdza' 
251a7(rgyud 'grel): yas spyod par bdag gyur cig /sngags kyi tshul gyis sems can rnams/ /de tshe bdag gis dul 'gyur zhing/ /kun gyis rigs 'dzin gnas thob nas/ /de nyid mgon po mthong bar shog /lha rnams kun gyi gnas zhugs pa'i/
251b1(rgyud 'grel): ye shes sems dpa' i sngags 'khor lo/ /nyi zla rten dang brten pa'i sngags/ /'khor lo'i tshul ldan shes rab thabs/ /ye shes mtshan ma sku yi gnas/ /yan lag rnam gsum ldan byas te/ /gsal ba gnyis kyi sgo nas brtsams/ /
251b2(rgyud 'grel): bgrang ba las ni 'das pa'o/ /rtse gcig gnas su 'khor ba dang/ /las dang rgyu dang 'phro ba las/ /mchod bskul las mdzad bsdu byed cing/ /dkyil 'khor gsal bar gyur pa'o/ /oM badzra satwa mahA sa ma ya A(rgyud 'grel): hUM swAhA/ /thun mong gi gsang
251b3(rgyud 'grel): sngags yi ge bcu bzhi pa'o/ /so so'i las la snyoms bzhugs nas/ /rang gi thun mtshams sngags yig bcas/ /'phro 'dus rang gi las mdzad nas/ /sku gsung thugs kyi gsal grub pa'o/ /oM mahA su kha badzra satwa A:/
251b4(rgyud 'grel): dza(rgyud 'grel): hUM baM ho(rgyud 'grel): su ra ta stwaM/ khyad par gyi snying po yi ge bco brgyad pa'o/ /sngags gzhan rim bzhin gsal ldan pas/ /go rims 'khrul med bzlas brjod bya/ /las rdzogs mchod bstod bskul byas nas/ /rang gi gnas su bsdu
251b5(rgyud 'grel): bar bya/ /thun mtshams gzhan du bsam bya ba/ /bzlas brjod khyad par phyed pa'i tshad/ /bzhi 'am drug tu rim bzhin bzla/ /kun bzang mchod pa nas brtsams te/ /de mthar phyin pa'i las rdzogs nas/ /glu gar dbyangs kyis dngos
251b6(rgyud 'grel): grub bskul/ /rigs kyi dkyil 'khor gsal byas nas/ /tshogs gnyis rdzogs par sgrub byed pa'i/ /tshogs kyi dga' bde'i longs spyod kyis/ /rnal 'byor bcas pa mnyes par bya/ /lha rnams mnyes shing tshim pa dang/ /las kun bsgrub
251b7(rgyud 'grel): par bya ba'i phyir/ /las rnams ma lus bsdus pa yi/ /sbyin bsreg cho ga rgyas par brtsam/ /rta mchog mkha' 'gro 'khor bcas ba/ /lhag pa'i mchod pa mnyes byas nas/ /rang gi las la sbyar bya ste/ /dngos grub don phyir
252a1(rgyud 'grel): mtshams su bzhag /nang par dkyil 'khor mchod bstod cing/ /bskor bcas rgyun tu bshags te gdon/ /ye shes dam tshig gnyis med bsdu/ /rdul tshon gtsang ma'i gnas su bzhag /rdo rje sems dpa' dpal
252a2(rgyud 'grel): sbyor ba/ /ji lta'i gzugs dang dbyibs su ldan/ /bde ba nyid kyis kun gyis bdag /kun gyi bdag la gzhug par bya/ /chags pa med cing ma chags med/ /dbu mar yang ni dmigs su med/ /bud med kun gyi rgyu sbyor 'di/ /gnyis su
252a3(rgyud 'grel): med pa'i theg pa'i mchog /mnyam nyid dkyil 'khor kun gyi gzhi/ /don dam bde ba chen po'i sku/ /de bzhin nyid dbyings ye shes kyi/ /lha nyid brtson pas bsgom par bya/ /mdzod gnas dpa' bo gzugs brnyan mchog /rin
252a4(rgyud 'grel): chen sna lnga'i phreng bas 'khrigs/ /mtshon gang zla nyi'i gdan la gnas/ /pho brang sgo bzhi gdan pad+ma/ /chos kyi snying po nyi shu gcig /mda' mangs 'khor lo'i tshul 'chang ngo/ /mi gsal gsal ba'i rnam par brtag /'phro 'dus
252a5(rgyud 'grel): rigs kyi skur rdzogs shing/ /rgyan chas cha lugs gsal byas te/ /rang gi phrin las spro byed pa'o/ /phyag rgya bzhi rdzogs dbang bskur ldan/ /ye shes dkyil 'khor gnyis med bstim/ /mchod bstod las la bskul gsal 'grub/ /yun
252a6(rgyud 'grel): rings mtshan ma lnga yi mthar/ /dkyil 'khor rgyas pa la dmigs te/ /kun gyi gsang ba'i mdzod rgyas par/ /dmigs pa gcig bzhin gsal bar ru/ /brtan par gyur nas spro bar bya/ /rgya cher gnas gsum rdo rje la/ /bum
252a7(rgyud 'grel): pa'i khang par dkyil 'khor bsgom/ /rim bzhin gtso bo'i rnam pa gnas/ /'khor gyi lha mo mthar thug par/ /dkyil 'khor gnyis med rdzogs pa'i mthar/ /mnyes mdzad 'gro ba'i don la sbyar/ /dpa' bo mtshan ma gsang
252b1(rgyud 'grel): gsum sngags/ /'phro 'du'i phreng ba kun 'khor bas/ /mgal med 'khor lo'i rnam pa bzhin/ /gnas kun bar chad med par brtsam/ /smig rgyu du ba srin bu me/ /mar me zla nyi'i 'od bzhin du/ /thig le rgyas pa'i dkyil 'khor gyis/ /phyag rgya
252b2(rgyud 'grel): chen po'i lam la sbyor/ /gnyis med rol pa'i mkha' gsang du/ /gtso bo'i mtshan ma gsal gyur nas/ /bum par rten dang brten pa'i lha/ /gtso bo nas gzung rim par bsgom/ /phyag rgya rgyan chas cha lugs kyi/ /rigs kyi dkyil
252b3(rgyud 'grel): 'khor rdzogs pa dang/ /phyag rgya bzhis mtshan dbang bskur 'bras/ /skye mched byin brlabs gsal bar bya/ /ye shes lha dang sbyor gnas nas/ /dman pa'i phyag rgya bzhi yis gdab/ /mchod bstod 'gro ba'i don spro ba/ /rim bzhin
252b4(rgyud 'grel): mtshan ma lnga yi bar/ /lha rnams kun sbyor gnas rgyas par/ /rnam gcig skul gsal ji lta bar/ /spro dang bsdu ba'i tshul brtan pa/ /phra rags dkyil 'khor mthar phyin pa'o/ /des na phrin las dngos grub kyi/ /phra mo'i las kun
252b5(rgyud 'grel): brtsams pas 'grub/ /de ltar thig le phra mo'i tshul/ /dkyil 'khor lha yi rnam dag gis/ /mtshan mas dmigs pa sbyang byas te/ /chos sku'i phyag rgya chen por gnas/ /gang zag bzhi yis dbye ba yis/ /rang gi phrin las sbyor
252b6(rgyud 'grel): ba'i mthus/ /bsnyen sgrub yan lag bzhi rdzogs te/ /mchog gyur phyag rgya bzhi mthar phyin/ /bsnyen sgrub sbyor ba bzhi dag gis/ /dang po'i dkyil 'khor mnyes byas pa/ /spyi yi bsnyen pa dang po ste/ /thun mong bzhi yis dkyil 'khor
252b7(rgyud 'grel): yin/ /rnal 'byor de nyid bcom ldan 'das/ /rdo rje sems dpa' bsgrub 'dod pas/ /bar chad med par zhi rgyas dbang/ /phrin las sna tshogs sgo dag nas/ /nye ba'i brten pa brtsam pa'i phyir/ /dkyil 'khor bzhi yi las la 'jug /dang po
253a1(rgyud 'grel): zhi ba chen po'i las/ /rgyud sbyang bsrung zhing lhag gnas dang/ /dngos grub shis pa brtag pa'i phyir/ /rnam snang dkyil 'khor nye bar bsnyen/ /de bzhin nyid nas brtsam bya ste/ /phreng bas brgyan pa'i bar du bsgom/ /nang gi
253a2(rgyud 'grel): dkyil 'khor dbyings dag ni/ /ri'u mig zlum po 'khor los brgyan/ /'khor lo'i phreng bas rnam par spras/ /sna tshogs pad+ma'i gdan gyis mtshan/ /phyi rol ra ba dur khrod dang/ /kun 'byung 'khor yug tu bzhis mtshan/ /mngon par byang
253a3(rgyud 'grel): chub rnam lnga yis/ /mgon po rgyu yi sems dpa' skyed/ /sku mdog rgyan cha nas bzung ste/ /byin rlabs rdzogs pas dag par bya/ /rang 'od rig pa bskyed pa nas/ /lha mos bskul ba'i mthar thug brtsam/ /thugs rjes 'gro
253a4(rgyud 'grel): ba'i rgyud gzigs te/ /lam dang 'khor lo las byung ste/ /zhing oM bruM khaM gis bskyed pa'i/ /'dul phyir rnam snang mdzad du gyur/ /gser mdog zhal bzhi phyag bzhis mdzes/ /zhal gsum dkar dmar ljang gu'i mdog /chos kyi
253a5(rgyud 'grel): 'khor lo'i rtsibs rnams la/ /sna tshogs mtshan mas brgyan pa 'am/ /lhung bzed mkhar gsil chos gos dang/ /dam pa'i chos kyi glegs bam 'dzin/ /rin chen sna tshogs rgyan dang gos/ /mtshan dpe phyag rgya lnga yi spras//
253a6(rgyud 'grel): sku gsung thugs kyi rdo rje dang/ /ye shes sems dpa' sngags dang bcas/ /sangs rgyas kun gyi dbang bskur zhing/ /dbu la rigs kyi bdag pos brgyan/ /rdo rje thal mo mnyam sbyar te/ /lag gnyis nor bu rin chen du/ /ji
253a7(rgyud 'grel): ltar rig pas mnyam sbyar nas/ /mdzub mos mthe bo rtse mo bzhi/ /yongs su bsgyur te bteg nas su/ /dpral ba'i gnas su bzhag par bya/ /oM a b+hi Shiny+tsa maM/ rin chen myu gu 'khor lo'i phreng/ /ngar dbyengs dgyes pa'i thal mor
253b1(rgyud 'grel): bcas/ /rang 'od yum dang 'khril ba nas/ /gnas nas kham dang shaM brgyan te/ /ling ga 'bar ba'i rin chen phaT/ /rtse mo 'khor lo rnam par mdzes/ /rnam thar pad+ma e dkyil can/ /mdog ser lte ba ze 'bru dmar/ /sa ma ya sogs brdas
253b2(rgyud 'grel): bskul nas/ /dza(rgyud 'grel): hUM baM ho(rgyud 'grel): sa rol pa bya/ /ling ga 'greng ba rang byung ba/ /brla yi dbus su gzhug byas nas/ /ling ga mtshan mar byin brlabs te/ /rdo rje dbyings dag sngon kye'o/ /gsang gnas so so'i gdan dag la/ /chos kyi snying pos lha
253b3(rgyud 'grel): rnams bskyed/ /khaM las rnam par snang mdzad nyid/ /dbus kyi gdan la bsgom par bya/ /shaM las sangs rgyas dbyangs ma ste/ /raM las de bzhin dpa' mo ma/ /maM las kun tu bzang mo yin/ /thaM las zad med snod 'dzin ma'o/ /'di bzhi'i gtso
253b4(rgyud 'grel): bo'i phyogs rnams su/ /pho brang pad+ma bzhi la gnas/ /haM las sangs rgyas sku ldan ma/ /tshaM las lha mo zhal mdzes mo/ /traM las de bzhin sprin chen mo/ /daM las nam mkha' i spyan ma yin/ /gling bu ma sogs lha mo rnams/ /rdo rje sems dpa' i
253b5(rgyud 'grel): dkyil 'khor bzhin/ /b+ha gar ling ga bcug byas nas/ /der ni mtshan ma bsgom par bya/ /rnam par snang mdzad gzugs 'dra ba'i/ /sku gnyis ldan pa spro bya'o/ /oM b+hu khaM dza dza/ phyogs bcur don byas 'dus pa dag /gtso bo yab yum
253b6(rgyud 'grel): la gzhug bya/ /sangs rgyas dbyangs ma chu shel mdangs/ /rgyan mdzes lce yi phyag rgyas mtshan/ /oM badzra satwa shaM dzdza/ dpal mo gser mdog phyag gnyis kyis/ /cha lang 'khrol zhing gar mdzad pa'o/ /oM badzra ratna raM dzdza/ kun tu
253b7(rgyud 'grel): bzang mo dmar gsal mdangs/ /phyag gnyis rdo rje rin po che/ oM badzra d+harma maM dzdza/ /zad med snod 'dzin sna tshogs mdog /rgyan chas snod dang dud 'dzin pa'o/ /oM badzra karma thaM dzdza/ 'di bzhi dbus kyi lha mo ste/ /phyag rgya'i sku dang 'khrig par
254a1(rgyud 'grel): bzhugs/ /sangs rgyas kun ldan me long mdog /phyag gnyis mi bskyod thugs kar 'dzin/ /haM satwa badzra dzdza/ zhal mdzes sngo skya phyag gnyis kyis/ /me long mdangs gsal rlung yab 'dzin/ /cheM badzra rat+teM dzdza/ sprin
254a2(rgyud 'grel): chen bai DUrya mdog phyag /rdo rje'i sprin las ser ba 'beb/ /taM badzra padme dzdza/ nam mkha' i spyan ma gur gum mdog /phyag na pad+ma la gnas spyan/ /daM pi shwa badzra dzdza/ /'di dag phyogs kyi 'khor lo la/ /rim pa bzhin du dgod par bya/ /lha
254a3(rgyud 'grel): mo 'di dag mdzes pa'i mdangs/ /rin chen dar phreng bas brgyan/ /byin brlabs dbang bskur rdzogs byas pas/ /dam tshig dkyil 'khor gsal bar gyur/ /sbyor bas rang rig dkyil 'khor bskul/ /zhi ba'i tshul bcas mdun du bzhugs/ /rdo rje dpal
254a4(rgyud 'grel): gyi thal mo bsgyur/ /bsam pa g.yos pas phyag rgya'o/ /oM a ti b+hu oM/ /gar bsgyur rdo rje thal mo bsgyur/ /g.yon bskor spyi bo'i mtshams su bzhag /bskal bzang o zhes bya ba'i glu/ /mchod pa thams cad dbul bar bya/ /tshad med
254a5(rgyud 'grel): bzhi yi sbyor ba yis/ /lha rnams gnyis su med par gyur/ /oM rnal 'byor de nyid bcom ldan 'das/ /rdo rje sems dpa' de bzhin gshegs/ /thar pa thams cad rnam dag phyir/ /sangs rgyas phyag rgya dpal du gnas/ /don dam rnam
254a6(rgyud 'grel): par dag pa'i phyir/ /btso ma gser gyi kha dog bzhin/ /chags med la sogs chags chen phyir/ /dkar zhing sna tshogs gsal ba'i mdangs/ /chos kyi rgyal srid rab bsgrub pa/ /rin chen chos las lhag pa med/ /de las theg chen
254a7(rgyud 'grel): byang chub sems/ /rgyal ba rdo rje rin chen can/ /g.yas pa'i mthe bong gung mo gnyis/ /g.yon pa'i khu tshur bcangs pa yis/ /sor mo kun la reg pa ni/ /rtsa ba'i phyag rgya yin par grags/ /'di ni sangs rgyas thams cad kyi/ /shes
254b1(rgyud 'grel): rab pha rol tu phyin gsal yin/ /g.yas pa'i yan lag gnon pa yis/ /g.yon pa'i yan lag kun las rgyas/ /sems dpa' i skyil mo krung bcas na/ /dpung rnams thams cad 'joms par byed/ /oM b+hu khaM mahA mu dra oM/ rdo rje khu tshur bcangs nas
254b2(rgyud 'grel): kyang/ /lag pa g.yon pas bkab nas ni/ /sangs rgyas kun brjod dngos grub rnams/ /ma lus lus pa med par 'grub/ /oM badzra satwa shaM mahA mu tra oM/ de bzhin dpal ldan he ru ka'i/ /rdo rje khu tshur chen po dgag /dpa' bo ma yis dngos grub rnams//
254b3(rgyud 'grel): ma lus lus pa med pa 'grub/ /oM badzra ratna raM mahA mu dra oM/ /padmo'i bud med khu tshur ni/ /de bzhin lag pa g.yon pas dgag /byang chub spyod pa rab grub rnams/ /ma lus lus pa med pa 'grub/ /oM badzra d+harma maM mahA mu dra oM/ rin chen 'dzin
254b4(rgyud 'grel): pa'i khu tshur yang/ /lag pa g.yon pas bkang nas ni/ /sangs rgyas nor kun dngos grub rnams/ /ma lus lus pa med pa 'grub/ /oM badzra karmA mahA mu dra oM/ /sangs rgyas khu tshur bcangs nas su/ /lag pa g.yon pas bkab nas ni/ /sangs rgyas
254b5(rgyud 'grel): kun gyi tshe sgrub pa/ /ma lus lus pa med pa 'grub/ /haM satwa badzra mahA mu tra oM/ /bud med phyag rgya bcings nas su/ /lag pa g.yon pas bkab pa ni/ /dngos grub thams cad myur 'grub pa/ /ma lus lus pa med pa 'grub/ /tsheM badzra rat+ta mahA mu dra oM//
254b6(rgyud 'grel): rta mchog dpal gyi khu tshur yang/ /lag pa g.yon pas bkab nas ni/ /thams cad dgug pa rab bsgrub pa/ /ma lus lus pa med pa 'grub/ /traM badzra pad+ma ma mahA mu tra oM/ /dpal 'grub spyan gyi khu tshur yang/ /lag pa g.yon pas bkab
254b7(rgyud 'grel): na ni/ /snang ba thams cad rab 'grub 'gyur/ /ma lus lus pa med pa 'grub/ /daM bi shwa badzre mahA mu dra oM/ /oM 'jig rten khams mang rdul phran snyed/ /grangs med khyab par spros pa yis/ /rgyal ba'i don rnams rab dag tu/ /phra ba'i
255a1(rgyud 'grel): rdul gyi grangs snyed pa/ /sprul pa'i sku rnams rab dag tu/ /phra ba'i rdul gyi grangs snyed ni/ /srid pa bde chen de bzhin gshegs/ /rnam 'phrul rnam pa sna tshogs kyis/ /rdul phran grangs snyed de bzhin gshegs/ /rnam par 'phrul
255a2(rgyud 'grel): pas rol mdzad do/ /rnam par snang mdzad dpal sbyor ba/ /a la la ho/ /bde grub mdzod/ /oM ru ru sphu ru dzwa la tiSh+Tha sid+d+ha lotsA ne sarbArtha sid+d+hi ni swAhA/ rdo rje thal mo mnyam sbyar nas/ /mdzub mo gnyis kyi rtse mo dgug /mthe bo'i rtse mo mnyam par
255a3(rgyud 'grel): bzhag /khong stong mi 'gyur ngam pa po/ /spyi bo'i gtsug tu bzhag nas kyang/ /sngags bcas rim bzhin grol bar bya/ /rdo rje khu tshur legs bcings la/ /bdag gi mthe bo nang du gzhug /zhi ba'i las rnams bsgrub pa yis/ /phyag rgya sngags
255a4(rgyud 'grel): rnams mnyam sbyor ba'o/ /phyi nang gsang ba'i mchog tshogs dag /byin rlabs sngags dang phyag rgyas dbul/ /mnyam med mi g.yo la sogs pa'i/ /bstod pa'i phyag rgyas mnyes par bya/ /smon lam rgya chen btab byas nas/ /bzlas brjod thig
255a5(rgyud 'grel): le phra mo dang/ /dkyil 'khor de nyid gang rung gis/ /mtshan ma'i dkyil 'khor brtan par bya/ /sgrib sbyang bde ba bskyed pa'i phyir/ /rin chen bum pa byab pa'i rdzas/ /sngags kyi phra ti me tog phreng/ bza' btung phyag rgya bdud rtsi'i tshogs/ /la
255a6(rgyud 'grel): mnyes mgron tshim las grub byed/ /tshogs dang sbyin sreg lhag ma'i las/ /las rdzogs mchod bstod bskul byas shing/ /rang gi gnas su bsdus nas ni/ /mtshan ma bud dang yongs bral ba'i/ /mnyam nyid dbyings su gnas par bya/ /
255a7(rgyud 'grel): yod pa ma yin med pa min/ /dbu mar yang ni dmigs su med/ /shes rab pha rol phyin sbyor ba/ /sangs rgyas byang chub rab bsgrub pa'o/ /thams cad dbang du bya ba'i phyir/ /pad+ma gar dbang mchod byas te/ /chags bcas bsdus shing gzung
255b1(rgyud 'grel): byas nas/ /tshe yi cho ga rgya cher bya/ /gzhi yi ting nge 'dzin rim pa nas/ /phreng bas brgyan pa'i bar du bsgom/ /nang gi dkyil 'khor dbyibs dag ni/ /re'u cha dgu dang pad+mas bskor/ /pad+ma'i lcug ma mu khyud mdzes/ /sna tshogs pad+ma'i gdan gyis
255b2(rgyud 'grel): mtshan/ /phyi rol ra ba dur khrod dang/ /kun 'byung khor yug tu bzhis mtshan/ /mngon par byang chub rnam lnga yis/ /mgon po rgyu yi sems dpa' bskyed/ /sku mdog brgyan cha nas bzung ste/ /byin brlabs rdzogs pas dag par bya/ /rang
255b3(rgyud 'grel): 'od rig ma bskyed pa nas/ /lha mos bskul ba'i mthar thug tsam/ /thugs rjes 'gro la dmigs nas bzhengs/ /h+ri(rgyud 'grel): dang padmo las byung ba'o/ /oM swa b+hA ba bi shud+d+ha pad+ma ma nirte shwa re h+ri(rgyud 'grel): dpal ldan pad+ma gar dbang phyug /zla gsal shes mdangs
255b4(rgyud 'grel): zhal bco lnga/ /lnga bcu gnyis ldan mtshan bcas gar/ /zhabs bzhi mnyam pa'i pad+ma la/ /zla mdog dmar mdangs zhal bzhi pa/ /phyag g.yas nyi shu rtsa lnga na/ /pad+ma rdo rje sogs kyis mtshan/ /kha dog bdun ldan nyi shu lnga/ /rin chen sna
255b5(rgyud 'grel): tshogs brgyan gos klubs/ /mtshan dpe phyag rgya lnga yis spras/ /sku gsung thugs kyi rdo rje dang/ /ye shes sems dpa' sngags dang bcas/ /sangs rgyas kun gyi dbang bskur zhing/ /dbu la rigs kyi bdag pos brgyan/ /mthe bong sems
255b6(rgyud 'grel): dpa' i skyil mo krung/ /mdzub mo gnyis kyi rtse me dgug /gung mo gnyis ni mnyam par sbyar/ /lhag ma rdo rje thal mo'i 'od/ rdo rje rin chen phyag rgya 'di/ /rang 'byung rnams kyi dbang bskur ba'o/ /oM a b+hi Shiny+tsa h+ri(rgyud 'grel): pad+ma'i myu gu phyag rgya'i phreng
255b7(rgyud 'grel): dar dpyangs dgyes pa'i thal mo bcas/ /rang 'od yum dang 'khril lo las/ /gsang gnas h+rI(rgyud 'grel): dang dza(rgyud 'grel): sa brgyan te/ /pad+ma 'bar ba phaT dang bcas/ /rnam thar pad+ma e dkyil can/ /mdog ser lte ba ze 'bru dmar/ /brdas bskul byin brlabs rol par
256a1(rgyud 'grel): mdzad/ /ling ga bsgreng ba rang byung ba/ /brla yi dbus su gzhug byas nas/ /ling ga padmor byin brlabs te/ /padmo gar bdag sngon skye'o/ /gsang gnas so so'i gdan dag la/ /chos kyi snying pos lha rnams bskyed/ /h+rI(rgyud 'grel): las
256a2(rgyud 'grel): pad+ma gar dbang phyug /gsang gnas dbus kyi gdan la bsgom/ /dza(rgyud 'grel): yis rnam par gzigs pa ste/ /hUM(rgyud 'grel): gis lha mo sgrol ma'o/ /baM gyis lha mo rgyan bcas ma/ /ho(rgyud 'grel): yis khro gnyer chen mo'o/ /hUM gis gtum pa'i dbang phyug ma//
256a3(rgyud 'grel): hes ni sna tshogs pad+ma yin/ /a las pad+ma'i na bza' ste/ /ho(rgyud 'grel): yis 'dod pa'i dbang mo'o/ /gling bu ma la sogs pa yi/ /lha mo gzhan rnams snga ma bzhin/ /b+ha gar ling ga bcug byas nas/ /der ni h+ri(rgyud 'grel): yig bsgom par bya/ /pad+ma
256a4(rgyud 'grel): gar dbang gzugs 'dra ba/ /sku gnyis ldan par spro ba'o/ /oM swa b+hA ba bi shud+d+ha pad+ma nirte shwa ri dzdza/ phyogs bcur don byas 'dus pa dag /gtso bo yab yum gzhug par bya/ /rnam gzigs dkar dmar mdangs ldan pa/ /g.yon
256a5(rgyud 'grel): pas pad+mar g.yas 'byed shar/ /oM sarba ta thA ga te pad+ma mi dzdza/ sgrol ma dkar gsal g.yon dkur brten/ /utpal sngo g.yas bud med lho/ /oM badzra padmi dzdza/ rgyan can dmar po g.yon pad dkar/ /g.yas pas 'khor lo rtse
256a6(rgyud 'grel): brgyad nub/ /he padmi padmi paM dzdza/ khro gnyer ljang gu g.yon pa mthing/ /dkur brten g.yas pas rtse gsum byang/ /ho pad+ma ni ra dza dzdza/ pad gtum dbang phyug mthing ka g.yon/ /pad+ma g.yas pas rdo rje 'dzin/ /hUM pad+ma tsiN+Da shwa ri hUM
256a7(rgyud 'grel): phaT dzdza/ sna tshogs pad+ma sngon mo g.yon/ /sna tshogs pad 'dzin g.yas 'khor lo/ /he ma hA bi shwa pad+ma mu tre sid+hi hUM phaT dzdza/ pad+ma'i na bza' ser mo g.yon/ /pad mthing g.yas pas chu srin rgyal/ /h+rI(rgyud 'grel): pad+ma pad+ma hUM aM dzdza/ rdo rje
256b1(rgyud 'grel): pad+ma dbang phyug ljang/ /g.yon na pad+ma g.yas rdo rje/ /ho padme bi shwa kra ma hUM dzdza/ /'di bzhi phyi rol pad+ma yi/ /shar sogs rim bzhin gnas pa'o/ /'od 'bar sna tshogs 'khrugs 'od bcas/ /pad+ma rgyan bcas phreng bas mdzes/ /dbang bskur
256b2(rgyud 'grel): byin brlabs rdzogs byas te/ /dbu la rigs kyi bdag pos mtshan/ /sbyor bas rigs kyi dkyil 'khor bskul/ /chags pa'i tshul bcas mdun du bzhugs/ /thal mo pad+ma kha 'bus bzhin/ /rang gi sbyor ldan snying gar bcing/ /mthe bo
256b3(rgyud 'grel): mthe'u chung 'dab ma bzhin/ /rgyas par bdud pa'i phyag kyang bya/ /oM a ti b+hu h+ri(rgyud 'grel): gar bsgyur g.yas g.yon thal mos brdab/ /padmo gar gyi mchod pa 'bul/ /tshad med bzhi yi sbyor ba yis/ /lha rnams gnyis su med par bya/ /h+ri(rgyud 'grel): rnal 'byor
256b4(rgyud 'grel): de nyid bcom ldan 'das/ /rdo rje sems dpa' i de bzhin gshegs/ /'dod chags thams cad rnam dag phyir/ /pad+ma'i phyag rgya dpal du gnas/ /mi 'gyur ngam pa dag pa'i phyir/ /shel gong bzhin du dag pa 'dra/ /'dod chags thams cad
256b5(rgyud 'grel): bsal ba'i phyir/ /'bar ba sna tshogs 'khrigs pa'i 'od/ /sangs rgyas rin chen rab tu spras/ /gos ngang sna tshogs rgyan gyis mdzes/ /sangs rgyas thams cad 'dus pa yis/ /bde ba can bzhin dam par 'gyur/ /gar thabs rnam pa
256b6(rgyud 'grel): sna tshogs kyis/ /yongs su bsgyur zhing gar byas pa/ /padmo'i mtshan mchog padmor bcas/ /phyag ni rgya rnams 'khor lo bskor/ /g.yas dang g.yon gyi sbyor ba yis/ /skyil mo krung ni phyed mar bcas/ /oM swa b+hA ba bi shud+d+hA pad+ma nirte
256b7(rgyud 'grel): shwa ri h+rI(rgyud 'grel): mahA mu dra h+ri(rgyud 'grel): bsnyems pa'i lag pa g.yon pa yis/ /pad+ma dmar po ci bder gzung/ /rang gi snying gar 'dren pa'i tshul/ /g.yas pas 'dab ma kha 'byed pa'o/ /oM sarba ta thA ga tA padme dzdza(rgyud 'grel): mahA mu dra h+rI(rgyud 'grel): bsnyems pa'i
257a1(rgyud 'grel): lag pa g.yon pa yis/ /skyil mo krung ni phyed mar bya/ /pad+ma sngon po ci bder bzung/ /rang gi snying gar 'dren tshul gyis/ /bud med phyag rgya bcing bar bya/ /hUM badzra padmi mahA mu dra h+rI(rgyud 'grel): bsnyems pa'i lag pa g.yon pa yis//
257a2(rgyud 'grel): pad+ma dkar po ci bder bzung/ /'khor lo'i phyag rgya bcings nas ni/ /chos kyi 'khor lo rab tu bskor/ /he padmi padmi baM mahA mu dra h+ri:/ bsnyems pa'i lag pa g.yon pa yis/ /pad+ma mthing kha ci bder bzung/ /g.yas pa rab tu
257a3(rgyud 'grel): gar byed pa/ /dpal gyi phyag rgya ba dan gsum/ /ho pad+ma ni ra dzaM ma hA mu dra h+ri:/ bsnyems pa'i lag pa g.yon pa yis/ /pad+ma dmar po ci bder bzung/ /g.yas pas rdo rje stod byed cing/ /gzhan dag zil gnon 'jigs pa'i tshul//
257a4(rgyud 'grel): hUM pad+ma tsaN+De shwa ri hUM phaT/ mahA mu dra h+ri(rgyud 'grel): bsnyems pa'i lag pa g.yon pa yis/ /sna tshogs pad+ma ci bder bzung/ /g.yas kyi 'khor lo'i phyag rgya yis/ /khams gsum phrin las gnon pa'o/ /he mahA bi shwa pad+ma mu dre sid+d+hi hUM phaT
257a5(rgyud 'grel): mahA mu dra h+rI(rgyud 'grel): bsnyems pa'i lag pa g.yon pa yis/ /pad+ma mthing kha ci bder bzung/ /g.yas pas rab tu gar byed pas/ /chu srin tshul du bsgreng bar bya/ /h+ri(rgyud 'grel): padmi padmi hUM A(rgyud 'grel): mahA mu dra h+rI(rgyud 'grel): bsnyems pa'i lag pa g.yon pa

257a7(rgyud 'grel): 'dzin/ /sems can rnam pa sna tshogs kyi/ /'dul mchog dngos grub mchog mnga' ba/ /sems dpa' padmo dga' ba'i mchog /sgyu ma'i dga' ba bstan du gsol/ /a la la ho e ma'o/ /gar dbang thar pa'i gar mdzod cig /sangs
257b1(rgyud 'grel): rgyas rdo rje 'dzin pa'i bdag/ tshangs pa 'jug sel dbang phyug bdag/ nyi zla bdag lags a la la ho/ /padmo sgyu ma dpal sna tshogs/ /'dul mdzad dga' ba'i tshul dgar mdzod/ /padmo dam tshig sangs rgyas kyis/ /dbang phyug gar rnams
257b2(rgyud 'grel): mdzad du gsol/ /'dod chags rnam par spyod ba dag /thams cad da rung rnam par sbyong/ /padmo 'dzin pas mngon sum du/ /spyan sngar gar mkhan gar mdzod cig /oM tA re tut+tA re swAhA/ /rdo rje thal mo mnyam sbyar nas// gong ma mnyam
257b3(rgyud 'grel): pa rab tu bsgrub/ /mthe bo mthe'u chung 'dab ma bzhi/ /pad+ma dri med rab tu rgyas/ /rdeg pa'i khu tshur bcangs pa las/ /mthe bo dag la gung mo bzhag /pad+ma'i khu tshur grub pa ste/ /thams cad dag pa'i las la sbyar/ /phyi nang gsang ba'i mchod
257b4(rgyud 'grel): tshogs dag /byin brlabs sngags dang phyag rgyas dbul/ /mnyam med mi g.yo la sogs pa'i/ /bstod pa'i phyag rgya mnyes par bya/ /smon lam rgyas gdab byas nas ni/ /bzlas brjod thig le phra mo dang/ /dkyil 'khor de nyid gang rung gis//
257b5(rgyud 'grel): mtshan ma'i dmigs pa brtan par bya/ /pho brang bkra shis mtshan ldan du/ /pad+ma la gnas gsang ba'i ming/ /bdud rtsis bkang ba bsgrub pa'i mchog /rigs kyi dkyil 'khor phyag rgyar bcas/ /gsang sngags mdza' rgyan ma nyams par//
257b6(rgyud 'grel): 'phro 'du'i dmigs pa gsal ldan zhing/ /bskul tshig glu dbyangs phyag rgya'i gar/ /bza' btung tshogs bcas rol pas spyang/ /lha mnyes mgro na tshim las grub byed/ /tshogs sgrub sbyin sreg lhag ma'i las/ /las rdzogs mchod
257b7(rgyud 'grel): bstod bskul byas shing/ /rang gi gnas su bsdus nas ni/ /mtshan mo kun dang yongs bral ba'i/ /gnyis med dbyings su gnas par bya/ /ji ltar pad+ma dmar po 'di/ /chags pa'i nyes pas mi dgos pa/ /rnal 'byor ldan pas de bzhin du//
258a1(rgyud 'grel): gnas kyi nyes bas yongs mi gos/ /thams cad rgyas par bya ba'i phyir rdo rje nyi ma'i tshogs sgrub ste/ /dpal dang gzi mdangs kun grub pa'i/ /rgyas pa'i longs spyod dgod par bya/ /gzhi yi ting 'dzin nas bzung ste/ /phreng bas brgyan
258a2(rgyud 'grel): pa'i bar du bsgom/ /pho brang nang gi mtshan bcas sogs/ /rin chen 'bar ba cha brgyad pa/ /nyi rim lte ba re'u cha dgu/ /rin chen phreng ba mu khyud 'dzin/ /ka ba mchog brgyad rin chen tog /sna bdun pad+ma'i gdan gyis mtshan/ /phyi rol rab dur
258a3(rgyud 'grel): khrod dang/ /kun 'byung khor yug tu bzhis mtshan/ /mngon par byang chub rnam lnga yis/ /mgon po rgyu yi sems dpa' bskyed/ /sku mdog rgyan chas nas bzung ste/ /byin brlabs sprul pas dag par bsgom/ /rang 'ong rig ma bskyed pa nas/
258a4(rgyud 'grel): lha mos bskul ba'i mthar thug tsam/ /thugs rjes 'gro ba'i rgyud gzigs te/ /taM yig nor bu mda' las byung/ /oM sid+d+hya b+ha baM sid+d+hya bu ba/ sid+d+ha sa ma sid+d+ha shad mahA badzra ratna b+ha bAt+ta traM/ dpal ldan rdo rje nyi ma rgyal/ /gser mdog zhal bzhi phyag
258a5(rgyud 'grel): mdzes mtshungs/ /g.yas pas mnga' gsor g.yon gzhu 'dzin/ /mdzub bcas g.yon mig gyen du gzigs/ /g.yas kyi 'og mas ral gri 'dzin/ /g.yon pa pad+ma nyi dkyil la/ /rdo rje rtse lnga 'bar ba gnas/ /zhabs gnyis rgyal po'i skyil
258a6(rgyud 'grel): mo krung/ /khro mdangs pad+ma rA ga'i mdog /nyi ma'i dkyil 'khor 'bar bas mtshan/ /rin chen sna tshogs rgyan dang gos/ /mtshan dpe phyag rgya lnga yis mtshan/ /sku gsung thugs kyi rdo rje dang/ /ye shes sems dpa' sngags dang bcas/ /sangs
258a7(rgyud 'grel): rgyas kun gyi dbang bskur zhing/ /dbu la rigs kyi bdag pos brgyan/ /rdo rje thal mo mnyam sbyar nas/ /mdzub gnyis mnyam ste phyi ru dgu/ mthe bong gnyis ni rab tu brkyang/ /rdo rje nor bu dpral bar bzhag /oM a b+hi Shiny+tsa traM/ rin
258b1(rgyud 'grel): chen myu gu'i phyag rgya phreng/ /dar dpyangs dges pa'i thal mor bcas/ /rang 'ong yum dang 'khril ba las/ /gsang gnas h+ri(rgyud 'grel): dang a(rgyud 'grel): sa brgyan te/ /rin chen par phaT phaT dang bcas/ /brdas bskul gnyis med rol pa mdzad/ /ling ga bgreng ba rang
258b2(rgyud 'grel): 'byung ba/ /brla yi dbus su gzhug byas nas/ /ling ga rin chen byin brlabs te/ /rdo rje nyi mar bdag sngon bskyed/ /gsang gnas so so'i gdan dag la/ /chos kyi snying pos lha rnams bskyed/ /traM las rdo rje nyi ma ste/ /gsang gnas dbus kyi gdan
258b3(rgyud 'grel): pa'o/ /dza(rgyud 'grel): las lha mo dbang bskur ma/ /hUM gis lha mo gter ldan mchog /baM las rgyal mtshan mchog ldan te/ /ho las lha mo mchod chen mo/ /de bzhin oM las mnga' 'dzin rgyal/ /h+raM las ral gri 'dzin ma yin/ /ho yis lha mo nyi ma ste/
258b4(rgyud 'grel): taM las rdo rje me ma'o/ /lhag pa'i lha mo gling sogs rnams/ /rdo rje sems dpa' i dkyil 'khor bzhin/ /b+ha gar ling ga bcug nas ni/ /der ni taM yig bsgom par bya/ /rdo rje nyi ma'i gzugs 'dra ba/ /sku gnyis ldan par spro bya'o/ /oM sid+d+ha b+hu sid+d+hya b+hu
258b5(rgyud 'grel): sid+d+hya sa ya sid+d+hya sha/ mahA badzra ratna b+ha ba ta ta traM dzdza/ phyogs bcur don mdzad 'dus pa dag /gtso bo yab yum la gzhug bya/ /lha mo dbang bskur dkar gsal mdangs/ /dbu rgyan rtse lnga bum pa'i chu/ /badzra satwa dza dzdza/ gter ldan ser mo phyag
258b6(rgyud 'grel): gnyis na/ /rin chen gter gyi bum pa thogs/ /badzra ratna hUM dzdza/ rgyal mtshan mchog ldan dmar ba'i mdangs/ /rgyal mtshan rin chen tog bcas 'dzin/ /badzra ratna ma baM dzdza/ mchod chen ldang sngon rin chen snod/ /rin chen mchog rdzas gang ba
258b7(rgyud 'grel): 'dzin/ /badzra karma ho dzdza/ de dag gtso bo'i phyogs bzhi yi// ri'u cha'i pad+ma dag la gnas/ /mda' gzhu dmar ser mtshan mthun phyag /shar gyi phyogs kyi rtse la dgod/ /oM pra ti badzra ni ma ta dzdza/ rdo rje kha TwAM bai DUrya/ /ral gri kha twE lho yi
259a1(rgyud 'grel): tse/ /oM badzra pra ti h+ri dzdza/ /rdo rje nyi ma dmar ser mdangs/ /nyi ma'i dkyil 'khor nub kyi phyogs/ /oM tsin+ta ma ni ho dzdza/ rdo rje me mo ljang ser mdog /rdo rje snod bcas me 'dzin byang/ /oM badzra ma Sha hASh+TaM dzdza/ phyi rol shar sogs pad+ma'i
259a2(rgyud 'grel): gdan/ /rin chen 'bar ba'i rtsibs la gnas/ /'od 'bar sna tshogs 'khrugs 'od bcas/ /rin chen rgyan phreng na bza' klubs/ /byin brlabs dbang bskur rigs dag gis/ /dam tshig dkyil 'khor gsal bar 'gyur/ /sbyor bas rang gi
259a3(rgyud 'grel): dkyil 'khor bskul/ /rgyal ba'i tshul brjid gdan la bzhugs/ /lus kun sa la bsnyal byas te/ /gnas gsum thal mo phyag 'tshal lo/ /oM a ti b+hu traM/ gar bsgyur rin chen thal sbyar nas/ /nyi ma'i tshogs mnyes mchod pa dbul/ /tshad
259a4(rgyud 'grel): med bzhi yi sbyor ba yis/ /lha rnams gnyis su med par bya/ /traM rnal 'byor de nyid bcom ldan 'das/ /rdo rje sems dpa' de bzhin gshegs/ /nor mchog rnam par sbyar ba'i phyir/ /rdo rje nyi ma'i phyag rgyar gnas/ /nam mkha' i snying po thams
259a5(rgyud 'grel): cad phyogs/ /re ba thams cad yongs rdzogs par/ /bud med la sogs rin chen mchog /rin chen thams cad mkha' la 'bebs/ /drag po 'dus pa'i 'jig rten rnams/ /drag po nyid kyis sgrub par byed/ /nyi ma'i gzugs dang sbyor lam
259a6(rgyud 'grel): dang/ /tshul la gzi brjid chen po ston/ /rdo rje gzhu dang mnga' mchog dag /shin tu legs par bzung ba ste/ /mdangs gsal 'dzum dang bcas pa'i spyan/ /g.yon pas 'byed cing gyen du 'deg /rdo rje pus mo gnyis ?
259a7(rgyud 'grel): te/ /rgyal po'i skyil mo krung bcas nas/ /rang gi stan la 'dug na ni/ /bgegs rnams thams cad gzhig par bya/ /oM sid+d+hya b+hu sid+d+hya b+hu sid+d+ha sa ma sid+d+ha sha/ mahA badzra ratna bA b+ha ta ta traM/ mahA mu tra tra/ khams gsum gnas kun
259b1(rgyud 'grel): dag mdzad cing/ /chos kyi rgyal por dbang bskur ba'o/ /ye shes lngas mtshan rgyan gyis spras/ /skyon gyis ma gos sgrib tshogs spangs/ /badzra satwa dza(rgyud 'grel): mahA mu tra traM/ /rgyal srid kun la longs spyod cing/ /'phags pa'i nor tshogs zag pa
259b2(rgyud 'grel): med/ /rang bzhin mi 'gyur lhun grub rgyas/ /rtag tu 'gyur med rnam par spyod/ /badzra ratna hUM mahA mu dra traM/ chos kun mtshan ma las rgyal zhing/ /yon tan tshogs ldan nub pa med/ /chags pa'i thugs rjes kun khyab mdzad/ /mchog
259b3(rgyud 'grel): gi mtshan mas mnyes pa'i tshul/ /badzra d+harmA baM mahA mu tra traM/ mnyes mdzad 'phrin las kun spyod cing/ /kun 'byung yon tan snod bcud sogs/ /rnam kun spungs pa'i sprin chen po/ /sna tshogs las mdzad 'gyur ba med/ /badzra karma ho:
259b4(rgyud 'grel): mahA mu dra traM/ thabs dang shes rab 'brel pa'i mchog /rgya chen zab mo'i dbyings su sbyor/ /chags pa'i skyon bral rgyas byed mdangs/ /thugs rjes mdzad pas bshol ba med/ /oM pra ti badzra ni phaT/ mahA mu tra traM/ /sku gsung thugs mchog
259b5(rgyud 'grel): rtags ldan pas/ /sna tshogs sgrar bcas khams gsum gnon/ /shes rab mtshon tshogs g.yul las rgyal/ /don dam 'gyur med mkha' 'gro ma/ /oM badzra pra ti h+ri(rgyud 'grel): mahA mu dra traM/ sra brtan mi shigs 'gro rgyud khyab/ /'od mdangs
259b6(rgyud 'grel): gsal ba'i dkyil 'khor can/ /lhag pa'i thugs gnyis dbri dkrol med/ /de nyid bzhin 'das tshul ston pa'o/ /oM tsi ta ma ni ho mahA mu dra traM/ /drag po bskal pas 'khrigs byas nas/ /mi mthun gnas kyi rgyud kun bsreg /kun spyod
259b7(rgyud 'grel): yon tan mthar phyin pa'i/ /gsung gsum rten bcas 'gro la ston/ /oM badzra maShA mahA ShuM mahA mu dra traM/ traM khams gsum kun gyi rgyal srid bdag /sna tshogs mchog gi nor ldan pas/ /'jam 'dum g.yul 'gyed la sogs pa'i/ /rnam
260a1(rgyud 'grel): mang sangs rgyas kyis 'dul ba/ /rnam pa sna tshogs 'jam 'dum las/ /rnam par rgyal ba'i rgyal mtshan can/ /rdo rje nyi ma'i rgyal po yi/ /bde mchog sgyu ma bstan du gsol/ /sems can sprin la byang chub sems/ /mchog
260a2(rgyud 'grel): sbyin sna tshogs char 'bebs pa/ /bdag gi re ba thams cad sgrub/ /myur ston a la la ho/ /mi zad gter gyi dbang bskur ba/ /khyad par bdag la bstan du gsol/ /hUM pa pa ta ta Ta Ta ta ta taM taM swA hA/ rdo rje thal mo mnyam sbyor
260a3(rgyud 'grel): la/ /mdzub mo mnyam par phyir bkug ste/ /mthe bo rdo rje g.yogs pa ni/ /rdo rje khu tshur rin chen mchog/ 'bebs pa thams cad yongs rdzogs pa'o/ /phyi nang gsang ba'i mchog tshogs bdag/ byin brlabs sngags dang phyag rgya 'bul/
260a4(rgyud 'grel): mnyam med mi g.yo la sogs pa'i/ /bstod pa'i phyag rgyas mnyes par bya/ /smon lam rgya chen btab byas nas/ /slar brjod thig le phra mo dang/ /dkyil 'khor de nyid gang rung gis/ /mtshan ma'i dkyil 'khor brtan par bya/ /'byor
260a5(rgyud 'grel): tshogs yon tan rgyas pa'i phyir/ /rin chen snod bzang legs spras par/ /dkyil 'khor pho brang thig gis dbye/ /bza' btung brda sbyor bdud rtsis bkang/ /rigs kyi bsgom bzlas 'phro 'dud bcas/ /glu gar dbyangs kyi sprul par bya
260a6(rgyud 'grel): gnyis med rol pas longs spyod cing/ /rten gyi dkyil 'khor bcad par bya/ /lha mnyes mgron tshims las grub byed/ /tshogs 'khor sbyin sreg lhag ma'i las/ /las rdzogs mchod bstod bskul byas shing/ /rang gi gnas su
260a7(rgyud 'grel): bsdus nas ni/ /mtshan ma kun dang yongs bral ba'i/ /mnyam nyid dbyings su gnas par bya/ /shin tu gdug cing drag pa la/ /zhi bas phan par mi 'gyur te/ /shes rab thabs kyi sbyor ba ni/ /rnam par rgyal phyir rab tu grag /sna tshogs
260b1(rgyud 'grel): las rnams brtsam pa'i phyir/ /rta mchog dkyil 'khor mchod bya ste/ /gro gar phyag rgya'i tshogs bcas pas/ /rang gi las gzhung rnam par 'phrul/ /de bzhin nyid nas brtsam bya ste/ /phreng bas brgyan pa'i bar du bsgom/ /nang gi dkyil
260b2(rgyud 'grel): 'khor dbyibs dag ni/ /sna tshogs pad+ma 'dab brgyad mdzes/ /'khor los mtshan pa mu khyud mchog /rim gnyis rgya gram pad+ma'i gdan/ /phyi rol ra ba dur khrod dang/ /kun 'byung 'khor yug gru bzhis mchad/ /mngon par byang chub
260b3(rgyud 'grel): rnam lnga yis/ /mgon po rgyu yi sems dpa' bskyed/ /sku mdog brgyan chas nas bzung ste/ /byin brlabs rdzogs pas dag par bya/ /rang 'od rig ma bskyed pas na/ /lha mos bskul ba'i mthar thug brtsams/ /thugs rjes 'gro rgyud
260b4(rgyud 'grel): gzigs mdzad de/ /haM yig rgya gram las byung ba'o/ /oM suM b+ha ni suM b+ha hUM/ rta mchog ljang ser zhal gsum pa/ /dbus steng rta mgo ljang sngon bcas/ /bgegs bcas drag tshul zhi mdangs khros/ /lag ngar brgyad pa dpa' bo'i
260b5(rgyud 'grel): mchog /g.yas pas ba dan gsum pa'i phyag /'degs pa'i tshul du mdzad pa dang/ /gnyis pa rdo rje rgya gram 'dzin/ /'og ma gnyis na ral gri mda'/ /g.yon gyis sna tshogs pad+ma dang/ /shak+ti rtse gcig be con gzhu/ /g.yas kyi
260b6(rgyud 'grel): smig pa dang po yis/ /dngos grub gsum dang dpal mo gnon/ /gnyis pa zhi la dga' ba mo/ /g.yon pas drag po khyab 'jug dang/ /gnyis pas tshangs pa 'dod pa'i lha/ /rin chen sna tshogs brgyan dang gos/ /khro 'dzum phyag rgya lnga
260b7(rgyud 'grel): yis spras/ /sku gsung thugs kyi rdo rje dang/ /ye shes sems dpa' sngags dang bcas/ /sangs rgyas kun gyis dbang bskur zhing/ /dbu la rigs kyi bdag pos brgyan/ /sangs rgyas rin chen padmo dang/ /de bzhin rdo rje rin chen dang/ /yid bzhin
261a1(rgyud 'grel): nor bu rin chen mchog /rta mchog rab tu 'grub par 'gyur/ /oM a b+hi Shiny+tsa haM/ rgya gram phreng ba'i phyag rgya dang/ /dar dpyangs dgyes pa'i thal mor bcas/ /rang 'od yum dang 'khril ba las/ /gsang gnas hUM dang
261a2(rgyud 'grel): as rgyan te/ /rgya gram 'bar dang phaT dang bcas/ /rnam par thar pa e dkyil can/ /sa ma ya sogs brdas bskul nas/ /dza(rgyud 'grel): hUM baM ho(rgyud 'grel): sa rol ba bya/ /ling ga 'greng ba rang 'byung pa/ /brla yi dbus su gzhug bya ste/ /ling ga sna
261a3(rgyud 'grel): tshogs rdo rje ste/ /rta yi rgyal por bdag sngon bskyed/ /gsang gnas so so'i gdan dag la/ /chos kyi snying pos lha rnams bskyed/ /haM gi rta mchog rgyal po ste/ /gsang gnas dbus kyi gdan la'o/ /dzI las sna tshogs padmi rgya/ /ha
261a4(rgyud 'grel): las sna tshogs rdo rje ma/ /khyad par rta yi lha mo ste/ /g.yas g.yon phyogs kyi pad+ma la'o/ /'khor gzhan rigs rnams gang rung gi /lha mo nyi shu gong ma bzhin/ /b+ha gar ling ga bcug nas ni/ /der ni hUM yig bsgom par bya/ /rta
261a5(rgyud 'grel): mchog rol? pa'i gzugs dag ni/ /sku gnyis ldan pas spro ba'o/ /oM suM b+ha ni suM b+ha hUM dzdza/ phyogs bcur don byas 'dus pa dag /gtso bo yab yum la gzhug bya/ /sna tshogs pad+ma ljang ser 'gro /mtshan mthun phyag rgya g.yas
261a6(rgyud 'grel): kyi phyogs/ /oM b+hi sha badzra d+ha bo dzdza/ sna tshogs rdo rje ljang sngon 'phro/ /mtshan mthun phyag 'dzin g.yon gyi phyogs/ /oM b+hi sha badzra satwa dzdza/ 'khor gzhan lha mo tshogs bcas la/ /sna tshogs rdo rje brgya phreng mdzes/ /byin brlabs dbang
261a7(rgyud 'grel): bskur rdzogs byas pas/ /dam tshig dkyil 'khor gsal bar snang/ /sbyor pas rang rigs dkyil 'khor bskul/ /sna tshogs tshul gyis mdun du bzhugs/ /dpal ldan rdo rje 'gying pa'i thabs/ /'dzum pa'i mig gis phyag bya'o/ /
261b1(rgyud 'grel): oM a ti? hA? haM/ gang dam 'on te stong yang rung/ /yang na ci 'byor pa yis kyang/ /dam tshig mnyam par bsgrubs pa yis/ /mchod pa thams cad 'grub par 'gyur/ /tshad med bzhi yi sbyor ba yis/ /lha rnams gnyis su med par bya/ /hUM
261b2(rgyud 'grel): rnal 'byor de nyid bcom ldan 'das/ /rdo rje sems dpa' de bzhin gshegs/ /drag shul sbyor bas rnam spyod pa/ /rta mchog phyag rgyas rab tu gnas/ /thams cad padmo mos pa yis/ /sdig med stobs kyi ngo 'thon du/ /rab tu gnon pa'i
261b3(rgyud 'grel): rtsal dag gis/ /'jig rten thams cad rab tu 'joms/ /'dod chags can la g.yem par ston/ /gdug pa rnams las gdug par 'gyur/ /zhi ba rnams la zhi ba'i mchog /drag shul can la drag shul sbyor/ /zhal bzhi pa la phyag
261b4(rgyud 'grel): bzhi pa/ /zhabs bzhi pa la rmig pa bzhi/ /rta mgrin rgyal po chen po ste/ /dbang phyug dam pa 'grub par 'gyur/ /g.yon pa'i khu tshur mdzub mo yis/ /dpal ldan pad+ma sna tshogs 'dzin/ /rdo rjer bcas shing slong pa 'grub/ /g.yas pas
261b5(rgyud 'grel): ba dan gsum pas byas/ /g.yas dang g.yon pa'i sbyor ba yis/ /brkyang bskum pa yis tshul byas nas/ /khro bo'i skyil mo krung bcas te/ /'jig rten thams cad rab tu bshig /haM mos byed stong pas lhag pa yis/ /bde bar 'dod
261b6(rgyud 'grel): pa'i gzugs ston pa/ /'dul pa'i dbang gis gshin rje'i tshogs/ /stong pas lhag par rab tu 'jigs/ /zhi ba'i srung yang tshangs pa'i tshogs/ /stong pas shin tu lhag par ston/ /dkyil 'khor kun gyi mchog dag tu/ /de bzhin gshegs kun grub
261b7(rgyud 'grel): par mdzod/ /thams cad dag par mos pa yis/ /ngo 'thon stobs kyis non pas gnon/ /e hi i hi dbang phyug tshogs/ /thams cad rab shig rab tu shig /rab kyi rtsal gyis non pa yis/ /stobs kyi ngo 'thon dbang phyug gnon/ /sbyor chen hu lu hu
262a1(rgyud 'grel): lu yi/ /mig gsum pa las gsum grub drongs/ /rab kyi rtsal gyis mngon gnon pa'i/ /stobs kyis ngo 'thon mthu chen gnon/ /mnyam sbyor? ru ta ma snying las/ /dpal mo drongs shig rab drongs shig /rab kyi rtsal gyis gnon
262a2(rgyud 'grel): pa yis/ /stobs kyi ngo 'thon tshangs pa gnon/ /sbyor chen tshangs pa'i rgyu ma las/ /sgrol ma drongs shig smra rat/ /rang kyi rtsal gyis non pa yi/ /stobs kyis ngo 'thon dga' dbang gnon/ /mnyam sbyor kun gyis bdag las dga' / /drongs shig
262a3(rgyud 'grel): a la la ho/ /gdug cing khro la rab gtum pa'i/ /sems can bsgral ba'i phyir sgrub zhugs/ /a la la ho a la la ho/ oM suM b+ha ni suM b+ha hUM phaT/ mahA mu tra haM/ mdza' bo mi la bya ba'ang min/ /yongs rtog de dag med kyang blang/ /de 'dra mdza' 
262a4(rgyud 'grel): bo sgyu bzhin pas/ /de la mdza' zhes su zhig zer/ /rgol ba mi la bya ba min/ /yongs su rtog pa med kyang blang/ /de 'dra'i rgol ba sgrub bzhin pas/ /de la su zhig dpa' zhes zer/ /oM sh+rI pad+ma pa Da ba mu kha yo gi shwa ri hi hi hi hi haM/ /rdo rje thal mo mnyam
262a5(rgyud 'grel): sbyar nas/ /mthe'u chung srin lag mnyam pa brkyang/ /mdzub mo rtse bsnyams bkug pa ni/ /dpal mchog rta zhes grags pa yin/ /rdo rje khu tshur dpal bcings la/ /sor mo thams cad yongs su bzung/ /de ltar phyag rgya gong ma dang/ /rang rang las
262a6(rgyud 'grel): la sbyar bar bya/ /phyi nang gsang ba'i mchod tshogs dag /byin brlabs sngags dang phyag rgya dbul/ /mnyam med mi g.yo la sogs pa'i/ /bstod pa'i phyag rgyas mnyes par bya/ /smon lam rgya che gdab byas nas/ /bzlas brjod thig le phra mo dang/
262a7(rgyud 'grel): dkyil 'khor de nyid gang rung gis/ /mtshan ma'i dkyil 'khor bstan par bya/ /glu gar bro sngags phyag rgya'i tshogs/ /phrin las rnam bzhi'i bzhin lta 'dzum/ /las kyi bskul tshig dang bcas pa'i/ /sna tshogs stang stabs 'phro 'du'i gar/ /lha
262b1(rgyud 'grel): gnyis mgron tshim pas grub byed/ /chags dang sbyin sreg lhag ma'i las/ /las rdzogs mchod bstod bskul byas shing/ /rang gi gnas su bsdus nas ni/ /mtshan ma kun dang yongs bral ba'i/ /mnyam nyid dbyings su gnas par bya/ /thams cad dag
262b2(rgyud 'grel): bar mos pa yis/ /sdig med stobs kyis ngo mthon du/ /drag shul sbyor bas mnyam sbyar bas/ /'jig rten thams cad gzhom par byed/ /phyag rgya sgrub pa'i dus su ni/ /snga ma las ni gnas sgyur te/ /bskal pa med dpung 'khrigs pa bzhin/ /'bar
262b3(rgyud 'grel): ba'i tshogs ni rnam par bsam/ /gzhi dang rten pa'i ting 'dzin nyid/ /sbyor ba bzhi yis gsal byas te/ /dam tshig 'phro 'du'i yan lag dag /mngon sum snang ba ltar gnas nas/ /ye shes dkyil 'khor la dmigs shing/ /mdun nas gnyis
262b4(rgyud 'grel): med dkyil 'khor gyi/ /cho ga rdzogs par spyad byas pas/ /ye shes dkyil 'khor bsgrub par bya/ /'khor bcas mchod pa rdzogs nas ni/ /bsnyen pa'i lung bzhin brtson pas 'bad/ /bsnyen par gnas pa'i dbang thob nas/ /bsgom dbyangs yi
262b5(rgyud 'grel): ge 'bru brgyad bstan/ /'phro 'du'i yan lag kun ldan bas/ /dbyangs drug blangs pas don drug gsal/ /sngags mchog yi ge'i 'bru brjod pas/ /des ni drag po'i dkyil 'khor bskyed/ /dge mchog dngos grub kun bsdus te/ /gnas
262b6(rgyud 'grel): gsum bskor zhing gsang mchog sgrub/ /khyad par gsang sngags rim pa bzhin/ /'phro 'du mchod bstod bskul tshig ldan/ /mdza' phyin gsang sngags rgyal po yis/ /las kyi sbyor ba kun brtsam bya/ /mnyes shing mgron tshim las grub byed//
262b7(rgyud 'grel): tshogs dang sbyin sreg lhag pa'i las/ /las rdzogs mchod bstod bskul byas shing/ /rang gi gnas su bsdus nas ni/ /mtshan ma kun dang yongs bral ba'i/ /mnyam nyid dbyings su gnas par bya/ /thams cad nam mkha' i mtshan nyid
263a1(rgyud 'grel): nam mkha' la yang mtshan nyid med/ /khams gsum dag ni ma lus pa/ /thams cad sgyu ma lta bu ste/ /ji ltar sgyu ma thams cad du/ /mthong ba dang ni reg par 'gyur/ /dmigs su yod pa ma yin te/ /de bzhin 'gro ba kun gyi tshul//
263a2(rgyud 'grel): dbugs dbyung dkyil 'khor rnam dag drug /sbyor ba bzhi dang ldan par bya/ /sbyor dang rjes su sbyor ba dang/ /shin tu sbyor dang sbyor chen po/ /ye shes tsam la snyoms 'jug pa/ /sbyor ba zhes ni bshad pa yin/ /yum ldan byin brlabs rol pas
263a3(rgyud 'grel): mchod/ /gzhug pa rjes su sbyor ba'o/ /dag mdzad dkyil 'khor rdzogs byas nas/ /'phro 'du shin tu sbyor ba yin/ /byin brlabs dbang bskur las rdzogs pa/ /sbyor ba chen po zhes bya'o/ /sgrub chen dngos grub tshul bzhin du/ /mtshan brtags
263a4(rgyud 'grel): gsal pa'i gnas shes pas/ /bdag gzhan don tshogs las sbyar te/ /de dogs mdza' kun bral bas blang/ /de bzhin nyid nas brtsam bya ste/ /phreng bas brgyan pa'i bar du bsgom/ /nang gi dkyil 'khor dbyibs dag ni/ /thig bzhis rnam par
263a5(rgyud 'grel): phye ba la/ /so so'i pho brang ji lta bar/ /rigs bsdus dkyil 'khor rgyas pa'i tshul/ /dbus su rigs bdag 'khor lo ste/ /shar du de bzhin gshegs pa'i rigs/ /lho phyogs rdo rje drag po'i tshogs/ /nub tu padmo rnam dag chos/ /byang phyogs
263a6(rgyud 'grel): yon tan rin chen mdzod/ /shar mtshams bzhi dkyil sdud pa'i tshul/ /lho mtshams drag po sreg byed ltar/ /nub mtshams dbang mdzad g.yo ba'i bzhin/ /byang mtshams rgyas pa dbang chen ltar/ /rang rang phreng bas mdzes par bya/ /pho brang
263a7(rgyud 'grel): kha dog rin chen bzhi/ /sna tshogs pad+ma gdan gyis mtshan/ /phyi rol ra ba dur khrod dang/ /kun 'byung khor yug tu bzhis mtshan/ /mngon par byang chub rnam lnga yis/ /mgon po rgyu yis sems dpa' bskyed/ /sku mdog rgyan cha
263b1(rgyud 'grel): nas bzung ste/ /byin brlab rdzogs pas dag par bya/ /rang 'od rig ma bskyed pa nas/ /lha mo bskul ba'i mthar thug par/ /thugs rjes 'gro rgyud la gzigs nas/ /'od kyi gong bu las 'phro ba'i/ /thig le rin chen sna lnga'i mdangs/ /phyogs
263b2(rgyud 'grel): mtshams dbus kyi lte ba ni/ /yi ge'i 'phro 'dus mtshan ma ste/ /sngags kyi phyag rgya chen po'i sku/ /sku mdog phyag mtshan rgyan chas dang/ /cha lugs so so'i dkyil 'khor bzhin/ /sku gsung thugs kyi rdo rje dang/ /ye shes sems dpa' sngags
263b3(rgyud 'grel): dang bcas/ /sangs rgyas kun gyis dbang bskur zhing/ /dbus la rigs kyi bdag pos mtshan/ /so so'i dbang bskur phyag rgya dang/ /rang gi gsang sngags bcas pa'o/ /rin chen myu gu la sogs dang/ /dar dpyangs dges pa'i thal mor bcas//
263b4(rgyud 'grel): so so'i yum dang 'khril ba las/ /gsang gnas byin brlabs bcas bskul te/ /snyoms 'jug chos kyi snying po las/ /rigs dgu'i dkyil 'khor gsal bas bsgom/ /phyi nang sngags kyis spro mdzad nas/ /rang rigs dkyil 'khor gnas la
263b5(rgyud 'grel): 'khor/ /byin brlabs dbang bskur rdzogs byas pas/ /dam tshig dkyil 'khor gsal bar 'gyur/ /ye shes dkyil 'khor rgyas dmigs pas/ /mdun gyi dkyil 'khor mnyes par bya/ /gnyis med dkyil 'khor rgyas btab nas/ /cho ga lhag
263b6(rgyud 'grel): mas mnyes par bya/ /rnam shes ye shes bye brag gis/ /dkyil 'khor drug gi rim pa bzhin/ /yi ge gcig pa'i sngags bzlas shing/ /las bzhi'i bskul sngags gsang ba la/ /mdza' brgyan gyur pas gsol gdab cing/ /bar skabs
263b7(rgyud 'grel): mchod bstod 'phro 'du dang/ /glu dbyangs gar gyis bskul bar bya/ /rnam shes ye shes bye brag gis/ /mtshan ma gang rung gsang bar brtag /rdo rjes mi mthun 'joms byed cing/ /'khor los khams gsum gtso bor 'gyur/ /mda' yis phra bar
264a1(rgyud 'grel): 'bigs byed cing/ /ral gris lha min grong khyer 'joms/ /pad+mas lha mo la sogs 'gugs/ /rtse gsum lha dbang dul 'gyur zhing/ /bum pas bkra shis bdud rtsi 'grub/ /rgya gram sa 'og gser 'gyur rtsi/ /nyi mas
264a2(rgyud 'grel): gser mdog 'od dang ldan/ /lcags kyus srid pa'i rtse mor 'gro/ /nor bus grong khyer rgyas par byed/ /me long mngon par shes pa 'grub/ /pi paM sna tshogs gsung sgrogs shing/ /gling bus chos kyi tshig brjod pa'o/ /gzhan yang gzugs
264a3(rgyud 'grel): sogs mang bshad pa'i/ /yul drug snang ba'i mtshan ma kun/ /ting 'dzin sngags dang las sbyar zhing/ /bcom ldan bar chad med pas gzung/ /g.yas g.yon nyi zla'i dkyil 'khor la/ /yab yum sa bon bcu gnyis bsgom/ /zung ngu
264a4(rgyud 'grel): spros shing 'dus pa las/ /rigs kyi lha tshogs snyoms 'jug pa'o/ /sor mo phan tshun sbyor rjes bsnol/ /gnyis med rdo rje thal mo'i rgya/ /de rjes rdo rje bsdams pa las/ /g.yon mdzub rtse mo'i nang ngag tu/ /g.yas pa'i mthe bo'i
264a5(rgyud 'grel): mtshan ma gzhug /legs bsdams bskyod pa dga' chen dpal/ /'di ni sangs rgyas thams cad kyi/ /thun mong sngon 'gro'i yan lag yin/ /dga' chen dpal gyi rdo rje las/ /gung mo bcings pa'i nang du gzhug /mthe bong mthe'u chung rtse
264a6(rgyud 'grel): mo can/ /rdo rje'i phyag rgya yongs su sgyur/ /de las gung mo lcags kyu ni/ /snying gar sbyor ba dgug pa'i mchog /rdo rje bsdams pa byas nas ni/ /gung mo bcing ba'i mang du gzhug /mthe'u chung mthe bo'i rtse mo can/ /rdo rje'i phyag rgya yongs su
264a7(rgyud 'grel): sgyur/ /de las gung mo lcags kyu ni/ /rdo rje 'khor lo snang mdzad rgya/ /rdo rje'i rgya bcings sbyor ldan pas/ /thal mo khong stong khebs pa yi/ /rdo rje'i phyag rgya bcings pa las/ /gung mo de bzhin bkug nas ni/ /rdo rje rdo rje zhes brjod de/ /gung mo nam
264b1(rgyud 'grel): mkha' rdo rje mchog /rdo rje bsdams pa la gnas te/ /rdo rje'i rtse mo de bzhin bsdams/ /mdzub mo gnyis kyi rtse mo dgug /rdo rje phyag rgya dag byed pa'o/ /rdo rje padmor byas pa las/ /gung mo bcing pa'i dbus na gnas/ /mthe'u chung mnyam pa'i rtse mo mde'u/ /rdo rje
264b2(rgyud 'grel): mda' ni yongs su 'phang/ /rdo rje'i phyag rgya yongs bcings na/ /gung mo bcings pa phyi rol bzhag /rdo rje sna tshogs dpal gyi rgya/ /ldang ba thams cad rab sgrub pa'o/ /lta bas mi ngoms pa yi sku/ /thams cad bdag nyid ston par mdzad/ /legs so zhes pa grub
264b3(rgyud 'grel): pa ni/ /dam pa dag kyang rab tu stsol/ /bsam pa thams cad ma rdzogs pa'i/ /grub pa kun mchog nyams dga' ba/ /ji ltar 'dod pa'i longs spyod dag /thams cad kyi ni bdag nyid stsol/ /dbang phyug bde ba la sogs drug /sku dang ye shes gsal ba
264b4(rgyud 'grel): 'grub/ /phan gnod byed pa rnam gnyis pa'i/ /gzugs dang sgra dang dri dag gi /mtshan ma rnam gsum snang ba na/ /bye brag tu ni shes par bya/ /gal te dngos grub mi gsal na/ /zhe rgyas dbang dang mngon spyod dang/ /mnan dang zlog gis las brtsam
264b5(rgyud 'grel): zhing/ /spobs pa'i tshogs sbyar bar bya/ /lha mnyes mgron tshim las sgrub byed/ /tshogs 'khor sbyin sreg lhag ma'i las/ /las rdzogs rigs kyi sku brtan pas/ /dngos grub legs sbyor 'gyur med brtan/ /mchog tu gyur pa'i phyag rgya bzhes
264b6(rgyud 'grel): las spangs 'bras bu mdzad bcas 'grub/ /bsod nams ye shes tshogs chen po'i/ /cho gas las kun 'grub byed cing/ /rigs 'dzin go 'phang rdzogs ? pas/ /'khor lo 'khor lo che gnas sbyor/ /rang gi lha yi sbyor ldan pas/ /rdzas rnams
264b7(rgyud 'grel): spyang zhing byin gyis brlab/ /gru bzhi pa la sgo bzhi pa/ /rta babs bzhi yis mdzes par byas/ /rang gi lha dang 'dra ba yis/ /bud med rnams ni legs bsgrubs pa/ /rdo rje rin chen pad+ma sogs/ /sgo bsrungs dang ni ldan par bya/ /sangs rgyas 
265a1(rgyud 'grel): thams cad mnyam sbyor ba/ /sbyor ba'i dbang phyug rnam 'phrul pas/ /rdo rje sems dpa' dpal gyi lha/ /de na rnam par 'phrul pa mdzad/ /dkyil 'khor so so'i ting 'dzin gyis/ /sbyor ba snga ma bzhin du gsal/ /bskal
265a2(rgyud 'grel): bzang rang gi phyag rgyas mtshan/ /tshogs kyi dkyil 'khor brtag par bya/ /ye shes dkyil 'khor la dmigs shing/ /mdun gyi dkyil 'khor sprul byas la/ /tshad med phyag rgya bzhis bstims nas/ /gsang ba'i phyag rgya bzhi
265a3(rgyud 'grel): rgyas gdab/ /lha mo kun gyi bde ba'i mchog /mdzes pa'i zhal ni rnam gyur pa/ /bde bar myong ba rab sbyar ba/ /mdzes par blta zhing gar byed pa'o/ /bud med mkhas pa rgya ma che/ /mdzes pa'i bzhin ni rnam par 'gyur/ /rim mor bcas
265a4(rgyud 'grel): shing btag pa'i mchog /mdzes pas lta ba'i gar byed pa'o/ /sangs rgyas byang chub mnyam sbyor dang/ /rab tu dga' bas lta zhing 'dzum/ /shin tu srid pa yang dag bsgrub/ /gsang bar blta ba gnas pa'i rgya/ /gteg la sogs pa'i
265a5(rgyud 'grel): nyams dang ldan/ /mdzes pa'i bzhin ni rnam 'gyur zhing/ /rim 'gror bcas pa bteg pa'i mchog /bteg pa'i lta bas gar byed pa'o/ /mche ba cung zad gtsigs pa'i zhal/ /khro zhing 'dzum dang bcas pa'i bzhin/ /khro las gyur par
265a6(rgyud 'grel): bcas zhing 'dzum/ /gsal bar lta zhing legs par gnas/ /'dod chags mos pas g.yen spro ba/ /mdzes pa'i bzhin ni rnam par 'gyur/ /drag po mche ba nyon po gtsig /gdug pa za ba 'jigs 'jigs lta/ /dngos po kun gyi
265a7(rgyud 'grel): bde ba mchog /rab tu dga' bar lta zhing 'dzum/ /spyi bor rta mgrin 'phang 'tho ba/ /mche gtsigs ljang ser kha dog gsal/ /lha mo kun gyi bde ba mchog /mdzes pa'i ma mchu sos mnan cing/ /'dod chags bde bas dben spyod pa//
265b1(rgyud 'grel): bteg pa'i ma mchu sos mnan pa'o/ /sbyor ba kun gyi bde ba mchog /mdzes pa'i ma mchus g.yog par byed/ /sha chen gyi ni ro myang zhing/ /mdzes pa'i ma mchu sos mnan cing/ /bde ba kun gyi ro myang zhing/ /ma mchu rnam par mdzes par bya'o/ /bde
265b2(rgyud 'grel): ba myong ba rab sbyor bas/ /zam zim lta ba'i rnam 'gyur bcas/ /bud med mkhas pa sgyu ma mchog /mdzes par lta ba'i gar byed pa'o/ /sangs rgyas gsang ba'i mnyam sbyor ba/ /lta ba rab zhi bde bar gnas/ /smin mtshams khro gnyer 'gyur bar bcas
265b3(rgyud 'grel): lta ba rab 'bar rnam par 'gyur/ /steg pa la sogs ro dang ldan/ /sgeg bcas lta ba'i gar byed pa/ /khro zhing 'gyur ba bcas par 'dzum/ /lta ba gsal bar bde bar gnas/ /rigs kyi dkyil 'khor so so'i rgya/ /phyag rgya glu dang bcas pa dag /hUM las
265b4(rgyud 'grel): sogs pas sna drangs te/ /mchod tshogs kun la sbyar bar bya/ /de nas tshogs kyi zhal zas rnams/ /lha tshogs rnal 'byor rnams la 'bul/ /rdo rje bla ma chen po dang/ /bdag dang gzhan yang 'dod dgus mchod/ /lha mo mtshan ldan sgyu rtsal can//
265b5(rgyud 'grel): las mkhan grogs dang bcas pa yis/ /pad+ma mtshan mo dpa' bos bkang/ /bdud rtsi rdzas mchog byin brlabs pas/ /bkra shis dbyangs dang gar tshogs kyis/ /thams cad rnam rtog med par mchod/ /ston mo'i yan lag gzhan dag kyang/ /rim pa
265b6(rgyud 'grel): bzhin du drang bar bya/ /oM thams cad rnam dag bdud rtsi'i rang bzhin te/ /sku lnga chos lnga gnyis med ngo bo gcig /ngo phyir dag las dag pa nyid mchod de/ /chos nyid la thim ye shes rnam par rol/ /a la la ho/ /rnal 'byor dkyil 'khor kun
265b7(rgyud 'grel): gyis kyang/ /gar dang dbyangs su bcas pa yis/ /a he su rka zhes brjod cing/ /dga' mgu'i tshul gyis blang bar bya/ /rigs kyi dkyil 'khor gsal byas nas/ /lce la so so'i mtshan ma dang/ /chos kyi snying po bsam bya ste/ /rang gi lus la gnas
266a1(rgyud 'grel): par sbyor/ /dus gsum rab zhi mchog rnams kyis/ /hUM la sogs pa gla blang zhing/ /lha mo'i ka ka sha ta sogs/ /glu rnams rjes su blang bar bya/ /hUM rab tu dga' ba'i rjes su chags pa yi/ /mda' gzhu rab tu phra ba'i rgyas bcas
266a2(rgyud 'grel): pa'i/ /rab tu dga' ba'i sbyor ba'i bde ba myos/ /bde ba thams cad bdag la grub par mdzod/ /rab tu bde mchog rnam pa sna tshogs rnams/ /rgyal ba'i rgyal mtshan bsgreng ba'i longs spyod dang/ /rab tu dga' ba'i dbang phyug bde mchog
266a3(rgyud 'grel): grub/ /de bzhin gshegs pa rab tu bzhugs ho rta mchog /rab tu sna tshogs bde mchog rol gcig ho/ /bde bas slong ba rnam rol snang bar mdzod/ /ho de bzhin gshegs pa kun gyi mkha' 'gro yis/ /sgyu ma'i tshogs kyis slob
266a4(rgyud 'grel): ma bzung tu gsol/ /oM gyi glu yi phyag rgya ni/ /tshangs pa'i dbyangs kyis ci bder blang/ /oM rdo rje sems dpa' bsdus pa nas/ /rdo rje rin chen bla na med/ /rdo rje chos ni gsung ba dang/ /rdo rje las rnams byed par 'gyur/ /rdo rje drag po gang
266a5(rgyud 'grel): mo che/ /'khur ba'i dbugs kyi rlung 'byin cing/ /'brug gi sgra ltar zab pa yi/ /ru lu ru lu'i sgra phyung nas/ /hUM rdo rje las kyi mda' gzhu phyag 'tshal lo/ /dpal rdo rje chags pa'i dam tshig la phyag 'tshal lo/ /rdo rje kha TwAM ga rab tu 'dzin pa la phyag
266a6(rgyud 'grel): 'tshal lo/ /dpal rdo rje dril bu rab tu 'khrol ba la phyag 'tshal lo/ /te zhes bya ba glu yi rgya/ /thams cad dag par rab sgrub pa'o/ /te lar rab tu drag cing gzhan drag la/ /drag po'i bud med sku ltar rab tu snang/ /'gro ba mdza' yas 'dul
266a7(rgyud 'grel): phyir la la ni/ /rab rno'i 'khor lo phyag na bsnams pa'i sku/ /la lar rab tu nges shing zhi ba yis/ /mi 'gyur sbyin pa'i tshangs pa'i skur ston mdzad/ /la lar rab 'bar chags pa padmo yi/ /rgyal po'i dam tshig bdag la grub par mdzod/ /hi
266b1(rgyud 'grel): zhes bya ba glu yi rgya/ /khams gsum rnam par rgyal bar byed/ /hi thams cad dbang phyug dam pa mi zad pa'i/ /gter mchog bdag la grub par mdzad du gsol/ /kun mchog rgyal mtshan rgyal ba bsgreng rdo rje/ /rin chen shin tu che ba bdag la
266b2(rgyud 'grel): mdzod/ /ka ka la lags dang gtso rgya'i dbyangs/ /de bzhin rab tu mdangs snyan dang/ /ka ha la yi glu yi rgya/ /'joms pa thams cad rab sgrub pa'o/ /hi lar mkhas pa'i gzugs kyang 'dzin/ /la las dus mdza' i dus ltar drag /la lar rgyal dbang
266b3(rgyud 'grel): bzhin du zhi/ /la lar rta mchog sbyor bas 'grub/ /de dag sku yi glu yi mchog /phyag rgya sngags kyis sbyor bcas pa'o/ /tshogs sgrub chen po'i dus su ni/ /phyag rgya yi ni yang dag dang/ /brda dang sbyor ba sna tshogs kyis/ /'khor lo rim bzhin
266b4(rgyud 'grel): bskor byas te/ /dpa' bo btung bas tshim 'gyur nas/ /bgegs bskrad sbyang zhing byin gyis brlab/ /de yi dam tshig de 'byung ba'i/ /sdug pa dam tshig bdag rjes 'brang/ /shin tu sbyor dbang sbyor chen po/ /thams cad bdag nyid dam tshig
266b5(rgyud 'grel): mchog /gcig bzhin du ni gcig spyod pa/ /lhan cig sbyong pa rjes sbyong sdug /lha mo kun gyi longs spyod la/ /ci bde bar ni bsten par bya/ /de nas khrus byas dri zhim lus/ /ci 'byor ba yi gos rang rgyan/ /sna tshogs rnam par bgos nas ni/
266b6(rgyud 'grel): me tog phreng ldan kha dri zhim/ /sna tshogs kun gyi bskal bzang pos/ /slong pas ngal gyis ngal gyis su/ /gos bgab pa yi sbyor ba yis/ /bdag gi dbyung ba bskur bar bya/ /rdzogs par sangs rgyas nyi zla rnams/ /shar ba dang/ gis mthong
266b7(rgyud 'grel): ba yis/ /nges pa'i lam dang kun ldan pa/ /rnam par 'das pas rnam par brgyan/ /dbang bskur kun las byung ba yis/ /mchod pa'i sprin? chen rnam bkod pa/ /rab 'byams tshogs rnams thams cad kyis/ /kun gyi bdag nyid mchod
267a1(rgyud 'grel): par byed/ /bdud rtsi rnam pa lnga po dang/ /so so'i phrang dang sbyar byas nas/ /tshogs kyis dbus su bzhag pa ni/ /ra sa ya na kun slong ba'o/ /rigs kyi dkyil 'khor 'phro 'du sngags/ /dngos grub bskul tshig dbyangs kun blang/ /
267a2(rgyud 'grel): oM A hUM hUM oM h+ri h+ri traM haM/ he pany+tsa A mri ta ra sa ya na sid+d+hi/ sarbArtha sid+d+hi/ hUM oM hi tri traM haM/ h+ri thar/ oM ba hu ba wi ta/ dzi baM san+ta ti/ e she sha ne she sha /sa d+ha bi na ya/ sarba ta thA ga tA dza le pra dza le/ kurba ba bi kurba/ sarba shaM pa re hUM/
267a3(rgyud 'grel): biShu bi sha hUM/ oM ba hu ba wi ta/ ra ga san+ta ni/ a she sha she sha/ sarba bi na ya/ sarba ta thA ga ta/ dza le pra dza le/ kurba bi kurba/ sarba sham+ba re/ hUM hUM hUM/ oM ba hu ba wi ta/ re'u ha san+ta ni/ e she sha ni she sha /sarba pi na ya/ sarba ta thA ga ta/ tsa
267a4(rgyud 'grel): le pra tsa le/ kurba bi kurba/ sarba sham+ba re/ ru lu ru lu hUM b+hyo hUM/ shaM ti nga ku ru ba shang ku ru/ puSh+TiM ku ru/ mar ya/ paM(rgyud 'grel): hUM swA hA/ phaT/ mchog gi bdud rtsi don sbyang ba'i/ /gsang sngags yi ge bcu gcig pas/ /bdud rtsi lnga bar bcud len

267a7(rgyud 'grel): blang bar bya/ /de dus 'gro don rgya che dang/ /dbang bskur las kun brtsam bya zhing/ /bdag don 'gro ba'i gnas sbyor te/ /dam tshig sdom pa bzung bar bya/ /gling bu dang ni rgyud gcig dang/ /de bzhin rgyud mang sa rgyud sdug /sil snyan phyag
