267b2(rgyud 'grel): he/ g+he ta g+he/ he na don/ Ta ki hUM dza/ g+he ta g+he don/ Ta ki hUM/ tran a la la ho/ /ru Ta ma Ta/ thal mo brdab pa brtag pa'o/ /ta g+he g+he/ ta g+he g+he/ ta g+he na/ ta g+he na/ ta g+he na/ g+he ta/ g+hen g+hen g+hen/ rgyun gyi rnga'o/ /AM AM AM(rgyud 'grel): haM haM haM/ baM baM b+haM/ d+haM d+haM d+haM
267b3(rgyud 'grel): dam tshig gsum gyi rnga'o/ /d+he koM koM koM/ d+he badzra badzra nar ne/ koM koM koM koM/ hUM b+hyo hUM b+hyo hUM b+hyo hUM b+hyo hUM b+hyo hUM b+hyo/ ru lu ru lu hUM b+hyo/ d+heM koM koM/ kOM kOM kOM kOM/ d+he kOM kOM kOM/ dpal he ru ka'i rnga'o/ /pad+ma pad+ma h+riM/ pad+ma pad+ma h+riM/ pad+ma pad+ma h+riM/ dpal padmo'i thal mo brdab
267b4(rgyud 'grel): pa'i rnga'o/ /traM traM traM/ ba bdun/ Ta bdun/ tran bzhi/ tran tra te/ Ta tud te/ rud tad te/ rgyal po'i rnga'o/ /Ta ki hUM dza/ Ta ki hUM dza/ snyems pa'i 'gros so/ /tra bdun/ myur zhi rab tu myur ba'o/ /Tata ba(rgyud 'grel): Tata ba/ hUM Ta ta ba/ Ta ta ba hUM/ dpa' rta mchog
267b5(rgyud 'grel): rnam par rol ba'o/ /Ta Ta ba gsum/ Ta Ta ba gsum/ Ta ta shin tu myur ba'i rnga'i phyag rgya'o/ /lha rnams mnyes par bya ba dang/ /las rnams 'grub par bya ba'i phyir/ /thog ma bar skabs mdza' rnams su/ /sbyin sreg drug gi las brtsam bya/ /dkyil
267b6(rgyud 'grel): 'khor chen po'i shar phyogs su/ /las kun ba dang rgyas pa brtsam/ /byang du zhi ba lhor mngon spyod/ /nub du dbang dang dgug pa'i las/ /thabs khung kun gyi nang rgya ru/ /khru gang zabs su phyed brgos shing/ /kha khyer rim gsum dgying byas pa/ /rim
267b7(rgyud 'grel): bzhin sor ni/ bzhi bzhir gnas/ /zhi la zlum po rgyas gru bzhi/ /dbang la zla gam gru gsum drag /dkar ser dmar nag rim bzhin mdog /las kun dbyibs dang mdog kun ldan/ /dgug pa lcags kyu mtshon cha'i tshogs/ /rang gi rig mthun
268a1(rgyud 'grel): kha dog can/ /'khor lo rin chen pad+ma dang/ /rdo rjes mtshan cing phreng bas brgyan/ /so so'i rigs dang mthun pa yi/ /bu shing rang gi dbyibs su rtsig /sor bzhi brgyad dang bcu drug gnyis/ /yam shing me tog dri yis brgyan/ /rtse mo'i cha
268a2(rgyud 'grel): las rtse mo ste/ /so so'i mar gyis byug pa'o/ /thabs kyi phyi rol 'khor ngag tu/ /ku sha rgyan dang mtshon cha dang/ /me long rnga ma yol bar bcas/ /mtshon cha sna lnga'i thag pas skor/ /g.yas su rdo rje bril bu dang/ /yam shing til dang rlung yab bzhag /
268a3(rgyud 'grel): g.yon du dri chu me tog gis/ /durba ku sha'i chun po bzhag /mdun du mchod pa rnam lnga dang/ /mchod rdzas gzhan yang bzhag par bya/ /mchod yon yan lag brgyad ldan pa/ /dri sna me tog dkar po dang/ /zho dang durbas bkang ba dang/ /
268a4(rgyud 'grel): 'bras kar yungs kar mar dang zho/ /mchod rdzas kun gyis snar tshig dgod/ /bgegs gsal bsrung sbyangs byin gyis brlab/ /rdo rje sems dpa' i ting 'dzin gyis/ /rigs kyi dkyil 'khor gsal byas nas/ /chas gos lnga po dbu rgyan
268a5(rgyud 'grel): phreng ba phyag rgya lnga sogs rgyan gyis mtshan/ /mdun du dpal mchog las gyur ba'i/ /raM skyes las dang rjes mthun pa'i/ /dkar ser dmar gnag go rims bzhin/ /zhi sogs las mdzad me lha bskyed/ /mig gsum gdong bzhi rim pa
268a6(rgyud 'grel): can/ /gsum po che la phyag bzhi pa/ /mi 'jigs rgya phreng spyi blugs dang/ /dbyug pa sras bu'i phreng ba thogs/ /snying ga sum mdo yum dang 'khril/ /pad+ma'i gdan la rnam par gnas/ /dbang bskur byin brlabs dbu rgyan bcas/ /me ri 'bar bas
268a7(rgyud 'grel): mtshan pa'o/ /dam tshig sems dpa' i gzugs 'dra ba'i/ /ye shes 'phrul pa spyan drangs nas/ /thabs kyi logs su bzhag byas la/ /bsang gtor mchod yon zhabs bsil dang/ nye reg phul te phyag rgya bzhis/ /gnyis su med par bstan pa dang//
268b1(rgyud 'grel): oM Ta ki hUM dza hUM/ dza hUM baM ho(rgyud 'grel): sa ma ya stwaM g.yas pas ku sha'i chun po bzung/ /phyogs rnams kun tu bsang gtor bya/ /so so'i las dang mthun pa'i me/ /rlung yab ba dan dang bcas sbar/ /oM dz+nyA na dzwa la raM/ lag gnyis mchod yon phyag rgya yis/ /dud
268b2(rgyud 'grel): chos blangs te dbul bar bya/ /dgang gzar blugs gzar tshad ldan la/ /mtshan ma'i ye shes brgyan byas te/ /'od bcas mar khus bkang nas ni/ /lan gsum lha'i zhal du bstim/ /oM na ma(rgyud 'grel): sa man+ta bud+d+ha naM agne ye swA hA/ /dgang blugs kyi sngags
268b3(rgyud 'grel): so/ /mchod pa rnam pa lnga yi tshogs/ /so so'i sngags dang phyag rgyas dbul/ /oM agna ye swA hA/ yam shing gi'o/ /oM sarba pA paM dA ha na badzra ya swA hA/ pA paM dA ha na swA hA/ /til dang mar sres pa'i 'o/ /oM badzra a yu she swA hA/ /durba'i nyu gu mar
268b4(rgyud 'grel): gyis byugs pa'i 'o/ /oM badzra puShpe ye swA hA/ /'bras ma grus pa dang/ mar bsres pa'i 'o/ /oM sarba saM ba te swA hA/ zho'i 'o/ /oM a dra ti ha da ni ha d+ha badzra ya swA hA/ ku sha kyang ba'i 'o/ /oM pra ba ra satka ra pra tits+tsha ho zhes pa yang dgang blugs so/ /nye
268b5(rgyud 'grel): reg la sogs byas nas ni/ /dpa' bo rdo rje dri 'khrol zhing/ /bstod pa'i phyag rgyas mnyes byas nas/ /gar dbyangs rol mos bskul bar bya/ /lag gnyis lto sbyor bskyod byas te/ /rdzas rnams lan gsum spyang bar bya/ /oM ki lI ki lI/ bim la ri'u tri/ ta
268b6(rgyud 'grel): ki ni h+ri da ya hUM phaT/ de nas dkyil 'khor gang yin pa'i/ /lha rnams me yi gnas su gzhug /gong ma'i dkyil 'khor rim pa bzhin/ /rang gnas gdan la legs bzhugs sam/ /ma 'brel me lha'i? skhang pa ru/ /dam tshig dkyil 'khor rim bzhin
268b7(rgyud 'grel): bsam/ /ye shes dkyil 'khor spyan drangs te/ /dgug gzhug la sogs gnyis med par/ /mchod bstod las rnams sngon bzhin las/ /gsang sngags mdza' sngags skul tshig bcas/ /oM lha yi me lha shin tu tshogs/ /lha yi dri yis
269a1(rgyud 'grel): nye bar byugs/ /me tog bzang po 'di bzhes la/ /gnas 'di nyid du bzhugs su gsol/ /oM mar me 'od zer 'bar ba ni/ /ngan 'gro'i mun pa 'joms byed pa'i/ /lha yi mig 'byed dam pa 'di/ /bdag la dgongs te gshegs su
269a2(rgyud 'grel): gsol/ /oM tsan dan ga pur bcas pa yi/ /dri mchog bdug spos dam pa yi/ /dbang po'i sgo rnams tshim pa'i mchog /byin gyis rlobs la bzhes su gsol/ /oM sna tshogs lha yi dri ldan pa/ /sna tshogs ga pur gyis ni brgyam/ sna
269a3(rgyud 'grel): tshogs hUM las yang dag byung/ /dri mchog 'di dag bzhes su gsol/ /oM kha dog dri dang ror ldan pa'i/ /gza' ba' i bye brag sna tshogs dag /zhal zas phun sum tshogs pa'i bzhi/ /'gro ba'i don du gzhes su gsol/ /lha rnams mnyes
269a4(rgyud 'grel): shing tshim pa dang/ /'dod pa'i 'bras bu gsol btab cing/ /mchod bstod bskul tshig las byas te/ /snga ma'i dkyil 'khor gnas su dgong/ /gal te ma 'grel spyan drangs lha/ /thugs ka nas bton kha la bzhag /zhal bsil la sogs
269a5(rgyud 'grel): dbul byas te/ /sngar bzhin gshegs pa bsdus pa dag /sngags dang phyag rgyas gshegs su gsol/ /oM khyed kyis sems can don kun mdzad/ /rjes su mthun pa'i dngos grub gsol/ /sangs rgyas yul du gshegs nas kyang/ /slar yang
269a6(rgyud 'grel): byon par mdzad du gsol/ /oM A hUM/ badzre gats+tsha mu:/ rigs kyi dkyil 'khor bsdu byas nas/ /lhag mas me lha mchod byas te/ /sngar bzhin gshegs gsol bsdus pa dag /mnyam nyid rang la gnas par bya'o/ /de nas las kyi rdo rje yis/ /dkyil
269a7(rgyud 'grel): 'khor phyi rol mtshams dag tu/ /khor yug zlum pa'i rim pa la/ /dreg byed mkha' 'gro'i tshogs rnams kyi/ /pho brang gdan dang mtshan ma'i rtags/ /rin chen rgya tshogs phreng bar bcas/ /sna tshogs bza' btung gtor ma'i tshogs/ /lhag ma'i
269b1(rgyud 'grel): tshogs bcas dgram par bya/ /rdzas rnams tshogs nas dri yis bsang/ /bdud rtsi'i rgyun gdab sbyang zhing bsrung/ /dbus kyi sna tshogs rdo rje'i steng/ /haM las rta mchog rgyal po bsgom/ /phrin las rnam bzhi'i dkyil 'khor la/ /dug gsum 'byung bzhi
269b2(rgyud 'grel): rang rtags phreng/ /sgo bzhi bar khyams phyi rol sgo/ /rang gi mtshan mas mdzes par byas/ /mdun du dbang phyug chen po ste/ /g.yas su tshangs pa brgya byin lha/ /g.yon du khyab 'jug 'dod lha ste/ /chung ma gzhon pa la gnas pa'i/ /mtshan ma
269b3(rgyud 'grel): rgyan bcas 'jigs pa'i tshul/ /rang gi sa bon sngags las skyes/ /dbang ldan me lha'i rgyal po dang/ /srin po'i rgyal po rlung gi bdag /chung ma gzhon pa'i gdan dang bcas/ /lho 'am shar du lha chen brgyad/ /lho ru gshin rje ma mo'i tshogs/ /nub phyogs
269b4(rgyud 'grel): pho nya klu yi 'khor/ /byang du gnod sbyin chen po brgyad/ /sgo bzhir nyi zla sa bdag che/ /sa yi lha mo gnas pa'o/ /phyi khyam mtshogs dbang phyug rnams/ /sgo bzhir mkha' 'gro chen mo bzhi/ /kun kyang rgyan bcas cha lugs dang/ /lag cha gzhon par 
269b5(rgyud 'grel): bcas pa yi/ /chung ma khyo dang bran g.yog tshogs/ /gsang sngags las skyes bsal bar dgod/ /dgug cing gnas su bzhug byas nas/ /zil gnon dam tshig phyag rgya bstan/ /mchod stong las la bskul byas nas/ /rta mgrin phyag rgya rnam gnyis
269b6(rgyud 'grel): bcing/ /hUM khro las rnga chen 'bar ba'i skur ston cing/ /'jigs byed lha chen yab yum zhabs kyi gzhon/ /drag po'i dkyil 'khor sna tshogs ston mdzad pa'i/ /dbu mang rta skad mtsher zhing gar mdzad pa/ /nyi ma 'bum gyi 'od mdangs sku la rdzogs//
269b7(rgyud 'grel): khro rgyal 'khor bcas ma lus gshegs su gsol/ /oM sum+b+ha ni sum+b+ha hUM/ dza(rgyud 'grel): hUM baM ho:/ A kiDDha ya/ A kaTta ya/ pra be sha ya dra be sha ya/ band+ha ya band+ha ya/ to Sha ya to Sha ya/ mo ha ya mo ha ya/ oM oM a ral+li ho/ /h+riM h+riM h+riM/ oM
270a1(rgyud 'grel): 'jigs byed lha chen dbang phyug dang/ /de bzhin tshangs pa rgya byin dang/ /khyab 'jug 'dod dga' i dbang phyug dang/ /'jig rten skyong ba'i lha klu dang/ /gnod sbyin gshin rje mo yi tshogs/ /mtshams kyi dbang ldan la sogs pa'i//
270a2(rgyud 'grel): gal te rdzu 'phrul mthu mnga' rnams/ /bran tshogs g.yog dang chung mar bcas/ /dpa' bo'i spyan sngar dam bcas bzhin/ /rang gi dam tshig rang bya sol/ /tshogs kyi dkyil 'khor bsrung ba'i phyir/ /'khor bcas gnas 'dir gshegs su gsol//
270a3(rgyud 'grel): oM e hya hi/ ru lu ru lu thA(rgyud 'grel): hUM baM ho(rgyud 'grel): oM badzra DA ki ni b+hyo e a ra l+li dzA dzA/ oM DA ki ni a karya ya a kadSha ya/ pra be sha ya/ pra be sha ya band+ha ya/ band+ha ya/ to Sha ya to Sha ya/ ma ha na mo ha na/ sarba na ta gi nan/ h+ri nga ya hUM phaT dza dza(rgyud 'grel): hUM baM
270a4(rgyud 'grel): rtsom Da ki ni hUM dza(rgyud 'grel): Da ki phyag rgyas dgug pa'o/ /oM sh+rI he ru ka/ mahA badzra/ sarba duSh+Tra na sa ma ya mu tra pra b+hany+tsa kra hUM phaT/ he ru ka'i phyag rgyas zil gyis mnan pa'o/ /oM badzra ba ta mu kha/ a karSha ya/ a karSha ya/ pra be sha ya/ pra be sha ya/
270a5(rgyud 'grel): band+ha ya band+ha ya/ to dza ya to Sha ya/ sarba DA kin na/ tri da yan/ ha ha hi hi/ oM A(rgyud 'grel): hUM/ rta mgrin phyag rgyas bsdu ba'o/ /rdo rje phur pa gdab byas pas/ /bgags kun g.yo ba med par byas/ /ye shes mes bsregs bdud rtsis gsos/ /sgrub?
270a6(rgyud 'grel): zhong byin brlabs lha yi skur/ /sku gsung thugs kyi rdo rje dang/ /rigs kyi bdag po'i mtshan mas brgyan/ /snga ma'i phyag rgya'i cha lugs las/ /'od mdangs rgyan chas 'bar ba yis/ /'khor bcas bsdus pa'i dga' 'gyur kun/ /da mo
270a7(rgyud 'grel): tshig lha dang gnyis med sbyor/ /oM thugs rje chen po gzigs nas kyang/ /sna tshogs rgyud rnams 'phrul mdzad cing/ /gar mkhan 'khor lo'i rgyud mnga' ba'i/ /drag po'i zhi mdzad khyod la phyag 'tshal lo/ /sna tshogs gar gyis rnam
270b1(rgyud 'grel): por 'phrul pa la phyag 'tshal lo/ /rdo rje la sogs mtshon chas rol la phyag 'tshal lo/ /ma lus lha'i lha mchog skyong la phyag 'tshal lo/ /dpa' bo rtsal rdzogs stobs bcu'i shugs la phyag 'tshal lo/ /haM a taM bu bu ho/ /a la la ho/ /ma lus mchod
270b2(rgyud 'grel): gtor rdzes rnams kun/ /ha ho h+ri yis bsreg spyang brlab/ /rin chen dbyibs mdzes spras pa'i snod/ /'dod lnga'i longs spyod bdud rtsi'i mtsho/ /lha mos 'khril ba'i dgyes stobs shing/ /kun bzang mchod sprin gang bar dmigs/ /dang po'i dri yi
270b3(rgyud 'grel): chus bsangs nas/ /mchod yon zhabs bsil me tog 'thor/ /so so'i ting 'dzin phyag rgya sngags/ /mchod gter rim bzhin dbul bar bya/ /oM badzra puShpe/ oM badzra d+hu pa/ oM badzra g+hande/ oM badzra nai pe tya pU dza spha ra Na swA hA/ /oM tadya thA/ na
270b4(rgyud 'grel): ma badzra ma hA de ba/ /badzra pi snu/ badzra pra ma/ badzra pra in+t+ra/ badzra kA ma de ba/ badzra a yu d+ha/ badzra mA yA/ badzra shwa b+ha/ badzra bai ra wa/ badzra ga na pa ti/ badzra d+ha sha gri ba/ badzra pA sha kA la/ badzra bu ma ra/ badzra ya ma rA dza/ badzra ya ma kA la/ badzra ya ma duSh+Tan
270b5(rgyud 'grel): badzra ya ma kro d+ha/ /badzra ya ma tsa kra/ badzra ya ma shu la/ badzra ya ma ya ra/ badzra ya ma mu raM/ badzra nA ga tsa kra/ badzra na ga ba su ka/ badzra na ga karko Ta/ badzra na ga pad+ma/ badzra nA ga ma hA pad+ma/ badzra nA ga shaM kha pA la/ badzra nA ga ga yu/ badzra nA ga kyu li ka /
270b6(rgyud 'grel): badzra nA ga ba la ta/ badzra nA ga gu su/ badzra ya ma ni pa tra ye/ badzra pU r+Na pa Ta ye/ badzra da na d+ha ya/ badzra ma hA d+ha dza na/ badzra dzi bi ku land+ha ya/ badzra dza b+ha la mu khan+ta ya badzra dza b+ha la dza len+t+ra ya/ badzra ki li mi li ni/ /badzra agne ye/ badzra na ri ti/ badzra bai
270b7(rgyud 'grel): raM ba/ badzra a'i sha na ye/ badzra nA ga u liM ka/ badzra nA ga ba la ti/ badzra su rya ba/ badzra tsan+d+ra ba/ badzra geM tsi tri/ badzra pra ti bi de ba/ badzra DA ki ni ka la badzra b+hyo/ badzra DA ki ni ka la ratna b+hyo/ badzra DA ki ni ka la pad+ma b+hyo/ badzra DA ki ni kA la karma b+hyo/ /sa pa ri ba ra
271a1(rgyud 'grel): i daM d+hU pa/ puShpa/ tI paM/ gand+haM/ ni be te/ di saM ka taM/ pa lI pra ha raM/ pra tits+tsha/ yu ba buM dza/ ma ma sarba satwa/ naM pa ti/ ran N+ya/ su ba rna/ d+ha na d+hya n+ya/ a yu yo ba na/ a ra kya/ satshu khaM/ aM pa ha ra kaM/ shAn+tiM ku ru/ puSh+Ti ku ru ka ba
271a2(rgyud 'grel): shaM ku ru/ ma ra ya/ sarba karma artha sid+d+hi hUM hUM swA hA/ oM thams cad gnyis med thugs rje'i mchog /rdo rje gsang gsum gnas las byung/ /dam pa'i dka' spyod byang chub sems/ /drag po'i gzugs 'dzin mkha' 'gro'i
271a3(rgyud 'grel): tshogs/ /dam chog bstan pa gnas bsrung zhing/ /rnal 'byor sgrub pa'i las mdzad ma/ /don kun phrin las sngags kyi mthus/ /'gro ba'i gnas kun rnam par dag /byang chub sbyor ba rgya mtsho'i tshogs/ /dam bcas phrin las sna tshogs kyis/ /sangs
271a4(rgyud 'grel): rgyas thams cad mnyam sbyong ba'i/ /mkha' 'gro sgyu ma'i don ston mdzad/ /oM shin tu drag chen sprul pa'i sku/ /khams gsum gnas kun g.yo mdzad pa/ /ka las sprul pa'i lha chen po/ /dkar ser khyu mchog gdan la bzhugs/ /zhal
271a5(rgyud 'grel): phyag mtshungs par kri shul la/ /ngag rta ral gri thod khrag sha/ spyan gsum ral pa thod phreng rgyan/ rin chen sna tshogs gos kyis klubs/ /zla ba phyed pa'i ru mtshon can/ /sgeg dges chags pa'i gzi mdangs kyis/ /u ma ljang skya thod pa thogs/
271a6(rgyud 'grel): zhi ba rin chen rgyan bcas 'khril/ /stobs ldan dpa' bo dpa' mo'i tshogs/ /'khor bcas gnas 'dir 'dus pa rnams/ /mchod gtor rgyun bcas 'di bzhes shig /rang gi dam tshig dran byos la/ /zhi rgyas dbang drag las kun dang/ /
271a7(rgyud 'grel): thun mong dngos grub 'dod pa'i don/ /bdag sogs rnal 'byor sgrub pa'i tshogs/ /ma lus thogs med grub par mdzod/ /oM khams gsum gtso bo 'byin byed lha/ /oM las sprul pa'i tshangs pa che/ /gser mdog gdong bzhi/
271b1(rgyud 'grel): phreng bas mdzes/ /g.yas gnyis pad ser ral gri thogs/ /g.yon gnyis 'khor lo rin chen 'od/ /ngang pa zla ba'i khri steng gnas/ /khams gsum bskyod tshul rnam grub ma/ /mdzes ma kun gzugs yum dang 'khril/ /oM byang chub sems dpa' 
271b2(rgyud 'grel): gtso bo mchog /a las sprul pa'i lha dbang rgyal/ /dkar gsal zla rgyas mdangs dpal phyug /gos rgyan rin chen tshogs kyis klubs/ /g.yas gnyis rdo rje rtse gsum rin/ /g.yon gnyis rin chen phreng ba 'bum/ /glang chen rin chen khri steng
271b3(rgyud 'grel): na/ /sha rtsi dkar mo'i rin chen pang/ /'khril tshul 'dod pa'i longs spyod tshogs/ /rin chen sna bdun tshogs la rol/ /oM stobs ldan drag po mthu bo che/ /haM las sprul pa khyab 'jug gtso/ /mthing gnag khro bo'i tshul 'chang ba/ /'khor lo rtse
271b4(rgyud 'grel): gsum mda' dang gzhu/ /'jigs pa'i cha lugs gos rgyan klub/ /ri dags shing rta'i na chen khri/ /gzugs 'dzin drag mo pad+ma 'dzin/ /mtshon cha 'khrigs pa'i phreng ba can/ /oM ma lus 'dod tshogs kun gyi bdag /d+haM las byung ba'i 'dod lha mchog/
271b5(rgyud 'grel): ser skya sna tshogs rgyan gyis klubs/ /g.yas gnyis mnga' mchog rin po che/ /g.yon gnyis rin chen gzhu pad+ma/ /'dod dpung rin chen kun la spyod/ /drag po gnas rgyal rin chen skyes/ /rin chen khri bcas rta yi tshogs/ /lha yi bdud sogs
271b6(rgyud 'grel): mos pa'i dpung/ /yan lag bzhi bcas las mdzad pa/ /oM shar gyi phyogs nas lha chen tshogs/ /gsang ba'i bka' 'dzin dam tshig can/ /a yig sngags kyis sprul pa rnams/ /zhi pa'i rgyan bcas byang sems gsal/ /rdo rje mtshon cha
271b7(rgyud 'grel): gser mdog 'od/ /zhal phyag bzhi pa rdo rje rin/ /pad+ma bum pa bdud rtsi'i rgyun/ /rin chen gos rgyan yum dang bcas/ /rgyal po chen po'i tshul 'dzin cing/ /glang chen rin chen stegs la gnas/ /rdo rje sgyu ma sngo gsang mdog /g.yas gnyis
272a1(rgyud 'grel): 'khor lo ral gri 'dzin/ /g.yon gnyis dung dang padmo thogs/ /nyi ma'i 'od mdangs stan la gnas/ /dbu rgyan phreng ba gos kyis klubs/ /btsun mo'i 'khor tshogs sum cu gnyis/ /rdo rje glang sna dkar ser mdangs/ /g.yas
272a2(rgyud 'grel): gnyis gtun shing ral gri dang/ /g.yon gnyis phreng ba rin chen 'khor/ /chu srin rin chen pad+ma'i khri/ /mche gtsigs khro tshul drag po'i spyan/ /btsun mo gtum chen bdud rtsi'i snod/ /rdo rje 'jigs byed khro bo'i mchog /sngo nag me
272a3(rgyud 'grel): 'od 'bar ba phreng/ /g.yas gnyis rtse gsum 'khor lo smyur/ /g.yon gnyis mtshon cha me 'od phreng/ /ma mo'i gdan la yum dang 'khril/ /thod rus sprul gyi phreng bas brgyan/ /rdo rje tshogs bdag ljang ser sku/ /rin chen gos rgyun 'jigs
272a4(rgyud 'grel): pa'i tshogs/ /g.yas gnyis bdud rtsi rin po che/ /g.yon gnyis zla ba rtse gsum bdud/ /rdo rje brag chen blung dkyil myur/ /btsun mo stobs chen brgyad kyi dbus/ /rdo rje srin me sngo skya'i 'od/ /srid gsum thal byed rnga skad sgrogs/ /g.yas
272a5(rgyud 'grel): gnyis gri gug 'byug pa 'dzin/ /g.yon gnyis pad+ma'i thod pa 'chang/ /thub dka' srin po'i gdan la gnas/ /yum bcas rgyan phreng 'jigs pa'i tshul/ /rdo rje zhags pa gnas kun rgyal/ /mdog gnag mi lpags thod pa'i rgyan/ /
272a6(rgyud 'grel): g.yas gnyis zhags pa rtse gsum 'od/ /g.yon gnyis gri gug thod pa'i snod/ /lus ngan sprul pa'i khri la gnas/ /yum tshogs pho nya gtso bo brgyad/ /rdo rje gzhon nu gdong drug lta/ /dmar ser zhi ba'i rgyan gyis mdzes/ /g.yas
272a7(rgyud 'grel): na rin chen pad+ma mda'/ /g.yon na phreng ba bum bzang gzhu/ /dad pa padmo rdzing bcas gdan/ /phyag rgya yum sogs gnas drug ma/ /oM lho yi rgyal chen gshin rje'i tshogs/ /byang sems yang las 'phrul pa'i gzugs/ /khro bo
272b1(rgyud 'grel): 'joms byed rgyan phreng klubs/ /'jigs pa'i gzugs mchog khro gnyer 'gyur/ /mche gtsigs pheM sgrogs spyan gsum bgrang/ /ser skya'i skra 'bar sma ra can/ /ma tshogs yum bcas thal zhag khrag /lus byugs thong phreng ma he'i gdan
272b2(rgyud 'grel): rdo rje gshin rje'i rgyal chen po/ /sngo nag 'khor lo ral gri 'dzin/ /rdo rje gshin rje dus kyi tshogs/ /mdog dmar glegs bam khram shing thogs /rdo rje gshin rje sdang ba 'joms/ /ser skya rtse gsum pa dan dril/ /rdo rje gshin rje khro bo mchog /sngo
272b3(rgyud 'grel): nag ral gri thod khrag sha/ rdo rje gshin rje'i 'khor lo'i gdan/ /dung ka 'khor lo phreng ba me/ /rdo rje gshin rje mdung 'dzin gnon/ /sngo skya mdung rtse gsum pa rlung/ /rdo rje gshin rje mda''dzin rgyal/ /dmar skya mda' gzhu glog phreng rgyan/ /
272b4(rgyud 'grel): rdo rje gshin rje thub pa che/ /sngo gnag gri gug thod khrab sprin/ /dur khrod cha che gtum pa yi/ /mkha' 'gro 'jigs byed brgyad rnams kun/ /mdog nag mun pa'i tshogs ltar gtibs/ /lag na gri gug zod khrag sha/ dus 'dzin 'chi bdag
272b5(rgyud 'grel): bzlog byed cing/ /ma mo'i sbong ba'i gdon brtson/ /oM nub phyogs rdo rje klu yi tshogs/ /byang chub sems sogs phuM las sbrul/ /rdzu 'phrul mthu stobs byin brlabs can/ /rin chen 'bar pa'i sprul mgo'i rgyan/ /pho dang rin chen khang
272b6(rgyud 'grel): mdzes na/ /bdud rtsi'i rgya mtsho rdzing bu'i tshogs/ /btsun mo yum tshogs dga' ba rnams/ /rin chen pad+ma'i skyed tshal gnas/ /rdo rje mdza' yas sngo sangs mdog /sbrul zhags rin chen bum pa thogs/ /rdo rje nor rgyas mdog dkar la/ /nor
272b7(rgyud 'grel): bu rtse dgu phreng ba'i tshul/ /rdo rje 'og po dmar mdangs can/ /sprin phung rin chen char 'bebs mdzad/ /rdo rje kar ko Ta nag po/ /rin tshen phreng ba pad+ma'i rgya/ /rdo rje pad+ma chu shel mdangs/ /'dod pa'i zhal zas bdud rtsi'i rgyun/ /rdo rje pad chen
273a1(rgyud 'grel): dkar skya'i mdangs/ /me tog utpal sgra snyan sgrogs/ /rdo rje dung skyong gser gyi mdog /phreng ba ljon shing me tog rgyan/ /rdo rje rigs ldan sna tshogs sku/ /chu srin rin chen gter mdzod sbyor/ /oM byang gi gnod sbyin
273a2(rgyud 'grel): 'jigs pa'i gtso/ /pho brang rin chen gnas kyi bdag /me'u thung zugs 'dra stobs ldan pa/ /byang sems rigs sogs haM las sprul/ /rin chen bum tshogs nor bu'i tshogs/ /pad+ma bdun rtsegs rin chen khri/ /dpag bsam
273a3(rgyud 'grel): rgyan phreng bum pa'i lho/ /rgyal blon btsun mo'i tshogs dang bcas/ /rdo rje gang bzang chu shel mdog /rin chen mkha' mdzod zla gsal mdangs/ /rdo rje bum bzang gser lta bu/ /rtse gsum bum pa lag na 'dzin/ /rdo rje nor bzang
273a4(rgyud 'grel): bai DUrya/ /nor bu rin chen phreng ba'i tshogs/ /rdo rje rnam thos gser gyi mdangs/ /mchod rten rin chen dbyug pa thogs/ /rdo rje lus ngan ljang skya'i 'od/ /rin chen dbyug pa lcug ma'i rgyun/ /rdo rje gnon 'jigs mthing shun mdog /
273a5(rgyud 'grel): ral gri utpal me tog phreng/ /rdo rje gnon gnas nyi ma'i mdangs/ /shing thog ne 'u le'i skyal bu 'thor/ /rdo rje sde bzang in+d+ra'i mdog /glegs bam rin chen bum pa'i chu/ /khro gnyer spyan dmar dbu skra 'khril/ /mche ba cung zad 'dzum
273a6(rgyud 'grel): mdangs brgyan/ /rin chen go cha mtshon sna tshogs/ /'dod pa'i longs spyod kun gyis myos/ /oM mtshams kyi rgyal chen dpa' bo'i dpung/ /rang gi 'khor tshogs 'dul mdzad pa/ /byang chub sems sogs gzhan don mdzad/ /sa
273a7(rgyud 'grel): bon a ri yaM ming las/ /'phrul bas byin brlabs gzugs dang ldan/ /gtso bo rang rigs rgyan gyis mdzes/ /rdo rje me lha dmar ser 'od/ /bgrang phreng spyi blugs srang bus brgyan/ /rdo rje srin po dmar ser 'od/ /chu srin pad+ma 'jigs
273b1(rgyud 'grel): byed gzugs/ /rdo rje rlung lta dud kha'i mdog /ba dan phreng ba kha mang rgya/ /rdo rje dbang ldan in+d+ra rin/ /be con rtse gsum 'od phreng 'khrigs/ /btsun mo'i 'khor tshogs las mdzad pa/ /ra skyes chu srin sha ba dang/ /mi ro'i stan la rin chen brgyan/ /'dod
273b2(rgyud 'grel): ba'i longs spyod dga' rtser rol/ /oM sgo bzhi pho nya mthun pa'i grogs/ /rnal 'byor dam can skyong mdzad pa/ /steng 'og nyin mtshan dus 'byed cing/ /byang chub sems tshogs sbyong ldan pas/ /tshad med bzhi yis rnam par rol/ /sa bon suM tsaM pra taM las/
273b3(rgyud 'grel): 'byung ba'i gzi brjid 'od po che/ /btsun mo dam pa'i gnas longs spyod/ /blon po de/ dpon dpung bcas pas/ /dam chos bstan pa rgyas par mdzad/ /rdo rje nyi ma me shel mdangs/ /pad+ma rin chen shing rtar ldan/ /rdo rje zla ba chu shel 'od/ /bdud rtsi ku mu dang
273b4(rgyud 'grel): pa'i khri/ /rdo rje sa 'dzin gser gyi mdog /bum pa bgrang phreng pad+ma'i gdan/ /rdo rje thag bzangs btsod kyi mdog /gos mtshon 'brug gi khri la gnas/ /'jig rten gsum la mnga' mdzad pa'i/ /stobs ldan phrin las myur ba'i tshul/ /oM bde
273b5(rgyud 'grel): gshegs sras tshogs bka' nyan bran/ /mkha' 'gro'i rgyal po rgyal mo rnams/ /rnam pa rang gi gzugs nyid la/ /rang bzhin bde gshegs sku gsung thugs/ /phyag rgya rnam bzhi dbu brgyan dang/ /rigs kyi bdag por dbang bskur ba'i/ /rgyal
273b6(rgyud 'grel): ba'i sras tshogs thugs rje can/ /bka' gsang dam tshig byos la/ /smad byung mthu rang rdzu 'phrul gyis/ /rigs 'dzin sgrub pa'i grogs mdzod cig /dgra bgegs nad gdon bar chad rnams/ /phrin las kun gyis 'dul mdzad cing/ /tshe dbang bkra shis bde legs
273b7(rgyud 'grel): tshogs/ /dus kun tu ni rgyas par mdzod/ /oM phyi rol ma tshogs mkha' 'gro'i sku/ /thams cad 'phrul ba'i rdzu 'phrul can/ /sna tshogs dbang phyug phrin las kyi/ /rtag tu rang gi don brtson zhing/ /drag po mkha' 'gro'i tshogs bsdus pas/ /gzhan don las la rnam
274a1(rgyud 'grel): par rol/ /sprul pa yang sprul 'jigs pa'i gzugs/ /gsod don sha khrag las la brtson/ /shar gyi rdo rje sgyu 'phrul gtso/ /gzugs chen nam mkha' i gos gyon ma/ /keng rus rnam par 'gyur ba dang/ /mkha' chen 'dra ba'i sgyu
274a2(rgyud 'grel): ma che/ /rdo rje'i thog 'bebs mthu rtsal can/ /mun pa'i tshogs 'joms snang ba'i sku/ /rdo rje rigs tshogs mkha' 'gro'i rgyal/ /dkar mo rdo rje rtse gsum dang/ /'khor lo bdun shing gri gug mtshon/ /mda' rnon lcags kyu zhags pa
274a3(rgyud 'grel): dangs ral gri thod dbyug mdung 'phen ma/ /mi mgo rgyu ma'i phreng ba thogs/ /'jigs pa'i mtshon cha me ltar 'phro/ /gtum pa'i rngam tshig 'brug bzhin sgrogs/ /shar gyi gnas mchog lhun po'i rtse/ /dkyil 'khor 'bar ba'i las mdzod cig /lho
274a4(rgyud 'grel): phyogs rin chen 'od mdzes brgyan/ /byang chub gnas bsrung rdzu 'phrul che/ /khro gnyer 'jigs pa'i sprul pa can/ /gshin rje'i tshogs 'joms mched thogs/ /'od chen khams gsum khyab pa mo/ /rin chen dbyug pa'i klu dbyangs sgrogs/ /sngon
274a5(rgyud 'grel): 'gro ral gri thod khrag 'thung/ /'khor lo sta ri me thab dang/ /bdud kyi khram shing zhags pa bdun/ /rtsa gsum mgo thod dum bu dang/ /dra ba lcags kyu 'bar ba thogs/ /'jigs pa'i 'od 'bar rin chen gnas/ /rgya mtsho 'khyil ba'i
274a6(rgyud 'grel): klu gnas sbyon/ /pan chen yi dags gdan rnams su/ /sprul ba'i nyi ma'i 'od zer ltar/ /dam bcas phrin las skal la bab/ /nub phyogs pad+ma'i 'dod chags ma/ /rdo rje keng rus gnas kun 'joms/ /shugs 'chang rlung gi grong khyer
274a7(rgyud 'grel): bdag /sgrub pa'i gsang 'dzin phyag rgya can/ /ro'i phreng bas bskyod pa'i gzugs/ /mtshon cha glog gi phreng thogs ma/ /dmar mo thod dbyug rgyu ma'i phreng/ /gri gug 'then thag zangs dung dang/ /mkha' lding mi snying khrag 'dzag ma/
274b1(rgyud 'grel): mda' yi me tog lcug ma dang/ /rdo rje'i phreng ba thod dbyug 'chad/ /ro'i nags tshal lcug ma can/ /khams gsum 'khrug pa'i khrag mtsho nas/ /dbang po srid gsum chags mdzad spyan/ /byang gi rdo rje las mchog gtso/ /kun tu bzang mo yid kyi shugs/
274b2(rgyud 'grel): rdo rje gnon byed dpa' mo'i mchog /dpal ldan bzang mo'i rgyan chos can/ /'bar ba'i spyan can drag po'i gzugs/ /las rnams kun la mnga' mdzad rgyal/ /ljang gnag rdo rje rgya gram khrag /me ri 'bar bcas lcags kyu zhags/ /gnod sbyin dbyug
274b3(rgyud 'grel): pa bdud rtsi dang/ /be con zla dkyil thag mdung gri/ 'khrul 'khor me tog lcug ma dang/ /rtse gsum ba dan mi yi rkang/ /gnod byed stobs mchog 'jigs pa'i ri/ /byang gi gtum 'phrul rol pa'i tshogs/ /ma mo mkha' 'gro gzugs can rnams
274b4(rgyud 'grel): dam tshig mchog gi gnas grub mdzod/ /oM bud+d+ha DA ki ni maM pa liM ta pra tits+tsha ho/ /oM phaT kha'i/ /oM badzra DA kA ni maM ba laM ta pra tits+tsha ho hUM(rgyud 'grel): phaT kha'i/ oM ratna DA kI ni maM pa liM ta pra tits+tsha ho traM phaT kha'i/ /oM pad+ma DA kI ni maM ba liM ta pra tits+tsha ho h+ri phaT
274b5(rgyud 'grel): kha'i/ /oM karma DA kI ni maM ba liM ta pra tIts+tsha ho haM phaT kha'i/ /dza(rgyud 'grel): hUM baM ho(rgyud 'grel): A be sha ya/ A pe sha ya/ pra be sha ya/ pra pe sha ya pra pe sha ya/ pra tits+tsha ho/ sh+rI b+ha ga bAn/ kha kha kha/ le le le/ kha'i kha'i kha'i/ oM b+hu ru tro ha ka/ sa ma ya blang sha kha'i/ pak+Sha su nan/
274b6(rgyud 'grel): bud+d+ha k+She Ta pra tiSh+Ta pa ya kha'i/ /pad+ma'i phyag rgyas kha chus mchod pa'o/ /lag gnyis rgyab sgyur snying gar gtad/ /mdzub bsnol srin lag mig gi tshul/ /gung mtheb gnyis gdangs rtse sprad kha/ /mthe'u chung gyen du bsgreng ba'i rgyas/ /'jig rten pa yi
274b7(rgyud 'grel): las tshogs rnams/ /phyogs kun dngos grub rgyas byed pa'o/ /oM pad+ma pa mu karma sid+d+hi hUM/ /phyag rgya mdun rol bsgyur byas te/ mtheb gung mdzub srin gong bzhin sbyar/ /dngos grub mchog rnams dbang byas pas/ /brten byed mi 'bral kun
275a1(rgyud 'grel): spyod mdzod/ /oM pad+ma ba mu khe a be sha ya h+ri/ rdo rje khu tshur bcangs pa yi/ /mthe bo'i rtse bzhi mche ba'i tshul/ /mchod gtor phyogs kun gnas bsgyur bas/ /las kun bya ba mthar phyin 'gyur/ /oM badzra e sa hUM/ pU sa hUM/ sa
275a2(rgyud 'grel): ma ya bak+Sha hUM/ oM lu ru lu hUM b+hyo hUM/ /phyag rgya'i ting 'dzin sngags bcas ldan/ /gtor ma'i las bskul gnas su btang/ /slar log dkyil 'khor ma nyams blos/ /bkra shis dngos grub bskul bar bya/ /oM dngos grub dbang phyug yang dag
275a3(rgyud 'grel): bden pa'i stobs/ /phun sum tshogs pa kun tu 'byung ba'i gzhi/ /stobs mchog mi 'jigs gdon bral 'tshe ba med/ /bcom ldan bkra shis mi 'gyur brtan par shog /oM sangs rgyas thams cad mnyam sbyor ba'i/ /mkha' 'gro sgyu ma bde
275a4(rgyud 'grel): ba chen po'i mchog /dkyil 'khor phyag rgya gsang sngags sbyor ba'i mthus/ /rigs kun bkra shis mi 'gyur brtan par shog /oM thams cad don grub don tshogs rgya chen po/ /thun mongs mngon shes rnam lnga sgo gsal zhing/ /gser 'gyur
275a5(rgyud 'grel): bum pa bcud len bdud rtsi'i tshogs/ /bcu drug bkra shis mi 'gyur brtan par shog /oM mtshan mchog dpe byad mi 'gyur brtan zhing brjid/ /bdud 'dul bkra shis gdugs mchog rgyal mtshan dung/ /'khor lo dpal be'u gser nya bum pa
275a6(rgyud 'grel): mtshon/ nye ba'i bkra shis mi 'gyur brtan par shog /oM zhi rgyas dbang drag mnan bzlog las rnams kun/ /thams cad skad cig mthu yis grub gyur zhing/ /bdag gzhan cha lugs gnas kun sbyor byed pa'i/ /phrin las bkra shis mi
275a7(rgyud 'grel): 'gyur brtan par shog /oM rgyal pa thams cad gnyis med mnyam pa'i dbyings/ /ye shes sku mchog rigs dang sprul pa'i tshogs/ /ma 'dres dngos grub 'bras bzang dpe dang bral/ /snyoms 'jug mi 'gyur bkra shis brtan par shog /las
275b1(rgyud 'grel): rdzogs rnal 'byor pho mo kun/ /lu gu rgyud kyi phyag rgyas 'brel/ /oM mi gnas ye shes thugs kyi dkyil 'khor du/ /'gyur ba med pa lhun gyis grub pa dang/ /rab 'byams rgyal ba'i bka' la dbang thob nas/ /'gro ba yongs kyi dpal du 'gyur bar
275b2(rgyud 'grel): shog /'di lta bu'i man ngag lung ston cing/ /bka' drin che ba'i dge ba'i bshes gnyen dang/ /srog gi lu gu rgyud kyi 'bral ba rnams/ /'og min lhun gyis grub pa'i gnas mchog tu/ /dus gsum 'du 'bral med par 'grogs pa dang/ /gsang chen
275b3(rgyud 'grel): thugs kyi dkyil 'khor chen po ru/ /bla med sku gsung thugs mchog grub gyur nas/ /rgyal ba'i mdzad pas 'gro rnams sgrol byed shog /rang gi dkyil 'khor rgyas pa dag /phrin las bcu drug gnas 'jug cing/ /phyag rgya gsang sngags 'khrul 'khor
275b4(rgyud 'grel): sbyor/ /bsam gtan bya ba'i las bzhin du/ /bdag gzhan don 'gyur dus tshed shes/ /cho ga rten 'brel rdzogs par spyad/ /de yang rten gyi dbye ba yis/ /bsam gtan bzlas brjod sbyin sreg dang/ /las sbyor 'khrul 'khor rdzas las sgrub/ /mos
275b5(rgyud 'grel): sogs goms pa'i shugs kyis 'jug /dang por sbyor ba mthun pa'i las/ /sngon du 'gro ba'i cho ga rdzogs/ /las kyi yan lag dag byas nas/ /rlung zhing byin gyis brlabs pa tsam/ /gsang ba las dang mthun gnas su/ /grogs sogs dbang bskur byin
275b6(rgyud 'grel): brlabs ldan/ /mos pas byang chub mchog sems bskyed/ /dang brtson blo gros 'gyur ba med/ /gsang ba'i phyag rgya rgya chen sgom/ /tshul bzhin the tshom med pas 'grub/ /de ltar byin brlabs myur ba'i mthus/ /las kyi rtog tshogs rab 'jigs pa'o//
275b7(rgyud 'grel): sbyor ba ji snyed yod pa kun/ /byed pa rnam pa sna tshogs la/ /rdo rje sems dpa' dpal gyi rgya/ /dngos grub thams cad rab grub pa'o/ /bya ba dang ni bzlog pa dang/ /khyad par du ni dbrog pa dag /yan lag kun tu byed pa'i nang/ /des ni nor rnams kun kyang shog?
276a1(rgyud 'grel): 'o byed 'khyud pa la sogs pas/ /khams gsum pa yang rgyas 'debs so/ /thar bar byed cing gsod par byed/ /sbyor ba'i longs spyod thams cad kyis/ /khams gsum po ni ma lus par/ /rgyas btab rmongs byas blangs nas su/ /gar
276a2(rgyud 'grel): byas nas ni za bar byed/ /sbyor ba kun gyi bde myong bas/ /khams gsum pa ni ma lus par/ /rgyas btab rmongs byas zos pa dang/ /thal bar gyur pa'ang 'tsho bar byed/ /sbyor ba thams cad phyag rgya la/ /rigs mchog gtso bo'i lha mor bcas/ /sna
276a3(rgyud 'grel): tshogs phrin las ma lus la/ /rang gi tshul bzhin rnam par sbyar/ /ras dang grog shing sogs la/ /gur gum gi wang tshon sna las/ /bdag gzhan pho mo la dmigs te/ /rten gyi gsang sngags sbyor bcas bri/ /mu khyud phreng ba rim gsum
276a4(rgyud 'grel): nang/ /sna tshogs rdo rje lte ba la/ /'khor lo rtsibs brgyad nyis 'gyur brtsegs/ /rang rigs mtshan mas brgyan par bri/ /'khor lo lte ba rnams la ni/ /rigs bdag rtsa ba'i dkyil 'khor sngags/ /'khor lo gnyis par yi ge brgya/ /sna tshogs
276a5(rgyud 'grel): mtshams bzhir zhal bzhi pa/ /mu khyud nang mar phreng ba'i sngags/ /gnyis par yi ge ma mo rnams/ /gsum pa rigs kyi mtshon cha phreng/ /bar mtshams bsgrub bya'i ming gsol 'debs/ /de la 'phreng ba'i gsang sngags che/ /rdo rje sems
276a6(rgyud 'grel): dpa' i sbyor ba gnyis/ /rigs gzhan dkyil 'khor phyag rgya'i tshogs/ /thams cad shar nas g.yas su bskor/ /oM A(rgyud 'grel): hUM sh+rI de ba ta/ badzra satwa kro ta na mos stu sti sarba bud+d+ha/ sa ma yo gI na ma hUM hUM swAhA/ oM A(rgyud 'grel): hUM sh+rI badzra swa dzro sta te su rA ga
276a7(rgyud 'grel): na mo sarba bud+d+ha sa ma yo gI dzwa la saM b+hA ra na ma hUM hUM swA hA/ oM A(rgyud 'grel): hUM mahA rA ga mu ga ta/ sh+rI bai ro tsa na/ sarba tsakra sa ma yo ga rA ga i ti na ma oM kha swA hA/ oM A(rgyud 'grel): hUM ka ru Na a ma la kro d+ha sh+rI he ru ka/ sarba badzrod sa ma yo gi ni sto tra na mas
276b1(rgyud 'grel): stu tra na ma hi hUM phaT swAhA/ /oM A hUM sh+rI pad+ma rA ga shud+d+ha shud+d+ho sarba mahA rA ga padmo sa ma yo gI ni na ma h+ri hUM swA hA/ oM A(rgyud 'grel): hUM sh+rI badzra b+ha ba ta o dza nya tot+ta ratno sa ma yo gI ni na ma traM hUM swAhA/ oM A(rgyud 'grel): hUM sh+rI a sho ta pa ra kra ma sarba bi shwa sa ma yo
276b2(rgyud 'grel): gI mahA rA ga na ma haM hUM swAhA/ rigs kyi dkyil 'khor gsal ldan pas/ /rten gyi sbyor ba rang nyid bzhin/ /rdzogs par dgug gzhug brtan byas nas/ /byin brlabs dbang bskur shis byas la/ /mchod dbul bstod cing gsol ba btab/ /grangs
276b3(rgyud 'grel): kyi bzlas brjod rdzogs pa dang/ /tshogs bsags bsrung ba la rbod gdon/ /sgrub pos gzungs bzlas mchod par bya/ /sbyor ba'i dkyil 'khor gsal rdzogs pas/ /chas gos rgyan chas rdzas bsag cing/ /rdo rje 'khrul 'khor sngags kyi mthus/ /phyi
276b4(rgyud 'grel): rol dgra bgegs bdud dpung tshogs/ /nyon mongs rnam rtog nang gi las/ /kun sbyor phyag rgya 'phrul 'khor sngags/ /bsam gtan rigs kyi cho ga ltar/ /yang dag brtson pa mthu yis 'jig/ /sa chu me rlung 'byung tshogs 'khrug /thams cad zhi
276b5(rgyud 'grel): ba'i gnas su 'gyur/ /las mchog khro bo'i sbyor bcas pas/ /gtor ma gos dang mar me zas/ /yungs kar thal chen sngags kyi mthus/ /bgegs la bka' bsgo bskrad par bya/ /zhag bdun la sogs dus kyi mthar/ /sAg pa'i gzugs
276b6(rgyud 'grel): brnyan 'byung zhing sbrang/ /me dang chu yis shis byas te/ /phyi nang las bzhin dag pa'i phyir/ /ming rus dag la gtan bzhag cing/ /sngags kyi chu yis khrus byas te/ /dri mchog me tog bzang ldan dang/ /gsang sngags 'khor las gnas kun
276b7(rgyud 'grel): brgyan/ /dbang po'i sgo rnams byin brlabs nas/ /gos byas phreng ba gdags par bya/ /dkyil 'khor gnas su rim pa bzhin/ /'jug pa'i cho ga tshul bzhin du/ /gsang ba'i sngags blo ldan pa yis/ /rol mchod rdzas cho ga rdzogs/ /dkyil 'khor
277a1(rgyud 'grel): chen por rigs dbang sogs/ /bya ba'i cho ga skabs kyi don/ /'khor lo rdzogs pa'i gnas brtsams pas/ /bsreg khang rigs mchog pho brang du/ /ma lus dkyil 'khor gnyis med rdzogs/ /ye shes dkyil 'khor dgug gzhug
277a2(rgyud 'grel): bstim/ /rnal 'byor grogs sogs rgyan bcas pas/ /bza' btung rgyan dang bsgo ba rnams/ /byin brlabs rim gyi lhar gsal zhing/ /phyi nang gsang ba'i mchod chen dbul/ /las sngags mdza' rgyan 'brel ba'i mthus/ /stong gsum 'gro gnas
277a3(rgyud 'grel): sbyang bar bya/ /me lha mnyes pas las rdzogs te/ /dngos grub 'dod don gsol ba gdab/ /mnyam nyid mi g.yos bstod byas nas/ /smon lam rgya mtsho don mthar dbyung/ /dkyil 'khor rnam gsum rdzogs byas pas/ /bde chen byang chub sems
277a4(rgyud 'grel): nyid sku/ /sngags kyis dag po'i sku gdung rnams/ /sku gsung thugs ldan phyag rgya che/ /bskal par mi gnas phyag rgya rdzogs/ /rgyan tshogs mchod pas mnyes par bya/ /rdo rje sems dpa' dpal sbyor ba/ /ji ltar gzugs dang dbyibs ldan
277a5(rgyud 'grel): pas/ /dur khrod lha'i gnas rnams dang/ /ma mo'i gnas kyi thal ba mchog /thams cad bral ba'i bsrung ba ni/ /thig le 'am so so'i ris gsum bya/ /phyogs mtshams nam mkha' sa bcings na/ /bsrung ba kun gyi bla med pa'o/ /rgya mtshor 'bab
277a6(rgyud 'grel): ba'i chu yis 'gram/ /lha rdzas zhi ba'i chu mchog gis/ /gtor ba dang ni blugs pa dang/ /khrus byas pa dang phog pa yis/ /phyogs mtshams nam mkha' sa bcings na/ /bsrung ba kun gyi bla med pa'o/ /mi yi thod pa'i nang du ni/ /yungs kar bskyed
277a7(rgyud 'grel): nas blang bar bya/ /bza' btung lus la byug pa dang/ /phyogs bcur gtor bas bsrung bar 'gyur/ /dpa' bo gcig pa'i rten rnams kyis/ /sbyor ba gsum ldan bsrung ba'i mchog /de bzhin dkyil 'khor rgyas pas kyang/ /thams cad rgyas
277b1(rgyud 'grel): 'debs rdo sems mchog /sangs rgyas kun bdag sbyor ldan pas/ /phyogs bcu legs pa'i 'khor lo'i tshul/ /bla dang 'og tu byin brlabs nas/ /bsrungs pas sangs rgyas kun dgongs 'gyur/ /he ru dpal gyi rnam 'phrul bas/ /thams cad kun tu kun
277b2(rgyud 'grel): gyi bdag /thams cad bsrung ba mi 'gyur che/ /mi mthun gdon sogs mod la zhi/ /sna tshogs padmo kha 'byed pas/ /sgrib pa med par 'grub par 'gyur/ /'bar bas blta ba'i tshul bzhugs na/ /rdo rje 'bar ba mi bzad 'grub/ rdo rje khu tshur gnyis
277b3(rgyud 'grel): bcings nas/ /go cha bgo ba'i tshul du bya/ /'di yis bsrung bar byas nas ni/ /rdo rje sems dpa' dpal dang 'dra/ /mi chod pa dang mi phyed pa'i/ /rdo rje'i sku ni rab tu 'grub/ /dus rnams kun tu 'gro gzhan dag /bsod nams tshe 'phel longs spyod
277b4(rgyud 'grel): tshigs/ /'khrul 'khor phyag rgya sngags kyi mthus/ /bde gshegs 'khor lo sgyur rgyal stobs/ /lha dbang klu yis dbang sogs kyis/ /'dod yon rin chen gter sogs dpal/ /lang tshe tshe dbang nad med bde/ /yon tan rgyas pa'i tshogs 'phel 'gyur
277b5(rgyud 'grel): 'khor lo rtsibs brgyad rin chen 'phreng/ /mu khyud yi ge'i phreng bas mdzes/ /rigs mchog lha'i mtshan ma sngags/ /dkyil 'khor rgyas pa'i tshul du dgod/ /bsam bya bris shing bkod pa dag /byin brlabs brtan par 'gyur med gnas/ chos sems
277b6(rgyud 'grel): pa yi tshul ston cing/ /rdo rje khu tshur gnyis dag dang/ /zhi sogs lta bas bltas na ni/ /rims du gnad kun rnam par sel/ /rdo rje khu tshur gnyis bcings nas/ /mthe'u chung lcags kyu lta bur spel/ /mdzub mo bsnyams pa'i rtse mo mnan/ /nang rnams
277b7(rgyud 'grel): thams cad bzlog par byed/ /yongs su gyur te bteg nas su/ /dpral bar legs par bzhag par bya/ /ma lus lus pa med pa yis/ /sdug bsngal thams cad sel bar byed/ /rdo rje bsdams pa byas pa las/ /mdzub mo phan tshun mngon phyogs pa/ /zug rngu kun las
278a1(rgyud 'grel): grol 'gyur zhing/ /nad rnams kun gyis gnod pa med/ /grub pa dpal gyis spyan bcings nas/ /de yis phyis mig longs pas mthong/ /sbyor ldan khu tshur dam pa yis/ /slang nas kha nas drangs te btung/ /de bzhin rims
278a2(rgyud 'grel): gnod dug rnams kun/ /sbyor ldan khu tshur tshul gyis btung/ /oM sarba ta thA ga? ta mis ho/ /'di ni rna par bzlas pa'i mchog /zug rngu med cing 'bar ba'i mchog/ /lag g.yas sems dpa' i gtsug tor
278a3(rgyud 'grel): bcing/ /byis pa nad med bde bar bsrung/ /g.yas pa klu'i mgo'i gdengs ka brgya/ /'bar ba'i tshul ston 'bebs bcas pas/ /dug gi las rnams 'dul byed de/ /'chi ba'ang 'tsho bar byed pa'i mchog /g.yas pa'i mthe bo gung mo gnyis/ g.yon
278a4(rgyud 'grel): pa'i khu tshur bcings pa yi/ /gung mo la ni reg byas te/ /gdon rnams kun las thar bar 'gyur/ /ba dan gsum po gnyis bcings nas/ /gung mo gnyis ni mdud par bcings/ /mdzub mo mthe'u chung rtse mo can/ /rdo rje'i phyag rgya yongs bsgyur
278a5(rgyud 'grel): bteg /smin mtshams bzhag pas mkha' 'gro yi/ /las rnams ma lus lus med 'grub/ /sbyor ba sngags dang phyag rgya'i mthus/ /glang po rta gya 'gro ba'i tshogs/ /skyed tshal me tog ldum ra rnams/ thams cad gos ba bla na med/ /thams
278a6(rgyud 'grel): cad bdag nyid kun sbyong ba'i/ /gnas gsum 'khrul 'khor bsdu ba'i rgya/ /thun mong khams gsum las las byung/ /dus 'dir dngos grub las tshogs 'joms/ /mchog gi phyag rgya ye shes sku/ /'dod don 'bras bu 'di sbyor dpal//
278a7(rgyud 'grel): chags pa gnyis tshul longs spyad pas/ /'bras bzang mdzad pa chen po 'grub/ /khu tshur snying gar bcings pa ni/ /bud med phyag rgyar de bshad de/ /bud med sbyor ba ma lus pa/ /lus pa med pa thams cad 'grub/ /g.yon pa 'gying pa'i
278b1(rgyud 'grel): tshul du byas/ /lag g.yas bdag gi snying gar ni/ /gyen du drang pa'i tshul byas nas/ /bud med thams cad dbang du gyur/ /dpal ldan pad+ma sna tshogs 'dzin/ /g.yon pa brdeg pa'i khu tshur dang/ /g.yas pa spang ba 'grub pa dang/ /sangs rgyas dbang
278b2(rgyud 'grel): phyug ting 'dzin bya/ /g.yon pa dril bu sgra sgrogs shing/ /g.yas pa yi ni lag pa yis/ /rdo rje gyen du gsor zhing bskor/ /sgyu ma thams cad dbyung bar bya/ /lag pa g.yon pa bla ma bzhag /lag pa g.yas pa'i mdzub mo yis/ /sbyor ba sngags
278b3(rgyud 'grel): kyi mdangs bcas pa/ /mi dge'i las rnams sel bar byed/ /bdag gi snying gar 'dren tshul du/ /g.yon pa nor bu rin chen 'dzin/ /g.yas nas de rdzogs rin chen bdun/ /bsam pa thams cad yongs rdzogs byed/ /bdag gi snying gar 'dren tshul
278b4(rgyud 'grel): du/ pad+ma sna tshogs pa yi 'dzin/ /g.yas pa rdo rje 'gying ba yis/ /dbang phyug dam pa thob par 'gyur ro/ /drag po las kyi bdul mdzad pa'i/ /mtshon cha gsang sngags spu gri'i 'os/ /gnod gdug phyi nang dgra bgegs sogs/ /ral? bar gyur
278b5(rgyud 'grel): pa'ang ? 'bar? byed/ /mtshon cha lnga yi phyag rgya yis/ /khams gsum 'dul byed rgyal bar gyur/ /dbyibs dang bde glag sbyor ba dang/ /kun tu sbyor dang 'dren dang myur/ /'gengs dang 'phen dang gsal ba yis/ /phrag po'i las rnams kun la
278b6(rgyud 'grel): sbyor 'drag shul sbyor bas gnon pa'i?/ /'khral 'khor sbyong ba sngags ldan pas/ /rkang pa brkyang dang gnod pa dang/ /bskums nas 'debs pa'i stabs dag gis/ /g.yas g.yon sbyor ba'i phyag rgya ches/ /gzugs rnams thams cad mnan
278b7(rgyud 'grel): par bya/ /sdig med stobs kyis ngo mngon du/ /rigs kyi dkyil 'khor rgyu 'bras dang/ /byang chub pha rol phyin sogs dang/ /lha chen tshogs bcas mnan byas te/ /dga' sdug lha mo'i tshogs bcas dang/ /yon tan longs spyod spyad par bya'o//
279a1(rgyud 'grel): rdo rje snying po gzhan 'joms byed/ /phyir bzlog rnam par rgyal ba'i mthus/ /'khor lo sngags phreng phyag rgya dang/ /sbyor ba kun gyis spro byed pas/ /nyam pa lag dang bde phyogs dang/ /thad ka de bzhin gyen du 'degs/ /'di
279a2(rgyud 'grel): dag bzlog pa'i phyag rgya ste/ /gnas gsum dag ni bzlog par bya/ /mar me bdud rtsi rdzas rnams kyis/ /dngos grub blangs nas lha rnams la/ /mchod bstod rta rag bro gar dang/ /dga' ba'i 'gying bcas blang bar bya/ /smin ma mig dang
279a3(rgyud 'grel): so dang mchu/ /kha dang lus dang rkang lag gis/ /cha lugs bzhin du gar byed pas/ /phyag rgya yongs su grol ba yis/ /dkyil 'khor rgyas pa la dmigs nas/ /ye shes dkyil 'khor rim pa bzhin/ /rdzogs par phyung ste mdun bzhag
279a4(rgyud 'grel): nas/ /rim bzhin mchod bstod gshegs su gsol/ /phyag rgya sngags bcas tshigs bcad kyis/ /dgyes shing brtan par 'gro la gzigs/ /phyi rol ra ba rten gnas bcas/ /dam tshig dkyil 'khor rim bzhin bsdu/ /slar nyid bde ba chen
279a5(rgyud 'grel): po'i sku/ /thams cad phyag rgya yab yum gnas/ /dpal ldan g.yon pa 'gying dang bcas/ /dpal ldan lag pa g.yas pa yis/ /padmo khu tshur dpral bar bzhag /bdag gi mig ni gyen du lta/ /kaM haM rin chen rgya gram gnyis/ /spyi bo snying
279a6(rgyud 'grel): ga'i gnas rnams spro/ /oM TuM rdo rje khu tshur gyis/ /go cha bgos pa bcing bar bya/ /spyi bo dang ni dpral ba gnyis/ /glo gnyis dang ni rgyab tu gnyis/ /rdo rje phreng bas bcings pa dang/ /sangs rgyas gtsug gi nor bu ngag /dar dbyangs tshul du bcings
279a7(rgyud 'grel): na ni/ /bsgyings dang bcas pas mdza' nas dgrol/ /dar dpyangs dkar dmar bzhi 'phur zhing/ /thal mo brdabs pas brtan par bya/ /rdzas rnams legs par bskol nas kyang/ /rdul tshon chu bo chen por dor/ /ba yi rnam lngas legs byug
279b1(rgyud 'grel): cing/ /mchod rdzas rten sogs ci mang sped/ /khro bo mchod bstod phur ba bton/ /bdud rtsis khrus gsol gzi byin bskyed/ /phyogs skyong rgyal po gsol bskyed cing/ /mnyes byas zhi sems gshegs su gsol/ /rang gi lha yi sbyor ldan pas/ /rigs kyi
279b2(rgyud 'grel): dkyil 'khor bkang byas te/ /brda'i mtshams la sogs pa dgrol/ /srung ma tshogs mchod btang rag gtang/ /spyod lam ma nyams dkyil 'khor blos/ /mdzad spyod tshogs chen gnyis su brtag /bkra shis rgya chen gdon bya zhing/ /pha rol phyin
279b3(rgyud 'grel): sogs mchod sbyin bsgrags/ /mtshan rtag bdud rnams 'joms mdzad cing/ /bsnyen sgrub kun gyi don gsal sbyor/ /tshogs dbang dkyil 'khor las la mkhas/ /dngos grub gdeng ldan rgyal po bzhi/ /sku gsung thugs lam ma nyams
279b4(rgyud 'grel): par/ /dus kun rgyan bzlas rgyun sprel zhing/ /dngos kun sbyor ba'i las kun mkhas/ /gong ma'i gtsang 'tshang rgyal 'theb las/ /mtshams bcad bskang gso'i dngos sbyang bshams/ /gtor dang las brtson mkha' 'gro bskang/ /bar
279b5(rgyud 'grel): skabs dkyil 'khor dbyigs so mchod/ /thun mtshams bzlas brjod las rdo rje/ /spyan yangs lha gsal gsang sngags gdon/ /gus pas rtag tu lha mnyes brtson/ /grogs kyis bsgo ba'i las sbyin spyod/ /rtog bral gzungs thub phyag
279b6(rgyud 'grel): rgya gsal/ /nges don zab mo'i gsang ba mchog /rims sam yang na cig car du/ /mchog gi rnal 'byor sbyangs pa'i mthus/ /tshe 'dis bde gshegs yul la sbyor/ /dka' ba kun gyis ma rnyed pa'i/ /dam pa'i nor bu rin po che/ /gang gis
279b7(rgyud 'grel): drin gyis bdag las rnyed/ /ya mtshan rmad 'byung ston pa'i gnas/ /sangs rgyas thams cad mnyam sbyor ba/ /rnal 'byor dbang phyug bde chen po/ /'di la khrus dang bsdam mi dgos/ /dka' thub dka' bar spyad mi dgos/ /dka' thub sdom pa
280a1(rgyud 'grel): med pa dang/ /bde ba dang ni dga' bas 'grub/ /de bas ji ltar 'dod spyod cing/ /kun za de bzhin thams cad spyod/ /spyod pa ci dag 'dod par byed/ /g.yo ba dag kyang ci dgar byed/ /langs pa dang ni 'dug pa dang/ /'chag
280a2(rgyud 'grel): gam ji ltar gnas kyang rung/ /rgod dam rab tu smra ba dang/ /gang la ji ltar spyod kyang rung/ /dkyil 'khor du yang ma zhugs pa'ang/ /sgrib pa kun dang ldan pa yang/ /rang gi ltar ni bdag sbyor na/ /bsod nams chung yang 'grub
280a3(rgyud 'grel): par 'gyur/ /de nyid rnal 'byor 'di yis ni/ /thams cad 'grub par byin rlabs pas/ /ngan zos ngan spyod thams cad kyis/ /nyes pa dag tu yang mi 'gyur/ /bud med kun gyi rgyu ma'i rgya/ /'di ni gnyis med theg pa'i mchog /sgyu ma
280a4(rgyud 'grel): dag ni thams cad pas/ /bud med sgyu ma khyad par che/ /ngo bo nyid kyi mthu dag dang/ /rang bzhin gyis ni de 'grub pa'o/ /'jig rten gsum 'dir bud med 'dis/ /gus par byed pa dag tu 'gyur/ /chags med chags dang bral ba
280a5(rgyud 'grel): min/ /dbu mar yang ni mi dmigs so/ /thams cad ma lus phyag rgya yi/ /thams cad ma lus bde mchog yin/ /byang chub sems ni rdo rje ste/ /sangs rgyas kun gyi bdag nyid yin/ /bde bas thams cad bdag sbyor bas/ /sangs
280a6(rgyud 'grel): rgyas thams cad thob par 'gyur/ /rdo rje sems dpa' bdag sbyor bas/ /dbab pa thams cad rab tu 'grub/ /sangs rgyas thams cad mnyam sbyor ba/ /rnal 'byor dbang phyug bde ba'i mchog /de bas bde ba nyid kyi phyir/ /sangs
280a7(rgyud 'grel): rgyas bde ba kun thob bo/ /kun tu kun nas thams cad ni/ /bdag nyid rtag tu rnam pa kun/ /sangs rgyas la sogs brtan g.yo kun/ /kun gyi dngos por bdag gyur to/ /sems dang sems dpa' i ting 'dzin dang/ /byang chub spyod pa sna tshogs nyid//
280b1(rgyud 'grel): de bzhin bdud dang bdud las rgyal/ /de ni byang chub sangs rgyas yin/ /rdo rje rdo rje 'dzin nyid dang/ /de bzhin pad+ma pad+ma 'chang/ /nor bu nor bu 'dzin nyid dang/ /de dag gi yang rigs yin no/ /dngos grub rlabs chen phrin la sogs/ /grangs med rgya chen don
280b2(rgyud 'grel): spyod pas/ /bdag gzhan bya ba kun rdzogs par/ /ye shes 'khor lo'i tshogs chen so/ /rnal 'byor chen po'i don gsal 'grub/ /mchog gi bsnyen sgrub phyag rgya bzhi/ /zung 'jug gnyis med rdzogs pa'i mthus/ /dngos grub rgya chen
280b3(rgyud 'grel): zab mo mtshan/ /lha mo kun dang mnyam sbyor ba/ /skal bzang mchog ni 'dod pa ste/ /yang dag sbyor ba bde myong ba/ /'dod chags ther zug brtan pa can/ /sangs rgyas kun gyi gzugs chen dang/ /dbyangs dang dri dang ro dag kyang/ /sangs rgyas
280b4(rgyud 'grel): kun gyi reg bya'i mchog /bdag gi spyad par de spyod do/ /dkyil 'khor rgya chen brtan pa'i zlos/ rigs mchog mnyes pa'i tshul la spyad/ /cung zad sbyor ba klog pa na/ /sgo gsum bsod nams tshogs 'gyur pa'i/ /pha rol phyin drug smon
280b5(rgyud 'grel): lam sogs/ /'gro don spyod pa rgya chen brtsam/ /sangs rgyas kun gyi bdag nyid kyi/ /ra sa ya nI bde ba 'dis/ /rdo rje sems dpa' i dpal tsho dang/ /lang tsho nad med bde mchog grub/ /kun tu kun nas thams cad du/ /sangs rgyas thams cad
280b6(rgyud 'grel): mnyam sbyor ba/ /mkha' 'gro sgyu ma bde ba'i mchog /rtag tu de ni 'grub par 'gyur/ /'di yis sangs rgyas thams cad dang/ /dpa' bo rnams dang thams cad dang/ /rdo rje 'dzin pa thams cad du/ /tshe 'di nyid la 'grub par 'gyur/ /bdag
280b7(rgyud 'grel): don mi gnas mya ngan 'das/ /rigs drug dkyil 'khor rgya chen dang/ /gzhan don 'jig rten bde longs spyod/ /lha chen kun gyi rgyal srid tshogs/ /thams cad dmar mdzad dbang bsgyur zhing/ /'dod don gzhan la sbyin par mdzad/ /sangs
281a1(rgyud 'grel): rgyas byang chub sems dpa' yang/ /phrogs nas kyang ni sbyin mdzad na/ /las mchog dag ni rab 'byams dang/ /dngos grub gzhan lta smos ci dgos/ /mdzad spyod mdza' yas sngags tshul dag /las dang 'bras bu'i rjes
281a2(rgyud 'grel): 'gro byed/ /yan lag bzhi'i don snang ba/ /'jug byed bzhi las 'bras bu'i tshul/ /rten gyi sgrub po snang ba bzhi/ /bsnyen sgrub phyag rgya lam rim dang/ /sa yi khyad par dngos grub 'bras/ /phrin las bzhi snang bcu drug tshogs/ /gsang
281a3(rgyud 'grel): ba bla na med pa'i tshul/ /sum cu rtsa gnyis brgya nyi shu/ /rtsa brgyad yang dag grub pa'i gzhung/ /sgrub gzhung rgyas 'bring bsdus pa dang/ /shin tu bsdus pa'i ngang tshul can/ /go rims gnas skabs dbye bar shes/ /thog mar sgrub blo phun
281a4(rgyud 'grel): tshogs pas/ /rten gyi yan lag bzhi ldan 'jug /tshogs bsag rnal 'byor sbyor rnal 'byor/ /mthong gsal rnal 'byor brtan rnal 'byor/ /rim bzhin goms pa gsal ba'i sgo/ /dang por sbyor dang brtan pa dang/ /yang dag ye shes
281a5(rgyud 'grel): rnam par grol/ /mtshan ma rtags kyis goms byas pa'i/ /bcu drug 'jug pa'i bye brag gis/ /theg chen nyes don zung sdud sbyor/ /'gro drug rang rgyud brtags pa'i tshul/ /theg dman snang ba phyogs gcig pa/ /blo gros zab mo rgya
281a6(rgyud 'grel): chen don/ /nges 'byung zung 'jug mang po'i sgo/ /snang ba tshul mthun khyad par can/ /rnam pa'i chags gsal mdza' yas grol/ /nyams myong rim gyis zhen chags bral/ /snang ba bzhi las bcu drug tshogs/ /bdag nyid gzhan tshogs
281a7(rgyud 'grel): gnyis kar 'brel/ /chags sdang btang snyoms tshul gyis 'jug /sdug bsngal kun 'byung 'gog lam dang/ /rten 'brel rgyu 'bras bzlog pa'i tshul/ /bden gnyis rnam shes bden brdzun brtag /sgyu ma gnyis su med pa'i dngos/ /dkyil
281b1(rgyud 'grel): 'khor chu zla 'od gsal sku/ /zung 'jug bde ba chen po'i dbyings/ /sku gsum mdzad pa mdzad pa yis/ /theg pa'i snang ba ma 'gags pa'o/ /bsnyen pa las la sbyor byas nas/ /nye bsnyen gsal bar gyur pa las/ /sgrub pa snga ma'i gnas
281b2(rgyud 'grel): 'gyur te/ /sgrub pa chen 'bras bu la spyod pa'o/ /rim 'jug bsnyen sgrub bcu gnyis kyis/ /dkyil 'khor rgya chen gnas sbyor zhing/ /zung 'jug bsnyen sgrub yan lag bzhis/ /zab mo'i dkyil 'khor gsal bar snang/ /tshad med phyag rgya
281b3(rgyud 'grel): dman pa'i rgya/ /gsang ba'i phyag rgya mchog gi rgyas/ /gsal 'debs rgyal po mchog gi sku/ /bzhi yi bcu drug rdzogs byed pa'o/ /dang po sku gsal brtan pa dang/ /dam tshig ye shes gnyis med mnyes/ /sku gsung thugs mchog
281b4(rgyud 'grel): byin brlabs mthu/ /bde gshegs rigs mchog ye shes sbyor/ /thabs kyis rgya che lam bgrod cing/ /shes rab zab mo'i lam la 'jug /zung du 'brel bas phyag rgya'i lam/ /gnyis med bgrod pa'i lam mchog yin/ /rgyu rkyen gnyis
281b5(rgyud 'grel): med tshogs gnyis rdzogs/ /tshul bzhis bcu drug lam du 'gyur/ /tshogs drug rnam par sbyor ba yis/ /yon tan tshogs rdzogs don gsal sa/ /rigs 'dzin sangs rgyas sa yi mthar/ /bzhi las bdun drug brgyad du snang/ /rgyu
281b6(rgyud 'grel): 'bras dbye bas bcu drug tshogs/ /rim sbyar cig car thob pa'i tshul/ /mos spyod lam la sbyor ba dang/ /sar chud las la spyod pa dang/ /rnam smin phyag rgya chen po dang/ /bya ba mthar phyin sangs rgyas sa/ /tshe 'dis rig 'dzin gnas sbyor
281b7(rgyud 'grel): zhing/ /de nas sangs rgyas sa drug rdzogs/ /'jig rten thun mong bdag don dang/ /gzhan don mchog 'gyur dngos grub bzang/ /bdag gzhan las snang sgo bzhi nas/ /bcu drug tshogs la longs spyod mdzad/ /mkha' 'gro tshogs med
282a1(rgyud 'grel): stobs ldan zhing/ /mi mthun rkyen gyis 'jigs pa med/ /ral gri mig sman rkang mgyogs bum/ /bdud rtsi'i bcud len rig 'dzin gser/ /sku gsung thugs sogs mi 'jigs stobs/ /phra zhing khyab mdzad
282a2(rgyud 'grel): dpal gyi gzhi/ /kun tu brten pas bdag gzhan don/ /zhi rgyas dbang dang mngon spyod rdzogs/ /phrin las bzhi spyod bcu drug tshogs/ /'bad pa med pa'i tshul gyis 'grub/ /mnyes shing srung mdzad btang dang grol/ /
282a3(rgyud 'grel): gso ba stobs 'phel rgyal byed brtan/ /dgug cing rengs shing rmongs pa dang/ /dbye mnan bskrad dang pham phyed pa'o/ /dam pas rgyud don rgya chen tshogs/ /pad mdzes nyi mas rgyas ltar byas/ /bde mchog mkha' 'gro'i
282a4(rgyud 'grel): don bstan las/ /khyad par lhag pa gzhan du med/ /de nyid cung zhig gsal ba'i phyir/ /tshul 'jug dam pa'i rjes 'brang ste/ /rtogs par sla don mdza' gnyis bral/ /mkha' 'gro'i tshogs rnams bzod par mdzod/ /kun
282a5(rgyud 'grel): mchog rgya chen dri med dge /ston ka'i zla gsal sgrib brel ltar/ /'gro kun sangs rgyas thams cad dang/ /mnyam par sbyor ba'i gnas thob shog /yan lag bzhi'i don snang bar byed pa zhes bya ba slob dpon mkhas shing dngos
282a6(rgyud 'grel): grub mnyes pa hUM mdzad grags pas mdzad pa rdzogs so// //mda' bdag gtsan po byang chub sems dpa' i bkas/ dpal bsam yas kyi 'ching phu ru dkyil 'khor chen po'i slob dpon paN+Di ta dpal
282a7(rgyud 'grel): rdo rje bzhad pa dang/ sgra bsgyur gyi lo tsa ba chen po rma rin chen mchog gis dbang sgrub dang bcas par bsgyur cing bshad nas/ gtan la phab pa'o// // !/ /sangs rgyas thams cad mnyam la sbyor ba'i dkyil 'khor sgrub pa'i rim pa bzhugs so//
282b1(rgyud 'grel): rgya gar skad du/ sh+rI sarba bud+d+ha sa ma yo gi maN+Da la sA d+ha na kra ma nA ma/ bod skad du/ dpal sangs rgyas thams cad mnyam par sbyor ba'i dkyil 'khor sgrub pa'i rim pa zhes bya ba/ dpal rdo rje sems dpa' la phyag 'tshal lo
282b2(rgyud 'grel): ma 'gags rnam 'phrul ye shes chen po'i 'od/ /zab cing rgya che gsungs dbyangs sna tshogs sgrogs/ /yon tan rgyan gyis cho 'phrul bshad mthar phyin/ /rigs drug lha mo'i tshogs bcas rgyal gyur cig /theg chen gsang ba'i laM
282b3(rgyud 'grel): mchog gsal mdzad pa'i/ /sangs rgyas gnyis pas nges pa'i dgongs mdzad 'grol/ /'khor 'das ma spangs las sgrol rgyal chen po/ /rim bzhin brgyud pa'i dam pa rnams la 'dud/ /rgyud mchog sangs rgyas kun gyi gsang mdzod las//
282b4(rgyud 'grel): dkyil 'khor chen po'i las la rim pa dag /legs bsdus rnam 'grel sogs kyis gnas byas kyang/ /phyag rgya chen po'i sgrub thabs gsal ma bstan/ /dam pas ma 'ongs rnams la brtser dgongs phyir/ /sgrub pa chen po'i yan lag
282b5(rgyud 'grel): don sdus te/ /rgya mtsho rgya chen bdud rtsi thigs pa'i tshul/ /yang dag sgrub don yan lag phyogs gcig bshad/ /dam pa'i gsungs dang brgyud pa mi brten cing/ /dges 'brel yan lag 'thad pa'i sgrub med par/ /rang dgar smos tshig khA
282b6(rgyud 'grel): bzhin smra byed pa/ /gsang don smos phyir log 'dren gtso bor grags/ dgongs pa'i rim pas sgrub don pa bshad kyang/ /tshogs pas las rgyas myur ba'i cho ga yis/ /brten pa'i stobs kyis dus mtshungs grol byed pa/ /khyad par thabs
282b7(rgyud 'grel): kyi dkyil 'khor gsal bstan bshad/ /rgyal ba rnams kyi dgongs mdzad ji bzhin pa'i/ /yang dag sgrub pa'i bsnyen sgrub cho ga las/ /dang po rten gyi mtshan nyid ldan pa yis/ /sgrub pa chen po'i las la 'jug par bya/ /de dag ji bzhin
283a1(rgyud 'grel): legs par spyod pa'i mthus/ /tshe 'di las dang dngos rub phun tshogs gnas/ /rig 'dzin gnas thob sangs rgyas sar 'gro zhing/ /zag med yon tan phrin las go bar ston/ /gang zhig rgyal ba rnams kyi rjes su 'jug
283a2(rgyud 'grel): pa dag gis ni nges pa'i don du bshad pa'i theg pa dag kyang phyag rgya bzhi dang tshad mas bsgrubs te bla ma brgyud pa la brten par bya'o/ /de la dang po rten gyis mtshan nyid ni/ /zhi zhing des la gsong por smra ba dang/ /sgyu sogs med pas
283a3(rgyud 'grel): gzhan don brtson pa dang/ /nga rgyal khro gtum dang bral ba/ /'gro ba kun gyi yid 'ongs zhing/ /dam pa'i bshes gnyen la brten te/ skyabs su 'gro ba dang/ byang chub mchog tu sems bskyed pa dang/ sdom pa blang pa dag bya'o/ /de nas
283a4(rgyud 'grel): theg pa chen po la mos pa'i shugs kyis dad pa dang/ brtson 'grus dang/ yang dag pa'i lta bas shes rab gsum bskyed cing snod kyi rim pa dag gsal bar byas nas rdo rje theg pa la mos pas de nyid kyi bla ma dam pa la brten te/
283a5(rgyud 'grel): dkyil 'khor du 'jug pa dang/ dbang bzhi rim pa bzhin du thob par bya ba dang/ de dag gi dam tshig ji skad bstan pa bzhin du gnas pas 'gro ba thams cad bsgral zhing byang chub kyi lam la dgod par bya ba'i phyir rdo rje theg pa
283a6(rgyud 'grel): las bshad pa'i don bzhin du bdag bsgral bar bya ste/ dad pa la skyon dub med pa dang/ brtson 'grus la thang lhod med pa dang/ lta ba la dbye gsal med pa dang/ spyod pa la 'gro 'theb med pas de bzhin gshegs pa'i spyan sngar
283a7(rgyud 'grel): dam bcas te/ /sgrub pa rim pa'i gdams ngag mnos shing lta bas mtshan nyid dang/ sgom pa'i mtshan nyid dang/ spyod pa'i mtshan nyid dang/ sgrub pa'i mtshan nyid dag the tshom med par nyams su blangs so/ /des bdag dang gzhan dag rjes su
283b1(rgyud 'grel): gzung ba'i phyir gzugs brnyan gyi dkyil 'khor bya ba'i cho ga dang/ dkyil 'khor ji lta ba bzhin shes shing bsgom pa'i ting nge 'dzin dang/ phyag rgya rnam pa bzhi shes pas rgyas gdab pa dang/ sngags rnam pa bzhis dkyil 'khor
283b2(rgyud 'grel): sgrub pa dang/ ye shes kyis lha la sogs pa rnams dgug pa dang/ mchod pa gsum gyi rim pa shes pas lha dang slob dpon mnyes par bya ba dang/ las sna tshogs kyi bya ba la sbyor ba'i cho ga dang/ bdag dang gzhan la sogs pa ma lus
283b3(rgyud 'grel): rnams/ /gang 'dod pa bsrung ba'i cho ga dang/ slar snga ba'i cho ga dang/ gshegs su gsol ba'i cho ga rnams la mkhas shing byang bar byas nas bdud rtsi lnga'i ri bus bcang zhing bsgrub par bya'o/ /de yang rdo rje rgyal po dang/ rgyal 'theb kyis ma
283b4(rgyud 'grel): zin par gyur nas/ gnas dang byang du gzhol zhing phyogs gzhan mtho bar gyur pa nags tshal phun sum tshogs par 'khor ba dang/ /yul dang/ yo byad dang/ rgyan chas phun sum tshogs pa'i sgo nas las la sbyar ro/ /de la gnas ni
283b5(rgyud 'grel): rnal 'byor pa nyid dag shin tu nyams dga' bar gyur pa'i sa gzhi pad+ma 'dra ba las dbus mtho zhing nam mkha' 'khor lo rtsibs brgyad pa ltar mngon pa/ shar dang byang du gzhol zhing phyogs gzhan mtho bar gyur pa nags tshal bzang
283b6(rgyud 'grel): po me tog 'bras bu'i tshogs kyis brgyan cing/ chu rgyun gsal bas mdza' bzhi rgyas pa'i ri 'am/ /ljongs sam/ thang la sogs pa rin po che dang sman 'bras kyis brgyan pa ni shin tu bkra shis par gyur to/ /de las gzhan pa'i
283b7(rgyud 'grel): las phra mo dag sgrub pa la ni rigs so so'i gnas dang mthun par bya'o/ /der shis pa dang mi shis pa'i ltas brtag pa'i phyir sa pus nub tsam du brkos la slar sa des dga' ba 'am dri chu bzang po dang sbyar bas bkang ste/ mnyam par
284a1(rgyud 'grel): bzhag pas rdo rje dril bu bzung zhing rang gi sngags brjod nas mi drag par gom par brgya'i gnas log ste blta bar bya'o/ /de las ma legs pa'i mtshan ma mthong ba dag la ni g.yas g.yon gyi gnas su spho bar
284a2(rgyud 'grel): bya zhing/ pra sren la sogs brtag go /de nas bsod nams kyi tshogs kyis snod dag par bya ba'i phyir/ /sku'i rten gzugs pa dang gsung gi sgra bsgrags pa dang/ /mchod sbyin chen po rgya cher btang zhing/ gtor ma'i tshogs kyis
284a3(rgyud 'grel): mgron rnams tshim par bya'o/ /de nas yang rnam par shes pa'i phyag rgya 'am/ /ye shes kyi phyag rgyas kyang brtags nas shin tu dge bar gyur pa der bslab par bya'o/ /gal te mtshan ma ngan pa lta bu zhig na ni zhi ba dang drag pos
284a4(rgyud 'grel): gdul bar bya zhing de dag gi sbyin sreg la sogs pas 'grub par 'gyur ro/ /yul gyi bdag po rgyal po la sogs pa dag ni bslang pa 'am/ rin gyis nyos pa 'am/ mi snang la ni rang gi lha'i sbyor bas gtor ma gtang ste/ mgron
284a5(rgyud 'grel): rnams tshims nas/ las la bsgo zhing de las khyad par du sa'i lha mo dang/ sa bdag ta pa la'i 'khor rnams la bslangs nas de dag mnyes par bya'o/ /de nas gzhi de dag tu dri chab byin gyis brlabs pa sngags kyis
284a6(rgyud 'grel): gtor zhing/ ting nge 'dzin gsal ba'i 'phro 'dus bdud rtsi dang/ yi ge gsum gyis sbyang ba byas nas dkyil 'khor ji tsam 'dod pa'i rgyar sa gzhi brkos te/ dngos grub 'bring gi don du/ khru ngo dang/ sor bzhi'i tshad du brkos
284a7(rgyud 'grel): pa'i tshad 'phang du brtsig par bya'o/ /de'i dus su rus pa dang/ gseg ma dang/ gyo mo dang/ sol ba dang/ sa ro rnams bsal te dri zhim pa'i chu dang/ sa mnyam 'jim pa sbyin po dang bsres nas brtsigs te/ sman dang/ rin po che
284b1(rgyud 'grel): dang/ dri rnams snying po ru gzhug go /yang chos nyid rnam par dag pa'i don bsam mo/ /oM swa b+hA ba shud+d+ha(rgyud 'grel): sarba d+harma swa b+hA ba shud+d+ho haM zhes brjod de/ /dri'i chus byug par bya'o/ /de nas mchod gtor sna tshogs nye bar sbyang zhing/ rigs kyi nga rgyal dang

284b3(rgyud 'grel): rje sa gzhi dang/ ra ba dang/ gur la me 'od dang bcas par bsam mo/ /de nas sgrub pa po dkyil 'khor gyi dbus su gnas pa la phyogs bzhi/ de'i sngags dang phyag rgya ni/ /sna tshogs rdo rje bcings pa sa la bzhag ste/ oM me de ni badzri b+ha

284b5(rgyud 'grel): thams cad kyis/ /spyod pa'i tshul dang khyad par gyi/ /sa dang pha rol phyin pa dang/ lha mo khyod ni dbang du gyur/ /skyob pa shAkya seng ge yis/ ji ltar bdud kyi sde bcom pa/ /de bzhin bdag gi bdud las ni/ /rgyal bar bya phyir dkyil 'khor bri/ /zhes lan
284b6(rgyud 'grel): gsum gsol ba btab nas/ ji srid 'dam grub pa'i bar du bzhugs su gsol ba dang/ lha mo dgyes nas mdangs phyung ste slar smras pa/ khyed rnams dkyil 'khor chen po bsgrub par gyis shig ces brjod par bsam mo/ /de nas sgrub pa po
284b7(rgyud 'grel): dkyil 'khor gyi dbus su gnas pa la phyogs bzhi'i rnal 'byor pa rgyan gyis brgyan zhing/ /lha mo bzhi'i nga rgyal dang bcas pas gsol ba gdab par bya ste/ /oM byams chen nam mkha' i rigs sbyor ba/ /rdo rje 'dzin rgyal 'jigs pa'i skyabs/ /
285a1(rgyud 'grel): rnam 'byed gsal ba'i chos mchog can/ /yang dag ye shes spyod pa grol/ /a la la la la ho/ /oM snying rje'i gnas mchog dag pa'i dngos/ /mnyam nyid chos kun 'byung ba yis/ /yon tan rin chen mdzod ston pa'i//
285a2(rgyud 'grel): rnam 'phrul chos las rab tu grol/ /a la la la la ho/ /oM dga' ba'i padmo mtshan ldan pa/ /kun rtog dngos gsal chags pa med/ /rdo rje gsang gsum gnas don pa'i/ /brjod 'byung tshigs las 'das pa'o/ /a la la la la
285a3(rgyud 'grel): ho/ /oM btang snyoms gnas ngan dra ba sel/ /phrin las bdag po stobs rdzogs pa/ /bya ba'i ye shes mthar mdzad cing/ /sprul pa'i dkyil 'khor bstan du gsol/ /oM a la la la la ho/ /sangs rgyas thams cad mnyam sbyor ba'i//
285a4(rgyud 'grel): mkha' 'gro sgyu ma'i dkyil 'khor gtso/ /sdig pa thams cad las sgrol zhing/ /bsod nams dngos grub kun 'byung ba'i/ /rgyal ba kun gyi 'byung gnas mchog /mthong dga' thos pas grol byed pa/ /las mchog gsang ba chen po'i

285a6(rgyud 'grel): gnas te/ mig g.yas par ma las byung ba'i nyi ma'i mes thams cad bsreg pa dang/ mig g.yon par a las byung ba'i zla ba'i chus ngag pa dang/ sna'i rtse mo las byung ba'i rlung gis thams cad 'thor zhing phyag gis mtshan cha khrol
285a7(rgyud 'grel): nas spro ba mdzad de/ /oM sum+b+ha ni sum b+ha hUM/ lha klu gnod sbyin 'byung po dang/ /dri za srin po sha za'i tshogs/ /gshin rje ma mo mkha' 'gro bdug /gnod byed drag po ma lus rnams/ /rnam dag sa gzhi 'dir gnas pa/ /srung byed pa yi bdag
285b1(rgyud 'grel): po'i dka' / /thas pa tsam gyis myur du dengs/ /nga yi dka' las 'da' ma byed/ /gang zhig gnas pa'i mthu bo che/ /rdo rje rdo rje kha TwAM gas/ /thal ba'i tshogs bzhin bshig par byed/ /rab 'bar khro bo'i gnas 'joms pa'o/ /rdo rje 'bar ba'i gzugs

285b3(rgyud 'grel): gdab po/ /oM badzra g+ha(rgyud 'grel): g+ha(rgyud 'grel): g+ha ta ya g+ha ta ya/ sarba duSh+TaM phaT/ kI la ya kI la ya/ sarba pA paM phaT/ hUM hUM badzra kI la ya badzra d+ha ro/ /Adz+nyA pa ya ti/ kA ya bAk+tsit+ta badzra kI la hUM phaT/ ces brjod cing/ sum+b+ha ni'i sngags kyis bkug ste/ /dpang ldan gyi
285b4(rgyud 'grel): mtshams btsams nas brtsam par bya'o/ /de nas dpal he ru kar bsgom zhing mkha' 'gro ma brgyad dang bcas pa'i stang stabs kyis thams cad bsrung bar bya'o/ /de nas las kyi rdo rjes phyi rol gyi stegs bu la mchod gtor bshams
285b5(rgyud 'grel): te/ dkon mchog gsum dang por bzhag nas/ tshangs pa dang/ brgya byin la sogs pa'i bsrungs ma rnams dgug cing mchod pa dang/ 'gro ba drug pa gnas pa'i lha srin sde brgyad la cha gcig dbul ba dang/ lan chags kyi bgegs
285b6(rgyud 'grel): rigs rnams la gtor ma sngos nas khyad par gyi gtor ma'i gzhi rgyal po snga bzhi la dbul zhing rten la bzhag ste/ mnga' gsol nas phyi mtshams bcad do/ /de nas stegs bu tshad dang ldan pa legs par brtsig te/ phyogs
285b7(rgyud 'grel): bzhir sbyin sreg gi thab khung bzhi dang/ /mtshams su rta mchog lhag ma'i dkyil 'khor rtsam par bya'o/ /de nas legs par rtsig cing byugs nas pa'i rnam pa lnga dang/ dri zhim po'i spos dang/ sman rnams bsres te byug cing/ /de'i
286a1(rgyud 'grel): steng du bdud rtsi lnga'i chu byin gyis brlabs nas byug go /de nas lha rnams kyi gnas su rig pas thig gdab cing bdud rtsi lngas dbus su thig le gru bzhi pa lha mo nyi shu'i gnas su zlum por byas la/ /de la lha so so'i sngags
286a2(rgyud 'grel): kyis me tog dgram par bya'o/ /de'i rjes su mchod pa'i tshogs dgram zhing/ sbyang ba dang/ bsrung ba dang/ byin gyis brlabs pa dang/ gzhi'i ting nge 'dzin dang/ rten gyi ting nge 'dzin dang/ brten pa'i ting 'dzin gyis rdo rje sems dpa' i
286a3(rgyud 'grel): dkyil 'khor gsal bar byas nas ye shes kyi dkyil 'khor la dmigs pa dang/ mdun gyi dkyil 'khor la dmigs pas mnyes par byas nas bstod cing gsol ba gdab bo/ /de yang pus mo gnyis sa la btsugs te /
286a4(rgyud 'grel): g.yas pas spos thogs la/ g.yon pas dril bu dkrol zhing tshig 'di brjod do/ /thugs rje chen po bcom ldan 'das/ /ma lus sems can don mdzad pa'i/ /rgyal ba'i dkyil 'khor sras dang bcas/ /stobs mchog rgyal
286a5(rgyud 'grel): chen rnams la bstod/ /sangs rgyas thams cad mnyam sbyor ba'i/ /mkha' 'gro sgyu ma'i dkyil 'khor ni/ /mgon gyur las rnams grub pa'i phyir/ /rdo rje bsang ba bdag gis bri/ /brtse bas slob ma rnams phyir dang/ /bdag nyid

286a7(rgyud 'grel): gsang sngags gsang ba'i lha nyid dang/ /'byung tshogs 'jig rten skyong ba dang/ /rdzogs sangs rgyas kyis rjes dga' ba/ /bstan pa dga' ba'i 'gro ba dag /gang dag rdo rje'i spyan ldan pa'i/ /rigs rnams 'dus pa'i dkyil 'khor
286b1(rgyud 'grel): gtso/ /don grub gsang ba bdag gis brtsam/ /rjes su brtse bar nyer dgongs te/ /gnang bar mdzad pa'i 'od lags so/ /zhes lan gsum gsol ba btab nas/ /yang mchod pa cung zad phul te brtan par bzhugs su gsol lo/ /de nas mchod rdzas
286b2(rgyud 'grel): dang/ rnal 'byor pa'i rgyan cha dang/ bum pa dang/ yo byad dang/ las kyi phyag rgya dang/ rnal 'byor pa'i tshogs rnams 'tshogs par byas nas de'i rjes la phrin las rnam pa bzhi 'am/ yang na gang dgos pa'i sbyin bsreg bya'o/ /de nas rnal 'byor
286b3(rgyud 'grel): pa rnams la stan bde ba la gnas te/ dpal rdo rje sems dpa' i sbyor bas lus ngag yid gsum mthu bskyed cing/ bdag dang 'gro ba sbyang ba dang/ dbang po dgug pa dang/ 'phags pa la tshogs bsags pa dang/ sems can thams
286b4(rgyud 'grel): cad la tshogs bsags pa rnams bya'o/ /yang rigs kyi dkyil 'khor bsgom zhing lha tshogs rnams spyan drangs la/ /bdud rtsi byin gyis brlab pa dang/ /tshogs kyi mchod pas nyams pa bskang pa dang/ /gang dag dam tshig ma 'dres pa
286b5(rgyud 'grel): dag ni bsre mnan bya zhing gsar bu dag 'jug pa la ni rigs pa'i dbang lnga dam tshig dang bcas pa bzhin no/ /de nas bsrung ba'i 'khor lo'i sbyor bas mtshams kyi las bya ste/ phur pa dar gyi bcod pan can bcu drug la khro bo chen po
286b6(rgyud 'grel): bcur bskyed cing ye shes kyi khro bo dgug gzhug gnyis su med par byas nas mchod cing bstod do/ /bzlas brjod rdzogs par phul bas mnyes shing brtan par byas nas phyogs skyong gi gzugs la bdug pa'i sems phab ste gdab par
286b7(rgyud 'grel): bya'o/ /de nas gzugs brnyan gyi dkyil 'khor brtsam par bya ba'i phyir rdo rje rnal 'byor gyi sgrub pa po dag rgyan chas phyag rgya'i tshogs dang/ chos gos lnga dang/ srad bu dang/ thal bas mtshan cing rdo rje rgyal mtheb yum dang bcas pas rang
287a1(rgyud 'grel): gi lha gsal bar byas la/ thig skud ras sar pa'i rgyu las byung ba sngags kyis byin gyis brlabs nas skal bar bya ste/ /ring thung ni dkyil 'khor nyis 'gyur la/ sbom phra ni sgo'i nyi shu'i tshang ngo/ /de ltar kha dog lnga'i
287a2(rgyud 'grel): dog pa byas nas rin po che'i snod du bzhag ste/ rigs kyi yi ges lhar bskyed cing sngags kyis byin gyis brlabs nas lha rnams dgug bzhug byas la/ mchod cing bstod nas bsgril bar bya'o/ /oM dI ba ta dri Sh+Ti oM ku sha
287a3(rgyud 'grel): dza(rgyud 'grel): oM badzra sa ma ya su traM mA ti kra hUM/ oM A hUM/ dang po shar nas nub du brkyang ste gdab par bya'o/ /de yang thabs kyi bsang gnas dang/ shes rab kyis gsang ba'i gnas su drangs te/ /oM A(rgyud 'grel): hUM dza dza zhes brjod do/ /
287a4(rgyud 'grel): stobs mchog dpa' bo dgongs su gsol/ /rdo rje thig gi sgra ldan pas/ /nam mkha' i dkyil 'khor legs grub cing/ /'gro ba'i don la bskul bar mdzad/ /oM mahA bo d+hi tsit+ta sarba swa hUM/ zhes brjod cing/ thig skor dang bcas
287a5(rgyud 'grel): pas nam mkha' la btab ste/ dkyil 'khor bkod nas/ bzod sa gzhi la gdab par bya'o/ /de yang dang por shar nas nub tu brkyang ba'i thig go /de'i phyogs mtshams tshad pa'i phyir cha bzhir byas te/ bar mtshams gnyis nas
287a6(rgyud 'grel): phyed kyi tshad kyis ni lho byang du btsal te/ /der thig gnyis btab pa yang phyed kyi tshad kyis ngos bzhi'i thig rtse nas tshad pas mtshams kyi zur bzhi dod par 'gyur ba'o/ /de'i rjes la shar dang nub dang byang dang lho phyogs bzhi
287a7(rgyud 'grel): dag dang/ mtshams bzhir gdab cing/ /de las phyogs bzhi'i rtse mo'i tshad kyi ni cha bzhi'i tshad du 'gyur te/ de dag kyang lo ma gtub pa'i thig gis cha chen sum cu rtsa gnyis la cha la bran du so so'i gzhung bzhin dbye zhing/ de'i
287b1(rgyud 'grel): 'og ma'i he ru ka dang/ rdo rje nyi ma la cha bran gnyis ma phye ba'i snam bu'o/ /ra ba rim pa gsum dang/ khor yug rnams ni cha bran re re'i tshad kyis 'khor lo'i dur khrod dang ni cha bran bzhi'i tshad do/ /de ltar thig gi las rdzogs nas/ /ye shes kyi
287b2(rgyud 'grel): skud pa la mchod cing bstod de/ /slar gshegs su gsol nas/ /lha'i nga rgyal dang ldan pas mig gnyis la zla ba bsam zhing/ /hI zhes brjod nas lta ba byas nas/ rdo rje slong ba'i phyag rgya bcings te/ oM badzra be ga a kra ma hUM/ zhes pas ri
287b3(rgyud 'grel): mo de gdeg par bya'o/ /de nas phyogs thams cad mnyam pa nyid du dmigs nas tshig 'dis dag par bya'o/ /oM thams cad rang bzhin rnam 'phrul mchog /dngos med zhi ba 'od ldan gsol/ /rdo rje 'dzin pa gter chen 'byin/ /dkyil 'khor
287b4(rgyud 'grel): dag par byin gyis rlobs/ /mnyam pa'i sngags blo rnams gsal bas/ /nyes pa'i zug rngu dag par 'gyur/ /zhes brjod cing thams cad lha'i rang bzhin du brtag ste/ des ni cho ga lhag ma dang ma tshang ba kha skong bar byed do/ /de nas cha
287b5(rgyud 'grel): dbye bar bya ste/ phyi rol gru bzhi sgo dang bcas pa la/ /ra ba rim gsum dur khrod kyis brgyan pa/ /dbus su pho brang rim pas phye ba ste/ /dkyil 'khor so so dbyibs bzhin du/ pho brang gi ra ba dang/ mtshams 'byed pa dang/ gsang lam
287b6(rgyud 'grel): gyi phreng ba'o/ /de la tshon gyi cho ga ni/ /rin po che sna 'am/ tshon rtsi gang yang rung ba dag snod lnga'i nang du blugs te/ /phyogs phyogs su bzhag nas yi ge la sogs pa'i lha'i skur bskyed cing/ /ye shes kyi dkyil 'khor bkug ste mchod cing
287b7(rgyud 'grel): bstod nas rang gi gnas su dgram mo/ /oM badzra tsi tra sa ma ya hUM/ /dang po tshon gyi go rims ni lag pa g.yon pas/ dkar po dang/ mthing kha dang/ dmar po dang/ ser po dang/ ljang gu'i rim gyis pany+tsa re khA bris te/ mchod cing thod
288a1(rgyud 'grel): pas btab nas mtshan ma'i ltas brtag go /'di ni chos dbyings rnam par dag /sems can khams ni rab sgrol byed/ /dpal ldan rgyal po che ge mo'i/ /de bzhin gshegs pa kun gyi gnas/ /yang dag bden pa'i byin
288a2(rgyud 'grel): rlabs kyis/ /dkyil 'khor las rnams shis par mdzod/ /ces brjod cing bdeg ste blta bar bya'o/ /de yang thig ni phyi nas gdab cing/ /tshon ni nang nas dgye ste/ dang po rdo rje rgyal mtheb kyis bri zhing/ /phyi nas bde bar pri ste mtho
288a3(rgyud 'grel): zhing drang par bya'o/ /gang zhig re khwa dma' ba dang/ yo ba dang/ chad pa dang/ 'khrul pa dag gis ni mi 'grub po/ /de ltar tshon rtsi lnga'i mchog dag ni dbus su btab ste/ kha dog phyogs kyis phye la/ mu khyud sngon po dag la ni rdo rje dkar po
288a4(rgyud 'grel): 'bri'o/ /dkyil 'khor de'i phreng ba dmar po la rtsibs mtshan ljang gu dang/ gru chad ser po'o/ /gzhan dag kyang so so'i rigs kyis shes par 'gyur ro/ /sgo bzhi ni dkar po dang/ ser po dang/ dmar po dang/ ljang gu'o/ rta babs
288a5(rgyud 'grel): ni kha dog nyi shu rtsa lnga'o/ /pad+ma'i phreng ba ni kha dog sna tshogs pa'o/ /rdo rje'i ra ba ni sngo la dkar po'i phreng bas mdzes pa'i/ /me ri ni dmar ser ro/ /dur khrod ni phyogs kyi mdog go /shing dang zhing skyong ni nag go/ phyogs skyong ba dang
288a6(rgyud 'grel): klu la sogs pa ni rang gi rigs bzhin no/ /'dod 'byung gi gnas ni ser po la phyi'i ra ba ni sngo ngag go /de dag gi gnas rnams su ni rten pa'i mtshan ma gang rung bzhag go /des dkyil 'khor gyi rgyan la sogs pa dag kyang
288a7(rgyud 'grel): byin gyis brlabs te dgod par bya'o/ /gzhan yang mchod pa thams cad kyi phyag rgya zhes pa dang/ mchod pa thams cad kyi gtor ma'i phyag rgya shes pa rdzas dag kyang byin gyis brlabs te bzhag par bya'o/ /de nas dkyil 'khor la
288b1(rgyud 'grel): sogs pa bsrung bar bya zhing sta gon gyi lha rnams kyi gnas su dgod do/ /yang rdo rje rgyal po bzhi'i ting nge 'dzin dang rten gyi ting nge 'dzin dang/ dmigs pa dang po gnyis kyis 'khor mnyes par byas nas gsol ba gdab bo/ /de nas rnal 'byor pho mo
288b2(rgyud 'grel): rgyan dang bcas pas rdo rje dril bu thogs te yi ge brgya pas bskang zhing/ stang stabs dang bcas pas dkyil 'khor la lan bdun du bskor ro/ /de nas rdo rje rgyal po dang/ rgyal mtheb dang/ las kyi phyag rgya dang/ las kyi rdo rje dang/ brda'
288b3(rgyud 'grel): sbyor ba dang/ rdul phyag la sogs pa so sor bye ste/ so sor gdan bshams zhing dgod par bya'o/ /de dag snga ma'i gnas ji lta ba las/ phyis mi 'gyur bar rang rang gi rnal 'byor gyis 'khor cing phyogs kun nas langs te/ ye
288b4(rgyud 'grel): shes kyi dkyil 'khor dag gis byin pa gnas/ /gnas dang dkyil 'khor la sogs pa mnga' gsol lo/ /de nas gsang ba'i theg pa'i 'jug sgo shes pas/ gzhan las dbang par bya ba'i phyir brda' sgo dbye/ tha mal gyi tshig
288b5(rgyud 'grel): sprang zhing/ rdo rje rgyal mtheb kyi sgo nas lus kyi brdal gnas par bya zhing/ phyogs bzhi nas phyag 'tshal zhing gsol ba gdab ste/ sbyor ba'i gar thabs kyis gnas par bya'o/ /gzhan yang dur khrod kyi bdag po la sogs pa gdul ba'i
288b6(rgyud 'grel): phyir dpal he ru ka la sogs pa'i nga rgyal gyi glang po che'i/ stong g.yogs la sogs pas lus mtshan par bya ste/ sngags kyis sbyar zhing byin gyi brlabs nas/ gti mug dag par bya ba dang/ 'dod chags dag par bya ba dang/ nga rgyal
288b7(rgyud 'grel): dag par bya ba'i phyir ni mnabs pa'i rgyal/ /zhe sdang dag par bya ba'i phyir dang/ phrag dog dag par bya ba'i phyir ni gdags pa'i rgyan pa bgo'o/ /thugs rje chen po'i chags pa dang/ byang chub kyi sems dang mi 'bral zhing srid pa gsum
289a1(rgyud 'grel): gdul ba'i phyir ni byug pa'i rgyan pa bgo'o/ /des ni dur khrod dngos po gdul zhing rang gi don ston pa'o/ /de nas phyogs bcu'i sangs rgyas thams cad bdag la bsdus nas dmigs su med pa'i don la gnas pa las/ yang
289a2(rgyud 'grel): sangs rgyas dang byang chub sems dpa' gzhan dag gis bslang bar bsam nas rdo rje sems dpa' i skur bzhengs te 'dir brjod do/ /rgyal ba rigs lnga'i dkyil 'khor na/ /'byung ba lnga yi mtshan nyid las/ /zhi ba'i lha na lhan ne ba'i/ /
289a3(rgyud 'grel): thugs rje 'gro kun de las skyes/ /de tshe sems can thams cad ni/ shin tu khro drag gtum par 'gyur/ /de tshe sems can thams cad ni/ shin tu chags shing zhen par 'gyur/ /de tshe sems can thams cad ni/ shin tu gti mug che bar 'gyur/ /
289a4(rgyud 'grel): de ltar dus gsum brdo ba la/ /zhi bas phan par mi 'gyur te/ /shes rab thabs kyi nyi ma las/ /rnam par rgyal phyir rab tu drag /oM mahA sh+rI he ru ka sa ma ya kro d+ha ha la ha la hUM phaT/ /ces brjod nas/ thams cad gcig tu 'dus pa
289a5(rgyud 'grel): las/ /rngam pa'i sgra sgrog te/ hUM hUM hUM/ phaT phaT phaT/ hUM mi rtag pa'i mtshan nyid brtan pa'i phyir/ /nam mkha' i khro bo za byed cing/ /'jigs pa'i mtshon cha 'od dpung 'khrigs/ /zhal du stong khams ma lus thim/ /zad par byed cing
289a6(rgyud 'grel): stong par byed/ /rgas rgud brlag par byed pa'o/ /glog gi 'khor lo zhes bya ba/ /myur ba'i za byed chen po lngas/ /skye rga na 'chi 'joms byed cing/ /brlag cing zad byed stong par byed/ /rigs chen za byed khros pa'i tshe/ /sku ni sngo
289a7(rgyud 'grel): skya thal ba'i ngang/ /'od zer mang po rab tu 'khrigs/ /ru lu ru lu mang po za/ /'bar ba'i 'kha''gro tshogs bcas pas/ /bsreg cing 'jigs pa 'thor zhing 'khrud/ /gang 'dir bskal pa kun brlag tshe/ /gzhan zhig 'ongs 'jigs
289b1(rgyud 'grel): ma yin te/ za byed khrod pa lnga po yis/ /zhal du stong khams ma lus thim/ /oM bud+d+ha sh+rI he ru ka /sa ma ya kro d+ha/ oM oM ha ha hUM hUM phaT phaT/ dbu la de bzhin gshegs pa'i khro bo smug gnag /phyag na 'khor lo dang 'dzin/ tho ba khrag 'dzin
289b2(rgyud 'grel): pa grangs med pa'i tshogs rnams sprul pa dang bcas par gnas so/ /oM badzra sh+rI he ru ka /sa ma ya kro d+ha/ hUM hUM ru lu phaT/ lag pa g.yas pa la rdo rje khro bo sku mdog sngo skya/ lag na rdo rje rtse lnga pa dang/ kha TwAM ga thogs pa grangs med pa'i
289b3(rgyud 'grel): tshogs sprul pa dang bcas pa'o/ /oM ratna sh+rI he ru ka /sa ma ya kro d+ha/ traM traM he he hUM phaT/ lag pa g.yon pa na rin po che khro bo ser gnag /tri sh+ru la dang/ ral gri thogs pa grangs med pa sprul pa'i tshogs dang bcas par ro/ /oM pad+ma sh+rI
289b4(rgyud 'grel): tri(rgyud 'grel): he ru/ /sa ma ya kro d+ha h+ri na h+rid ha na hUM phaT/ rkang pa g.yon pa la pad+ma'i khro bo dmar nag /phyag na ral gri rtse gsum dang/ gtun shing thogs pa grangs med pa sprul par bcas pa gnas so/ /oM karma sh+rI he ru ka /sa ma ya kro d+ha/
289b5(rgyud 'grel): haM haM rak+Sha hUM phaT/ rkang pa g.yas pa la las kyi khro bo ljang nag /phyag na sna tshogs rdo rje dang/ lcags kyu thogs pa grangs med pa sprul pa dang bcas pa'o/ /oM sh+rI b+hai ra ba hUM ma hUM mahA de ba hUM phaT/ mtshan ma la lha chen po mdog dkar po/
289b6(rgyud 'grel): lag na tri shu la dang/ thod pa thogs pa 'khor dang bcas pa'o/ /oM biShu kampa la tsakra hUM phaT/ snying gar khyab 'jug mthing nag /lag na 'khor lo dang/ thod pa thogs pa 'khor dang bcas pa'o/ /oM rAk+Sha da sha gri ba hUM phaT/ mgrin
289b7(rgyud 'grel): bar srin po'i rgyal po ljang skya/ lag na dgra sna dang/ tho ba thogs pa 'khor dang bcas pa'o/ /oM ma pa sha la hUM phaT/ oM badzra b+hai ra hUM phaT/ brla gnyis la rdo rje 'jigs byed rnam par 'jigs pa ljang skya/ rdo rje rtse gsum dang thod pa
290a1(rgyud 'grel): thogs pa 'khor dang bcas pa'o/ /de dag kun kyang rang rang gi yum dang 'khril ba'i tshul du gnas so/ /lag pa'i sor mo bcu la mche ba can lnga dang/ sder mo can lnga dang/ sngags 'dis bsal bar bya'o/ /oM ma hA d+he
290a2(rgyud 'grel): ki shwA ri bi ka ma ru sha ha ha he he ru lu hUM phaT/ ye shes glog gi dkyil 'khor dang/ 'jigs pa'i khro bo gtum po'i tshogs/ /cir yang gyur pa'i mtshon cha yis/ sdug bsngal gnas rnams rab tu bcom/ /ma rung dur khrod
290a3(rgyud 'grel): gzhig pa'i phyir/ /stong gsum gnas rnams bsgral bar bya/ /'jigs byed drag shul chen po yis/ /khams gsum cig car bsgral nas kyang/ /za byed chen po'i zhal du ni/ /'gro kun yud tsam cig la dren/ /'gro dang mi 'gro'i
290a4(rgyud 'grel): snod bcud 'di/ /'jigs byed khyed lngas kun za na/ /dngos por gyur pa'i bgegs 'di kun/ /ngas bstabs khyed kyi yul la gsol/ /ngan song gsum gyi 'jigs byed du/ /sems can nyon mongs sdang byed pas/ /de phyir nga
290a5(rgyud 'grel): ni rdo rje tshe/ /zhe sdang zhes ni grags pa yin/ /ngan song 'jigs pa chen po ru/ /sems can thams cad rmongs byed pa/ /de phyir nga ni gti mug che/ /rtag tu thub pa mchog yin no/ /srid pa'i 'dod chags myos pa rnams/ /'dod
290a6(rgyud 'grel): chags nyid kyis mtshams sbyor bas/ /de phyir chos kyi rdo rje ni/ /'dod chags chen po'i mchog yin no/ /bde chen sbyin pa'i sprin gyis ni/ /sems can thams cad nga rgyal bskyed/ /nam mkha' bde bas bsdus pa'i phyir/ /bde chen
