290a7(rgyud 'grel): 'dod pa nga yin no/ /ro la sogs pa mnyam sbyor bas/ /phrag dog rdo rje gdon mi za/ /sna tshogs las kyi khro bo'i sku/ /phrag dog chen po'i mchog yin no/ /nga ni dus gsum bzhugs pa yi/ /sangs rgyas kun gyi ye shes sku//
290b1(rgyud 'grel): ye shes rno? dpal mtshon cha yis/ /log rtog 'khor ba'i rgyun gcod do/ /chos nyid mnyam nyid nam mkha' la/ /ye shes glog gi 'od 'phro ba/ /gnas med dmigs pa yod ma yin/ /rtsa ba med cing brten pa med/ /oM da ha da ha sarba na ra ka
290b2(rgyud 'grel): ga te te tu na hUM phaT/ oM pa tsa pa tsa sarba na ra ka ga te he tu na hUM phaT/ oM ma tha ma tha sarba na ra ka ga te he tu na hUM phaT/ oM sarba kle sha ts+tshinda ts+tshinda hUM phaT/ sarba birya tshinda hUM phaT/ sarba birya khaD gats+tshinda ts+tshinda hUM phaT/ oM tri bi shwa mu la ts+tshinda
290b3(rgyud 'grel): ts+tshinda hUM phaT/ dpal chen 'bar ba rgyal ba'i sku/ /rngam brjid khros pa'i cha lugs 'bar/ /gar dgur dur khrod rgyan gyis brgyan/ /shes rab sku dang 'khril sbyor zhing/ /'jo tshul gar mdzad lta bu yi/ /bdud dang srin po 'dul bar mdzad/ /
290b4(rgyud 'grel): ma tang la sogs bgegs byed rnams/ gzugs dang bcas pa'i tshogs bsdus te/ /sra kri ta yi phyag rgya yis/ /nges par gzugs la dbab par bya/ /gzugs brnyan bri la sogs pa la/ /phyag rgya bzhi yis mnyes byas nas/ /sngags
290b5(rgyud 'grel): dang 'od 'phro phyag rgya yis/ /de yi 'khor tshogs bsdu bar bya'o/ /rdo rje lcags kyu'i phyag rgya bcings te gyen du bteg nas/ oM ma hA kaM pa la d+ha ri shwa ya hUM/ A karSha ya hUM dza(rgyud 'grel): zhes brjod cing/ rdo rje gshog pa'i sngags dang phyag rgyas
290b6(rgyud 'grel): zil gyis mnan cing bstim mo/ /'phags pa thams cad bdag la gson/ /'byung po mang po kun nyon cig /stobs chen dpal ldan he ru ka'i/ /rdo rje rnon po 'jam dpal gyi/ /thugs rje dang ni shes rab dang/ /thabs la mkhas pa'i byin
290b7(rgyud 'grel): brlabs kyis/ /bdag dang 'gro ba bsrung bar mdzod/ 'gro ba rnams kyi tshe dang srog /gson po bde bar gcod byed pa'i/ /bdud dang srin po'i 'khor bcas kun/ /bcom zhing gsang ba'i gnyen po ni/ /bde gshegs thugs kyi dngos
291a1(rgyud 'grel): grub mchog /srin gsum thal byed rngam pa des/ /kha TwAM drag pos mi bzad pas/ /bdud dang srin po 'khor bcas dang/ /gshin rje bcom zhing bsad nas ni/ /ro yang lho'i 'dzam gling du/ /bor nas sa gzhir
291a2(rgyud 'grel): gyur pa ni/ /dur khrod chen po brgyad yin no/ /mgo ni lho nub mtshams su bstan/ /rkang pa byang shar mtshams su bstan/ /lag pa g.yas g.yon mtshams su bstan/ /nyams shing 'bod 'grogs rgyal bar 'gyur/ /oM sarba pA pa ka
291a3(rgyud 'grel): ra he ta pa bi shwa ma ta ka ru dra hUM phaT/ oM sarba pA pa ka ra he ta pa bi shwa kha TwAM ga ru dra hUM phaT/ oM sarba pA paM ka ra he ta pa bi shwa A karSha ru dra hUM phaT/ gnas kyi sgo ni su yis bcad/ /sems kyi bdag pos bcad dam ci/ /gzung
291a4(rgyud 'grel): 'dzin rkang pa bsnol ba las/ /yul las 'das pa'i zhabs kyis dbye/ /de nas g.yas su bskor te/ lte ba'i phyogs su e gru gsum gyi sgo phye nas lcags kyu'i phyag rgyas rnam par shes pa drangs te/ oM ma hA po sha phyang zhes/ gnas gsum
291a5(rgyud 'grel): gyi zhing khams gang rung du rigs kyi lhun gyis grub pa'i sras su bya'o/ /de nas khog pa gzhal yas khang du byas te/ /rnal 'byor pa rnams nang du bzhugs nas/ /nang khrol gyi tshogs rnams dug gsum rnam par dag pa 'dod pa'i
291a6(rgyud 'grel): longs spyod kyi mchod par dmigs shing/ /dga' ba'i glu gar dang rol mos mchod par bya'o/ /de nas lha thams cad la bstod cing bskul ba'i phyir rdo rje'i glu blang ste/ /kha TwAM ga la rgyab rten bcas/ /nam mkha' i phyag rgya rnal 'byor
291a7(rgyud 'grel): pas/ /nam mkha' kun las grol ba 'grub/ /dngos po thams cad mkha' byin pa/ /mkha' las sgyu ma kun blangs nas/ /lus pa med par der za'o/ /g+han d+ha ho/ g+han d+ha ho/ g+han d+ha'i sgra yis sgrol bar mdzad/ /la lar mkhas pa'i gzugs
291b1(rgyud 'grel): kyang 'dzin/ /la lar tshangs pa bzhin du zhi/ /la lar gshin rje bzhin du rngam/ /la lar dus mdza' i me ltar 'bar/ /'jig rten khams ni stong dag na/ /mi sdug rigs kyi gzugs 'dzin pa'i/ /mkha' 'gro 'bar ma'i tshogs bcas kyis/ /ma
291b2(rgyud 'grel): lus lus pa med par sgrol/ /zhes so/ /gzhan yang sha khrag rus pa'i tshogs rnams dang/ /za byed kyi tshogs dang/ 'jigs byed kyi zhal tu dbul ba ni/ /stabs su gsol cig he ru ka /gang la bya ba'i dngos po 'di/ /phra men gshed ma khyed rnams
291b3(rgyud 'grel): kyis/ /dbang dang rig sngags byin brlabs te/ /rig sngags kyis ni rmongs mdzad nas/ /drag po las kyis sgrub byed cing/ /'di la sogs pa rnams la yang/ /de dag longs spyod rgyan du 'bul/ /sha dang rkang khrag 'dod pa rnams/ /rig sngags kyis
291b4(rgyud 'grel): ni byin brlabs nas/ /'tsho ba phrogs nas ci bde bar/ /khyed kyis de la longs spyod cig /can dang bcud yangs zab pa na/ /khor yug tos kyi dngos po 'di/ /bdud rtsi'i rang bzhin yin pa'i phyir/ /'jigs byed dka' zlog dgyes shing rol/
291b5(rgyud 'grel): rdo rje gsum dang sku gsung thugs/ /srid gsum 'joms mdzad tri shu rol/ /rdo rje gsum 'bar sku gsung thugs/ /srid gsum 'joms mdzod tri shu la/ /dug gsum rtsad nas bcad pa'i phyir/ /khams gsum cig car bsgral
291b6(rgyud 'grel): bar bya/ /'jigs byed drag shul chen po yis/ /khams gsum cig car bsgral nas kyang/ /za byed chen po'i zhal du ni/ /'gro kun yud tsam cig la 'dren/ /'gro dang mi 'gro'i snod bcud 'di/ /'jig rten khyed lngas kun za na/ /dngos por
291b7(rgyud 'grel): gyur pa'i bgegs 'di kun/ /ngas bstabs khyed kyis yul la bzhes/ /oM ma hA sh+rI he ru ka ha ha ha ha ru lu ru lu/ hUM b+hyo hUM b+hyo khA hi khA hi/ /shar phyogs 'jig rten lam sgo na/ /yang dag thar lam gcod byed pa/ /'byung po gtum
292a1(rgyud 'grel): po nga rgyal can/ /khyod ni sgrib pa kun la sgrib/ /yang dag thar pa ye shes kyi/ /khungs brtag rtsad bcad dag las byung/ /bdag 'dzin bdag gi rtog pa rnams/ /bdag med stong pa'i tho bas gzhom/ /at+mAn hi mahA
292a2(rgyud 'grel): shU n+ya tA badzra swa b+hA ba At+ma ko haM/ /chos kun rtag tu rang gi ngo bos stong/ /rgyal ba'i sras rnams dngos po rnam par 'jigs/ /srid pa ji bzhin yod ye stong pa ste/ /nyi tshe'i stong nyid mu stegs can rnams kyi'o/ /'dod pa'i
292a3(rgyud 'grel): khams stong pa nyid do/ /gzugs kyi khams stong pa nyid do/ /gzugs med pa'i khams stong pa nyid do/ /bdag dang sems can thams cad kyi lus stong pa nyid do/ /dag stong pa nyid do/ /sems stong pa nyid do/ /gang
292a4(rgyud 'grel): dag stong pa nyid mi shes pa/ /de yis mya ngan 'das mi shes/ /de phyir dngos po dngos med pas/ /'jigs pas stong nyid shes par bya/ /chen po stong pa zhes bya ba/ /kun mkhyen ye shes rdzogs byed pa'o/ /de bas rnam pa
292a5(rgyud 'grel): thams cad du/ /stong nyid rjes su dran par bya/ /oM d+harma d+hA tu swa b+hA ba At+ma ko haM/ zhes pas/ mtshan ma'i rtog tshogs kun mi rtog ye shes kyis gzhom par bya'o/ /de nas band+ha mtshan dang ldan pa dag byin gyis brlab cing/ /rang rang gi
292a6(rgyud 'grel): gnas su me mar dang bcas pas dgram pa dang/ dur khrod chen po brgyad dag nas dgod de/ shar du rkang pa g.yas pa'o/ /lhor lag pa g.yas pa'o/ /nub tu lag pa g.yon pa'o/ /byang du rkang pa g.yon pa'o/ /shar lhor dbu
292a7(rgyud 'grel): g.yas pa'o/ /lho nub tu mgo bo'o/ /nub byang du dgu g.yon pa'o/ /byang shar du mtshan ma'o/ /de ltar dug gsum gyi rkyen bsags nas/ /zhing skyong la sogs pa'i gzugs bri bar bya'o/ /gzhan yang dbang sgyur ba chen po'i ting nge
292b1(rgyud 'grel): 'dzin las 'bruM gyi 'phro 'dus gnas byin gyis brlabs pa dang/ /rnal 'byor pa thams cad rang gi ltar bsgom pa dang/ sgrub rdzas thams cad yi ge gsum gyis byin gyis brlabs pa dang/ /lha mo kro d+hi shwa ris byin gyis brlabs pa'i dri
292b2(rgyud 'grel): chab kyis dag par bya ba dang/ bdud rtsi sbyang ba dang/ tshogs kyi zhal zas byin gyis brlab pa rnams sngags dang phyag rgya dang ting nge 'dzin gyis rdzogs par byas nas sgrub pa'i dkyil 'khor gyis so so'i gnas su dgram par bya'o//
292b3(rgyud 'grel): de dag gi ni sgrub pa'i dkyil 'khor gyi sngon du 'gro ba'i yan lag gi cho ga bstan pa yin no/ /da ni bsnyen pa'i cho ga bstan pa'i phyir phyag rgya lngas mtshan cing chos gos lnga bgos te/ 'gro ba'i don du dam bcas nas dpal rdo
292b4(rgyud 'grel): rje sems dpa' i dkyil 'khor la dmigs te/ gzhi'i ting nge 'dzin dang/ rten gyi ting nge 'dzin dang/ brten pa'i ting nge 'dzin dang/ ye shes kyi dkyil 'khor la dmigs pa'i bya ba dang/ mdun gyi dkyil 'khor la dmigs
292b5(rgyud 'grel): pa'i bya ba dang/ las sbyor ba dang/ thun mong gi bzlas brjod dang/ khyad par gyi bzlas brjod dang/ de dag rdzogs nas mtshon cing bstod pa byas la/ /lha rnam la thugs dam bskul bar bya/ /gal te rnal 'byor pa mtshan ma
292b6(rgyud 'grel): thob pa zhig gis 'jug na ni thig le 'am/ phra mo 'am/ rnam par dag pa spyad par bya'o/ /de nas tshogs kyi cho ga dang/ sbyin sreg dang/ lhag pa'i las dag gi bsgom pa dang/ cho ga rdzogs pa'i las la sbyar ro/ /de nas dbang
292b7(rgyud 'grel): bskur ba'i phyir gong du dkyil 'khor du 'jug pa tsam las ma byas pa ngag la ni snga ma'i dus su bar mtshams su bzhag nas rig pa'i dbang nas bskur ba dang/ de bzhin du gang thob pa nas brtsams te/ rdzogs pa'i bar du spyad 
293a1(rgyud 'grel): par bya'o/ /de dag gi rim pa ni 'di ltar yin te/ dang po gong rol du 'jug pa'i cho ga la/ rdo rje rgyal po dang/ rgyal mtheb cho ga rdzogs pas slob ma yongs su sbyongs pa bar khang gi sgo mtshams su maN+Dal bshams
293a2(rgyud 'grel): pa la bzhag ste/ byang gi sgo drung na gnas pa'i bum pas bsangs nas rigs kyi lha mchod cing gsol ba btab nas shis par bya'o/ /de nas dmar po 'am/ dkar po dag la/ /A(rgyud 'grel): khaM bI ra hUM hUM/ zhes bya bas byin gyis
293a3(rgyud 'grel): brlabs nas gdong g.yogs te/ rin po che'i phreng ba thogs nas theg pa chen por mos shing/ sems bskyed pas gnas pa la slob dpon gyis dri ste/ kye khyod ci la dga' bas 'dir 'jug pa yin zhes pa dang/ slob mas
293a4(rgyud 'grel): kyang bdag skal pa bzang po la dga' bas 'jug pa'o zhes so/ /slar brjod pa/ de la khyod la ci dgos zhes so/ /des smras pa/ rdo rje 'dzin pa'i dngos grub 'dod pa'i phyir ro/ /zhes so/ /slar brjod la/ bde gshegs
293a5(rgyud 'grel): sras bcas dam tshig pas/ yon dbul thugs rjes bdag la dgongs/ sangs rgyas sku gsung rang bzhin mchog /slob dpon mgon la skyabs su mchi/ /skal bzang lha mo'i tshogs bcas pa'i/ /dkyil 'khor tshogs
293a6(rgyud 'grel): la phyag 'tshal lo/ /thar pa chen po'i grong mchog tu/ /mgon po dag ni gzhug tu gsol/ /zhes pa dang/ slar brjod pa/ rgyal ba kun gyi gnas bzhugs pa'i/ /dkyil 'khor chen po nyams dga' ba/ /snying po'i grong khyer
293a7(rgyud 'grel): chen po 'dir/ /bdag gi slob ma gzhug par bgyi/ /zhes brjod do/ /de nas las kyi rdo rje lag pa g.yas pa nas bzung ste/ oM sarba yo ga tsit+ta ut+ta pA la ya mi hUM/ zhes brjod cing yol ba'i nang du gzhug ste/ dkyil 'khor gyi shar sgor
293b1(rgyud 'grel): bzhag la 'di brjod do/ /oM thog ma med dus 'khor ba'i gnas/ /bdag gis bsags pa'i las gang gis/ /bgyid rtsal yi rang dus 'dir bshags/ /phyin chad mi bgyid sdom pa gzung/ /rgyal ba sras sogs dge rtsa bzhi/ /'gro gzhan legs
293b2(rgyud 'grel): byas gang yin dang/ /de dag kun la rjes yi rang/ /byang chub chen por bdag gis bsngos/ /sangs rgyas chos dang dge 'dun la/ /bdag gis dus 'dir skyabs su gsol/ /nyon mongs sdug bsngal bcad pa dang/ /dge ba'i tshogs mang spel ba'i
293b3(rgyud 'grel): phyir/ /byang chub bde chen don bskyed nas/ /'gro rnams de ring dus 'dir gnyer/ /sangs rgyas gyur nas bdag gis ni/ /'gro rnams srid pa'i gnas nas gdon/ /zhes brjod do/ /de nas me tog phreng ba dang bcas pa slob ma'i snying gar bzhag
293b4(rgyud 'grel): ste/ oM bde gshegs kun gyis khyod nyid ni/ /de ring byin gyis brlabs pa na/ /de bzhin gshegs pa'i gsal chen 'di/ /dkyil 'khor dag tu ma zhugs shing/ /dad pa med pa'i mi rnams la/ /nams kyang smra bar bya ba min/ /oM su ra te
293b5(rgyud 'grel): sa ma ya stwaM ho sid+d+hi badzra ya thA khaM/ oM rdo rje sems dpa' deng khyod kyi/ /snying la yang dag zhugs mdzad de/ /gal te tshul 'di smras na ni/ /de ma thag tu dral te bshegs/ /oM mahA sa ma ya utpa Tha:/ 'di ni khyod kyi dmyal ba'i chu/ /dam tshig
293b6(rgyud 'grel): 'das na sreg par byed/ /dam tshig bsrungs na dngos grub ni/ /rdo rje bdud rtsi chu 'dis 'grub/ /oM A(rgyud 'grel): hUM sarba pany+tsa a mri ta hUM/ badzra utga ta h+ri Tha/ di ring phyin chad khyod nyid kyi/ /rdo rje sems dpa' nga yin pas/ /gang zhig sgo ba'i? las rnams byos//
293b7(rgyud 'grel): nga la brnyas par ma byed cig /gal te cung zhig brnyas byas na/ /dus min 'chi zhing dmyal bar ltung/ /rgyal pa kun gyi ye shes thugs/ /sku dang gsung 'phrul las mdzad pa/ /phyag rgya'i cho ga gang dag gis/ /de ring bdag la dbab tu gsol//
294a1(rgyud 'grel): zhes brjod de/ slob ma'i snying gar bde gshegs bzhugs pa dang/ /bdud rtsi byin gyis brlabs pas/ /dngos grub sbyin zhing dam tshig bsgrag par bya/ /de nas snying ga dang rkang mthil dang/ /mgrin pa dang/ spyi'o rnams su 'byung po'i
294a2(rgyud 'grel): sa bon gyis mtshan ma'i dkyil 'khor bsgom par bya'o/ /de nas yang/ sum+b+ha ni sum+b+ha ni hUM/ zhes bsrung zhing rdo rje dril bu dkrol te/ oM dz+nyA na A be sho ye/ staM b+ha ya/ ra ra ra ra/ tsa la ya tsa la ya hUM/ A ha dzhe/ zhes brgya rtsa brgyad brjod do/
294a3(rgyud 'grel): nam zhig ye shes babs pa'i tshe ni sku dang/ gsung dang/ thugs kyi rtags ston par 'gyur ro/ /rdo rje slob dpon gyis bden pa brjed par bya ste/ mgon mchog gsang ba'i dkyil 'khor 'dir/ /slob ma'i mchog 'di gzhug
294a4(rgyud 'grel): par bgyi/ /rigs kyi lha yi bye brag dang/ bsod nams gang yin de bzhin gshog /de bzhin dngos grub mtshan ma dag /snying po'i gnas 'dir legs par ston/ /zhes brjod cing kha dog dang dbyibs kyi bye brag la brtags
294a5(rgyud 'grel): te/ /des rang gi las dag grub par shes so/ /de nas phreng ba dkyil 'khor du dor te/ oM pra tIts+tsha badzra? ho/ /zhes pas/ lha gang la babs pa de yi dam du blang bar bya'o/ /de yang gtso bo la bab na ni mchog gi dngos grub 'grub cing//
294a6(rgyud 'grel): bar mtshams ngag gis ni 'bring gis las 'grub la/ /ra ba las 'das pa dag gis ni slar bskyar te lan gsum du dor zhing/ gang zhig dkyil la ma bab pa ngag ni chus shis par byas te slar gtang bar bya'o/ /yang phreng ba de
294a7(rgyud 'grel): blangs te slob ma'i mgo la bcings nas/ kye sems dpa' chen po phreng ba 'di dang mi 'bral bar gyis shig /oM ratna mA le ab+hi Shtsi traM/ zhes brjod do/ /yi ge oM gyis brjod pa'i gser gyi thur ma bras mtshan pa yis dri ma bsal
294b1(rgyud 'grel): nas/ oM rdo rje sems dpa' khyed nyid kyi/ mig 'byed par ni brtson bar mdzad/ /sgrib g.yogs ling thog kun bsal nas/ /rdo rje'i mig ni bla na med/ /oM badzra tsak+Shu dz+nyA na pra pe sha phaT/ ces brjod do/ /gdong g.yogs bsal nas dkyil
294b2(rgyud 'grel): 'khor bstan pa'i phyir sgo dbye ste/ bu khyod dkyil 'khor legs par ltos/ /thar pa chen po'i grong mchog tu/ /phreng ba gang la bab pa ni/ /de nyid khyod kyi rigs kyi lha/ /zhes te shar phyogs kyi sgo nas brtsams shing gtso bo'i bar du
294b3(rgyud 'grel): lha rnams kyi ming bstan par bya'o/ /de'i rjes la bza' ba dang btung ba la sogs pa'i tshogs kyis lha dang slob dpon dang/ rnal 'byor bdag mnyes par byas nas/ slob dpon la sems dad pa'i sgo nas bdag gi skal pa ji ltar lags
294b4(rgyud 'grel): pa bstan du gsol zhes brjod par bya'o/ /der slar brjod pa/ bu khyod dad pa rab tu bskyed/ /dkyil 'khor bzang po 'di la ltos/ /sangs rgyas thams cad mnyam sbyor ba'i/ /mkha' 'gro sgyu ma'i rigs mchog 'dzin/ /'gro ba phun sum tshogs
294b5(rgyud 'grel): kun dang/ /dngos rnams thams cad mngon du 'gyur/ /dam tshig ting 'dzin rjes chags dang/ /gsang sngags snying po 'dzin par gyis/ /zhes brjod par bya'o/ /de nas dbang bskur ba'i don du/ /slob ma yon dang bcas pas
294b6(rgyud 'grel): gsol ba gdab ste/ /rgyal ba kun gyis gsang ba'i lam/ /'gro ba skyobs la gzi brjid can/ /mkha' 'gro ma yi 'khor lo mchog /yon tan thams cad 'byung ba'i gnas/ /de ring dbang bskur gnang ba yi/ /dus la bab par 'os pa lags/ /
294b7(rgyud 'grel): dpa' bo chen pos mi ldog pa'i/ /dbang bskur rim bzhin bdag la stsol/ /rig pa chen pos las bsgrubs nas/ /dngos grub mchog rnams shis pa dang/ /sems can kun gyi don gyi phyir/ /bdag gi rdo rje slob dpon gzung zhes brjod
295a1(rgyud 'grel): do/ /de nas shar gyi phyogs kyi sgo drung du/ khru do tsam gyis mchod par dbang stegs dkyil 'khor gyi lte ba dang mnyam par brtsigs te/ pad+ma 'dab brgyad sgo dang bcas pa bris nas/ /seng ge'i khri la pad+mas mtshan ma'i
295a2(rgyud 'grel): gdan la bsham zhing slob ma bzhag ste/ 'phan gdugs dang/ me tog phreng ba dang/ rin po che'i rgyan dang/ gos sna tshogs kyis mdzes par byas nas/ /spos chus sbyangs te/ yungs kar gyi sbyin sreg dang/ ku sha'i chus shis
295a3(rgyud 'grel): ba'i cho ga bya'o/ /yang bdud rtsi byin gyis brlabs pa'i chu 'thor zhing/ /rta mchog gi sngags kyis bsrungs nas yi ge gsum gyis sbyang bar bya zhing/ chos nyid rnam par dag pa'i rang bzhin las rigs kyi lhar bskyed de/ /mchod
295a4(rgyud 'grel): dbyangs dang/ rol mo'i sil snyan du bcas pas bum pa'i nang nas chu blangs te/ dung chos la sogs pas blugs la tshigs su bcad pa brjod par bya'o/ /til gyi gang bu bzhin gang ba'i/ /rgyal ba'i bum pa bzung nas ni/ /'di nyid
295a5(rgyud 'grel): las ni blugs byas las/ /bag chags ma lus ngag gyur cig /ces phyir bum pa'i chus khrus byas nas/ yang sa bon gyi gsang sngags las byung ba'i lcags kyus ye shes kyi dkyil 'khor bkug ste/ mdun rol tu zla ba'i dkyil
295a6(rgyud 'grel): 'khor du bzhag nas gnyis su med pa'i rol pa mdzad cing/ byang chub kyi sems kyi chu rgyun gyis lha'i bum pa bkang ste/ gar dang dbyangs su bcas pas phyogs bzhi nas khrus mdzad do/ /oM lha yi chu ni dag pa yis/ /rdo rje gsang gsum
295a7(rgyud 'grel): gnas las byung/ /rig pa'i lha mo tshogs ldan pa'i/ /rang bzhin gcig tu gyur pa yin/ /oM badzra a b+hi Shiny+tsa mi/ /zhes brjod do/ /des ni me long lta bu'i ye shes kyi rang bzhin bcom ldan 'das he ru ka'i byang chub kyi sems kyi ngo bo
295b1(rgyud 'grel): ston te chu'i dbang bskur ro/ /de nas rin po che'i rgyu las byas pa 'am/ gzhan dag las byung ba gang yang rung ste/ /dbu rgyan rtse mo lnga pa sangs rgyas lnga'i mtshan ma dang/ dar dbyangs su bcas pa byin gyis brlabs te/ tshigs su bcad pa 'dis sbyin par
295b2(rgyud 'grel): bya'o/ /oM sangs rgyas kun gyis bsngags pa yi/ /rin chen las byung dbu rgyan che/ /thor tshugs cod pan gyis brgyan pa'i/ /dar dbyangs dbang bskur sbyin par bya/ /oM badzra da ra ta badzra a ra li ho/ /a b+hi Shiny+tsa traM/ zhes brjod nas/ de'i rjes la
295b3(rgyud 'grel): thod pa'i mtshan ma drug dang bcas pa'i dar dpyangs kyis bcings te/ oM sangs rgyas kun gyi ye shes rtags/ /thod pa'i phreng ba'i dbu rgyan gyis/ /rdo rje sems dpa' bdag sngon bskyed/ /rig pa'i ye shes mtshan ma'i rtags/ /hUM badzra ka
295b4(rgyud 'grel): pA la a bi Shiny+tsa mi/ des ni so sor kun tu rtog pa'i ye shes kyi rang bzhin dpal rdo rje nyi ma byang chub sems kyi ngo bo dbu rgyan gyis dbang bskur ba'o/ /de nas rdo rje rtse lnga pa rnam par sbyang zhing byin gyis brlabs pa/ /lag pa g.yas par
295b5(rgyud 'grel): gsor zhing/ /slob ma'i snying gar gtugs te/ /'di ni sangs rgyas thams cad kyi/ /rdo rje gsang ba chen po'i don/ /di ring khyod la dbang bskur te/ /rab tu grub phyir gzung bar bgyis/ /oM badzra satwa a b+hi Shiny+tsa mi zhes brjod de/ /slob ma'i
295b6(rgyud 'grel): lag pa g.yas par btang nas lan gsum gsor te thugs kar bzung ngo/ /oM thog mdza' med pa'i sems dpa' ni/ /rdo rje sems dpa' dga' ba che/ /kun tu bzang po kun bdag nyid/ /rdo rje snyems tshul bdag po'i bdag /ces brjod cing
295b7(rgyud 'grel): don bzhin du bsam par bya'o/ /des ni mnyam pa nyid kyi ye shes kyi rang bzhin dpal pad+ma gar gyi dbang phyug gi ngo bo mtshon par byed pa rdo rje'i dbang ngo/ /de nas dril bu sbyang zhing byin gyis brlabs pa dkrol zhing slob ma'i lag pa g.yon
296a1(rgyud 'grel): bar gtad la/ /'di ni rnal 'byor ma tshogs kyi/ /shes rab dbyangs kyi rjes 'gror bshad/ /khyod kyis rtag tu bcang bar gyis/ /byang chub mchog tu rgyal bas bzhed/ /oM a d+hi pa ti twaM a b+hi Shiny+tsa mi zhes brjod cing de
296a2(rgyud 'grel): nyid rnam par dag pa bstan pa'i phyir/ /srid pa ngo bo nyid kyis bdag /ngo bo nyid kyis srid bral byas/ /rang bzhin dag pa'i sems can rnams/ /dam pa'i srid pa byed par 'gyur/ /zhes brjod do/ /de nas bya ba grub pa'i ye shes kyi rang
296a3(rgyud 'grel): bzhin rta mchog rol pa'i ngo bo mtshon par byed pa dril bu'i dbang ngo/ /de nas rdo rje slob dpon gyis rdo rje dril bu gnyis gzung ba'i phyag rgya bstan te/ /thabs dang shes rab sbyor ba'i 'phro 'du dang bcas par slob ma'i mgo bor bzhag nas
296a4(rgyud 'grel): tshigs su bcad pa 'di brjod par bya'o/ /oM gang phyir chos rnams rnam dag pas/ /sangs rgyas ye shes rang bzhin nyid/ /dbang po'i spyod yul gang dang gang/ /bde mchog sgyu ma'i dkyil 'khor nyid/ /oM dpal che ge mo a b+hi Shiny+tsa mi/
296a5(rgyud 'grel): badzra nA ma a b+hi Shiny+tsa mi ka ta ya ho zhes so/ /de ni chos kyi dbyings kyi ye shes kyi rang bzhin dpal rnam par snang mdzad kyi ngo bo mtshon par byed pa ming gi dbang bskur pa'o/ /de ltar dbang bskur ba'i phan yon ni/ /sangs rgyas thams
296a6(rgyud 'grel): cad mnyam sbyor ba'i/ /mkha' 'gro sgyu ma'i bde mchog kyang/ /rgyas mi thebs shing mi rmongs te/ /de la gnod par mi 'gyur ro zhes so/ /de dam tshig dang sdom pa la sogs pa'i phyir/ /dang por mna' bsgag cing sdom pa sbyin pa ni
296a7(rgyud 'grel): sangs rgyas thams cad gsung dbyangs gcig pa'i sgo nas gsungs te/ /sangs rgyas thams cad mnyam sbyor bar/ /sdom pa nyams par khyed byed pa/ /ji snyed sangs rgyas thams cad dang/ /byang chub sems dpa' rdo rje 'dzin/ /lha rnams
296b1(rgyud 'grel): dang ni bdag dang/ /de bzhin rnal 'byor sgrub pa po/ /de dag la ni snying rings nas/ /snying la khrag chen 'thung ba zhig /sems can khams ni ma lus don/ /srid pa shin tu dag bya'i phyir/ /mi 'gog chos nyid sbyor ba yis/ /rtag pa nyid du bsgrub par bya//
296b2(rgyud 'grel): rang gi ngo bo yongs su spangs shing/ /dka' thub kyis ni gzir mi bya/ /mi bde bar ni bde bar spyad/ /'di ni phyi dus sangs rgyas yin/ /rnal 'byor longs spyod thams cad la/ /cis kyang mi 'jigs dga' bar bgyis/ /sdig med stobs kyis khyed ma
296b3(rgyud 'grel): 'jigs/ /dam tshig 'da' bar dka' ba'o/ /zhes brjod cing sku gsung thugs kyi dam tshig rnam pa gsum rgyas par bstan par bya'o/ /des ni slob ma'i dbang bskur ba'i cho ga'o/ /de nas rdo rje slob dpon du bya zhing/ /bdag dang gzhan gyi don grub
296b4(rgyud 'grel): par 'dod pas bla ma la gsol ba gdab par bya ste/ mgon khyod thugs rje'i bka' drin gyis/ dkyil 'khor slob dpon dbang bskur sogs/ /bdag gzhan don du bya ba rnams/ /'grub byed dbang bskur bdag la stsol/ /ces pa dang/ slar brjod
296b5(rgyud 'grel): pa/ rdo rje dril bu phyag rgya che/ /zung zhig yang dag gzung bar bgyi/ /de ring rdo rje slob dpon che/ /slob ma'i tshogs rnams bsdu bar mdzod/ /'di ni sangs rgyas thams cad nyid/ /rdo rje sems dpa' i phyag na bsnams/ /rtag tu khyod kyis kyang bzung
296b6(rgyud 'grel): ste/ /phyag na rdo rje'i brtul zhugs brtan/ /oM mahA badzra hUM/ oM badzra ta thA ga badzra satwa sa ma ya tiSh+Tha/ 'di de sangs rgyas thams cad kyis/ /shes rab dbyangs kyis rjes 'gror bshad/ /khyod kyis kyang ni rtag tu bcad/ /byang chub mchog?
296b7(rgyud 'grel): tu rgyal bas bzhed/ /oM badzra g+haN+Da a/ e Sha twaM d+ha ra ya mi hi hi hi hi ho/ /yid kyi lus ni brtan pa'i phyir/ /dam tshig phyag rgya zhes byar brjod/ /lus kun brtan byed gang zhig ni/ /phyag rgyar rab tu grags pa yin/ /oM mahA kA ya ?
297a1(rgyud 'grel): bAk+tsit+ta badzra sa ma ya hUM/ zhes brtul zhugs rnam pa gsum byin na/ /mchod pa'i tshogs dang/ bstod pa'i gar thabs kyis lha rnams mnyes bya'o/ /de nas rjes su gnang ba sbyin par bya ste/ /bdag gzhan don sgrub las
297a2(rgyud 'grel): kyi tshogs/ /thun mong 'bring ba mchog gyur pa'i/ /zhi rgyas dbang drag dgug pa dang/ /sdang gnod rengs pa'i las kun dang/ /dbye rmongs bskrad pa'i cho ga rnams/ /thogs pa med par bsgrub par gyis/ /ral gri mig rnon sa 'og
297a3(rgyud 'grel): dang/ /thogs med mi 'bying skas 'dzeg dang/ /gser 'gyur ril bu nyi zla gzung/ /char dbab la sogs las kyi tshogs/ /rnam shes sgrub dang ye shes sgrub/ /phyag rgya shes pa'i don grub dag /thams cad dngos grub 'gro ba
297a4(rgyud 'grel): yi/ /don nyid yang dag sbyor bar gyis/ /rgyal ba kun gyi gnas 'jug cing/ /sku gsung thugs mchog yon tan rgyan/ /'phrin las bdag gzhan gnas sbyor ba'i/ /mkha' 'gro sgyu ma'i dngos grub sgrub/ /ces brjod do/ /de
297a5(rgyud 'grel): nas yang snga ma bzhin du mig dbye bya ste/ /ji ltar mig mkhan rgyal po yis/ /mig nang ling rtog bsal ba ltar/ /bu khyod kyi ni mi shes pa'i/ /ling tog rgyal bas sel bar mdzad/ /oM badzra ni tra a pa ha ra pa Ta laM h+re/
297a6(rgyud 'grel): chos rnams gzugs brnyan lta bu ste/ /dag cing gsal la dri ma med/ /gzung 'dzin rnam bral brjod med du/ /rgyu dang las las kun du 'byung/ /rang bzhin med cing dag med pa/ /chos rnams de bzhin shes byas nas/ /
297a7(rgyud 'grel): sems can don ni yang dag byos/ /des na sangs rgyas sras su skye/ /zhes brjod de mig phye ba'i rjes la/ /chos thams cad kun rdzob sgyu ma lta bur snang ba la rjes su spyod par gnang ba'o/ /yang don dam pa dang yi dam gyi lha ji
297b1(rgyud 'grel): ltar gnas pa'i mtshan nyid bstan pa'i phyir/ /thams cad nam mkha' i mtshan nyid de/ /nam mkha' la yang mtshan nyid med/ /nam mkha' dag dang mnyam sbyor bas/ /kun mchog mnyam pa nyid du gsal/ /oM rdo rje sems dpa' me long bzhin
297b2(rgyud 'grel): dag cing gsal la rnyog pa med/ /bu khyod kyi ni snying la bzhugs/ /rdo rje sems dpa' rang nyid gtso/ /zhes brjod cing/ /de nyid kyi don bstan par bya'o/ /yang lha mo bde mchog mas byin gyis brlabs pa'i mda' gzhu byin te/ /phyogs bzhi dang steng 'og tu
297b3(rgyud 'grel): 'gengs shing 'phen pa'i tshul byas nas/ /chos kyi 'khor lo mas byin gyis brlabs pa'i gdan la 'dug ste/ /lag pa g.yas par dpal sangs rgyas thams cad dang mnyam par sbyor ba'i glegs bam sbyin zhing/ g.yon par dung byin te sgra
297b4(rgyud 'grel): bsgrag par bya'o/ /oM pha rol phyin drug las rnams kyis/ /sems can don kun mnyam sbyor zhing/ /'khor ba'i rgyun gcod mya ngan 'das/ /oM chos kyi 'khor lo chen po bskor/ /the tshom rtog tshogs gcod mdzad pa'i/ /chos kyi dung gi sgra
297b5(rgyud 'grel): sgrags pas/ /gsang sngags gsang chen snying po'i don/ /snod ldan kun la rab tu bshod/ /des ni rgyal ba thams cad la/ /phan 'dogs drin lan mdzad pa yin/ /mkha' 'gro sgyu ma'i dkyil 'khor gyis/ /khyod la rtag tu bsrung bar mdzad/ /ces
297b6(rgyud 'grel): brjod par bya'o/ /de'i rjes la rigs kyi dkyil 'khor lnga bskor bar gnas pa sbyin pa ni/ /mdor na 'jig rten khams rnams su/ /sems can rnams kyi don gyi phyir/ /ji ltar 'dul ba sna tshogs su/ /rdo rje'i 'khor lo rab tu gsol/ /ces rigs lnga'i
297b7(rgyud 'grel): gnas su sbyar bar bya'o/ /de ni lung bstan pa las/ dang po slob dpon gyis bsgo ba ni/ /'di ltar nga yis khyod lung bstan/ /rdo rje dpal ldan gsang ba'i bdag /dngos po mchog tu sgrub pa'i phyir/ /srid pa'i ngan 'gro gnas las grol/ /kye che ge mo zhes bya
298a1(rgyud 'grel): ba'i de bzhin gshegs pa/ /b+hur b+hu ba swa(rgyud 'grel): de'i rjes la dus gsum gyi rgyal ba rnams kyis kyang phyogs bcu nas gsung dbyangs mthun pa'i sgra skad kyis lung bstan par mdzad de/ /kye rigs kyi bu khyod kyi srid pa tha mar ni
298a2(rgyud 'grel): 'di yin te/ /gsang ba bla na med pa'i theg pa la zhugs pas phyag rgya chen po dang/ gsang sngags kyi mthus rigs kyi dkyil 'khor du gnas par 'gyur ro/ /khyod kyis chags pa rnam pa gnyis dang 'bral bar mi bya ste/ de dag gi las
298a3(rgyud 'grel): la sbyar bar bya'o/ /'dod chags bral ba lta bu'i sdig /khams gsum na ni gzhan med de/ /de bas 'dod la chags bral bar/ /khyod kyis nams kyang bya ba min/ /ma hA sa ma ya hUM phaT/ de ring dkyil 'khor slob dpon dang/ /sngags sogs
298a4(rgyud 'grel): rgyud rnams 'dzin par 'gyur/ /sangs rgyas byang chub sems dpa' dang/ /lha rnams kun gyis mthun par gsungs/ /sems can kun la rjes brtse bar/ /dkyil 'khor cho ga bzhin du bris/ /rtse gcig nan tan bskyed nas ni/ /sgrub pa po rnams
298a5(rgyud 'grel): rgyud la sbyor/ /zhes brjod de/ des ni lung bstan pa'o/ /de ni dbugs dbyung ba'i phyir/ /dang po dkyil 'khor mthong ba'i phan yon brjod par bya'o/ /mchog tu gsang ba'i dkyil 'khor 'dir/ /zhugs shing mthong pa la sogs pas/ /sdig pa
298a6(rgyud 'grel): kun las rnam grol zhing/ /khyed rnams rab tu dge bar gnas zhes brjod/ /de nas don bzhin du spyad pa'i phan yon bstan pa'i phyir/ /bde chen theg pa 'di la ni/ /phyi nas 'chi ba yod med cing/ /mtshungs med thub par mi 'gyur te/ /cis
298a7(rgyud 'grel): kyang mi 'jigs dga' bar gyis/ /srid pa shin tu dag la nas/ /srid pa'i sdug bsngal las 'das so/ /nga ni de dag gi dam tshig bshad par bya ste/ /byang chub sems ni yong mi speng/ /rdo rje zhes bya'i phyag rgya che/ /gang zhig bskyed pa
298b1(rgyud 'grel): tsam gyis ni/ /sangs rgyas nyid 'gyur the tshom med/ /dam pa'i chos dag mi smad cing/ /ma gus spang zhing dor mi bya/ /mi shes snod ming rmongs pa la/ /nam yang bstan par mi bya'o/ /rdo rje dril bu mi spang ste/ /slob dpon dag la gus par bgyis/ /zhes
298b2(rgyud 'grel): pa'i don bstan par bya'o/ /de ltar slob dpon gyi dbang thob pa'i phan yon ni/ /khams gsum gyis ni rgyal srid che/ /bdag po rgyal chen dbang bskur zhing/ /bdud rnams thams cad las rgyal bar/ /grong khyer mchog tu zhugs pa yin/ /'di
298b3(rgyud 'grel): yis khyed rnams dus 'di ru/ /sangs rgyas thob par the tsom med/ /dbang bskur rjes thob dbugs phyung bas/ /slob ma yon tan bdag por 'gyur/ /slob dpon blo gros dam tshig ldan/ /brtan g.ya'i mdza' la rnam par grol/ /lam mchog 'jug
298b4(rgyud 'grel): stobs dbugs phyin te/ ngan pa'i gnas ngan kun spangs pa'o/ /zhes brjod par bya'o/ /de nas gdams ngag bstan pa'i phyir dkyil 'khor gyi de kho na nyid dang/ lha'i de kho na nyid bstan par bya ste/ de la dang po dkyil 'khor gyi mtshan nyid ni gru
298b5(rgyud 'grel): bzhi par gnas pas/ che ba'i yon tan thams cad kyis rgyas par bya zhing sgo rnam pa bzhi yis byams pa dang/ snying rje dang/ dga' ba dang/ btang snyoms kyi mtshan nyid can no/ /rta babs nas chos kyi 'khor lo'i bar du ni rten cing 'brel par 'byung
298b6(rgyud 'grel): ba'i tshul du gnas pa ni byang chub kyi tshes sum cu rtsa bdun gyi bar du bgrod nas rnam par thar ba'i sgo bzhir 'jug pa'i mtshan nyid can no/ /rin po che sna lnga'i rtsig pa las kha dog nyi shu rtsa lnga dang bcas pa phro ba ni/ /rang bzhin ye shes drug
298b7(rgyud 'grel): gi byin brlabs las rigs kyi mtshan ma sna tshogs su snang ba'i rang bzhin no/ /rdo rjes mtshan pa'i ka ba brgyad ni rnam par thar pa brgyad kyi rang bzhin la rdo rje theg pa'i tshul gyis mtshan pa'o/ /rin po che dang/ mu tig dang/ me tog gi phreng bas
299a1(rgyud 'grel): brgyan pa ni mdzad pa rgya chen po'i phrin las rnams yon tan las byung ba'i tshul lo/ /'dod pa'i yon tan drug gi lha mo ni/ /yul drug rnam pa dag pa'i snang ba'o/ /gdugs snying rje chen po'i char bab dang/ rgyal
299a2(rgyud 'grel): mtshan bdud rnam bzhi las rgyal zhing theg pa'i mchog ston pa'i ma dang/ bla re mnyam pa nyid du tshul gcig par spyod pa'i tshul/ /rnga yab rnam par rtog pa'i sbrang ma sel bar mdzad pa dang/ /zla ba phyed pa rdo rjes smon lam rgya
299a3(rgyud 'grel): chen po 'gro ba'i don du theg pa chen po'i sngags kyi sgo nas don mdzad pa dang/ rdo rje rin po che dbyug pa la ba dan dpyangs pas mtshan dang dpe byad phun sum tshogs pa'i rtags dang ldan pa'o/ /de la dril bu sgra snyan pa phyogs bcur sgrogs
299a4(rgyud 'grel): ba ni theg pa sna tshogs kyi don ston pa'o/ /re'u cha'i cha brgyad kyi mtshan ma ni sku'i dbang phyug dang/ gsung gi dbang phyug dang/ thugs kyi dbang phyug la sogs pa'i yon tan brgyad kyis brgyan pa'o/ /thig bzhis legs par
299a5(rgyud 'grel): phye ba ni phrin las bzhi'i snang ba'o/ /sna tshogs pad+ma'i mtshon ma dang/ mu khyud rdo rje'i phreng bas bskor ba ni chags pa med pa'i phrin las kun tu don spyad kyang nyon mongs pa'i mtshan mas ma gos shing bde ba chen po'i dbyings
299a6(rgyud 'grel): lam sku gsung thugs kyi theg pa ston par mdzad pa'o/ /bum pa rgyan gyis mdzes shing bdud rtsi'i bcud dang ldan pas che ba'i yon tan thams cad kyi 'byung gnas 'chi ba med pa'i bdud rtsi ye shes rnam pa lnga'i don las yon tan
299a7(rgyud 'grel): gyi snang ba ma 'gags shing 'dod pa'i longs spyod sna tshogs su 'phro ba'o/ /bar du re mig 'khor lo'i tshul du gnas pa ni phrin las dang mchod pa'i gnas su 'gyur cing rang gi phyag rgya mdzes par gyur pa'o/ /phyi rol pad+ma la sogs
299b1(rgyud 'grel): pa'i phreng ba dag ni chos thams cad rnam par dag pa'i yon tan gyi snang ba ston pa dang/ sku gsung thugs kyi phrin las dang bcas pa'i rnam pa dang/ ye shes kyi byin brlabs kyis mi mthun pa'i rnam par rtog pa thams cad spel bar mdzad pa'o//
299b2(rgyud 'grel): phyi rol gyi dur khrod chen po dag gis ni thams cad gsang sngags kyi theg par 'du zhing theg pa gzhan las khyad par du 'phags pa'i tshul du khams gsum gyi zhen rtog sbyang ba dang/ phung po lnga dang 'byung ba lnga dag rnam par dag pa'i ngo bor
299b3(rgyud 'grel): bstan pa'o/ /zhing dang zhing skyong dag gis yon tan ma 'gags pa'i rten gnas la sangs rgyas brgyad kyi snang ba ston pa'o/ /mtsho dang klu brgyad ni srid pa'i gnas kyi rtog pa'i tshogs dag gnyis su med pa'i byang chub kyi sems kyi don ston pa'o//
299b4(rgyud 'grel): rnal 'byor pho mo dag gis ni dbyings dang ye shes bzung du 'brel ba'i don gyis chos thams cad 'dus par bstan pa'o/ /sprin dang mchod rten la sogs pa'i rnam pa dag gis ni thugs rje chen po'i sprul pa'i 'phro 'du dang ye shes kyi
299b5(rgyud 'grel): snang ba brgyad brtan pa'o/ /bya khyi dang mkha' 'gro la sogs sna tshogs pas ni thugs rje chen po'i sprul pa dang/ yon tan gyi rtsal ma 'gags pa'i phrin las gyi tshogs rnam par 'phro ba bstan pa yin no/ /de ltar rten gyi mtshan nyid rgya cher
299b6(rgyud 'grel): brtan nas brten pa'i rang bzhin dag shes par bya ba'i phyir dpal rdo rje sems dpa' dkar dmar gyi mdangs dang ldan pas byang chub kyi sems kyi rang bzhin la rtog pa'i mtshan mas ma gos shing thugs rje chen pos chags pa'i las
299b7(rgyud 'grel): mdzad pa'o/ /rin po che'i kha dog sna lnga'i 'od zer mdzes pas brgyan pa ni ye shes rnam pa lnga'i snang ba las rigs kyi mtshan ma sna tshogs ston pa'o/ /zhal bzhi dang/ phyag bzhi'i rnam pa can du byung bas phrin las rnam
300a1(rgyud 'grel): pa bzhi dang/ tshad med pa dag gi sgo nas 'gro ba dbugs 'byin pa'o/ /sgeg pa la sogs pa'i tshul gyis khams gsum las rgyal zhing/ rang gi che lugs bcom par mdzad pa'o/ /phyag bzhi'i mtshon cha dag gis
300a2(rgyud 'grel): ye shes rnam pa lnga'i che ba las rigs lnga'i dkyil 'khor snang bar mdzad pa dang/ thugs rje chen pos rtse gcig tu sems can gyi las la dgongs pa dang/ sku gsung thugs sna tshogs kyi sgo nas khams gsum las te/
300a3(rgyud 'grel): gsang ba bla med pa'i tshul ston pa dang/ zhi gnas dang lhag mthong zung du 'brel ba'i las kyis bskul ba dang/ de'i mtshan nyid gzhan la ston par mdzad pa'o/ /mtshan bzab sum cu rtsa gnyis dang dpe byad bzang po brgyad cu dag
300a4(rgyud 'grel): gzhan las khyad par du 'phags pa'i tshul gyis mdzes shing byang chub kyi mchog tu gyur pa'i thugs rje chen po'i rnam pa dang ma bral ba'i sgo nas stong g.yogs dang mdzad pa sna tshogs kyi las mnga' bas smad g.yogs
300a5(rgyud 'grel): kyis brgyan pa'o/ /bsdu ba'i dngos po bzhi dang/ tshad med pa bzhi'i 'phrin las dag la spyod bas dpung ba rin po ches mdzes pa'o/ /gzhan yang rin po che'i ske rags dang/ mgur chu dang/ do shal gyi dge ba bcu dang/ pha rol
300a6(rgyud 'grel): tu phyin pa bcu dang/ sangs rgyas kyi chos ma 'dres pa bco brgyad dang/ byang chub kyi phyogs kyi chos sum cu rtsa bdun gyi don ston par byed pa'o/ /phyag dang zhabs la gdu bus mdzes shing byang chub kyi mchog tu gyur/ se
300a7(rgyud 'grel): mo do bcus mtshan pa mo bden pa bzhi dang rnam par thar pa brgyad dang/ dge ba bcu yongs su rdzogs pa'i rtags so/ /dbu la rin po che'i rgyan pa dang/ phreng ba dang/ thod pa dang/ rigs kyi bdag po dag gis brgyan ni pha rol tu
300b1(rgyud 'grel): phyin pa drug dang/ rigs rnam pa lnga dang/ rigs kyi mtshan mas lhag par gyur pa'o/ /sku gsung thugs kyi rdo rje dang/ ye shes sems dpa' dang/ sangs rgyas kyi dkyil 'khor gyis brgyan pa ni phyag rgya bzhi'i sgo nas de nyid kyi don bstan
300b2(rgyud 'grel): par mdzad pa dang/ phung po lnga rnam par dag pa'i rang bzhin du bzhugs pa'o/ /gzhan yang 'byung ba rnam pa bzhi rnam par dag pa'i sgo nas khyad par gyi phrin las bzhis 'gro ba'i don bya ba'i phyir rigs kyi lha mo bzhi dang/ skye mched
300b3(rgyud 'grel): la sogs pa zag pa dang bcas pa rnam par mdzad cing rigs dang ye shes kyi snang ba yon tan gyi tshogs rnam par 'phrul ba las kyis gzhan gyi don mdzad pa'i phyir phrin las sna tshogs dang bcas par bstan pa yin no/ /de
300b4(rgyud 'grel): ltar rnam par dag pa'i mtshan nyid bstan nas slob dpon gyi las su bya ba ni dbang bskur ba dang/ rab tu gnas pa dang phrin las rtsom dang/ sgrub pa'i rim pa dang/ tshogs kyi 'khor lo la sogs pa gzhan dag gi lam gsum bya
300b5(rgyud 'grel): ba rnams kyang rgya cher bstan par bya'o/ /de nas lha dang/ slob dpon la ci 'byor ba'i yon gyis mchod cing rjes su yi rang dbul bar bya'o/ /des ni slob dpon du dbang bskur ba'i tshogs bstan pa yin no/ /de ni nye ba'i bsnyen pa'i skabs
300b6(rgyud 'grel): su dbang rdzogs par ma byas pa dang/ gang zhing rdzogs pa dag gis gnas par 'dod na dben pa'i gnas su dris legs par byugs pa'i maN+Dal la me tog la sogs pa bkram zhing bde ba'i stan brtsegs pa la bla ma bzhag nas/ shes
300b7(rgyud 'grel): rab mtshan dang ldan pa dag phul te/ mchod pa dang/ ston mo la sogs pa'i longs spyod kyis dgyes par byas nas/ ras kyi yol ba la sogs pas bar chad pa'i rgyab nas gsol ba gdab par bya'o/ /dpal ldan mgon po bde
301a1(rgyud 'grel): pa che/ /bde chen bde ba'i gnas la bzhugs/ /sangs rgyas thams cad mnyam sbyor ba'i/ /mkha' 'gro sgyu ma'i bde rtsol mdzod/ /byang chub sems dpa' che rnams kyi/ /yang dag don mchog rnam dag la/ /ji ltar de nyid bdud
301a2(rgyud 'grel): rtsi yi/ /mchog gi dbang ni bskur ba bzhin/ /de bzhin bdag sogs 'gro kun gyis/ /sdug bsngal thams cad sel bar mdzod/ /rnal 'byor bdud rtsi dri med mchog /ma rig rtog pa'i rab rib sel/ /gang gis byang chub bla med pa
301a3(rgyud 'grel): de ring bdag gis thob par mdzod/ /ces pa gsol pa dang/ de la slar yang smras nas/ /bu khyod ji ltar 'dod pa bzhin/ /rgyal ba kun gyi bde chen sbyin/ /ting 'dzin sbyor sngags gsal ba yis/ /rang rig gnas su legs par sdod ces
301a4(rgyud 'grel): pa'o/ /de nas phyi nang gis khrus byas te/ dam tshig lha mo sbyangs nas sngags dang bcas pa'i yungs kar gyi bgegs bskrad cing/ sbyor ba dang/ rjes su sbyor bas yum gnyis kyi sku bskyed par bya'o/ /yang dbang bskur ba dang/
301a5(rgyud 'grel): byin gyis brlab pa dag rdzogs par byas nas rol pa'i brdas bskur zhing/ spro ba skyed cing rigs kyi nga rgyal ma nyams pa'i sgo nas gnyis su med par sbyor ba'i byang chub kyi sems slob ma'i lce la bzhag par bya'o/ /ji ltar rgyal
301a6(rgyud 'grel): ba bde gshegs kyis/ /rang gi sras tshogs dbang bskur bzhin/ /byang chub sems de dag ba'i chus/ /rnam rtog dri ma dag par bya/ /oM mahA bo d+hi tsit+ta sa ma ya a b+hi Shiny+tsa hUM/ zhes brjod pa dang/ slob mas kyang a haM su
301a7(rgyud 'grel): kha zhes brjod cing med de/ rigs kyi cha lugs bsal bar chu'i zla ba'am sgyu ma'i rnam pa bzhin du gnas pa'o/ /des ni gsang ba'i dbang bskur ba'o/ /yang rdzogs pa'i rim pa thob par 'dod pas rdo rje bla ma mchog tu 'gyur pa la
301b1(rgyud 'grel): gsol ba gdab par bya ste/ maN+Dal dang mchod pa'i tshogs kyis rdo rje bla ma dang/ phyag rgya mo mtshan dang ldan pa mnyes par byas nas/ tshig 'di brjod par bya'o/ /kye kye mgon po bde ba che/ /rdo rje sbyor las yang dag byung /phyag rgya mi phyed rab sgrub
301b2(rgyud 'grel): pa/ /mngon sum nyams myongs bskyed pa'i phyir/ /bdag nyid chen pos ji lta bar/ /gtso bos bdag la bka' drin mdzod/ /rtog pa'i dri mas bsgribs pa rnams/ /byang sems chu yis dag par mdzod/ /des kyang rigs dang mthun pa'i yuM
301b3(rgyud 'grel): byin gyis brlabs la slob ma'i lag tu gtang de/ /dga' ba'i gnas chen lha mo 'di/ /sna tshogs sgyu rtsal yid du 'ong/ /legs par zung zhig blo gros can/ /dga' bde'i mchod pa rab tu gyis/ /thabs gzhan gyis ni 'tshang mi rgya/ /
301b4(rgyud 'grel): 'gro ba thams cad 'di las 'byung/ /de bas khyod kyis 'di nyid dang/ /nam yang 'bral bar mi bya ste/ /'di ni sangs rgyas thams cad kyi/ /rig pa'i brtul zhugs bla na med/ /blun po gang zhig 'di spong ba/ /de la mchog gi dngos
301b5(rgyud 'grel): grub med/ ces pa'o/ /de nas lha mos grogs la dga' ba'i bzhin gyis bltas te/ 'dzum pa dang bcas par b+ha ga bya zhing bstan nas/ khyod kyis nus sam rdo rje can/ /dri chen dri chu'i bza' btung dang/ /rak+ta ga pur mang sa dang/ /bud
301b6(rgyud 'grel): med rnams la rtag gus dang/ /b+ha gar 'o byed mi rtog gam/ /smos shig grags po bde ba can/ zhes pa dang/ des kyang slar smras pa/ lha mo ci phyir bdag mi spro/ /khu khrag la sogs za ba dang/ bud med rnams la rtag gus shing//
301b7(rgyud 'grel): b+ha ga'i pad+ma ra 'o bgyid do/ /zhes so/ lha mos slar brjod de/ rmad byung gsang ba'i pad+ma 'di/ /thams cad bde bar yang dag ldan/ /rtag tu rim bzhin 'di spyod na/ /de nyid bde chen bral mi 'gyur/ /chos dbyings 'di ni rnam par dag /sems
302a1(rgyud 'grel): can thams cad rnam par grol/ /bde chen rgyal po 'di nyid ni/ /dngos po kun gyi rang 'byung gnas/ /gang gi rtsa yi 'khor lo la/ /pad+ma la bzhugs rab tu rgyas/ /b+ha ga'i mkha' dbyings nam mkha' bzhin//
302a2(rgyud 'grel): 'byung ba bzhi po rgyan bzhin bkod/ /lte ba'i ze 'bru ge sar zlum/ /pad+ma 'dab brgyad rnam par mdzes/ /de'i dbus su gnas pa ni/ /de nyid bdud rtsi'i chen po'i gzugs/ /b+hany+dza mok+Sha ho:/ zhes brjod do/ /de nas gnas dben par
302a3(rgyud 'grel): rgyan bzang po bris shing/ dri zhim po'i chus gtor stan bde pa la gnas te/ khang pa 'am yol ba la sogs pa gang yang rung bas bsgribs la/ thabs dang shes rab kyi sbyor ba'i ting nge 'dzin dang/ rjes su sbyor ba'i ting nge 'dzin dang/ sbyor
302a4(rgyud 'grel): ba chen po'i ting nge 'dzin dag rim pa bzhin du bsgom par bya'o/ /de nas 'dod pa'i gtsug lag dang mthun par bde ba bskyed cing shis pa dang mi shis pa'i mtshan ma dag yi ge lnga bcu'i gnas gang la bab pa'i sgo nas brtag
302a5(rgyud 'grel): ste/ ma ning gi yi ge dag la bab na ni slar bskyar bar bya'o/ /de ltar bde ba chen po'i don byang chub kyi sems phab nas tshigs su bcad pa 'dis btung bar bya'o/ /ye shes 'di ni shin tu phra/ /rdo rje snying po mkha' ? shing/ /
302a6(rgyud 'grel): rdul bral thal ba zhi ba'i mchog /rang gi rang bzhin de nyid de/ /zhes so/ /de'i rjes la rdo rje slob dpon la yon phul te/ thabs dang shes rab dang/ dga' ba dang/ bcas bskor ba byas te/ gtang rag btang ngo/ /de nas ?
302a7(rgyud 'grel): bzhi pa dag bla ma'i gdam ngag las byung bzhin du phyag rgya rnam pa gsum gang yang rung ba la brten te/ rang gi nyams su myong bas me long gi dkyil 'khor bzhin du gnas pa la yun ring du gsal bar brtag go /
302b1(rgyud 'grel): des ne zag pa med pa'i ye shes bde ba chen po'i sku skye bar 'gyur ro/ /de'i phyir rnal 'byor bde ba thams cad kyi/ /dbang bskur bde chen las byung ba/ /rin chen tshogs rnams tham cad kyis/ /rab tu mos par dbang bskur 'gyur/ /de
302b2(rgyud 'grel): nas khyad par gyi dam tshig bsgrag par bya ste/ /khyod kyis sro chags bsad par bya/ /ma byin par yang blang bar bya/ /'dod la log par g.yem par bya/ /brdzun gyi tshig kyang smra bar bya/ /rdo rje ma dang byang chub sems/ /srog
302b3(rgyud 'grel): gi phyir yang gtang mi bya/ /dran pa gsal bas gzung byas nas/ /lhag pa'i lha bzhin rin chen tog /ces brjod par bya'o/ /de nas rdo rje slob dpon dang dkyil 'khor gyi lha rnams la mchod pa dang/ yon gyi tshogs dgul
302b4(rgyud 'grel): zhing bskor ba byas te/ /glu gar dang/ bkra shis la sogs brjod nas 'gron gyi tshogs rnams la gtor ma byin zhing dkyil 'khor bsdu bar bya'o/ /de dag gis ni gnas skabs kyi bye brag mang bar 'jug pa'i don rnams phyogs
302b5(rgyud 'grel): gcig tu bsdus te bstan pa yin pas gang zag gi bye brag gis so so'i gnas skabs shes par bya ste/ phyi mtshams dang/ bar mtshams dang/ nang gi mtshams su cho ga ma nor ba'i sgo nas dbang bskur ba dang sgrub pa bsdebs pa
302b6(rgyud 'grel): ni lam gyi man ngag go/ de dag ni dpal rdo rje sems dpa' i dkyil 'khor gyi sgo nas bsnyen pa'i cho ga'o// //da ni nye ba'i bsnyen pa rtsom pa bas/ dang po rnam par snang mdzad kyi sgo nas zhi ba las la 'jug pa'i phyir/
302b7(rgyud 'grel): dkyil 'khor dang chas gos lnga dag sgyur zhing zhi ba'i mchod pa dang/ rdzas dag bsags nas/ gzhi'i ting nge 'dzin dang/ rten gyi ting nge 'dzin dang/ ye shes kyi dkyil 'khor la dmigs pa dang/ mdun gyi dkyil 'khor la dmigs
303a1(rgyud 'grel): pa dang/ gnyis su med pa'i dkyil 'khor la dmigs pa'i bya ba nas lha so so'i bzlas brjod kyis zhi ba'i las la sbyar zhing/ mchod pa dang/ bstod pa dang bskul ba dang/ tshogs kyi cho ga dang/ sbyin sreg dang/
303a2(rgyud 'grel): lhag ma'i las dang/ dkyil 'khor bsdu ba rnams rim pa bzhin bya'o/ /de ltar dbang dang/ rgyas pa dang/ las sna tshogs pa dag la yang so so'i rdzas dang/ chas gos lnga dag sgyur zhing dkyil 'khor bsgom pa
303a3(rgyud 'grel): dang/ cho ga'i gzhung bsrang ba dang/ bzlas brjod kyis so so'i las la sbyor pa dang/ mchod bstod dang/ bskul ba la sogs pa'i las rnam rdzogs par byas nas dkyil 'khor bsdu ba rnams rim pa bzhin du
303a4(rgyud 'grel): rdzogs par bya'o/ /de ltar so so'i skabs su rdzas la brten pa'i las dag bsgrub cing/ ci 'dod pa'i don la gsol ba gdab par bya'o/ /de nas sgrub pa po don la sbyor ba'i phyir snga ma las zhal bsgyur te/ chas
303a5(rgyud 'grel): gos dang/ dkyil 'khor dang/ mchod rdzas dang/ rgyan cha dang/ cha lugs kyi bye brag dag khro bo'i rnam pa mthun par dur khrod chas brgyad kyi mtshon cing gnas te/ rdo rje rgyal po dang/ rgyal 'theb dang/ las kyi rdo rjes
303a6(rgyud 'grel): rang gi las dang 'jug par bya'o/ /de nas mar me dang/ band+ha dang/ rdzas dang/ dngos grub kyi phyag rgya dag dgram zhing byin bskyed par bya'o/ /de nas dpal he ru ka'i dkyil 'khor bskyed pa dang/ yongs su rdzogs par
303a7(rgyud 'grel): bya ba dang/ spyan drangs la sogs pa'i cho gas mnyes par bya ba dang/ bzlas brjod kyi rnam pa gsal bar byas nas dbyangs drug gis bskul ba dang/ mchod cing bstong pa dang/ bskul ba dang/ tshogs kyi cho
303b1(rgyud 'grel): ga dang/ sbyin sreg? dang/ lhag pa'i las rnams rdzogs par byas nas/ de ltar dkyil 'khor drug gi bzlas brjod kyi rim pa ni zhag gcig la nyin mtshan dus drug tu bcad de/ thun mong dang khyad par gyis bzlas pa dag rab 'bring
303b2(rgyud 'grel): bsdus rgyas kyis brtsam zhing thog ma'i dus su ni bsgom pa dang/ bzlas pa'i yan lag rdzogs par byas nas thun tha ma gnyis la ni kun tu bzang po'i mchod pa nas/ brtsams te mthar rdzogs par bya'o/ /de yang bsnyan pa dang
303b3(rgyud 'grel): bsgrub pa'i dus su bzlas pa'i grangs mnyam par ji srid mtshan ma'i rtags mi gsal gyi bar du brtsam zhing/ nye ba'i bsnyen pa dag la ni ji ltar 'tsham par thun mong gi bsnyen pa las bzhi'i sgo nas bskul ba dang/ khyad
303b4(rgyud 'grel): par du lha so so'i bsngags brjod par bya'o/ /sgrub pa'i dus su yang bzlas pa gnyis rdzogs par gyur nas/ las bzhi'i bskul bas mthar dbyung ngo/ /de nas mtshams gcig gis cho gas sgrub pa po bsam par bya ste/ rigs
303b5(rgyud 'grel): kyi dkyil 'khor thams cad dran par byas nas/ de nas gnyis su med pa'i tshul du sbyor ba'i byang chub kyis sems bsdus te/ dbang po lnga la thig le bya'o/ /de dag ni thams cad dag pa'i sbyor bas bdag nyid lus la dkyil
303b6(rgyud 'grel): 'khor rdzogs par bsgom pa'o/ /de nas dkyil 'khor drug gi sbyor bas rim pa bzhin yi ge gcig pa'i sngags brjod cing/ las thams cad dngos grub du bya ba dang/ dngos grub thams cad dbang du bya ba'i phyir/ phyag
303b7(rgyud 'grel): rgya rim pa bzhin du bcings te/ rnam shes kyi phyag rgya shes pa la sogs pas brtags nas/ so so'i mtshan ma dag so so'i phyag rgya dang sbyor bas dbang cing dbyangs drug bro gar dang bcas pas dngos grub kyi stsol
304a1(rgyud 'grel): byang bya ste/ mchod cing bstod nas mtshan ltas byung ba'i dus su dngos grub gang yin pa'i sgo nas blangs te/ dbang bskur bar bya'o/ /de'i dus su phan gnod byed pa'i mtshan ma ngo shes par byas nas re dogs
304a2(rgyud 'grel): med pa'i sems kyis dngos grub blang ba dang/ bgegs bzlog pa'i cho ga dag brtsam par bya'o/ /gal te grub bam mi gsal na zhi ba dang/ rgyas pa dang/ dbang dang/ drag po dang/ mnan pa dang/ bzlas pa'i cho gas bsgrub par
304a3(rgyud 'grel): bya ba'am/ sbyin sreg gis shis par bya'o/ /skabs skabs su mtshams kyi cho ga dang/ dri chab la sogs pa byin gyis brlab pa dang/ mkha' 'gro ma bskyang ba dang/ sbyin sreg dang/ bskang bshags rnams ni las kyi rdo rjes
304a4(rgyud 'grel): bya'o/ /de nas sgrub pa chen po mthar phyin nas dkyil 'khor gyi mdza' ma skor zhing 'di dang/ phyi mar mi bral ba'i smon lam gdab bo/ /yang rdo rje sems dpa' i yi ge brgya pas lhag chad bskang zhing bshags byang
304a5(rgyud 'grel): byas nas bkra shis brjod cing dngos grub kyi lhag ma blangs te rnal 'byor pas longs spyod do/ /slar yang mchod pa'i tshogs rnams lha dang/ bla ma la phul te bstod pa byas nas/ bro gar dang rdo rje'i glus dgyes par bya'o//
304a6(rgyud 'grel): de nas ye shes kyi dkyil 'khor bton nas mdun du bzhag ste/ mchod cing bstod nas/ bkra shis brjod cing gshegs su gsol zhing/ dam tshig dkyil 'khor rim bzhin bsdus nas gzugs brnyan gyis rdzas
304a7(rgyud 'grel): rnams dang/ tshon rtsi dag bsdus te gsang ba'i gnas su bzhag go/ de'i rjes la rdzas dang maN+Dal legs par dag pa'i tshogs bya ba gzhan gyis ma mthong bar bgyi'o/ /yang khro bo bcu las mchod cing bstod de/ /phu ral
304b1(rgyud 'grel): bsdus la cod pan dkrol zhing khrus byas nas brda dang mtshan ma dgrol bar bya'o/ /de nas gtor ma rgya chen po bshams te/ 'gron tshogs rnams bsdus la sngos nas mnyes pas las la bzhag go/ yang khyad par gyi bsrungs ma
304b2(rgyud 'grel): dag la bsngos te/ rten la bzhag pa'i rgyal po bzhi dang/ phur pas gtab pa'i phyogs skyong rnams mnyes nas/ rang gi gnas su gshegs su gsol lo/ /de nas rnal 'byor pa rnams shis pa brjod cing bkra shis 'don pa dang/ chos
304b3(rgyud 'grel): sbyin brjod pa dang/ 'gro ba'i don du smon lam gdab pa dang/ spyod lam gyi rnal 'byor ma nyams par bya'o/ /dang po'i rnal 'byor snga ma'i rim bzhin bka' / /legs bstan rjes mthun dam pas gsal byas gang/ /de don sgrub
304b4(rgyud 'grel): rim snga ma'i gzhung nyid bzhin/ /khyad par lhag pa cung zhig brjod pa med/ /'on kyang go rims mi gsal legs bsdebs pas/ /dang po gang du bdag pas dman sogs rnams/ /tshogs med pa bas las chen bsgrub
304b5(rgyud 'grel): pa'i phyir/ /sgrib pa'i rim pa gus pas blang bar mdzod/ /tshe 'dis phyag rgya chen po'i lam sgrub phyir/ /de yi cho ga dri med legs bshad pas/ /dga' mdzes pad dkar yid 'ong tshogs rgyas la/ /de 'dod brten pa'i don thob
304b6(rgyud 'grel): tshim bzhin shog /dpal sangs rgyas thams cad dang mnyam par sbyor ba'i dkyil 'khor sgrub pa'i rim pa zhes bya ba slob dpon chen po hUM mdzad rdo rjes mdzad pa rdzogs so// //rgya gar gyi mkhan po bidya ka
304b7(rgyud 'grel): ra siM ha dang/ bod kyi lo tsA ba lha rin po ches bsgyur zhing gtan la phab pa'o// */ /dpal khrag 'thung chen po'i sgrub thabs bzhugs so// */ /rgya gar skad du/ saM sid+d+hi mahA sh+rI he ru ka no pi ka nA ma/ bod skad du
305a1(rgyud 'grel): dpal khrag 'thung chen po'i sgrub thabs yang dag grub pa zhes bya ba/ bcom ldan 'das khrag 'thung chen po la phyag 'tshal lo/ /yang dag grub pa gcig pu nyid/ /sangs rgyas bde chen kun 'dus pa/ /rnal 'byor
305a2(rgyud 'grel): zab mo sku gsum rdzogs/ /mkha' 'gro sgyu ma bde mchog de'i/ /shes rab kyi ni blo phye nas/ /nges par rtogs pa'i sa gzhi las/ /bla mas nges pa'i lung 'di bstan/ /snum pa yi ni dam tshig dang/ /gtsang dang 'jigs pa'i
305a3(rgyud 'grel): rdul zhugs can/ /de dag goms nas nyams su blang/ /blo zhan shes rab chung bas ni/ /bsgrubs kyang 'grub par mi 'gyur te/ /phung byed gnyis ka bsregs pas na/ /de bas gzhan du bstan pa min/ /phun sum tshogs pa
305a4(rgyud 'grel): gzhi ldan nas/ /rdzas dang sa gzhi brtags par ni/ /cir yang 'gyur pa'i yig 'bru bsam/ /'od zer tshul du 'phros nas kyang/ /ma lus khyab pas mnyes byas te/ /re dang dam pa'i tshul zhes dgongs/ /'od zer de dag
305a5(rgyud 'grel): bsdus nas kyang/ /dur khrod sa ru brtag par bya/ /'byung po'i gtor ma gtang nas kyang/ /gsang ba'i don gyi las rnams bya/ /dkyil 'khor nub phyogs de bzhin bzhi/ /khaM phor ri mo bris pa dgu /snang ba'i 'od dang bcas pa
305a6(rgyud 'grel): ?/ /rdzas kyis mdzes par 'khor bar bzhag /mig gi rten yang mngon par bya/ /de nas dur khrod bdag po dag /phyag rgya che dang ldan pa yis/ /ci rigs su ni las rnams bya/ /mi dmigs chos la blo brtags shing//
305a7(rgyud 'grel): ye shes can gyi byin stobs kyis/ /thams cad tshul bzhin byin rlabs nas/ /rtogs pa'i blo can de dag gis/ /srog lus man chad rdzas kyi rnams/ /bla ma mnyes par bya phyir dbul/ /dngos grub 'dod pas gsol ba
305b1(rgyud 'grel): gdab/ /slob dpon ji bzhin stan bder gnas/ /rdo rje'i tshul du dbang can sbyin/ /g.yon phyogs gnas la tshul bzhin du/ /ji ltar 'dod pa bzhin du sbyar/ /gar mkhan tshul 'dra sgyu ma'i rgya/ /de la 'ja' tshon bzhin du gsal/ /'dod
305b2(rgyud 'grel): chags ye shes gsal ba'i phyir/ /'bar ba sna tshogs 'khrigs pa'i 'od/ /thim pas rgyal mar byin gyis brlabs/ /ye shes dam tshig chen po yis/ /bde mchog sgyu ma'i brdas mtshon te/ /pad+ma rin chen ldan byas nas/ /
305b3(rgyud 'grel): dbyings kyi bde chen 'byung bya ste/ /rang rig ye shes de la 'od/ /ji bzhin mkha' la gsal ba dag /dri med nyi ma'i 'od pas 'tsher/ /khams gsum rab tu 'das nas kyang/ /ma lus snying rjes khyab byas te/ /'dod par bya ba
305b4(rgyud 'grel): rab tu gnyis/ /'od 'dus thog ma'i gzugs la bzung/ /de dag dngos grub chen po bas/ /ji ltar 'dod par nan tan bya/ /dbang thob mdzes pa de dag gis/ /dul ba'i sems su bzhag nas kyang/ /dam tshig chen pos bde bar gnas/ /bsnyen par
305b5(rgyud 'grel): gnang ba'i dbang thob nas/ /sgom dbyangs yi ge 'bru brgyad bstan/ /ston pas bstan pa'i lung bzhin du/ /sgom rgyud gsal bar ci nus bya/ /lhag pa'i rtags kyis kun mtshon nas/ /grub rdzas de dag byin gyis brlab/ /dmigs med rtogs
305b6(rgyud 'grel): pa'i gdeng can gyis/ /kun mchog 'bar ba'i tshul du bsam/ /khams gsum khrag tu dmigs nas ni/ /dur khrod kun tu khyab par bsam/ /dngos ni a ru byin brlabs nas/ /rin chen gsal bar shar ba dang/ /byang chub sems ni 'od
305b7(rgyud 'grel): zer spro/ /mos pa'i thugs la mnyes bsams nas/ /'od 'dus thog ma'i gzugs la gzung/ /phyag mtshan snying po phra mo dag /bstan par red nas mkha' la bzhag /bskul ba'i rang bzhin kun 'dus pas/ /des kyang spro ba'i las rnams
306a1(rgyud 'grel): byed/ /dngos kyang mchod pa'i rdzas su sngo/ /sangs rgyas tshe 'di bsgrub pa'i phyir/ /sku gsum sa la goms par bya/ /dang por chos kyi dbyings nyid la/ /dmigs pa med pa'i don gyis bsgom/ /chos kyi dbyings kyi ye shes kyis
306a2(rgyud 'grel): thams cad du yang khyab par bya/ /rdo rje sems dpa' la sogs pa/ /dkyil 'khor lnga la sogs pa'i 'khor/ /zhi ba'i mchod pas mnyes pa dag /bsnyen pa'i don du de dag gyur/ /bsgrub pas bstan pa'i lung bzhin du/ /sku mdog so so'i
306a3(rgyud 'grel): phyag mtshan dang/ /rgyan dang cha lugs gsal ba dang/ /bskyed rdzogs grub pa'i lha dag bsgom/ /dngos grub dam pa blang ba'i phyir/ /snga ma las ni gnas bsgyur te/ /bskal pa'i me dpung 'khrigs pa bzhin/ /'bar ba'i tshogs ni rnam
306a4(rgyud 'grel): par bsam/ /ye shes dkyil 'khor spyan drangs te/ /gzhugs dang brten dang mi g.yo ba/ /dam tshig zil gnon phyag byed dang/ /mchod dang bstod dang bza' ba dang/ /tshul rigs goms pa'i blo dag gis/ /ci rigs su ni brtan par bya/ /
306a5(rgyud 'grel): dam tshig mchog gi mchod pa dang/ /bskul tshig dbyangs kyis de dag mnyes/ /'khor bcas mchod pa rdzogs nas ni/ /bsnyen pa'i lung bzhin brtson par 'bad/ /zhag grangs dus ni brtag pa'o/ /mtshan ma bstan po byung ba na/ /sgrub pa
306a6(rgyud 'grel): chen po brtsam par bya/ /bar chad byed pa'i bgegs chen yang/ /'jigs pa med pa'i sems kyis bzlog /dngos grub sbyin pa'i gzugs can yang/ /re dang dogs pa la sogs pa/ /ngan pa'i don gyi sems mi 'byung/ /phan
306a7(rgyud 'grel): gnod byed pa rnams gnyis po/ /gzugs dang sgra dang dri dag ni/ /rnam pa gsum po byung ba ni/ /dogs dang chags pa'i sems spangs te/ /bye brag tu ni shes par bya/ /nyams kyi phyag rgyas rang don sad/ /gal te 'byung po mnan par bya/
306b1(rgyud 'grel): kun kyang sems can don du bsngo/ /sgrub pa chen po yang dag grub pa zhes bya ba/ grub pa'i slob dpon chen po badzra hUM ka ra'i zhal snga nas mdzad pa rdzogs so// //bod kyi lha btsan po khri srong lde btsan gyi bka' 
306b2(rgyud 'grel): lung gis dpal na len+d+ra'i gtsug lag khang du// //rgya gar gyi mkhan po hUM ka ra de nyid dang/ zhu chen gyi lo tsA ba bande snubs nam mkha' i snying pos bsgyur cing zhus te gtan la phab pa'o// //
306b3(rgyud 'grel): rgyud kyi rgyal po sangs rgyas thams cad dang mkha' 'gro ma bde mchog gi dkyil cho ga bzhugs// */ /rgya gar skad du/ sh+rI sarba bud+d+ha sa ma yo ga DA kI nI dzA la saM par ma hA hanha rA dza nA ma maN+Da la no bi ka sarba satwa su kho ta ya nA ma/ bod skad
306b4(rgyud 'grel): du/ rgyud kyi rgyal po dpal sangs rgyas thams cad dang mnyam par sbyor ba mkha' 'gro ma sgyu ma bde mchog ces bya ba'i dkyil 'khor gyi cho ga sems can thams cad kyi bde bskyed ma zhes bya ba/ dpal rdo rje sems dpa' la phyag
306b5(rgyud 'grel): 'tshal lo/ /ma lus bdud rnams spro zhing bsdu ba mdzad nas rgyal gyur cing/ /bde gshegs rnams kyi thugs bral bskyungs nas bde mdzad rgyal gyur te/ /rdo rje'i sbyor bar rang gi yan lag dga' mdzad rgyal gyur nas/ /khrag gi
306b6(rgyud 'grel): gtung bas myos shing btsun mo la spyod rgyal par gyur/ /sangs rgyas thams cad mnyam sbyor ba/ /zab cing rgya tsha yon tan can/ /myur du byang chub rab sgrub pa/ /kun tu nub pa nyid mthong nas/ /dkyil 'khor cho ga'i rim 'di ni/ /sems
306b7(rgyud 'grel): can thams cad sngon 'gro ba'i/ /bde ba skyed ma zhes bya ba/ /kha cig rjes su gzung phyir yin/ /de nyid kyis ni rjes gzung ste/ /gang phyir de yin rjes bzung bas/ /ma lus sdig pa zad pas na/ /'di ni bdag gis gus par byas/ /
307a1(rgyud 'grel): gang phyir de yi gzugs sku ni/ /brim pa'i thang ka la sogs te/ /de yi yon tan dran sgo nas/ /de gzugs kha dog can du 'gyur/ /de rigs som nyi med pa dang/ /mchog tu yid dga' skyed pa ste/ /rigs med
307a2(rgyud 'grel): yon tan med gyur cing/ /kha cig rnam par 'phrul par 'gyur/ /des na rab rgyas gyur pa ni/ /gang zhig 'di ni dgos min te/ /de lta na yang brgya lam na/ /kha cig la ni dgos par 'gyur/ /brtse med khro la gdug pa dang//
307a3(rgyud 'grel): le lo chags dang sdang ldan pa/ /de sogs skyon ni rnam spangs te/ /mtshan nyid kun dang ldan pa yi/ /slob dpon sangs rgyas las dngos pa'i/ /mkhas pa yis ni bya ba yin/ /zhi dang rgyas dang rab gnas sogs/ /'dod dang
307a4(rgyud 'grel): don byed nus rnams kyi/ /slob mas dkyil 'khor bris pa la/ /lan gnyis lan gsum par gsol gdab/ /sngon du bsnyen pas bgegs gzhom dang/ /tshogs ni bskyed par bya ba'i phyir/ /'khor lo'i gtso bo'i sngags
307a5(rgyud 'grel): 'bum bzlas/ /yang na lhag pa'i lha ru mtshon/ /gzhan gyi yang ni khri yin te/ /'di ni sngon du bsnyen par brjod/ /gza' dang skar sogs bzang po la/ /mkhas pa yis ni brtsam byas te/ /zla ba drug dang gza' bzhi dang/
307a6(rgyud 'grel): skar ma rnams ni bcu bzhi dang/ /tshes grangs bdun du phye ba la/ /rab gnas la sogs rgyas par gsungs/ /dpyid zla ra ba 'bring dgun chung/ /dbyar zla ra 'bring dgun zla dang/ /gza' lag bla ma pa ba sangs/ /zla ba'i
307a7(rgyud 'grel): gza' rnams 'di dag go /rgyal dang me bzhi lha mtshams dang/ /snar ma bya bzhug mon gre dang/ /chu smad snron dang khrums dang lag /lnga pa bdun pa bcu rnams dang/ /gang zhig gsum dang 'gengs pa dang/ /zla ba nya
307b1(rgyud 'grel): dang bcu gsum pa/ /tshes grangs bdun ni dge ba yin/ /ji ltar sngar brjod skar bzang ni/ /rjes su mthun par spyang bya ste/ /gzhan du slob dpon rdzas 'dod pas/ /dmyal ba nyid du ltung ba yin/ /de lta'i rim pas spyang bya ste/ /ri dang grong khyer grong
307b2(rgyud 'grel): rdal dang/ /sa phyogs yid dang mthun pa ru/ /sa gzhi yongs su gzugs par bya/ /thal ba rus dum gtum bu rnams/ /shin tu dag pa nyid du bya/ /lho dang chu la thugs pa ru/ /sa ni shar dang byang du nub/ /dngos po kun la kun rdzob tu/ /
307b3(rgyud 'grel): rigs ni rnam par bzhir brjod do/ /dmangs rigs las ni bram ze'i bar/ /gnag ser dmar dang dkar po'o/ /de nas dri ni shes byas te/ /gnag dang chu rul phaT dri dang/ /bzhi pa yid 'ong dri ru brjod/ /ro yang yod ni brtag par bya/ /sgyur zhing
307b4(rgyud 'grel): rtsub pa dmar rigs 'gyur/ /mngar brje rigs kyang yin te/ /tsha ba yang ni rgyal rigs la/ /gzhan ni kha zhing bska pa yin/ /zhi dang rgyas dang de bzhin dbang/ /mngon spyod kyang ni 'dod pa ste/ /sa ni 'di ltar rim brjod pa/ /brkos
307b5(rgyud 'grel): nas yang ni dgang bar bya/ /ji ltar kha dog brjod sogs rim/ /mkhas pa bsang gtor bya ba ste/ /nag po ji ltar brjod pa ni/ /ser po bu ram nyid yin no/ /dkar po'i don phyir tsan dan nyid/ /dmar po pad+ma'i chu nyid dang/ /dmar
307b6(rgyud 'grel): po tsan dan dag gis te/ /'di ni gnyis kar shes par bya/ /ser po la ni gur gum ste/ /nag po yang ni brjod par bya/ /sha rul ba'i chu nyid do/ /de bzhin ro don brjod bya ste/ /nag po ji ltar brjod pa ni/ /ser po bu ram nyid
307b7(rgyud 'grel): yin no/ /dmar mo la ni tsha ba gsum/ /dkar po ji ltar brjod nyid yin/ /sa la phur gdab bsrung ba'i phyir/ /da ni bdag gis brjod par bya/ /n+ya gro d+ha phur zhi ba la/ /rgyas pa a shwa tha shing ste/ /dbang la seng ldeng phur bu gnas/ /
308a1(rgyud 'grel): bsad pa la ni rus pa'o/ /zhi ba la sogs bye brag gis/ /de nas bum pa brjod byas te/ /zhi ba la ni shes rab bzhin/ /rgyas pa la ni dngul du grag /dbang la gser gyi rang bzhin te/ /bsang pa la ni thod pa yin/ /dngul
308a2(rgyud 'grel): la sogs pa med gyur na/ /sa'i rang bzhin rtsa mi gnas/ /tsan dan dang ni gur gum dang/ /de bzhin tsan dan dmar po dang/ /dur khrod sol ba'i phye ma yis/ /mkhas pa yis ni byug par bya/ /zhi ba snga dro bya ba ste/ /rgyas pa de yi
308a3(rgyud 'grel): de ma thag /de nas dbang gi las yin te/ /dgongs ka bsad pa'i las yin no/ /de nas mchod yon snod bshad de/ /ji ltar khams dang tshang gyur pa/ /shel dang dngul dang gser dang ni/ /rim pa bzhin du lcags nyid do/ /pad+ma'i rnam
308a4(rgyud 'grel): pa dngul yin te/ /sor ni bcu gnyis pa nyid do/ /'dab ma yang ni bzhi bzhi ste/ /zhi ba la sogs lha gzugs ni/ /ji ltar nga ni brjod par bya/ /zhi ba la sogs dkar po ste/ /zhi ba'i rang bzhin mnyam pa'o/ /rgyas pa la ni ser po ste/ /
308a5(rgyud 'grel): mchog tu gter sogs dgug pa'o/ /dbang la chags pa'i sems kyis te/ /kha dog dmar zhing 'bar ba'o/ bsad pa kha dog nag po ste/ /'khrugs shing 'jigs pa nyid yin no/ /thig skud khru brgyad par gsungs te/ /gzhon nu ma yis
308a6(rgyud 'grel): bkal ba yis/ /du ma rab tu bkal nas ni/ /slob dpon mtheb sor bcu gnyis cha'o/ /'dug stangs ji ltar gsungs pa ni/ /rim bzhin ji ltar brjod par bya/ /zhi ba sems dpa' i skyil krung ste/ /rgyas la de bzhin rdor skyil krung/ /dbang la
308a7(rgyud 'grel): g.yon pa'i stangs stabs te/ /skyil krung stan la legs gnas pa'o/ /g.yas pas gdengs te bsnyal ba ni/ /bsang pa la mchog lta min bzhin/ /ji ltar go rims bzhin du ni/ /bdag gis bzlas phreng brjod bya ste/ /zhi ba la
308b1(rgyud 'grel): ni shel rang bzhin/ /rgyas la mu tig 'bras bur brjod/ /dbang la bo de rtse ru bshad/ /bsad pa mi yi rus pa yin/ /gser dang dngul dang mu tig dang/ /mthing shun dang ni byi ru ste/ /rin po che ni lngar brjod nas/ /kha rgyan lnga ni brjod par bya//
308b2(rgyud 'grel): 'dzam bu na da bi lnga dang/ /skyur shing sa bon gang pa'o/ /'bru ni til dang gro dang ni/ /sran ma nas dang 'bras bu brjod/ /de ltar rim pas myur ba ru/ /mkhas pa yis ni gzhan don bya/ /gang zhig rang don dgos byed na/ /rmongs pas dmyal
308b3(rgyud 'grel): ba nyid du ldan/ /dri chu sbrang rtsi 'o ma dang/ /dag pa'i chu dang me tog dkar/ /gzhan gyi las kyi rim tshul te/ /ji ltar brjod pa'i rim gang yin/ /ji ltar brjod pa'i bzed zhal du/ /mngon par bsngags te dri yis bdug /me tog spos dang
308b4(rgyud 'grel): de bzhin me/ /dri yis dung sogs g.yas su bzhag /sngags kyi mchod yon snod ni g.yon/ /bzed zhal mdun du bzhag par bya/ /yi ge gsum gyi sngags kyis ni/ /mchod yon snod la bsngags par bya/ /zhi la mthar ni wa bshad
308b5(rgyud 'grel): de/ /rgyas la mthar ni b+hyo bshad do/ /dbang la mthar ni h+ri yig ste/ /bsad pa'i mthar ni hUM phaT ngo/ /dang po dri chu dbul bar bya/ /sbrang dang 'o ma gnyis pa'o/ /dag pa'i chu ni gsum pa sti/ /me tog dang bcas bzhi par ro/ /dung chos nas
308b6(rgyud 'grel): ni dri yi chu/ /bzed zhal du ni dbul bar bya/ /zhal bsil thor thung 'o ma sbrang/ /yang ni bsang gtor chu nyid do/ /dkyil 'khor bri bar bya phyir dang/ /gdug pa rnams ni zhi phyir dang/ /sa la sogs pa brtag pa'i phyir/ /gnas bsrung rim
308b7(rgyud 'grel): brjod par bya/ /thog mar rdo rje slob dpon gyis/ /bdag gi gnas ni bsrung bar bya/ /phyis nas sa sogs gzung ba ni/ /legs par mnyam par bzhag par bya/ /rtag po'i ru ru phyin nas ni/ /'jam pa'i stan la legs 'dug nas//
309a1(rgyud 'grel): dag blos shar du kha bltas te/ /rta mchog gi ni ting 'dzin du/ /rnal 'byor pa yis bsam bya ste/ /yan lag la yang dgod par bya/ /oM yig kha dog dkar po yis/ /sa bon bral bar bsam par bya/ /a yig kha
309a2(rgyud 'grel): dog dmar po ni/ /longs spyod 'khor lor dgod par bya/ /hUM yig kha dog nag po ni/ /snying ga'i dkyil du dgod par bya/ /ho yig kha dog ser po ni/ /lte ba'i 'khor lor dgod pa'o/ /haM k+ShaM spyi gtsug gsang ba ni/ /ljang dang sngo ba de bzhin
309a3(rgyud 'grel): te/ /'khor lo drug tu rim bzhin du/ /dkyil 'khor drug ni bsgom byas te/ /sa gzhi rnams ni yongs gyur pas/ /mkhas pa yis ni rdo rje spro/ /rdo rje de las 'phros pa yi/ /rdo rje 'bar ba mi zad pas/ /phyogs bcur kun tu gnas
309a4(rgyud 'grel): pa yis/ /bgegs kun 'bar bas bsreg par bya/ /der gnas yul gyi ming gis ming/ /mkhas pa yis ni shes byas te/ /thog ma nyid du zhing skyong la/ /gtor ma byin te gtang bar bya/ /oM A(rgyud 'grel): hUM a mug ya sa pa
309a5(rgyud 'grel): ri wa ra ya/ i daM ba le gand+haM/ puShpaM/ d+hU paM dI paM/ ak+Sha daM/ dang ma he/ sa pa rI wa ra brI grih+Na pa tsha tu/ dza(rgyud 'grel): hUM baM ho(rgyud 'grel): i daM ba li grih+Na tu kha ta tu sa pa ri wa ri/ sarbA satwa naM/ shA na ti puSh+TiM/ rak+Shi war+Na go puSh+TiM ka ro tu ka /i daM
309a6(rgyud 'grel): s+tha naM ta ga twa he/ maN+Dal b+hu myaM/ tiSh+Tha tu hUM hUM phaT/ badzra d+hA ra adz+nyA pa ya hi swAhA/ bshad par gyur pa'i rim pa yis/ /bsrung ba'i 'khor los bsam bya ste/ /rlung sogs dkyil 'khor bsgom par bya/ /de dag yongs su gyur pa
309a7(rgyud 'grel): las/ /ji srid mthong ba'i par du ni/ /'khor lo'i mthar ni bsrung ba'i phyir/ /ra ba lnga yang de bzhin no/ /'og gi cha yi rtsa gsum la/ /steng gi mda' yi dra ba'o/ /ha ya ra ba la rgyu las/ /mkhas pas mkha' sogs dgong bya ste//
309b1(rgyud 'grel): yang ni yi ge gsum nyid dang/ /ha gnyis steng dang 'og tu'o/ /shes rab can gyis bsrungs bsgoms nas/ /bruM yig sa bon las byung ba'i/ /gzhal yas khang yang bsgom bya ste/ /der ni paM skyes pad+ma'o/ /de steng raM las nyi dkyil 'khor
309b2(rgyud 'grel): der ni a las zla dkyil 'khor/ /hUM bsam dag las rta mchog ste/ /bde mchog ma dang mnyam sbyor ma'o/ /zhal bzhi pa la dpung pa bzhi/ /phyag bzhi pa la zhabs bzhi pa/ /rta mgrin rgyal po chen po ste/ /dbang phyug chen po dam grub
309b3(rgyud 'grel): pa'o/ /dpal ldan sna tshogs pad 'chang zhing/ /g.yon 'og mdun du ral gri'o/ /g.yas pas rdo rje dang bcas 'phyar/ /g.yas 'og ba dan gsum par bya/ /de snying pad+mar nyid bsgom te/ /hUM la khro bo chen po'i ni/ /gdug cing rab tu
309b4(rgyud 'grel): mi bzad pa'i/ /khro bo bcu ni spro bar bya/ /mi lus gdegs ni gzhom pa dang/ /bdud bzhi zad par mdzad pa ste/ /'jigs pa'i dus mdza' i me 'bar bas/ /log 'dren bgegs ni bsreg par bya/ /mkha' khyab 'od zer tshogs 'phrog pa'i/ /de'i 'khor
309b5(rgyud 'grel): lo bsgoms nas ni/ /bdud sogs rnam par bcom byas te/ /de nas mnyam par bzhag par bya/ /oM A(rgyud 'grel): hUM ho(rgyud 'grel): haM k+Sha h+ra(rgyud 'grel): h+ra(rgyud 'grel): h+ra(rgyud 'grel): ra ra ra/ badzra a na la sarbbA wa ra na/ sarbba d+ha ma pra la ya sa b+ha ba sarbba mA ra ka ye ka bignan bi na ya ka di
309b6(rgyud 'grel): naM/ dA sha dig+ga? ta nAM ka ya wAk+tsit+ta ni/ da ha da ha/ pa tsa pa tsa/ b+hasmi ku ru hUM hUM hUM phaT/ 'di ni bgegs bsreg pa'i sngags so/ /log 'dren gyi ni bgegs la sogs/ /rdo rje lcags kyus bkug byas te/ /rdo rje zhags pas bcings byas nas//
309b7(rgyud 'grel): bcing pa kun gyis bcing bar bsgom/ /khro rgyal rdo rje phur bu ni/ /lte smad dpal gyi rang bzhin te/ /phyogs bcu gdug pa'i bgegs steng du/ /son par rnam par bsgom par bya/ /oM g+ha g+ha g+ha ta ya g+hA ta ya/ sarbba duSh+Tan phaT/ kI la kI la ya
310a1(rgyud 'grel): sarbba pA pe phaT/ hUM hUM hUM badzra kI la ya badzra d+ha rong a dz+nyA pa ya ti/ kA ya bAk+tsit+ta badzra kI la hUM phaT/ oM badzra mud kar badzra bI la ya a ko Ta ya hUM phaT/ phyogs mtshams phur bus bsrung pa la/ /khro bo rnams la bka' 
310a2(rgyud 'grel): stsol bsgo/ /blo ldan khro rgyal bsam bya ste/ /gsang sngags 'di ni brjod par bya/ /oM hUM kro te truM haM/ kro ta nA madz+nyA na da ka ya swA hA/ oM badzra ta thA ga tA rak+Sha tsakra swa b+ha ba at+ma konyahaM/ zhes nga rgyal brtan par bskyed par bya'o/ /chad par
310a3(rgyud 'grel): gyur ba'i rim pa yis/ /de nas de la gtor ma sbyin/ /dag cing rtogs la spar byas te/ /bdud rtsir byas te bsgrub par bya/ /thog mar thal mos dgab byas te/ /de nas rnam par phyag rgya bcing/ /oM A(rgyud 'grel): hUM ho(rgyud 'grel): u tiSh+Tha Sha/ suM b+hA ni suM b+hA/
310a4(rgyud 'grel): ya mAn+ta ka /bignAn+ta ka /pa mA dan+ta ka /bignan+ta ka /a tsa la ni li la danTa/ Ta ki rA dza/ mahA ba la dza b+hya/ i daM ba laM gand+ha daM puShpaM d+hA paM dI paM ak+Sha taM dAdma hi/ te tsa A gatstsa sa pa ri wA rA sI g+h+raM/ i daM pA liM/ grih+na du Sha da tu prI? ban+tu
310a5(rgyud 'grel): dza(rgyud 'grel): hUM baM ho(rgyud 'grel): san+t+re? rA da sarbba swatwa naM/ shan+ti(rgyud 'grel): pustra rak+Sha waM gupte kur ban du/ hUM hUM hUM phaT/ de nas g.yas g.yon rkang gnyis la/ hUM hUM dag las byung ba yi/ /rdo rje rkang mthil la gnas bas/ /rdo rje'i 'gros kyis gar bya'o/ /de nas g.yas
310a6(rgyud 'grel): brkyang g.yon brkyang dang/ /mnyam dang mi mnyam pa dag dang/ /zlum po dang ni zla gam dang/ /rus sbal rkang bstabs gcig par bya/ /me tog dri sogs bshams nas ni/ /mkhas pas sa ni bod par bya/ /skyob pa sangs rgyas
310a7(rgyud 'grel): thams cad kyis/ /spyod pa'i tshul dang khyad par las/ /sa dang pha rol phyin pa la/ /lha mo khyod ni dbang du gyur/ /dngos grub thams cad rab sgrub phyir/ /bdag ni dkyil 'khor 'bri bar 'tshal/ /btsun mo dang bcas byang chub
310b1(rgyud 'grel): sems/ /de dag thugs rje ldan pa dang/ /phyogs rnams kun na bzhugs pa yi/ /bde gshegs rnams la gsol ba gdab/ /kun tu thogs med gzigs pa yi/ /mgon po bdag la dgengs su gsol/ /slob ma dbang bskur la sogs
310b2(rgyud 'grel): dang/ /bdag gis dkyil 'khor bri ba dang/ /las rnams thams cad rab sgrub phyir/ /dkyil 'khor du ni bzhugs su gsol/ /sngags pas slar yang mchod bshams nas/ /rdo rje sa ni mdzes gyur pa/ /spyan drangs nas ni
310b3(rgyud 'grel): phyis mchod de/ /gsang sngags 'di ni brjod par bya/ /oM laM hUM badzra b+hu mi tiSh+Ta hUM hUM phaT/ /badzra d+ha ra adz+nyA pa ya ti swA hA/ /de nas yang bum pa'i lhag par gnas pa ste/ /sngags pas sngar brjod bum pa ni/ /grangs ni nyi shu rtsa
310b4(rgyud 'grel): gcig ste/ /yang na lnga 'am dgu nyid du/ /dngos grub 'dod pa rnams kyis bya/ /ji ltar mtshan ma de bri ba/ /ri baM bzhin du brjod par bya/ /gzhu dang 'khor lo de bzhin dri/ thod pa bdud rtsis gang ba dang/ /dpag bsam shing dang sha
310b5(rgyud 'grel): chen dang/ /de bzhin bdun pa lcang lo yin/ /thog mar tha mar rdo rje ste/ /lcags kyu de bzhin zhags pa dang/ /lcags sgrog dril bu de bzhin no/ /las kun pa ni gcig nyid de/ /mkhas pas mchod yon sogs kyis mchod/ /dkyil 'khor gyis
310b6(rgyud 'grel): ni dbus phyogs su/ /mkhas pas rnam rgyil bum bzhag ste/ /rdo rjer me tog phreng bcings la/ /bum steng blo dang ldan pas bzhag /sangs rgyas kun gyi gsang sngags ni/ /brgyad brgya nyid du bzlas par bya/ /de bzhin brgya rtsa brgyad du ni/ /
310b7(rgyud 'grel): dkyil 'khor pa yis bzlas par bya/ /de nas yang ni rdo rje'i thig /dkyil 'khor gyi ni shar gyi char/ /gau rI sngags kyis bzhugs nas ni/ /mchod yon sogs kyis mchod par bya/ /de nas gzhan yang rdo rje'i rdul/ /nub kyi phyogs su bzhag
311a1(rgyud 'grel): bya ste/ /mchod yon sogs kyis mchod par bya/ /de nas lho phyogs nyid du ni/ /slob mas maN+Dal byas nas ni/ /chom rkun ma yi sngags ldan pas/ /rdo rje rtse lnga bzhag bya ste/ /mchod yon sogs kyis mchod
311a2(rgyud 'grel): par bya/ /de nas byang gi phyogs su ni/ /ro langs ma'i gsang sngags kyis/ /rdo rje dril bu bzhag bya ste/ /mchod yon sogs kyis mchod par bya/ /de nas gsang sngags ldan pa yis/ /slob mas maN+Dal byas nas ni/ /me tog phreng ba
311a3(rgyud 'grel): lag thogs nas/ /pus mo g.yas pa sar btsugs te/ /rdo rje bla ma'i bdud rtsi'i thigs/ /de lta bu ni mnyam par bya/ /kha cig sngags ni sgrub phyir dang/ /bsod nams 'dod pa de las gzhan/ /gzhan du 'jig rten don gnyer ba/ /
311a4(rgyud 'grel): dkyil 'khor du ni 'jug par byed/ /'jig rten pha rol don gnyer ba/ /dad pas mang du gnyer ba yis/ /blo ldan dkyil 'khor 'jug bya yi/ /tshe 'di'i 'bras bu 'dod mi bya/ /tshe 'di'i 'dod par 'gyur ba la/ /'jig rten pha rol don mi
311a5(rgyud 'grel): 'gyur/ /skyes bu 'jig rten pha rol gnyer/ /tshe 'di yi ni 'brs bu rgyas/ /de ltar gus pa dang bcas te/ /chos ni mnyan par byas nas su/ /lus ngag bsdams pa'i rang bzhin gyis/ /mdun du tshul bzhin gnas par bya/ /slob
311a6(rgyud 'grel): ma rang gis lus bcug ste/ /rdo rje lam nas pad+mar gdon/ /de las bde gshegs zhu ba yi/ /dbang bskur dkyil 'khor shar sgor gdon/ /de nas thal sbyar pus btsugs nas/ /rdo rje 'dzin pa chen po la/ /'di lta bu yi tshig dag
311a7(rgyud 'grel): gis/ /lan gsum bar du gsol ba gdab/ /bdag gi ston pa dpa' chen khyod/ /bde mchog ma dang mnyam sbyor la/ /byang chub chen po'i tshul bstan pa/ /mgon po yis ni bdag la stsol/ /sangs rgyas chos dang dge 'dun te/ /
311b1(rgyud 'grel): skyabs gsum dag kyang bdag la stsol/ /dam tshig de nyid bdag la stsol/ /byang chub sems kyang bdag la stsol/ /thar pa chen po'i grong khyer du/ /mgon po bdag ni 'jug par 'chal/ /de nas slob ma gtso gyur pa/ /de la bod pa byas nas ni/ /
311b2(rgyud 'grel): mnyam par bzhag pa'i sems kyis su/ /'di lta bu yi tshigs bcas bya/ /khu tshur rdo rje theg chen po'i/ /gsang sngags pa yi tshul chen ni/ /khyod ni theg chen snod min na/ /khyod la yang dag bstan par bya/ /sku gsung thugs kyi rdo rje yi//
311b3(rgyud 'grel): dus gsum rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas rnams/ /'gro la phan phyir bzhugs pa rnams/ /de dag gis ni gsang sngags kyis/ /cho ga bzang po de mkhyen nas/ /dpa' bo byang chub shing drung du/ /thams cad mkhyen pa tshad med rnyed/ /gsang
311b4(rgyud 'grel): sngags spyod pas mnyam med de/ /shAkya seng+ge skyob pa yis/ /bdud sde shin tu mi bzad pa/ /dpung chen dag la'ang de yis bcom/ /de bas kun mkhyen thob bya'i phyir/ /bu yis blo gros 'di gyis shig /de nas bdud rtsi thal sbyor bgyi/ /sngags
311b5(rgyud 'grel): kyi mngon par sngags pa yi/ /a shwat+tha la sogs pa'i shing/ /shun pa ma nyams rma med pa/ /tshad ni bcu gnyis sor tshad la/ /me tog phreng bas rtsi bcings pa/ /mkhas pa yis ni rim bzhin du/ /slob ma rnams la sbyin par bya//
311b6(rgyud 'grel): gang yang mdun du lhung gyur na/ /de yis mchog gi dngos grub yin/ /de bzhin shar du rtse bltas na/ /de la dngos grub 'bring du bshad/ /de ltar phyogs mtshams rtse bltas na/ /'jig rten pa'i dngos grub 'dod/ /de ltar so shing
311b7(rgyud 'grel): dor pa las/ /gang zhig kha yi 'og bltas nas/ /de yis sa 'og dngos grub ni/ /som nyi med pa nyid du brjod/ /de rjes rdo rje slob ma la/ /dri yis chu yis thor 'thung dang/ /dri chu khyor gsum sbyin bya ste/ /oM hUM bi shud+d+ha d+harma ra sarbba
312a1(rgyud 'grel): bi kalpa an/ /a saM sho d+ha ya sarbba bi kalpa a na ya hUM/ /de nas yang ni nye 'dug ste/ /bdud rtsi thal sbyor gsang sngags kyis/ /ku sha'i rtse la rab bsngags te/ /de nas sngags dung stan du sbyin/ /de nyid bzlas
312a2(rgyud 'grel): ba'i sngags kyis ni/ /bsrung skud mdud pa gsum ldan pa/ /de dag bsrung bar bya ba'i phyir/ /slob ma rnams kyi dpung par bcing/ /de nas rdo rje slob dpon gyis/ /ma byung 'byung par ma gyur pa'i/ /bdud rtsi yi ni rol gyur pa'i/ /
312a3(rgyud 'grel): chos bshad pas ni gzeng bstod bya/ /gal te kun mkhyen 'jig rten du/ /ma byung 'byung bar mi 'gyur te/ /rgya lam na ni res 'ga' zhig /u dum ba ra'i me tog bzhin/ /gang phyir gsang sngags spyod pa'i tshul/ /gang phyir mnyam med
312a4(rgyud 'grel): sems can don/ /mya ngan mi 'da' byed nus pa/ /de bas kyang ni dkon pa yin/ /bskal ba bye ba du ma ru/ /sngar gyi sdig pa gang bgyis pa/ /dkyil 'khor 'di 'dra mthong ba yis/ /de dag thams cad byang bar 'gyur/ /gang dag
312a5(rgyud 'grel): spyod pa'i mchog 'di la/ /blo gros shin tu mi g.yo bas/ /sdug bsngal ma lus 'byung 'gyur ba'i/ /dman pa grong khyer de dag gcod/ /de ring khyod kyis mnyam med pa'i/ /rnyed pa mnyam med chen po rnyed/ /gang phyir rgyal ba sras
312a6(rgyud 'grel): bcas la/ /bdag nyid chen po kun gyis na/ /bstan pa 'di la khyed rnams kun/ /yongs su skye ste skye ba med/ /de phyir khyed ni theg chen la/ /sang ni rab tu skye bar 'gyur/ /theg pa chen po cher 'byung ba/ /lam mchog 'di ni dpal
312a7(rgyud 'grel): dang ldan/ /'di yis khyod rnams bgrong gyur nas/ /ye shes bla na med pa thob/ /de ltar slob ma la brjod nas/ /de yi don la gus pas mnyan/ /de ltar tshul bzhin mnyan nas ni/ /yang ni 'di ltar brjod par bya/ /dkon mchog
312b1(rgyud 'grel): gsum la skyabs su mchi/ /sdig pa mi dge so sor bshags/ /'gro ba'i dge la rjes yi rang/ /sangs rgyas byang chub yid kyis bzung/ sangs rgyas chos dang dge 'dun la/ /rtag par bdag ni skyabs su mchi/ /bdag dang gzhan don
312b2(rgyud 'grel): sgrub pa'i phyir/ /byang chub tu ni sems bskyed do/ /sems can thams cad mgron gnyed nas/ /byang chub sems mchog bskyed par bgyi/ /'gro la phan par bya ba'i phyir/ /byang chub spyod mchog spyad par bgyi/ /de ltar gsum
312b3(rgyud 'grel): la skyabs 'gro ba/ /lan gsum bar du brjod par bya/ /de rjes de ma thag tu ni/ /yang ni 'di ltar bya ba yin/ /de rjes rdo rje slob ma ni/ /bdud rtsi 'khyil ba yi ni sngags/ /oM A(rgyud 'grel): hUM bignan+ta krid hUM/ zhes bya ba'i sngags kyis
312b4(rgyud 'grel): bsrung bar bya/ /de dag snying ga lkog ma dang/ /spyi bo yi ni gnas rnams su/ /zla bar rdo rje pad+ma dang/ /'khor lo'i rang bzhin dgod par bya/ /de dag rnams kyi lte ba la/ /yi ge oM A(rgyud 'grel): hUM bsam par bya/ /de nas slob dpon stan langs
312b5(rgyud 'grel): nas/ /rdo rje 'byed pa g.yas bzung ste/ /slob ma'i snying ga lkog ma dang/ /spyi bo yi ni gnas rnams su/ /rdo rje yi ni reg bya ste/ oM A(rgyud 'grel): hUM zhes brjod par bya/ /de nas spyi bor me tog dang/ /mdun du spos ni dbul bar bya//
312b6(rgyud 'grel): de bzhin snying gar mar me dang/ /rims bzhin dri rnams dbul bar bya/ /de nas ku sha'i stan dag la/ /slob ma nyal du byas la/ /cung zhig rmi lam sus mthong ba/ /nang par nga la smros shig ces/ /rim bzhin du ni smra bar
312b7(rgyud 'grel): bya/ /de dag rang gi gnas su btang/ /slob ma lhag par gnas byas nas/ /las gzhan la ni 'jug par bya/ /slob ma bskul ba byas nas ni/ /de dag mi dge'i mtshan ma rnams/ /so so'i don ni rtag pa'i phyir/ /slob dpon
313a1(rgyud 'grel): rang gi gnas nyal te/ /dkyil 'khor sa yi phyogs kyi cha/ /lho phyogs su ni mkhas pa yi/ /shar phyogs su ni kha ltas te/ /nub phyogs su ni rkang pa'o/ /mchod yon la sogs phul nas ni/ /gnas ni lhag par gnas
313a2(rgyud 'grel): par bya/ /oM ho ka ma la garba sha ye badzra su ka ma Ni t+ta n+twa ka ra mi ya ga te thA ga te te na tre t+ta ha ha swA hA/ dngos sam yang na rmi lam du/ /de bzhin du ni rtags mthong dang/ /slob ma yis kyang de ltar te/ /gnyis ka'ang spyad par
313a3(rgyud 'grel): bya ba yin/ /de nas mtshan ma gyur na/ /slob dpon gyis ni khri bzlas te/ /gtor ma chen po byin byes nas/ /phyis ni 'di ltar dge ba yin/ /de nas dkyil 'khor de nyid du/ /sngar gyi lha rnams rim bskong? de/ /'khor lo
313a4(rgyud 'grel): bsgoms pa'i steng du ni/ /blo chen gyis ni bsam par bya/ /lte bar g.yon pa'i khu tshur gyis/ /bla mas thig gi sna gzung nas/ /sngags kyi bum pa kun gyi chus/ /khang pa'i nang du bsang gtor bya/ /oM sarba sho d+ha ni hUM phaT/ /las kyi thig gis rims
313a5(rgyud 'grel): bzhin du/ /ye shes thig ni brkyang bar byas/ /badzra sa ma ya sU traM ma tri kra ma hUM/ /ye shes kyi thig gdab pa'i sngags so/ /de nas de rjes nyid du ni/ /gong du bstan pa'i thig nyid kyis/ /mkhas pas mnyam par rab bzhag nas/ /las kyi thig ni gdab
313a6(rgyud 'grel): par bya/ /de la re zhig sngags bzlas pa'i/ /srad bu mdza' ma dkar ldan pas/ /dkar ba'i rdzas la spang byas te/ /yid kyis gtso bo'i gsang sngags bzlas/ /he ru ka'i gnas bsams te/ /khu tshur g.yon du thig gdab bya/ /g.yas pa'i khu
313a7(rgyud 'grel): tshur gyis bzung ste/ /dza(rgyud 'grel): yis bsgrubs pa'i lag tu btad/ /phyogs kun mnyam pa nyid dmigs te/ /shar bltas rdo rje'i thig gdab bya/ /slar yang slob dpon lhor 'dug ste/ /byang du bltas te gnyis pa gdab/ /me yis phyogs
313b1(rgyud 'grel): kyi char gnas nas/ /mkhas pas byang du kha bltas te/ /phyi rol dkyil 'khor thig gdab pa/ /de nas yang ni bya ba yin/ /rlung phyogs gnas la lhor bltas te/ /nub kyi phyogs kyi thig gdab bo/ /de nyid du ni 'dug byas te/ /byang gi phyogs kyi
