313b2(rgyud 'grel): thig gdab po/ /yang ni me phyogs 'dug nas ni/ /lho phyogs kyi ni thig gdab ste/ /kha khyer gyi ni thig dag kyang/ /shes rab can gyis gdab par bya/ /slar yang me mtshams su 'dug ste/ /rlung gi mtshams kyi thig gdab cing/ /de bzhin bden
313b3(rgyud 'grel): phral mtshams 'dug nas/ /dbang ldan mtshams kyi thig gdab bya/ /slob dpon dang ni de yi cha/ /bskor phyogs su ni 'gro bar bya/ /dang po cha chen brgyad du ni/ /rnal 'byor pa yis bgo byas te/ /de nas de rjes nyid du ni/ /sgrub pa po yid de
313b4(rgyud 'grel): la blta/ /slar yang de la bcu drug char/ /bgo bya slar yang nyis 'gyur du/ /mdor na thig rkang tshang ba ru/ /mkhas pa yis ni gdab par bya/ /yang na bcu drug cha chen la/ /rtsa ba'i tshangs thig nas bzung ste/ /mkhas pas dkyil 'khor
313b5(rgyud 'grel): rdzogs par ni/ /legs par thig ni gdab par bya/ /tshangs thig nas ni drangs pa yi/ /cha ni bzhi pa legs bzung ste/ /nam mkha' khams kyi rang bzhin du/ /mkhas pa yis ni gdab par bya/ /de yi cha chen lnga pa ni/ /nyi shu char ni bgo bya
313b6(rgyud 'grel): ste/ /dang po tshon rtsi cha nyid ni/ /gnyis bzhi de bzhin rim bzhin no/ /de yi cha chen drug pa ni/ /nyi shu bzhir ni gdab bya ste/ /cha gnyis sa ni dra phyed yin/ /de nas gnyis ni rim bzhin no/ /cha chen bdun pa brgyad pa ni/ /sum cu gnyis su gdang
313b7(rgyud 'grel): bya ste/ /rta babs su ni shes bya zhing/ /lhag ma ci rigs shes par bya/ /gzhan yang tshangs thig nas gzung ste/ /'khor lo'i thig gdab rim pa ni/ /rta babs bar du gdab par bya/ /lhag ma dang ci rigs shes par bya/ /slar yang 'khor lo'i lta
314a1(rgyud 'grel): dbus kyi/ /cha drug rnam par phyin nas ni/ /de na bdud rtsi brkyang nul bya/ /de nas de la thig gdab po/ /cha chen brgyad dang bcu drug tu/ /de la thig ni gdab bya ste/ /de nyid sum cu bzhi nyid du/ /mkhas pa yi ni slar thig
314a2(rgyud 'grel): gdab/ /cha chung phyi rol cig dor ba/ /rdo rjer ba'i thig yin te/ /de nas cha chung lnga gnyis ni/ /pad+ma'i 'dab ma'i thig yin no/ /de bzhin du ni lte ba ste/ /nang gi cha gcig ge sar yin/ /de ltar cha chung lnga gnyis la/ /'dab ma'i bar yang
314a3(rgyud 'grel): shes par bya/ /dbang ldan mtshams nas brtsams nas ni/ /g.yas skor gyis ni bskor bya ste/ /dkyil 'khor gyi ni thig rnams la/ /ye shes thig ni bstim bar bya/ /de nas de rjes nyid du ni/ /rdo rje slob dpon mnyam bzhag
314a4(rgyud 'grel): pas/ /hi hi'i sgra ni brjod bya zhing/ /yid kyis sgo ni dbye bar bya/ /oM hUM traM a khaM 'dis ni/ /rdul tshon kyang ni bsgrub bya ste/ /ji ltar tshogs pa rnyed gyur nas/ /dag pa'i dri rnams dbul bar bya/ /gsal bcas lha yi phyag
314a5(rgyud 'grel): rgyas ni/ /sngags ni brgya rtsa brgyad du bzlas/ /dril dkrol rdo rje gsor ba dang/ /rdo rje glus ni skul byed cing/ /dmar ba'i gos bcas gtor byin te/ /'di lta bu ni bsam par bya/ /'di ni chos dbyings dag pa ste/ /thams
314a6(rgyud 'grel): cad khams ni rnam dag pa/ /rang nyid sangs rgyas thams cad de/ /de bzhin gshegs pa kun nas gnas/ /g.yon pa'i khu tshur gyis thog mar/ /dbang ldan nas ni bskor bya ste/ /'khor lo'i gtso bo rjes 'dra bas nas//
314a7(rgyud 'grel): sngags pas rdul tshon bri bar bya/ /oM badzra tsit+twa sa ma ya hUM/ phyis ni slob ma bzo bo yi/ /ci rigs par ni bri bar bya/ /drang dang 'khyog dang chad pa dang/ /phra dang spom pa nyer mtshon te/ /sbom po yi ni nang 'gyur zhing/
314b1(rgyud 'grel): phran nor rnams zad par 'gyur/ /'khyogs na 'thab rtsod 'byung 'gyur zhing/ /chad na slob dpon slob ma 'chi/ /de la sogs pa'i skyon spangs nas/ /rdul tshon ri mo dgyes par bya/ /shar du sngon po chen po che/ /lhor ni ser po 'byung ba yin/ /
314b2(rgyud 'grel): nub du dmar po chen po ste/ /byang du ljang gu nyid 'byung ba'o/ /dbus ni zla ba'i 'od ltar te/ /'di ni rdul tshon rim par brjod/ /rdo rje sems dpa' i ting 'dzin gyis/ /slob dpon 'khor lo'i shar du 'dug /rnam snang mdzad sogs ting 'dzin gyis/
314b3(rgyud 'grel): sgo bzhi rnams su legs 'dug ste/ /gru bzhi yi ni mtshams rnams su/ /de mchos klog pa bzhi yang bzhag /dam tshig la 'das 'jigs pa yis/ /slob mar gyur pa gzhug mi bya/ /g.yas pas rdo rje gsor bya zhing/ /g.yon pa yis ni dril bu dkrol/
314b4(rgyud 'grel): sngags ni oM A(rgyud 'grel): hUM hUM/ oM badzra g+haN+De ra na ra na/ pra ra Na pra ra Na/ saM pra ra na saM pra ra na/ sarbba bud+d+ha k+She tra ye pra tsa li te/ pradz+nyA pa rA mi tA/ na da saM b+hA ba pe badzra d+ha da da ya/ soM to Sha na hUM hUM hUM phaT/ rkang pa 'deg dang 'jog pa dang/ /lta ba bzhin
314b5(rgyud 'grel): dang khro ba yi/ /slar ni sa gzhi mnan bya ste/ /sngags rigs pas ni gnas par bya/ /gzhan gyi rim 'di dag gis ni/ /sgo gzhan du yang shes par bya/ /g.yas dang g.yon pa'i rkang pa yis/ /rtag tu bgyings shing bsgyings bar bya/ /oM hUM
314b6(rgyud 'grel): zhes bya ba dkyil 'khor gyi slob dpon chen po'i sngags so/ /g.yas brkyang ba dang g.yon brkyang dang/ /lta stangs ji ltar sngon bzhin brjod/ /oM hUM a phaT ces bya ba ni shar phyogs kyi slob dpon gyi sngags so/ /mnyam dang mi mnyam rkang stabs
314b7(rgyud 'grel): dang/ /gtum zhing rab rmongs lta stangs te/ /oM hUM a phaT ces bya ba ni lho phyogs kyi slob dpon gyi sngags so/ /zlum po dang ni rus sbal dang/ /dga' pa'i gar dang lta bcas te/ /oM hUM a a a phaT ces bya ba ni nub kyi slob dpon gyi
315a1(rgyud 'grel): sngags so/ /lta ba rnam par rgyu ba dang/ /shi ba lta bu de bzhin te/ /rkang pa dag gis gar bya ba/ /sa ga dang ni rkang gcig yin/ /oM hUM hA ma ra duSh+Ta na g+hA ta ya g+ha ta ya/ /a a a hUM h+ri phaT/ byang phyogs kyi slob dpon gyi
315a2(rgyud 'grel): sngags so/ /phyogs de dag na gnas nas ni/ /blo dang ldan pas sngon bzhin brjod/ /sbyangs pa la sogs rim gyis ni/ /gtor ma lnga ni dbul bar bya/ /oM badzra a ra li ho(rgyud 'grel): dza(rgyud 'grel): hUM baM ho(rgyud 'grel): badzra DA ki ni sa ma ya stwaM/ dri sh+yA ha(rgyud 'grel): oM kha
315a3(rgyud 'grel): kha khA hi sarbba b+hA yak+Sha sarbba b+hA ta pi sha tsa udmanda a pa sma ra da/ DA ki n+ya nga yi a maM ba liM grih+nan du/ sa ma ya sid+d+hi/ ma ma pra yats+tsha na du/ ya the baM/ ya the staM/ b+hiny+dza du/ b+ha bandu maM/ ma ti kra ma du/ ma ma sarba kar sad+du kha'i/ shud+d+ha ya
315a4(rgyud 'grel): swar? yi ka b+ha wan+ta/ hUM hUM phaT swA hA/ zhes bya ba ni dkyil 'khor gyi slob dpon gyi gtso bo'i gtor ma'i sngags so/ /oM A hUM ho/ /b+h+ra mi bisnu iM haM sA ri in+d+ra a ti sa pa ra pa ri/ i daM bA li gand+haM pU ShpaM dI paM yak+Sha taM sAr ma hi he bi a gats+tsha
315a5(rgyud 'grel): sa ba ri ba ri/ i daM ba laM grih+Nan du kha dandu bi ban dza(rgyud 'grel): hUM baM ho(rgyud 'grel): sarte pa ta sarbba satwa naM/ shIn+taM puSh+TaM sha k+Sha par+Na guSh+TiM ku ru bandu/ hUM hUM hUM phaT/ slob dpon gnyis pa'i'o/ /oM a(rgyud 'grel): hUM ho(rgyud 'grel): hUM/ ka ra a ki ni/ tsanda su rya b+ha da mi
315a6(rgyud 'grel): gal su tA be he sa pa ti ki du sa ni b+hya(rgyud 'grel): zhes bya ba la sogs pa lho phyogs kyi slob dpon gyi sngags so/ /oM A(rgyud 'grel): hUM haM(rgyud 'grel): dza i ba dza ya pad+ma kar ko ta/ ba su ki saM b+ha ba la/ ku li ka A nan+ta/ tak+Sha ka mahA padme b+hya(rgyud 'grel): zhes bya ba la

315b1(rgyud 'grel): sngon pa yi rim pa yis/ /blo dang ldan pas bsrung byas te/ /bsrung ba'i khro bo rnams la ni/ /de nas bka' ni bsgo bar bya/ /bdag nyid gzugs brnyan lta bu ste/ /gzugs brnyan bzhin du bdag nyid lta/ /dang por snying gar pad+ma la/ /de stengs zla

315b7(rgyud 'grel): 'bar zhing/ /shes rab chags pas dmar ba'i zhal/ /phyag gnyis rang gi rim 'khyud cing/ /rdo rje dril bu mnyam par ldan/ /dpa' bo gzhu dang mda' bsnams shing/ /rdo rje'i skyil mo krung gis bzhugs/ /de nas kun gyis

316b2(rgyud 'grel): ba lta bu ste/ /utpal sngon po'i 'dab 'dra ba'i/ /na tshong mdzes shing sgeg pa'o/ /de lta'i lha mo dang mnyam pa'i/ /ji ltar khros par gyur pa ni/ /de nyid du ni bkug byas te/ /phun sum tshogs pa'i khrag 'thung bskyed/ /brgyad pa'i mdza' na
316b3(rgyud 'grel): thig ler bcas/ /dbyangs yig lnga dang mnyam ldan pa/ /hUM yig gtso bo gyur pa las/ /gau ri dkar mo dbyung bar bya/ /mdun du gzhu dang mnga' 'dzin cing/ /tshangs pa'i mog bo 'bigs par byed/ /thod pa khaTwAM ga 'dzin cing/ /
316b4(rgyud 'grel): phyag bzhi yi ni rnam par mdzes/ /gar gyi sbyor ba la gzigs shing/ /g.yas brkyang pa yis rnam par bzhugs/ /gsum pa yi ni gsum pa la/ /'og tu de nyid sbyor ba yi/ /tshogs bcas la ni tshom rkun ma/ /g.yas su kha dog dmar po ste/ /

317a1(rgyud 'grel): sdob/ /g.yon brkyang ba yis bzhugs par mdzad/ /lcang lo dang ni ba dang bcas/ /g.yas dang de bzhin g.yon par te/ /dpag bsam shing gi lcug ma dang/ /kha TwAM ga ni sngon bzhin no/ /gsum pa yi ni dang po la/ /

317a3(rgyud 'grel): mdzes pa'o/ /dang po yi ni gnyis pa la/ /thig las rnam par brgyan pa ste/ /sa bon de las za phod ma/ /kha dog ljang la cung zad skya/ /rlung mtshams g.yon brkyang bas bzhugs shing/ /phyag gnyis kyis ni gar mdzad ma//
