317a6(rgyud 'grel): par brgyan/ /zhal gcig ma la spyan gsum ma/ /sgeg ba'i rgyan gyis brgyan pa ste/ /thams cad mdzes pas phun tshogs shing/ /'dzum zhing rnam par 'dzum pa'i zhal/ /zhi ba drag por rab rmongs gtum/ /dga' zhing gar byed
317a7(rgyud 'grel): 'gyur dang bcas/ /shi ba bung ba lta bu yi/ /zhal gyi phyag rgya rnam par gnas/ /zhi dang drag po rmongs byed dang/ /gar byed bsgyings shing lta bar mdzad/ /yi ge bzhi las byung ba yi/ /phyi rol mtshams kyi lha mo ni/ /so so rang gi lhag
317b1(rgyud 'grel): ba'i lnga/ /rang gi phyag rgyas rol pa yi/ /pi wang la sogs sngags rnams ni/ /ha ho h+ri(rgyud 'grel): hUM 'di ru gnas/ /a A:/ aM a 'di sngon bzhin/ /me tog sogs su brtags par bya/ /de rnams nang gi phyogs gyur pa/ /rdo rje me tog sogs de bzhin//
317b2(rgyud 'grel): dza(rgyud 'grel): hUM baM ho:/ 'di las kyang/ /sgo bsrungs rnams ni 'byung ba yin/ /rin du 'gro sogs de dag ni/ /kha dog mtshan ma brjod par bya/ /gling bu ma ni dmar mo la/ /gling bu'i sgra ni dar brtson ma/ /pi wang me ni dkar mo la/ /pi wang la ni mngon par
317b3(rgyud 'grel): brtson/ /rdza rnga mo ni dkar mo la/ /ku mun ta ni de bzhin ljang/ /lha mo de rnams nang nas ni/ /me tog spos dang mar me dri/ /dkar dang du blta bu dang/ /gsum pa gser gyi mdog can te/ /dri ma dmar po gur gum gyi/ /cung zad rab tu 'drel ba'o//
317b4(rgyud 'grel): shar gyi phyogs kyi sgo ru ni/ /ring du 'gro ma lcags kyu 'chang/ /g.yon pas lcug ma 'dzin pa la/ /cung zad khro dang bcas pa'o/ /nag mo 'gugs par byed ma la/ /g.yon brkyang ba yis gnas pa'o/ /lho yi phyogs kyi sgo ru ni/ /ser mo rdo rje
317b5(rgyud 'grel): gdong can ma/ /g.yon brkyang ba'i gnas pas bzhugs/ /lcags kyu kha dog ser mo 'dzin/ /g.yon pas mche ba 'dzin pa ste/ /rdo rje gdong can zhes bya ba/ /bkug pa rnams ni rab 'dzud pa'o/ /de nas nub phyogs sgo ru ni/ /rdo rje sgrog ma
317b6(rgyud 'grel): rab tu gnas/ /phyag gnyis nyi ma zla ba 'dzin/ /de dag dbus na lcags sgrog ste/ /'di ni dmar zhing 'ching bar mdzad/ /g.yas brkyang ba yi bzhugs pa'o/ /mgon po phyag ni bcur brjod cing/ /phyag gnyis ma yis mgul nas mkhyud
317b7(rgyud 'grel): phyag bzhir ldan pa'i lha mo ni/ /brgyad kyis yongs su bskor ba'o/ /me tog gling bu'i rim pa yis/ /de las gzhan dus gar byed cing/ /sgo bzhi dag tu gnas pas ni/ /kun nas yongs su bsrungs pa'o/ /'di rdzogs dkyil 'khor ba dang/
318a1(rgyud 'grel): nyid de/ /rigs lnga yis ni byin gyis brlabs/ /mig la sogs pa byin brlabs te/ /dbang bskur ba ni blang bar bya/ /mig la sangs rgyas byang chub ste/ /gzugs ni 'dod pa'i lcug ma yin/ /nyan par rdo rje
318a2(rgyud 'grel): gling bu ste/ /sgra la rdza rnga ma ru grags/ /sna la rdo rje me tog ste/ /dri la dri yi rnam par grags/ /lce la ring du 'gro ma ste/ /ro la thal ba 'jigs ma'o/ /lus la de bzhin reg bya la/ /pra mo ha ming rnal 'byor ma/ /yid la bde
318a3(rgyud 'grel): mchog mar brjod de/ /chos la ri bong can ma'o/ /phung po rgyal ba sngar brjod do/ /sa la khams gsum rnam rgyal ma/ /sa'i khams la gnas pa ni/ /de bzhin lha mo A lo ka /me'i khams la mar me ma/ /rlung la gu mun+ta
318a4(rgyud 'grel): bu grags/ /mig ni rnam shes khams la ni/ /chos kyi 'khor lo ma ru brjod/ /rna ba'i rnam shes khams la ni/ /rdo rje pi paM ma ru grags/ /sna yi khams kyi rnam shes la/ /rdo rje yid ni 'phrog ma'o/ /lce'i rnam shes khams
318a5(rgyud 'grel): la ni/ /rdo rje gdong can lha mo brjod/ /lus kyi rnam shes khams la ni/ /lha mo phyag rgya'i rgya yi gdab/ /yid kyi rnam shes khams la ni/ /lha mo e ma bde bar gnas/ /gau rI de bzhin pra mo ha/ /de bzhin gtum mo puk+ka sI/ /
318a6(rgyud 'grel): za phong mar brjod de bzhin dri/ /gti mug rdo rje rgya yis gdab/ /chom rkun ro langs ma ning ma/ /gling bu de bzhin pi wang dang/ /de bzhin lha mo rdza rnga ma/ /zhe sdang phyag rgya rgya yis gdab/ /yid kyi rnam shes khams la ni/ /
318a7(rgyud 'grel): las kyi phyag rgya mar me nyid/ /lha mo bcom ldan rim 'gro ma/ /de bzhin lha mo rdo rje gdong/ /thal bas rab 'jigs ro langs ma/ /'dod chags phyag rgya'i rgya yis gdab/ /ku mun+ta dang me tog spos/ /ser sna'i phyag rgya'i rgya
318b1(rgyud 'grel): yis gdab/ /'jig rten gsum ni rab sgrub pa/ /'jig rten gsum gyi phyag byas pa/ /'jig rten gsum gyi ston pa po/ /'jig rten gsum la skyid sbyin ma/ /rdo rje 'dzin chen dpal rdo rje/ /sems dpa' i skal pa bzang po yis/ /dpal ldan
318b2(rgyud 'grel): sangs rgyas thams cad kyi/ /rin po che yi phung po yis/ /lha yi dbu rgyan zhes bya bas/ /bdag la dbang bskur mdzad du gsol/ /de na thod phreng dbu rgyan dang/ /sangs rgyas gtsug tor de bzhin no/ /de nas lha mos mchod
318b3(rgyud 'grel): byas te/ /glu yi rol mos mchod bar bya/ /rjes su chags pa'i padmo yi/ /dga' ba'i padmo rnam dag pas/ /mchod pa gsal ba'i rjes su mchod byis pas/ /mchog tu rtag tu rnal 'byor bde bas bde ba grub par mdzod/ /kye mchog tu bde
318b4(rgyud 'grel): ba'i dam tshig ngo bo bde ba nyid/ /mchog tu bde ba skal bzang mchog dgyes pa/ kye mchog tu gsang ba'i bdag /rang gi dam tshig skyon med bdag la rol cig rol cig ho/ /ye shes lnga yi bdud rtsi mchog /btung ba de nas dbul
318b5(rgyud 'grel): bar byed/ /mchog tu gsang ba'i lha mo ni/ /'o dang 'khyud pa la sogs kyis/ /bskal bzang de ni chags mdzad cing/ /skyes bu'i tshul du rol par mdzad/ /sangs rgyas kun dang mnyam sbyor ba'i/ /mkha' 'gro sgyu ma bde ba'i mchog /lha
318b6(rgyud 'grel): mo chen mos mgul nas 'khyud/ /sku yi rjes su 'jug par mdzad/ /lha mo kun dang mnyam ldan pa'i/ /de ni khyab bdag 'chad par byed/ /phyag rgya chen po'i sbyor ba yis/ /btsun mo kun la longs spyod mdzod/ /pang rtsa'i skud pa'i
318b7(rgyud 'grel): sbyor ba yis/ /phra mo'i rnal 'byor sbyor par bya/ /phyag rgya chen mo gsal 'bar ma/ /gnas la sogs par gshegs pa mo/ /sdig med zhe sdang can gus pas/ /rnal 'byor ma ni kun gyis bsgom/ /khrag mthung gi ni rang
319a1(rgyud 'grel): bzhin gyis/ /'gro ba rtsa bzhin blta bar bya/ /de'i byin brlabs sbyor ba yis/ /le lo med par bzlas par bya/ /gang zhig bla mas bka' gnang ba/ /de nas legs par sbyar byas te/ /las gang gis ni sngags kyis kyang
319a2(rgyud 'grel): gzhan du mkhas pa nyon mongs 'gyur/ /dang po rab sngags brjod par bya/ /snying po de bzhin he ru ka/ /rdo rje dam tshig mnyam ldan pa/ /rdo rjes gtum pa thams cad do/ /dam tshig ces bya phyag rgya ste/ /de nas nyid du rab mdzes pa/ /hUM
319a3(rgyud 'grel): yig de nas brjod bya ste/ /dril bu'i sgra gnyis brjod par bya/ /e hyi'i sgra gnyis de bzhin te/ /de nas hUM phaT gdon par bya/ /bcom ldan 'das kyi sngags so/ /oM badzra g+hu ha si hi zhes/ /par me zhes de nas brjod/ /oM gi shwa
319a4(rgyud 'grel): ra ka pa la/ /ma ra nga re ni ya brjod/ /ru ti ri zhes pra yi zhes/ /de nas sma sha na zhes brjod/ /wa sa na zhes de nas brjod/ /hUM phaT yi ge mdza' rten no/ /gau ri phyag 'tshal badzra dang/ /de rjes tsaN+De shwa ri brjod/ /ka ka la ma
319a5(rgyud 'grel): la ku mu ti/ /a ka te zhes lan gnyis brjod/ /sarba duSh+Ta snying por bcas/ /hUM dang ru yi tshig gnyis brjod/ /he ru ka la bod bya ste/ /hUM phaT a yig mdza' rten no/ /rkun ma rnam snang tshogs tshig gzhan/ /badzra a pa ra
319a6(rgyud 'grel): tsi dam tshig go /pa ru g+hu ha ka pa la/ /ma la b+ha ra na bas shin te/ /sarba duSh+Tan zhes brjod do/ /mo ha ni zhes sri yi gzhan/ /e hi e hi yang dag brjod/ /sarba duSh+Tan wo ra ni/ /hUM phaT yi ge brjod par bya/ /rmongs byed lha mo
319a7(rgyud 'grel): dran bya ste/ /pra mo ha ya oM zhes brjod/ /badzra pi ta ha la yi sgra/ /phyi nas sngags yig kha gnyis so/ /sarba duSh+Ta zhes brjod de/ /pi gri ta wo sha da re ni/ /pi tri ta a laM ka ra'i tshig /mo ha na'i tshig gnyis brgyan te/ /spyad par
319b1(rgyud 'grel): byas te bklag par bya/ /da nyin bcas pa ci dang/ /pa tsa yi ti gnyis dang ni/ /ma bi laM pa'i tshig ni gcig/ /sa ma ya de phyi nas bzlas/ /a nu sma ra ye zhes bya/ /pra be sha ya bklag par bya/ /yang ni man dang zhes su bzla/ /sarba bar dbus su bzhag par
319b2(rgyud 'grel): bya/ /hUM dang phaT dang mnyam ldan pa'o/ /rigs byed rnams kyi dang po gzung/ /e hi'i tshig ni lan gnyis bzla/ /bcom ldan 'das ma bod par bya/ /rdo rje gsang dbang de bzhin no/ /rnam pa du ma'i tshul 'dzin pa'i/ /gzungs ma la ni bod par
319b3(rgyud 'grel): bya/ /sarba ta thA ga ta'i tshig/ dzU shu'i sgra'i mchod ba'o/ /a nu sma re dang bcas pa'i/ /de nas ma ya dran bya/ /ha na ra ga'i tshig bkar cing/ /ram 'ba' pa ra su ra ya/ /a pe sha ya lan gnyis brjod/ /sarba b+hu traM de nas bzla/ /nar ta nar ta pa ya
319b4(rgyud 'grel): gnyis/ /ta gnyis tsheg drag bcas pa'o/ /ha ga'i sgra ni lan gnyis bzla/ /de nas hUM phaT bzla bar bya/ /puk+ka sI la oM zhes brjod/ /badzra d+hu pa agne bzlas/ /b+ha ti b+ha ta yang dag brjod/ /sarba saSh+Tan zhes snying po/ /a karSha'i tshig gnyis so//
319b5(rgyud 'grel): ha na'i tshig dang da ha'i tshig/ /pa tsi nir ma tha ma ra ya/ /ma bi lam bi dang bcas/ /sa ma ya ni lan gnyis brjod/ /hUM phaT yi ge legs brjod de/ /tsan+d+ra li sngags btu bar bya/ /phyag 'tshal ba dang badzra'i sgra/ /mahe mahe shwa rar ldan/ /ha ni
319b6(rgyud 'grel): tsheg drag bcas pa ste/ /ha hUM ha ni lan bzhir brjod/ /ru lu'i sgra ni gnyis brjod do/ /hUM gnyis b+hak+Sha sbyang bar bya/ /nir ma thi ni kun la brjod/ /de nas snying po hUM phaT bzlas/ /sgra gnyis swAhA mnyam sbyar te/ /g+hasma ri la sogs bsgrub
319b7(rgyud 'grel): bya/ /g+hasma ri la oM bzla shing/ /suM b+ha ni zhes sbyar bar bya/ /di pa ta sgra sa ma ya/ /brjod cing badzra hUM phaT bzla/ /gang zhig phag mo'i sngags brjod pa/ /las kyi phyag rgya'i sngags su brjod/ /gzhan gyi sngon gyi snying po ni/ /rang gi ming
320a1(rgyud 'grel): bcas bod pa ni/ /sngags su rnam par bzhag bya ste/ /oM dang hUM phaT thog mar ro/ /de na me tog sogs kyis mchod/ /sngon brjod pa yi rim pa yi/ /gtor ma sha ni thams cad dang/ /bza' dang btung bar mnyam ldan
320a2(rgyud 'grel): pa/ /'byung po kun gyi gsang sngags sam/ /a ra li sogs sngags kyis dbul/ /de nas sangs rgyas kun bdag nyid/ /rdo rje slob dpon blo gros ches/ /slob ma rnams ni gzhug pa'i phyir/ /bden pa 'di yis gsol btab
320a3(rgyud 'grel): bya/ /chos kun sgyu ma lta bu ste/ /dag cing gsal la rnyog pa med/ /gzungs du med cing brjod du med/ /rgyu dang las la kun tu 'byung/ /de bzhin nyid la nges par skyes/ /bden pa 'di yis dkyil 'khor du/ /gzugs brnyan
320a4(rgyud 'grel): gsal bar slob ma yis/ /kun gyi dri ma med mthong shog /de ltar gsol btab de rjes su/ /slob ma rnam snang du dmigs te/ /dkyil 'khor du ni gzhug pa'i phyir/ /bla ma la ni yon dbul bya/ /yol ba yi ni phyi rol nas//
320a5(rgyud 'grel): yon gyi mchog ni blang bya ste/ /kun tu sna tshogs bla ma la/ /yon gyi mchog ni dbul bar bya/ /gang la yongs su btang dka' gang/ /de ni yon gyi mchog tu bshad/ /gang dang gang ni sdug pa'i mchog /yang na shin tu khyad par
320a6(rgyud 'grel): can/ /de dang de ni bla ma la/ /de nyid mi zad 'dod pas dbul/ /yang na ci bzhed 'gyur ba 'am/ /'on te thugs la dgongs su dag/ der dbul yang na dgos par bya/ /gal te yang na de la mchog dag pa/ /de dbul ba na mchog yin no//
320a7(rgyud 'grel): bu mo shin tu brgyan pa 'am/ /de bzhin chung ma sdug pa dag/ phul nas rim gyis bslu ba dag/ sangs rgyas byang chub mchog yin no/ /phyug chen dag kyang 'bul byed na/ /gzhan lta mos kyang ci zhig dgos/ /slob ma bdag nyid du
320b1(rgyud 'grel): bsams te/ /de nas thams cad bsgrub par bya/ /a khaM bi ra hUM zhes pas/ /me tog phreng ba 'dzin bcug ste/ /dar gyis mig gnyis bkab byas la/ /bum pa'i chu yis bkang bar bya/ /kye ho su zhig bya ba'i sgras/ /de nas gzhug phyir dri bya
320b2(rgyud 'grel): ste/ /bde ba chen pos bskal bzang bdag /'jug pas kyang ni ske? bar bya/ /slob ma'i snying gar rdo rje ni/ /bzhag nas 'di skad brjod par bya/ oM sarba yo ga tsit+ta utpa dA ya pi ma/ /su ra te sa ma ya staM/ ho sid+d+hi badzra ya tha su khaM/ /de skad
320b3(rgyud 'grel): byang chub sems bskyed de/ /yang na 'di ltar brjod par bya/ /deng khyod de bzhin gshegs gyur pa/ /thams cad kyis ni byin rlob kyis/ /khyod ni de bzhin gshegs kun gyis/ /mchog tu gsang ba'i dkyil 'khor du/ /ma zhugs
320b4(rgyud 'grel): pa lam smra zhig /mi dang par yang ma byed cig/ ces ni de ltar brjod par bya/ /dza(rgyud 'grel): hUM baM ho(rgyud 'grel): zhes bya ba 'dis/ /slob ma yol ba'i nang khrid de/ /'jug 'gyur dkyil 'khor shar sgo ru/ /bzhag la 'di skad brjod par bya/ /deng
320b5(rgyud 'grel): khyod de bzhin gshegs rigs kyi/ /rigs su zhugs te de bas na/ /nga yis khyod la rdo rje yi/ /ye shes bskyed par bya ba ste/ /khyod ni ye shes gang zhig gis/ /de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi/ /dngos grub kyang ni thob
320b6(rgyud 'grel): 'gyur na/ /dngos grub gzhan lta mos ci dgos/ /khyod kyang yang 'di dkyil 'khor ni/ /mthong min rnams la ma smra zhig /'on te smras par gyur na ni/ /de ma thag tu dam tshig nyams/ /spyi bor rdo rje bzhag nas kyang/ /'di skad ces
320b7(rgyud 'grel): ni brjod par bya/ /'di khyod rdo rje dam tshig ste/ /gal te khyod kyis 'di smras nas/ /klad pa nges par 'gas 'gyur zhing/ /dam tshig nyams par 'byung ba yin/ /me tog dang bcas rdo rje ni/ /snying gar bzhag la 'di skad brjod/ /oM rdo rje
321a1(rgyud 'grel): sems dpa' deng khyod kyis/ /snying la yang dag gnas pa ste/ /gal te tshul 'di smras na ni/ /de ma thag tu dral te gshegs/ /de skad brjod pa byas nas ni/ /mna' ni rab tu bsgag par bya/ /pad+ma'i snod du bzhag pa la/ /yang ni
321a2(rgyud 'grel): bdud rtsi bsgrub bya ste/ /blo dang ldan pas yig gsum gyis/ /byin gyis brlab par bya ba yin/ /'di ni bu yi dmyal ba'i chu/ /bsrungs shig ma bsrung sreg par byed/ /bsrungs na dngos grub kun 'grub pas/ /grub pa'i bdud rtsi chu 'thungs
321a3(rgyud 'grel): shig /oM pany+tsa a mri te udka Tha hUM/ /de lta bu'i sngags kyis ni/ /'thung pa dang ni spyi bo sbyin/ /khyod kyis brnyas par mi bya ste/ /gzhan khyod dam tshig nyams gyur nas/ /dmyal bar 'gro bar ltung 'gyur te/ /rdo rje skad cig gis dbab
321a4(rgyud 'grel): bya/ /de la'ang ni rim pa yin/ /bud med khrag ldan ras la ni/ /de ltar bu yi sngags kyis ni/ /snal ma breg ste bshad pa dang/ /gu gul dang ni mnyam par bya/ /yi dags me ni blangs byas nas/ /de ni pad+ma'i snod du bzhag /der ni de kun
321a5(rgyud 'grel): blugs bya ste/ /khro bo'i cha 'dzin slob dpon gyis/ /g.yon brkyang gis ni legs 'dug nas/ /de ni bdag sbyin bya ba yi/ /de rjes spos bzhin rdo rje can/ /'dir ni 'bebs 'gyur the tshom med/ /a la la la la ho/ /sarba ta thA ga ta
321a6(rgyud 'grel): be tsi di tra DA gi dza le/ /zhes bya ba ni sku dbab pa'o/ /rnam pa mang po rab tu dga' ba'i rgyud kyis sems can ma lus lus pa med pa 'dul mkhas pa/ /de bzhin gshegs pa kun gyi rgyu ma'i bde mchog sgyu ma thams cad
321a7(rgyud 'grel): rab sprul rnam par sprul/ /hUM hUM hUM/ zhes bya ba ni gsung dbab po/ /rnam pa mang po'i rgyud kyis sems can ma lus lus pa med par 'dul mkhas pa/ /de bzhin gshegs pa kun gyi sgyu ma bde mchog sgyu ma thams cad rab
321b1(rgyud 'grel): sprul/ /ru lu ru lu/ hUM b+hyo hUM/ zhes bya bas thugs dbab pa'o/ /rnam pa mang po srog gi rgyud kyis sems can ma lus lus pa med par 'dul mkhas pa/ /de bzhin gshegs pa kun gyi sgyu ma'i bde mchog sgyu mas rab sprul rnam par sprul/ /hUM shi
321b2(rgyud 'grel): shi bi sha hUM/ ye shes dbab pa'o/ /de nas mig gi dngos po ci/ /mthong ba yin zhes dri bya ste/ /dkar ser dmar dang gnag mthong na/ /zhi rgyas dbang bsad 'grub ces brjod/ /de rjes pra ti ts+tsha ho zhes/ /brjod nas me tog dkyil
321b3(rgyud 'grel): 'khor dor/ /de ltar me tog dor ba las/ /mchog la sogs pa'i dngos grub bshad/ /bde gshegs rnams kyi spyi bo 'am/ /spyi gtsug mdzod spur phog gyur na/ /dngos grub 'bring ni thob pa ste/ /tha ma la phog dngos grub tha/ /gzugs
321b4(rgyud 'grel): brnyan las ni ring 'gyur na/ /dus ring nyen nye ba ste/ /lha yi lo tsa la phog na/ /de bzhin du yang shes par bya/ /gal te lha gnyis par phog na/ /de la me tog gar nye ba/ /de dang de yi rigs su ni/ /mkhas pa yis ni shes par bya/ /dkyil
321b5(rgyud 'grel): 'khor phyi rol babs gyur na/ /dngos grub phran tshegs thob pa ste/ /re khA rnams la phog gyur na/ /slar yang skyar la dor bar bya/ /lan gsum par dor de nyid du/ /bab na dngos grub med pa ste/ /phyi rol rdo rje ra pa la/ /phog par gyur na
321b6(rgyud 'grel): dngos grub med/ /ra ba'i nang du bab gyur na/ /shin tu dkar ba thob 'gyur te/ /'di dag gi ni rim pa ste/ /me tog dor ba'i rim pa'o/ /de nas me tog phreng blangs nas/ /slob ma'i mgo la bcing bya ste/ /pra ti grih+Na swa mi maM satwa/ /mahA
321b7(rgyud 'grel): pa la zhes brjod bya/ /mig gnyis la ni oM bsgoms te/ /tshigs bcad 'di brjod par bya/ /oM rdo rje sems dpa' deng khyod kyi/ /mig 'byed par ni brtson phyed pa/ /mig ni thams cad 'byed mdzad de/ /rdo rje mig ni bla na med
322a1(rgyud 'grel): rdo rje slob ma rnams la ni/ /dkyil 'khor rab tu bstan par bya/ /rang bzhin rnam dag bdag gi lus/ /rang bzhin gyi ni dri ma med/ /dpa' bo pad+ma'i pho brang du/ /dkyil 'khor du ni bu ltos shig /de nas gnas dang nye
322a2(rgyud 'grel): gnas srog /bdag gi lus kyi dkyil 'khor gnas/ /byang chub phyogs chos rtsa bdun gyi/ /chos kyi rang bzhin khrag 'thung dpal/ /yan lag dang ni yan lag rnams/ /nye bar bstan pa nyid du bya/ /bsam gyis mi khyab pa
322a3(rgyud 'grel): yi snod?/ /thams cad bdag nyid mgon tud de/ /bla ma mgon la gsol ba 'debs/ /bdag la dbang bskur mdzad du gsol/ /slob ma gsol btab de rjes la/ /dbang bskur ba ni sbyin par bya/ /rnam rgyal bum sogs blangs
322a4(rgyud 'grel): nas ni/ /pad+ma'i steng du chu bzhag go /hUM las rdo rje mi bskyod do/ /rdo rje slob dpon gyis bsgom bya/ /ye shes sems gzugs sa bon gyis/ /'od zer gyis ni bskul byas te/ /ye shes sems dpa' zhugs nas ni/ /mchod nas
322a5(rgyud 'grel): chu'i rang bzhin bya/ /de nyid mi bskyod pa yi tshul gyis/ /rnam shes phung po'i rang bzhin gyis/ /de nas brtse chen ston pa 'dis/ /dpa' bo'i mgor ni bkru bar bya/ /oM sarba bud+d+hA d+ha traM a b+hi ShIny+tsa mi/ /zhes brjod par bya/ /'di ni chu'i
322a6(rgyud 'grel): dbang bskur ba'o/ /rol mo la sogs cod pan la/ /rin 'byung sa bon oM las ni/ /rdo rje nyi ma bskyed bya ste/ /snga ma bzhin du mchod par bya/ /de nyid cod pan rang bzhin ste/ /tshor ba'i phung po'i bdag nyid do/ /sangs rgyas kun gyi spyi
322a7(rgyud 'grel): bor ni/ /rdo rje can gyis de bsam mo/ /oM badzra g+hu ha sid+d+hi pa ra ma yo gi shwa ri/ ka pA la mA la rA ri ni ru ti pre ye shma ma sha na was ni hUM phaT/ ces bya ba ni cod pan gyi dbang dzi las pad 'byung 'du shes te/ /bde gshegs 'od
322b1(rgyud 'grel): dpag med pa ni/ /rdo rje las ni bskyed bzung ste/ /slob ma'i lag pa g.yas par sbyin/ /sangs rgyas he ru ka sogs kyis/ /de ring khyod la dbang bskur ba/ /'di ni sangs rgyas thams cad de/ /legs par grub phyir rdo rje gzung/ /zhes bya ba ni rdo rje'i
322b2(rgyud 'grel): dbang bskur ba'o/ /khaM las byung ba'i ral gri ni/ /don yod grub pa'i rang bzhin te/ /'du byed dngos po'i dril bu 'di/ /'di ni lag pa g.yon par sbyin/ /'di ni rnal 'byor ma kun gyi/ /shes rab sgra yi rjes 'gror dran/ /khyod kyis kyang
322b3(rgyud 'grel): ni rtag tu gzung/ /byang chub mchog tu rgyal ba bzhed/ /ces bya ba ni/ dril bu'i dbang bskur ba'o/ /dpa' bo lag na rdo rje dril bu can/ /sangs rgyas kun gyi mchog gi mchog /rang bzhin mdzes shis dga' ba mo/ /phyag rgya chen
322b4(rgyud 'grel): pos byin brlabs pa/ /'di bdag po'i dbang bskur ba'o/ /rnam par snang mdzad la sogs kyis/ /slob ma'i spyi bor lag bzhag ste/ /rdo rje dril bu rdo rjer bcas/ /des kyang spyi bor bzhag bya ste/ /gzugs kyi phung po'i rang bzhin gyis/ /
322b5(rgyud 'grel): rdo rje can gyis ming dbang bskur/ /oM A(rgyud 'grel): ho(rgyud 'grel): khyod dpal che ge mo zhes bya ba'i de bzhin gshegs pa yin no/ /zhes bya ba ni/ ming 'di dbang bskur ba'o/ /dpal mchog dang po'i rdo rje dang/ /dpe med pa'i rdo rje dang/ bde ba'i rdo rje dang
322b6(rgyud 'grel): mnyam pa'i rdo rje dang/ rnam par rgyal ba'i rdo rje dang/ bde ba chen po'i rdo rje dang/ rdo rje me dang/ rdo rje sems dpa' i rdo rje dang/ yan lag med pa'i rdo rje dang/ ye shes rdo rje dang/ lhan cig skyes pa'i rdo rje'i zhal zhes bya ba la sogs pa'o//
322b7(rgyud 'grel): mi bskyod pa'i ming ni/ bzhad pa'i rdo rje dang/ rnam par sgeg pa'i rdo rje dang/ gnyis med rdo rje dang/ 'dzum pa'i rdo rje dang/ gzhi med pa'i rdo rje dang/ mi phyed pa'i rdo rje dang/ dga' ba'i rdo rje dang/ bsgying ba'i rdo rje dang/ rang 'byung rdo rje dang/ zhe
323a1(rgyud 'grel): sdang rdo rje dang/ dgyes pa'i rdo rje dang/ rtse ba'i rdo rje dang/ thugs kyi rdo rje zhes bya ba la sogs pa'o/ /rnam par snang mdzad kyi ming ni rnam snang rdo rje dang/ gti mug rdo rje dang/ oM ka ra badzra dang/ rtog pa'i rdo rje dang/ de bzhin
323a2(rgyud 'grel): gshegs pa'i rdo rje dang/ sgyu 'phrul dra ba'i rdo rje dang/ sangs rgyas rdo rje dang/ sku'i rdo rje la sogs pa'o/ /snang ba mdza' yas kyi ming ni/ /chags pa'i rdo rje dang/ rnam par gzigs pa'i rdo rje dang/ chos rdo rje dang/ shes rab myu
323a3(rgyud 'grel): gu'i rdo rje dang/ bde ba rdo rje'i myu gu dang/ brtse ba'i myu gu rdo rje dang/ mchog tu dga' ba'i rdo rje dang/ gsung rdo rje zhes bya ba la sogs pa'o/ /rin chen 'byung ldan gyi ming ni/ /rin chen rdo rje dang/ yid bzhin nor bu'i rdo rje dang/ nam
323a4(rgyud 'grel): mkha' i rdo rje dang/ rdo rje gzi brjid dang/ rdo rje chen po dang/ rdo rje nyi ma dang/ rdo rje yid ces bya ba la sogs pa'o/ /don yod grub pa'i ming ni/ don yod rdo rje dang/ dpal mchog dang po'i rdo rje dang/ dam tshig rdo rje dang/ pha
323a5(rgyud 'grel): rol tu phyin pa'i rdo rje dang/ rdo rje las dang/ rdo rje srung ba zhes bya ba la sogs pa rnams so/ /rdo rje sems ma'i bud med kyi ming ni/ rdo rje chags ba ma dang/ rdo rje glu ma dang/ rdo rje sgeg mo dang/ rdo rje shugs can ma dang/ rdo rje yum
323a6(rgyud 'grel): dang/ rdo rje kong ka na dang/ rdo rje bsgyings ma'o/ /mi bskyod pa'i ming ni/ rdo rje bdag med ma dang/ rdo rje bzhed pa ma dang/ rdo rje phreng ba ma dang/ rdo rje myu gu ma dang/ rdo rje mA ma kI zhes bya ba'o/ /rnam par snang mdzad kyi btsun mo'i
323a7(rgyud 'grel): ming ni/ rdo rje mkha' 'gro ma dang/ rdo rje gau ri ma dang/ rdo rje bzhad pa mo dang/ rdo rje sprin ma dang/ rdo rje spyan ma la sogs pa'o/ /rin chen 'byung ldan gyi ming ni/ /rin chen 'byung ma dang/ rdo rje dra ba ma dang/ rdo rje dbugs
323b1(rgyud 'grel): 'byung ma dang/ rdo rje 'bar ba ma dang/ rdo rje phreng ba ma zhes bya ba'o/ /snang ba mdza' yas kyi ming ni/ rdo rje chags pa ma dang/ rdo rje glu ma dang/ rdo rje ro langs ma dang/ rdo rje blo ldan ma dang/ rdo rje bzhad pa mo dang/ rdo rje gos dkar mo zhes
323b2(rgyud 'grel): bya'o/ /don yod grub pa'i ming ni/ rdo rje snying po ma dang/ rdo rje sgyu ma dang/ rdo rje 'ching ba mo/ /rdo rje sgrol ma zhes bya'o/ /sangs rgyas lnga ni rnam dag dngos/ /dbang ldan thob pa'i rgyu las ni/ /ma rig pa ni rnam spangs te/ /ye shes lnga
323b3(rgyud 'grel): ni rim gyis yin/ /blo ldan ston brjod rim pa yis/ /de nas sngags kyis dbang bskur zhing/ /'di ni sangs rgyas thams cad de/ /he ru ka'i lag na gnas/ /khyod kyis kyang ni rtag tu chongs/ /he ru ka yi brtul zhugs brtan//
323b4(rgyud 'grel): oM sarba ta thA ga ta sid+d+hi badzra sa ma ya tiSh+Tha o Sha stwaM pA ra ya mi/ /oM ha ha ha ha ho:/ zhes bya ba ni rdo rje'i brtul zhugs sbyin pa'o/ /dpal ldan khrag 'thung phyag rgya ni/ /phyi dang nang du yang dag gnas/ /thod pa kha TwAM cang ti'u//
323b5(rgyud 'grel): dpa' bo chen po sbyin gyis gzung/ /spyod pa'i brtul zhugs sbyin pa'o/ /rdo rje can gyi phyag g.yon gyis/ /chos gos go sar nas bzung nas/ /g.yas pas mi 'jigs sbyin byas te/ /slob ma la ni dbugs dbyung sbyin//
323b6(rgyud 'grel): sangs rgyas kun khyad 'dir shog cig /khyod ni dpa' bo kun rang bzhin/ /dpal ldan khrag 'thung zhes bya ba'i/ /de bzhin gshegs pas lung bstan to/ /dpal he ru ka zhes bya ba'i ming gis de bzhin gshegs par 'gyur
323b7(rgyud 'grel): b+hur b+hu ba swa:/ phyag rgya'i rgya ni rnam lnga dang/ /rtag tu rdo rje'i brtul zhugs bzung/ /thod pa kha TwAM cang ti'u/ /zung zhig zung zhig dpal chen po/ /rdo rje rdo rje kha TwAM ga /dril bu'i sgra ni 'khrol ba dang/ /tshangs skud rang bzhin rnal 'byor dang
324a1(rgyud 'grel): rdo rje kha TwAM rnal 'byor dang/ /dpal ldan khrag 'thung phyag rgya ni/ /phyi rol nang du yang dag gnas/ /khams gsum gyi ni rgyal chen po/ /gtso bo dpal ldan yon tan gtso/ /thams cad bdud sogs pas
324a2(rgyud 'grel): rgyal nas/ /khyod ni mchog gi grong du gshegs/ /shes bya ba ni lung bstan pa'o/ /phyir mi ldog pa'i dbang chen po/ /dpa' bo chen pos bdag la stsol/ /'gro ba mtshan ma med bya'i phyir/ /de nas sangs rgyas thams
324a3(rgyud 'grel): cad kyi/ /bdag nyid ye shes sems dpa' yi/ /snying ga'i sa bon 'od zer gyis/ /bskul ba'i dpa' bo rnal 'byor ma/ /rnams kyis mchod bskur rgya chen po/ /thogs pa rnams ni spyan drangs te/ /ye shes bdud rtsi chus gang
324a4(rgyud 'grel): ba'i/ /lag na bum thogs bde gshegs kyis/ /rdo rje 'dzin dbang gis bkrus par/ /dpa' bos rnam par bsam par bya/ /dbang bskur rdo rje chen po ni/ /'jig rten kun gyis phyag byas la/ /gsang ba gsum gnas
324a5(rgyud 'grel): 'byung ba yi/ /sangs rgyas kun gyis sbyin par bya/ /dpa' bo kun gyis byin brlabs pa'o/ /de nas mi bskyod cod par gyur/ /oM su pra tiSh+Tha badzre swAhA/ /zhes bya ba'i sngags brjod par bya'o/ /rnal 'byor mas ni ci 'dod par/ /kun
324a6(rgyud 'grel): nas rnam pa sna tshogs pa'i/ /de nas me tog mchod sogs kyis/ /dpa' bo de ni mchod par bya/ /de nas gnod sbyin rdo rje can/ /slob mas phyag 'tshal thal mo sbyar/ /sangs rgyas gzugs su dmigs byas te/ /rtag pa'i
324a7(rgyud 'grel): gnang ba sbyin par bya/ /sems can kun la phan don du/ /kun nas sems can thams cad la/ /ji ltar sna tshogs 'dul 'gyur ba/ /ji ltar chos kyi 'khor lo bskor/ /de ltar chos kyi gnas su ni/ /rdo rje rin chen pad+ma dang//
324b1(rgyud 'grel): las rnams gzhug par bya ba ni/ /ci rigs par ni shes par bya/ /tshigs bcad rim pa lnga yis ni/ /khyab bdag gi ni gnang ba sbyin/ /rnal 'byor de nyid rig pa la/ /bya ba ma yin cung zad med/ /dpa' bo de nyid shes de nas/ /'dod
324b2(rgyud 'grel): pa'i yon tan lnga la spyod/ /bdag nyid sangs rgyas kun bdag nyid/ /rang nyid lha mo kun rang bzhin/ /ci rigs par ni shes par bya/ /de phyir dngos po kun gyis ni/ /bdag nyid dpal ldan khrag 'thung mchog /rten cing 'brel par 'byung
324b3(rgyud 'grel): ba'i chos/ /sems can don ni gzugs brnyan te/ /de ltar 'jig rten gsum shes nas/ /sems can don ni mnyam med kyis/ /sangs rgyas thams cad mnyam sbyor ba'i/ /sdom pa nyams par khyed byed pa/ /ji snyed sangs rgyas
324b4(rgyud 'grel): thams cad dang/ /byang chub sems dpa' rdo rje 'dzin/ /lha dag dang ni mi dag dang/ /de bzhin rnal 'byor sgrub pa po/ /de dag la ni snying rings na/ /snying las khrag chen 'thung ba yin/ /sems can khams ni ma lus pa/ /srid pa shin
324b5(rgyud 'grel): tu dag bya'i phyir/ /mi 'gog chos nyid sbyor ba yis/ /rtag pa nyid du bsgrub par bya/ /bdag gi ngo bo yongs spong ba/ /dga' thub kyis ni mi gtung ste/ /ci bde bas ni bde bzung na/ /'di las ma 'ongs sangs rgyas yin/ /rnal
324b6(rgyud 'grel): 'byor longs spyod thams cad la/ /cis kyang mi 'jigs dga' bar gyis/ /sdig pa med kyis khyed ma 'jigs/ /dam tshig shin tu 'da' dka' ba'o/ /sgrub pa gcig pu gcig la spyod/ /lhan cig spyod dang rjes la spyod/ /
324b7(rgyud 'grel): sangs rgyas byang chub bla na med/ /yang dag nyid kyis rtag tu rten/ /slob ma'i bya ba byas de nas/ /bla ma la ni yon dbul zhing/ /dngos po kun gyis phyag kyang 'tshal/ /mdza' bo kun kyang bsdu bar bya/ /zhes bya ba ni phyir mi
325a1(rgyud 'grel): ldog pa'i dbang ngo/ /skabs med rnams kyi skyabs dang mgon/ /khyab bdag sangs rgyas kun bdag nyid/ /thugs rje chen po rgyu med pa/ /mgon med mgon med bka' drin mdzod/ /gang zhig bdag chen
325a2(rgyud 'grel): khyod kyis ni/ /bdag la phan pa bden mdzod cing/ /'khor ba 'dam gyi tshogs su ni/ /bying ba bdag la 'dir skyabs mdzod/ /de la 'dir ni rim pa yin/ /slob dpon dpal ldan stobs chen la/ /mtshan chen dben pa'i gnas su ni/ /
325a3(rgyud 'grel): chung ma sring mo bu mo rnams/ /mkhas pa yis ni dbul bar bya/ /phyag rgya dam tshig bsrung 'gyur ba/ /gang dang gang du rnyed 'gyur bas/ /snyoms par zhugs te gang skyes pa/ /ma skyes pa yi rang bzhin te/ /lha mo thams cad
325a4(rgyud 'grel): 'dus pa ni/ /dpa' bo thams cad gshegs pa ste/ /gang zhig kun nas byang chub sems/ /gsang ba des ni dbang bskur bya/ /'di ni dpa' bo rnal 'byor pa'i/ /dam tshig rmad byung chen po ste/ /khams lnga zhu ba'i rtsi sman pa'i/ /bde
325a5(rgyud 'grel): ba chen po yang dag nos/ /ji ltar sangs rgyas sras po sngon/ /rdo rje 'dzin sogs rnams kyis bkrus/ /byang chub sems ni mdzes pa yis/ /de bzhin bu khyod bkru bar bya/ /e ma bde chen bde ba zhes/ /bla mas bka' 
325a6(rgyud 'grel): gnang bsgrub par bya/ /slob ma'i rnam par rtog spong la/ /pad+ma lag las spyad par bya/ /gsang pa'i dbang bskur ba'o// //rang gi byin rlabs rig pa 'am/ /gzhan gyi grub mdza' gzhan yin te/ /mchog ni
325a7(rgyud 'grel): rtogs par bya ba'i phyir/ /de phyir ston pas gtad par bya/ /lha mo phyag rgya chen po 'di/ /bde ba dpag med ster ba mo/ /rnam pa kun tu bus gzung ste/ /bla na med pa'i mchod pa gyis/ /lha mo nges ni gnang byin ste/ /
325b1(rgyud 'grel): dpa' bo bla na med pa'i gu/ /byang chub sa bon la spyod pa/ /dpa' bo khyod ni spro 'am ci/ /rigs lnga las ni nges byung ba'i/ /rig ma las ni gus mchod dang/ /bshang gci khu ba khrag la sogs/ /da lta nyid du za nus sam/ /gzhan
325b2(rgyud 'grel): yang dam tshig gang dang gang/ /ji ltar 'dod pa bus smos shig /ji ltar 'dod pa'i dam tshig la/ /lha mo ci phyir bdag mi spro/ /rtag tu bud med cis mi gus/ /padmo las ni cis mi mchod/ /de nas lha mo de mnyes te/ /skra bshig
325b3(rgyud 'grel): cer bur rtsa ba dang/ /pad+ma gsal bar byas nas ni/ /b+ha ga mok+Sha ho:/ zhes brjod/ bkas gsang pad+ma'i dbus pa'o/ /rtsa ni bde ba babs pa mo/ /byams pas sor mos bskul bya ste/ /lce yis de nas dga' gnas bya/ /lhan
325b4(rgyud 'grel): cig skyes dga' byed pa mo/ /dam pa'i lha mo des gzung ste/ /mchog tu dga' bas myos byas nas/ /lhan cig skyes dga' dor mi bya/ /sbyang bar ma byas dor 'gyur na/ /ltar yang phyir ni sbyad par bya/ /de nas bcom
325b5(rgyud 'grel): ldan 'das ma de/ /dga' mgu yid ni dgyes 'gyur te/ /spyi bor yan lag bzhag nas ni/ /rjes su gnang ba sbyin par bya/ /ding nas gzung ste bu khyod kyis/ /ji srid byang chub ma thob par/ /sems can kun la rmi lam ltar/ /kun gyi
325b6(rgyud 'grel): dngos po'i don gyis shig /shes rab ye shes kyi dbang bskur ba'o// //slob dpon la sogs bye brag gis/ /dbang ni rnam pa bzhir brjod pa/ /tshul sogs pa'i bye brag gis/ /bzhi po de dag bcu bzhi
325b7(rgyud 'grel): yin/ /'thad pa de dag yongs bca' bas/ /rim pa 'di bzhin dam pa rnams/ /rigs pa 'di ni dor gyur na/ /thams cad dag gis sangs mi rgya/ /brtul zhugs gong nas gong gyur pa/ /bu yis rig pa'i brtul zhugs spyod
326a1(rgyud 'grel): ces bya ba ni rig pa'i brtul zhugs so/ /chu nas phyir mi ldog pa'i mthar/ /slob dpon gyis ni dbang du brjod/ /lhag ma ji lta de ltar te/ /phyi dang nang du yang dag gnas/ /'pho ba'i rim pa'i bye brag ni/ /dpa' bo'i bdag nyid
326a2(rgyud 'grel): las shes bya/ /dbang ni rnam pa bzhir brjod pa/ /ji ltar brtul zhugs can gus pas/ /bsam gyis mi khyab chos thob ste/ /de ni skal ba can du 'gyur/ /phyi dang nang du legs rdzogs pa/ /phyi dang nang ni rang bzhin te/ /rang bzhin
326a3(rgyud 'grel): chos ni thams cad la/ /bsam gyis mi khyab pa zhes brjod/ /snang ba med cing mi gsal ba/ /skye ba med cing gnas med pa/ /lnga yi de nyid rdzogs pa ste/ /rim gyis lhan skyes bzang med/ /bsam gyis mi khyab mdza' med pa/ /
326a4(rgyud 'grel): 'gro ba brtan dang g.yo bdag nyid/ /bdag med pa ru bdag med gnas/ /dpa' bo chen po shes rab kyis/ /slob ma'i bya ba rdzogs nas ni/ /dkyil 'khor phyi rol mthon byas te/ /cho ga sbyin sreg gis rdzogs bya/ /slar zhugs rgyal
326a5(rgyud 'grel): ba la bzod gsol/ /g.yon pa yis ni dril dkrol te/ /mchod pa nang ni bstod par bya/ /g.yas pa yis ni rdo rje gsor/ /tshigs bcad kyis ni gshegs su gsol/ /khyod kyis sems can don kun mdzod/ /rjes su mthun pa'i
326a6(rgyud 'grel): dngos grub gsol/ /sangs rgyas yul du gshegs nas kyang/ /slar yang 'byon par mdzad du gsol/ /lha yi 'khor lo gshegs nas kyang/ /sngags pas rdul tshon bsdu bya ste/ /gtsang ma'i snod du bzhag nas ni/ /chu bo'i
326a7(rgyud 'grel): rgyun la dor bar bya/ /oM pi li ki li hUM dza(rgyud 'grel): swAhA/ /rdul tshon dor ba'i sngags so/ /dkyil 'khor rnam par bri ba yis/ /de nas dris ni nyer byugs te/ /'byung po yi ni tshogs bcas la/ /dngos grub phyir ni gtor ma sbyin/ /
326b1(rgyud 'grel): oM in+d+ra/ dza ma/ dza la/ dza kh+kha b+hu ta/ ba h+ni/ ba hu/ ra kh+kha/ tsanda/ pU tsa/ ma hA/ pa b+ha/ ta pa ta pa ye/ ad+ha/ sa pa sya swA hA/ i daM ba liM/ b+hu na dza/ dzing+ga/ phu la/ du pa/ ma ma sa ping+ga/ a md+ha g+ha dza sa pa ha/ khandi/ khu ni/ phed lha g+ha d+ha/ oM a
326b2(rgyud 'grel): kA ro mu khaM/ sarba d+harmA NA/ Adya nud+pa n+na dwata/ oM A(rgyud 'grel): hUM phaT swA hA/ gtor ma sbyin nas slar yang ni/ gsang sngags 'di ni brjod par bya/ /oM badzra satwa sa ma ya/ ma nu pa la ya/ dri Dho me b+ha ba/ su po Sh+yo me b+ha ba/ su to Sh+yo ma b+ha ba/ shA
326b3(rgyud 'grel): shwa to ma b+ha ba/ a nu rak+to me b+ha ba/ sarba sid+d+hi me pra yats+tsha/ sarba karma su tsa me tsit+taM/ sh+re ya(rgyud 'grel): ku ru hUM/ ha ha ha ha ha ho/ /b+ha ga ban sarba ta thA ga ta h+ri da ya mi hyi ti Sh+Ta mA me muny+tsa/ badzri b+ha ba/ mahA sa ma ya satwa a mu:/ rab gnas dang
326b4(rgyud 'grel): ni sbyin sreg dang/ /nges par dkyil 'khor yan lag ste/ /dkyil 'khor de ma thag pa ni/ /sbyin sreg rab gnas brjod par bya/ /de nyid bcu shes slob dpon gyis/ /rab tu gnas par byar 'os te/ /gza' dang skar ma bzang sogs
326b5(rgyud 'grel): la/ /mdzos pa yis ni shes par bya/ /mgul brgyan dpung rgyan rkang gdub par/ /rna rgyan dang ni lag gdub ste/ /gser ni man cha las byas pa'i/ /sor gdub tsam ni bcing bar bya/ /thog mar re zhig slob dpon gyi/ /dril bu
326b6(rgyud 'grel): lag par dgrol bya zhing/ /g.yas pas rdo rje gsor byas te/ /cho ga de bzhin gtor ma bzhin/ /pa yi rnam lnga shing shun lnga/ /khyad par du ni dri lnga yis/ /lus can rnams ni bkru bya ste/ /mchod pa la sogs sngon bzhin
326b7(rgyud 'grel): dbul/ /dgongs kar yul nges shes pa ste/ /lhag par gnas par bya ba yin/ /dung chos chu yis gsang gtor gyis/ /gzugs brnyan la sogs bkru byas te/ /shin tu 'jam pa'i gos kyis ni/ /las rnams phyi bar
327a1(rgyud 'grel): bya ba yin/ /ji lta'i lha rnams dmigs nas ni/ /lha'i gzugs rnams nam mkha' ste/ /'od zer gtso bos rnams spros nas/ /de yang lcags kyu'i rnam pa yis/ /de bzhin gshegs kun spyan drangs te/ /gzugs
327a2(rgyud 'grel): brnyan la sogs thugs ka ru/ /sangs rgyas thams cad gzhugs par bya/ /ji ltar sangs rgyas thams cad ni/ /dga' ldan la ni rab gnas dang/ /lha mo rgyu 'phrul lhums ji bzhin/ /ji ltar gzugs brnyan 'dir
327a3(rgyud 'grel): bzhugs shing/ /gru bzhi pa la khru bzhi pa'o/ /de nas lhag gnas khang pa dang/ /ring ba nyid du mi bya ste/ /dpang su khru do mtho ba ni/ /brtan par legs rkos skal ldan gyis/ /mkhas pa yi ni stegs bsdu bya/ /shar
327a4(rgyud 'grel): phyogs mngon phyogs 'dug byas te/ /lha 'di la ni mngon phyogs bya/ /rdo rje dril bu lag thogs te/ /de ma thag tu gtor ma sbyin/ /ye shes 'od zer sbyor ba yis/ /de nas lha mo mchod spros te/ /stegs bu'i gdan la gnas
327a5(rgyud 'grel): pa yis/ /lha rnams bkru bar bya ba yin/ /bris sku glegs bam la sogs pa/ /gzugs brnyan la sogs ji lta bar/ /me long gzugs brnyan bkru bya ste/ /de las gzhan la dngos su yis/ /sngags pa rnams kyis
327a6(rgyud 'grel): mnyam gzhag ste/ /mdun nas lha rnams bkru bar bya/ /oM sarba ta thA ga ta ka ya b+hi sho d+ha ne swAhA/ /lha rnams lha yi bdag nyid kyi/ /slar yang dris byugs bkru bya ste/ /bkra shis glu dang rol mo dang/ /rnam pa sna tshogs
327a7(rgyud 'grel): gar mdzes pa'o/ /yo byad rnams kyi nus pa ni/ /bsogs te rgyal po'i dbang bskur/ /ji ltar bstam pa tsam gyis ni/ /de bzhin gshegs kun khrus gsol te/ /lha yi chu ni dag pa yis/ /de bzhin bdag gis bkru bar
327b1(rgyud 'grel): bya/ /oM sarba ta thA ga ta a b+hi She ka sa ma ya sh+rI ye hUM/ /mkhas pa gser gyi thur ma ni/ /man cha tsam gyi tshang byas la/ /oM ni mig la bsgom par bya/ /'di yis spyan ni dbye bar bya/ /oM tsak+Shu tsak+Shu sa man+ta tsak+Shu sho d+ha ni swA hA//
327b2(rgyud 'grel): mchod yon me tog sogs mchod nas/ /gsang sngags 'di ni brjod par bya/ /oM su pra tis+tha te badzri swA hA/ 'di ni stong du bzlas byas te/ /rab tu gnas pa'i rim pa'o/ /gsang sngags ma bzlas mi 'grub cing/ /sbyin sreg ma
327b3(rgyud 'grel): byas 'bras mi bsted?/ /las rnams thams cad rab bsgrub phyir/ /sbyin sreg las rnams brtsam par bya/ /sbyin sreg med par gyur pas ni/ /dngos grub 'byung bar mi 'gyur te/ /de phyir brtson pa chen po yis/ /sngags pas
327b4(rgyud 'grel): sbyin sreg las rnams bya/ /chu skyes rnams pa'i thab khud du/ /las rnams thams cad shis pa ste/ /khru gang tsam gyi kham phor te/ /sngags pas kun tu mnyam par bya/ /'og tu bskor bar bya ba'i tshad/ /khru phyed kyis ni chad
327b5(rgyud 'grel): yin te/ /skos pa'i dbus su pad+ma ni/ /mdab ma brgyad legs mdzes pa yi/ /de dag sngags bas thab khung steng/ /sor bzhi der bar byas nas ni/ zheng dang dbang du de bzhin te/ /sor bzhi yi ni tshad du bya/ /thab khung las
327b6(rgyud 'grel): byung rgyas pa yi/ /'dab ma'i rnam pa kha phyir te/ /kha khyir gyi ni phyi rol dang/ /pad+ma'i phreng pas bskor bar bya/ /sngags brjod pa yi sa la ni/ /kha dog dri dang ro rnams kyis/ /gal te dngos grub 'dod gyur na/ /sngags pa
327b7(rgyud 'grel): yis ni bsku bar bya/ /thab khung dbus kyi pad+ma ma/ /mtshan ma dgu ni bri bya ste/ /de dbus rdo rje bri bya zhing/ /'dab brgyad du ni bum pa bzhin/ /kun nas gru bzhi mnyam par ni/ /shes rab can gyis tshan? thig gdab/ /sgo
328a1(rgyud 'grel): bzhi la sogs dang ldan zhing/ /phyogs rnams su ni mtshan ma bri/ /pad+ma nags kyi lcug ma dang/ /bgrang phreng dang ni spyi blugs dang/ ri dwags pags pa de bzhin te/ /shar gyi snam bu dag la bri/ /rtse gsum
328a2(rgyud 'grel): zla ba phyed pa dang/ /rgyal mtshan dang ni ril ba dang/ /de bzhin du ni mig dang ni/ /lho phyogs snam bu dag la bri/ /'khor lo dung dang gtun shing dang/ /ral gri phug dang lnga pa ste/ /chu yi phyogs kyi snam bu la/ /sngags pa
328a3(rgyud 'grel): yis ni mtshan ma bri/ /mda' dang dril bu ba dan dang/ /rma bya ra skyes de bzhin te/ /gnod sbyin byi na'i phyogs dag tu/ /mchan ma lnga ni shes rab can/ /mchod yon sngan sogs sngon bzhin du/ /mnyam par bzhag pa
328a4(rgyud 'grel): thams cad bya/ /dngul dang gser dang zangs rnams dang/ /lcags las rim bzhin dgangs gzar te/ /med na mchod yon shing bu la/ /mkhas pa yis ni dgang gzar bya/ /mtsho skyes 'dab ma'i rnam pa la/ /yu ba sor ni nyid?
328a5(rgyud 'grel): bzhi/ /rdo rje khu tshur gyi tshad ni/ /ji ltar rigs par 'gyur pa yin/ de yi rtse mo gru bzhi la/ /rgyar ni sor bzhi pa yin te/ /kha ni sor gnyis zabs su yang/ /sor gnyis par ni shes par bya/ /rdo rje rtse mo lnga pa yis/ /dbus kyi cha ni byin
328a6(rgyud 'grel): gyis brlabs/ /ro yi rgyun ni lam yang yin/ /sor gcig gi ni tshad yin te/ /yum mthar rdo rje rin chen la/ /tshad ni sor drug pa yin no/ /blug gzar khru gang tshad yin te/ /sboms su sor phyed pa yin no/ /kha ni pad+ma'i mdab dbyings
328a7(rgyud 'grel): te/ /zabs su sor gcig rko bar bya/ /rdo rje rtse lnga pas mtshan pa'i/ /g.yu mthar rdo rje rin chen te/ /de nas thab khung g.yog bya ste/ /chu shing 'dab ma mdzes pa 'am/ /shin tu 'jam pa'i gos kyis ni/ /thab khung rab tu
328b1(rgyud 'grel): g.yog par bya/ /de nas ku sha dgram bya ste/ /rtsa bar bcas shing ma nyams pa/ /kha dog ljang zhing gsar pa yin/ /ku sha sgrub pa bas rkos nas/ /thog mar shar du dgram par bya/ /gnyis pa lho yi phyogs su ste/ /gsum pa nub kyi phyogs su
328b2(rgyud 'grel): yin/ /bzhi par byang gi phyogs su'o/ /oM i mi ku sha shu pa ti b+hya(rgyud 'grel): /b+hu ta b+h+ra ma pa wi tre te/ bud+d+ha d+harmma saM/ g+ha a mi ra dang pra ti b+hi saM dza da gar shAn+ti ku ru ban+tu swA hA/ ku sha dgram pa'i cho ga'o// //u dum ba ra pa la
328b3(rgyud 'grel): shad a mra a shwat+ta karmma rya/ /ne gro d+ha la sogs pa ye/ /'o ma can shing 'dab bcas te/ /mnyam par mthong rtse'i chad tsam la/ /rtse mo sbrang dang 'o ma dang/ /mar gyis spangs pa nyid dang ni/ /dkar po'i dri yis legs byugs pa'i/ /yam
328b4(rgyud 'grel): shing te ra bsngogs khyab pa nas ni/ /zhi ba la ni sbyin sreg bya/ /snying pa dang ni 'dab breg dang/ /gas pa dang ni 'bus bros dang/ /de la sogs pa'i skyon rnams ni/ /shes rab can gyis spang par bya/ /nas dang 'o ma zho dang sbrang/ mar
328b5(rgyud 'grel): dang til dang yos 'bog dang/ /mar gyis legs par sbrangs pa ste/ /yang na mngar gsum gyis spangs shing/ /ser po'i dri yi byugs pa'o/ /til dang zho zan mar ldan dag /pilba yi ni 'bras bu dang/ /a lu dandu la dag dang/ /zhi yi spris
328b6(rgyud 'grel): ma dag dang ni/ /pang na ga ge sar sogs/ /rgyas pa la ni sbyin sreg bya/ /tsan tsa ka dang a ka sho ka ba ku la la sogs pa yi/ /yam shing sor lnga'i tshad tsam ni/ /mkhas pa yis ni shes par bya/ /skyar po me tog dmar pa dang/ /de la
328b7(rgyud 'grel): sogs pa mdza' yas mchog /gzhan yang rang gi tog pa las/ /gsungs pa dbang la sbyin sreg bya/ /nimpa dang ni seng ldeng dang/ /pa la ta ka dag dang ni/ /myos byed kyi ni shing bu dang/ /kha dang tshad dang sgyur shing rnams/ /drag du ston pa
329a1(rgyud 'grel): byas nas ni/ /rtsa ba'i cha las byung ba yi/ /sor bcu pa yi tshang tsam la/ /dug dang khrag dang mar kus byug / pa la ka yi mar ku dang/ /khrig dang tshwa dang skye tshe dang/ /ni ma pa yi ni lo ma dang/ /dur khrod thal ba rkang
329a2(rgyud 'grel): ngal dang/ /rnga mo bung bu'i rtug pa dang/ /skra dang zhag dang kha la sogs/ /tsher ma mi rus phye ma dang/ /spu dang sha sogs ji snyed rdzas/ /dug dang khrag dang tshwa dang ni/ /skye tshe myos byed khu ba yis/ /rdzas 'di dag ni mkhas pa
329a3(rgyud 'grel): yis/ /legs pa nyid du byug par bya/ /sol ba dang ni thal ba dang/ /phug mas dgra yis gzugs byas te/ /gtub cing gtub par byas nas ni/ /mngon spyod phyir ni sbyin sreg bya/ mchod yon shing nyid dag
329a4(rgyud 'grel): dang ni/ /a shwat+thA la sogs pa'i shing/ /zhi ba yi ni sbyin sreg bya/ /rgyas pa'i sbyin sreg shing bu'o/ /snum zhing sgyur la me tog bcas/ /dbang la shis pa'i shing bu yin/ /tshwa zhing tsher bcas dri ba'i shing/ /dur khrod kyi ni shing bu dang/ /rnga mo bung bu'i
329a5(rgyud 'grel): rtug pa ni/ /mngon spyod kyi ni shing bu yin/ /oM sarba duSh+Tha u pa shAn+ti ku ru swAhA/ /zhes bya ba ni zhi ba'i sngags so/ /oM badzra puSh+Ti swAhA zhes bya ba ni rgyas pa'i sngags so/ /oM badzra saM kar ya swA hA/ zhes bya ba ni dbang gi sngags so/ /oM suM b+ha ni
329a6(rgyud 'grel): su b+ha hUM/ grih+Na grih+Na hUM/ grih+Na ba ya grih+Na pa ya hUM/ A na ya ho b+ha ga ban bidya rA dza hUM/ mA ra ya hUM phaT/ ces bya ba ni mngon spyod kyi sngags so/ 'bar ba'i dbus kyi dkyil na ni/ /chu yi me yi mtshan nyid ni/ /dung dang kun da zla bzhin ni//
329a7(rgyud 'grel): spyan gsum ral ba'i thor tshugs 'chang/ /phyag bzhi g.yas dbyug mi 'jigs dang/ /g.yon pa bgrang? phreng spyi blugs 'dzin/ /dkar dang rgyan can tshangs spyad can/ /lus kun gyi na yin lag las/ /bdud rtsi yi ni rang bzhin gyi/ /'od
329b1(rgyud 'grel): zer dkar po dag 'phro ba/ /zhi ba la ni bsam par bya/ /de bzhin du 'bar ba'i dbus su sa'i dkyil 'khor la/ /laM las byung ba'i rang bzhin rgyas pa'i me lha spyan gsum pa/ /ral pa'i thor tshugs can/ /phyag g.yas ba dag na dbyug pa dang
329b2(rgyud 'grel): mchog sbyin 'dzin cing/ /g.yon pa dag na bgrang phreng dang spyi blugs 'dzin/ /ser bo'i rgyan dang mchod phyir thogs pa 'chang zhing 'od zer ser po 'phro ba/ /sems can ma lus pa'i stobs dang/ /grags pa dang/ bkra shis pa rab tu bgengs
329b3(rgyud 'grel): pa rgyas pa la bsgom par bya/ /de bzhin du 'bar ba'i dbus su raM las byung ba dbang gi me/ /nyi ma gzhon nu ma ltar dmar po 'phro ba/ /spyan gsum pa/ ral pa'i thor tshugs dang ldan pa phyag gzhi pa g.yas na dbyug tho dang lcags kyu
329b4(rgyud 'grel): 'dzin la/ /g.yon na zhags pa dang spyi blugs 'dzin pa/ /dmar po'i gos dang rgyan 'chang zhing phreng ba dang dris nye bar byugs pa/ mchod phyir thogs pa 'chang ba/ dbang la 'dod pa bsgom par bya'o/ /de bzhin du 'bar ba'i dbus su rlung gi dkyil 'khor
329b5(rgyud 'grel): gyi steng du yi ge yaM las byung ba'i me du bo'i mdo ba can/ spyan gsum pa zur gyis gzigs pa/ sgra ser po gyen du brdzes pa shin tu spros shing spyan dmar ga mche ba gtsigs bzhin gnyer ba/ 'khrugs shing cher 'jigs pa/ rgyan nag pos
329b6(rgyud 'grel): brgyan cing mchod phyir thogs pa 'chang pa/ 'od zer nag po 'phro bas srid pa gsum khyab pa/ phyag bzhi pa/ phyag g.yas na dbyug tho dang ral gri thogs pa/ g.yon na zhags pa dang spyi blugs 'dzin pa/ rlung gi me mngon spyod la snyom par bya'o
329b7(rgyud 'grel): de nas lus bkru dri zhim byug /ji ltar 'dod pa'i rgyan bgos te/ /zhi dang rgyas dang de bzhin dbang/ /bsad pa yi ni las rnams la/ /ji ltar las dang rjes mthun par/ /blo ldan gyis ni sngon bzhin brjod/ /sems can kun la phan brtson
330a1(rgyud 'grel): pas/ /ji ltar 'dod pa thams cad bya/ /bsrung ba'i 'khor lo sngon bzhin du/ /sngags pa yis ni bya ba yin/ /shar phyogs su ni mngon phyogs dang/ /de bzhin du ni byang du yin/ /nub phyogs su ni mngon phyogs te/ /de bzhin du
330a2(rgyud 'grel): ji lho phyogs yin/ /zhi ba la sogs pa 'dug nas/ /las bzhi po ni bya ba yin/ /de nas las dang rjes su mthun pa'i tshul gyis phyi rol gyi me dgug ste/ rdo rje gnod sbyin gyi sngags kyi bzlas pa'i chu ku sha'i rtse mos blangs nas bskor
330a3(rgyud 'grel): zhing bsang gtor lan gsum gyi bar bya'o/ /de'i rjes su btsang zhing skom pa'i rtsa dang lhan cig pa'i shing la/ rlung yab kyis me rab tu sbar bar bya'o/ /oM dzwA la dzwA la hUM zhes bya ba ni sbar ba'i sngags so/ /oM badzra yak+Sha hUM zhes bya ba ni
330a4(rgyud 'grel): gnod sbyin gyi sngags so/ /dam tshig sems dpa' brjod pa bzhin/ /thab khung dbus su des bsams te/ /ye shes sems dpa' spyan drang ba/ /sngags dang phyag rgyas bya ba yin/ /g.yas pa'i mi 'jigs rgya byas te/ /mthe
330a5(rgyud 'grel): bod gis ni srin lag gi /rtsa ba'i tshigs la reg byas te/ /yang dang yang du bskul bar bya/ /'di nyid kyi ni phyag rgya ni/ /me 'gugs pa yi mchog yin no/ /tshur gshegs tshur gshegs mgon po che/ /sangs rgyas bla med
330a6(rgyud 'grel): las bla med/ /dgang blugs 'di ni bzhes nas su/ /de nyid du ni bzhugs su gsol/ /de nas me lha spyan drangs pa/ /dam tshig sems dpa' dang gcig tu byas te mchod yon la sogs pa phul nas/ byin gyi gnyis kyi nang du
330a7(rgyud 'grel): bzhag la/ blugs gzar gyis dgang blugs gsum sangs rgyas thams cad dang mnyam par sbyor ba'i sngags kyis dbul bar bya'o/ /yang dgang gzar khengs par byas la/ /de'i steng du blugs gzar bzhag ste/ lag pa
330b1(rgyud 'grel): g.yas pa'i mthe bong dang mthe chung sbrel te/ lhag ma'i sor mo yu ba'i steng du bzhag la mar gyi dgang blugs dbul bar bya'o/ /de nas yo byad thams cad sngar brjod pa'i sngags kyi sbyin sreg bya zhing/ sngags kyi bcu chas sbyin sreg bya'o/ /de
330b2(rgyud 'grel): nas bsreg rdzas dang/ me tog la sogs pa dang/ bshos bzang la sogs pa dbul bar bya'o/ /rdzogs pa'i mthar oM h+ri(rgyud 'grel): zhes bya ba'i sngags 'dis mar gyi dgang blugs nyi shu rtsa gcig gis gzi byin bskyed par bya'o/ /de'i
330b3(rgyud 'grel): rdzes la gang ba'i dgang blugs dbul bar bya zhing/ mchod yon la sogs pa dbul bar bya'o/ /de nas stod cing yid la 'dod pa'i dngos grub la gsol ba btab ste bzod pa gsol la/ oM mu(rgyud 'grel): zhes brjod de steng du gshegs su gsol
330b4(rgyud 'grel): bar bya'o/ /oM khyed kyis sems can don kun mdzad/ /rjes su mthun pa'i dngos grub stsol/ /sangs rgyas yul du gshegs nas kyang/ /slar yang byon par mdzad du gsol/ /ye shes sems dpa' gshegs gsol nas/
330b5(rgyud 'grel): sprul pa'i me ni mchod byas te/ /bsang gtor la sogs phul byas nas/ /bsreg rdzas lhag ma bsreg par bya/ de nas gang ba'i dgang blugs dbul/ /mchod yon la sogs dbul bar bya'o/ /de'i rjes su yid la 'dod pa'i
330b6(rgyud 'grel): dngos grub gsol ba btab ste bzod par gsol la/ /dza hi dza hi zhes bya bas gshegs su gsol bar bya'o/ /sngon du brjod pa'i rim bzhin du/ /a ra li ho/ /zhes bya ba'i sngags kyis gtor ma sbyin par bya'o/ /'di yi mthar ni
330b7(rgyud 'grel): tshogs 'khor lo/ /sngags pa yi ni bya ba ste/ /bsdus pas dngos grub kun 'grub pa/ /cung zad bdag gis brjod par bya/ /nyin re lam ni zla ba re/ /yang na lo re dag tu ni/ /sna tshogs ston mor ldan pa la/ /tshogs kyi dkyil 'khor
331a1(rgyud 'grel): bya ba yin/ /dam tshig sdom pa shes pa yi/ /rang gi slob ma bla mar bcas/ /dam tshig dbus su mdor bsdu ste/ /pad+ma bde ba chen po 'di/ /thog mar rim bzhin bsgom bya ste/ /'byung po rnams la gtor ma gtang
331a2(rgyud 'grel): kun kyang dam tshig ba dang nyid can/ /rang rang phyag rgyar ldan byas te/ dus min yid kyis brtags nas ni/ /der ni rim pa bzhin du 'dug /me tog spos dang de bzhin me/ /dri dang phreng ba na bza' dang/ /ji ltar dmigs par 'gyur pa
331a3(rgyud 'grel): yi/ /bza' dang btung ba dbul bar bya/ /rim bzhin mchod pa byas nas ni/ /rang kha 'dam skyes thabs khung du/ /lag pa blugs gzar tha snyad kyis/ /snod las dgang blugs dbul bar bya/ /nang gi bdag nyid sbyin
331a4(rgyud 'grel): sreg gis/ /lhag pa'i lha ni yid 'ong ba/ /dga' zhing bde bas spro ba ni/ /dngos po kun gyis mnyes par bya/ /snod ni a yis khongs bya ste/ /mkhas pa yis ni so sor dbul/ /bla ma la gus dang cing grims/ /thams
331a5(rgyud 'grel): cad yid 'ong bzod ldan zhing/ /thams cad mtshungs par khrims ldan pa'i/ /slob ma las kyi rdo rje 'dod/ /de ltar rnal 'byor pa kun gyis/ /spyod lam la ni mnyam gzhag ste/ /skom par gyur kyang rgyu lam yang/ /snod ni
331a6(rgyud 'grel): skam bar mi bya'o/ /'thab pa dang ni snod pa dang/ /ku co'i sgra ni 'jigs pa dang/ /shin tu nga rgyal dang ldan pa/ /tshogs kyi dbus si bya'o/ /slob dpon gyi ni dka' min par/ /glu dang gar ni mi bya zhing/ /tshogs kyi 'khor lo'i
331a7(rgyud 'grel): gtso bo yis/ /gang la bka' snang byin gyur na/ /de yis myur du dgongs pa ni/ /bde bar gshegs pa'i bka' sbyin bya/ /brda dang brda'i tha snyad ni/ /sgrub pa po yi shes bya ste/ /shin tu rgyas par sbyor bsdus las/ /'phags pa lha
331b1(rgyud 'grel): yis bris ? yin/ /bcom ldan 'das kyis dpal ldan rin chen rdo rje dang/ /blo bzangs ma yis bka' yis rjes bzung bas/ /rnam pa sna tshogs pa yi babs ni bstan pa yin/ /srid pa shin tu 'jigs las sems can sgrol bar shog/ //
331b2(rgyud 'grel): rgyud kyi rgyal po chen po dpal sangs rgyas thams cad mnyam par sbyor ba/ /mkha' 'gro ma sgyu ma bde ba'i mchog ces bya ba'i dkyil 'khor gyi mchog sems can thams cad kyi bde ba skye ma zhes bya ba/ kha che'i mkhas pa chen po shes
331b3(rgyud 'grel): bya mthar dag la mkhas pa dpal rin chen rdo rjes mdzad pa rdzogs so// //dpal ldan o rgyan du sbyangs ba/ mkhas pa ye shes rdo rje dang/ /skad sgyur gnyan ban bsod de yis/ /bsgyur cing zhus nas
331b4(rgyud 'grel): gtan la phab/ /dpal ldan mnyam sbyor rgyur chen gyi/ /dge ba shel sgong ltar thob pa/ /rdo rje 'dzin pa'i sa gnas shog/ // */ /rdo rje sems dpa' i sgrub thabs bzhugs// */ /rgya gar skad du/ badzra
331b5(rgyud 'grel): satwa no pi ka/ bod skad du/ rdo rje sems dpa' i sgrub thabs/ dkon mchog gsum la phyag 'tshal lo/ /gang zhig phan bzang skyob pa'i mgon/ thams cad don kun ston mdzad cing/ /yang dag dkyil 'khor rdzogs pa'i mchog /rigs
331b6(rgyud 'grel): bdag sems dpa' la phyag 'tshal/ /rnal 'byor sgrub pa'i cho ga dag /rab tu sbyangs pas grol gyur cing/ /de gnas ye shes bzang po nyid/ /don mchog gsang ba bshad par bya/ /dam tshig 'khor la rdzogs byas te/ /phyag
331b7(rgyud 'grel): rgya'i yan lag rnam sbyangs pas/ /dngos grub kun gyi cha shas dag /nye bar sbyar ba'i yul tu 'gyur/ /sa phyogs mngon par dga' ba ru/ /bde ba'i stan la nyer 'dug ste/ /'gro rnams kun grol bsam pa yis/ /khrus rnams cho
332a1(rgyud 'grel): ga bzhin du sbyar/ /dus gsum phyogs cha'i bye brag gis/ /drug gi chos rnams rang bzhin med/ /der snang rtog pa'i cha bral zhing/ /'byung tshogs khams rnams ma skyes pa'o/ /'gro ba'i rigs rnams tha dad
332a2(rgyud 'grel): kyang/ /mtshan nyid rten cing 'brel ba'i rgyun/ /bya dang byed tshogs yul can nyid/ /kun rtags ye shes chen pos non/ /thugs rje snang ba 'od ldan pa'i/ /kun 'byung rin chen phung po'i tshogs/ /rab tu sbyar bas khyab mdzad cing/ /nye
332a3(rgyud 'grel): bar ston pa'i bdag nyid do/ /thugs kyi sngags kyis gsal byas te/ /kun nas sro zhing bsdus pa'i mthus/ /rdo rje sa gzhi la brten pa'i/ /rwa ba gur sogs mtshon char bcas/ /shin tu gsal ba'i snang ba las/ /thabs kyi phyag
332a4(rgyud 'grel): rgya rdzogs pa nyid/ /gnyen po'i ye shes stobs dang ldan/ /'gro gnas nyon mongs rnam par dag /rigs mchog 'khor lo bzang po'i tshogs/ /kun nas bsdus pas brtan pa dag /rdo rje sems dpa' i bdag nyid sku/ /'od 'bar
332a5(rgyud 'grel): zla ba'i dkyil 'khor bzhin/ /zhal gcig phyag gnyis sgeg dang bcas/ /rin chen rgyan sogs kun gyis spras/ /g.yas pa rdo rje rtse lnga 'dzin/ /g.yon pa kha TwAM dril bu 'khrol/ /dbu rgyan rtse phran lnga yis brgyan/ /byang
332a6(rgyud 'grel): chub sems kyi cha lugs kyis/ /'od 'bar kha dog sna lnga'i mdangs/ /stod smad na bzas rnam par glubs/ /pad+ma'i dkyil 'khor la gnas pa'i/ /nyi zla gsal ba'i gdan dang bcas/ /mtshan dang dpe byed phun sum
332a7(rgyud 'grel): tshogs/ /rigs kyi sprul pas kun don mdzad/ /gnas gsum yi ge'i mtshan ma las/ /spro bsdus rigs kyi sems dpa' dang/ /rang gi cha lugs phreng sngags bcas/ /thugs ka'i ye shes sems dpa' nyid/ /ting 'dzin
332b1(rgyud 'grel): 'khor lo rdzogs pa'i gnas/ /yang dag bskul ba'i byin brlabs kyis/ /sangs rgyas kun gyis dbang bskur zhing/ /rigs lnga'i cod pan rnam par mdzes/ /dam tshig phyag rgya rdzogs pa las/ /ye shes byin brlabs brtan par gzhug /lha mo
332b2(rgyud 'grel): mchod pas mnyes byas te/ /shin tu gar bcas rol mo'i glus/ /rigs kyi 'khor lo sna tshogs dag /yang dag stod cing gnas kun brgyan/ /thugs ka'i sngags kyi phreng ba las/ /sna lnga'i phreng ba spro zhing bsdu/ /oM badzra satwa hUM swA hA/ ji
332b3(rgyud 'grel): srid brtan par ma gyur par/ /'od 'bar 'phreng bas kun tu rgyas/ /stong pa ma yin mi stong min/ /dbu mar yang ni dmigs su med/ /shes rab pha rol phyin sbyor bas/ /thabs kyi snying rje'i bdag nyid rnams/ /de bas de nyid snying rje thabs/ /shes
332b4(rgyud 'grel): rab pha rol phyin par gsal/ /kun tu 'gro dang 'dug pa dang/ /nyal dang la sogs thams cad du/ /lha yi ting 'dzin brtan byas te/ /thams cad sbyang zhing byin gyis brlab/ /bza' btung thams cad bdud rtsi'i tshogs/ /yul kun lha mo'i
332b5(rgyud 'grel): dkyil 'khor nyid/ /bskyed la phyag rgya'i 'khor lo yis/ /bya ba'i phrin las sna tshogs kun/ /'gro gnas 'jug pa'i don bzhin spyad/ /dkyil 'khor mnyes pas mchod bya ste/ /dga' ba'i sbyin sreg tshim pa'i mchog /tshogs kyi 'khor lo rtul zhugs bza'  
332b6(rgyud 'grel): yi ge phyag rgya mtshan ma'i sku/ /rnam gsum mdzad pa sku gsung thugs/ /rtag tu gsang sngags sgra ldan pas/ /phyag rgya'i gnas kun mnyam sbyor zhing/ /thabs dang shes rab gnyis med pa'i/ /dngos grub sna tshogs nye bar 'grub/ /phyag rgya gcig
332b7(rgyud 'grel): pa'i bsam gtan mchog /rigs kun yon tan 'byung ba'i gnas/ /rdo rje sems dpa' gsal byed pa'i/ /theg pa bla med dam pa'i mchog /yang dag sbyar ba'i tshul 'di yis/ /ma lus mngon rdzogs sangs rgyas te/ /dngos grub 'khrigs pa'i
333a1(rgyud 'grel): phreng bas rgyan/ /rigs mchog phrin las mthar phyin shog/ //rdo rje sems dpa' i sgrub thabs slob dpon chen po rgyal po in+d+ra bu tis mdzad pa rdzogs so// //bcom ldan 'das dpal rdo rje sems dpa' i
333a2(rgyud 'grel): sgrub thabs bzhugs/ */ /rgya gar skad du/ b+ha ga bAM sh+rI mahA su kha badzra satwa sA d+ha ni/ bod skad du/ bcom ldan 'das dpal bde ba chen po rdo rje sems dpa' i sgrub pa'i thabs/ /dpal rdo rje sems dpa' la phyag 'tshal lo
333a3(rgyud 'grel): bde ba kun gyi mchog rig mnyam med ye shes gzugs/ /'dod chags zhe sdang gti mug nga rgyal phrag dog min/ /bdag nyid kun du rtag gnas srid gsum gzugs/ /dpal ldan tshad med bde ba'i rgya mtsho mi 'gyur ba/ /bde
333a4(rgyud 'grel): chen bde skyer rdo rje sems dpa' mgon po la/ /'gro pa gsum gyis gnyen gyur phyogs pas phyag byas te/ /sems can dus ngan rnyog pas nyen cing dge ster ba/ /yul la chags pa'i nyon mongs mun nag chen po rnams
333a5(rgyud 'grel): bla ma'i ? gis ser sna'i tho ba 'joms 'gyur ba/ /bde byed byang chub bla med bde ba thob pa'i phyir/ /'di yi sgrub pa cho ga cung zad bshad par bya/ /'jig rten mgon po rdo rje sems/ /skyob pa pos ni rnam gsum pa/ /rnal 'byor
333a6(rgyud 'grel): rgyud ni thams cad las/ /de bas thams cad lha nyid do/ /rdo rje byang chub sems 'di ni/ /sangs rgyas kun gyi ngo bo ste/ /de bas bdag nyid kun sbyor bas/ /sangs rgyas thams cad 'grub par 'gyur/ /sangs rgyas thams cad bdag nyid de/ /de
333a7(rgyud 'grel): bzhin dpa' bo thams cad pas/ /rang gi lha yi sbyor ba yis/ /de bas bdag nyid bsgrub par bya/ /rdo rje byin brlab tshul gyis su/ /ting nge 'dzin ni bdag dbang bskur/ /snying po'i phyag rgya sngag rig gis/ /gsang ba'i mchod pa mchog
333b1(rgyud 'grel): gis bskur/ /sbyor dang rab sbyor sbyor che ba/ /rnal 'byor thams cad bsgrub par bya/ /de nyid bcu la sogs tshul gyis/ /thams cad skye 'gyur bsgrub par bya/ /'di yis sangs rgyas thams cad dang/ /de bzhin dpa' bo thams cad dag ci bder
333b2(rgyud 'grel): yul la yongs sbyong bas/ /tshe 'di nyid la thob par 'gyur/ /de nas bcom ldan 'das dpal bde ba chen po rdo rje sems dpa' bsgrub par 'dod pas thog mar rdo rje slob dpon la bsnyen bkur ji lta ba bzhin du byas nas/ /dam tshig
333b3(rgyud 'grel): gi sdom pa'i dbang la sogs pa mnos te/ ji lta ba'i gnas sam/ theg pa 'am/ khyim 'am/ gzhal med khang ngam/ skyed mos tshal gyi gnas la sogs par/ /rang gi stan 'jam zhing reg na bde ba pad+ma sna tshogs kyi 'dab
333b4(rgyud 'grel): mas g.yogs pa de ni gdan thams cad kyi nang na dngags pa ste/ dpal rdo rje sems dpa' gang du rnam par rol pa sangs rgyas thams cad mnyam par sbyor ba mkha' 'gro ma sgyu ma'i bde ba blangs te/ oM badzra pad+ma a sa na mahA yo ga
333b5(rgyud 'grel): pi da hUM zhes byin gyis brlabs nas/ /stan bde ba la sbyor ba'i dbang phyug rnam par gnas te ji ltar byin gyis brlabs pa de bzhin du thams cad kyi stan dang sbyar ro/ /mnyam par bzhag nas rgyal ba kun/ /nye bar nam mkha' thams
333b6(rgyud 'grel): cad la/ /rdo rje se gol bcings pa yis/ /rdo rje rtogs pas bsdu bar bya/ /dza(rgyud 'grel): hUM baM ho sangs rgyas kun/ /rab tu sbyor bas yang dag brjod/ /thal mo gsum gyi sbyor ba yis/ /zhi ba'i thal mos mnyes par bya/ /cho ga bzhin du phyag byas
333b7(rgyud 'grel): te/ /ci rigs mchod pa rnams byas la/ /'dod pa lnga yi yon tan rnams/ /dbang po kun nas spro bar bya/ /dngos grub thams cad sgrub byed pa/ /zhi ba'i thal mo sbyor ba yis/ /shardza gan dar tshul gyis su/ /rdo rje dbyangs kyis stod par bya/ /
334a1(rgyud 'grel): mnyam nyid mi g.yo mnyam nyid mchog gi chos nyid can/ /thugs rje'i bdag nyid 'gro ba'i sdug bsngal sel bar mdzad/ /yon tan mdza' yas dngos grub thams cad sbyin mdzad pa/ /dri med mi g.yo mnyam
334a2(rgyud 'grel): med dam pa'i chos mchog can/ /yon tan shin tu phra ba'i cha la'ang tshad med de/ /dpe ni nam mkha' dang yang bskrun du yod ma yin/ /dngos grub mdza' yas mnyam med dpe dang bral ba rnams/ /sems can khams la dngos grub
334a3(rgyud 'grel): mchog rnams nges par stsol/ /rtag tu dri ma med pa'i thugs rje shugs las byung/ /smon lam grub pa 'gag pa med pa'i chos nyid can/ /'gro ba'i don bsgrub rab tu brtson pa mdza' yas pa/ /thugs rje chen po bdag
334a4(rgyud 'grel): nyid rtag tu rnam par snang/ /tshad med tshad dang bral ba shin tu rdzogs pa yi/ /bde bar gshegs pa'i go 'phang dam pa rnyed gyur kyang/ /kham gsum rnams la dngos grub mchog stsol mdzad pa yi/ /thugs rje'i spyod pa mi
334a5(rgyud 'grel): g.yo 'gag par yong mi 'gyur/ /e ma ho shin tu bzang po'i chos nyid mchog dang ldan/ /mchog sbyin rnams kyi nang na go 'phang mchog brnyes pas/ /khams gsum kun la rtag tu dngos grub mchog stsol mdzad/ /mgon por
334a6(rgyud 'grel): dus gsum sgrib pa med par rab mkhyen pa/ /dam tshig mchog gsum dngos grub dam pa bdag la stsol/ /de nas sngon tshe gang byas pa'i/ /sdig pa rnams ni bshags par bya/ /rgyal ba rnams ni dge bzang la/ /ma lus rjes su yi
334a7(rgyud 'grel): rangs bya/ /de rnams gsol btab par bya ba/ /skad cig skad cig sems par bya/ /ma lus pa yi dge ba rnams/ /sems can rnams la bsngo bar bya/ /de nas brtson 'grus chen po'i go bgos pa/ /snying rje chen po brlan pa'i sems
334b1(rgyud 'grel): gzhan la phan pa gcig bu mthar gyur pa'i mchog ma lus lus pa med pa'i 'jig rten gnas pa'i 'gro ba thams cad bdag gis sdug bsngal gyi rgya mtsho las bsgral bar bya'o/ /snyam du bsams te/ de bzhin gshegs pa thams
334b2(rgyud 'grel): cad kyi sku dang gsung dang thugs rdo rje'i bdag po bde ba chen po dpal rdo rje sems dpa' i ting nge 'dzin mngon du byas nas pad+ma'i lag pa g.yas g.yon gyi mthil la ma Ta yi ge gnyis las nyi ma dang zla ba'i dkyil 'khor tsha thams
334b3(rgyud 'grel): cad kyis rnam par mdzes pa'i mngon du brtags te/ de'i steng du 'dis rdo rje dang padmor bsam par bya ste/ oM mahA su kha sa man+ta b+ha dra hUM/ a zhes brjod nas rdo rje'i tshig las mngon du bsdu ba dang/ spro ba bya ba ni 'od zer sna tshogs kyi
334b4(rgyud 'grel): phreng bas spro ba dang bsdu ba bya ste/ g.yon pa'i sor mo thams cad du yi ge sa bon lnga las gzugs mar bsam/ g.yas kyi rnams la gtso bo rnams/ tshul 'di bsam mo/ /aM a aM a aM/ hUM hUM tUM hi a/ de nas snying po
334b5(rgyud 'grel): 'dis rdo rje thal mo bcing bar bya'o/ /oM badzra any+dza li oM/ /rdo rje khu tshur bsdams pa'i snying po ni/ oM badzra band+ha hUM/ de yang snying bo 'di lan gnyis sam gsum du brjod de dbab bar byin gyis brlab bo/ /oM badzra pad+ma saM yo gaM a bi
334b6(rgyud 'grel): sha mahA su kha/ oM badzra satwa hUM a/ su ra ta stwaM/ dza(rgyud 'grel): hUM baM ho:/ bcings pa de 'bab par gyur gyi bar du brjod nas de nas snying gar dgrol bar bya'o/ /oM badzra banda mahA kro d+ha ha na da ha pa tsa ga ta ya/ sarba duSh+Ta dra duSh+Ta/ me ma na
334b7(rgyud 'grel): sridz+tsa /dz+nyA na ma hA ta mon+ta ka ra pa ti tso gi ra bi ka ra hUM/ trat+ta tra de ta tat+ta/ de nas rang gi lus mi shes pa'i dri ma dang bral nas zla ba lta bur yongs su dag par bsgoms te/ oM sarbba bi shud+d+hi d+harmA ta sa ma ya hUM zhes yid la bsngo ba'o//
335a1(rgyud 'grel): de nas bcings pa de slar gnyis su bcings nas mdzub mo gnyis brkyang ba las lcags kyu ltar bcus te/ de bzhin du rang gi snying gar sngags 'dis grol bar bya'o/ /oM badzra band+ha a gu sha ma hA kro ta dza(rgyud 'grel): hUM baM
335a2(rgyud 'grel): ho(rgyud 'grel): hUM hUM phaT phaT/ de nas bdag nyid shin tu rnam par dag par bsam ste/ ye shes yongs su dag pa tsam la dmigs nas sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das de dag gis bdag la 'dis bskul bar bsam mo/ /stong pa
335a3(rgyud 'grel): yod med shin tu rnal 'byor mthus/ /nam mkha' bzhin du dam tshig nye bar gshegs/ /bde gshegs bde bar gshegs pa bzhengs su gsol/ /rdo rje sems pa'i skal bzang dpal khyod bdag /de nas de bdag gi
335a4(rgyud 'grel): bdag la bskul bar rig nas bdag nyid bde ba chen po rim pa 'di ltar bskyed par bya'o/ /hUM gi phyag rgya dang bcas par byin gyis brlab par bya ste/ de la phyag rgya ni bcings pa las brkyang ste/ mthe'u chung dang sren lag ba/
335a5(rgyud 'grel): dbus su mthe bong rtse sbyar nas/ dbab pa byas la/ snying gar dbu ma rtse mo can du byas te/ a'i pad+ma'i steng du bzhag go/ oM ma hA su kha sa man+ta pa tra a bi Shiny+tsa hUM a zhes brjod nas dbab pa'i phyag rgya bstod do/ /yang na a
335a6(rgyud 'grel): las zla ba'i dkyil 'khor du brtags te/ sa bon rgyal po rdo rje sems dpa' i kun gzhi rnam par rigs pa bzhin bsams te/ hUM gdan la a la sogs pas kyang 'od zer gyis chas brgyan pa ltar bsams nas sa bon
335a7(rgyud 'grel): hUM de las rdo rje rtse lnga par bsam mo/ /hUM hUM hUM hUM hUM/ zhes brjod pa 'dis rdo rje rtse lnga pa 'dir mngon du 'grub ste/ rdo rje'i ye shes de las ye shes rnam lngar gzugs dang kha dog sna tshogs su byung nas/ de bzhin gshegs pa
335b1(rgyud 'grel): thams cad kyi dkyil 'khor chen po la sogs par kun tu snang bar byed par bsams te/ de bdag nyid rdo rje la slar 'dus pas phyag rgya chen po'i tshul du gyur par bsams pa/ thams cad bde byed dkar ba'i phyir/ thams cad dag pa
335b2(rgyud 'grel): rnam dag ste/ /zla ba gang ba dkar ba'i sku/ /rdo rje sems dpa' mchog tu bde/ /rdo rje sems dpa' i phyag rgya ni/ /dmar po sna tshogs 'bar ba'i 'od/ /g.yas kyis bdud pa'i snying ga ru/ /'dzum bcas rdo rje gsor bar mdzad/ /sems
335b3(rgyud 'grel): dpa' i skyil krung dbyibs su gnas/ /chu skyes spyan yang yid tsam rgyas/ /sangs rgyas rin chen dbu rgyan rnams/ /sna tshogs rgyan gyi rnam par klubs/ /rgyab tu 'od dang 'dra ba yis/ /zla ba'i dkyil 'khor 'od kyi mchog /a las
335b4(rgyud 'grel): yang dag bskyod byas te/ /de nas kun tu spro bar bya/ /sangs rgyas rin chen khams gsum ni/ /rin chen gzhan dang mtshungs pa med/ /sangs rgyas kun gyi rin po che/ /de bas dbu brgyan mchog ces bya/ /bdag gi gzhan gyis
335b5(rgyud 'grel): mi 'phrogs te/ /dag cing dang ba'i chu 'dra ba/ /ngo bo nyid kyi mthar gyur pas/ /rang bzhin gyis ni de dngos grub/ /de nas byin brlabs tshul gyis su/ /snying ga smin mtshams mgrin spyi bar/ /gar bcas lag pa 'dud pa yis/ /rdo rje
335b6(rgyud 'grel): phyag rgya bcings par bya/ /byin brlabs phyag rgya 'di yin te/ /rdo rje khu tshur bcings bya te/ /mdzub mo mthe bo'i mtshan nyid du/ /g.yas pa'i mthe bo dbang po yis/ /kha ru bcug nas bsdam par bya/ /'di yis byin gyis brlab pa yis
335b7(rgyud 'grel): rdo rje dga' chen thob par 'gyur/ /bde ba chen po bde byed che/ /phyi yi gsang ba rnam sdud yin/ /rdo rje dga' ba rab bcings nas/ /dbu ma bcings ba nang du bzhug/ /mthe bo mthe'u chung mnyam bsnol ba'i/ /rdo rje'i phyag rgya bsgrub
336a1(rgyud 'grel): par bya/ /bcings pa de yis byin brlabs na/ /rdo rje 'dzin pa mchog tu 'gyur/ /'di yis 'di ltar rigs pa yis/ /blo dang ldan pas dbang bskur bya/ /dar gyis bcing bas bcing bya ste/ /'gying dang bcas pas mdza' 
336a2(rgyud 'grel): dgrol bya/ /dar 'phyangs 'dra ba'i tshul nyid kyis/ /thal mo yis ni bstan par bya/ /sngags shes pa yi sngags 'di yis/ /hUM a b+hi Shiny+tsa maM/ /'di ni rang gi rigs kyi dbang bskur ba'i byin gyis brlab pa'i rim pa'o/ /mthe
336a3(rgyud 'grel): bo sems dpa' i skyil krung las/ /mdzub mo rtse mo dgug par bya/ /gung mo mchog gnyis mnyam sbyor mnyam/ /lhag ma rdo rje thal mo 'od/ /sangs rgyas rin chen dbang bskur brgya/ /rang byung ba yis dbang bskur bas//
336a4(rgyud 'grel): rgyal srid mchog gi dngos grub kun/ /ma lum lus pa med par 'grub/ /spyi bo ngang ni dpral ba gnyis/ /blo dang de bzhin rgyab nyid du/ /byas nas dar dpyangs tshul du bya/ /oM bud+d+ha a b+hi She ke ru ru sphu ru dzwa la tiSh+Ta bud+d+ha lo
336a5(rgyud 'grel): tsa na sarbba artha sa d+ha na a b+hi Shiny+tsa ma swA hA/ /sangs rgyas kun gyi dbang bskur ba'o/ /rdo rje rab tu dga' ba'i phyag rgyas snga ma bzhin dbang bskur ba'o/ /oM badzra ratna a b+hi She ka hi ri mi ti sh+rI ya a b+ha Shany+tsa maM swA hA/ /rdo
336a6(rgyud 'grel): rje rin chen gyi dbang bskur ba'o/ /oM pad+ma a b+hi She ka ta re tu re tu tA re a b+hi Shiny+tsa maM swA hA/ /de'i phyag rgya ni sangs rgyas rin chen gyis dbang bskur bas dbu ma'i rtse mo phab pa ni pad+ma rin chen gyi phyag rgya ste/ 'dis
336a7(rgyud 'grel): snga ma bzhin du dbang bskur ro/ /rdo rje thal mo rab sbyor te/ /gnyis kyis rin chen 'dzin pa ltar/ /ji ltar rigs pas mnyam par bya/ /mthe bo rtse mo gdong bzhi yis/ /phyag rgya de nas rab bsgyur te/ /g.yas pa nyid du
336b1(rgyud 'grel): bzhag par bya/ /blo dang ldan pa'i sngags 'di yis/ /sngags rigs de bzhin dbang bskur bya/ /oM ratna ratna a b+hi She kE traM traM/ b+ha b+ha ta ta tra tra tra tra a b+hi Shiny+tsa maM swAhA/ /rin chen rigs kyi dbang bskur ba'o/ /rdo rje thal mo gdab pa
336b2(rgyud 'grel): ste/ /mdzub mo'i rtse mo yur tsam dgug/ mthe bo dpa' ba' i skyil krung du/ /lhag ma rnams ni 'od bzhin btang/ /sngon bzhin yang ni sbyang bar bya/ /las kyi rin chen dbang bskur ba'o/ /oM badzra karmma ratna a b+hi She ke hi hi hi hi
336b3(rgyud 'grel): shDi pad+ma ba da mu She a b+hi Shiny+tsa maM swA hA/ /rig sngags sbyin bdag la dbang bskur bar bstan te rang gi rigs kyi na thog ma nyid du dbang bskur ba'o/ /de ltar bdag nyid dbang bskur bar byas nas/ go bgo bar bya ste/ rdo
336b4(rgyud 'grel): rje khu tshur brkyang ba las mgrin par bzhag ste/ oM badzra ka pa tsa yA maM haM paM yaM/ zhes bya ba'i snying po brjod nas bcings pa de las mdzub mo brkyang ste/ /so sor nas gdong spang pa mdud pa'i tshul gyis snying ga nas brtsams
336b5(rgyud 'grel): te/ spyi bo'i gtsug gi bar du sngags 'dis oM TuM ka pa tsa yaM maM hUM/ lan gsum du byas na lus la cis kyang mi phyed par 'gyur ro/ /de nas a las bcom ldan 'das ma rdo rje shin tu dga' ba ma 'am rdo rje sems ma
336b6(rgyud 'grel): skyed do/ /bcom ldan 'das kyis cha lugs dang kha dog dbyibs su ldan pa g.yas g.yon gyi padmo'i dbyibs can du shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la snga ma bzhin du byin gyis brlab pa la sogs pa bya ste/ gnyis su med pa'i ting nge
336b7(rgyud 'grel): 'dzin gyis brtsam par bya na ni lung ngo/ /dza(rgyud 'grel): hUM baM ho:/ azhes brjod cing bcing ba ni nang gi dbu ma'i lcags kyu rang gi snying gar lcags kyus drang bar bya/ de nyid gdong reg pa ni zhags pa'o/ /de nyid lu gu rgyud ltar byas pa ni
337a1(rgyud 'grel): bcing ba'o/ /de nyid rtse mo bsdams pa ni dgyes pa'o/ /'di ni gsang ba'i phyag rgya ste/ /phyi yi phyag rgya rnams kyis kyang sbyang bar bya'o/ /de la de rnams kyi phyag rgya ni 'di ste/ rdo rje bcing ba gnyis su bya ste/ g.yon pa'i steng du g.yas pa bzhag
337a2(rgyud 'grel): nas/ mthe'u chung bsnol ba la g.yon gyi mdzub mo bsgreng ba'i tshigs nas g.yas kyi mdzub mo dgug pa ni rdo rje 'dod pa'i phyag rgya ste/ oM badzra kA ma aM ku sha ka ta hUM dza:/ zhes pa'i snying po dang bcas pas drang bar bya'o/ /de nyid las phan tshun
337a3(rgyud 'grel): du mdzub mo gnyis zhags pa ltar bcings te oM badzra pra pe sha ya swA hA/ zhes bya ba'i snying po dang bcas pas gzhug go /de nyid las phan tshun shin tu bskums te/ oM badzra kA ma band+ha band+ha paM/ zhes pas bcing bar bya'o/ /de nyid las
337a4(rgyud 'grel): mthe'u chung gnyis lu gu rgyud ltar 'byung ste/ rgyab sbyar ba 'di ni rdo rje dgyes pa'o/ /oM badzra duSh+Ti ka ma su ko sho ta ya ho/ zhes brjod nas phyag rgya des dgyes par bya ste/ bde ba'i thal mo 'am/ zhi ba'i thal mo gsum gyis dgyes pa
337a5(rgyud 'grel): bskyed nas mdun du rdo rje shin tu dga' ba la sogs pa mngon du blta bar bya ba'i phyir dbyangs bskul bar bya'o/ /rdo rje sems dpa' bde chen bskal bzang khyod bdag lags so/ /bsgrub la rtogs par mdzad du gsol/ /de
337a6(rgyud 'grel): bzhin gshegs pa kun gyi bdag nyid bde ba mkha' 'gro sgyu ma sna tshogs bde ba'i mchog /'gro ba'i rgyud rnam pa sna tshogs 'dul mchog grub pa bdag la grub par mdzad du gsol/ /a la la ho/ /de bzhin gshegs
337a7(rgyud 'grel): pa'i sbyor ba rnam pa sna tshogs gar rnams bstan du gsol/ /dza(rgyud 'grel): hUM baM ho(rgyud 'grel): kye ma bde mchog bde bas gzung ba rnam par sprul pa snang bar mdzad du gsol/ /a la la ho/ /de bzhin gshegs pa kun gyi sna tshogs sgyu ma
337b1(rgyud 'grel): mkha' 'gro slob mas gzung du gsol/ /de nas 'dug pa de langs te/ ma dang Ta las gyur pa'i mig gis nam mkha' i ngos la bde bar gshegs pa rnams kyis til 'bru bzhin brtags te rdo rje lcags kyu bcings nas/ dza(rgyud 'grel): hUM baM ho(rgyud 'grel): zhes
337b2(rgyud 'grel): brjod cing rang gi lha la mchod pa'i phyir/ de rnams kyi snying gar gzhug par bya'o/ /yang na rang bzhin gyis grub pa'i phyag rgya stsal te/ cho ga ji lta bu bzhin du byin gyis brlabs la/ dbang bskur ba la sogs pa byas/ mchod pa brtsam
337b3(rgyud 'grel): par bya'o/ /mdun du zla ba'i kha dog can/ /chu skyes zhal ni 'dzum dang bcas/ /phyag rgya mnga' ltor 'dren par 'dzin/ /sangs rgyas rin chen rnams kyis brgyan/ /rgyab tu lha mo chu srin gyi/ /pad+ma dmar po 'od dang ldan/ /dpal byed dran
337b4(rgyud 'grel): pa sna tshogs kyi/ /sangs rgyas dbu brgyan mchog 'dzin ma/ /sngo mthing mchog gi phyag gnyis kyis/ /phyag rgya rang gis 'khyud pa yi/ /sangs rgyas dbu rgyan phreng ba la/ /sna tshogs rgyan gyis rnam par klubs/ /'dud bcas g.yon
337b5(rgyud 'grel): nas sngo bsangs te/ /sangs rgyas gtsug gis rnam par spras/ /rnal 'byor 'byor ldan bsam bya ba/ /rang gi snying po rdzogs par bya/ /bzhi po de rnams ni phyag rgya phyi mo'i tshogs su bstan te/ gzugs dang/ sgra dang dri dang/ ro'i lha mo
337b6(rgyud 'grel): rnams phyogs bzhir rang gi stan la padmo'i lo ma la gnas par bsam mo/ /padmo'i phyi mtshams su sgeg mo dang/ phreng ba ma dang/ dbyangs can ma dang/ gar ma la sogs pa grwa bzhir bzhag go /de bzhin du me tog ma dang/ bdug pa
337b7(rgyud 'grel): ma dang/ mar me ma dang/ sna tshogs kyi dri yi sogs pa yang phyogs mtshams su bzhag go /gling bu dang/ pi wang dang/ cang te'u dang/ rdza rnga dang/ cha lang dang/ dar dir dang/ pa Ta ha gdungs pa la sogs pa yang phyogs phyogs su bzhag go /
338a1(rgyud 'grel): shar gyi sgo ru bsam pa ni/ /rdo rje lcags kyu 'dod pa mchog /g.yon du rdo rje zhags pa ste/ /nub du rdo rje lcags kyu rgyud/ /byang du dril bu bshad pa ste/ /de rnams rang gi las la brtson/ /kun kyang gzugs kyi
338a2(rgyud 'grel): mchog ldan pa/ /rang gi lha la rjes mthun pa'i/ /rang gi phyag mtshan 'dzin ldan par/ /ljags shes pas na dgod par bya/ /rang gi lha'i sbyor ldan pas/ /ci rigs mnyam par bzhag bya ste/ /mnyam par bzhag pa'i ting

338a4(rgyud 'grel): bcing zhib mchod bya ba/ /rang nyid lha yi ngo bo la/ /de dag gis mchod dmigs par bya/ /brdung dang gar du bcas pa yis/ /stegs bcas dga' bas bde ba yis/ /glu la sogs pa'i ro ldan pas/ /hUM a/ bde ba chen po

338a6(rgyud 'grel): Tasma ra ra te/ hu lu hu lu/ pra si ta/ ta ke hUM/ sru ta ki ni hUM dza dza/ hu lu hu lu/ a la la ho/ shud+hya/ sid+d+ha ya/ da ri sha ya/ sarba ka te ta g+he ta g+he ta g+he/ ta ta g+he ta g+he/ g+he g+he ta/ g+he te g+he ta/ g+he na to/ ta ki hUM dza dza/ hu lu hu lu hu lu/

338b1(rgyud 'grel): gyis brdung ba'o/ /aM aM aM/ haM haM haM/ baM baM baM/ daM daM daM/ dam tshig gsum gyis brdungs pa ste/ 'dis ni bcom ldan 'das sku gsung thugs bskul ba'i dam tshig gsum gyi gsang ba'i sbyor ba ste/ de rnams kyi brdung ba dbyings su blangs

338b7(rgyud 'grel): g.yas dang g.yon gyi lags yis/ /bgyings pa'i tshul gyi gar byas te/ /g.yon gyi mthe bo sprin lag sbyar/ /g.yas kyi ba dan gsum pa yis/ /phyag rgya 'di yis btab pa ni/ /sangs rgyas kun dang yang dag 'phrogs/ /thams

339b6(rgyud 'grel): du 'dod pas phyag bya zhing/ /'dzum dang bcas pas blta ba'i mig /smin pa mig dang mchu gdon pa/ /kha dang lus kyis gdon pa yis/ /cha lugs ji bzhin gar bya ste/ /phyag rgya thams cad dbul bar bya/ /na mo stu sarba bud+d+he b+hya:/

340a2(rgyud 'grel): dang/ /rdo rje rin chen bla na med pa/ /rdo rje chos ni gsung ba dang/ /rdo rje las ni byed par 'gyur/ /a ho su kha zhes pa'i ming/ /rdo rje sems gang gang klog pa/ /sdig pa kun las grol 'gyur zhing/ /bsod nams rnams ni byin brlabs

342a1(rgyud 'grel): hUM/ dz+nyA na sa ma ya stwaM/ dza(rgyud 'grel): hUM baM ho(rgyud 'grel): pra pe sha ya phaT/ badzra A pe sha ya a A/ /ji srid brtan pa'i gnas bzhugs shing/ /byang chub sems mchog spel ba'i phyir/ /bkra shis lhag nas brgyad pa yis/ /zhing

342a4(rgyud 'grel): yon tan rdzogs pa yi/ /me tog 'bras bu bzang ldan zhing/ /kun tu bzang po'i rgyan rnams dang/ /'dod pa'i lha mo rgyan ldan cing/ /yul kun chags pa rnam grol ba/ /phyag brgya'i dkyil 'khor bla med pa/ /lha dang lha mo bsam yas

342a7(rgyud 'grel): pa'i chos/ /tshul khrims brtul zhugs sdom pa dang/ /nyer mdzes brgyan pa'i yan lag rnams/ /rab bsngags bstod pas yi rang mchog /sangs rgyas kun gyi lam ston cing/ /don bzhin bstan pas 'dul mdzad de/? sbyor ba'i
342b1(rgyud 'grel): stobs bcad shes rab tshogs/ /thabs kyi theg chen bshad du gsol/ /phyogs bcu'i mgron gnas ji snyed mdza' / /mya ngan kun sgrol mgon po rnams/ /sku gsum bstan pa'i tshul gyis ni/ /dus gsum 'gyur ba med pa'i dbyibs/ /ma
342b2(rgyud 'grel): lus srid dngos 'gro ba'i tshogs 'don cing/ /yang dag gnyis med bstan par byed pa'i yid/ /byang chub sems mchog bla na med pa'i don/ /yang dag brtan gnas kun tu rgyas par bya/ /smin cing grol bar byed pa'i tshogs rnams kyis
342b3(rgyud 'grel): khyad par lam kun yang dag rdzogs par 'gyur/ /bsnyen sgrub phyag rgya'i yan lag sna tshogs pas/ /bdag gzhan gzung zhing yan lag rdzogs par spyad/ /thugs rje rnam dag dkyil 'khor rdzogs pa'i tshogs/ /rab tu grol
342b4(rgyud 'grel): bas gnyis med mnyam ldan pa'i/ /thams cad mthun pa'i tshul rnams mdzad bcas pas/ /bdag gis cha shas rab tu dmigs pas dbul/ /thams cad mi gnyis ye shes chen po bdag /bya byed rtog pa'i tshogs
342b5(rgyud 'grel): rnams rnam dag cing/ /sgyu ma rnam dag bya rtsal bde ba'i mchog /mkha' 'gro sgyu ma'i don rdzogs mnyam pa nyid/ /mgon po dus gsum sgrib bral sangs rgyas kun/ /dngos grub phrin las yul rnams nye bar ston/ /rang gnas
342b6(rgyud 'grel): nyams dga' mnyan nyid mchog gi bdag /rnam dag bya ba'i tshul gyi yul las 'das/ /oM badzra satwa sa ma ya/ ma nu pA la ya/ badzra satwa twe no pe tiSh+Tha/ dri Dho me d+ha ba/ su toSh+yo me b+ha ba/ su bo Sh+yo me b+ha ba/ a nu rak+to me b+ha ba/
342b7(rgyud 'grel): sarba sid+d+hiM me/ pra yats+tsha/? sarba karma su tsa me/ tsit+taM sh+re ya:/ ku ru hUM/ ha ha ha ha ho/ badzra mA me muny+tsa/ badzra b+ha ba/ mahA sa ma ya satwa A(rgyud 'grel): badzra gats+tsha mu(rgyud 'grel): rtse gcig dran pa'i ting 'dzin gyis/ /ma lus yul bcas rnam par grol//
343a1(rgyud 'grel): phyag rgya gsang sngags sbyor ba'i mthus/ /lha mo'i dkyil 'khor sna tshogs nyid/ /'gro gnas sdug bsngal las grol zhing/ /bde ba'i mchog kun mthar phyin te/ thar pa mya ngan las 'das par/ /btang snyoms
343a2(rgyud 'grel): kun tu mi dmigs pa'i/ /drag po'i tshogs bcas ma lus kun/ /rab tu zhe na rtog stobs kyis 'jug /de dag thugs rje chen po yis/ /'dul byed stobs chen he ru ka /phyag rgya dbyings dang mnyam par sbyor/ /rnam par
343a3(rgyud 'grel): 'phrul pa'i ting 'dzin gyis/ /phyogs bcu'i bgegs tshogs 'dul bar mdzad/ /yang dag dkyil 'khor brtan byas te/ /mtshon cha me 'od 'bar ba yi/ /dkyil 'khor kun nas brgyan pa la/ /bgegs kyi rgyal po kun
343a4(rgyud 'grel): bsdus te/ /phyag rgya bzhi yis dbang byas nas/ /myos shing gzir gnon rnam par dgod/ /thugs kyi ye shes rab 'bar ba/ /ye shes phyag rgya'i gnas kyis 'jug /kun nas 'phro zhing bsdu ba'i mthus/ /khro bo'i dkyil
343a5(rgyud 'grel): 'khor bstan 'gyur ba'o/ /zhal gsum phyag drug 'jigs par byed/ /rgyan chas mtshon cha'i tshogs rnams dang/ /cha lugs rngam pa'i tshe byad ldan/ /rigs kyi sprul pa'i bsam yas pa'o/ /gsang ba'i phyag rgya bzhi ston cing
343a6(rgyud 'grel): nges par brjod pa'i sngags rnams kyis/ /kun nas brtan pa'i dkyil 'khor rnams/ /yang dag sbyor bcas rdzogs par 'gyur/ /oM badzra kro d+ha mu sa la ts+tshinda ts+tshinda hUM/ hu lu hu lu/ tiSh+Tha tiSh+Tha/ band+ha band+ha/ ha na ha na/ sh+rI he ru kro d+hI shwa
343a7(rgyud 'grel): ri hUM phaT/ /thams cad kun nas rdzogs pa'i chos/ /rnam gsum yul kun rnam dag pa'i/ /byang chub sems nyid rang byung ba/ /thams cad rdzogs pa'i gnas nyid do/ /oM ma hA shU n+ya tA dz+nyA na badzra swa b+ha ba At+ma konyahaM/ thugs
343b1(rgyud 'grel): rje chen po'i rgyun gyis ni/ /thams cad khyab mdzad rin chen tshogs/ /don kun snang ba'i gnas rdzogs te/ /sangs rgyas mdzad pa rnam par dag /oM d+harma d+hA tu badzra swa b+ha ba At+ma konyahaM/ /rnam par 'phrul ba'i ting 'dzin mchog /'og
343b2(rgyud 'grel): min gnas mchog nyams dga' bar/ /phyag rgya rdzogs pa'i cha lugs kyis/ /pad+ma'i dkyil 'khor la gnas pa'o/ /thugs rje chags pa'i ting 'dzin dang/ /gsang ba sngags kyi byin brlabs kyis/ /pho brang rnam par dag pa'i tshogs//

343b6(rgyud 'grel): las me'i dkyil 'khor mchog /dmar ser gru gsum ra yis mtshan/ /de dbus bruM las gzhal yas khang/ /gru bzhi sgo khang sgo khyud bcas/ /ra ba rim gsum dur khrod dang/ /kun 'byung rin chen phreng bas mdzes/ /rigs kyi dkyil

344a1(rgyud 'grel): 'khor rnam bkod pa'i/ /ma 'dres par ni dag pa'i don/ /dbus kyi 'khor lo la gnas pa'i/ /sangs rgyas rdo rje 'dzin pa nyid/ /rab tu 'od 'bar phyag rgya'i tshogs/ /rigs dang rigs bcas mnyam par sbyor/ /phyogs bcu sangs rgyas thams cad

346b5(rgyud 'grel): nas/ /byang sems bde ba'i mchog pas rnam par rol/ /oM mahA su kha bo d+hi tsit+ta a la le ho/ /oM mnyam nyid mi g.yo mnyam nyid mchog gi chos nyid can/ /thugs rje'i bdag nyid 'gro ba'i sdug bsngal sel bar mdzad/ /yon tan mdza' 
346b6(rgyud 'grel): yas dngos grub thams cad sbyin mdzad pa/ /dri med mi g.yo mnyam med med pa'i chos mchog can/ /oM yon tan shin tu phra ba'i cha la'ang? tshang med de/ /dpe ni nam mkha' dang yang bskrun du yod ma yin/ /dngos grub mdza' yas mnyam med
346b7(rgyud 'grel): dpe dang bral ba rnams/ /sems can khams la dngos grub mchog rnams nges par gsol/ /oM rtag tu dri ma med pa'i thugs rje shugs la byung/ /smon lam grub pa 'gag pa med pa'i chos nyid can/ /'gro ba'i don mdzad mdza' yas par?
347a1(rgyud 'grel): mdzad pa/ /thugs rje bdag nyid rnam par gnas/ /oM tshad med tshad dang bral ba shin tu rdzogs pa yi/ /bde bar gshegs pa'i go 'phang dam pa rnyed gyur kyang/ /khams gsum rnams la dngos grub mchog stsol
347a2(rgyud 'grel): mdzad pa yi/ /thugs rje'i skyong? pa mi g.yo 'gag par yod mi 'gyur/ /oM shin tu bzang po'i chos nyid mchog dang ldan/ /mchog sbyin rnams kyi nang na go 'phang mchog mnyes pa/ /mgon po dus gsum sgrib pa med par rab mkhen

347a5(rgyud 'grel): 'phro gsal ba rnam gnyis kyis/ /thabs dang shes rab rnam gnyis rgyun/ /rin chen thig le rnam gnyis 'ong/ /rigs kyi 'khor lo rdzogs byed pa'o/ /oM ma hA su kha badzra satwa A(rgyud 'grel): dza(rgyud 'grel): hUM baM ho/ su ra ta stwaM/ /ye shes dkyil 'khor brtan?
347a6(rgyud 'grel): byed pa'o/ /yan lag cho ga kun bsdus te/ /rin chen 'bar ba'i gong bu la/ /mtshan ma rnam pa rim bzhin rdzogs/ /phyag rgya'i dkyil 'khor spro bsdu kun/ /mtshan ma lnga'i mthar ji srid yul kun brtan gnas pa/ /de gnas dmigs pa med pa'i
347a7(rgyud 'grel): chos/ /phyag rgya'i gsang gnas dkyil 'khor du/ /yi ge mtshan mo phra mo sku/ /rim bzhin rdzogs pas las mdzad cing/ /phyag rgya bstan pa'i ting 'dzin/ /khams gsum yul bcas rnam dag pa'i/ /byang chub sems mchog bde ba'i rgyun//
347b1(rgyud 'grel): 'khor lo bzhi gnas rim pa bzhin/ /dga' bzhis bskyod pa'i zla ba'i rgya/ /gong gi phyag rgya'i tshogs dang bcas/ /rab tu chags pas rnam grol sems/ /sku gsung thugs kyi sbyor ba yis/ /gnas gsum bde ba me mar bzhin/ /rnam par spro
347b2(rgyud 'grel): zhing bsdu bya ste/ /'dod pa'i yan lag rdzogs pa yi/ /thig le mnyam dang mnyam sbyor bas/ /dga' bcas byang chub sems bzhi bdag /'byor tshogs yang dag sbyor ba'i mthus/ /skye 'gags chos kun rnam par spangs/ /rdo rje sems dpa' 
347b3(rgyud 'grel): dpal 'byor pa/ /ji lta'i gzugs dang dbyibs su ldan/ /bde ba nyid kyis kun gyi bdag /kun gyi bdag la bzhugs par bya/ /chags pa med cing ma chags med/ /dbu mar yang ni dmigs su med/ /bud med kun gyi sgyu sbyor zhing/ /gnyis
347b4(rgyud 'grel): med pa'i theg pa mchog /thun mtshams sbyor ba'i phyag rgya yis/ /rigs kyi dam tshig sngags gsal zhing/ /bzlas brjod la sogs grangs kyis 'jug/ /ye shes rdzogs pa'i 'khor lo zhing/ /dam tshig yul kun mnyam sbyor zhing
347b5(rgyud 'grel): rim dang cig car yan lag gis/ /mtshan bcas mtshan ma med gnas dag /rab tu brtan pas gnyis med rdzogs/ /mang du gsang ba'i rdzas rnams kun/ /dag pa'i snod rnams bkang byas te/ /nye bar sgyur ba'i byin brlabs kyis/ /gnyis
347b6(rgyud 'grel): med bdud rtsi chen po bsgrub/ /bsnyen pa rab gsal rdzogs pa las/ /nye bar gnas pa'i byin brlabs rgyas/ /sgrub pa bdag gzhan 'bras bu nyid/ /yang dag brtan 'gyur dga' chen po/ /'jig rten mgron tshogs ma lus pa/ /rang gi
347b7(rgyud 'grel): sngags dang phyag rgyas dgug/ /gtor ma'i rdzas rnams bsag pa dang/ /dus gcig thugs kyi sems bsreg shing/ /gsung gi bdud rtsi dag par mdzad/ /sku yi byin brlabs ye shes lnga/ /nye bar bkod pa'i sprin rnams kyis//
348a1(rgyud 'grel): thams cad dkyil 'khor brtan pa'i tshogs/ /thabs kyi dkyil 'khor mnyam sbyor zhing/ /shes rab yum bcas rol ba nyid/ /de dag sngags dang phyag rgya yis/ /
348a2(rgyud 'grel): dbang bskur byin brlabs rdzogs par mchod/ /spyod lam kun tu ma nyams blos/ /phyag rgya'i dkyil 'khor brtan byas te/ /thabs dang shes rab gar sogs kyis/ /ral pa'i
348a3(rgyud 'grel): 'phro 'du rgyun bzhin gnas/ /nges pa'i gsang mchog phyag rgya'i tshogs/ /nyer gsal bshad pa'i tshul dag gis/ /don kun sku gsung thugs kyi tshul/ /rab sbyangs
348a4(rgyud 'grel): brtan par rdzogs pa nyid/ /mi shes dri ma kun sel cing/ /yang dag ye shes gnas gsal byed/ /rigs mchog 'khor lo rdzogs pa yi/ /sgrub pa'i thabs
348a5(rgyud 'grel): 'dis rgyas par shog/ //dpal rdo rje sems dpa' rjes su dran pa'i cho ga zhes bya ba/ slob dpon chen po thu bo rA dza ha tis
348a6(rgyud 'grel): mdzad pa rdzogs so// //ye d+harmmA he tu pra b+ha wA he tun+te ShAn+ta thA ga to hya ba da ta/ te ShAny+tsa yo ni ro d+ha e wan+d+rA rI mahA sh+ra ma Na:/ /
